JDG 13:20 Lang lasǝ-bǝsa lo amúr gyangŋan aban o a kuli ka, kara à sǝn mǝturonjar mala Yahweh mǝno eau aban o a kuli aɓa lasǝ-bǝshe. Lang Manuwa andǝ māmí sǝni anggo ka, à sarǝa a nzali nǝ ɓamǝsǝia.
JDG 13:21 Mǝturonjar mala Yahweh pusǝrǝi aban Manuwa andǝ māmí ɗǝm ɗàng. Nda Manuwa yi sǝlǝ ama ɓwê ka, mǝturonjar mala Yahweh na.
JDG 13:22 Manuwa ne māmí ama, <<Ɓafo, sǝm nda sǝm nǝ̀ wù ka, acemǝnana sǝm sǝnǝna Ɓakuli.>>
JDG 13:23 Sǝama māmí banggi wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh earce ama nǝ̀ wal-lú sǝm ngga, pà nǝ̀ ak pàgir mala pisǝe kǝring, andǝ pagìr mala mǝsǝsa a bù sǝm ɗàng. Ɗǝm ngga, pà nǝ̀ lǝmdǝa sǝm amǝnia yì agir kat, ko nǝ̀ hamba sǝm agir kǝla amǝnia ka ɗàng.>>
JDG 13:24 Mālá Manuwa ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura, sǝ tsǝki wi lullǝu ama Samsǝn. Mune gulo sǝ Yahweh tsǝki wi bù.
JDG 13:25 Bangŋo mala Yahweh tita pàktúró nǝ Samsǝn a Mahane-Dan, anre Zora andǝ Eshtawol.
JDG 14:1 Samsǝn wari a Timna, sǝ kya sǝn ɓè muna-ɓwama mala amǝ'Filisti a ban mǝno.
JDG 14:2 Lang nyar a là ka, yi ne tárrí andǝ nggè ama, <<Ən sǝn ɓè muna-ɓwama mala amǝ'Filisti a Timna. Ən nggǝ earce nǝma wu alami ɓǝ̀ duk māmám.>>
JDG 14:3 Sǝ tárrí andǝ nggè banggi wi ama, <<Kǝ muna-ɓwama pà kàm atà amuna-mamǝna mala amǝ'eambo, ko aɓalǝ aɓwana ma'sǝm kat re, mǝnana nǝ̀ tsǝa sǝ awu nǝ nggá al ɓwama aɓalǝ amǝ'Filisti, yià amǝ ɗwanyi kasǝ-ɓatau ka?>> Sǝama Samsǝn ngga banggi tárrí ama, <<Alami, acemǝnana nda ɓwama mǝnana ǝn sǝni ɓoaram a mǝsǝàm ngga.>>
JDG 14:4 (Tárrí andǝ nggè ka, à sǝlǝ ama Yahweh na mǝnana kǝ pàk mǝnia yì gìr ka ɗàng, acemǝnana Yahweh naban alta njar mala munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti. A bàkú mǝno ka, amǝ'Filisti na mǝnana à kǝ yálmúr amǝ Isǝrayila ka.)
JDG 14:5 Samsǝn wari a Timna atarǝia andǝ tárrí andǝ nggè. Pǝlǝa wari a ban aɓaban mala anggun-anap mala amǝ Timna, kara ɓè muna-im lo arkwar aban yiu arǝì.
JDG 14:6 Bangŋo mala Yahweh sulǝ amurí nǝ rǝcandǝa, sǝ kat andǝ amani ama pànǝ kǝ girbura a buì raka, bwal muna-imnì sàngi, kǝla mǝnana ɓwa nǝ̀ sàngi muna-mbul ka. Sǝama ne tárrí andǝ nggè gìr mǝnana pàk ka ɗàng.
JDG 14:7 Pǝlǝa wario kya nacau nǝ muna-ɓwame, sǝ ceɓoarî Samsǝn.
JDG 14:8 Anzǝm anonggio bǝti ka, Samsǝn nyare wario nǝ̀ nggá al muna-ɓwame. Amur njar ka, kyangye ace sǝn lú muna-im mana wal-luí ka; sǝ sǝni ka, mǝsǝnyi ramǝna arǝì mbǝl-mbǝl sǝ mur-nyi na kam aɓa lú imnì.
JDG 14:9 Samsǝn pǝlǝa ɗàrǝ́ mur-nyi a ɓabui, sǝ kǝ nui aban o. Lang yina aban tárrí andǝ nggè ka, pea wia aɓa mur-nyinî, sǝ à nu. Sǝama banggia wia ama ɗàrǝ́ mǝno yì mur-nyi ka aɓa lú imnì ɗang.
JDG 14:10 Pǝlǝa tárrí wari a Timna a ɓala mala muna-ɓwame. Samsǝn pàk girlina ace lìli-isǝban, kǝla mǝnana abura-māfela pàkkiyi ka.
JDG 14:11 Lang amǝ'Filisti sǝni Samsǝn panǝ aɓwana atè raka, pǝlǝa à yinǝ alaggana lumi-tàrú ace mǝnana ɓǝà pà kǝla aɓimǝdo ka.
JDG 14:12 Samsǝn banggia wia ama, <<Mǝ nǝ na wun ɓekǝ cauɓaɓe. Ɓǝ̀ wun nǝ̀ gandǝ súrǝ̀ mǝnia yì cauɓaɓe aɓa nongŋo tongno-nong-ɓari mala lìli-isǝban man, sǝ wun nǝ̀ banggam ɓalǝi ka, mǝ nǝ pà wun adaura linǝn lumi-tàrú andǝ anggea-daura lumi-tàrú.
JDG 14:13 Sǝama ɓǝ̀ wu gandǝnǝ nam raka, wun nǝ̀ pam adaura linǝn lumi-tàrú andǝ anggea-daura lumi-tàrú.>> Amǝ'Filisti ne wi ama, <<Na sǝm cauɓaɓenî ɓǝ̀ sǝm oè.>>
JDG 14:14 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Aɓa mǝligìr, girlina puro; Aɓa mǝ'rǝcandǝa, gìr pǝlpǝl puro.>> Nongŋo tàrú yi kutio, à gandǝnǝ na ɓá cauɓaɓe man ɗang.
JDG 14:15 A inea nongŋo ka, à banggi mālá Samsǝn ama, <<Ɓorikitakun burio ɓǝ̀ na sǝm ɓá cauɓaɓenî, ɓǝ̀ ana raka, sǝm nǝ̀ pisǝo wunǝ ɓala mala tárró. Wu tunǝ sǝm kani, ace mǝnana wun nǝ̀ tsǝk sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm pǝlǝ amǝ'tǝ̀r ka le?>>
JDG 14:16 Nda mālá Samsǝn ɓua a ɓadǝmbi, sǝ ne wi ama, <<A kǝ ɓinǝmǝsǝàm; a earcem ɗàng. A nongsǝì alaggana mala aɓwana mem cauɓaɓe, sǝ a nam ɓalǝi ɗàng.>> Samsǝn ne wi ama, <<Sǝni, nggearǝ tárrám andǝ nggem ngga, ǝn malaká nea wia ɗàng, sǝ palang sǝ a kǝ earce ama mǝ banggo?>>
JDG 14:17 Mālá Samsǝn ɓua aɓadǝm Samsǝn aɓalǝ anongŋo tongno-nong-ɓari mala lìli-isǝban mǝnia ka, sǝ a tongno-nong-ɓaria pwari ka, Samsǝn ne wi ɓá cauɓaɓenî acemǝnana kùrrî mwacang ngga. Mālá Samsǝn pǝlǝa wario kya ne aɓwana male ɓá cauɓaɓenî.
JDG 14:18 A tongno-nong-ɓaria pwari, kaniama pwari nǝ̀ kpa ka, aburana mala nggea-lê ne Samsǝn ama, Mana pàk-pǝlpǝl kútì mur-nyi? Mana pàk-rǝcandǝa kútì im? Pǝlǝa Samsǝn nea wia ama, Ɓǝ̀ wu rikma-rya nǝ mamǝna muna-ndǎ mem raka, wun pà wun nǝ̀ súrǝ̀ ɓá cauɓaɓe mem ɗàng.
JDG 14:19 Bangŋo mala Yahweh sulǝ amúr Samsǝn nǝ rǝcandǝa, pǝlǝa wari a Ashkelon kya wal-lú aburana lumi-tàrú, swárki agir-nggūrǝu malea, sǝ pè aburana mana à na ɓá cauɓaɓe male ka. Bumilul kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ nyare o a ɓala aban tarrí.
JDG 14:20 Nda à twal mālá Samsǝn à pè mwashat atà aɓimǝdo, mǝnana pàk murǝm-gyajam male. a ban lìli-isǝban ngga.
JDG 15:1 Anzǝm anonggio bǝti, a kúnì mala pwan-mǝssa alkama ka, Samsǝn warinǝ muna-mbul a buì nǝ̀ nggá sǝn māmí. Ne nkili-mǝɓwabure ama, <<Ən nggǝ earce mǝ nǝ kúti atà māmám aɓa kurǝm male.>> Sǝ nkili-mǝɓwabure ka eari wi ɓǝ̀ kùtí ɗang.
JDG 15:2 Nkili-mǝɓwabure ne wi ama, <<Ən twali nǝma a ɓǝsǝki, a ɓinǝmǝsǝi, nda ǝn twali ǝn pê murǝm-gyajam mô ka. Mǝ'kyauwa māmó ka ɓoarnsari kútì māmó re? Ida, twali ɓǝ̀ duk māmó a kúnì.>>
JDG 15:3 Samsǝn bang ama, <<Man yalung ngga, mǝ nǝ duk mǝ'ɗwanyicau-arǝu, ɓǝ̀ ǝn pakki amǝ'Filisti gìr mǝɓane ka.>>
JDG 15:4 Nda Samsǝn wario kya bwal amǝ'nzǝgban gbǝman-tàrú, sǝ kurkia ɓari-ɓari arǝ anggilatea, sǝ ɗúrkia wia ɓukan, a tsùrú mala nggilatea mana kurkia ɓari-ɓari ka.
JDG 15:5 Pǝlǝa tsǝk bǝsa arǝ aɓukanì, sǝ nying amǝ'nzǝgbanî à kutiki aɓa mǝssa mǝnana nda ban came aɓalǝ aɓaban mala amǝ'Filisti ka. Sǝ kutio soa bǝsa, pisǝ akūno mǝssa mala amǝ'Filisti mǝnana à rambi ka, andǝ mǝssa mǝnana à malaká cani raka. Ɗǝm ngga pisǝ aɓaban-anap andǝ aɓaban mala anggun-olif malea.
JDG 15:6 Pǝlǝa amǝ'Filisti ɗiban ama, <<Yana ɓwê pàk mǝnia yì gìr ka?>> À banggia wia ama, <<Samsǝn, nkil ɓwa'Timna na. Samsǝn pàk mǝno acemǝnana nkili-mǝɓwabure twal māfela mala Samsǝn, sǝ pè murǝm-gyajam mala Samsǝn.>> Nda amǝ'Filisti wario à kya pisǝ ɓwame andǝ tárrí nǝ bǝsa ka.
JDG 15:7 Samsǝn nea wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ anggo sǝ wu kǝ pak ka, ǝn kána mǝ nǝ mbwe wun akúnì, anzǝm mǝno ka, sǝ mǝ nǝ came.>>
JDG 15:8 Nda wal-luia pas, sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr pà kàm ɗàng, nǝ kaɓa walban. Pǝlǝa wario kya do aɓa sà-tali mala Etam.
JDG 15:9 Pǝlǝa amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti yiu nǝ rǝcandǝa mala lwa aɓa bù-nzali Yahuda, à bwal-kàttì anzǝm la mǝnana à tunǝi ama Lehi ka, sǝ à warinǝ munǝo arǝì.
JDG 15:10 Aburana mala tàu mala Yahuda ɗia ama, <<Palang sǝ wu yiua munǝo arǝ sǝm?>> Amǝ'Filisti earia wia ama, <<Sǝm yiu ace bwal Samsǝn, ace mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ pàkki wi kǝla mǝnana pàkka sǝm ngga.>>
JDG 15:11 Aburana á-tàrú (3,000) mala Yahuda wari a sà-tali mala Etam, sǝ à ne Samsǝn ama, <<A sǝlǝ mbak ama amǝ'Filisti na à yálkiyimúr sǝm ngga? Palang sǝ a pàkka sǝm mǝnia yì gìr ka?>> Samsǝn pǝlǝa earia wia ama, <<Kǝ gìr mǝnana à pàkkam ngga, nda gbal ǝn pàkkia wia ka.>>
JDG 15:12 À banggi wi ama, <<Sǝm yiu a kùrro, sǝm nǝ̀ túrrǒ a ɓabù amǝ'Filisti.>> Samsǝn bang ama, <<Wu kánbàm ama pà wun nǝ̀ wal-luem nǝnggearǝ wun ɗàng.>>
JDG 15:13 À banggi wi ama, <<Awo, kǝ kùrban na nǝmurǝi sǝm nǝ̀ kùrro, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ túrrǒ a ɓabuia ka.>> Nda à kùrrì nǝ aɓǝsa anggur ɓari, sǝ à pur nǝi aɓa tali mǝno ka, à umnǝi.
JDG 15:14 Lang Samsǝn yi bingŋǝna Lehi ka, amǝ'Filisti lo aban yiu a baní nǝ gāwàn. Sǝ Bangŋo mala Yahweh sulǝ amurí nǝ rǝcandǝa. Anggur mana à kùrkina agarabui nǝia ka, à pǝlǝ kǝla záng mana à pisǝì a bǝsa ka, à panzǝkya à nying abui.
JDG 15:15 Kum mu-garakún mǝdambǝriso mǝnana malaká ìm raka, pǝlǝa lǝmdǝ buì twali sǝ wal-lú aburana á-mwashat nǝi.
JDG 15:16 Samsǝn pǝlǝa bang ama, <<Nǝ́ mu-garakún mǝdambǝriso, ǝn ramgia amur rǝarǝia gum-gum. Nǝ́ mu-garakún mǝdambǝriso, ǝn wal-lú aburana á-mwashat.>>
JDG 15:17 Lang malna nacau ka, pǝlǝa nyesǝ mu-garakún mǝdambǝrisonî mǝnana a buì ka túrí, sǝ tsǝkî banì lullǝu ama Ramat Lehi.
JDG 15:18 Mǝsamùr wali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, nda ɓua aban Yahweh ama, <<A pana mǝnia yì kaɓa amsǝban ngga nǝ bu guro mò. Sǝ adyan ngga, mǝ nǝ wù ace mǝsamùr, mǝ nǝ kpa a ɓabù amǝ'Filisti, amǝ ɗwanyi kasǝ-ɓatau le?>>
JDG 15:19 Pǝlǝa Ɓakuli mǝn ɓè tūliban a nzali a Lehi, sǝ mùr pur kàm aɓalǝi. Lang nuna ka, kara nyare kum bǝsa rǝcandǝa, sǝ yilǝmi nyar arǝì. Ace mǝno ka, Samsǝn tsǝkî tūli-mùrnî lullǝu ama En Hakkore. Mǝno yì tūli-mùr ka, ndakam a Lehi bà yalung.
JDG 15:20 Samsǝn duk kasǝla amúr amǝ Isǝrayila ba apǝlǝa lumi-ɓari, a bàkú mǝnana amǝ'Filisti kǝ yálmúr amǝ Isǝrayila ka.
JDG 16:1 Samsǝn wari a Gaza, sǝ kya sǝn ɓè mā-gung abanì, pǝlǝa kúti a baní.
JDG 16:2 Cau mesǝ aban amǝ Gaza ama, <<Samsǝn yina kani!>> Nda à kàrì banì, sǝ à kùmsǝi wi, à nǝ̀ kundǝi aɓa dù kat, a kún nggea-là. Sǝama nǝ du ka à nea rǝia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɗeki sheɓǝ̀ bankwarna nǝ dǝmbari ka; pǝlǝa sǝm nǝ̀ wal-lui.>> Nda à duk ɗǝong aɓa dù kat.
JDG 16:3 Sǝ Samsǝn ngga nongŋo ba gakkya mala ɓadu. Sǝ lang ɓadu gakkina ka, pǝlǝa lo sǝ kya gbami agirkún bankutio mala nggea-lê, atarǝia andǝ anggunkúni ɓari, sǝ uia, kat andǝ nggun-gangndea mala múr bankutionì andǝ koman kat, sǝ imsǝia a kwàrì, pǝlǝa umnǝia a ɓong mgbang-ban mana a dǝm Hebǝron ngga.
JDG 16:4 Anzǝm mǝno ka, Samsǝn yi earce ɓè ɓwama a Ɓangŋaban Sorek. Lullǝ ɓwame ama Delila.
JDG 16:5 Aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ'Filisti wari aban Delila sǝ à ne wi ama, <<Swárí ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝo ban mǝnana kaɓa rǝcandǝa male pàk kàm ngga, sǝ lang sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ gandǝì, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm kùrrì, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ ɓunni ka; sǝ koyana atà sǝm ngga nǝ̀ po mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa á-mwashat nǝ gbǝman-mwashat [1,100.]>>
JDG 16:6 Nda Delila ne Samsǝn ama, <<Ida, banggam ban mǝnana kaɓa rǝcandǝa mò pàk kàm, sǝ lang sǝ ɓwa nǝ̀ gandǝ kurkio ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ɓùn rǝcandǝa mô ka.>>
JDG 16:7 Samsǝn ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa kùrram nǝ bǝsa amazo tongno-nong-ɓari mǝnana à malaká ìm raka, mǝ nǝ yauwiki, mǝ nǝ pa kǝla koya ɓwa ka.>>
JDG 16:8 Pǝlǝa aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ'Filisti yinǝì Delila bǝsa amazo tongno-nong-ɓari, mǝnana à malaká ìm raka, sǝ kùrki Samsǝn nǝia.
JDG 16:9 Delila ka angŋa-dǝmba yinanǝ aɓea aburana à ndaban kùmsǝó aɓa ɓè kurǝm-ɓaɓalǝu. Pǝlǝa Delila loasǝ gì na ama, <<Samsǝn! Amǝ'Filisti na amuro!>> Samsǝn kasǝki amazo mǝno kǝla kasǝa mala nkonggúr lang bǝsa je ka. Acemani ka, fe mala rǝcandǝa male ka à súrǝì ɗàng.
JDG 16:10 Pǝlǝa Delila ne Samsǝn ama, <<Sǝni, a swarkiam sǝ a nam nyir. Ida, nam lang sǝ ɓwa nǝ̀ gandǝ kùrro.>>
JDG 16:11 Samsǝn banggi wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa kùrram nǝ bǝsa anggur mana à malaká pàktúró nǝia raka, mǝ nǝ yauwiki, mǝ nǝ pa kǝla koya ɓwa ka.>>
JDG 16:12 Aburana mǝno yina à ndaban kùmsǝó aɓa kurǝm-ɓaɓalǝu. Pǝlǝa Delila twal bǝsa anggur, kùrki Samsǝn nǝia, sǝ loasǝ gì na ama, <<Samsǝn! Amǝ'Filisti na amuro!>> Sǝ Samsǝn kara kasǝki anggur mana à kùrki nǝia arǝ agarabui ka kǝla mǝsǝ'nkonggúr.
JDG 16:13 Pǝlǝa Delila ne Samsǝn ama, <<Bà adyan a camarǝ swarkiam, andǝ nam nyir. Banggam lang sǝ ɓwa nǝ̀ gandǝ kùrro.>> Pǝlǝa Samsǝn banggi wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a tâ nyang-muram mǝnana à bwalki arǝ abanì tongno-nong-ɓari aɓalǝarǝia andǝ nkonggúr-tàgìr mana nda arǝ nggun-tà'nggubyau, sǝ a kifi nǝ gara-tàgìr ka, mǝ nǝ yauwiki, mǝ nǝ pa kǝla koya ɓwa.>>
JDG 16:14 Sǝ lang Samsǝn na a ntulo ka, Delila tà nyang-múr Samsǝn mǝnana à bwalki arǝ abanì tongno-nong-ɓari ka aɓalǝarǝia andǝ nkonggúr-tàgìr mana nda arǝ nggun-tà'nggubyau ka, sǝ kifi nǝ gara-tàgìr. Pǝlǝa loasǝ gì na ama, <<Samsǝn! Amǝ'Filisti na amuro!>> Sǝ Samsǝn loapi ntulo, gwachi nyang-múrí arǝ gara-tàgìr, andǝ nggun-tà'nggubyau, andǝ nkonggúr-tàgìr.
JDG 16:15 Pǝlǝa Delila ne Samsǝn ama, <<Lang sǝ awu nǝ na ama, <Ən nggǝ earceo,> sǝ ɓabumo pà arǝàm ɗàng? A ɓangginanǝ mim kusǝ tàrú ado, sǝ a nam ban mǝnana kaɓa rǝcandǝa mò pàk kàm ngga ɗàng.>>
JDG 16:16 Delila camarǝ pisǝta Samsǝn tùtù koya pwari nǝ acau male andǝ ɓuakiarǝu, gandǝa lulbum Samsǝn kǝla nǝ wǔ.
JDG 16:17 A masǝlǝate ka, Samsǝn ne wi ɓabumi kat. Banggi wi ama, <<Twal a pwari mǝnana à ɓǝlam ngga, nkembu je muram a kǝ pwari ɗàng, acemǝnana mǝ nda ɓwa-nazir aban Ɓakuli twal a bum nggem. Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa mwa nyang ɓamuram ngga, rǝcandǝa mem nǝ̀ nyem, sǝ mǝ nǝ yauwiki, mǝ nǝ pa kǝla koya ɓwa ka.>>
JDG 16:18 Lang Delila sǝni ama Samsǝn nani wi ɓabumi kat ka, túrban ɓǝà tunǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ'Filisti, nǝ cau ama, <<Wu yiu ɗǝm, acemǝnana bangŋǝnam ɓabumi kat.>> Nda aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ'Filisti yiu abani nǝ boalo a buia.
JDG 16:19 Delila pǝlǝa tsǝk Samsǝn koa ntulo a byali, sǝ tunǝ ɓè ɓwabura yi mwa nyang-múr Samsǝn mǝnana à bwalki wi arǝ abanì tongno-nong-ɓari ka. Anggo sǝ Delila tita kyauwiki Samsǝn, sǝ rǝcandǝa male nying rǝì.
JDG 16:20 Pǝlǝa loasǝ gì na ama, <<Samsǝn! Amǝ'Filisti na amuro!>> Sǝ Samsǝn loapi ntulo male, ne ɓamurǝi ama, <<Mǝ nǝ puro kǝla mǝnana ǝn pakkiyi ɗiɗyal ka, sǝ mǝ nǝ dǝurǝ rǝàm ace panzǝ ɓamuràm.>> Sǝ yi ka sǝlǝ ama Yahweh nyingŋǝni ɗàng.
JDG 16:21 Amǝ'Filisti gbami, sǝ à ukki amǝsǝi à pusǝkia. À yinǝi a Gaza, sǝ à kùrri nǝ ansolo bolo-bángŋá. À tsǝi pǝlǝ mǝgogô a ndàkurban.
JDG 16:22 Sǝama nyang-múrí tita to ɗǝm anzǝm mana à mwani ka.
JDG 16:23 Aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ'Filisti ramba abanɓwáná ace pa gìr'nkila mǝgule aban Dagon, ɓakuli malea, sǝ ace pàkkiɗire. À na ama, <<ɓakuli ma'sǝm pàna Samsǝn ɓisǝm mǝbura a ɓabù sǝm.>>
JDG 16:24 Lang aɓwe sǝn Samsǝn ngga, à ɓwangsǝ ɓakuli malea. À kǝ na ama, <<ɓakuli ma'sǝm pàna ɓisǝm mǝbura a ɓabù sǝm, yì ɓwa mana kiɗiki nzali ma'sǝm sǝ wal-lú sǝm pas ka.>>
JDG 16:25 Lang à nda aɓa banɓoarnado ka, à bang ama, <<Wu yinǝa sǝm nǝ Samsǝn ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ yi pakgìr ace pa sǝm oalo ka.>> Pǝlǝa à pusǝ Samsǝn a ndàkurban, sǝ pàkkia wia gìr pà oalo. À tamsǝì a nre ka anggun-gbasha.
JDG 16:26 Samsǝn ne mǝlagga mǝnana bwalkiyi wi gara ka ama, <<Kyan nǝ mim a ban mǝnana mǝ nǝ gandǝ je anggun-gbasha mana à tamsǝ ndàmǝgule man ngga, ace mǝnana mǝ eangnǝ arǝia ka.>>
JDG 16:27 Ndàmǝgule mǝno lumsǝ nǝ aburana andǝ amamǝna, andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ'Filisti. Sǝ a múr-kurǝm ngga aburana andǝ amamǝna nakam á-tàrú aban sǝn Samsǝn kǝ pàk gìr pà'oalo.
JDG 16:28 Pǝlǝa Samsǝn pakhiwi aban Yahweh ama, <<We Mǝtalem, Yahweh, ida ɗenyinǝ mim! Ida, pam rǝcandǝa ɗǝm kusǝ mwashat ɓǝ̀rɓǝ̀r, We Ɓakuli, ace mǝnana mǝ mbweka amǝ'Filisti akúnì amǝsǝam ɓari mǝnana à pusǝkia ka.>>
JDG 16:29 Pǝlǝa Samsǝn tsǝk abui arǝ anggun-gbasha ɓari mǝnana a tsùrú, mana à tamsǝ ndàmǝgulenì ka, sǝ eangnǝ arǝia nǝ buì-mǝlì arǝ man mwashat ka, sǝ buì-mǝ'nggare arǝ ɓè.
JDG 16:30 Sǝ Samsǝn bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀n wú sǝnǝ amǝ'Filisti!>> Pǝlǝa mǝn rǝì [ramta anggun-gbasha] nǝ rǝcandǝa male kat, kara ndàmǝgulenì bǝbbǝriki amúr aɓwana-mǝgule sǝ amur aɓwe kat mǝnana aɓalǝi ka. Aɓwana mana Samsǝn wal-luia a lú male ka, à kútì mana wal-luia a do-yilǝmu male ka.
JDG 16:31 Amǝ'eam Samsǝn andǝ aɓǝla male yi twal luí, à umnǝi à kya tsǝì anre Zora andǝ Eshtawol, a ɓembe-ɓa-tali mala tárrí Manuwa. Samsǝn duk kasǝla amúr amǝ Isǝrayila mala apǝlǝa lumi-ɓari.
JDG 17:1 Ɓè ɓwabura nakam, ɓwa nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem na, lùllǝì ama Mika.
JDG 17:2 Banggi nggè ama, <<Mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa á-mwashat-nǝ-gbǝman-mwashat (1,100) mana à twalì arǝò, mǝnana ǝn oeo a sú ɓwa mana iu mǝsǝ boale ka, sǝni, mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfe ka nda a buam; mǝ nda ǝn twali ka.>> Sǝ nggè ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝko bù, munem!>>
JDG 17:3 Pǝlǝa nyesǝî nggè mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa á-mwashat-nǝ-gbǝman-mwashat mǝno. Sǝ nggè bang ama, <<Mǝ ndya ǝn nggǝ tàr mǝnia yì mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa ka nǝ buam aban Yahweh ace munem, ace pàk nkúl mǝnana à shàrrì andǝ ɓǝ̀nzál mana à ɓè nǝ bolo-azǝrfa ka.>>
JDG 17:4 Lang nyesǝni nggè mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa ka, pǝlǝa nggè twal mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa gbǝman-ɓari (200), sǝ pè mǝ'ntùl. Sǝ mǝ'ntùl pàktúró nǝ mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa man sǝ pàk ɓǝ̀nzál mǝnana à shàrrì, andǝ ɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-ntùl. Pǝlǝa à tsǝì a ɓala mala Mika.
JDG 17:5 Ɓwabura man, yì Mika ka ndanǝ ndà-ankúl. Pàk efot andǝ ankúl ace amǝɓala, sǝ tàr mwashat atà amuna-burana male ɓǝ̀ duk pǝris male.
JDG 17:6 A bàkú mǝno ka, amǝ'Isǝrayila pànǝ murǝm ɗàng. Koyana le ka pàk gìr mǝnana ɓoari wi a mǝsǝi ka.
JDG 17:7 Ɓè lagga nakam mǝnana ndanǝdo a Betalami, a bu-nzali Yahuda ka. Yì ka, ɓwa'Lawi na sǝ yi do kǝla bǝri aɓalǝ amǝ'tàu mala Yahuda.
JDG 17:8 Mǝnia yì ɓwabura ka, nying Betalami a bu-nzali Yahuda, sǝ o ace alta ɓè ban mana nǝ̀ duk kam ngga. Aɓa gya male ka, yiu a nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem, a ɓala mala Mika.
JDG 17:9 Mika ɗì ama, <<A pùr nǝ kǝshe?>> Pǝlǝa eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda ɓwa'Lawi, sǝ ǝn pùr a Betalami a bu-nzali Yahuda. Mǝ nda aban alta ban mǝnana mǝ nǝ duk kam ngga.>>
JDG 17:10 Mika ne wi ama, <<Do atàm. Duk tárrû andǝ pǝris abanam. Mǝ nǝ nggǝ mbweo mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa lum koya pǝlǝa ka, andǝ agir-nggūrǝu sǝ girlina.>>
JDG 17:11 Nda ɓwa'Lawi man eare do atà Mika, sǝ yì laggè ka pǝlǝì Mika kǝla mwashat atà amuna-burana male.
JDG 17:12 Pǝlǝa Mika kùrî ɓwa'Lawi man pǝris, sǝ yì laggè ka pǝlǝ pǝris male, sǝ do a ɓala mala Mika.
JDG 17:13 Sǝ Mika bang ama, <<Adyan ngga, ǝn sǝlǝna ama Yahweh nǝ̀ pàkkam mǝɓoarne, atàcau mala ɓwa'Lawi mǝnia mǝnana duk pǝris mem ngga.>>
JDG 18:1 A bàkú mǝno ka, amǝ'Isǝrayila pànǝ murǝm ɗàng. Sǝ a kǝ bákuì ka, amǝ'tàu mala Dan naban alta nzali liɓala mǝnana à nǝ̀ duk kam ngga, acemǝnana yi pur a bàkú mǝno ka, à malaká kum nzali liɓala malea aɓalǝ atau mala amǝ'Isǝrayila ɗàng.
JDG 18:2 Nda amǝ'tàu mala Dan tàrki akanggǝrang aburana tongno, aɓa tàu malea puppup a Zora andǝ Eshtawol, sǝ à tasǝia ace shenzǝ nzali mǝnana à nǝ̀ duk kam ngga, ɓǝà gya aɓalǝi ace súrǝè pepè. À banggi aburane ama, <<Wu kyane, wu gya aɓa nzali pacauni wu pelǝki pepè.>> Sǝ à yiu a nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem, a ɓala mala Mika, sǝ à sulǝ kam.
JDG 18:3 Lang à yi bik ban ɓala mala Mika ka, à súrǝ̀ gi mǝlagga ɓwa'Lawi mǝno. Nda à wari abani sǝ à ɗì ama, <<Yana yinǝ we kani? Mana a pakkiyi a ban mǝnia? Mana yinǝ we kani?>>
JDG 18:4 Pǝlǝa banggia wia gìr mǝnana Mika pàkki wi ka, ama, <<Mika twalama-túró, sǝ ǝn duk pǝris male.>>
JDG 18:5 Pǝlǝa à ne wi ama, <<Ida, ɗìbancau aban Ɓakuli, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm sǝlǝa ko gya ma'sǝm mǝnia ka, sǝm nǝ̀ kum puro aɓalǝi ko pà sǝm nǝ̀ kum ɗang.>>
JDG 18:6 Pǝris banggia wia ama, <<Wu kyane aɓa rǝpwala. Yahweh na atà wun aɓa gya ma'wun mǝnia.>>
JDG 18:7 Pǝlǝa aburana man tongno ka à lo, sǝ à yiu a Layish. À sǝn aɓwana mǝnana à ndanǝdo kano ka, à nda aɓa do-jam kǝla do mala amǝ'Sidon, aɓa rǝpwala andǝ ɗwanyi-tsǝk'mǝsǝu; yià ɗǝm ngga amǝ'kume na acemǝnana à ɗwanyi kǝgìr aɓa nzali malea ɗàng. À nda kuko nǝ amǝ'Sidon, sǝ à pà aɓa kpapimúrû andǝ ɓekǝ nzali ace kum gbasha ɗàng.
JDG 18:8 Sǝ lang aburana man nyarna aban amǝ'eambia, a Zora andǝ Eshtawol ka, amǝ'eambia ɗia ama, <<Mana nda kún-bǝri ma'wun?>>
JDG 18:9 À banggia wia ama, <<Wu lo, ɓǝ̀ sǝm kya arǝia nǝ munǝo, acemǝnana sǝm pelǝna ɓá nzalinì, sǝ sǝm sǝni ka, ndanǝ ɓoaro kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Sǝ pà wun nǝ̀ pàk kǝgir re? Wu kǝa dǝndi arǝ ká ak nzalinì ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝ ma'wun ɗàng.
JDG 18:10 Lang wu bingŋǝna nzalinì ka, wun nǝ̀ kum aɓwana mana à nda ɓá do ɗwanyi-tsǝk'mǝsǝu; andǝ nzali mǝtangŋe mǝnana Ɓakuli pana wuni a ɓabù wun ngga; nzali mǝnana ɗwanyi kǝgir mana nda a ɓanza ka ɗàng!>>
JDG 18:11 Aburana gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat a tàu mala Dan kùr rǝia nǝ agirbura mala lwa, sǝ à pur a Zora andǝ Eshtawol.
JDG 18:12 Pǝlǝa à eauwe à kya tsǝk kàttì malea a Kiriat-Jarim a bu-nzali Yahuda. Nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ ban mǝno a njar-nzali mala Kiriat-Jarim ngga, à tunǝi ama Mahane Dan bà yalung ngga.
JDG 18:13 À lo kano ka, à gya aɓa nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem, sǝ à yiu a ɓala mala Mika.
JDG 18:14 Pǝlǝa aburana tongno mana à wari a shenzǝ nzali Layish ka, à banggi amǝ'eambǝia ama, <<Wu sǝlǝ ama atà aɓala mǝnia ka, efot, andǝ ankúl ace ɓala, andǝ ɓǝ̀nzál mǝnana à shàrrì, andǝ ɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-ntul ka à ndakam? Wu ɓalkiɓabum wun amúr mana ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ wu pa.>>
JDG 18:15 Pǝlǝa à kàr kano, sǝ à wari a bando mala mǝlagga ɓwa'Lawi mǝno a ɓala mala Mika ka, sǝ à makki-wi-kûn.
JDG 18:16 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka, aburana mala amǝ'tàu mala Dan mǝno à kùrna rǝia nǝ agirbura ace lwa ka, à cam a bankutio a kúnɓala.
JDG 18:17 Pǝlǝa aburana tongno mǝnana à yina atadǝmbe à shenzǝna nzalinì ka, à wario sǝ à kutio sǝ à twal ɓǝ̀nzál mǝnana à shàrrì ka, andǝ efot, andǝ ankúl mala ɓala, andǝ ɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-ntul, sǝ pǝris ka ndaban came a bankutio a kúnɓala atà aburana gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat mana à kùrna rǝia nǝ agirbura ace lwa ka.
JDG 18:18 Lang aburana man kúti a ɓala mala Mika sǝ à twal ɓǝ̀nzál mǝnana à shàrrì, andǝ efot, andǝ ankúl mala ɓala, andǝ ɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-ntul ka, pǝris ɗia ama, <<Mana mǝna wu pàkkiyi ka?>>
JDG 18:19 À earî wi ama, <<Duk kúnó piu! Kǝa na kǝ cau ɗàng. We ka, yiu atà sǝm, sǝ wu duk tárrû andǝ pǝris amur sǝm. Pà nǝ̀ ɓoaribani wu duk pǝris amur ɓè nggurkwar, andǝ pǝris amur ɓè tàu mala Isǝrayila puppup, amúr-mana wu duk pǝris amúr ɓala mala ɓwa mwashat ka re?>>
JDG 18:20 Kara banɓoari pǝris mǝno. Nda twal ɓǝ̀nzál mǝnana à shàrrì, andǝ efot, andǝ ankúl mala ɓala, andǝ ɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-ntul, sǝ o ateà.
JDG 18:21 Pǝlǝa à wulio, sǝ à bwal njar aban o, sǝama à tsǝk amuna-mǝkeke, andǝ agirkusǝu, andǝ agirkuma malea a dǝmba sǝ à kǝ gya anzǝmia.
JDG 18:22 Lang à umǝna ɗār nǝ ɓala mala Mika ka, amǝ'murkala mala Mika ramba abanɓwáná, sǝ à o pǝrta aɓwana mala Dan.
JDG 18:23 Lang à loasǝ gia à tunǝia ka, aɓwana mala Dan pǝlǝ ɓamǝsǝia sǝ à ɗì Mika ama, <<Marǝò sǝ wu ram rǝ wun anggo?>>
JDG 18:24 Mika earia wia ama, <<Wu twalna aɓakuli mem mǝnana ǝn pea ka, andǝ pǝris, sǝ wu umǝna nǝia. Mana uekàm ɗǝm? Palang sǝ wun nǝ̀ ɗiem ama, <Marǝò?> >>
JDG 18:25 Aɓwana mala Dan banggi wi ama, <<Kǝa eare ɓǝà ok gio aɓalǝ sǝm ɗàng, ɓǝ̀ ana raka, aɓea aburana mǝ'lulle aɓalǝ sǝm nǝ̀ kpa amuro, sǝ awu nǝ ɗwanyi yilǝmo andǝ ayilǝmi amǝ'ɓala mò.>>
JDG 18:26 Pǝlǝa aɓwana mala Dan ukia'o malea. Sǝ lang Mika sǝni ama à kútì nǝ rǝcandǝa ka, kara nyare o a ɓala male.
JDG 18:27 Aɓwana mala Dan twal agir mǝnana Mika pea ka, andǝ pǝris male, sǝ à yiu a Layish, aban aɓwana mana à nda ɓá do rǝpwala andǝ ɗwanyi-tsǝk'mǝsǝu ka. À wal-luia nǝ kún nggeabyau, sǝ à soaki nggea-lê bǝsa.
JDG 18:28 Sǝ kǝɓwa yiu ace amsǝia ɗàng, acemǝnana nggea-lê ka nda kuko nǝ Sidon, sǝ ɗǝm ngga, à pà aɓa kpapimúrû andǝ ɓekǝ nzali ace kum gbasha ɗang. Nggea-lê ka, nda aɓa ɓangŋaban mala Bet-Rehop. Pǝlǝa aɓwana mala Dan ɓǝsǝlǝ-ɓak nggea-lê, sǝ à duk kam.
JDG 18:29 À tsǝkî nggea-lê lullǝu ama Dan, mǝnana nda lullǝu keâ, yì Dan mana à ɓǝlî Isǝrayila ka; sǝama ɗiɗyal ka, lullǝu nggea-lê nda Layish.
JDG 18:30 Sǝ tàu mala Dan tamsǝî ɓamuria mǝno yì ɓǝ̀nzál mana à shàrrì ka; sǝ Jonatan, muna-ɓwabura mala Gashom, muna-ɓwabura mala Musa andǝ amǝ'ke ka, à nda ka apǝris mala tàu mala Dan bà bàkú mala bwalban-aguro andǝ umnǝia a bǝri-nzali.
JDG 18:31 Nda tàu mala Dan tamsǝî ɓamuria ɓǝ̀nzál mala Mika mana à shàrrì, mǝnana pè ka, sǝ uekam arǝ abákú mǝnana kat Taragula mala Ɓakuli nakam a Shilo ka.
JDG 19:1 A bàkú mǝno mǝnana murǝm pà kàm a Isǝrayila raka, ɓè ɓwa'Lawi nakam mǝnana ndanǝdo kuko a nkanggariban mala nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem ngga. Yì ka twalî ɓamurì mā-twala a Betalami, a bu-nzali Yahuda.
JDG 19:2 Sǝ mā-twala mǝnia ka bumi-lullo arǝ burí, pǝlǝa nyì sǝ o a ɓala mala tárrí a Betalami, a bu-nzali Yahuda. Lang pàngŋǝ́nà azongŋo ine a ɓala mala tárrí ka,
JDG 19:3 pǝlǝa burí lo wari ace bǝ́lè; nǝ̀ nggá bangcau nǝi, nǝ tsǝkɓalǝu ama nǝ̀ nun ɓabumi nǝ̀ nyesǝi. Wari andǝ guro male atè andǝ amǝdambǝriso ɓari. Lang bingŋǝ́nà ka, mā-twala male kútí nǝi a ɓala mala tárrí, sǝ lang nkili sǝni ka, gingsǝi nǝ banɓoarnado.
JDG 19:4 Sǝ nkili, yì tár mā-twala male ka, tsǝì duk kano, sǝ ue kano atè anonggio tàrú. Aɓalǝ anonggio mǝno ka, à lìli, sǝ à nǔ, sǝ nong kano atè.
JDG 19:5 A inea nongŋo ka, à lo nǝ dǝmbari nǝ ban'mbul-mbul, sǝ ɓwa'Lawi gilǝrǝi nǝ̀ o. Sǝama nkili ne wi ama, <<Kundǝ bǝti, wu lî girlina ace mǝnana wu kum rǝcandǝa ka, sǝ wu o.>>
JDG 19:6 Nda à do yià kǝm, sǝ à lì girlina sǝ à nǔ atārǝia; pǝlǝa tár muna-ɓwame banggi ɓwabure, yì ɓwa'Lawi ama, <<Ida, eare nong ɗǝm, sǝ ɓǝ̀ banɓoaro.>>
JDG 19:7 Sǝ lang ɓwabure, yì ɓwa'Lawi lo nǝ̀ u ka, nkili ɓuakiarǝi gandǝa nong ɗǝm.
JDG 19:8 A tongnoia pwari, lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal ace mǝnana nǝ̀ o, sǝ nkili ka ne wi ama, <<Ida, kúndǝô wu lî girlina ace kum rǝcandǝa, sheɓǝ̀ rǝ pwari wuna ka!>> Nda à lìli yià kǝm ngga.
JDG 19:9 Sǝ lang ɓwabure andǝ mā-twala male andǝ guro male longŋǝ́nà à nǝ̀ u ka, nkili, yì tár muna-ɓwame banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni! Pwari malanǝ̀ kpa! Ida, nongŋo. Ado mǝnana pwari wulina ka, nong kani sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɓabumo kum banɓoarnado. Lí ka, awu nǝ lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal ace gya mô, sǝ wu oa là.>>
JDG 19:10 Sǝama ɓwabure ka, ear ama nǝ̀ nong ɗǝm ɗàng. Nda tsǝk agir-do a nzǝm amǝdambǝriso male ɓari. Sǝ yì andǝ mā-twala male andǝ guro male à bwal-njar, sǝ à gya à yi bik Jebus (mǝnana yalung à tunǝi ama Urǝshalima ka).
JDG 19:11 Lang à gbàshìban Jebus ka, pwari umǝna ɗār. Sǝ guro ne mǝtala-ɓala male ama, <<Ida, ɓǝ̀ sǝm kàr a nggea-là mala amǝ'Jebus mǝnia ka, ɓǝ̀ sǝm nong kam.>>
JDG 19:12 Sǝama mǝtala-ɓala male banggi wi ama, <<Pà sǝm nǝ̀ kàr aɓa nggea-là mala amǝ'kúnɗàngna, mǝnana amǝ'Isǝrayila na raka ɗàng. Sǝm nǝ̀ lidǝmba nǝ gya aban ká Gibiya.>>
JDG 19:13 Pǝlǝa ne guro male ama, <<Fa, ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɓariki ɓǝ̀ sǝm bik Gibiya ko Rama, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ nong aɓa mwashat atà abân mǝnia ka.>>
JDG 19:14 Nda à lidǝmba nǝ gya, sǝ pwari yi kpa lang à gbàshìban Gibiya a bu-nzali mala amǝ'tàu mala Benjami ka.
JDG 19:15 Pǝlǝa à kàr abanì ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ kúti ace nongŋo aɓa Gibiya ka. À yiu aɓa nggea-lê sǝ à do a patal mala nggea-lê, acemǝnana kǝɓwa ea a ɓala male ɓǝà kya nong kam ɗàng.
JDG 19:16 Zuku ka, ɓè jamgula nia loapi túró a ɓaban male sǝ kǝ yiu nǝ pwarikpǝra mǝno ka. Ɓwabure ka ɓwa nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem na; sǝ yì ka ndanǝdo a Gibiya kǝla bǝri-ɓwa. (Aɓwana mǝnana à ndanǝdo a là mǝno ka, amǝ'tàu mala Benjami na.)
JDG 19:17 Lang jamgula man loasǝ mǝsǝi sǝ sǝn bǝri a patal mala nggea-lê ka, pǝlǝa ɗì ama, <<A pùr nǝ kǝshe? Sǝ aya ban awu nǝ̀ ká?>>
JDG 19:18 Ɓwa'Lawi eari wi ama, <<Sǝm pùr a Betalami a bu-nzali Yahuda; sǝm nggǝ umnǝ o kuko a nkanggariban mala nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem, ban mǝnana ǝn pur kàm ngga. Ən wari a Betalami a bu-nzali Yahuda, sǝ adyan ngga mǝ ndaban nyare mǝ nǝ o a là mem, sǝ kǝɓwa pà kàm mǝnana nǝ̀ em a ɓala male ka ɗàng.
JDG 19:19 Sǝm ndanǝ mǝsǝkuri andǝ dǝmo ace amǝdambǝriso ma'sǝm, sǝ sǝm ndanǝ girlina andǝ mùr-anap ace ɓamur rǝ sǝm, sǝm aguro mò, mim, sǝ ɓwama man andǝ lagga mana atà sǝm ngga. Sǝm ɗwanyi kǝgir ɗàng.>>
JDG 19:20 Sǝ jamgule bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝ wun pwalo! Mǝ nǝ pa wun gìr mǝnana kat wu earce ka. Sǝama wu kǝa nongŋo a patal ɗàng.>>
JDG 19:21 Nda yinǝia a ɓala male, sǝ pe amǝdambǝriso dǝmo. Sǝ à lakkia wia akusǝia, à lìli sǝ à nu.
JDG 19:22 Lang bân na rǝ ɓoaria wia ka, kara aɓea aburana amǝɓealɓike mala nggea-lê yi gumbǝli ɓalae, sǝ à camarǝ walki kúnɓala. À banggi jamgula, mǝtala ɓalae ama, <<Pusǝa sǝm ɓwabura mana yiu a ɓala mò ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm súrǝì.>>
JDG 19:23 Pǝlǝa mǝtala ɓalae puro abania a nza sǝ nea wia ama, <<Awo, wun amǝ'eambǝam! Wu kǝa pàk gìr ɓealɓikea man ɗàng. Acemǝnana mǝnia yì ɓwabura ka bǝri na a ɓala mem ngga, wu kǝa pàk gìr ɓeakǝno man ɗàng!
JDG 19:24 Wu sǝni, muna-ɓwama mem mǝnana nsari na ka, andǝ mā-twala mala ɓwabure ka, à ndya ka. Mǝ nǝ pusǝia ado; wu gbária sǝ wu pàk gìr mǝnana wu earkiyice pangnǝia ka. Sǝama wu kǝa pàk mǝnia yì gìr kǝsǝkya ka arǝ ɓwabura man ɗàng.>>
JDG 19:25 Sǝ aburane ka à ɓinǝ kwakikiria arǝì. Nda ɓwa'Lawi gbami mā-twala male sǝ wari nǝi abania a nza. Sǝ à nongnǝi, à kìɗikì aɓa du kat bà kwaro mala bân. Sǝ lang bân tita pàk mbul-mbul ka, à ɗeki o.
JDG 19:26 Nǝ ban'mbul-mbul ka ɓwame yiu yi kpa a kún ɓala mala ɓwabura mǝnana mǝtala-ɓala male nakam ngga bà kwaro mala bân.
JDG 19:27 Lang mǝtala-ɓala male lo nǝ dǝmbari, mǝn kún ɓala sǝ pur a nza ace mǝnana nǝ̀ lidǝmba nǝ gya male ka, kara sǝn mā-twala male aban nongŋo a kún ɓala nǝ abui amur bankutio mala kún ɓala.
JDG 19:28 Pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Lo, ɓǝ̀ sǝm o!>> Sǝama okban ɗǝong. Nda twali, tsǝì a nzǝm mǝdambǝriso, sǝ bwal njar aban oa là ka.
JDG 19:29 Lang bingŋǝna là ka, twal byau sǝ kasǝki abare lú mā-twala male arǝ abanì lum-nong-ɓari, sǝ túrban nǝ koya bare mwashat ka arǝ abu-nzali kat mala amǝ Isǝrayila.
JDG 19:30 Sǝ koyan mǝnana sǝni ka, bang ama, <<Gìr kǝla mǝnia ka kumban, ko à sǝni a kǝ fara ɗàng, twal a pwari mǝnana amǝ Isǝrayila purî ɓá nzali Masar ka, she yalung! Wu pàk ɗenyicau amurí, wu sǝngi, sǝ wu bang gìr mǝnana ɓoaro ɓǝà pàk ka.>>
JDG 20:1 Pǝlǝa amǝ Isǝrayila puppup puro, twal a bu-nzali Dan aban ká Biya-Sheba, kat andǝ nzali Gilǝyat. Ɓwabundǝa yi ramba kǝla ɓwa mwashat aban Yahweh a Mizpa.
JDG 20:2 Aɓwana-mǝgule mala aɓwe kat, andǝ atau mala Isǝrayila kat, à yi twal bancame malea a ban ramba mala aɓwana mala Ɓakuli, mǝnana làkkì malea ka amǝ'lwa á-gbǝman-ine (400,000) na, mǝnana à nda aɓa kùrrǝu nǝ anggeabyau ka.
JDG 20:3 Amǝ'tàu mala Benjami ok ama Isǝrayila umǝna a Mizpa. Sǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila bang ama, <<Wu bǝla sǝm lang sǝ gìr mǝɓike man kumban?>>
JDG 20:4 Pǝlǝa Ɓwa'Lawi, bura ɓwame mǝnana à wal-lui ka, ear ama, <<Mim sǝnǝ mā-twala mem sǝm yiu a Gibiya a bu-nzali Benjami, ace mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ nongŋo abanì ka.
JDG 20:5 Aɓa bu-dù mǝno ka, aburana mala Gibiya lo arǝàm, à gumbǝli ɓala mana sǝm sulǝ kam ngga. À earce ama à nǝ̀ wal-luem, sǝama a kún mani ka, à gbárí mā-twala mem, gandǝa wǔ.
JDG 20:6 Ən twal lú mā-twala mem sǝ ǝn kasǝki arǝ abare mwashat-mwashat, sǝ ǝn túrban nǝ abare arǝ abân aɓa nzali liɓala kat mala Isǝrayila, acemǝnana à pàngŋǝ̀nà ɓealɓikea andǝ ɓwaɓana mala pa-kǝsǝkya a Isǝrayila.
JDG 20:7 Ado ka, wun amǝ Isǝrayila kat, wu na mana nda kwarkiru ma'wun andǝ gìr mǝnana ɓoaro ɓǝà pè amúr cau man ngga.>>
JDG 20:8 Pǝlǝa aɓwana kat lo gǝu kǝla ɓwa mwashat ama, <<Kǝɓwa atà sǝm pà nǝ̀ o a ɓala male ɗàng, sǝ kǝɓwa atà sǝm pà nǝ̀ nyar a là male ɗàng!
JDG 20:9 Mǝnia ka, nda gìr mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ pàkkî Gibiya ka: aɓa koya tàu mala Isǝrayila ka, sǝm nǝ̀ twal aburana lum aɓa gbǝman, gbǝman-mwashat aɓa á-mwashat, sǝ á-mwashat aɓa á-gbǝman-mwashat, ɓǝà yinǝ girlina ace amǝ'lwa. Sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ bwal-shishar ace tàr aburana mǝnana à nǝ̀ ká arǝ Gibiya a bu-nzali Benjami nǝ lwa ka. Sǝ lang à warina ka, ɓǝà mbwe ka amǝ Gibiya a kúnì ɓwaɓana mala pa-kǝsǝkya mǝnana à pè a Isǝrayila ka.>>
JDG 20:11 Nda aburana mala Isǝrayila kat ram rǝia ace kánǝ lwa arǝ nggea-lê, sǝ à kpapimúrià kǝla ɓwa mwashat ka.
JDG 20:12 Atau mala Isǝrayila túr aburana arǝ abân aɓa bu-nzali mala tàu mala Benjami puppup nǝ cau ama, <<Mana nda man yì ɓealɓikea mǝnana kumban aɓalǝ wun ngga?
JDG 20:13 Adyan ngga, wu pusǝki amǝ'ɓealɓana mǝnana aɓalǝ wun a Gibiya ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm wal-luia, sǝ ɓǝ̀ sǝm esǝki ɓealɓikea a Isǝrayila.>> Sǝama amǝ'tàu mala Benjami ɓinǝ kwakikiria arǝ gi ka amǝ'eambia, amǝ Isǝrayila.
JDG 20:14 Pǝlǝa amǝ'tàu mala Benjami purki arǝ anggea-là, sǝ à yi ram rǝia abanɓwáná a Gibiya ace oa munǝo arǝ amǝ Isǝrayila.
JDG 20:15 A pwari mǝno ka, amǝ'tàu mala Benjami ramba amǝ'lwa á-lumi-ɓari nǝ á-tongno-nong-mwashat (26,000) mǝnana à purki arǝ anggea-là malea, sǝ à kùrna rǝia nǝ anggeabyau ka. Tsǝa amur amǝnia ka, amǝ'do aɓa Gibiya tàrki aburana gbǝman-tongno-nong-ɓari (700) mana anggaro na ka; koyan atea ka nǝ̀ gandǝ túr tali nǝ ntamso arǝ mǝsǝ nyang mwashat sǝ pà nǝ̀ pǝ́tì ɗàng.
JDG 20:17 Pǝlǝa cili aburana mala Isǝrayila (mana tàu mala Benjami pà aɓalǝia raka) ram rǝia, amǝ'lwa á-gbǝman-ine (400,000) mǝnana à kùrna rǝia nǝ anggeabyau ka; yià kat ka akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa na.
JDG 20:18 Aburana mala Isǝrayila lo sǝ à wari a Betel, sǝ à ɗì Ɓakuli ama, <<Ya tàu nani nǝ̀ aka sǝm dǝmba kánǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami?>> Sǝ Yahweh earia wia ama, <<Tàu mala Yahuda na nǝ̀ tita ká ka.>>
JDG 20:19 Pǝlǝa amǝ Isǝrayila lo nǝ dǝmbari sǝ à kya tsǝk kàttì malea a nkanggari Gibiya.
JDG 20:20 Sǝ à pur ace soa munǝo arǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami; à tsǝk amǝ'lwa malea à cam a nzong ban-je munǝo a Gibiya.
JDG 20:21 Amǝ'tàu mala Benjami purî ɓá Gibiya, sǝ à yi wal-lú aburana mala amǝ'Isǝrayila á-lumi-ɓari nǝ á-ɓari (22,000) a kun-munǝo a pwari mǝno.
JDG 20:22 Amǝ'Isǝrayila wario à kya ɓua aɓadǝm Yahweh bà pwarikpǝra. Pǝlǝa à ɗì Yahweh ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm kyan ɗǝm nǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'eam sǝm amǝ'tàu mala Benjami le?>> Yahweh earia wia ama, <<Wu kya arǝia ɗǝm.>> Aburana, amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Isǝrayila kum ɓabumcandǝa, sǝ à kya cam a nzong ban-je munǝo, a kǝ̀ ban mǝnana à cam kam a dǝmbe ka.
JDG 20:24 Anggo sǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila wari arǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami a ɓaria nongŋo.
JDG 20:25 Lang amǝ'lwa mala tàu mala Benjami purî ɓá Gibiya sǝ à soa munǝ arǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila, a ɓaria pwari ka, à wal-lú aburana á-lum-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-tàrú (18,000) mala amǝ'Isǝrayila. Yia mǝno kat ka, aburana amǝ'lwa nǝ nggeabyau na.
JDG 20:26 Pǝlǝa amǝ'Isǝrayila kat, yì amǝ'lwa malea puppup, à eauwe sǝ à yiu a Betel, sǝ à ɓua. À do abanì aɓadǝm Yahweh, sǝ à gilmùr a pwari mǝno ka, bà pwarikpǝra. À pàgir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ pàgir mala dotarǝu aɓadǝm Yahweh.
JDG 20:27 (A bàkú mǝno ka, Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli na kanó, sǝ Finehas muna-ɓwabura mala Eleaza, mǝ'kà Haruna ka, nda mǝnana pàkkiyi túró-pǝris aɓadǝmbi ka.) Amǝ Isǝrayila ɗì Yahweh ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm kyan nǝ munǝo ɗǝm arǝ amǝ'eam sǝm amǝ'tàu mala Benjami le, ko ɓǝ̀ sǝm tamsǝ munǝo?>> Yahweh nea wia ama, <<Wu kyane, acemǝnana liwi ka, Mǝ nǝ̀ pà wunia a ɓabù wun.>>
JDG 20:29 Nda Isǝrayila tsǝk aburana à kùmsǝó, à kàrì Gibiya.
JDG 20:30 Pǝlǝa Isǝrayila wari arǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami a tàruia pwari, sǝ à twal bancame malea ace soa munǝo kǝla mana à pè aɓalǝ anonggio mana à kutiki ka.
JDG 20:31 Pǝlǝa aburana mala tàu mala Benjami puro ace je-munǝo andǝia, sǝ Isǝrayila nunia à upi nggea-là. Sǝ kǝla mǝnana à pè arǝ aɓea apwari ka, amǝ'tàu mala Benjami tita walkia sǝ à wal-lú aɓea aɓwana ateà amur anjargula: mana umnǝ Betel ka andǝ mana umnǝ Gibiya ka, sǝ aɓa ɓawan. À wal-lú amǝ'Isǝrayila kǝla aɓwana lumi-tàrú.
JDG 20:32 Nda amǝ'tàu mala Benjami bang ama, <<Sǝm ndarǝ gandǝia kǝla mana atadǝmbe ka.>> Sǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila ka, à na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɓangŋa sǝ ɓǝà pǝrta sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm nunia ɓǝà upi nggea-là ɗār amúr anjargula.>>
JDG 20:33 Sǝ koya ɓwabura mala Isǝrayila ka loapi ban male sǝ dǝshi Ba'al-Tamar, ban mǝnana à kya ram rǝia kàm ngga. Sǝ aburana mala Isǝrayila mana à kumsǝ ka, à purki pat arǝ abân kumsǝó malea a ɓawan mana kàrì Gibiya ka.
JDG 20:34 Nda amǝ'lwa á-lum, aburana mana à kwar aɓa lwa ka, purî ɓá Isǝrayila kat, sǝ à dǝshi Gibiya, sǝ munǝo yi candǝ kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Sǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami ka, à sǝlǝ ama gir'murmwana naban yiu amúrià ɗàng.
JDG 20:35 Sǝ Yahweh gandǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami aɓadǝm Isǝrayila, mǝnana tsǝa amǝ'Isǝrayila wal-lú amǝ'lwa mala tàu mala Benjami, aɓwana á-lumi-ɓari-bwamdǝ-tongno nǝ gbǝman-mwashat (25,100), a pwari mǝno, sǝ yià mǝno kat ka amǝ'lwa nǝ nggeabyau na.
JDG 20:36 Nda amǝ'tàu mala Benjami sǝni ka amǝ'Isǝrayila gandǝnia. Amǝ'Isǝrayila nyar nǝtea arǝ ká arǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami, acemǝnana à gūlì arǝ aburana malea mana à tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nia à kùmsǝ̀nà a nkanggari Gibiya ka.
JDG 20:37 Pǝlǝa aburana mana à kumsǝ ka, à latti arǝ nggea-là Gibiya, sǝ à mesǝ amurí; à pàktúró nǝ kún anggeabyau malea sǝ à wal-lú koyan mǝnana aɓalǝi ka.
JDG 20:38 Gir'lǝmdǝa mǝnana à earna amurí anre ka aburana mala Isǝrayila andǝ aburana mana à kumsǝ ka, nda mǝnana ama à nǝ̀ loasǝ nggea yele aɓa nggea-là aban o a kuli.
JDG 20:39 Sǝ lang mǝno pángŋǝ̀nà ka, aburana mala Isǝrayila nǝ̀ wulio arǝ amǝ'lwa mala tàu mala Benjami nǝ munǝo. Sǝama kaniama mǝno yi kumban ngga, amǝ'lwa mala tàu mala Benjami walna-lú atà aburana mala Isǝrayila kǝla lumi-tàrú. Sǝ à nani arǝarǝia ama, <<Ɓafo, sǝm ndarǝ gandǝia kǝla mana aɓa munǝo mǝdǝmbe ka.>>
JDG 20:40 Sǝ lang gupi mala yele tita lo aɓa nggea-là aban o a kuli ka, amǝ'lwa mala tàu mala Benjami pǝlǝ mǝsǝia anzǝmia sǝ à sǝni ka, yele angŋa nggea-lê puppup aban o a kuli.
JDG 20:41 Pǝlǝa aburana mala Isǝrayila wulio, sǝ amǝ'lwa mala tàu mala Benjami ka, ɓangciu bwalia sǝ à gǝggǝli kǝ̀rkǝ́r acemǝnana à sǝni ka, gir'murmwana sulǝna amúrià.
JDG 20:42 Acemani ka, à pǝlǝ nzǝmia arǝ aburana mala Isǝrayila sǝ à tsǝkmuria nǝ njargula ɓabondo, sǝ kat andǝ amani ka, à apî munǝo ɗang. Amǝ Isǝrayila mǝnana à purki aɓalǝ anggea-là ka, à kùtí a wal-luia aɓalǝia.
JDG 20:43 À gumbǝli amǝ'tàu mala Benjami aɓalǝu, sǝ à pǝrtea, twal a Noha sǝ à yi ɓākia aban ká ɗār a nkāɓe Gibiya a bù takuli.
JDG 20:44 Amǝ'lwa á-lum-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-tàrú (18,000) mala amǝ'tàu mala Benjami kpa, sǝ yià mǝno kat ka, akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa na.
JDG 20:45 Acilia wulio sǝ à ɓangŋa aban o nǝ ɓabondo, à tsǝkmuria aban ká tali mala Rimon. Sǝama amǝ'Isǝrayila wal-lú aɓwana atea á-tongno (5,000) amúr anjargula. À pìtea aban ká Gidom, sǝ à kya wal-lú aɓea aburana kàm á-ɓari.
JDG 20:46 A pwari mǝno ka, tàu mala Benjami ɗwanyi akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa á-lumi-ɓari-bwamdǝ-tongno (25,000) a munǝo; sǝ yià mǝno kat ka amǝ'lwa nǝ nggeabyau na.
JDG 20:47 Sǝama aburana gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat (600) auwa sǝ à ɓangŋa à umnǝ ɓabondo aban ká a tali mala Rimon, sǝ à ue kano a tali mala Rimon zongŋo ine.
JDG 20:48 Pǝlǝa aburana mala Isǝrayila nyar arǝ aɓwana mala tàu mala Benjami, sǝ à wal-lú koya ɓwa andǝ girkusǝu mǝnana à kumi nǝyilǝmu aɓa nggea-lê ka puppup. Sǝ koya là na à kumi ka, à soaki wi bǝsa.
JDG 21:1 Aburana mala Isǝrayila kánagìr a Mizpa ama, <<Kǝɓwa pà atà sǝm nǝ̀ pà muna-ɓwama male ɓǝ̀ al ɓwabura a tàu mala Benjami ɗàng.>>
JDG 21:2 Nda amǝ Isǝrayila yiu a Betel, sǝ à dumnǝdo abanì a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli bà kpa mala pwari, sǝ à loasǝ già à ɓua, ɓua mǝkwanbanì.
JDG 21:3 À bang ama, <<We Yahweh Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila, palang sǝ mǝnia yì gìr ka kumban a Isǝrayila, ama yalung ngga à nǝ̀ ɗwanyi tàu mwashat a Isǝrayila?>>
JDG 21:4 Lang ban fana ka, à lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal, sǝ à ɓak gyangŋan abanì. À pàgir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ pàgir mala dotarǝu.
JDG 21:5 Sǝ à bang ama, <<Ya tàu na atà atau mala Isǝrayila yiu a ramba-banɓwáná aɓadǝm Yahweh ɗàng?>> Acemǝnana à kanǝna nggea kángìr amúr ɓwa mana yiu a ramba-banɓwáná aɓadǝm Yahweh a Mizpa raka, ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng à nǝ̀ wal-lui.>>
JDG 21:6 Amǝ Isǝrayila pàk bumkiɗikea nǝ gìr mǝnana kum amǝ'tàu mala mǝ'eambia, Benjami ka, sǝ à bang ama, <<Yalung ngga sǝm ɗwanyini tàu mwashat aɓalǝ atau ma'sǝm.
JDG 21:7 Lang sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ kum amamǝna ace aburana mana à ueo nǝyilǝmu a tàu mala Benjami ngga? Sǝm kánagìr aɓa lullǝu Yahweh ama, pà sǝm nǝ̀ pea wia amuna-mamǝna ma'sǝm ɓǝà alia ɗàng.>>
JDG 21:8 Nda à ɗìban ama, <<Ya tàu na aɓalǝ atau mala Isǝrayila mǝnana yiu a ramba-banɓwáná aɓadǝm Yahweh a Mizpa raka? Sǝ à yi sǝni ka, kǝɓwa pà kàm a Jabesh-Gilǝyat mǝnana yiu a kàttì mala ramba-banɓwáná ka ɗàng.>>
JDG 21:9 Lang à ɓalkiban ngga, à yi sǝni ka, kǝ ɓwa pà kàm atà amǝ'do a Jabesh-Gilǝyat a banì ɗàng.
JDG 21:10 Nda ɓwabundǝa tasǝ akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa malea á-lum-nong-ɓari (12,000) sǝ à sà'arǝia ama, <<Wu kyane wu wal-lú aɓwana mǝnana à ndanǝdo a Jabesh-Gilǝyat ka nǝ kún nggeabyau, kat andǝ amamǝna andǝ amuna-mǝkeke.
JDG 21:11 Wu pàk mǝnia ka: koya ɓwabura, andǝ koya ɓwama mana súrǝ́nà ɓwabura ka, wu twaltea kat-kat.>>
JDG 21:12 Sǝ à yi kum atà aɓwana mana à ndanǝdo a Jabesh-Gilǝyat ka, alo-ɓwa ansarina gbǝman-ine, mǝnana à malaká súrǝ̀ ɓwabura raka; sǝ à yinǝia a kàttì a Shilo, mǝnana nda aɓa nzali Kan'ana ka.
JDG 21:13 Pǝlǝa ɓwabundǝa puppup túrban nǝ cau aban amǝ'tàu mala Benjami mǝnana à nda a tali mala Rimon ngga, sǝ à hambia wia dorǝpwala.
JDG 21:14 Nda aburana mala tàu mala Benjami nyare a bákú mǝno, sǝ à pea wia amamǝna mǝnana à amsǝia nǝyilǝmu aɓalǝ amamǝna mala Jabesh-Gilǝyat ka. Sǝama amamǝne karǝa amúrià ɗàng.
JDG 21:15 Aɓwana mala Isǝrayila pàk bumkiɗikea ace gìr mǝnana kum amǝ'tàu mala Benjami ka; acemǝnana Yahweh gbakǝrina atau mala Isǝrayila.
JDG 21:16 Nda aɓwana-mǝgule amur ɓwabundǝa bang ama, <<Amamǝna mala tàu mala Benjami ka, à twalnatea. Mana ado sǝm nǝ̀ pa ace kum amamǝna ace acili aburana mana à ue ka?>>
JDG 21:17 À na ama, <<Dumǝna púp ama acili aɓwana mala Benjami mana à au ka, ɓǝà kum malea amǝ'liɓala, ace mana ɓekǝ tàu a Isǝrayila ɓǝ̀ kǝa ɓwar raka.
JDG 21:18 Sǝama pà sǝm nǝ̀ gandǝ pea wia amamǝna atà aɓoarnsarile sǝm ɗang, acemǝnana amǝ Isǝrayila kánagìr ama, <Ɓwa mǝnana kat pè ɓwa'Benjami ɓwama ka, ɓǝ̀ suban sulǝo amur ɓwe!> >>
JDG 21:19 Nda à bang ama, <<Wu sǝni, lamsan mala Yahweh mǝnana à kǝ pê koya pǝlǝa a Shilo ka malanǝ̀ yiu.>> (Shilo ka nda a njar-nza mala Betel, a njar-kunmur mala Lebona, sǝ a takuli mala njargula mǝnana anre Betel andǝ Shekem ngga.)
JDG 21:20 À ne amǝ'tàu mala Benjami ama, <<Wu kyane wu kùmsǝ aɓalǝ aɓaban-anap,
JDG 21:21 sǝ wun nǝ̀ tsǝk mǝsǝ wun. Ɓǝ̀ wu sǝni ansarina mala Shilo purna ace tàki-anggwam ngga, pǝlǝa wun nǝ̀ purî ɓalǝ aɓaban-anap, sǝ koya ɓwa atà wun ngga ɓǝ̀ gbami male yì ɓwama ace ɓamurì aɓalǝ ansarina mala Shilo, sǝ wu o a nzali Benjami.
JDG 21:22 Sǝ nǝ̀ ya do ama atárrià ko amǝ'eambǝia nǝ̀ yiu ace lǝmdǝ ɓua malea aban sǝm, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ banggia wia ama, <Wu ɓwamur sǝm acea, acemǝnana sǝm gandǝnǝ kúmbi koyan atea ka male yì ɓwama a kun-munǝo ɗàng. Sǝ wun gbal ka, wu pea wia ɗàng, ɓǝ̀ ana raka ado ka wun nǝ̀ duk amǝ'kumcau.> >>
JDG 21:23 Aburana mala tàu mala Benjami pè kǝla mǝnana à banggia wia ka. À twalki amamǝna kǝla mana làkkì malea pàk ka, aɓalǝ amǝ'tà-nggwam sǝ à umnǝia. Pǝlǝa à nyare à o a nzali liɓala malea, sǝ à kya ɓǝsǝlǝ-ɓakki alá, sǝ à do aɓalǝia.
JDG 21:24 Nda amǝ'Isǝrayila mesǝì ban mǝno a pwari mǝno; à o arǝ atau andǝ anggurkwar malea, sǝ koya ɓwa ka nyar a nzali liɓala male.
JDG 21:25 A bàkú mǝno ka, murǝm pà kàm a Isǝrayila ɗàng. Koyan ngga pàk gìr mǝnana sǝni ɓoari wi a mǝsǝi ka.
RUT 1:1 Ɗiɗyal arǝ abákú mǝnana akasǝla kǝ yálmúrû ka, nzal-gula kpa aɓa nzali Isǝrayila. Sǝ ɓè ɓwabura ɓwa Betalami a bu-nzali Yahuda wari a nzali Mowap ace do abanì bǝti; wari andǝ māmí andǝ amuna-burana male ɓari.
RUT 1:2 Lullǝ ɓwabure ama Elimelek, sǝ lullǝ māmí ama Naomi; lullǝ amuna-burana male nda ka Malon andǝ Kiliyon. Yià ka amǝ'Efǝrat mala Betalami a bu-nzali Yahuda na. Yì ka do a Betalami a bu-nzali Yahuda. À kùtí aɓa nzali Mowap sǝ à ue kam.
RUT 1:3 Lang à ndaban do kano ka, Elimelek bura Naomi paklú, sǝ Naomi ueo andǝ amuna-burana male ɓari.
RUT 1:4 Malon andǝ Kiliyon al amamǝna mala amǝ'Mowap. Alullǝ amālia nda ka Orpa andǝ Rut. Anzǝm apǝlǝa kǝla lum ngga,
RUT 1:5 Malon andǝ Kiliyon gbal ka à paklú, sǝ Naomi ue nǝmurǝi, burí andǝ amuna-burana male pà kàm ɗàng.
RUT 1:6 Naomi ok a bu-nzali Mowap ama Yahweh yina aban aɓwana male, yi pania wia girlina; nda Naomi gilǝki atwalo male ace mǝnana yì andǝ ankili-mǝɓwame ka, à nǝ̀ nyarî nzali Mowap.
RUT 1:7 À bwal njar atārǝia andǝ ankili-mǝɓwame à nǝ̀ nyar a bu-nzali Yahuda, sǝama a njar aban o ka,
RUT 1:8 Naomi banggi ankili-mǝɓwame ama, <<Wu nyar a là wu kya do wunǝ anggea wun. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh pàkka wun mǝɓoarne kǝla mǝnana wu pàkkam, sǝ wu pàkkî aɓwana mǝnana à wuna ka.
RUT 1:9 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝa koyan atà wun ɓǝ̀ dukɓala ɗǝm, sǝ ɓǝ̀ pe wi usǝlǝo a ɓala mala burí.>> Naomi pǝlǝa kùria-zǝp sǝ tsǝiandà. Sǝama à tita ɓua,
RUT 1:10 à ne wi ama, <<Awo! Sǝm nǝ̀ ká atò, aban aɓwana mô.>>
RUT 1:11 Naomi nyesǝia wia ama, <<Wu nyare, amuna-mamǝna mem. Palang sǝ wu earce ama wun nǝ̀ yiu atàm? Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla mǝ nǝ gandǝnǝ ɓǝla wun amuna-burana ɗǝm mǝnana à nǝ̀ al wun ngga le?
RUT 1:12 Wu nyare a là, amuna-mamǝna mem, acemǝnana ǝn eni dolabura. Ko ɓǝ̀ ǝn twali ama tsǝkɓalǝu na kam piu, sǝ ǝn albura yalung, ǝn kum amuna-burana ka,
RUT 1:13 wun nǝ̀ kúndǝia she ɓǝà gulkina ka le? Wun nǝ̀ ginǝ albura acea? Awo, amuna-mamǝna mem, wu sǝlǝna ama mǝno ka pà nǝ̀ pàk ɗàng. Bù Yahweh pǝlǝna arǝàm, sǝ mǝ nda aɓa bumkiɗikea kǝ̀rkǝ́r ace wun.>>
RUT 1:14 Nyare à kùtí a ɓua. Pǝlǝa Orpa tsǝk nkili-mǝɓwame andà, sǝ nyar a là, sǝama Rut ka lanzǝ arǝ Naomi.
RUT 1:15 Nda Naomi ne Rut ama, <<Sǝni, ɓio nyarna umǝna aban aɓwana male andǝ aɓakuli male. Wu nyar wunǝi a là.>>
RUT 1:16 Sǝ Rut earî wi ama, <<Ida, kǝa banggam mǝ nyio ɗàng! Ɗekiam mǝ o atò. Ban mǝnana kat awu nǝ kà kam ngga, mǝ nǝ ká; ban mǝnana kat a duk kam ngga, mǝ nǝ do. Aɓwana mô nǝ̀ duk aɓwana mem, sǝ Ɓakuli mô nǝ̀ duk Ɓakuli mem.
RUT 1:17 Ban mǝnana a wú ka, akàm sǝ mǝ nǝ wú, sǝ abanì sǝ à nǝ̀ tsǝk-luem. Ɓǝ̀ ɓashi mǝkǝ̀rkǝ́rnì mala Yahweh sulǝ amuram, ɓǝ̀ ǝn nying ɓekǝ gìr gau nrem sǝnǝ we ka, she lú!>>
RUT 1:18 Lang Naomi sǝni ama Rut shamabumi nǝ̀ o atè ka, nyare ne wi kǝ cau ɗǝm ɗàng.
RUT 1:19 Yià kǝm à lidǝmba nǝ gya ba yiu malea a Betalami. Lang à kùtí aɓa Betalami ka, là kat cam nǝ kusǝi acea, sǝ amamǝna mǝnana a lě ka, ɗìban ama, <<Naomi nda mǝnia?>>
RUT 1:20 Naomi nyesǝia wia ama, <<Wu kǝa tunǝam ɗǝm ama Naomi ɗàng; wu tunǝam ama Mara, acemǝnana Ɓakuli mana Karban nǝ Gulo kat ka, tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà do mem pǝlǝna mǝlulle.
RUT 1:21 Lang ǝn nying ban mǝnia ka, mǝ ndanǝ agir kpǝm, sǝama Yahweh nyesǝnam nǝ ɓabuam atàrǝì. Palang sǝ wu tunǝam ama Naomi, yi mǝnana Ɓakuli mana Karban nǝ Gulo kat ka tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nám aɓa tanni, sǝ yinanǝ murɓikea amuram ngga?>>
RUT 1:22 Anggo sǝ Naomi nyarî nzali Mowap andǝ Rut ɓwama'Mowap, nkili-mǝɓwame. À yi bik Betalami, a bàkú mǝnana aɓwe tita pwan mǝssa-bálì nǝi ka.
RUT 2:1 Naomi ka ndanǝ ɓè ɓǝla mala burí, lùllǝì ama Boaz. Yì Boaz ka ɓwamǝgule na, sǝ mǝkume na a nggurkwar mala Elimelek.
RUT 2:2 A ɓè pwari ka, Rut ɓwama'Mowap banggi Naomi ama, <<Ida earâm mǝ kya alta ɓakurikuri mala mǝssa mǝnana amǝtúró ɗeki arǝ aɓaban ngga, atà ɓwa mǝnana kat nǝ̀ earam mǝ pàktúró atè ka.>> Naomi earî wi ama, <<Kyane, muna-ɓwama mem.>>
RUT 2:3 Nda Rut puro wari arǝ aɓaban, sǝ kǝ gya anzǝm amǝ'túró can mǝssa, aban alta ɓakurikuri. Rut yi kum ɓamúrì a ɓaban mala Boaz.
RUT 2:4 Zuku ka, Boaz pur a Betalami sǝ yiu [ace sǝn amǝ'túró a ɓaban], sǝ makkia-wia-kún ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh pa atà wun.>> À nyesǝi wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝko bù.>>
RUT 2:5 Pǝlǝa Boaz ɗì mǝgulo amur amǝ'túró male ama, <<Ya lo ɓwama na mǝno?>>
RUT 2:6 Ɓwabure earî wi ama, <<Lo ɓwama'Mowap mǝnana yiu atārǝia andǝ Naomi lang nyarî nzali Mowap ka nda.
RUT 2:7 Ɓwame zǝmbam ama mǝ nyi ɓǝ̀ kǝ gya anzǝm amǝ'túró, ace alta ɓakurikuri mala mǝssa. Twal a dǝmbari ka, camarǝ pàktúró, she adyan tù sǝ tamsǝ túró ace usǝlǝ bǝti a yilǝm.>>
RUT 2:8 Pǝlǝa Boaz ne Rut ama, <<Kwakikiro, muna-ɓwama mem. Kǝa na ama a nǝ ká alta ɓakurikuri a ɓè ɓaban ko awu nǝ nying ɓaban man ɗang. Ue kani atà mamǝna amǝtúró mem.
RUT 2:9 Tsǝk-mǝsǝo arǝ ban mǝnana aburana kǝ can mǝssa kàm ngga, sǝ wu kpa ateà wun nǝ̀ amamǝna amǝtúró mem. Ən nani alaggana mem ama ɓǝà kǝa jeo ɗang. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝsamur walo ka, kya ɗàrǝ́ mùr aɓalǝ adú mǝnana à lùmsǝkia ka, wu nu.>>
RUT 2:10 Rut kūndǝ nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali, sǝ ne Boaz ama, <<Palang sǝ ǝn kum earmúrú a bano anggo? Palang sǝ a lǝmdǝi bǝriɓwa pěmǝɓoarne anggo kǝ̀rkǝ́r?>>
RUT 2:11 Boaz eari wi ama, <<Ən ongŋǝna cau mala gìr mǝnana kat a pakkì nkilo-mǝɓwame, tite a pwari mǝnana burio pàngŋǝ̀nà-lú nǝi ka. À banggam ama a nying tárró andǝ nggó, andǝ nzali-la mô, sǝ a yiu ace do aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnana a súrǝ̀ia ɗiɗyal raka.
RUT 2:12 Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh mbweo tangnakusǝo ace gìr mǝnana a pàk ka. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila mǝnana a yina abani ace kum ban-auwa ka, mbweo tangnakusǝo kat!>>
RUT 2:13 Rut nyesǝi wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, a lǝmdǝnam pěmǝɓoarne. A tsǝ́ngŋǝ̀nám rǝam pwalǝna ɗwal nǝ cau mǝɓukɓuki mǝnana a nam ngga, kat andǝ amani ama ǝn pa aɓalǝ guro mò raka.>>
RUT 2:14 Lang pwari li girlina pángŋǝ̀nà ka, Boaz ne Rut ama, <<Yiu ak girlina, lǐ sǝ wu nu mùr ɓǝlanggun anap.>> Nda Rut do andǝ amǝ'túró can mǝssa, sǝ Boaz pe wi mǝssa mǝnana à dandǝi ka. Rut lìli ɗǝmbo, cili girlina ueo.
RUT 2:15 Lang Rut longŋǝna nǝ̀ nyar aban alta ɓakurikuri ka, Boaz ne alaggana male ama, <<Wu nying Rut ɓǝ̀ alta ɓakurikuri a ban mǝnana akúnò mǝssa ram kam ngga. Wu kǝa pǝrki ɗàng. Ɗǝm ngga, wu pusǝ aɓea amur-mǝssa arǝ akúnò, sǝ wu nyia ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ tarkia ka.>>
RUT 2:17 Nda Rut lidǝmba nǝ ram ɓakurikuri a ɓaban ba pwarikpǝra ka; sǝ lang nyána mǝssa mǝnana ram ngga, kum mǝsǝsa mǝnana lùmsǝ nggea-kwar ka.
RUT 2:18 Pǝlǝa twal mǝsǝse umnǝi a là, kya lǝmdǝi nkili-mǝɓwame gulo mala mǝsǝsa mǝnana ram ngga. Ɗǝm ngga, pè nkili-mǝɓwame girlina mana lì sǝ cili ue ka.
RUT 2:19 Naomi ɗì ama, <<Nda aya ban, sǝ a ram mǝssa mǝnia kat yalung? A ɓaban mala yana sǝ a pàktúró? Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli tsǝki ɓwabura mǝnana lǝmdǝo earmúrú ka bù.>> Rut ne Naomi ama nda a ɓaban mala ɓè ɓwabura lullǝi ama Boaz sǝ ram ɓakurikuri.
RUT 2:20 Naomi banggi Rut nkili-mǝɓwame ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ tsǝkbu sulǝ amurí nǝban Yahweh mǝnana bwal domǝsǝcau andǝ pěmǝɓoarne male aban aɓwana mǝnana nǝyilǝmu ka andǝ aɓwana mana à wuna ka.>> Pǝlǝa Naomi banggi wi ama, <<Ɓwabura mǝno ka ɓǝla-nggurkwar ma'sǝma. Yì ka nda mwashat aɓalǝ amǝ'akmúr sǝm.>>
RUT 2:21 Ɗǝm ngga Rut ɓwama'Mowap na ama, <<Yale ɓwabure banggam ama, <Ue kani atà amǝ'túró mem sheɓǝ̀ à malna pwan-gìrɓaban mem kat ka.> >>
RUT 2:22 Naomi ne Rut, nkili-mǝɓwame ama, <<E, muna-ɓwama mem, nǝ̀ ɓoaribani wu pàktúró wunǝ amamǝna amǝtúró mala Boaz. Ɓǝ̀ a o a ɓaban mala ɓeɓwa ɗàng ngga, ɓekǝ gìr mǝɓane nǝ̀ gandǝnǝ kumo.>>
RUT 2:23 Nda Rut pàktúró a nkanggari amamǝna amǝtúró mala Boaz aban ram ɓakurikuri ateà, ba masǝlǝata pwan-gìrɓaban mala mǝssa-bálì andǝ mala mǝssa-alkama kat. Anzǝm mǝno ka, Rut do andǝ nkili-mǝɓwame.
RUT 3:1 A ɓè pwari ka, Naomi banggi Rut, nkili-mǝɓwame ama, <<Muna-ɓwama mem, pà nǝ̀ ɓoaro mǝ kumbo usǝlǝo, ace mǝnana koman ngga ɓǝ̀ kyanbo pepè ka re?
RUT 3:2 Ɗenyi ama mǝnia yì ɓwabura, yì Boaz mǝnana a kǝ wari a paktúró wunǝ amamǝna amǝtúró male ka, ɓǝla-nggurkwar ma'sǝma. Ado ka, kwakikiro. Nǝ pwarikpǝra man ngga, amǝtúró nǝ̀ nyaki wi mǝssa-bálì male a katǝra.
RUT 3:3 Acemani ka, sussǝo, hasǝ mùrú, sǝ wu oasǝ agir-nggūrǝu mô mǝɓoarne-katkat. Pǝlǝa wu kya a ban mǝnana à kǝ̀ nya mǝssa kam ngga, sǝama kǝa eari wi ɓǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama a nda a ban mǝno ɗàng, sheɓǝ̀ malǝna lǐ andǝ nu ka.
RUT 3:4 Tsǝkiro pepè wu sǝn ban mǝnana nǝ̀ nong kam ngga. Anzǝm mana kongŋǝna a ntulo ka, kya loasǝ nggubyau-kùmsǝo male, sǝ wu nong tù a ban akusǝi. Yì ka nǝ̀ banggo gìr mǝnana awu nǝ pàk ka.>>
RUT 3:5 Rut earî Naomi ama, <<Mǝ nǝ pàk gìr mǝnana kat a banggam ama mǝ pak ka.>>
RUT 3:6 Nda Rut wari a ban nya mǝssa, sǝ pàk gìr mǝnana kat nkili-mǝɓwame ne wi ama ɓǝ̀ pàk ka.
RUT 3:7 Lang Boaz malǝna lǐ andǝ nu ka, banɓoari wi. Sǝ wari a ban mǝnana à ramgi akúnò mǝssa-bálì ka, sǝ nongŋo nǝ̀ nong'ntullo. Pǝlǝa Rut ging zàng, kya loasǝ nggubyau-kùmsǝo mala Boaz, sǝ nong tù a ban akusǝi.
RUT 3:8 Nǝ ɓadu ka, Boaz lo hǝrkit, sǝ lang pǝlǝ ka, ndali, sǝn ɓè ɓwama aban nongŋo a ban akusǝi!
RUT 3:9 Boaz ɗì ama, <<A nda yana?>> Pǝlǝa ɓwame ear ama, <<Mǝ nda guro mò, Rut. Sárǝ́ nggubyau mô amuram, acemǝnana a nda mǝ'akmúrú ka.>>
RUT 3:10 Boaz ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝko bù, muna-ɓwama mem. Gìr mǝnia a kǝ pè ado ka, a ndaban lǝmdǝ domǝsǝcau mǝgule mǝnana kútì mana a lǝmdǝì nkilo-mǝɓwame ka. Ɓǝ́ a umǝna alta lagga-ɓwa mǝkume ko mǝ'tǝ̀r, sǝama a pak anggo ɗàng.
RUT 3:11 Ado ka, cè ɓangciu pakko ɗàng ɓoarnsarilem. Mǝ nǝ pàk gìr mǝnana kat a bang ngga. Acili aɓwana mǝnana kat a là ka, à sǝlǝna ama a nda ɓwama mǝɓoarne.
RUT 3:12 Mǝsǝcau na ama mǝ nda mǝ'akmúrú, sǝama ɓeɓwa nakam mǝnana nda a dǝmbanǝ mim kǝla ɓǝla-nggurkwar ka.
RUT 3:13 Ue kani a dù man yalung ngga. Sǝ lí nǝ dǝmbari ka, sǝm nǝ̀ ɗì. Ɓǝ̀ eare nǝ̀ akmuro ka, mǝɓoarne na. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ earce nǝ̀ pàk anggo raka, ǝn panacau a bano ama, mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, mǝ nǝ akmuro. Ado ka, nong kani sheɓǝ̀ bankwarna ka.>>
RUT 3:14 Nda Rut nong kano nǝban akusǝ Boaz, sǝama kaniama ban nǝ̀ kwaro mǝnana ɓwa nǝ̀ gandǝ sǝn ɓì nǝ̀ súrǝì ka, Rut loapi ban mǝno. Boaz ka earce ama kǝɓwa ɓǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama ɓè ɓwama yiu kani a ban nya mǝssa ɗàng.
RUT 3:15 Boaz ne wi ama, <<Yinǝ nggubyau-koarǝu mô, sǝ wu sárǝi kani.>> Rut pǝlǝa pàk anggo, sǝ Boaz karǝkì wi mǝssa-bálì tasau tongno-nong-mwashat aɓa nggubyau-koarǝu, sǝ tsǝki wi amurí. Pǝlǝa Rut nyar a là nǝ mǝsǝsa mǝno.
RUT 3:16 Lang Rut yiu a ɓala aban Naomi nkili-mǝɓwame ka, Naomi ɗì ama, <<Muna-ɓwama mem, wu kya mal lang le?>> Pǝlǝa Rut ne wi gìr mǝnana kat Boaz pàk aceì ka.
RUT 3:17 Nyare ne wi ɗǝm ama, <<Boaz banggam ama mǝ nggá nyar a bano nǝ ɓabuam atàrǝì ɗàng, nda pam mǝnia yì mǝssa-bálì kat ka.>>
RUT 3:18 Pǝlǝa Naomi banggi wi ama, <<Ado ka, kúndǝô, muna-ɓwama mem, sheɓǝ̀ a sǝna gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ pur aɓalǝi ka. Boaz pà nǝ̀ usǝlǝ yalung ɗàng, sheɓǝ̀ malna cê ka.>>
RUT 4:1 Boaz wari a [ban ramba mala aɓwana] a kún là, sǝ dumnǝdo abanì. Pǝlǝa ɓè ɓǝla-nggurkwar, yì ɓwabura mǝnana Boaz bangcau male aban Rut ka, yiu kǝ kútiô; sǝ Boaz tunǝi ama, <<Gyajam mem, kàra yiu, yi dumnǝdo kani.>> Ɓwabure pǝlǝa kàra wario kya dumnǝdo.
RUT 4:2 Sǝ Boaz tunǝ aɓwana-mǝgule lum mala lê, sǝ banggia wia ama ɓǝà dumnǝdo gbal. Lang à dumǝna ka,
RUT 4:3 Boaz ne ɓǝla-nggurkwar male ama, <<Ado mǝnana Naomi nyarǝnì nzali Mowap ka, kǝ earce ama nǝ̀ mak nzali mala ɓǝla ma'sǝm Elimelek,
RUT 4:4 sǝ ǝn sǝni ka, ndanǝ ɓoaro wu sǝlǝa. Ado ka, ɓǝ̀ a kǝ earce ka, kúrí aɓadǝm aburana mǝnia à dumnǝdo kani ka, sǝ aɓadǝm aɓwana-mǝgule mala aɓwana mem. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ a kǝ earce raka, na kúno mǝ sǝlǝa, acemǝnana a nda ɓwa mǝnana ɓoaro wu kúrí ka. Anzǝmó ka, mǝ nda.>> Ɓwabure ear ama, <<Mǝ nǝ kúrí.>>
RUT 4:5 Pǝlǝa Boaz banggi wi ama, <<Ndanǝ ɓoaro, sǝama a pwari mǝnana a nǝ kúr nzalinì a bù Naomi ka, awu nǝ twal Rut yì mā-lú ɓwama'Mowap gbal, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ nzali liɓalanî ueo a bù aɓwana mala lú ka.>>
RUT 4:6 Ɓwabure eari wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ cê na anggo ka, pà mǝ nǝ kúr nzalinì ɗǝm ɗàng, acemǝnana nzalinì pà nǝ̀ duk nzali liɓala mala amunem ɗàng. Kúrí, acemǝnana pà mǝ nǝ gandǝ akmúrí ɗàng.>>
RUT 4:7 A nza mǝno ka, kuncau mala amǝ'Isǝrayila amur cau mala akmúr nzali ko mê ka, nda mǝnana ama: ɓwa mǝnana kǝ mak nzali ka, nǝ̀ pusǝ nkura male a kusǝi, sǝ nǝ̀ pè ɓwa mǝnana nǝ kúr nzalinì ka. Anggo sǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kǝ lǝmdǝ ama cê ka dumǝna.
RUT 4:8 Acemani ka, lang ɓwabure ne Boaz ama, <<Kúrí>> ka, pusǝ nkura male pè Boaz.
RUT 4:9 Pǝlǝa Boaz banggi aɓwana-mǝgule andǝ acili aɓwana mǝnana a ban mǝno ka ama, <<Yalung ngga, wu dumǝna amǝ'nakún kat ama, ǝn kúrna gìr mǝnana kat mala Elimelek na, andǝ gir mǝnana kat mala amuna-burana male, yià Kiliyon andǝ Malon na ka.
RUT 4:10 Ɗǝm ngga, Rut ɓwama'Mowap, yì mā-lú mala Malon, pǝlǝna māmám, ace ɓǝlî lú muna mǝnana nǝ̀ yia liɓala male ka, ace mǝnana lullǝ lú ɓǝ̀ kǝa ndǝrmì ɓalǝ aɓǝla-nggurkwar male andǝ là male raka. Wu nda ka amǝ'nakún, a pwari man yalung ngga.>>
RUT 4:11 Aɓwana-mǝgule andǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à nda a ban ramba a kún lá kà à bang ama, <<E, sǝm nda ka amǝ'nakún. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝk ɓwama mǝnia kǝ yiu a kútiô a ɓala mò ka ɓǝ̀ duk kǝla Rahila andǝ Liya, mǝnana nǝbania yià kǝm sǝ à kum ɓwapǝndǝa mala ɓala Isǝrayila ka. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝa wu hangǝli a Efǝrata, sǝ ɓǝ̀ lullǝo zǝki a Betalami.
RUT 4:12 Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝa amuna mǝnana nsari man nǝ̀ ɓǝlô ka, à nǝ̀ tsǝk ɓala mò ɓǝ̀ pa kǝla ɓala mala Perez, muna-ɓwabura mala Yahuda mǝnana ɓǝl andǝ Tamar ka.>>
RUT 4:13 Nda Boaz twal Rut pǝlǝ māmí ka. Yahweh tsǝki Rut bù, kum muna a bumi sǝ ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura.
RUT 4:14 Amamǝna mala Betalami ne Naomi ama, <<Ɓwangsǝban ɓǝ pà aban Yahweh! Yalung ngga, Yahweh pano mǝ'kau muna-ɓwabura ace tsǝkiro. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝa ɓǝ̀ lullǝ mune zǝki a Isǝrayila!
RUT 4:15 Nkilo-mǝɓwame mǝnana kǝ earceo, sǝ pàngŋǝ́nò gìr mǝnana kútì mǝnana amuna-burana tongno-nong-ɓari nǝ̀ pàkkô ka. Sǝ ado ka, ɓǝlǝno mǝ'kau muna-ɓwabura mǝnana nǝ̀ yinǝo nǝ bǝsa yilǝmu, sǝ nǝ̀ tsǝkiro aɓa è mô ka.>>
RUT 4:16 Naomi twal mune, nongsǝi a byali, sǝ iulǝi.
RUT 4:17 Amamǝna mǝnana à nda murkala andǝia ka, à tsǝkî mune lullǝu ama Obet. À bang ama, <<À ɓǝlǝni Naomi muna-ɓwabura!>> Obet na yi ɓǝl Jeshi, sǝ Jeshi yi bǝl Dauda ka.
RUT 4:18 Mǝnia ka nda nggurkwar mala Perez: Perez nda tár Hezǝron, Hezǝron nda tár Ram, Ram nda tár Aminadap, Aminadap nda tár Nashon, Nashon nda tár Salmon, Salmon nda tár Boaz, Boaz nda tár Obet, Obet nda tár Jeshi, Sǝ Jeshi nda tár Dauda.
1SA 1:1 Ɓè ɓwabura nakam lullǝì ama Elkana. Tárrí nda Jeroham, kè-mǝɓwabure nda Elihu, sǝ tár-kè-mǝ-ɓwabure ka nda Tohu, a nggurkwar mala Zuf, ɓwa'Efǝrat. Yì ka do a Rama, ɓè nggea-là aɓa nzali múr ankono mala Ifǝrem.
1SA 1:2 Ndanǝ amamǝna ɓari, Hana andǝ Penina. Penina ka ndanǝ amuna, sǝ Hana ka pànǝ kǝ muna ɗang.
1SA 1:3 Ɓwabura mǝnia ka kǝ pur a nggea-là male koya pǝlǝa ace ká peri andǝ pà gir'nkila aban Yahweh, Mǝtala Abangŋo, a Shilo. Hofni andǝ Finehas, amuna-burana ɓari mala Eli ka, à nda ka apǝris mala Yahweh kano.
1SA 1:4 Koya pwari sǝ Elkana nǝ̀ pà gir'nkila ka, kǝ pê māmí Penina andǝ koyan atà amuni amuna-burana andǝ amuna-mamǝna kāmbe mala nyama.
1SA 1:5 Sǝ Hana ka kǝ pe wi akāmbe ɓari, acemǝnana kǝ earce Hana, kat andǝ amani ama Yahweh pè wi ɓǝlmuna raka.
1SA 1:6 Pàk ka ɓimama kǝ altacau arǝì, nǝ̀ lulbumi acemǝnana Yahweh pè wi ɓǝlmuna raka.
1SA 1:7 Anggo sǝ gìrnî lidǝmba pǝlǝa anzǝm pǝlǝa. Ɓǝ̀ kusǝ shen sǝ wari a ɓala mala Yahweh ka, anggo gbal sǝ ɓimama nǝ̀ nggǝ lulbumi. Acemani ka, Hana nǝ̀ nggǝ ɓua sǝ pà nǝ̀ li girlina ɗang.
1SA 1:8 Sǝ Elkana burí ka banggi wi ama, <<Hana, palang sǝ a kǝ ɓua? Sǝ palang sǝ a kǝ li girlina ɗang? Sǝ palang sǝ a pàk bumkiɗikea? Ən kútì amuna-burana lum a bano re?>>
1SA 1:9 A ɓè pwari anzǝm mana à malna li girlina sǝ à nuna gìr a Shilo ka, Hana lo. Nda aɓa bumpina mǝlime, sǝ pakhiwi aban Yahweh nǝ sukkimǝrǝm kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Aɓa mǝno anggo ka, Eli pǝris ka, nda aban do a buno male a nkanggari kpangbang-kunkurǝm mala ndà mala Yahweh.
1SA 1:11 Pǝlǝa Hana pàcau nǝ-shambum ama, <<We Yahweh mana a Karban Kat nǝ Gulo ka, ɓǝ̀ aɓa mǝsǝcau awu nǝ sǝn tanni mem, mim guro mò, sǝ awu nǝ ɗenyinǝ mim, ɓalǝo pà nǝ̀ lorǝǎm, mim guro mò ɗàng, sǝ awu nǝ pàm, mim guro mò, muna-ɓwabura ka, mǝ nǝ nyesǝi mǝ nǝ po wi we Yahweh, aɓalǝ anonggio mala do-yilǝmu male kat, sǝ kǝ nkembu pa nǝ̀ je múrí ɗàng.>>
1SA 1:12 Lang lidǝmba nǝ pakhiwi aɓadǝm Yahweh ka, Eli soa mǝsǝi kǝ sǝn kúni.
1SA 1:13 Hana na aban nacau a ɓabumi; kǝ amburkuni na à kǝ dǝurǝ ka, sǝ gì ka à oè ɗàng. Acemani ka, Eli twali ama mba-walì nǝ walo.
1SA 1:14 Sǝ Eli banggi wi ama, <<Nǝ̀ sau lang sǝ awu nǝ ueo aɓa walo-mba? Nying nu mùr-anap mò.>>
1SA 1:15 Sǝ Hana ka eari wi ama, <<Awo, ɓwamǝgule mem, Mǝ nda ɓwama mǝnana yilǝmem na aɓa zunggǝli ka. Ən nu kǝ mùr-anap ko mba ɗàng. Mǝ nda rǝ ú bumam a ɓadǝm Yahweh.
1SA 1:16 Kǝa twalam, mim guro mò kǝla ɓwama mǝɓane ɗàng; ǝn mal pwari yi pur ado mǝ ndaban lǝmdǝ ɓuanǝbum andǝ bumkiɗikea mǝgule mem aɓa hiwi.>>
1SA 1:17 Pǝlǝa Eli pà eare ama, <<Kyane aɓa rǝpwala, sǝ ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila po zǝmba mô mǝnana a alte a baní ka.>>
1SA 1:18 Pǝlǝa Hana bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ guro mò kum earmúrú a mǝsǝo.>> Pǝlǝa ɓwame oa o male sǝ kya lili sǝ ɓamǝsǝi panzǝa.
1SA 1:19 Pǝlǝa à lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal sǝ à peri aɓadǝm Yahweh; sǝ à nyar a ɓala malea a Rama. Elkana yi súrǝ̀ māmí Hana, sǝ Yahweh ɗenyinǝ Hana.
1SA 1:20 Lang anonggio yi karna ka, muna kpa a bum Hana sǝ ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura, sǝ tsǝki wi lullǝu ama Samuyila, acemǝnana bang ama, <<Ən zǝmbì aban Yahweh.>>
1SA 1:21 Lang ɓè bàkú kàrna ka, ɓwabura man, yì Elkana ka wari andǝ ɓala male kat ace pà gìr'nkila mala koya pǝlǝa, sǝ ace lùmsǝ pàcau nǝ-shambum male aban Yahweh.
1SA 1:22 Sǝama Hana ka wari ɗang. Banggi burí ama, <<Anzǝm mǝnana ǝn kasǝna muna a kiura ka, sǝ mǝ nǝ kánǝi, mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝí aɓadǝm Yahweh, sǝ yì ka nǝ̀ ue kano ba do-yilǝmu male kat.>>
1SA 1:23 Burí Elkana banggi wi ama, <<Pàk gìr mǝnana ɓoaro kutibani a bano ka; kúndǝô sheɓǝ̀ a kasǝni a kiura ka; ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝk cau male ɓǝ̀ yi lumsǝo.>> Nda ɓwame ueo sǝ lǝsǝ muni she lang kasǝni a kiura ka.
1SA 1:24 Sǝ lang kasǝni a kiura ka, twali atè, atārǝia andǝ muna-jamnda mǝnana mbule tàrú ka, andǝ tyang lum mala muku alkama, andǝ sambǝram mana lùmsǝì nǝ mùr-anap ka. Sǝ twal Samuyila aɓa kyauwe male yinǝi a ɓala mala Yahweh a Shilo.
1SA 1:25 Pǝlǝa à pwanmyal muna-jamndè, sǝ à yinǝ mune aban Eli.
1SA 1:26 Pǝlǝa Hana bang ama, <<Ida, ɓwamǝgule mem, kǝla mǝnana a ndakam nǝyilǝmu ka, mǝ nda ɓwama mǝnana ǝn cam kani aɓadǝmbo, aban pakhiwi aban Yahweh ka.
1SA 1:27 Ən pakhiwi ace muna mǝnia ka, sǝ Yahweh panam zǝmba mem mǝnana ǝn warinǝi a baní ka.
1SA 1:28 Acemani ka, ǝn panì Yahweh. Aɓa do-yilǝmu male kat ka, ǝn nyingŋǝ́nì Yahweh.>> Pǝlǝa à peri aban Yahweh a banì.
1SA 2:1 Sǝ Hana pakhiwi ama: Ɓabumam pàk banɓoarnado kǝ̀rkǝ́r aban Yahweh! Njawe mem kumǝna loasǝ́bân atàcau mala Yahweh! Kunam nǝ̀ nacau nǝ mǝsǝkàng-kàngŋa arǝ aɓiam-mǝbura, acemǝnana ǝn nggǝ pàk-banɓoarnado aɓa amsǝban mô.
1SA 2:2 Kǝɓwa pà kàm mǝfele kǝla Yahweh ɗàng! Kǝɓè pà kàm ɗàng she we! Sǝ kǝ Tali pa kàm kǝla Ɓakuli ma'sǝm ɗàng.
1SA 2:3 Kǝa wu hatǝki nacau twàlɓamúrû kǝ̀rkǝ́r ɗàng, sǝ kǝa ɗeki acau gusǝlǝ-múrû pur a kuno ɗàng! Acemǝnana Yahweh ka Ɓakuli mala sǝlǝe na, sǝ nǝbani sǝ à kǝ karǝki atúró mala aɓwana.
1SA 2:4 À ɓungina anta mala akanggǝrang-ɓwa, sǝ amǝ'tanggigya ka à marǝia nǝ rǝcandǝa.
1SA 2:5 Aɓwana mǝnana à ɗǝm ɗiɗyal ka, à mak ɓamuria ace nɗǝmo bǝtikulyak, sǝ aɓwana mana nzala walia ka, à ɗwanyi ɗǝm ɗàng. Nggearǝ nkombi ka, ɓǝlna amuna tongno-nong-ɓari, sǝ ɓwama mǝnana ndanǝ amuna pas ka, dumǝna-pwari'pwari.
1SA 2:6 Yahweh kǝ wal-lú sǝ kǝ pa yilǝmu; kǝ sulǝ ɓwa a Shewol sǝ kǝ loasǝ ɓwa.
1SA 2:7 Yahweh kǝ tsǝk ɓwa a tǝ̀r, sǝ kǝ tsǝk ɓwa ɓǝ̀ duk mǝkume; kǝ kyauwiki ɓwa, sǝ kǝ gusǝlǝ ɓwa.
1SA 2:8 Kǝ loasǝ amǝ'tǝ̀r ɓǝà purî ɓá tú, sǝ amǝtapwasǝa ka kǝ pusǝia aɓa gìgí, ace tsǝia ɓǝà do andǝ amǝgulo, sǝ ɓǝà kum liɓala mala buno ɓoarɓwa. Akusǝɓa mala ɓanza ka à mala Yahweh na; amúria sǝ tamsǝ ɓanza.
1SA 2:9 Kǝ yál kusǝ amǝ'do-mǝsǝcau male, sǝ amǝ'ɓealɓikea ka nǝ̀ tsǝa kunia nǝ̀ pwal aɓa pǝndǝa. Pà nǝ rǝcandǝa sǝ ɓwa nǝ̀ duk-gbani ɗang.
1SA 2:10 Amǝ'ɓinǝcau arǝ Yahweh ka, à nǝ̀ arkia gucik-gucik; nǝ̀ ìm arǝia a kuli. Yahweh nǝ̀ ɓashì ɓanza kat; nǝ̀ pè murǝm male rǝcandǝa; nǝ̀ loasǝ bù ɓwa male mǝnana tàrì ka.
1SA 2:11 Pǝlǝa Elkana nyar a là a Rama. Sǝ muna ka ueo ace pàkkî Yahweh túró aɓadǝm Eli pǝris.
1SA 2:12 Amuna-burana mala Eli ka, aɓwana mǝɓane na. À súrǝ̀ Yahweh ɗàng
1SA 2:13 sǝ à tsǝkiria arǝ anggurcau amur agir mǝnana ɓoaro apǝris nǝ̀ ɗice aban aɓwana ka ɗàng. A kún mani ka, lang ɓwa na aban pà gir'nkila ka, mǝtúró-ɓala mala pǝris nǝ̀ yiu nǝ shokali-soa-nyama. Lang nyama narǝ ɓǝla a bǝsa ka,
1SA 2:14 nǝ̀ yia zuɓi shokali-soa-nyama aɓa nkenye, ko muna-nkwaring, ko kwangiri, ko nggea-nkwaring. Gìr mǝnana kat shokali-soa-nyama loasǝi ka, pǝris nǝ̀ twali ace ɓamurì. Mǝnia ka nda gìr mǝnana à kǝ pakki amǝ'Isǝrayila mǝnana kat à yiua pà gìr'nkila a Shilo ka.
1SA 2:15 Amur mǝno ka, kaniama à nǝ̀ pisǝ mùrú-nyama ka, mǝtúró-ɓala mala pǝris nǝ̀ yiu sǝ nǝ̀ banggi ɓwa mǝnana pàkiyi gir'nkila ka ama, <<Pà nyama mǝnana à nǝ̀ twani ace pǝris ka, acemǝnana pà nǝ̀ ak nyama mǝnana à lambǝni ka ɗàng she mǝpwale.>>
1SA 2:16 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɓwê banggi wi ama, <<Kúndǝô ɓǝà pisǝ mùruí peatu, sǝ awu nǝ̀ twal gìr mǝnana a earce ka,>> nǝ̀ bang ama, <<Awo, dumǝna púp awu nǝ pà adyan! Ɓǝ̀ a pa raka, mǝ nǝ twali nǝ rǝcandǝa.>>
1SA 2:17 Mǝnia yì cauɓikea mala alaggana mǝnia ka gul kǝ̀rkǝ́r a mǝsǝ Yahweh, acemǝnana pàgir aban Yahweh ka à pàkce-ɓà.
1SA 2:18 A bàkú mǝno ka Samuyila yì muna ka lidǝmba nǝ̀ pàkki Yahweh túró, kǝ oasǝ efot mala nggubyau linǝn.
1SA 2:19 Koya pǝlǝa ka nggè nǝ̀ pàkki wi muna daura-múrɓì sǝ nǝ̀ yinǝi wi nǝi lang yiu atà burí ace pà gir'nkila mala koya pǝlǝa ka.
1SA 2:20 Pǝlǝa Eli nǝ̀ tsǝki Elkana andǝ māmí bù sǝ nǝ̀ bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh loasǝò amuna nǝ bù ɓwama man a kúnì mǝnana zǝmba ace aban Yahweh ka.>> Anzǝm mǝno ka sǝ à nǝ̀ o a là.
1SA 2:21 Mǝsǝcau Yahweh ɓwamur Hana, sǝ kum ɓǝlmuna sǝ ɓǝl amuna-burana tàrú andǝ amuna-mamǝna ɓari. Sǝ muna yì Samuyila ka gulo a ɓadǝm Yahweh.
1SA 2:22 A bàkú mǝno ka Eli ena kutsuk, sǝ camarǝ ok cau mala gìr mǝnana kat amuna-burana male kǝ pakki Isǝrayila kat, andǝ mǝnana ama à kǝ nongginǝ amamǝna mana à kǝ yiu a pàktúró a kún Tara ban-kpapí ka.
1SA 2:23 Sǝ banggi amuna-burana male ama, <<Palang sǝ wu kǝ pakki agir kǝla amǝnia ka? Ən nggǝ oe a kún aɓwana mǝnia kat acau mala agir mǝɓike mǝnana wu kǝ pea ka.
1SA 2:24 Awo, amunem; cau mǝnana ǝn nggǝ oè kǝ mesǝe aɓalǝ aɓwana mala Yahweh ka, mǝɓoarne na ɗang.
1SA 2:25 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa pàkkî ɓì cauɓikea ka, Ɓakuli nǝ̀ kùtí anrea ace gilǝki càu, sǝama ɓǝ̀ ɓwa pàkkî Yahweh cauɓikea ka, yana ɓwê nǝ̀ pwanzali aceì?>> Sǝ yià ka, à ginǝ kwakikiria arǝ cau mala tárria, acemǝnana kàne mala Yahweh na nǝ̀ wal-luia.
1SA 2:26 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka, muna yì Samuyila ka lidǝmba nǝ gulo aɓa nggūrǝu, sǝ aɓa earmúrú aban Yahweh andǝ aɓwana.
1SA 2:27 Pǝlǝa ɓè ɓwa mala Ɓakuli yiu aban Eli sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda cau mala Yahweh, <Ən lǝmdǝ ɓamúràm bwāng aban ɓala mala keò, lang à nda a Masar aɓata Firona ka re?
1SA 2:28 Ən tárì aɓalǝ atau mala Isǝrayila kat ɓǝ̀ duk pǝris mem, ace eauwe amur gyangŋan mem, ace paɓoro mala pisǝ muku-gìr loasǝ yele mǝ'rǝmɓoarne, sǝ ɓǝ̀ oasǝ efot aɓadǝmbam ngga re? Ən pê ɓala mala keò apagir kat mala bǝsa, mǝnana amǝ Isǝrayila kǝ yinǝia abanam ngga.
1SA 2:29 Sǝ palang sǝ wun kat wu ɓǝsǝkice agir'nkila mem andǝ apagir mem mǝnana ǝn tsǝk nzongcau nǝma ɓǝà yinǝia a mǝnia yì bando mem ngga? A gusǝlǝce amunio amuram nǝ earia wia ɓǝà twal amǝɓoarne kat aɓalǝ akoya pàgir mǝnana aɓwana mem amǝ Isǝrayila yinǝia ka, ace lǝsǝ ɓamuria ɓǝà nyange?>
1SA 2:30 <<Acemani ka, Yahweh, Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila kǝ bang ama: <Ən pacau nǝma ɓala mò andǝ nggurkwar mò ɓǝà lidǝmba nǝ kutio andǝ puro aɓadǝmbam tàtǝ́k.> Sǝama, adyan ngga Yahweh kǝ na ama: <Pà mǝ nǝ ɗeki ɓǝ̀ pàk anggo ɗǝm ɗàng. A kún mani ka, mǝ nǝ gusǝlǝ aɓwana mǝnana à gusǝlǝam ngga, sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à ɓǝsǝkiam ngga, mǝ nǝ pàkcea-ɓa.
1SA 2:31 Kwakikiro, anonggio na kǝ yiu mǝnana aɓalǝia ka, mǝ nǝ wal-lú koya lo-ɓwa muna-ɓwabura a ɓala mò andǝ nggurkwar mò, mǝnana nǝ̀ tsǝa à pà nǝ̀ kum jamgula ɗǝm a ɓala mò raka.
1SA 2:32 Sǝ mǝsǝo nǝ̀ sǝn tanni mǝkwanbanì mala ɓala peri mem. Mǝɓoarne nǝ̀ yiu amur Isǝrayila, sǝ a ɓala mò ka, kǝ ɓwa pà nǝ̀ bik apǝlǝa mala ě ɗǝm ɗàng, arǝ anza kat.
1SA 2:33 Ɓwa mwashat atà amǝkeo mǝnana mǝ nǝ ɗeki ɓǝ̀ lidǝmba nǝ túró pǝris amur gyangŋan mem ngga, nǝ̀ duk nte sǝ do male nǝ̀ pà aɓa tímúrû. Amǝkeo kat nǝ̀ wǔ a lo-ɓwa malea.
1SA 2:34 Sǝ mǝnia yì gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ kum amuna-burana mô ɓari, yia Hofni andǝ Finehas ka, nǝ̀ dupô gìr'lǝmdǝa: yià kǝm à nǝ̀ wǔ aɓa pwari mǝ'mwashati.
1SA 2:35 << <Sǝ mǝ nǝ loasǝì ɓamúràm pǝris mǝ'mǝsǝcaunì, mǝnana nǝ̀ pàk gìr kǝla mana nda a bumam andǝ ɗenyicau mem ngga. Mǝ nǝ tamsǝ ɓala-pǝris male kàngkàng, sǝ nǝ̀ pàk túró-pǝris aɓadǝm ɓwa mem mana ǝn tárì ka tàtǝ́k.
1SA 2:36 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat ueo nǝyilǝmu a nggurkwar mò ka, nǝ̀ ká aban pǝris mǝno ka ace zǝmbi wi gbatali bolo-azǝrfa andǝ ɗurǝo nɗǝmo, sǝ nǝ̀ bang ama: Ida, twalam a ɓè bantúró pǝris ace mǝnana mǝ kum girlina mana mǝ nǝ lì ka.> >>
1SA 3:1 Adyan ngga muna, yì Samuyila ka, ndarǝ pakkì Yahweh túró a ɓadǝm Eli. Arǝ abákú mǝno ka, Yahweh kǝ nacau nǝ aɓwana tùtù ɗang; sǝ sǝna ka làkkì ɗàng.
1SA 3:2 A ɓè dù, Eli mǝnana amǝsǝì kǝ sǝnban ɗǝm pepè raka, ndaban nongŋo a ban mǝnana nonggiyi kam ngga,
1SA 3:3 sǝ pitǝla mala Ɓakuli ka, à malaká limi ɗàng. Sǝ Samuyila ka, ndaban nongŋo a ndà mala Yahweh, a ban mǝnana Akwati mala Ɓakuli pàk kàm ngga.
1SA 3:4 Pǝlǝa Yahweh tunǝ Samuyila, sǝ Samuyila ear ama, <<Mǝ ndya ka!>>
1SA 3:5 Pǝlǝa ɓangŋa wari aban Eli sǝ ne wi ama, <<Mǝ ndya ka, a tunǝam.>> Sǝ Eli banggi wi ama, <<Ən tunǝo ɗàng. Nyare kya nongnǝ-nongŋo.>> Nda nyare nongnǝ-nongŋo ka.
1SA 3:6 Yahweh nyare tunǝban ama, <<Samuyila!>> Sǝ Samuyila lo wari aban Eli sǝ ne wi ama, <<Mǝ ndya ka, a tunǝam.>> Sǝ Eli banggi wi ama, <<Ən tunǝo ɗàng, munem; nyare kya nongnǝ-nongŋo.>>
1SA 3:7 Samuyila ka sǝlǝ ama Yahweh na kǝ tunǝi ka ɗàng, acemǝnana cau mala Yahweh malaká yiu a baní akǝ fara anggo ɗàng.
1SA 3:8 Pǝlǝa Yahweh tunǝ Samuyila ɗǝm tàruia tunǝban. Samuyila lo wari aban Eli sǝ ne wi ama, <<Mǝ ndya ka, a tunǝam!>> Nda Eli yi sǝlǝa ama Yahweh na kǝ tunǝ mune ka.
1SA 3:9 Acemani ka, Eli banggi Samuyila ama, <<Nyare kya nongnǝ-nongŋo, sǝ ɓǝ̀ tunǝno ɗǝm ngga, ne wi ama, <Nacau, Yahweh, guro mò na kǝ ueo ka.> >> Nda Samuyila nyare wario kya nongnǝ-nongŋo a ban nongŋo male ka.
1SA 3:10 Sǝ Yahweh yiu yi came, sǝ tunǝban kǝla mana a dǝmbe ka, ama, <<Samuyila! Samuyila!>> Samuyila pǝlǝa ear ama, <<Nacau, guro mò na kǝ ueo ka!>>
1SA 3:11 Pǝlǝa Yahweh banggi Samuyila ama, <<Sǝni, Mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ pàk ɓegìr a Isǝrayila; ɓwa mana kat okce ka, nǝ̀ gǝggǝli.
1SA 3:12 A pwari mǝno ka, mǝ nǝ̀ lùmsǝ cau mǝnana ǝn ne amúr Eli andǝ ɓala male ka, twal a tite aban ká masǝlǝate.
1SA 3:13 Ən bangŋǝni wi nǝma mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ ɓashì ɓala male tàtǝ́k, ace cauɓikea mǝnana sǝlǝce ka, acemǝnana amuni bang caukyauwikiban amur Ɓakuli, sǝ gimbia ɗàng.
1SA 3:14 Acemani ka, ǝn kángìr aban ɓala mala Eli ama, <Cauɓikea mala ɓala mala Eli ka, à pa nǝ̀ shawuɗi nǝ gìr'nkila ko pàɓoro ɗàng tàtǝ́k.> >>
1SA 3:15 Nda Samuyila nongŋo bà dǝmbari. Pǝlǝa mǝngi akúnda mala ɓala mala Yahweh. Sǝ Samuyila ka ɓangciu pàkki wi arǝ ne Eli mǝno yì sǝna ka.
1SA 3:16 Sǝ Eli tunǝ Samuyila ama, <<Samuyila, munem!>> Sǝ Samuyila eari wi ama, <<Mǝ ndya ka.>>
1SA 3:17 Eli ɗì ama, <<Mana Yahweh banggo? Ida, kǝa sǝmbǝ́rǝàmì ɗàng. Ɓakuli nǝ̀ ɓashio kǝ̀rkǝ́r yi mǝnana ɓǝ̀ a sǝmbǝ́rǝàm kǝcau mana banggo ka!>>
1SA 3:18 Nda Samuyila ne wi cê kat ka. Sǝmbǝrǝi wi kǝ cau ɗàng. Eli pǝlǝa bang ama, <<Yì nda Yahweh. Ɓǝ̀ pàk gìr mǝnana sǝni nda mǝɓoarne a mǝsǝì ka.>>
1SA 3:19 Samuyila lidǝmba nǝ̀ gulo, sǝ Yahweh na atè. Kǝ cau male kpa a nzali ɗàng.
1SA 3:20 Amǝ Isǝrayila puppup, twal a Dan aban ká Biyasheba yi sǝlǝa ama, Samuyila ka, mǝɓangnǝa mala Yahweh na nǝ mǝsǝcau.
1SA 3:21 Yahweh lidǝmba nǝ pusǝrǝi a Shilo; lǝmdǝrǝì a Shilo aban Samuyila nǝ cau male.
1SA 4:1 Sǝ cau mala [Yahweh nǝ kún] Samuyila yiu aban amǝ Isǝrayila kat. A bàkú mǝno ka, amǝ'Isǝrayila wari a munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti. À kya tsǝk kàttì malea a Ebeneza, sǝ amǝ'Filisti tsǝk kàttì malea a Afek.
1SA 4:2 Amǝ'Filisti tsaɗi a kúnarǝia a nzong ban-je munǝo ace ká arǝ Isǝrayila. Lang munǝo candǝ ka, amǝ'Filisti gandǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila, à wal-lú aburana mala amǝ'Isǝrayila kǝla aɓwana á-ine a ɓawan lwa.
1SA 4:3 Lang amǝ'lwa nyarǝna a kàttì ka, aɓwana-mǝgule mala Isǝrayila bang ama, <<Palang sǝ Yahweh eari amǝ'Filisti sǝ à li sǝm a munǝo yalung? Ɓǝ̀ sǝm kyane ɓǝ̀ sǝm twal Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh a Shilo, ɓǝ̀ sǝm yinǝi kani, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ pà atà sǝm, sǝ ɓǝ̀ amsǝ sǝm a ɓabù aɓisǝm amǝbura.>>
1SA 4:4 Nda à tùr aburana a Shilo, sǝ à kya twal Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh Mǝtala Abangŋo, mǝnana do a buno-murǝm a nre ka acerup ka. Amuna-burana ɓari mala Eli, yià Hofni andǝ Finehas ka, à nda kano atà Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli.
1SA 4:5 Lang à yinanǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh aɓa kàttì ka, Isǝrayila kat ɓuà-gāwàn mǝcandǝe gandǝa nzali gǝggǝli.
1SA 4:6 Sǝ lang amǝ'Filisti ok gì ɓuà-gāwàn ngga, à bang ama, <<Mana nda ɓá mǝnia yi gāwàn mǝcandǝe aɓa kàttì mala amǝ'Ibǝru ka?>> Lang à yi sǝlǝa ama, Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh yina aɓa kàttì ka,
1SA 4:7 ɓangciu pàkki amǝ'Filisti, acemǝnana à bang ama, <<Aɓakuli yina a kàttì malea! Caukwanban nǝ sǝm! Kǝgìr kǝla man kum sǝm a kǝ fara ɗàng!
1SA 4:8 Caukwanban nǝ sǝm! Yana nǝ̀ amsǝ sǝm a ɓabù aɓakuli mǝ'rǝcandǝe man? Amǝnia ka, à nda ka aɓakuli mǝnana à wal amǝ'Masar nǝ koya ulang agir'murmwana a ɓabondo ka!
1SA 4:9 Wu cam kàngkàng, wu duk aburana, wun amǝ'Filisti, ɓǝ̀ ana raka wun nǝ̀ duk aguro mala amǝ'Ibǝru, kǝla mana à duk aguro ma'wun ngga! Wu duk aburana sǝ wu munǝo!>>
1SA 4:10 Nda amǝ'Filisti munǝo, sǝ à gandǝ Isǝrayila, sǝ koya ɓwabura ka, ɓangŋa nyare a gumli male. À wal-lú amǝ'Isǝrayila kǝ̀rkǝ́r: asoje-kusǝu á-lumi-tàrú (30,000) wù a kun-munǝo.
1SA 4:11 Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli ka, Amǝ'Filisti é à umnǝi, sǝ amuna-burana mala Eli ɓari, yià Hofni andǝ Finehas ka, à wal-luia.
1SA 4:12 Akǝ pwari mǝno ka, ɓè ɓwabura ɓwa'Benjami ɓangŋa a kun-munǝo sǝ yiu a Shilo nǝ gìr'nggūrǝu mǝsange arǝì nǝ tú a ɓamuri.
1SA 4:13 Lang yi bik ka, Eli naban do yak, amúr buno male a gírí kun-nda aban sǝn njar, ɓalǝi kǝ kasǝki atàcau mala Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli. Lang ɓwabure kùtí aɓa nggea-là sǝ bangce gìr mǝnana kumban ngga, nggea-là kat so ɓua gǝu.
1SA 4:14 Eli ok ɓua-woi'woi sǝ ɗìban ama, <<Mana nda ɓá mǝnia yì zunggǝli mala ban ngga?>> Pǝlǝa ɓwabure larri yiu, sǝ banggi Eli cê.
1SA 4:15 (Eli ka ndanǝ apǝlǝa lumi-tongno-nong-ine-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-tàrú (98), sǝ anggur-mǝsǝì wuna, acemani ka kǝ sǝnban pepè ɗàng.)
1SA 4:16 Ɓwabure ne Eli ama, <<Mǝ nda ɓwa mǝnana ǝn pur a kun-munǝo ka; ǝn ɓangŋa a kun-munǝo yalung.>> Eli ɗì ama, <<Mana kumban, munem?>>
1SA 4:17 Ɓwabure eari wi ama, <<Isǝrayila ɓangŋa a ɓadǝmba amǝ'Filisti, sǝ à wal-lú amǝ Isǝrayila nǝ nggea walban! Amuna-burana mô ɓari, Hofni andǝ Finehas ka à walnia, sǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli ka, amǝ'Filisti angŋǝni!>>
1SA 4:18 Lang bangcau mala Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli ka, kara Eli nyare kpa nǝtakwari amúr buno male a nkanggari bankutio, myali ɓunno, sǝ wǔ, acemǝnana enà sǝ dǝmbǝrya. Eli ka nda mǝɓashi amúr Isǝrayila mala apǝlǝa lumi-ine.
1SA 4:19 Nkil Eli, mālá Finehas ka ndanǝ muna a bumi, sǝ pwari gbashi male gbashìna tù. Lang ok cau ama Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli ka à angŋǝni, sǝ nkili-mǝɓwabure andǝ burí ka à wuna ka, kara kùndǝ a nzali sǝ gbashi. Sǝama kwanban mala gbashi ɓākì.
1SA 4:20 Sǝ lang malanǝ̀ wù ka, amamǝna mǝnana à ndaban came amurí ka à ne wi ama, <<Cè ɓangciu pàkkô ɗàng! A ɓǝlna muna-ɓwabura!>> Sǝ yì ka, nyesǝia wia kǝcau ko tsǝkiri ɗàng.
1SA 4:21 Pǝlǝa tsǝki mune lullǝu ama Ikabot, ɓālǝi ama, <<Ɓoarɓwa mala Ɓakuli nyìngŋǝ̀nà Isǝrayila.>> Pà mǝnia yi lullǝu ka acemǝnana à gbamina Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli arǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila, sǝ ace lú mala nkili-mǝɓwabure andǝ burí.
1SA 4:22 Bang ama, <<Ɓoarɓwa mala Ɓakuli nyìngŋǝ̀nà Isǝrayila, acemǝnana Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli ka, à gbamini.>>
1SA 5:1 Anzǝm mana amǝ'Filisti angŋǝna Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli ka, à twali a Ebeneza sǝ à warini a Ashdot.
1SA 5:2 Pǝlǝa amǝ'Filisti twal Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli sǝ à yinǝi a ndà mala Dagon, sǝ à kya tsǝi a nkanggari Dagon.
1SA 5:3 Lang banfana ka, amǝ Ashdot lo nǝ dǝmbari sǝ à yi sǝni ka, Dagon kpana nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali aɓadǝm Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh. Nda à twal Dagon sǝ à tsǝi a bancame male.
1SA 5:4 Sǝ lang banfana ɗǝm ngga, à lo nǝ dǝmbari sǝ à yi sǝni ka, Dagon kpana nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali aɓadǝm Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh, ɓamur Dagon andǝ abui kǝm na aban nongŋo a bankutio, à ɓungina. Kǝ nggunrǝ Dagon na ue ka.
1SA 5:5 Mǝnia ka nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ apǝris mala Dagon andǝ aɓwana mana kat à kǝ kúti a ndà mala Dagon a Ashdot ka, à kǝ tsǝk kusǝia amur bankutio a ndà mala Dagon raka bà yalung.
1SA 5:6 Bù Yahweh sulǝ nǝ-dǝmbǝrya amúr aɓwana mana à ndanǝdo a Ashdot ka, sǝ yinǝia wia gìr'mur'mwana amúrià, sǝ koea nǝ kwano rǝu-mwarkya, nggearǝ Ashdot andǝ amuna-là male.
1SA 5:7 Lang aɓwana mala Ashdot sǝn gìr mǝnana kǝ̀ kumia ka, à bang ama, <<Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli mala amǝ'Isǝrayila ɓǝ̀kǝa ue a ban sǝm ɗàng, acemǝnana buì sulǝna nǝ gìr'mur'mwana kǝ̀rkǝ́r amúr sǝm sǝ amúr Dagon, ɓakuli ma'sǝm!>>
1SA 5:8 Nda à túrban sǝ à ramba amǝ'yálmurû kat mala amǝ'Filisti abanɓwáná, sǝ à ɗia ama, <<Mana sǝm nǝ̀ pang nǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli mala amǝ'Isǝrayila?>> À ear ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm yinǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli mala amǝ'Isǝrayila a Gat.>> Nda à yinǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli mala amǝ'Isǝrayila abanì ka.
1SA 5:9 Sǝama lang à warina nǝi kano ka, bù Yahweh sulǝ amúr nggea-là mǝno gbal, mǝnana turia aɓa nggea kàrmúrû ka. Rǝu-mwarkya sakki arǝ aɓwana mala nggea-lê, amuna andǝ aɓwamǝgule kat.
1SA 5:10 Pǝlǝa à tasǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli a Ekǝron. Sǝama lang Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli bwalǝna Ekǝron ngga, amǝ Ekǝron túr kunia a ɓua ama, <<À yinanǝ Akwati mala Ɓakuli mala amǝ'Isǝrayila aban sǝm ace wal-lú sǝm andǝ aɓwana ma'sǝm!>>
1SA 5:11 Nda à túrban sǝ à ramba amǝ'yálmurû mala amǝ'Filisti kat abanɓwáná sǝ à bang ama, <<Wu nyesǝ Akwati mala Ɓakuli mala amǝ'Isǝrayila ɓǝ̀ nyar a ban mǝnana pùr kam ngga, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ kǝa wal-lú sǝm andǝ aɓwana ma'sǝm ɗàng.>> Kàrmúrû mala lú yi sulǝ amur nggea-là mǝno puppup atàcau mala gir'murmwana mana yiu amúrià nǝ bù Ɓakuli ka.
1SA 5:12 Aɓwana mǝnana à wù raka, à bwal nǝ kwano rǝu-mwarkya, sǝ ɓua mala nggea-lê lo a kuli.
1SA 6:1 Lang Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh pàngŋǝ́nà azongŋo tongno-nong-ɓari a nzali mala amǝ'Filisti ka,
1SA 6:2 Amǝ'Filisti tunǝ apǝris andǝ amǝ'ɓángnǝ́-ɓángna sǝ à ɗia ama, <<Mana sǝm nǝ̀ pang nǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh? Wu bangga sǝm lang sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ nyesǝ man yì Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh a ban mǝnana pùr kam ngga?>>
1SA 6:3 À ear ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ wun nǝ̀ nyesǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila ka, wu kǝa nyesǝi nǝ ɓālǝi atarǝì ɗàng; koɓǝ̀ lang le ka wu nyesǝi nǝ pàgir mala mbwegìr ace kumcau. Anggo ka, sǝ wun nǝ̀ kum twalbanì, sǝ wun nǝ̀ bwalta gìr mana tsǝa sǝ buì loapi múr wun raka.>>
1SA 6:4 Pǝlǝa à ɗìban ama, <<Ya ulang pàgir mala mbwegìr ace kumcau na sǝm nǝ̀ tasǝî wi?>> Apǝris andǝ amǝ'ɓángnǝ́-ɓángna nyesǝia wia ama, <<Lakkì mala amǝ'yálmurû mala amǝ'Filisti ka, à nda tongno. Acemani ka, wu tasǝ aɓǝ̀nzál mala rǝu-mwarkya mala bolo-njengǝlan tongno andǝ aɓǝ̀nzál mala ankwam mala bolo-njengǝlan tongno, acemǝnana mǝno ka, nda mwashat andǝ gir'murmwana mana kum wun andǝ amǝ'yálmurû ma'wun ngga.
1SA 6:5 Acemani ka, dumǝna púp wun nǝ̀ pak aɓǝ̀nzál mala rǝu-mwarkya andǝ aɓǝ̀nzál mala ankwam mǝnana à kiɗiki nzali ka. Dumǝna púp wun nǝ̀ pè Ɓakuli mala amǝ'Isǝrayila gulo. Yakǝla buì nǝ̀ pàk halku amúr wun, sǝ amúr aɓakuli ma'wun, andǝ nzali ma'wun.
1SA 6:6 Palang sǝ wun nǝ̀ tǝr ɓabum wun kǝla mǝnana amǝ'Masar andǝ Firona tǝr ɓabumia ka? Anzǝm mana pàngŋǝ́nia wia gìr'kwanban arǝia ka, à nying amǝ'Isǝrayila ace mǝnana ɓǝà u ka re?
1SA 6:7 Ado ka, wu kyane, wu pàk bǝsa keke-ndá. Wu alta andá ɓari amǝ-pakiura, mǝnana à malaká tsǝkia wia nggun-rya a myalia raka. Wu kùrî andá mǝnia ka keke-ndá arǝ nggun-rya a myalia, sǝ wu pǝr amunia ɓǝà nyare a domwan malea.
1SA 6:8 Sǝ wu twal Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh, wu tsǝi amúr keke-ndá, sǝ aɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-njengǝlan mǝnana wun nǝ̀ tasǝia kǝla pàgir mala mbwegìr ace kumcau ka, wu tsǝia aɓa ɓè akwati a nkanggari Akwati Kùrcau. Sǝ wu tasǝta keke-ndá ɓǝ̀ ukia o male.
1SA 6:9 Sǝama wu tsǝkmǝsǝ wun. Ɓǝ̀ umnǝ njar Bet-Shemesh aɓa nzali male ka, lǝmdǝ ama Ɓakuli mala amǝ Isǝrayila nda mǝnana pàkka sǝm mǝnia yi nggea gìr mǝɓike ka. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ pàk anggo raka, sǝm nǝ̀ sǝlǝa ama buì nda mǝnana kok sǝm ngga ɗàng; múrɓikea na mǝnana kum sǝm ngga.>>
1SA 6:10 Nda aburane pàk kǝla mana à banggia wia ka. À twal andá ɓari amǝ-pakiura, à tsǝkia wia nggun-rya a myalia sǝ à kùrrì arǝ keke-ndá; osso à kasǝkun amunia a là.
1SA 6:11 À tsǝk Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh amúr keke-ndê, sǝ akwati mǝnana nǝ aɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-njengǝlan mala ankwam andǝ rǝu-mwarkya malea ka, à tsǝì a nkanggari.
1SA 6:12 Pǝlǝa andê lo ò amur njargula ká Bet-Shemesh; à dǝshi kporong aban ká nǝ ɓua, sǝ ko à kyang a bu-mǝli ko bu-mǝnggare ɗàng. Amǝ'yálmurû mala amǝ'Filisti gya anzǝmia aban ká ɗār a nzong-nzali mala Bet-Shemesh.
1SA 6:13 A bàkú mǝno ka aɓwana mala Bet-Shemesh na aban um mǝssa-alkama malea a ɓangŋaban ace pwan-gìrɓaban. Lang à loasǝ mǝsǝia sǝ à sǝn Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh ka, à pàk-banɓoarnado nǝ sǝne.
1SA 6:14 Keke-ndê yiu a ɓaban mala Jesǝwa ɓwa Bet-Shemesh, sǝ cam abanì a nkanggari ɓè tali mǝgule. Pǝlǝa aɓwana mana abanì ka, à arki akpamgbang mala keke-ndê sǝ à pàgir mala pisǝe kǝring nǝ andê aban Yahweh.
1SA 6:15 Pǝlǝa amǝ'Lawi twal Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh andǝ akwati mana a nkanggari, mǝnana ndanǝ aɓǝ̀nzál mala bolo-njengǝlan aɓalǝi ka, sǝ à tsǝia amúr nggea tali mǝno. Sǝ amǝ Bet-Shemesh pàgir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ apagir mala gir'nkila aban Yahweh a pwari mǝno.
1SA 6:16 Amǝ'yálmurû tongno mala amǝ'Filisti came sǝ à sǝn gìr mǝno kat, pǝlǝa à nyar a Ekǝron akǝ pwari mǝno.
1SA 6:17 Amǝnia ka, à nda ka aɓǝ̀nzál mala rǝu-mwarkya mala bolo-njengǝlan, mǝnana amǝ'Filisti yinǝi kǝla pàgir mala mbwegìr ace kumcau aban Yahweh ka: mwashat ace cauɓikea mala Ashdot, mwashat ace cauɓikea mala Gaza, mwashat ace cauɓikea mala Ashkelon, mwashat ace cauɓikea mala Gat, mwashat ace cauɓikea mala Ekǝron;
1SA 6:18 sǝ aɓǝ̀nzál nkwam mala bolo-njengǝlan ngga, à nda akúnì nggea-là mala amúrû tongno mala amǝ'Filisti, tite arǝ anggea-là mǝnana à kària nǝ akanggǝrang sheran aban ká arǝ amuna-là malea mana a patal ka. Nggea tali mǝnana à tsǝk Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh amurí ka, ndakam bà yalung a ɓaban mala Jesǝwa ɓwa Bet-Shemesh, ace kasǝɓalǝu arǝ gìr mǝnana kumban ngga.
1SA 6:19 Sǝama Yahweh wal-lú aɓea aburana mala Bet-Shemesh, acemǝnana à sǝn ɓá Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh ka. Yahweh wal-lú aburana malea lumi-tongno-nong-ɓari. Amǝ Bet-Shemesh pak-bumkiɗikea acemǝnana Yahweh wal-lú aɓwana malea nǝ nggea walban ngga.
1SA 6:20 Pǝlǝa amǝ Bet-Shemesh bang ama, <<Yana nǝ̀ gandǝnǝ came aɓadǝm Yahweh, yì Ɓakuli mǝfele? Sǝ aban ayan sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ tasǝì ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ upi ban sǝm ngga?>>
1SA 6:21 Nda à tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân a Kiriat-Jarim, nǝ cau ama, <<Amǝ'Filisti nyesǝna Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh. Wu yiu wu twali, wu umnǝi a ban wun.>>
1SA 7:1 Pǝlǝa aburana mala Kiriat-Jarim yiu à yi twal Akwati kùrcau mala Yahweh; à wari nǝi a ɓala mala Aminadap mǝnana nda amúr mgbang-ban ngga. À twal muna-ɓwabura male Eleaza ɓǝ̀ do ndà mǝ'yál Akwati kùrcau mala Yahweh, ɓǝ̀ kǝ ɗenyinǝi.
