1SA 7:2 Twal a pwari mǝno ka Akwati kùrcau mala Yahweh ue kano a Kiriat-Jarim banì sau kǝ̀rkǝ́r, pǝlǝa lumi-ɓari. Arǝ apǝlǝkia mǝno ka, amǝ Isǝrayila ɓua, ɓua keban mala alta Yahweh.
1SA 7:3 Sǝ Samuyila banggi ɓala mala Isǝrayila kat ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ wun nǝ̀ nyar aban Yahweh nǝ ɓabum wun kat ka, dumǝna púp wun nǝ̀ vwakibu wun arǝ abǝri ɓakuli andǝ aɓǝ̀nzál Ashtarot, ɓǝà pùrî ɓalǝ wun. Wu pà ɓamur rǝ wun kat-kat aban Yahweh, sǝ wu peri abani nǝmurǝì, sǝ yì ka nǝ̀ amsǝ wun a ɓabu amǝ'Filisti.>>
1SA 7:4 Nda amǝ Isǝrayila yi pusǝki ankúl mala Ba'al andǝ Ashtarot à sukkia, sǝ à peri aban Yahweh nǝmurǝì ka.
1SA 7:5 Pǝlǝa Samuyila bang ama, <<Wu ram Isǝrayila kat a Mizǝpa sǝ mǝ nǝ pakhiwi aban Yahweh ace wun.>>
1SA 7:6 Lang à yi ramna a Mizǝpa ka, à tò mùr sǝ à solǝi a nzali a ɓadǝm Yahweh. A pwari mǝno kat ka, à gilmùr sǝ à bang nǝ kunia ama <<Sǝm pàngŋǝ́nì Yahweh cauɓikea.>> Samuyila yi do nda mǝɓashi amúr Isǝrayila a Mizǝpa.
1SA 7:7 Lang amǝ'Filisti ok ama amǝ Isǝrayila ramna a Mizǝpa ka, amurǝma mala amǝ'Filisti lo à yiu ace kánǝ munǝo arǝia. Sǝ lang amǝ Isǝrayila okce ka, ɓangciu pakkia wia arǝ amǝ'Filisti.
1SA 7:8 Sǝ amǝ Isǝrayila zǝmbi Samuyila ama, <<Lidǝmba nǝ ɓua ace sǝm aban Yahweh Ɓakuli ma'sǝm, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ amsǝ sǝm a bu amǝ'Filisti.>>
1SA 7:9 Pǝlǝa Samuyila twal muna-nzur mana nda a kúnkiura ka, pànà gir'nkila mala pisǝì kǝring nǝi a bǝsa aban Yahweh. Sǝ Samuyila ɓua aban Yahweh ɓǝ̀ bwalì amǝ Isǝrayila kàm, sǝ Yahweh ok ɓua male.
1SA 7:10 Lang Samuyila na aban pa gir'nkila mala pisǝe a bǝsa ka, amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti soa aban yiu nǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ Isǝrayila. Sǝama a pwari mǝno ka, Yahweh ìm arǝ amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti a kùli nǝ giu mǝcandǝe kǝla sa mala mgbarangce. Yahweh túriá aɓa múrzurǝkya, nda à ɓangŋa a ɓadǝmba amǝ'lwa mala amǝ Isǝrayila ka.
1SA 7:11 Sǝ aburana mala amǝ Isǝrayila purî ɓá Mizǝpa nǝ mire, à pǝrta amǝ'Filisti sǝ à kǝ wal-luia amur njar aban ká ɗār a ɓangŋaban mala Bet-kar.
1SA 7:12 Anzǝm mǝno ka, Samuyila twal nggea-tali sǝ yi kwaki anre Mizǝpa andǝ Shen, sǝ tunǝ lullǝ banì ama Ebeneza, acemǝnana bang ama, <<Ba ado ka, Yahweh na pakka sǝm gbasha ka!>>
1SA 7:13 Anggo sǝ amǝ'Filisti ka à paria, sǝ à nyare à kútí ɗǝm a nzong-nzali mala amǝ Isǝrayila ama à nǝ̀ yiu nǝ lwa ɗang. Aɓa do-yilǝmu kat mala Samuyila ka, bù Yahweh ɓìkî amǝ'Filisti.
1SA 7:14 Amǝ'lwa mala amǝ Isǝrayila ak anggea-là mǝnana amǝ'Filisti ea arǝ amǝ Isǝrayila ka, à nyesǝia a bu amǝ Isǝrayila, twal a Ekǝron aban ká Gat. Acili abân mana tù nǝ anggea-là mǝnana amǝ'Filisti ea ɗiɗyal ka, amǝ'lwa mala amǝ Isǝrayila nyesǝia a bu amǝ Isǝrayila. Ɗǝm ngga do-rǝpwala yi pa a nreka amǝ Isǝrayila andǝ amǝ'Amor.
1SA 7:15 Samuyila lidǝmba nǝ do mǝɓashi amur amǝ Isǝrayila bà lú male.
1SA 7:16 Koya pǝlǝa ka kǝ twal gya aban ká andǝ nyare arǝ anggea-là Betel, andǝ Gilgal sǝ Mizǝpa. Pàkkî Isǝrayila ɓashi arǝ abân mǝnia ka kat.
1SA 7:17 Anzǝm mana malna ka, nǝ̀ nyar a Rama, ban mǝnana ɓala male pàk kàm ngga. A Rama gbal ka nda mǝɓashi, sǝ ɓakkî Yahweh gyangŋan kàm.
1SA 8:1 Lang yi bwalna arǝ apǝlǝkia mala e mala Samuyila ka, tsǝk amuni ɓǝà duk amǝ'ɓashi amur amǝ Isǝrayila.
1SA 8:2 Lullǝ muna-dǝmba male nda Joyel, sǝ ɓaria muni ka, lullǝi nda Abija. À duk amǝ'ɓashi a Biyasheba.
1SA 8:3 Amuni ka, à twal kusǝi ɗàng, à kyanggî njar ace alta kume, à ak pàbunǝnzali sǝ à pūrǝ ɓashi.
1SA 8:4 Pǝlǝa aɓwana-mǝgule mala Isǝrayila kat, ram rǝia abanɓwáná sǝ à yiu aban Samuyila a Rama;
1SA 8:5 à yi ne wi ama, <<Sǝni, a ena, sǝ amunio twalkusǝo ɗàng. Ado ka, tsǝka sǝm murǝm mǝnana nǝ̀ yálmúr sǝm kǝla mala acili anzali kat ka.>>
1SA 8:6 Sǝama cau mǝnia à ne ama, <<Pà sǝm murǝm mǝnana nǝ̀ yálmúr sǝm>> ngga, pwasǝbum Samuyila ɗàng. Nda Samuyila pakhiwi aban Yahweh ka.
1SA 8:7 Osso Yahweh banggi Samuyila ama, <<Kpata gì aɓwana man, pàk gìr mǝnana kat à banggo ka, acemǝnana a nda mǝnana à ginǝo ka ɗàng, mǝ nda mǝnana à ginǝam ɓǝn nggá duk murǝm amúrià raka.
1SA 8:8 Kǝla mǝnana à pa, twal a pwari mǝnana ǝn pusǝia à purî ɓá Masar ba yalung ngga, à ginǝkiam, sǝ à peri aban aɓea aɓakuli ka, nda kǝgìr mǝnana à kǝ pakko gbal ka.
1SA 8:9 Acemani ka, kpata gia; sǝama awu nǝ nunkiria pepè, sǝ awu nǝ bǝlia wia lang sǝ murǝm mǝnana nǝ̀ yálmuria ka nǝ̀ pàngŋǝ́nǝia.>>
1SA 8:10 Anggo sǝ Samuyila bang acau mala Yahweh kat aban aɓwana mǝnana à alkiyita murǝm a baní ka.
1SA 8:11 Bang ama, <<Ani sǝ murǝm mǝnana nǝ̀ yálmúr wun ngga, nǝ̀ pangnǝ wun: nǝ̀ twal amuna ma'wun nǝ̀ tsǝia à nǝ̀ duk amǝkok awaru-pǝr andǝ apǝr male mǝnana à nǝ̀ nggǝ ɓang aɓadǝm awaru-pǝr male ka.
1SA 8:12 Sǝ nǝ̀ tsǝkî ɓamurì amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur aɓwana á-á, andǝ amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur aɓwana á-lumi-tongno, sǝ aɓea ka à nǝ̀ duk amǝ'rya andǝ amǝ'pwan-gìrɓaban male, andǝ amǝ'tulki agirbura mala lwa andǝ agirtúró mala awaru-pǝr male.
1SA 8:13 Nǝ̀ twal amuna-mamǝna ma'wun ɓǝà pǝlǝ amǝ'pakki agir pà'rǝmban-mǝɓoarne, andǝ amǝ'lamggi agirlina, andǝ amǝ'lúrǝ́gir.
1SA 8:14 Nǝ̀ ak aɓaban mǝɓoarne ma'wun andǝ aɓaban-anap, andǝ aɓaban mala anggun-olif ma'wun sǝ nǝ̀ pè amǝ'túró male.
1SA 8:15 Nǝ ak kāmbe mwashat aɓa lum mala mǝsǝsa andǝ aɓǝla-anap ma'wun, sǝ nǝ̀ pè amǝgulo andǝ amǝ'túró male.
1SA 8:16 Nǝ̀ twal aguro ma'wun aburana andǝ amamǝna, andǝ alaggana mǝnana à nda dwat ka, andǝ amǝdambǝriso ma'wun, sǝ nǝ̀ tsǝia aɓa túró male.
1SA 8:17 Nǝ̀ ak kāmbe mwashat aɓa lum mala agirkusǝu ma'wun, sǝ wun nǝ̀ duk aguro male.
1SA 8:18 A pwarì mǝno ka, wun nǝ̀ ɓua ace kum usǝlǝo a bù murǝm mǝnana wu tàrrî ɓamurǝ wun ngga, sǝ Yahweh pà nǝ̀ oka wun amǝno yì pwari ka ɗàng.>>
1SA 8:19 Kat andǝ manì ka, aɓwe ginǝ okî Samuyila. À bang ama, <<Awo, ma'sǝm ngga sǝm nggǝ earce murǝm amur sǝm,
1SA 8:20 ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm pa kǝla acili anzali kat, sǝ ɗǝm ngga ɓǝ̀ murǝm ma'sǝm ɓǝ̀ kǝ pakka sǝm ɓashi sǝ ɓǝ̀ dupa sǝm a dǝmba, sǝ nǝ̀ lwa-lwa ma'sǝm.>>
1SA 8:21 Lang Samuyila ongŋǝna acau mala aɓwe ka, ɓǝsǝlǝia ɓǝ̀ Yahweh oea.
1SA 8:22 Sǝ Yahweh banggi Samuyila ama, <<Kpata gia sǝ wu pea wia murǝm.>> Samuyila pǝlǝa ne aburana mala Isǝrayila ama, <<Koyan ngga ɓǝ̀ nyare a nggea-là male.>>
1SA 9:1 Ɓè ɓwa'Benjami nakam mǝnana à tunǝki ama Kish ka, muna-ɓwabura mala Abiyel, muna-ɓwabura mala Zero, muna-ɓwabura mala Bekorat, muna-ɓwabura mala Afiya, ɓwa'Benjami, mǝgǝna na.
1SA 9:2 Ndanǝ muna-ɓwabura mǝnana à tunǝki ama Sawul ka, lagga mǝɓoarjami. Kǝ ɓwa pà kàm aɓa Isǝrayila mǝnana ɓoarjam kútì ka ɗàng. Twal a nkpamtari aban umnǝ kuli ka, dāh'rya kútì koyan atà aɓwe.
1SA 9:3 A bàkú mǝno ka, aɓea mǝdambǝriso mala Kish, tár Sawul ɓwaro. Nda Kish banggi muni Sawul ama, <<Twal mwashat atà alaggana atò, sǝ wu lo, wu kya alta amǝdambǝriso.>>
1SA 9:4 Sǝ Sawul kùtí nǝɓa nzali múr ankono mala Ifǝrem sǝ yi kútí nǝɓa nzali Shalisha, sǝama à kumia ɗàng. Sǝ à kùtí nǝɓa nzali Sha'alim, sǝ à kumia ɗàng. Pǝlǝa à yi kútí nǝɓa nzali Benjami, sǝ à kumia ɗàng.
1SA 9:5 Lang à yina a nzali Zuf ka, Sawul banggi lagga male mǝnana nda atè ka ama, <<Yiu sǝm nǝ̀ nyare, ɓǝ̀ ana raka, tárrám nǝ̀ nying pàk ɗenyicau amur amǝdambǝriso, nǝ̀ kùtí a bumpina ace sǝm.>>
1SA 9:6 Sǝ lagga male ka banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni, ɓwa mala Ɓakuli na a nggea-là man, ɓwa na à kǝ gusǝlǝce kǝ̀rkǝ́r; gir mǝnana kat ne ka kǝ lumsǝo. Ado ka, fa sǝm nǝ̀ ká abani, earka nǝ bangga sǝm njar mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ ká kàm ngga.>>
1SA 9:7 Pǝlǝa Sawul ne guro male ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm na ama sǝm nǝ̀ ká aban ɓwabure ka, mana sǝm nǝ̀ kánǝi wi? Bǝredi mǝnana aɓalǝ abuku ma'sǝm ngga malǝna. Sǝm pànǝ kǝ ɓoro mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ kánǝi ɓwa mala Ɓakuli ka ɗàng. Mana sǝm ndani?>>
1SA 9:8 Laggè earî Sawul ɗǝm ama, <<Sǝni, akani ka, mǝ ndanǝ gauwe-ine mala shekel mala bolo-azǝrfa a buam, mǝ nǝ nggá pè ɓwa mala Ɓakuli ɓǝ̀ na sǝm njar mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ ká kam ngga.>>
1SA 9:9 (Ɗiɗyal a Isǝrayila ka, lang ɓwa earce ɗìbancau aban Ɓakuli ka, nǝ̀ bang ama, <<Yiu, ɓǝ̀ sǝm kya aban mǝ'sǝna,>> acemǝnana <<mǝɓangnǝa>> yalung ngga à tunǝi ɗiɗyal ama mǝ'sǝna.)
1SA 9:10 Sǝ Sawul banggi lagga male ama, <<Cau mò na jik, fa sǝm nǝ̀ ká.>> Nda à wari a nggea-là mǝnana ɓwa mala Ɓakuli na kam ngga.
1SA 9:11 Lang à ndaban eau a mgbangban aban ká a nggea-lê ka, à je andǝ aɓea ansarina aban yiu ace ká to mùr, sǝ à ɗia ama, <<Mǝ'sǝna na kani le?>>
1SA 9:12 À earia wia ama, <<Nda kani; wu sǝni, nda kǝ ká a dǝm wun ngga. Wu fà rǝ wun. Ndo kǝ kùtí nǝ kutio a nggea-là ka, acemǝnana aɓwe nanǝ pa gìr'nkila yalung a ban-mǝdāhre.
1SA 9:13 Lang wu kutina ka, wun nǝ̀ kumi a kún nggea-là; kǝ umnǝ o a ban-mǝdāhre ace li girlina. Aɓwe pà nǝ̀ lìli ɗang sheɓǝ̀ yina ka, acemǝnana dumǝna púp nǝ̀ tsǝkî gìr'nkila bu; sǝ anzǝm mǝno ka, abǝri mǝnana à tunǝia ka, à nǝ̀ lìli. Ado ka, wu eau tu, wun nǝ̀ nggá kumi.>>
1SA 9:14 Nda à eau aban ká nggea-lê ka. Lang à nǝ̀ nggǝ kùtí aɓa nggea-là ka, à sǝn Samuyila dǝshinia, nǝ̀ eau aban ká ban-mǝdāhre.
1SA 9:15 Nongŋo mwashat a dǝm yiu mala Sawul ka, Yahweh angŋa-dǝmba lǝmdǝni Samuyila ama:
1SA 9:16 <<Li ani ka, mǝ nǝ tasǝ ɓeɓwa mala nzali Benjami a bano, awu nǝ ɗārǝi ɓǝ̀ duk múrû mala aɓwana mem amǝ Isǝrayila. Nǝ̀ amsǝ aɓwana mem a bù amǝ'Filisti. Acemǝnana ǝn sǝnǝna tanni mala aɓwana mem, sǝ ɓua malea bwalǝna banam.>>
1SA 9:17 Lang Samuyila sǝn Sawul ka, Yahweh banggi wi ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana ǝn nô ce ka ndya ka! Yi nda ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ yálmúr aɓwana mem ngga.>>
1SA 9:18 Pǝlǝa Sawul gbàshìban Samuyila a tsùrú mala bankutio a nggea-là sǝ na ama, <<Ida banggam, ake sǝ ɓala mala mǝ'sǝna pa?>>
1SA 9:19 Samuyila earî wi ama, <<Mǝ nda mǝ'sǝnê. Fa aɓadǝmbam a ban-mǝdāhre. Wun kǝm ngga, wun nǝ̀ lìli atàm yalung, sǝ lí nǝ dǝmbari ka, mǝ nǝ nying wun, wun nǝ̀ o, sǝ gìr mǝnana kat a ɓabumo ka, mǝ nǝ nô.
1SA 9:20 Sǝ amur cau mala amǝdambǝriso mò mǝnana à ɓwaro nongŋo tàrú mǝnana à kùtí ka, kǝa tsǝk ɓalǝo arǝia ɗàng, acemǝnana à kumǝnia. Sǝ yana nda ɓwe mǝnana Isǝrayila kat earkiyice kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka? A nda andǝ ɓala mala tárró kat re?>>
1SA 9:21 Sawul pa eare ama, <<Mǝ nda ɓwa'Benjami, aɓa rítǎu mala atau mala Isǝrayila re? Sǝ nggurkwar mem ngga nda mǝkyauwe aɓalǝ anggurkwar mala tàu mala Benjami re? Sǝ palang sǝ a nam cau ani?>>
1SA 9:22 Pǝlǝa Samuyila warinǝ Sawul andǝ lagga male a ndà-ramba sǝ kya tsǝia à do a ban mǝɓoarne aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnana à tunǝia, mǝnana làkkì malea na kǝla lumi-tàrú ka.
1SA 9:23 Sǝ Samuyila banggi mǝlamli ama, <<Yinǝàm nǝ kāmbe nyama mǝnana ǝn pô, mǝnana ǝn banggo nǝma wu tsǝi ɗàng ngga.>>
1SA 9:24 Nda mǝlamli twal byal nyama andǝ gir mǝnana amurí ka, sǝ tamsǝi a ɓadǝm Sawul. Sǝ Samuyila bang ama, <<Sǝnì, gìr mǝnana à tsǝì ka, nda à tamsǝo wi a ɓadǝmbo ka. Lì, acemǝnana à tsǝì aceo ace pwari mǝnia ka, twal a pwari mǝnana ǝn bang nǝma, <Mǝ ndanǝ abǝri mǝnana ǝn tunǝia ka.> >> Nda Sawul lìli atà Samuyila a pwari mǝno ka.
1SA 9:25 Sǝ lang à sùlǝ́nì ban-mǝdāhre sǝ à yina a nggea-là ka, à sárǝì Sawul kal-nongŋo a múr-kurǝm, sǝ sarǝa nǝ̀ nong'ntullo.
1SA 9:26 Sǝ à lo ɗiɗyal, sǝ lang ban fana ka, Samuyila tunǝ Sawul a múr-kurǝm ama, <<Lo, ɓǝn pusǝbǝrio.>> Nda Sawul lo, sǝ yia kǝm, yì andǝ Samuyila ka, à pur amur njarɓala.
1SA 9:27 Lang à nda aban sulǝo à nǝ̀ ká a nzǝm-la ka, Samuyila banggi Sawul ama ɓǝ̀ banggi lagga male ɓǝ̀ kutio ɓǝ̀ fa a dǝmba. Sǝ lang kutina ka, Samuyila bang ama, <<Cam kani bǝti, ace mǝnana ɓǝn banggo cau mǝnana Ɓakuli bang ngga.>>
1SA 10:1 Pǝlǝa Samuyila twal du mùrú sǝ solǝi a ɓamur Sawul, kùrrì zǝp sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Yahweh ɗārǝo wu duk yalu amur aɓwana male Isǝrayila re?
1SA 10:2 Lang a nying banam yalung ngga, awu nǝ nggá je wunǝ aburana ɓari a ban ɓembe mala Rahila aɓa bù-nzali Benjami a Zelza; sǝ à nǝ̀ nô ama, <Amǝdambǝriso mǝnana a wari altea ka, à kumǝnia, sǝ ado ka, cau mala amǝdambǝriso na tárró nakiyice ɗǝm ngga ɗàng, a nda mǝnana bumi kǝ pi aceo, kǝ na ama, <<Mana mǝ nǝ pa ace munem le ka?>> >
1SA 10:3 Pǝlǝa awu nǝ lo a ban mǝno ka, awu nǝ lidǝmba aban ká sheɓǝ̀ a yina aban nggun mǝgule mala Tabo ka. Aɓwana tàrú mǝnana à nda njar aban ká [pà gir'nkila] aban Ɓakuli a Betel ka, à nǝ̀ kumǒ abanì, mwashat ka ndanǝ amuna-mbùl tàrú a buì, ɓè ka, ndanǝ agbatali bǝredi tàrú a buì, sǝ ɓè ka, ndanǝ bàng mùr-anap a buì.
1SA 10:4 À nǝ makkòkun sǝ à nǝ po gbatali bǝredi ɓari, mǝnana awu nǝ e a buia ka.
1SA 10:5 Anzǝm mǝno ka, awu nǝ ká a mǝ'nkono mala Ɓakuli a Gibiya, ban mǝnana ɓè kàttì mala amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti nakam ngga. Kutio mô aɓa nggea-là ka, awu nǝ je wunǝ nggǝsan mala amǝɓangnǝa aban súlǝì ban-mǝdāhre, nǝ amǝ'walki azangŋan, andǝ akarata-bu, andǝ adànà, andǝ amǝ'twanggi ankori aɓadǝmbia; sǝ à nǝ̀ nggǝ naki acau ɓangnǝa.
1SA 10:6 Pǝlǝa Bangŋo mala Yahweh nǝ̀ sulǝ amuro nǝ rǝcandǝa, sǝ awu nǝ nacau ɓangnǝa ateà, sǝ awu nǝ pǝlǝ ɓè ɓwa ɗàng.
1SA 10:7 Lang amǝnia yì agir-lǝmdǝa yi kumǒ ka, pàk gìr mǝnana buo kumo nǝ̀ pàk ka, acemǝnana Ɓakuli na atò.
1SA 10:8 Pǝlǝa awu nǝ akàmdǝmba ká a Gilgal. Sǝ sǝni, mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ sulǝ aban ká a bano ace pa agir'nkila mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ apagir mala dotarǝu ka. Awu nǝ twal anongŋo tongno-nong-ɓari aban kúndǝô, she ɓǝn yina a bano sǝ ǝn nano gìr mǝnana awu nǝ pàk ka.>>
1SA 10:9 Lang Sawul pǝlǝna nzǝmi nǝ̀ nying Samuyila ka, Ɓakuli pe wi, yì Sawul ɓè ɓabum. Sǝ amǝnia yì agir-lǝmdǝa ka, à yi lumsǝ kat a pwari mǝno.
1SA 10:10 Lang Sawul andǝ guro male yi bwalǝna Gibiya ka, kara nggǝsan mala amǝɓangnǝa yi kumi, sǝ Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli sulǝ amurí nǝ rǝcandǝa, sǝ nacau ɓangnǝ aɓalǝia.
1SA 10:11 Sǝ lang aɓwana mǝnana à súrǝì ɗiɗyal, sǝni aban nacau ɓangnǝa aɓalǝ amǝɓangnǝa ka, à ɗiki rǝia ama, <<Mana pur arǝ muna-ɓwabura mala Kish? Sawul gbal ka nda aɓalǝ amǝɓangnǝa le?>>
1SA 10:12 Sǝ ɓè ɓwabura mǝnana ndanǝdo abanì ka bang ama, <<Sǝ yana nda tárrià?>> Nda pǝlǝ caubangŋa ama, <<Sawul ka nda aɓalǝ amǝɓangnǝa gbal le?>>
1SA 10:13 Lang malǝna nacau ɓangnǝa ka, sǝ wari a ban-mǝdāhre.
1SA 10:14 Kina Sawul ɗì andǝ lagga male ama, <<A ke sǝ wu wario?>> Sǝ bang ama, <<A ban alta amǝdambǝriso. Sǝ lang sǝm kumia raka, sǝm wari aban Samuyila.>>
1SA 10:15 Pǝlǝa kina Sawul banggia wia ama, <<Ida, wu banggam cau mǝnana Samuyila bangga wun ngga.>>
1SA 10:16 Sǝ Sawul banggi kine ama, <<Bangga sǝm bwāng ama amǝdambǝriso ka, à kumǝnia.>> Sǝama amur cau mala domurǝm mǝnana Samuyila bang cè ka, banggi wi kǝ cau ɗàng.
1SA 10:17 A bàkú mǝno ka, Samuyila tunǝ aɓwe abanɓwáná aban Yahweh a Mizǝpa.
1SA 10:18 Sǝ banggia amǝ Isǝrayila ama, <<Yahweh, Ɓakuli mala amǝ Isǝrayila bang ama, <Ən pusǝ wun Isǝrayila wu purî ɓá Masar, sǝ ǝn amsǝ wun a ɓabu amǝ'Masar sǝ a bu adomurǝm mǝnana kat à kǝ par wun aɓatea ka.>
1SA 10:19 Sǝama yalung ngga wu ginǝkina Ɓakuli ma'wun, mǝnana amsǝyi wun aɓalǝ agir'mur'mwana ma'wun andǝ agir'zunggǝliban ma'wun, sǝ wu bangŋǝ́nì wi ama, <Tsǝka sǝm murǝm amúr sǝm.> Acemani ado ka, wu lǝmdǝ rǝwun aɓadǝm Yahweh arǝ atau ma'wun, sǝ arǝ anggurkwar ma'wun.>>
1SA 10:20 Pǝlǝa Samuyila yinǝ atau mala Isǝrayila tù, sǝ à twal tau mala Benjami nǝ bwal-shishar.
1SA 10:21 Sǝ yinǝ tau mala Benjami tù arǝ anggurkwar male, sǝ à twal nggurkwar mala Matǝri nǝ bwal-shishar, sǝ à twal Sawul, muna-ɓwabura mala Kish nǝ bwal-shishar. Sǝ lang à sǝnbani ka, à kumi ɗàng.
1SA 10:22 Sǝ à ɗì Yahweh ɗǝm ama, <<Kǝɓwa na kam piu nǝ̀ yiu le?>> Sǝ Yahweh bang ama, <<Wu sǝni, nda sǝmbǝrǝ ɓamurì aɓalǝ atwalo ka.>>
1SA 10:23 Pǝlǝa à ɓangŋa à twali a banì. Sǝ lang cam aɓalǝ aɓwe ka, dāh'rya-kuti koyan kat aɓalǝ aɓwe, twal a nkpamtari aban o a kuli.
1SA 10:24 Sǝ Samuyila banggi aɓwe kat ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh twalo ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm amur wun ngga ndya ka. Aɓalǝ aɓwe kat ka, kǝ ɓwa pà kǝla yì ɗàng.>> Sǝ aɓwe kat loasǝ gia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ yilǝmi murǝm sauwa!>>
1SA 10:25 Pǝlǝa Samuyila bǝli aɓwe agir mǝnana gulo-murǝm nǝ̀ tsǝia púp ɓǝà pè, andǝ amǝnana twàló na amúr murǝm nǝ̀ pè ka. Gilǝia aɓa nggú-gilǝgir sǝ nongsǝi aɓadǝm Yahweh. Pǝlǝa Samuyila mesǝ aɓwe ɓǝà o arǝ aɓala malea.
1SA 10:26 Sawul gbal ka, o a là male a Gibiya, sǝ akanggǝrang aburana mǝnana Ɓakuli je ɓabumia ka, à o atè.
1SA 10:27 Sǝama aɓea aɓwana mǝɓane bang ama, <<Làng sǝ ɓwa man nǝ̀ gandǝ amsǝ sǝm?>> À nyesǝce-ɓà, sǝ à ginǝ yinǝì nǝ kǝ ɓoro. Sǝama yi ka, kùr yinggǝli.
1SA 11:1 Nahash, ɓwa'Amon eauwe sǝ kya gumbǝli Jabesh-Gilǝyat, sǝ aburana mala amǝ Jabesh kat ne wi ama, <<Kùrcau nǝ sǝm sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ do aɓato.>>
1SA 11:2 Pǝlǝa Nahash ɓwa'Amon ear ama, <<Mǝ nǝ kùrcau nǝ wun amur cau mwashat, ama mǝ nǝ pusǝki amǝsǝ wun mǝli kat, sǝ anggo ka, nǝ̀ yinǝ kirsakya amur Isǝrayila kat.>>
1SA 11:3 Aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Jabesh ne wi ama, <<Nyingga sǝm anongŋo tongno-nong-ɓari ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân arǝ alá mala amǝ Isǝrayila kat. Ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ amsǝ sǝm raka, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ pà ɓamur rǝ sǝm aɓato.>>
1SA 11:4 Lang amǝ'na-túrbân bwalna Gibiya là mala Sawul ka, à kya ne aɓwana cê à kiria, sǝ yia kat ka, à túr kunia a ɓua.
1SA 11:5 Kara à sǝn Sawul kǝ nyarî ɓaban aban gya atà andá-rya. Sǝ Sawul ɗiban ama, <<Mana kum aɓwe sǝ à kǝ ɓua?>> Pǝlǝa à ne wi cau mala aburana mala amǝ Jabesh.
1SA 11:6 Lang Sawul okcau malea ka, kara Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli sulǝ amurí nǝ rǝcandǝa, sǝ bumlulla male earki-bǝsa kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 11:7 Twal andá-rya ɓari, kasǝkia nyak-nyak sǝ turaban nǝia aɓa nzong-nzali Isǝrayila ɗǝɗak nǝ bù amǝ'na-túrbân ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana kat puro yiu atà Sawul andǝ Samuyila raka, anggo sǝ à nǝ̀ pàkkî andá-rya male.>> Pǝlǝa ɓangciu mala Yahweh bwal amǝ Isǝrayila, sǝ à puro kǝla ɓwa mwashat.
1SA 11:8 Lang Sawul rambia a Bezek ka, làkkì mala amǝ Isǝrayila na á-gbǝman-tàrú (300,000) sǝ amǝ Yahuda ka à nda á-lumi-tàrú (30,000.)
1SA 11:9 Sǝ à ne amǝ'na-túrbân mana à yiu ka ama, <<Ani sǝ wun nǝ̀ ne amǝ Jabesh-Gilǝyat: <Li ɓǝ̀ pwari zǝkina ka, wun nǝ̀ kum amsǝban ma'wun.> >> Lang amǝ'na-túrbân yiu sǝ à banggi aburana mala Jabesh ka, banɓoaria wia.
1SA 11:10 Acemani ka, aburana mala Jabesh banggi Nahash ama, <<Li ka, sǝm nǝ̀ pur aban wun, sǝ wun nǝ̀ gandǝ pakka sǝm gìr mǝnana kat wu sǝni nda ɓoara wun ngga.>>
1SA 11:11 Sǝ lang ban fana ka, Sawul gau aɓwe arǝ anggǝsan tàrú; sǝ à yi ar aɓa tsùrú mala kàttì mala amǝ'Amon nǝ ban mbul-mbul, sǝ à camarǝ wal amǝ'Amon ba zǝkya mala pwari. Aɓwana mǝnana à au ka à mesǝkì tàrǝia, yale à kum aɓwana ɓari atārǝia ɗàng.
1SA 11:12 Pǝlǝa aburana mala amǝ Isǝrayila ne Samuyila ama, <<Ya ɓwe na bang ama <Sawul nǝ̀ duk murǝm amur sǝm le ka?> Wu yinǝ aɓwe, ɓǝ̀ sǝm wal-luia.>>
1SA 11:13 Sǝama Sawul bang ama, <<À pà nǝ̀ wal-lú kǝɓwa a pwari mǝnia ka ɗàng, acemǝnana yalung ngga, Yahweh yina nǝ amsǝban a Isǝrayila.>>
1SA 11:14 Pǝlǝa Samuyila ne aɓwana ama, <<Wu yiu, sǝm nǝ̀ o a Gilgal, sǝm nǝ̀ nggá basǝ domurǝm kano.>>
1SA 11:15 Osso aɓwe kat wari a Gilgal, akano sǝ à dumsǝ Sawul à murǝm aɓadǝm Yahweh a Gilgal. Akano sǝ à pà gir'nkila mala dorǝpwala aɓadǝm Yahweh, sǝ akano sǝ Sawul andǝ aburana mala amǝ Isǝrayila kat pàk-banɓoarnado kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 12:1 Pǝlǝa Samuyila banggi Isǝrayila kat ama, <<Wu sǝni, ǝn kpanata gì wun aɓalǝ agir mǝnana kat wu nam ngga, sǝ ǝn tsǝ́ngŋǝ̀nà wun murǝm amur wun.
1SA 12:2 Sǝ adyan ngga, wu ndanǝ murǝm, mǝnana nda mǝdǝmba ma'wun ngga. Sǝ mim adyan ngga, ǝn ena, nǝ mbù amuram; sǝ amuna-burana mem ngga, á nda atà wun. Mim ngga, ǝn duk mǝdǝmba ma'wun, twal a lo-ɓwa mem, ba yalung.
1SA 12:3 <<Mǝ ndya ǝn cam ngga, wu nakun amuram aɓadǝm Yahweh sǝ ɓadǝm ɓwa male mana twali nda murǝm ngga. Jamnda mala yani ǝn twali? Ko mǝdambǝriso mala yani na, mana ǝn twali ka? Ko yana, mǝnana ǝn ɓǝmbǝri ka? Sǝ yana, mǝnana ǝn pari ka? Ko a bù yan sǝ ǝn ak pàbunǝnzali, mana gìrki amǝsǝam ngga? Ɓǝ̀ ndakam ama ǝn pak mwashat atà agir mǝnia ka, mǝ nǝ nyesǝa wuni.>>
1SA 12:4 Pǝlǝa aɓwe pa eare ama, <<Awo, a ɓǝmbǝri ma, ko a par ma sǝm, ko a ak ma kǝgir a bù kǝɓwa ɗàng.>>
1SA 12:5 Pǝlǝa Samuyila banggia wia ama, <<Yahweh ka, nda mǝ'nakún amur gir mǝnana wu pàk ka; anggo gbal, murǝm mǝnana Yahweh twal ka, dumǝna mǝ'nakún yalung, ama, wu kum ɓè kǝgir a buam ɗàng.>> Pǝlǝa à ear ama, <<Yahweh nda mǝ'nakún.>>
1SA 12:6 Pǝlǝa Samuyila banggi aɓwe ama, <<Yahweh nda mǝnana twal Musa andǝ Haruna, sǝ pusǝ aká wun à purî ɓá nzali Masar ka.
1SA 12:7 Acemani ka, wu cam piu, sǝ mǝ nǝ kútí a ɓashi sǝnǝa wun aɓadǝm Yahweh, amur ɓealɓoarna mala Yahweh mǝnana pàkka wunia, sǝ pàkkî aká wun ngga.
1SA 12:8 Lang Yakupu wari a Masar, sǝ aká wun wari nǝ ɓua malea aban Yahweh ka, Yahweh tasǝ Musa andǝ Haruna, mǝnana à pusǝ aká wun à purî ɓá Masar, sǝ tsǝia à yi do a mǝnia yì ban ngga.
1SA 12:9 <<Sǝama, à lorǝ Yahweh, Ɓakuli malea; nda sǝ Yahweh mea a ɓabu Sǝsera, yì mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur amǝ'lwa mala Hazo, sǝ a ɓabu amǝ'Filisti, sǝ a ɓabu murǝm mala Mowap. Sǝ à munǝ-munǝo arǝia.
1SA 12:10 Pǝlǝa à ɓua aban Yahweh, aban na ama, <Sǝm pàngŋǝ̀nà cauɓikea acemǝnana sǝm nying Yahweh, sǝm kpanata aBa'al andǝ Ashtarot ka. Sǝama adyan ngga, amsǝ sǝm a bù aɓisǝm amǝbura, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ kpato.>
1SA 12:11 Pǝlǝa Yahweh tasǝ Jerub-ba'al, andǝ Barak, andǝ Jefta andǝ Samuyila, sǝ amsǝ wun, ak wun a ɓabu aɓiwun amǝbura mana à do, à kàrì wun a ɓalǝu ka; nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ wu duk jam ngga.
1SA 12:12 <<Sǝ lang wu sǝn Nahash, murǝm mala amǝ'Amon, nǝ̀ nggǝ yiu nǝ munǝo arǝ wun ngga, nda wu banggam ama, <Awo, sǝm nggǝ earce murǝm ɓǝ̀ yálmúr sǝm,> kat andǝ amani ama, Yahweh Ɓakuli ma'wun, nda murǝm ma'wun ngga.
1SA 12:13 Sǝ adyan ngga, murǝm ma'wun mana wu twal ka, ndya ka, yì mana wu zǝmbace ka. Wu sǝni, Yahweh ka, tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà murǝm amur wun.
1SA 12:14 Ɓǝ̀ wun nǝ̀ ɓanggi Yahweh, sǝ wun nǝ̀ kpate, wun nǝ̀ oki wi, sǝ pà wu nǝ̀ mgbicau arǝ nzongcau mala Yahweh raka, ɓǝ̀ wun sǝ murǝm mana yálkiyi múr wun, wunia kat, wun nǝ̀ kpata Yahweh, Ɓakuli ma'wun ngga, gir mǝɓoarne na!
1SA 12:15 Sǝama, ɓǝ̀ pa wun nǝ̀ okî Yahweh ɗàng, gandǝa wun nǝ̀ mgbicau, pà wun nǝ̀ kpata anzongcau mala Yahweh raka, bù Yahweh nǝ̀ pǝlǝa arǝ wun, kǝla mana buì pǝlǝa arǝ aká wun ngga.
1SA 12:16 <<Ado ka, wu cam piu, wu sǝn mǝnia yì gìr mǝgule, mǝnana Yahweh nǝ̀ pè a ɓamǝsǝ wun ngga!
1SA 12:17 Kún pwan mǝssa-alkama na ado re? Mǝ nǝ nacau nǝ Yahweh, ɓǝ̀ tasǝ sàkkya mala mgbarangce andǝ mbulo. Sǝ wun nǝ̀ sǝlǝa, wun nǝ̀ sǝni ama ɓealɓikea ma'wun mǝnana wu pè a mǝsǝ Yahweh, nǝ zǝmba ama ɓǝ̀ pa wun murǝm ngga, mǝgule na.>>
1SA 12:18 Pǝlǝa Samuyila zǝmbi Yahweh, sǝ a kǝ pwari mǝno ka, Yahweh tasǝ sàkkya mala mgbarangce andǝ mbulo. Nda aɓwana kat ɓanggi Yahweh andǝ Samuyila kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka.
1SA 12:19 Pǝlǝa aɓwana kat banggi Samuyila ama, <<Pakhiwi aban Yahweh, Ɓakuli mò, ace aguro mò, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm nggá wu ɗàng; sǝm tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà ɓè cauɓikea amur amǝnana sǝm peǎ ka, nǝ zǝmbace murǝm ace ɓamur rǝ sǝm.>>
1SA 12:20 Sǝ Samuyila ear ama, <<Ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakka wun ɗàng. Mǝsǝcau na ama wu pàngŋǝ̀nà mǝnia yì ɓealɓikea kat ka; sǝama, wu kǝa pǝlǝ nzǝm wun arǝ Yahweh ɗàng, wu kpate nǝ ɓabum wun kat.
1SA 12:21 Wu kǝa nyar aban kpata agirɓana mǝnana à pà nǝ̀ pusǝ wun, ko à nǝ̀ amsǝ wun raka ɗàng, acemǝnana à nda ɓà.
1SA 12:22 Yahweh ka, pà nǝ̀ túr nzǝm aɓwana male ɗàng, atàcau mala lùllǝì mǝgule. Acemǝnana Yahweh ka, bumi kǝ pwasǝ arǝ nyesǝ wun, ɓǝ̀ wu duk aɓwana male.
1SA 12:23 Amur mǝno ka, ɓǝ̀ sappi banam, mǝnana ama mǝ nǝ pàkkî Yahweh cauɓikea nǝ tamsǝ pakhiwi ace wun ngga. Sǝama, mǝ nǝ nggǝ kània wun njar mǝnana ɓoaro, sǝ nda pepè ka.
1SA 12:24 Sǝ a dǝmba nǝ koman kat ka, wu ɓanggi Yahweh, sǝ wu kpate nǝ ɓabum wun mwashat andǝ mǝsǝcau. Wu ɗenyinǝ agir mǝgulke mǝnana peǎ ace wun ngga.
1SA 12:25 <<Sǝama, ɓǝ̀ wu lidǝmba nǝ pak ɓealɓikea ka, wun, wunǝa murǝm ma'wun ngga, wun nǝ̀ kìɗikì.>>
1SA 13:1 Sawul ndanǝ apǝlǝa lumi-tàrú lang duk murǝm ngga, sǝ yálmúr amǝ'Isǝrayila mala apǝlǝa lumi-ine-nong-ɓari.
1SA 13:2 Sawul tàr aburana á-tàrú (3,000) mala Isǝrayila; á-ɓari (2,000) aɓalǝia ka, à nda atè a Mikmash andǝ nzali múr ankono mala Betel, sǝ á-mwashat ka, à nda atà Jonatan a Gibiya, a bù-nzali mala Benjami. Sǝ acili aɓwe (1,000) ka, nyesǝia ɓǝà o a là, koyan ngga a ɓala male.
1SA 13:3 Jonatan gandǝ kàttì mala amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti mǝnana a Geba ka, sǝ amǝ'Filisti ok cè. Pǝlǝa Sawul twang njawe aɓa nzali kat ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ amǝ'Ibǝru ǒ.>>
1SA 13:4 Sǝ Isǝrayila kat oè à bangŋi ama Sawul gandǝna kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti, sǝ ɗǝm ngga ama Isǝrayila pǝlǝna gìr mǝnana à nǝ̀ ɓinǝì ka aban amǝ'Filisti. Nda aɓwana ok tunǝbanì sǝ à puro à kya kpapi ɓamuria atà Sawul a Gilgal ka.
1SA 13:5 Amǝ'Filisti ram rǝia ace kánǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila; à ndanǝ awaru-pǝr á-lumi-tàrú (30,000), amǝ'pǝ̀r á-tongno-nong-mwashat (6,000), sǝ anggǝsan mala amǝ'lwa mǝ'làkke kǝla lakkì mala mǝsǝsala a kún nggeamùr. À eauwe sǝ à yi tsǝk kàttì malea a Mikmash nǝ takuli mala Bet-Aven
1SA 13:6 Lang amǝ Isǝrayila sǝni ama tanni na amúrià, sǝ amǝ'lwa malea na aɓa nggikiban mǝcandǝe ka, à kya sǝmbǝrǝki rǝia aɓalǝ agumi andǝ akarwan, andǝ ɓong ankono, andǝ ɓalǝ afouroban a tà-nzali, andǝ ɓalǝ a'imna tūli-mùr.
1SA 13:7 Aɓea aɓwana atà amǝ'Ibǝru ka, à yàl a nkaring Nggeasala Jodan aban ká bu-nzali mala Gad andǝ Gilǝyat. Sǝ Sawul ka nda piu a Gilgal; amǝ'lwa puppup mǝnana atè ka, rǝia kǝ ɓǝla nǝ ɓangciu.
1SA 13:8 Sawul twal anongŋo tongno-nong-ɓari, ndaban kúndǝô a Gilgal, kǝla mǝnana Samuyila tsǝki wi ka, sǝ Samuyila yiu ɗàng. Aɓwana tita mesǝ arǝ Sawul.
1SA 13:9 Nda Sawul bang ama, <<Wu yinǝam nǝ pàgir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ apagir mala dotarǝu.>> Pǝlǝa Sawul pà gir'nkila mala pisǝe kǝring.
1SA 13:10 Sǝ lang Sawul nǝ̀ mal pà gir'nkila mala pisǝe kǝring ani ka, kara Samuyila yi tusǝo. Sawul puro wario nǝ nggá kumi sǝ nǝ̀ gingsǝi.
1SA 13:11 Sǝ Samuyila ɗì ama, <<Mana a pa?>> Sawul eari wi ama, <<Lang ǝn sǝni aɓwe na arǝ mǝsǝ arǝàm, sǝ a yiu aɓalǝ anonggio mǝnana a tsǝa ama awu nǝ yiu nǝi raka, sǝ ɗǝm ngga amǝ'Filisti ramǝna rǝia a Mikmash ka,
1SA 13:12 nda ǝn bang nǝma, <Amǝ'Filisti na à nǝ̀ sulǝ aban yiu arǝàm nǝ munǝo kani a Gilgal, sǝ ǝn malaká zǝm earmúrú aban Yahweh ɗàng.> Acemani ka, ǝn tsǝk ɓamúràm púp ǝn pà gir'nkila mala pisǝe kǝring.>>
1SA 13:13 Samuyila banggi wi ama, <<A pángŋǝ̀nà ɓwaɓana. A kpata nzongcau mǝnana Yahweh Ɓakuli mô tsǝko ka ɗàng. Ɓǝ̀ a kpanatà nzongcau mala Yahweh mǝni ka, ɓǝ́ Yahweh nǝ̀ tamsǝkusǝ domurǝm mò amur Isǝrayila tàtǝ́k!
1SA 13:14 Sǝama adyan ngga, domurǝm mò pà nǝ̀ lidǝmba ɗàng. Yahweh alǝnata ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝ ulang ɓabum male ka, sǝ tsǝ̀ngŋǝ́nì wi nzongcau ɓǝ̀ yálmúr aɓwana male, acemǝnana a kpata nzongcau mala Yahweh ɗàng.>>
1SA 13:15 Pǝlǝa Samuyila loapi Gilgal ka, wari a Gibiya a bu-nzali Benjami, sǝ acili aɓwana ka, à o atà Sawul ace kpapi ɓamuria andǝ amǝ'lwa. À loapi Gilgal ka, à wari a Gibiya a bu-nzali Benjami. Pǝlǝa Sawul ram aɓwana mǝnana à nda atè piu ka, sǝ ɓallia. Làkkì malea na kǝla gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat.
1SA 13:16 Sawul, andǝ muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan, andǝ amǝ'lwa mǝnana à nda atè ka, à ue a Geba a bu-nzali mala Benjami; sǝ amǝ'Filisti ka à tsǝk kàttì malea a Mikmash.
1SA 13:17 Pǝlǝa amǝ'tǝllìban purì ɓá kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti arǝ anggǝsan tàrú. Nggǝsan mwashat ka, pǝlǝ nǝ Ofǝra, aban ká a bu-nzali Shuwal;
1SA 13:18 ɓè nggǝsan dǝshi Bet-Horon; sǝ ɓè nggǝsan ngga pǝlǝ nǝ nzong-nzali mǝnana kǝ sǝn ɓamǝsǝarǝia andǝ Ɓangŋaban mala Zeboyim andǝ ɓabondo ka.
1SA 13:19 A bàkú mǝno ka, à kum kǝ mǝ'ntùl aɓa nzali Isǝrayila kat ɗàng, acemǝnana amǝ'Filisti bangŋǝna ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ana raka amǝ'Ibǝru nǝ̀ pàkkî ɓamuria anggeabyau andǝ ankongŋo.>>
1SA 13:20 Nda koyan a Isǝrayila ka kǝ wari aban amǝ'Filisti ace kolǝ kún soro-gwam-nzali, andǝ adá, andǝ bero, andǝ nshiri male.
1SA 13:21 À mbwe gauwe ɓari aɓa tàrú mala shekel ace kolǝ kún asoro-gwam-nzali, andǝa adá, sǝ à mbwe mwashat aɓa gauwe tàrú mala shekel ace kolǝ kún abero, andǝ kún agir pǝ̀r anda-rya.
1SA 13:22 Acemani ka, a pwari mala munǝo ka, à kum nggeabyau andǝ nzo a bú kǝɓwa aɓalǝ amǝ'lwa mǝnana à nda atà Sawul andǝ Jonatan ngga ɗàng; sǝama Sawul andǝ muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan ngga, à ndanǝia.
1SA 13:23 Amǝ'Filisti tasǝ ɓè nggǝsan mala amǝ'lwa malea ace yál njar nre ka ankono mala Mikmash.
1SA 14:1 Ɓè pwari ka Jonatan, muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul banggi mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male ama, <<Yiu ɓǝ̀ sǝm yàl aban ká a kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti mǝnana a nkaring ngga.>> Sǝama yì ka ne tárrí ɗàng.
1SA 14:2 Sawul ka, nda a gumli male a tǝrta nggun mɓǝring a Migǝron, anzǝm là Gibiya. Amǝ'lwa mǝnana à nda atè ka, à nda kǝla ɓwa gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat (600).
1SA 14:3 Ahija muna-ɓwabura mala Ahitup, mǝ'eam Ikabod, muna-ɓwabura mala Finehas, mǝkà Eli, yì pǝris mala Yahweh a Shilo ka, ndakam ateà nǝ efot, a buì. Aɓwana sǝlǝ ama Jonatan umǝna ɗàng.
1SA 14:4 Nreban mǝnana Jonatan nǝ kùtí kam aban ká a kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti ka, atali mǝ'dāh'rike nakam a koya nkanggari. Ɓè talî ka, à tunǝi ama Bozez, sǝ ɓè man ngga à tunǝi ama Sene.
1SA 14:5 Tali mǝ'dāhre mana nǝ njar-nza ka, nda aɓadǝm Mikmash, sǝ mǝnana nǝ njar-kunmur ka, nda aɓadǝm Geba.
1SA 14:6 Jonatan banggi mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male ama, <<Yiu, ɓǝ̀ sǝm yàl aban ká a kàttì mala amǝ'ɗwanyi-kasǝ-ɓatau man. Earka Yahweh nǝ̀ pàktúró ace sǝm; kǝgir pà kàm nǝ̀ tamsǝ Yahweh arǝ amsǝban, ko nǝ aɓwana pas ko nǝ aɓwana kpokyak ɗàng.>>
1SA 14:7 Mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male ne wi ama, <<Pàk gìr mǝnana nda a ɓabumo ka. Kyane, sǝ sǝni, mǝ nda atò, kǝla mǝnana ɓabumo twali ka.>>
1SA 14:8 Jonatan banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni, sǝm nǝ̀ yàlé ace ká a ban amǝ'Filisti, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ pusǝ rǝ sǝm ɓǝà sǝn sǝm.
1SA 14:9 Ɓǝ̀ à bangga sǝm ama, <Wu kúndǝô sheɓǝ̀ sǝm yina aban wun ngga,> pǝlǝa sǝm nǝ̀ cam pikǝr abanì, pà sǝm nǝ̀ ká abania ɗàng.
1SA 14:10 Sǝama ɓǝ̀ à bangga sǝm ama, <Wu yiu aban sǝm ngga,> pǝlǝa sǝm nǝ̀ ká, acemǝnana Yahweh pània a ɓabù sǝm. Mǝno ka nda gìr'lǝmdǝa aban sǝm ama Yahweh pània a ɓabù sǝm.>>
1SA 14:11 Lang à lǝmdǝ ɓamuria yià kǝm aban amǝ'lwa a kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti ka, amǝ'Filisti bang ama, <<Wu sǝni, amǝ'Ibǝru nako à kǝ purki aɓalǝ atūli mǝnana à sǝmbǝrǝki kam ngga.>>
1SA 14:12 Pǝlǝa à tunǝ Jonatan andǝ mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo ama, <<Wu yiu kani, sǝm nǝ̀ lǝmdǝa wun gìr arǝ wun.>> Pǝlǝa Jonatan ne mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo ama, <<Yiu atàm. Yahweh túrnia a ɓabù Isǝrayila.>>
1SA 14:13 Pǝlǝa Jonatan kundǝkio amur abui andǝ akusǝi, eau aban ká aban amǝ'Filisti, sǝ mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo ka nda atè. Jonatan wal-lú amǝ'Filisti mǝnana à nda aɓadǝmbi ka, sǝ mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo gbal ka, wal-lú amana àkǝ yiu nǝ nzǝmia ka.
1SA 14:14 Aɓa je-munǝo mǝdǝmbe man ngga, Jonatan andǝ mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo wal-lú aburana kǝla lumi-ɓari, a patal mǝnana tangŋa male na kǝla mita lumi-ɓari ka.
1SA 14:15 Sǝ ɓangciu bwal amǝ'Filisti mǝnana kat à nda a kàttì ka, andǝ amǝnana à nda a patal ka, andǝ amǝ'lwa malea mǝnana kat à tamsǝia ace yalban ngga, andǝ anggǝsan mala amǝ'tǝllìban; rǝia ɓǝla atàcau mala ɓangciu, sǝ nzali gǝggǝli. Mǝnia yì ɓangciu ka pur nǝban Ɓakuli.
1SA 14:16 Amǝ'yalban mala Sawul a Gibiya, a bu-nzali Benjami soa-mǝsǝia, sǝ à sǝni ka, ɓwabundǝa mala amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti na aban mesǝki arǝ abuban ɗàngɗáng.
1SA 14:17 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi aɓwana mǝnana à nda atè ka ama, <<Wu ɓal amǝ'lwa ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm súrǝ̀ ɓwa mǝnana pa kani raka.>> Lang à ɓalkiban ngga, Jonatan andǝ mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male ka à pà abanì ɗàng.
1SA 14:18 Osso Sawul ne Ahija ama, <<Yinǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli kani.>> A pwari mǝno ka, Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli ka, nda aban amǝ'Isǝrayila.
1SA 14:19 Lang Sawul na aban nacau nǝ pǝris ka, zùrǝì mǝnana aɓa kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti ka lidǝmba arǝ gulkio. Nda Sawul ne pǝris ama, <<Nying buo.>>
1SA 14:20 Pǝlǝa Sawul andǝ amǝ'lwa mǝnana kat à nda atè ka ramba abanɓwáná, sǝ à pur ace munǝo. À kya kum amǝ'Filisti aɓa zùrǝì mǝgule, aban wal-lú rǝarǝia nǝ anggeabyau malea.
1SA 14:21 Amǝ'Ibǝru mǝnana à sanna à o atà amǝ'Filisti a kàttì malea ɗiɗyal ka, à nyare à yi kpapi ɓamúrià atà amǝ'Isǝrayila mǝnana à nda atà Sawul andǝ Jonatan ngga.
1SA 14:22 Lang amǝ'Isǝrayila mǝnana à sǝmbǝrǝki rǝia aɓa nzali múr ankono mala Ifǝrem ok ama amǝ'Filisti ɓangŋǝna ka, yìa gbal ka à lo pǝrtea nǝ munǝo.
1SA 14:23 Nda Yahweh amsǝ Isǝrayila a pwari mǝno, sǝ munǝo mesǝe kya kúti aban ká dǝmba nǝ Bet-Aven.
1SA 14:24 Amǝ'Isǝrayila kùtí aɓa gandǝrǝu a pwari mǝno ka, acemǝnana Sawul tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà aɓwe aɓata kángìr ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ suban sulǝ amur ɓwa mǝnana lì girlina yalung bà pwarikpǝra ka, she ɓǝ̀n mbwena aɓiam-mǝbura akúnì ka.>>Acemani ka, kǝ ɓwa ateà tsǝk kǝ girlina a kúní ɗàng.
1SA 14:25 Lang amǝ'lwa puppup yiu aɓa ɓè ndà-nggun ngga, à kum mur-nyi kàm arǝ abân amur nzali.
1SA 14:26 Sǝ lang à kùtí aɓalǝ anggunì ka, à sǝn mur-nyi aban surkio, sǝ kǝɓwa lǝmdǝ buì je ama nǝ̀ kánǝi a kúni ɗàng, acemǝnana aɓwana ɓanggi súbanì.
1SA 14:27 Jonatan ngga, ok cau mala kángir mǝnana tárrí tsǝk aɓwana à kán ngga ɗàng. Acemani ka, lǝmdǝ kún gara male mana a buì ka, oasǝi aɓa ntòngŋò-nyì, ɗàrǝ́ mur-nyi sǝ lì. Anzǝm mana lìnì ka, kum bǝsa rǝcandǝa.
1SA 14:28 Pǝlǝa ɓeɓwa atà amǝ'lwa banggi wi ama, <<Tárró tsǝk amǝ'lwa à kángìr nǝ nggea kána mǝcandǝe ama, <Ɓǝ̀ suban sulǝ amur ɓwa mǝnana lì girlina aɓa pwari man yalung ngga.> Nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ amǝ'lwa yauwiki nǝ nzala ka.>>
1SA 14:29 Jonatan ne wi ama, <<Tárrám tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà aɓwana aɓa tanni. Ida, wu sǝn rǝcandǝa mǝno nyar arǝàm atàcau mala mur-nyi mǝnia bǝti ǝn oê a kunam ngga.
1SA 14:30 Ɓǝ́ gìrnî ɓoarna kutini man ɓǝ̀ amǝ'lwa lina gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ karǝia yalung aɓa girlina mana à kum aɓalǝ agǝna-lwa mala aɓia-mǝbura ka. Ɓǝ́ alú mǝnana à wal atà amǝ'Filisti ka kutini man.>>
1SA 14:31 A pwari mǝno ka, amǝ'Isǝrayila wal amǝ'Filisti tite a Mikmash kya pur a Aijalon. Sǝ à yauwiki kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ nzala.
1SA 14:32 Nda amǝ'lwa fàkìfákya amúr gǝna-lwa, sǝ à bwalki anzur, andǝ andá, andǝ amuna-ndá, à pwangi-myalia akǝ banì sǝ à shak nyamia andǝapwale.
1SA 14:33 Pǝlǝa ɓeɓwa banggi Sawul ama, <<Sǝni, aɓwana nia à kǝ̀ pàkkî Yahweh cauɓikea nǝ shak nyama nǝ nkila arǝì ka.>> Sǝ Sawul na ama, <<Wun kat wu lǝmdǝna ɗwanyi domǝsǝcau; wu ɗǝnggǝliki tali mǝgule kani abanam.>>
1SA 14:34 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Wu mesǝ aɓalǝ aɓwana, wu banggia wia ama, <Koyan atà wun ngga, wu yinǝàmnǝ andá andǝ anzur ma'wun kani. Wu pwangi-myalia kani sǝ wu shea; sǝama wu kǝa pàkkî Yahweh cauɓikea nǝ shak nyama nǝ nkila arǝì ɗàng.> >> Nda yià kat à yinǝ andá andǝ anzur malea a buia nǝ dù mǝno, sǝ à pwangi-myalia abanì.
1SA 14:35 Pǝlǝa Sawul ɓakkî Yahweh gyangŋan. Mǝnia ka nda gyangŋan mǝdǝmbe mana ɓakkî Yahweh ka.
1SA 14:36 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi amǝ'lwa male ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm kya loasǝtà amǝ'Filisti nǝ du sǝ ɓǝ̀ sǝm pwan gǝna-lwa ba kwaro mala bân; ɓǝ̀ sǝm wal-luia kat.>> Pǝlǝa à eari wi ama, <<Pàk gìr mǝnana a sǝni nda ɓoaro kutibanì ka.>> Sǝama pǝris ne wi ama, <<Came ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɗì Yahweh peatu.>>
1SA 14:37 Nda Sawul ɗì Ɓakuli ama, <<Mǝ kyan nǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti le? Awu nǝ túriá a ɓabu Isǝrayila le?>> Sǝama Ɓakuli pe wi eare a pwari mǝno ka ɗàng.
1SA 14:38 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi amúrû mala amǝ'lwa ama, <<Wu yiu kani kat, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm súrǝ̀ cauɓikea mǝnana à pè yalung ngga.
1SA 14:39 Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh, mǝ'akmúr Isǝrayila nakam ngga, ɓwa mǝnana kat à kumi nǝ cau ka, dumǝna púp nǝ̀ wú, ko ɓǝ̀ muna-ɓwabura mem Jonatan na ka.>> Sǝama kǝɓwa atà aɓwana kat na kǝ cau ɗàng.
1SA 14:40 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi amǝ'Isǝrayila ama, <<Wun kat ka, wu cam kanó sǝ mim sǝnǝ Jonatan ngga, sǝm nǝ̀ cam kani.>> À eari wi ama, <<Pàk gìr mǝnana a sǝni nda ɓoarô ka.>>
1SA 14:41 Pǝlǝa Sawul na ama, <<We Yahweh, Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila, palang sǝ a pè guro mò eare yalung ɗàng? Ɓǝ̀ mim ko muna-ɓwabura mem Jonatan, nda mǝnana pàk man yì cauɓikea ka, pa eare nǝ Urim; sǝ ɓǝ̀ aɓwana mô, amǝ'Isǝrayila na à pàk man yì cauɓikea ka, pa eare nǝ Thummim.>> Pǝlǝa bwal-shishar kpa amur Sawul andǝ Jonatan, sǝ aɓwana ka à auwa.
1SA 14:42 Pǝlǝa Sawul bang ama, <<Wu bwal-shishar anrem sǝnǝ muna-ɓwabura mem Jonatan.>> Sǝ bwal-shishar kpa amur Jonatan.
1SA 14:43 Pǝlǝa Sawul ɗì Jonatan ama, <<Banggam gìr mǝnana a pàk ka!>> Jonatan ne wi ama, <<Ən oasǝ kún gara mana nda a buam ngga aɓa mur-nyi sǝ ǝn oê a kunam. Mǝ ndya ka; mǝ nǝ wǔ.>>
1SA 14:44 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi Jonatan ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli wal-luim, ɓǝ̀ à wal-luio raka!>>
1SA 14:45 Sǝama amǝ'lwa ne Sawul ama, <<Palang sǝ à nǝ̀ wal-lú Jonatan, mǝnana Ɓakuli paktúró nǝi sǝ sǝm kum mǝnia yì limurǝm mǝgule a Isǝrayila ka? Pà nǝ̀ pa anggo ɗàng! Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, ko nyang mwashat a ɓamur Jonatan pà nǝ̀ kpa a nzali ɗang. Gìr mǝnana pè yalung ngga, Ɓakuli na mǝnana bwali wi kam ngga.>> Nda amǝ'lwa man amsǝ Jonatan, à wal-luí raka.
1SA 14:46 Pǝlǝa Sawul nying pǝrta amǝ'Filisti, sǝ amǝ'Filisti nyar a bu-nzali malea ka.
1SA 14:47 Anzǝm mǝnana Sawul dumǝna murǝm mala Isǝrayila ka, lwa-lwa arǝ aɓi-mǝbura a koya buì: amǝ'Mowap, andǝ amǝ'Amon, andǝ amǝ'Edom andǝ amurǝma mala Zoba, andǝ amǝ'Filisti. Koya ban na Sawul wari a munǝo ka, kǝ kum limurǝm.
1SA 14:48 Sawul munǝ munǝo mala ɓwaburaɓwa, sǝ gandǝ amǝ'Amalek. Amsǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila a bù aɓwana mana à yinǝ munǝo arǝia ka.
1SA 14:49 Amuna-burana mala Sawul ka, à nda ka Jonatan, andǝ Ishvi, sǝ Malkishuwa; sǝ ndanǝ amuna-mamǝna ɓari; mǝgule atea ka nda Merap, sǝ mǝkyauwe nda Mikal.
1SA 14:50 Mālá Sawul nda Ahinowam, ɓoarnsarile Ahima'az. Mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur amǝ'lwa mala Sawul ka, nda Abna muna-ɓwabura mala Ner, kina Sawul.
1SA 14:51 Tár Sawul ka nda Kish; sǝ Ner yì tár Abna ka, nda muna-ɓwabura mala Abiyel.
1SA 14:52 Sawul munǝ munǝo mǝcandǝe arǝ amǝ'Filisti aɓa do-yilǝmu male kat. Nda gìr mana tsǝa sǝ akoya pwari sǝ kum ɓwabura mǝnana ndanǝ rǝcandǝa andǝ mǝsǝkàng-kàngŋa ka, nǝ̀ oasǝ ɓwe aɓalǝ amǝ'lwa male.
1SA 15:1 Samuyila banggi Sawul ama, <<Mǝ nda ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh tasǝam ɓǝ̀n ɗārǝo ace mǝnana wu duk murǝm amúr aɓwana male amǝ'Isǝrayila ka. Adyan ngga, kwakikiro arǝ cau mǝnana Yahweh kǝ na ka.
1SA 15:2 Yahweh mana Karban nǝ Gulo kat ka, bang ama, <Ən sǝnǝna gìr mǝɓane mǝnana amǝ'Amalek pàkkî amǝ Isǝrayila amur njar, lang amǝ Isǝrayila purî nzali Masar ka.
1SA 15:3 Adyan ngga, wu kyane wu kya wal amǝ'Amalek, sǝ gìr mǝnana kat à ndanǝi ka, wu tàrì ace Ɓakuli. Wu kǝa sǝn-mǝsǝswatǝr malea ɗàng. Wu wal-lú aburana, andǝ amamǝna, andǝ amuna, andǝ amuna-mǝkeke, andǝ andá, andǝ anzur, andǝ akalakadambi, sǝ amǝdambǝriso.> >>
1SA 15:4 Pǝlǝa Sawul ramba amǝ'lwa, sǝ ɓallia a Telem. Asoje-kusǝu na á-gbǝman-ɓari (200,000), sǝ aburana mala tàu mala Yahuda ka à nda á-lum (10,000).
1SA 15:5 Pǝlǝa Sawul andǝ aburana male wari a nggea-là mala amǝ'Amalek, sǝ à kya kumsǝ a ɓangŋaban.
1SA 15:6 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi amǝ'Ken ama, <<Wu o, wu nying amǝ'Amalek, ace mǝnana mǝ nggá kiɗiki wun wunǝia raka. Wun ngga, wu lǝmdǝ pěmǝɓoarne aban amǝ Isǝrayila kat lang à purî ɓá nzali Masar ka.>> Nda amǝ'Ken purî ɓalǝ amǝ'Amalek ka.
1SA 15:7 Pǝlǝa Sawul wal amǝ'Amalek kat twal a Havila aban ká ɗār a Shur, mǝnana nda a takuli mala Masar ka.
1SA 15:8 Sǝ gbami Agag murǝm mala amǝ'Amalek andǝamǝsǝi, sǝ aɓwana mala Agag ka, tària nǝ twaltea kat-kat nǝ kún nggeabyau.
1SA 15:9 Sǝama, Sawul andǝ amǝ'lwa male ka, à nying Agag nǝyilǝmu, sǝ à nying amǝɓoarne-katkat atà ambul andǝ anzur, andǝ andá, andǝ amuna-ndá mǝ'nyange, andǝ amuna-nzur, andǝ koya gir mǝnana mǝɓoarne na ka. À earce ama à nǝ̀ kiɗiki amǝnia yì agir ka ɗàng. Sǝ acili agirkusǝu mǝnana à ɓǝsǝkia sǝ amǝɓane na ka, à wal-luia kat.
1SA 15:10 Pǝlǝa cau mala Yahweh yiu aban Samuyila ama:
1SA 15:11 <<Ən pàk-ɓǝnsǝlǝma nǝ tsǝk Sawul ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm, acemǝnana pǝlǝna nzǝmi arǝ kpatam, sǝ ɓinǝ pàk gìr mǝnana ǝn tsǝki wi nzongcau arǝì nǝma ɓǝ̀ pè ka.>> Bum Samuyila lúllô, sǝ ɓua aban Yahweh aɓa dù mǝno kat.
1SA 15:12 Ban fana ka, Samuyila lo nǝ dǝmbari ace ká aban Sawul. Sǝama ɓeɓwa banggi Samuyila ama, <<Sawul wari a Kamel a bân ɓakkì ɓamúrì gìr mana aɓwana nǝ̀ nggǝ ɗenyinǝi ace ka, sǝ wulina umǝna a Gilgal.>>
1SA 15:13 Lang Samuyila yina aban Sawul ka, Sawul ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝko bù! Ən pàngŋǝ́nà gìr mǝnana Yahweh bang ngga.>>
1SA 15:14 Sǝ Samuyila ɗì ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ nda anggo ka, sǝ gi mana ǝn nggǝ oè a kiram kǝla ɓua mala anzur andǝ andá?>>
1SA 15:15 Sawul ne wi ama, <<Amǝ'lwa pwania arǝ amǝ'Amalek sǝ à yinǝia; à nying anzur andǝ andá amǝɓoarne-katkat nǝyilǝmu ace pà gìr'nkila nǝia aban Yahweh Ɓakuli mô; sǝ acilia ka sǝm kiɗikinia kat-kat.>>
1SA 15:16 Pǝlǝa Samuyila banggi Sawul ama, <<Came ɓǝ̀n banggo gìr mǝnana Yahweh banggam yilung nǝ du ka.>> Sawul ne wi ama, <<Banggam.>>
1SA 15:17 Samuyila banggi wi ama, <<Kat andǝ mani ama, a sǝn ɓamuro ka a pa kún kǝgir raka, a nda múrû mala atau mala Isǝrayila re? Yahweh ɗārǝo a duk murǝm amúr amǝ'Isǝrayila.
1SA 15:18 Yahweh tasǝo kya pakki wi túrô, banggo ama, <Kyane, tària ace kiɗikia kat-kat, yià amǝ'Amalek amǝ'cauɓikea mǝno, sǝ wu munǝ-munǝo arǝia sheɓǝ̀ a twalnatea kang ngga.>
1SA 15:19 Palang sǝ a kpata gi Yahweh ɗàng? Palang sǝ a rufi atà gǝna-lwa, sǝ a pàk gìr mǝnana mǝɓike na ka, a sǝne mala Yahweh.>>
1SA 15:20 Pǝlǝa Sawul ne Samuyila ama, <<Ən kpanatà gi Yahweh. Ən warina ǝn pangŋǝ̀nà túró mǝnana Yahweh túrǎm ace ka. Ən yinanǝ Agag murǝm mala amǝ'Amalek, sǝ ǝn twalnata amǝ'Amalek kat-kat.
1SA 15:21 Sǝama amǝ'lwa mem pwan gǝna-lwa atà anzur andǝ andá; yià agir mǝɓoarne-katkat aɓalǝ amǝnana à tària ace kiɗikia ka; à yinǝia kani a Gilgal ace pà gìr'nkila aban Yahweh, Ɓakuli mô.>>
1SA 15:22 Samuyila bang ama, <<Mǝye nda mǝnana kǝ pwasǝbum Yahweh ka: Okiru na le ko apagir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ pà agir'nkila na? Sǝni, okiru ka ɓoaro-kuti pà gìr'nkila, sǝ kwakikiru ka ɓoaro-kuti mùrú agam.
1SA 15:23 Mgbicau ka nda kǝla cauɓikea mala monzǝo, sǝ twalkicau ka nda kǝla ɓealɓikea mala peri atà ankúl. Acemǝnana a ɓinǝ cau mala Yahweh ka, Yì gbal ka ɓinǝno arǝ duk murǝm.>>
1SA 15:24 Sawul ne Samuyila ama, <<Ən pángŋǝ̀nà cauɓikea, acemǝnana ǝn kpata nzongcau mala Yahweh andǝ cau mò ɗàng. Gìr mǝnana tsǝk ka ɓangciu na pàkkam arǝ aɓwana, sǝ ǝn kpata già ka.
1SA 15:25 Sǝama adyan ngga, ida twàlâm-ban cauɓikea mem, sǝ wu yiu atam, ace mǝnana mǝ peri aban Yahweh ka.>>
1SA 15:26 Samuyila banggi wi ama, <<Pà mǝ nǝ ká atò ɗàng. A ginǝ kpata nzongcau mala Yahweh, sǝ Yahweh ɓinǝno arǝ duk murǝm amúr Isǝrayila.>>
1SA 15:27 Lang Samuyila wulio nǝ̀ u ka, Sawul gbami kún nggea-daura male, kara sana.
1SA 15:28 Samuyila ne wi ama, <<Yahweh sanǝna domurǝm mala Isǝrayila arǝò yalung sǝ pànî ɓio ɓwa-Isǝrayila mana ɓoaro kútiǒ ka.
1SA 15:29 Ɓakuli mǝɓoarɓwe mala Isǝrayila ka, kǝ na nyir ɗàng, sǝ kǝ nggaɗi ɗenyicau male ɗàng. Yì ka, ɓwapǝndǝa na mǝnana kǝ nggaɗi ɗenyicau male ka ɗàng.>>
1SA 15:30 Pǝlǝa Sawul bang ama, <<Ən pàngŋǝ́nà cauɓikea. Sǝama, ida lǝmdǝam gulo aɓadǝm aɓwana-mǝgule mala aɓwana mem sǝ aɓadǝm amǝ'Isǝrayila. Nyare atàm ace mǝnana mǝ peri aban Yahweh Ɓakuli mô ka.>>
1SA 15:31 Nda Samuyila nyar atè, sǝ Sawul peri aban Yahweh.
1SA 15:32 Pǝlǝa Samuyila bang ama, <<Wu yinǝam nǝ Agag, yì murǝm mala amǝ'Amalek kani.>> Agag pǝlǝa yiu abani aɓalǝ ansolo, sǝ kǝ ne ɓamúrì ama, <<Mǝsǝcau, lúllô mala lú ka umǝna.>>
1SA 15:33 Samuyila ne wi ama, <<Kǝla mǝnana nggeabyau mô tsǝk amamǝna à ɗwanyi amuna ka, anggo gbal nggò nǝ̀ ɗwanyi munì.>> Pǝlǝa Samuyila kwarki Agag, kasǝki mgbeatuk-mgbeatuk akano a Gilgal aɓadǝm Yahweh.
1SA 15:34 Pǝlǝa Samuyila o a Rama, sǝ Sawul nyar a ɓala male a Gibiya.
1SA 15:35 Samuyila nyare sǝn Sawul ɗǝm ɗàng bà lú male. Sǝama Samuyila pàk bumkiɗikea ace Sawul. Sǝ Yahweh ka banɓiki wi mǝnana tsǝk Sawul ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm amur Isǝrayila ka.
1SA 16:1 A ɓè fara ka, Yahweh banggi Samuyila ama, <<Baniò nǝ̀ sau lang sǝ awu nǝ lidǝmba nǝ pak-bumkiɗikea ace Sawul. Ən ɓinǝnace duk murǝm male amur amǝ Isǝrayila. Acemani ka, lùmsǝ njawe mò nǝ mùrú olif sǝ wu o a Betalami. A mǝno yì là ka, ɗice ɓwa mǝnana à tunǝki ama Jeshi ka, acemǝnana ǝn tarna mwashat aɓalǝ amuna-burana male ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm mem.>>
1SA 16:2 Sǝ Samuyila bang ama, <<Lang sǝ mǝ nǝ ká? Ɓǝ̀ Sawul okce ka, nǝ̀ wal-luem.>> Pǝlǝa Yahweh banggi wi ama, <<Bwal muna-ndǎ abuo sǝ wu bang ama, <Ən yiu ace pà gìr'nkila aban Yahweh.>
1SA 16:3 Tunǝ Jeshi ɓǝ̀ yiu a ban pa gìr'nkilè, sǝ mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝo gìr mǝnana awu nǝ pàk ka. Awu nǝ ɗārǝàm ɓwa mǝnana mǝ nǝ banggo ka.>>
1SA 16:4 Anggo sǝ Samuyila pa kǝla mǝnana Yahweh ne wi ka. Lang yi bwalǝna Betalami ka, aɓwana-mǝgule mala là pur nǝ rǝɓǝla à yi kúllì. À ɗì ama, <<Mana kumban le? A yiu jam le?>>
1SA 16:5 Samuyila earia wia ama, <<E, ǝn yiu aɓa rǝpwala, ace pà gìr'nkila aban Yahweh. Wu lak ɓamur rǝ wun sǝ wu yiu atàm a ban pâ gìr'nkilè.>> Pǝlǝa Samuyila lak Jeshi andǝ amuni, sǝ tunǝia ɓǝà yiu gbal ace pà mǝno yì gìr'nkila ka.
1SA 16:6 Lang Jeshi andǝ amuni yi bwalǝna ka, Samuyila soa mǝsǝi arǝ Eliyap sǝ na ama, <<Ɓafo, mǝnia ka nda kǝ ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh tàrì ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm ngga.>>
1SA 16:7 Sǝ Yahweh ka ne Samuyila ama, <<Cè ɓabumo o arǝ puro male a nggūrǝu ko dāh'rya male ɗàng. Yì ka ǝn ɓinǝni. Yahweh kǝ sǝngìr a sǝne mala ɓwapǝndǝa ɗang. Ɓwapǝndǝa kǝ sǝn pǎ mala ɓwa a nggūrǝu, sǝ Yahweh ka ɓabum na sǝngiyi ka.>>
1SA 16:8 Pǝlǝa Jeshi ne muni Abinadap ɓǝ̀ puro ɓǝ̀ gya a ɓadǝm Samuyila. Sǝ Samuyila ka na ama, <<Mǝnia nda ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh twal ka ɗàng.>>
1SA 16:9 Anzǝmi ka Jeshi tasǝ Shama. Samuyila na ama, <<Mǝnia gbal ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh twal ka ɗàng.>>
1SA 16:10 Anggo sǝ Jeshi lǝmdǝì Samuyila amuni tongno-nong-ɓari. Sǝ Samuyila ne Jeshi ama, <<Yahweh twal kǝ ɓwa atà amǝnia yì amuna ka ɗàng.>>
1SA 16:11 Pǝlǝa Samuyila ɗì Jeshi ama, <<Kǝ amunio nia ka le?>> Jeshi eari wi ama, <<Mǝtankwang malea nakam, sǝ nda a bondo aban yál anzur andǝ ambul.>> Samuyila na ama, <<Turban atè adyan ɓǝà kya yinǝi; pà sǝm nǝ̀ dumnǝdo ɗang sheɓǝ̀ yina ka.>>
1SA 16:12 Jeshi pǝlǝa túrban atè sǝ yiu. Yì mǝlagga Dauda ka, pǝndǝa a nggūrǝu, ɓoarjam sǝ amǝsǝì ɓoar sǝna. Yahweh ne Samuyila ama, <<Mǝnia nda ɓwê; lo ɗārǝí.>>
1SA 16:13 Lang Dauda na aban came aɓalǝ amǝ'eambi ka, Samuyila twal mùrú olif mana aɓa njawe mǝnana yinǝi ka, sǝ ɗārǝ́ Dauda nǝi. Twal amǝno yì pwari aban o a dǝmba ka, Bangŋo mala Yahweh sulǝo amur Dauda nǝ rǝcandǝa. Samuyila pǝlǝa nyare o a Rama.
1SA 16:14 A bàkú mǝno ka, Bangŋo mala Yahweh nyìngŋǝ̀nà Sawul, sǝ ɓè bangŋo mǝɓike mǝnana pur nǝban Yahweh ka, yinǝi wi nǝ banɓikea.
1SA 16:15 Amǝ'túró male yì Sawul banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni, ɓè bangŋo mǝɓike mǝnana pur nǝban Yahweh ka nda mǝnana kǝ po banɓikea ka.
1SA 16:16 Eara sǝm, ɓwamǝgule, ɓǝ̀ sǝm alota ɓwa mǝnana mǝ'sǝlǝ wal zangŋan na ka; sǝ lang yì bangŋo mǝɓike nǝban Ɓakuli yina amuro ka, ɓwê nǝ̀ walô zangŋan sǝ hakkilo mô nǝ̀ nongŋo.>>
1SA 16:17 Nda Sawul banggi amǝ'túró male ama, <<Wu alamta ɓwa mǝnana sǝlǝ wal zangŋan pepè ka sǝ wu yinǝi abanam.>>
1SA 16:18 Mwashat atà alaggana male eari wi ama, <<Ən sǝnǝna ɓè muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi ɓwa Betalami, mǝnana mǝ'sǝlǝ wal zangŋan na ka. Yì ɗǝm ngga ɓwabura mǝ'ɓabum-candǝa na sǝ mǝ'lwa na. Kǝ nacau pepè sǝ ɓoarjam. Sǝ Yahweh na atè.>>
1SA 16:19 Pǝlǝa Sawul tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân aban Jeshi nǝ cau ama, <<Tàsǝâm muna-ɓwabura mô Dauda, mǝnana nda atà ambul andǝ anzur ka.>>
1SA 16:20 Pǝlǝa Jeshi twal mǝdambǝriso sǝ tsǝki wi twalo mala bǝredi andǝ mùr-anap aɓa sambǝram a nzǝmi, andǝ muna-mbul sǝ tasǝia nǝ bú Dauda aban Sawul.
1SA 16:21 Dauda yiu aban Sawul sǝ yi duk mǝtúró male. Sawul earce Dauda kǝ̀rkǝ́r sǝ twali ɓǝ̀ duk mǝ'twali wi agirmunǝo male.
1SA 16:22 Pǝlǝa Sawul tasǝ mǝ'na-túrbân aban Jeshi nǝ cau ama, <<Ida, ɗeki Dauda ɓǝ̀ ueo aɓa túró mem, acemǝnana kumǝna earmúrú a mǝsǝam.>>
1SA 16:23 Twal a pwari mǝno, lang yì bangŋo mǝɓike nǝban Ɓakuli yina amur Sawul ka, Dauda nǝ̀ twal zangŋan male nǝ̀ wali. Sǝ yì bangŋo mǝɓike ka nǝ̀ o, hakkilo mala Sawul nǝ̀ nongŋo, sǝ nǝ̀ kum rǝpwala.
1SA 17:1 A bàkú mǝno ka amǝ'Filisti ramba amǝ'lwa malea ace munǝo a Soko, ɓè là a bu-nzali Yahuda; à tsǝk kàttì malea a ban mǝnana à tunǝi ama Efes-Damim ngga, anre Soko andǝ Azeka.
1SA 17:2 Sawul andǝ aburana mala Isǝrayila ramba, sǝ à tsǝk kàttì malea a Ɓangŋaban Ela, a ban mǝnana à gilǝrǝia a nzong ban-je munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti ka.
1SA 17:3 Amǝ'Filisti cam amur ɓè mgbangban, sǝ amǝ Isǝrayila cam amur ɓè mǝnana soa mǝno, sǝ ɓangŋaban na gau nrea ka.
1SA 17:4 Pǝlǝa gbani mala amǝ'Filisti, purî ɓá kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti. Lullǝì nda Golaya; ɓwa nggea-là Gat na. Dāh'rya male bik kǝla mita tàrú.
1SA 17:5 Oasǝ sukuru-bolo mala bolo-bángŋá a ɓamúrí, sǝ daura-bolo mǝnana oasǝ arǝì ka, dǝmbǝrya male bik kǝla tyang lumi-tongno-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-ɓari (57).
1SA 17:6 Yì ɗǝm ngga oasǝa oamsǝkan mala bolo-bángŋá arǝ akusǝì, sǝ bwal nkongŋo a mkpamtari.
1SA 17:7 Tondong kaɗa male nyane kǝla muna-nggun-so. Dǝmbǝrya mala mǝsǝ kaɗa male mala bolo-candǝa ka, tyang tongno-nong-ɓari na. Ɓè mǝ'lwa bwalì wi ntongŋo male sǝ kǝ gya a ɓadǝmbi.
1SA 17:8 Golaya came sǝ loasǝ gì arǝ amǝ Isǝrayila ama, <<Mana tsǝa sǝ wu pur kat ama wun nǝ̀ munǝo? Mǝ nda ɓwa'Filisti re, sǝ wun ngga, wu nda ka aguro mala Sawul re? Wu pusǝ ɓwa mwashat aɓalǝ wun, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sulǝ abanam.
1SA 17:9 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwê gandǝ munǝ arǝàm sǝ wal-luem ngga, sǝm nǝ̀ duk aguro ma'wun; sǝ ɓǝ̀n gandǝì, sǝ ǝn wal-luí ka, wun nǝ̀ duk aguro ma'sǝm, wun nǝ̀ pàkka sǝm túró.
1SA 17:10 Yalung ngga ǝn ɓǝsǝki wun kat, wun amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila. Wu tasǝ ɓwa mwashat ɓǝ̀ pur atàm, mǝnana nǝ̀ munǝ arǝàm ngga.>>
1SA 17:11 Lang Sawul andǝ Isǝrayila kat ok amǝnia yì acau mala ɓwa'Filisti ka, ǝn'ò pakkia wia sǝ à dǝurǝ kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 17:12 A bàkú mǝno ka, ɓè ɓwabura na kam lùllǝì ama Jeshi, ɓwa'Efǝrat a Betalami, mana nda tár Dauda ka; ndanǝ amuna-burana tongno-nong-tàrú. A nza mala Sawul ka, ɓwabure enà kutsuk.
1SA 17:13 Amuna-burana amǝdǝmbe male tàrú ka, à o atà Sawul a munǝo. Alullǝia nda ka Eliyap muna-dǝmba, andǝ Aminadap ɓaria, sǝ tàruia nda Shama.
1SA 17:14 Dauda ka nda mǝtankwang. Amǝgule mǝnia tàrú ka, à o atà Sawul,
1SA 17:15 sǝ Dauda ka camarǝ ká aban Sawul sǝ nǝ̀ nyare ace ɗenyinǝ ambul andǝ anzur mala tárrí a Betalami.
1SA 17:16 Twal anongŋo lumi-ine ɓwa'Filisti mǝno camarǝ puro sǝ nǝ̀ yia came a bancame male, dǝmbari andǝ pwarikpǝra.
1SA 17:17 Ɓè pwari ka, Jeshi banggi muna-ɓwabura male Dauda ama, <<Kyan nǝì amǝ'eambo buku mǝssa mǝnia à kàngŋì ka, andǝ agbatali bǝredi mǝnia lum ngga; kyan nǝia akaurǝa aban amǝ'eambo a kàttì.
1SA 17:18 Sǝ wu twal adú kiura mǝnia lum ngga a buo wu kya pê mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur nggǝsan mala amǝ'lwa á-mwashat malea. Kya sǝni ko amǝ'eambo na jam, sǝ wu yinǝam nǝ kún-bǝri nǝbania mǝnana nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama mbak-kàngkàng à nda kam ngga.>>
1SA 17:19 Anggo ka, Sawul andǝ amǝ'eambu mǝnia andǝ amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila puppup ka, à nda aɓa Ɓangŋaban Ela, a ban munǝo andǝ amǝ'Filisti.
1SA 17:20 Nda Dauda lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal sǝ nying ambul andǝ anzur a bù ɓeɓwa ɓǝ̀ tsǝkiria, pǝlǝa twal agirlina mǝno sǝ bwal-njar, kǝla mǝnana Jeshi banggi wi ka. Yi bik kàttì lang amǝ'lwa na arǝ puro à nǝ̀ ká nzong ban-je munǝo, sǝ à kǝ̀ ɓua gāwàn lwa ka.
1SA 17:21 Amǝ'Isǝrayila tsaɗi-akunarǝia ace munǝo, sǝ à soa ka amǝ'Filisti; sǝ amǝ'Filisti gbal ka, à tsaɗi-akunarǝia ace munǝo, sǝ à soa ka amǝ'Isǝrayila. À came sǝ à soa ɓamǝsǝarǝia, amǝ'lwa arǝ amǝ'lwa.
1SA 17:22 Pǝlǝa Dauda nying atwalo male a bù mǝ'tsǝkir atwalo, sǝ ɓangŋa wari a nzong ban-je munǝo sǝ makkì-amǝ'eambi-kún.
1SA 17:23 Lang ndarǝ nacau nǝia ka, kara sǝni ka, Golaya, gbani mala amǝ'Filisti, ɓwa'Gat, purnì nzong ban-je munǝo mala amǝ'Filisti. Nacau mǝ'mwashati kǝla mana nakiyi pwari-pwari ka, sǝ Dauda oè.
1SA 17:24 Pwari mǝnana kat aburana mala Isǝrayila sǝni ka, yià kat à ɓanggi wi nǝ ɓangciu mǝkǝ̀rkǝ́rnì.
1SA 17:25 À hamnanǝi aban aburana mala Isǝrayila ama, <<Wu sǝn mǝnia yì ɓwabura mǝnana camarǝ puro ka re? Kǝ pur ace nabura arǝ Isǝrayila. Murǝm nǝ̀ pa gǝna mǝgule aban ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ wal-luí ka; nǝ̀ pe wi ɓoarnsarile ɓǝ̀ duk māmí, sǝ nǝ̀ pusǝ ɓala mala tárrí arǝ mbwe boalo-cemi!>>
1SA 17:26 Dauda ɗì amǝ'lwa mǝnana a baní tù ka ama, <<Mana à nǝ̀ pè ɓwa mǝnana wal-lú ɓwa'Filisti mǝnia, nǝ̀ pusǝ mǝnia yì gìr kǝsǝkya arǝ Isǝrayila ka? Yana ɗe nda mǝnia yì ɓwa'Filisti mǝ'ɗwanyi kasǝ-ɓatau, mǝnana nǝ̀ sanggi amǝ'lwa mala Ɓakuli mǝ'yilǝmui ka?>>
1SA 17:27 Pǝlǝa aburana mǝnia eari Dauda nǝ ɓǝsǝlǝi wi cau mǝnana à nani a dǝmba ka ama, <<E, mǝno ka nda gìr mǝnana à nǝ̀ pè ace ɓwa mǝnana wal-lú mǝno yì ɓwabura ka.>>
1SA 17:28 Lang Eliyap, mǝgula Dauda ok cau mǝno Dauda nakiyi aburana mǝno ka, pǝlǝa ɗì Dauda nǝ bumlulla ama, <<Mana ɗe a yiua pě kani? Amǝno yì anzur kpokyak ka yana a nyinggi wi ɓǝ̀ yália a ɓabondo? Ən súrǝ́nà rǝ twàlɓamúrû mô andǝ twalkicau mò. A yiu nǝ yiu ace sǝn amǝ'lwa a kún munǝo.>>
1SA 17:29 Dauda ɗiban ama, <<Mana ǝn pa ado? Mim ngga ǝn ɗiban nǝ ɗi.>>
1SA 17:30 Pǝlǝa nying baní kutio o aban aɓea aɓwana, sǝ ɗia kǝ ɗiban mǝ'mwashati. À nyesǝi wi eare mǝ'mwashati kǝla mǝnana a dǝmba ka.
1SA 17:31 Aɓea amǝ'lwa ok cau mǝno Dauda nakiyi ka, pǝlǝa à warinǝ ɗiban male aban murǝm Sawul. Pǝlǝa Sawul túrban atè ɓǝ̀ yiu.
1SA 17:32 Sǝ Dauda ne Sawul ama, <<Cè ɓabum kǝɓwa ɓungi atàcau mala mǝnia yì ɓwa'Filisti ka ɗàng. Mim guro mò, mǝ nǝ nggá munǝ arǝì.>>
1SA 17:33 Sawul ne Dauda ama, <<A pà wunǝ gandǝ ká arǝ ɓwa'Filisti man ace munǝo arǝì ɗàng, acemǝnana we ka, a nda muntulo, sǝ yì ka nggea kanggǝrang mǝ'lwa na twal a lo male ba yalung.>>
1SA 17:34 Sǝ Dauda ka banggi Sawul ama, <<Mim guro mò ka mǝ nda yálgír mala anzur andǝ ambul mala tárrám. A pwari mǝnana im ko biya yiu yi bwal atà anzur a domwan nǝ̀ um nǝi ka,
1SA 17:35 ǝn ɓang atè, ǝn wali kum, sǝ ǝn ak nzurnì a kúni. Lang pǝlǝ arǝàm ngga, ǝn gbami arǝ ankpakò-kúni, ǝn walki, sǝ ǝn wal-luí.
1SA 17:36 Ən wal im sǝ ǝn wal biya, anggo gbal sǝ mǝ nǝ pang nǝ ɓwa'Filisti mǝnia à kasǝ ɓate raka, acemǝnana ɓǝsǝki amǝ'lwa mala Ɓakuli mǝyilǝmui.
1SA 17:37 Ɓakuli mǝnana amsǝam aɓalǝ ankaulakusǝ im andǝ ankaulakusǝ biya ka, nǝ̀ amsǝam a bu mǝnia yì ɓwa'Filisti ka!>> Sǝ Sawul banggi Dauda ama, <<Kyane! Yahweh nǝ̀ pà atò!>>
1SA 17:38 Pǝlǝa Sawul nyesǝ agirmunǝo male pè Dauda. Oasǝi wi sukuru mala bolo-bángŋá amurí, sǝ oasǝi wi daura-bolo arǝì.
1SA 17:39 Dauda gyar nggeabyau mala Sawul amur agirmunǝo mǝno arǝì ka, sǝ mwam gya kàrìban nǝ̀ sǝn pǎ malea, acemǝnana yì ka malaká oasǝ a'ulang agir mǝno ka a kǝ pwari ɗàng. Pǝlǝa Dauda ne Sawul ama, <<Pà mǝ nǝ gandǝ ká aɓalǝ amǝnia yì agir ka ɗàng, acemǝnana ǝn bwalta paktúró nǝia ɗàng.>> Dauda pǝlǝa swáriǎ.
1SA 17:40 Twal gara-yálgìr male a buì sǝ kya tàrki amǝsǝtali tongno, amǝnana rǝia ɓùlɓùl ka, a muna-myalmur, oasǝia aɓa sambǝram-yálgìr male. Nǝ ntamso male a buì, gya aban ká, gbàshìban ɓwa'Filisti.
1SA 17:41 Golaya pur aban yiu arǝ Dauda, mǝ'bwali wi ntongŋo male na a ɓadǝmbi sǝ kǝ gya atè. Gya kǝ sungŋo aban Dauda.
1SA 17:42 Lang soa mǝsǝi pèlǝ Dauda ka, ɓǝsǝki, acemǝnana sǝn Dauda ka lo-ɓwa na, ɓamǝsǝ muntulo na arǝì, pǝndǝa sǝ ɓoarjam.
1SA 17:43 Ne Dauda ama, <<A yiu arǝàm nǝ gara ka, mǝ nda nvwa le?>> Pǝlǝa sú Dauda aɓa lullǝ ankúl malea yià amǝ'Filisti.
1SA 17:44 Ne Dauda ama, <<Yiu kani, mǝ nǝ pè anyal andǝ anyam-ɓabondo nyamo.>>
1SA 17:45 Dauda ne yì ɓwa'Filisti ama, <<A yiu arǝàm nǝ nggeabyau, andǝ kaɗa, andǝ nkongŋo, sǝ mim ngga, mǝ ndarǝ ká arǝò aɓa lullǝ Yahweh Mǝtala Abangŋo, yì Ɓakuli mala amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila, mǝnana a nabura arǝì ka.
1SA 17:46 A pwari man yalung ngga, Yahweh nǝ̀ tasǝo a ɓabuam! Mǝ nǝ walo sǝ mǝ nǝ kasǝ ɓamuro. Yalung ngga mǝ nǝ pè anyal mǝnana a kuli ka, andǝ anyam-ɓabondo mala nzali man alú ka amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti. Sǝ ɓanza kat nǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama Ɓakuli na a Isǝrayila.
1SA 17:47 Sǝ koya ɓwa mǝnana a ban ramba kani ka, nǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama pà nǝ nggeabyau ko nkongŋo sǝ Yahweh kǝ amsǝ aɓwana male ɗàng. Lwa mǝnia ka mala Yahweh na, sǝ yì ka nǝ̀ tasǝ wun kat a ɓabù sǝm.>>
1SA 17:48 Lang yì ɓwa'Filisti lo kǝ gbàshìban je andǝ Dauda ka, Dauda tù nǝ mire aban ká a nzong ban-je munǝo ace je andǝ ɓwa'Filisti.
1SA 17:49 Dauda oasǝ buì aɓa sambǝram male sǝ pusǝ tali mwashat, wúlì aɓa ntamso sǝ ɓungŋǝna ɓwa'Filisti nǝi a kundǝmbi kum! Tali ar mu kundǝmbi kò aɓalǝi, kara kasǝa kpa nǝ ɓamǝsǝì a nzali.
1SA 17:50 Anggo sǝ Dauda limurǝm amur ɓwa'Filisti nǝ ntamso andǝ tali; kat andǝ amani ama Dauda pànǝ kǝ nggeabyau a buì raka, ɓù ɓwa'Filisti túrí a nzali wali màk.
1SA 17:51 Pǝlǝa Dauda ɓangŋa yi cam amur ɓwa'Filisti. Gbami nggeabyau mala ɓwa'Filisti, kwetǝi a ndè, sǝ masǝlǝi kasǝ ɓamúrí. Lang amǝ'Filisti sǝni ama gbani malea wuna ka, à pǝlǝ nǝ mire aban o.
1SA 17:52 Pǝlǝa aburana mala Isǝrayila lo nǝ gāwàn lwa, sǝ à pǝrta amǝ'Filisti aban ká ɗār a ɓangŋaban andǝ akún nggea-là Ekǝron. Alú ka amǝ'Filisti nonggi amur njargula Sharayim aban ká Gat andǝ Ekǝron.
1SA 17:53 Sǝ lang amǝ Isǝrayila nyarî pǝrta amǝ'Filisti ka, à kya pwan gǝna-lwa a kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti.
1SA 17:54 Dauda twal ɓamur Golaya, yì ɓwa'Filisti sǝ yinǝi a Urǝshalima, sǝ agirmunǝo male ka tsǝia aɓa gumli male.
1SA 17:55 Lang Sawul sǝn Dauda pur aban ká munǝo arǝ Golaya ka, ɗì Abna, mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'lwa ama, <<Abna, muna mala yan nda mǝno yì lagga ka wo?>> Abna eari wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ yilǝmo sauwa, Murǝm, ǝn sǝlǝ ɗang.>>
1SA 17:56 Sǝ murǝm bang ama, <<Ɗiban, yana nda tár mune.>>
1SA 17:57 Lang Dauda nyarǝnì wal-lú Golaya, ɓwa'Filisti ka, Abna twali, yinǝi aɓadǝm Sawul nǝ ɓamur Golaya a buì.
1SA 17:58 Sǝ Sawul ɗì ama, <<Lagga, a nda muna mala yana?>> Sǝ Dauda eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda muna mala guro mò, Jeshi ɓwa'Betalami.>>
1SA 18:1 Lang Dauda malǝna nacau andǝ Sawul ka, kara ɓabum Jonatan o arǝ Dauda. Sǝ Jonatan earce Dauda kǝla mǝnana earce yilǝmi ka.
1SA 18:2 Tite a pwari mǝno ka, Sawul twal Dauda ɓǝ̀ do atè, sǝ eari wi nyar a ɓala mala tárrí ɗàng.
1SA 18:3 Pǝlǝa Jonatan kùrcau nǝ Dauda, acemǝnana earce Dauda kǝla mǝnana earce yilǝmi ka.
1SA 18:4 Jonatan swár nggea-daura mana arǝì ka, sǝ pè Dauda, andǝ nggeabyau male, andǝ nta male, sǝ nggur-ɓunu male.
1SA 18:5 Dauda ka, kǝ kum lidǝmba a koya puro male andǝ amǝ'lwa aban ká a koya ban mǝnana kat Sawul túrí kàm ngga; acemani ka, Sawul tsǝk Dauda a bancame mǝgule amur amǝ'lwa. Sǝ mǝnia ka, pwasǝbum amǝ'lwa kat andǝ amǝgulo mala Sawul.
1SA 18:6 Lang amǝ'lwa na aban nyare a là, anzǝm mana Dauda walna ɓwa'Filisti ka, amamǝna purki arǝ alá mala Isǝrayila kat ace ká kúllí Murǝm Sawul nǝ nggyal andǝ nggwam. Banɓoaria wia sǝ à kǝ wal akarata-bu andǝ agir jerang malea.
1SA 18:7 Amamǝne kǝ pakkiɗire, sǝ à kǝ tu'nggyal ama, <<Sawul walna aá male, sǝ Dauda walna aá lum male!>>
1SA 18:8 Mǝnia ka tsǝk Sawul bumi lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ earce mǝno yì nggyal ka ɗàng. Na ama, <<À ɓwangsǝ Dauda nǝ aá lum, sǝ mim ngga, kǝ aá na à ɓwangsǝam nǝi ka. Mana ue ɗǝm nǝ̀ kumô ɓǝ̀ domurǝm na raka.>>
1SA 18:9 Twal a pwari mǝno aban ká dǝmba ka, Sawul tsǝk mǝsǝi arǝ Dauda nǝ mɓali andǝ nusǝban.
1SA 18:10 Ban fana ka, bangŋo mǝɓike pùr nǝban Ɓakuli, sǝ sulǝ amúr Sawul nǝ rǝcandǝa. Sǝ kútí a pàkkiagir kǝla mǝɓanggya aɓa ɓala male, sǝ Dauda na aban wal jerang male kǝla mana pàkkiyi pwari-pwari ka. Sawul ka ndanǝ nzo male a bui.
1SA 18:11 Sawul pakɗenyicau a bumi ama, <<Mǝ nǝ tǝm Dauda nǝ nzo, mǝ nǝ laptǝi arǝ bum-sheran,>> pǝlǝa túr nzo arǝ Dauda. Sǝama Dauda vwaki, api wi kusǝ ɓari.
1SA 18:12 Sawul ɓanggi Dauda, acemǝnana Yahweh na atà Dauda, sǝ Yahweh ka nyìngŋǝ̀nà Sawul.
1SA 18:13 Acemani ka, Sawul pusǝ Dauda arǝ came a ɓadǝmbi, sǝ tsǝi pǝlǝ mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amúr amǝ'lwa á-mwashat. Sǝ Dauda gingnǝ amǝ'lwa arǝ amunǝo.
1SA 18:14 Dauda kum lidǝmba aɓa koya gìr mǝnana pàkkiyi ka, acemǝnana Yahweh na atè.
1SA 18:15 Lang Sawul sǝni ama Dauda kǝ kum lidǝmba kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka, ɓangciu pàkki wi arǝì kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 18:16 Sǝama Isǝrayila andǝ aɓwana mala Yahuda kat earce Dauda, acemǝnana yì nda mǝnana kǝ̀ cambia wia a dǝmba sǝ kǝ gingnǝia ace pur ká lwa andǝ nyare ka.
1SA 18:17 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi Dauda ama, <<Sǝni, ɓoarnsarilem, Merap nia ka. Ən nggǝ earce nǝma mǝ nǝ po wi wu ali; kǝ gìr mana ǝn earkiyice nǝ we ka, nda mana ama wu dum nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa acem, sǝ wu lwa-lwa mala Yahweh.>> Sawul bang anggo acemǝnana nana a ɓabumi ama, <<Pà mǝ nǝ wal-lú Dauda nǝ nggearam ɗàng. Ɓǝ̀ bù amǝ'Filisti pàk mǝno!>>
1SA 18:18 Sǝ Dauda banggi Sawul ama, <<Mǝ nda yana? Ayana nda ka aɓǝla mem ko nggurkwar mala tárrám a Isǝrayila, mǝnana mǝ nǝ duk nkil murǝm ngga?>>
1SA 18:19 Lang pwari pàngŋǝ́nà mǝnana à nǝ̀ pa Merap, ɓoarnsarile Sawul aban Dauda ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ali ka, Sawul twal ɓoarnsarile pè Adǝriyel ɓwa Mehola.
1SA 18:20 Adyan ngga, Mikal ɓoarnsarile Sawul kǝ earce Dauda. Lang à banggi Sawul cê ka, banɓoari wi.
1SA 18:21 Sawul pàk ɗenyicau ama, <<Mǝ nǝ pè Dauda ɓoarnsarilem Mikal, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ duk gbǝli a baní, sǝ ɓǝ̀ bù amǝ'Filisti pǝlǝa arǝì ka.>> Nda Sawul banggi Dauda ama, <<Adyan ngga, a ndanǝ ɓaria dǝmbu mala duk nkilam.>>
1SA 18:22 Pǝlǝa Sawul ne amǝtúró male ama, <<Wu banggi Dauda aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa ama, <Sǝni, Murǝm ngga banɓoari wi arǝò, sǝ amǝtúró male kat ka, à kǝ̀ earceo. Adyan ngga, duk nkil murǝm.> >>
1SA 18:23 Sǝ amǝtúró mala Sawul wario à kya ne Dauda amǝnia yì acau ka aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa. Dauda banggia wia ama, <<Wu kǝ sǝni ama gìr mǝkyauwe na ɓǝ̀ ɓwa duk nkil murǝm le? Mim ngga, mǝ nda mǝtǝ̀r, sǝ aɓwe kǝ twalam nǝ gulo ɗàng!>>
1SA 18:24 Sǝ amǝtúró mala Sawul nyare, à yi ne Sawul cau mǝnana Dauda bang ngga.
1SA 18:25 Pǝlǝa Sawul na ama, <<Wu banggi Dauda ama, <Murǝm kǝ earce kǝ gǝna ɗang. Gìr mana murǝm earkiyice ka, nda nggú-ɓata amǝ'Filisti gbǝman-mwashat, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ duk mbweban akúnì arǝ aɓi-mǝbura mala murǝm.> >> Adyan ngga, Sawul kǝ twali ama nǝ̀ gandǝ wal-lú Dauda nǝ bù amǝ'Filisti.
1SA 18:26 Lang amǝtúró mala Sawul banggi Dauda amǝnia yì acau ka, banɓoari wi, sǝ ear ama nǝ̀ duk nkil murǝm. Sǝ kaniama pwari mǝnana à tsǝkî Dauda nǝ̀ yia bik ka,
1SA 18:27 Dauda lo wario, atārǝia andǝ aburana male, sǝ à kya wal-lú amǝ'Filisti gbǝman-ɓari. Dauda yinǝ aggú-ɓatea, sǝ yi pè murǝm, kǝla mana làkkì malea pàk ka, ace mǝnana nǝ̀ duk bura ɓoarnsarile murǝm ngga. Pǝlǝa Sawul twal ɓoarnsarile, yì Mikal, pè Dauda ɓǝ̀ duk māmí.
1SA 18:28 Lang Sawul sǝni sǝ sǝlǝ ama Yahweh na atà Dauda, sǝ ɗǝm ngga ɓoarnsarile Mikal earce Dauda ka,
1SA 18:29 ɓangciu mǝnana Sawul ndanǝi arǝ Dauda ka, yi gul kàm kpǝm; sǝ twal a pwari mǝno ka, pǝlǝ ɓibura mala Dauda aɓalǝ anonggio kat.
1SA 18:30 Sǝ amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti camarǝ pur lwa arǝ Isǝrayila; sǝ a koya munǝo ka, Dauda kum lidǝmba kútì acili amǝgulo mala amǝ'lwa mala Sawul kat. Sǝ mǝnia ka, tsǝa lullǝ Dauda zǝ́kí.
1SA 19:1 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan andǝ amǝtúró male kat, ama ɓǝà wal-lú Dauda. Sǝama Jonatan ngga kǝ̀ earce Dauda kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 19:2 Sǝ Jonatan ne Dauda ama, <<Tárrám Sawul kǝ alte nǝ̀ wal-luio. Acemani ka, ida tsǝkiro liwi nǝ dǝmbari. Alta ban sǝmbǝrǝa, do a banì.
1SA 19:3 Mǝ nǝ puro, sǝ mǝ nǝ cam a nkanggari tárrám a patal, a ban mǝnana a nda kam ngga. Mǝ nǝ banggi tárrám cau amuro. Sǝ cau mǝnana kat ǝn ok ka, mǝ nǝ banggo.>>
1SA 19:4 Nda Jonatan ne tárrí cau mǝɓoarne amúr Dauda ka. Banggi wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ murǝm ɓǝ̀kǝa pàkki guro male Dauda cauɓikea ɗàng, acemǝnana pàkkô cauɓikea ɗàng. A kún mani ka, agir mǝnana peǎ ka à yinanǝ mǝɓoarne a bano.
1SA 19:5 Twal yilǝmi a kún bui lang wal-lú ɓwa'Filisti, sǝ Yahweh pè Isǝrayila kat nggea limurǝm ngga. We nǝ nggearǝo ka a sǝni sǝ banɓoaro. Palang sǝ awu nǝ pàk cauɓikea arǝ nkila mala mǝ'kunpwasǝa, nǝ wal-lú Dauda mǝnana pàkkô kǝ mǝɓane raka?>>
1SA 19:6 Pǝlǝa Sawul kwakikiri arǝ cau mala Jonatan, sǝ kángir ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, à pà nǝ̀ wal-lú Dauda ɗàng.>>
1SA 19:7 Nda Jonatan tunǝ Dauda sǝ ne wi acau mǝnia kat ka. Pǝlǝa Jonatan yinǝ Dauda aban Sawul, sǝ Dauda lidǝmba nǝ pàkkî Sawul túró kǝla mǝnana a dǝmbe ka.
1SA 19:8 Munǝo lo ɗǝm anre ka amǝ'Filisti andǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila. Sǝ Dauda puro oa munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti, sǝ walia nǝ nggea walban, gandǝa amǝ'Filisti ɓanggi wi.
1SA 19:9 Pǝlǝa ɓè bangŋo mǝɓike pùr nǝban Yahweh sǝ sulǝ amúr Sawul. Sawul naban dumnǝdo a ɓala male nǝ nzo male a buì, sǝ Dauda ka ndaban wal jerang.
1SA 19:10 Pǝlǝa Sawul ɓariki ama nǝ̀ tǝm Dauda nǝ nzo, nǝ̀ laptǝi arǝ bumkurǝm, sǝama Dauda vwaki, sǝ putǝlì ɓadǝm Sawul, sǝ nzo wario kya tǝm bumkurǝm. Nǝ du mala pwari mǝno ka, Dauda ɓangŋa auwa.
1SA 19:11 Sawul tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân a ɓala mala Dauda ace mǝnana ɓǝà tsǝkmǝsǝia arǝì, sǝ ɓǝà wal-lui nǝ dǝmbari. Pǝlǝa Mikal mālá Dauda, banggi wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a ɓangŋa a amsǝ yilǝmo nǝ dù man raka, liwi ka, à nǝ̀ wal-luio!>>
1SA 19:12 Nda Mikal sulǝ Dauda a nzali nǝban mǝsǝkurǝm, pǝlǝa ɓangŋa o auwa.
1SA 19:13 Pǝlǝa Mikal twal ɓǝ̀nzál, sǝ nongsǝi amúr kpamgbang-nongŋo. Sǝ tsǝki wi gìr-loasǝmúrû mala nyang mbul a ban ɓamuri, sǝ kumsǝi wi nggubyau.
1SA 19:14 Lang Sawul tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân ɓǝà kya bwal Dauda ka, Mikal nea wia ama, <<Dauda pà jam ɗàng.>>
1SA 19:15 Pǝlǝa Sawul nyesǝ amǝ'na-túrbân ama ɓǝà kya sǝn Dauda nǝ nggearǝia. Banggia wia ama, <<Wu twali wu yinǝam nǝi amúr kpamgbang-nongŋo male, ace mǝnana mǝ wal-luí ka.>>
1SA 19:16 Lang amǝ'na-túrbân wari ka, à kum ɓǝ̀nzál na aban nongŋo amúr kpamgbang-nongŋo andǝ gìr-loasǝmúrû mala nyang mbul a ban ɓamuri.
1SA 19:17 Sawul banggi Mikal ama, <<Palang sǝ a swarkiam anggo, sǝ a nying ɓiam-mǝbura ɓangŋa o?>> Mikal eari wi ama, <<Dauda banggam ama ɓǝ̀n bwali wi purî ɓala raka, nǝ̀ wal-luem.>>
1SA 19:18 Lang Dauda ɓangŋǝna sǝ auna ka, wari aban Samuyila a Rama, sǝ ne wi gìr mǝnana kat Sawul pàkki wi ka. Pǝlǝa yì andǝ Samuyila o, sǝ à kya do a Nayot.
1SA 19:19 Cau yiu aban Sawul ama, <<Sǝni, Dauda na a Nayot a Rama.>>
1SA 19:20 Nda Sawul tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân ɓǝ̀ à kya bwal Dauda. Sǝama lang à wari ka, à kya kum nggǝsan mala amǝɓangnǝa aban nakiacau ɓangnǝa, sǝ Samuyila nakam aban came abanì kǝla ɓwamǝgule amúrià. Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli sulǝ amúr amǝ'na-túrbân mala Sawul mǝno, sǝ à nacau ɓangnǝa gbal.
1SA 19:21 Lang à banggi Sawul gìr mǝnana kum amǝ'na-túrbân male ka, nyare Sawul tasǝ aɓea amǝ'na-túrbân, sǝ yià gbal ka à nacau ɓangnǝa. Sawul tasǝ tàruia amǝ'na-túrbân ɗǝm, sǝ yià gbal ka à kya kútí a nacau ɓangnǝa.
1SA 19:22 A masǝlǝate ka, Sawul lo nǝ nggearǝì wari a Rama. Lang yi bingŋǝna ban tūli-mùr mǝgule mǝnana a Seku ka, ɗìban ama, <<Samuyila andǝ Dauda na ke?>> À eari wi ama, <<À nda a Nayot, a Rama.>>
1SA 19:23 Pǝlǝa Sawul wari a Nayot a Rama. Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli sulǝ amurí gbal; kǝ nacau ɓangnǝa sǝ kǝ gya aban ká she lang yina a Nayot a Rama ka.
1SA 19:24 Yale swárki agir-nggūrǝì, sǝ nacau ɓangnǝa aɓadǝm Samuyila. Sawul nong gbǝrangtang aɓa pwari mǝno kat andǝ dù mǝno kat. Acemani ka, aɓwana ɗiban ama, <<Sawul gbal ka, nda aɓalǝ amǝɓangnǝa le?>>
1SA 20:1 Pǝlǝa Dauda ɓangŋa nying Nayot a Rama. Wari aban Jonatan sǝ ɗì ama, <<Mana ǝn pàk le? Ya cauɓikea na ǝn pa? A ya njar sǝ ǝn pàkki tárró cauɓikea mǝnana tsǝa sǝ ndaban alte ama nǝ̀ twal yilǝmem ngga?>>
1SA 20:2 Jonatan eari wi ama, <<Ɓakuli twalbani; a pà nǝ wù ɗàng! Tárrám kǝ banggam koya gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ pàk ka, ko mǝgule ko mǝkyauwe. Sǝ palang sǝ tárrám nǝ̀ sǝmbǝ́rǝàm cau mǝnia ka? Mǝnia yì cau ka, pa anggo ɗàng.>>
1SA 20:3 Sǝ Dauda na ama: <<Mǝsǝtacau ǝn kánbo, Tárró sǝlǝna ama, ǝn kumǝna earmúrú a bano, acemani ka pà nǝ̀ banggo cê ɗàng, acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ kǝa lulbumo raka. Sǝama ǝn nggǝ banggo, mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam, sǝ a nda nǝyilǝmu ka, twalkusǝu mwashat na anrem sǝnǝ lú!>>
1SA 20:4 Jonatan ne Dauda ama, <<Gìr mǝnana a banggam ngga, mǝ nǝ̀ pàkkô wi>>
1SA 20:5 Dauda banggi wi ama, <<Liwi ka lamsan mala Bǝsa Zongŋo na, sǝ dumǝnam púp mǝ nǝ do aban ligirlina atà murǝm a kpamgbang-lǐ male; sǝama ǝn nggǝ earce nǝma wu nyem mǝ kya sǝmbǝrǝ a patal, twal ado aban ká pwarikpǝra mala tàruia nongŋo.
1SA 20:6 Ɓǝ̀ tárró ɗiban amuram ngga, awu nǝ banggi wi ama, <Dauda zǝm njar abanam tsuk-tsuk ama mǝ ɗeki nǝ̀ ɓangŋa nǝ̀ ká a nggea-là male a Betalami, acemǝnana pà gìr'nkila mala koya pǝlǝa na kam ace amǝ'ɓala malea puppup.>
1SA 20:7 Ɓǝ̀ bang ama, <Mǝɓoarne na> ka, lǝmdǝ ama guro mo pà aɓa ká-mǝɓane ɗàng. Sǝama ɓǝ̀ bumi lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka, sǝlǝ ama shamna nǝ̀ pàkkam mǝɓane.
1SA 20:8 Ace mani ka, awu nǝ̀ lǝmdǝam, mim guro mò, pěmǝɓoarne, acemǝnana a yina nǝi aɓa kùrcau nǝ we aɓadǝm Yahweh. Ɓǝ̀ mǝ ndanǝ cauɓikea amuram ngga, we nǝ nggearǝo ka wal-luim, kǝa kyan nǝ mim aban tárró ɗàng.>>
1SA 20:9 Jonatan ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli twalbani! Ɓǝ̀ ǝn sǝlǝ ama tárrám shamna nǝ̀ wal-luio ka, pà mǝ nǝ banggo re?>>
1SA 20:10 Osso Dauda ɗì Jonatan ama, <<Yana nǝ̀ banggam, ɓǝ̀ tárró nyesǝô cau nǝ bumlulla ka?>>
1SA 20:11 Jonatan banggi Dauda ama, <<Yiu ɓǝ̀ sǝm o a patal.>> Lang à warina a patal ka,
1SA 20:12 Jonatan banggi Dauda ama, <<Yahweh Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila nǝ̀ duk mǝ'nakún mem. Liwi nǝ bu-pwari kǝla man ko liawo ka, mǝ nǝ nacau nǝ tárrám ace súrǝ̀ mana nda ɗenyicau male amuro. Ɓǝ̀ tárrám ngga ndanǝ ɓabum mala lǝmdǝo earmúrú ka, mǝ nǝ túrban nǝ cau ɓǝà banggo.
1SA 20:13 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ tárrám nanǝ ɓabum mala pakko mǝɓane ka, ɓǝ̀ Yahweh ɓashiam, yì mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ǝn banggo cè, sǝ ǝn tasǝo a o aɓa dorǝpwala raka. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh pa atò kǝla mǝnana pà atà tárrám ngga.
1SA 20:14 Ado mǝnana mǝ ndanǝ yilǝmu piu ka, lǝmdǝam pěmǝɓoarne aɓa earcearǝu mala Yahweh; sǝ ɓǝ̀ ǝn wú ka,
1SA 20:15 a pà wunǝ tamsǝ lǝmdǝì ɓala mem mǝnia yì pěmǝɓoarne ka ɗàng tàtǝ́k; awo, ko anzǝm mǝnana Yahweh twalnata aɓio-mǝbura kàng a ɓanza ka, ɓǝ̀ lidǝmba.>>
1SA 20:16 Nda Jonatan kùrcau nǝ ɓala mala Dauda, sǝ bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh sulǝ ɓashi male amur aɓiu-mǝbura mala Dauda.>>
1SA 20:17 Jonatan nyare kùrcau ɗǝm nǝ Dauda atàcau mala earcearǝu mǝnana ndanǝi arǝì ka. Yale Jonatan earce Dauda kǝla mǝnana earce yilǝmi ka.
1SA 20:18 Jonatan ne wi ama, <<Liwi ka nda lamsan mala Bǝsa Zongŋo; à nǝ̀ alto sǝ à pà nǝ̀ sǝno ɗàng, acemǝnana buno mô ka nǝ̀ nong atàrǝì.
1SA 20:19 Liawo ka, awu nǝ̀ nyar akaurǝa awu nǝ yiu a ban mǝnana a sǝmbǝrǝ kam, a pwari mǝnana gìr mǝnia kat ka tite nǝi ka. Awu nǝ sǝmbǝrǝ a nkanggari tali Ezel.
1SA 20:20 Mǝ nǝ̀ túr amundi tàrú a ban talî, kǝla ɓè gìr na ǝn nggǝ earce tè ka.
1SA 20:21 Pǝlǝa mǝ nǝ túr muna ɓǝ̀ kya alamta amundinì. Ɓǝ̀ ǝn banggi wi ama, <Sǝni, amundinì na kana atà buo man ngga, pwania, sǝ wu nyare wu yiu> ka, ndaban lǝmdǝ ama awu nǝ auwa, sǝ kǝgìr mǝɓane pà nǝ̀ peo ɗang, mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga.
1SA 20:22 Sǝama ɓǝ̀ ǝn banggi muna ama, <Sǝni, amundinì ndako a dǝmba nǝ we> ka, lo o. Mǝno ka ndaban lǝmdǝ ama Yahweh tasǝnato wu o.
1SA 20:23 Amúr cau mǝnana sǝm bangŋi sǝnǝ we ka, Yahweh nda mǝ'nakún anre sǝm tàtǝ́k.>>
1SA 20:24 Nda Dauda sǝmbǝrǝ a patal ka. Lang lamsan mala Bǝsa Zongŋo yina ka, murǝm yi dumnǝdo ace ligirlina.
1SA 20:25 Murǝm do a bando male mǝnana dukiyi kam pwari-pwari ka, a ban mǝnana nda arǝ bumkurǝm sǝ kǝ sǝn ɓamǝsǝarǝia andǝ bando mala Jonatan ngga; sǝ Abna ka nda a bando male a nkanggari Murǝm. Sǝama bando mala Dauda ka, kǝɓwa pà kàm ɗàng.
1SA 20:26 Kat andǝ amani ka, Sawul na kǝ cau a pwari mǝno ɗàng, acemǝnana pàk ɗenyicau ama, <<Earka ɓè gìr kumǝnaban mǝnana tsǝ̀ngŋǝ́nà Dauda nda aɓa ɓeami ka, ɓafo nda aɓa ɓeami.>>
1SA 20:27 Sǝama lang ban fana, a ɓaria nongŋo mala lamsan mala Bǝsa Zongŋo ka, bando mala Dauda ka ndakam piu atàrǝì. Sǝ Sawul ɗì muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan ama, <<Mana tsǝa sǝ muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi yiu a ligirlina yilung andǝ yalung ɗàng?>>
1SA 20:28 Jonatan earî Sawul ama, <<Dauda zǝmbam tsuk-tsuk ama mǝ pe wi njar nǝ̀ ká Betalami.
1SA 20:29 Banggam ama, <Earâm mǝ kyane, acemǝnana amǝ'ɓala ma'sǝm ndanǝ pà gìr'nkila a nggea-là ma'sǝm, sǝ mǝ'eambǝam ɓuaki arǝàm ama mǝ kyane. Adyan ngga, ɓǝ̀ ǝn kumǝna earmúrú a bano ka, nyem mǝ kyane, ace mǝnana mǝ kya sǝn amǝ'eambǝam ngga.> Mǝnia ka, nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ Dauda yiu a ligirlina mala murǝm raka.>>
1SA 20:30 Bum Sawul lul arǝ Jonatan, sǝ ne wi ama, <<We muna mala mā-bwena sǝ mā-gandǝban! Ən sǝlǝ mbak ama a twalna pù'atà muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi, ace pè nggó andǝ ɓamuro kǝsǝkya re?
1SA 20:31 Ɓǝ̀ muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi lidǝmba nǝdo nǝyilǝmu a ɓanza ka, a pà wunǝ duk murǝm ko awu nǝ yálmúr kǝ domurǝm ɗàng. Ado ka, tasǝ aburana ɓǝà kya yinǝam nǝi. Acemǝnana dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ wal-lui!>>
1SA 20:32 Jonatan nyesǝi tárrí cau ama, <<Man tsǝa sǝ à nǝ̀ wal-lui? Mana pàk le?>>
1SA 20:33 Pǝlǝa Sawul túr nzo arǝ Jonatan ama nǝ̀ tǝmi. Nda Jonatan sǝlǝa ama ɓafo tárrí shamna bumi ama nǝ̀ wal-lú Dauda ka.
1SA 20:34 Jonatan loapi ban ligirlina nǝ bumlulla. Li girlina a ɓaria pwari mala lamsan mala Bǝsa Zongŋo mǝno ɗàng, acemǝnana bumikiɗiki ace gìr kǝsǝkya mǝnana tárrí pàk arǝ Dauda ka.
1SA 20:35 Nǝ dǝmbari ka, Jonatan puro andǝ muna atè, sǝ à o patal ace je male andǝ Dauda.
1SA 20:36 Banggi muna ama, <<Ɓangŋa, kya alta amundi mǝnana ǝn túriá ka.>> Lang muna ɓangŋa nǝ̀ ká ka, Jonatan túr ɓè mundi a dǝmba nǝ mune.
1SA 20:37 Lang muna bingŋǝna ban mǝnana Jonatan túr mundi sǝ mundi kpa kam ngga, Jonatan loasǝ gì ne muna ama, <<Mundinì pà a dǝmba a ɓadǝmbo re?>>
1SA 20:38 Jonatan loasǝ gì banggi muna ama, <<Farǝo! Kya akaurǝa! Kǝa cam ɗàng!>> Muna mala Jonatan tàrki amundinì, sǝ nyar aban mǝtala-ɓala male.
1SA 20:39 (Sǝama muna súrǝ̀ kǝ cau amur gìr mǝnia ka ɗàng. Kǝ Jonatan andǝ Dauda na à súrǝ̀ gìr mana kǝ u ka.)
1SA 20:40 Pǝlǝa Jonatan pè muna nta andǝ amundi male, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Kyane, nyesǝ agir mǝnia ka a là.>>
1SA 20:41 Anzǝm mǝnana mune umna ka, Dauda purî ban mǝnana sǝmbǝrǝ kam a nkanggari ban ramba mala atali ka, kūndǝ nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali, sǝ timuri kusǝ tàrú. Pǝlǝa à kùr rǝarǝia zǝp, sǝ à ɓua. Ɓua mala Dauda kútì mala Jonatan.
1SA 20:42 Jonatan banggi Dauda ama, <<O aɓa dorǝpwala, acemǝnana sǝm kǝm ngga, sǝm kánagìr aɓa lullǝ Yahweh ama, <Yahweh nǝ̀ duk mǝ'nakún anrem sǝnǝ we, sǝ anre ka amuna sǝm andǝ amǝ'kà sǝm.> >> Pǝlǝa Dauda lo o, sǝ Jonatan nyar a là.
1SA 21:1 Pǝlǝa Dauda wari aban Ahimale pǝris mǝnana ndanǝdo a Nop ka. Ahimale pur nǝ rǝɓǝla ace kum Dauda, sǝ ɗi ama, <<Mana tsǝa sǝ a nda nǝmurǝo, sǝ kǝɓwa pà atò ɗàng?>>
1SA 21:2 Sǝ Dauda eari Ahimale, pǝris ama, <<Murǝm tasǝam ace túrô mǝnana ama mǝ pak ka, sǝ nam ama, <Kǝɓwa ɓǝ̀ kǝa sǝlǝce kǝ gìr amur túrô mǝnana ǝn tasǝo ace, sǝ ǝn no wu pak ka ɗàng. Alaggana mem ngga, ǝn bangŋǝnia wia ban mǝnana ɓǝà kyan kàm ngga.>
1SA 21:3 Ado ka, mana à ndanǝi a buo? Pam agbatali bǝredi tongno, ko gìr mǝnana kat a ndanǝi ka.>>
1SA 21:4 Pǝlǝa pǝris pè Dauda eare ama, <<Ən panǝ bǝredi mǝnana nda ace koyan ngga ɗàng, shekǝ bǝredi mǝnana nda ace Ɓakuli ka. Mǝ nǝ gandǝ po, ɓǝ̀ alaggana mô nong nǝ amamǝna adyan-tù raka.>>
1SA 21:5 Dauda eari pǝris ama, <<Aɓa mǝsǝcau, à tamsǝ sǝm arǝ amamǝna, aɓalǝ anongŋo tàrú mǝnia ka, kǝla mǝnana sǝm pakkiyi ka. A koya pwari sǝ ǝn pur ka, alaggana mem kǝ pǝndǝki rǝia nǝ amamǝna ɗang, ko ɓǝ̀ twalbǝri ma'sǝm ngga, mǝfele na raka. Sǝ mǝnia yalung mǝnana twalbǝri ma'sǝm ngga, mala túrô mǝfele na ka, à pà nǝ̀ pǝndǝki rǝia ɗàng!>>
1SA 21:6 Nda pǝris pe wi bǝredi mǝfele ka, acemǝnana kǝ ɓè bǝredi pà kàm abanì ɗàng, shekǝ bǝredi mala Ɓadǝm Yahweh, mǝnana à pusǝì a ɓadǝm Yahweh, a pwari mǝnana à twali sǝ à nggaɗi nǝ bǝredi mǝnana bǝsa na arǝì ka.
1SA 21:7 Ɓè ɓwabura aɓalǝ aguro mala Sawul na kam a banì a mǝno yì pwari ka; à kasǝkuni aɓadǝm Yahweh. Lùllǝì nda Dowe ɓwa'Edom. Nda múr ayálgír mala Sawul.
1SA 21:8 Dauda banggi Ahimale ama, <<A ndanǝ nzo ko nggeabyau kani a buo le? Ən yinǝ nggeabyau mem ko ɓè kǝ girbura mem ɗang, acemǝnana túrô mǝnana murǝm túrǎm ɓǝn pe ka, kǝ earce ama ɓǝà pè tsuk-tsuk.>>
1SA 21:9 Pǝlǝa pǝris ear ama, <<Nggeabyau mala Golaya ɓwa'Filisti mana a wal-luí a Ɓangŋaban Ela ka, ndakani; à marǝki nǝ nggurbyau sǝ à tsǝi anzǝm efot. Ɓǝ̀ a kǝ earce ka, twali, acemǝnana ɓè kǝ nggeabyau pa akani ɗang shekǝ mǝno.>> Sǝ Dauda bang ama, <<Kǝ ɓè pa kǝla yì ɗang, pami.>>
1SA 21:10 Pǝlǝa Dauda lo, ɓanggi ban Sawul a mǝno yi pwari ka. O aban Akish murǝm Gat.
1SA 21:11 Amǝ'túró mala Akish ne wi ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda Dauda, murǝm mala nzalinì re? Yì nda ɓwa mǝnana à tu'nggyal nǝ akiarǝia aɓa nggwam, à kǝ na ama: <<Sawul walna á-á male, sǝ Dauda walna á-á lum male ka re?>>
1SA 21:12 Sǝ Dauda tsǝk acau mǝnia ka a ɓabumi, sǝ ɓangciu bwali kǝ̀rkǝ́r arǝ Akish, murǝm Gat.
1SA 21:13 Nggaɗi ɓeali aɓadǝmbia, sǝ acemǝnana nda a ɓabuia ka, ɓosǝki rǝì kǝla mǝmúrpǝlǝa, kǝ cangi rǝ akún bankutio, sǝ nying ntāra kúni kǝ solǝ a mbotakuni.
1SA 21:14 Pǝlǝa Akish ne amǝ'túró male ama, <<Wu sǝni, ɓwabure ka ɓanggina! Mana tsǝa sǝ wu yinǝi abanam?
1SA 21:15 Ən ɗwanyi amǝɓanggya sǝ wu yinǝam nǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka ɓǝ̀ kǝ pakki agir kǝla mǝɓanggya aɓadǝmbam le? Dumǝna púp ama mǝnia yì ɓwa ka nǝ̀ yiu a ɓala mem le?>>
1SA 22:1 Pǝlǝa Dauda nying Gat, sǝ ɓangŋa o a npu mala Adullam. Lang amǝ'eambi andǝ amǝ'ɓala mala tárrí kat ok cè ka, à wari kano a baní.
1SA 22:2 Aɓwana mana kat à nda aɓata parban, ko nǝ tangna amúrià, ko amana bumia pwasǝ raka, à wario, à ram rǝia a baní, sǝ duk mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amúrià. Ndanǝ aburana kǝla gbǝman-ine atè.
1SA 22:3 Sǝ Dauda loapi ban mǝno ka, o a Mizpa a nzali Mowap. Akano ka, banggi murǝm Mowap ama, <<Ida, earâm ɓǝ ǝn nying tárrám andǝ nggem ɓǝà duk kani atò, she ɓǝ̀n súrǝ́nà rǝ gir mǝnana Ɓakuli nǝ pa acem ngga.>>
1SA 22:4 Nda Dauda nyia à do atà murǝm mala Mowap ka; à do atè arǝ apwari mǝnana kat Dauda na aban sǝmbǝrǝ a ban-mǝcandǝe ka.
1SA 22:5 Pǝlǝa mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli, mana à tunǝki ama Gad ka, banggi Dauda ama, <<Kǝa duk kani a ban-mǝcandǝe ɗàng. Lo o aɓa nzali Yahuda.>> Nda Dauda nying banì, sǝ o a ndà-nggun a Heret ka.
1SA 22:6 Adyan ngga, Sawul yi ok ama, ban mǝnana Dauda andǝ aɓwana male na kam ngga, à kumǝni. A pwari mǝno ka Sawul na aban dumnǝdo, nǝ nkongŋo a buì, a tǝr nggun zāmbo, amur ɓè mgbangban a Gibiya, atārǝia andǝ amǝgulo male kat, aban came a nkanggari.
1SA 22:7 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggia wia ama, <<Wu kwakikir wun, wun aburana mala Benjami! Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi nǝ̀ pè koyan atà wun ngga aɓaban-rya andǝ aɓaban mala anggun-anap le? Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla nǝ̀ tsǝk wun kat, wun nǝ̀ duk amǝdǝmba mala aɓwana á-pas andǝ amǝdǝmba mala aɓwana gbǝman-pas le?
1SA 22:8 Mǝnia ka, nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ wu kpapikunarǝ wun amuram ngga re? Ko kǝ ɓwa mwashat banggam, lang muna-ɓwabura mem kurkunarǝia andǝ muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi ka ɗàng. Yale kǝ ɓwa pà kàm atà wun mana kǝ ɗenyinǝ mim, ko nǝ̀ banggam ama, muna-ɓwabura mem soakita mǝturo mem ɓǝ̀ kùmsǝ arǝàm, amur njar, kǝla mana kǝ pàk yalung ngga ɗàng.>>
1SA 22:9 Pǝlǝa Dowe, ɓwa'Edom, mana nda aban came atà amǝgulo mala Sawul ka, bang ama: <<Ən sǝn muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi, yiu aban Ahimale, muna-ɓwabura mala Ahitup mana a Nop ka.
1SA 22:10 Pǝlǝa Ahimale ɗì Yahweh ace súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana Dauda nǝ̀ pàk ka; ɗǝm ngga pè wi girlina, andǝ nggeabyau mala Golaya, ɓwa'Filisti.>>
1SA 22:11 Pǝlǝa murǝm túrban ɓǝà tunǝ pǝris Ahimale, muna-ɓwabura mala Ahitup, andǝ aburana mǝnana kat amǝɓala male na, sǝ à nda ka apǝris a Nop ka. Sǝ yia kat ka, à yiu aban murǝm.
1SA 22:12 Pǝlǝa Sawul bang ama, <<Kwakikiro ado, we muna-ɓwabura mala Ahitup.>> Pǝlǝa yì ka, pa eare ma, <<E, ɓwamǝgule mem.>>
1SA 22:13 Sawul banggi wi ama, <<Palang sǝ wu kpapikunarǝ wun amuram, we, wunǝ mǝno yì muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi ka. A pe wi girlina andǝ nggeabyau, sǝ a ɗì Ɓakuli aceì, mǝnana tsǝa longŋǝna arǝàm ace kùmsǝâm, kǝla mǝno kǝ pàk yalung ngga?>>
1SA 22:14 Pǝlǝa Ahimale pe murǝm eare ama, <<Yana atà amǝtúró mô kat, mǝnana ndanǝ mǝsǝcau kǝla Dauda, mana nda nkil murǝm, sǝ nda ɓwamǝgule amur amǝ'yáltò, sǝ à kǝ twali nǝ gulo a ɓala mò ka?
1SA 22:15 Sǝ mǝno yi pwari ka, nda pwari mana ǝn tita ɗì Ɓakuli aceì ka le? Awo, ɓǝ̀ murǝm ɓǝkǝa tsǝki guro male cau arǝì ko arǝ kǝ ɓwa atà amǝɓala mala tárrí ɗàng. Mim guro mò ka, ǝn súrǝ̀ kǝgir amur mǝnia yì gìr kat ka ɗàng, ko bǝti.>>
1SA 22:16 Sǝ murǝm ngga, bang ama, <<Dumǝna púp, awu nǝ wǔ, we Ahimale, andǝ amǝɓala mala tárró kat!>>
1SA 22:17 Osso murǝm banggi amǝ'yáltè mana à cam a nkanggari ka, ama, <<Wu pǝlǝ rǝ wun, wu wal-luia, yia apǝris mala Yahweh, acemǝnana yia gbal ka, buia na atà Dauda! À sǝlǝna ama, kǝ ɓang nǝ ɓangŋa, sǝ à banggam ɗàng.>> Sǝama, amǝtúró mala murǝm ear ama, à nǝ̀ loasǝ buia, à nǝ̀ wal apǝris mala Yahweh ɗàng.
1SA 22:18 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi Dowe ama, <<Pǝlǝ rǝo, wal apǝris.>> Nda Dowe, ɓwa'Edom, pǝlǝa sǝ wal apǝris. Wal-lú aburana lumi-tongno-nong-tàrú-bwamdǝ-tongno (85), mana à oasǝ efot mala nggubyau linǝn arǝia ka.
1SA 22:19 Ɗǝm ngga Sawul wal-lú aɓwana mǝnana à ndanǝdo a Nop, nggea-là mala apǝris ka, nǝ kún nggeabyau: aburana andǝ amamǝna, amuna andǝ abangna-muna, andǝ andá, andǝ amǝdambǝriso, andǝ anzur andǝ ambul; yià kat ka, wal-luia nǝ kún nggeabyau.
1SA 22:20 Sǝama, mwashat atà amuna-burana mala Ahimale, muna-ɓwabura mala Ahitup mana à tunǝki ama Abiyata ka, ɓangŋa auwa, o atà Dauda.
1SA 22:21 Sǝ Abiyata kya banggi Dauda ama, Sawul walna-lú apǝris mala Yahweh.
1SA 22:22 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi Abiyata ama, <<Lang ǝn sǝn Dowe, ɓwa'Edom, a mǝno yì ban a pwari mǝno ka, ǝn sǝlǝa nǝma mbak-kàngkàng, nǝ̀ nggá ne Sawul. Ado ka, mǝ nda ǝn tsǝa, sǝ à wal-lú aɓwana kat a ɓala mala tárró ka.
1SA 22:23 Duk kani atàm; cè ɓangciu pàkkô ɗàng. Ɓwa mǝnana kǝ earce ama nǝ̀ wal-luio ka, ndaban ɓariki nǝ̀ wal-luem gbal. We ka, awu nǝ kum auwa abanam.>>
1SA 23:1 Aɓwana banggi Dauda ama, <<Sǝni, amǝ'Filisti naban munǝo arǝ nggea-là Keyila, sǝ à ndaban iu mǝssa arǝ akatǝra.>>
1SA 23:2 Nda Dauda ɗì Yahweh ama, <<Mǝ kya munǝ arǝ amǝ'Filisti le?>> Sǝ Yahweh ne Dauda ama, <<Kyane, wal amǝ'Filisti, sǝ wu amsǝ Keyila.>>
1SA 23:3 Sǝama aburana mala Dauda ne wi ama, <<Sǝni, akani aɓa Yahuda ka, sǝm nda aɓa ɓangciu. Gìrnî nǝ̀ ɓikipa ɓǝ̀ sǝm o a Keyila nǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti ka!>>
1SA 23:4 Pǝlǝa Dauda nyar ɗǝm alta nê mala Yahweh amúr cê. Sǝ Yahweh nyare banggi Dauda ama, <<Lo, kya a Keyila, acemǝnana Mǝ nǝ túr amǝ'Filisti a ɓabuo.>>
1SA 23:5 Nda Dauda andǝ aburana male wari a Keyila, sǝ à munǝ-munǝo andǝ amǝ'Filisti. Dauda wal amǝ'Filisti nǝ walban mǝgule, sǝ à pwan agirkusǝu malea. Anggo sǝ Dauda amsǝ aɓwana mana à ndanǝdo a Keyila ka.
1SA 23:6 (Adyan ngga Abiyata muna-ɓwabura mala Ahimale ka ɓangŋǝna yina aban Dauda a Keyila; yina nǝ efot a bui.)
