1SA 23:7 Aɓwana banggi Sawul ama Dauda yina a Keyila. Pǝlǝa Sawul na ama, <<Ɓakuli túrnì a ɓabuam; acemǝnana kasǝnakun ɓamúrì nǝ kutio male a nggea-là mǝnana ndanǝ akúnla mana à peǎ nǝ agara-bolo ka.>>
1SA 23:8 Acemani ka, Sawul tunǝ amǝ'lwa male kat, sǝ banggia wia ama, ɓǝà kya a Keyila, ɓǝà gumbǝli Dauda andǝ aburana male.
1SA 23:9 Lang Dauda ok ama Sawul naban kanì mǝɓike arǝì ka, ne Abiyata pǝris ama, <<Yinǝ efot kani!>>
1SA 23:10 Pǝlǝa Dauda pakhiwi ama, <<We Yahweh, Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila, mim guro mò ka, ǝn ongŋǝna ama mbak-kàngkàng Sawul naban alte nǝ̀ yiu a Keyila ace kiɗiki nggea-lê, atàcau mem.
1SA 23:11 Aɓwana mala Keyila nǝ̀ túrǎm a ɓabui le? Sawul nǝ̀ yiu kǝla mana mim guro mò ok ka le? We Yahweh Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila, ida banggam mim guro mò!>> Pǝlǝa Yahweh pe wi eare ama, <<Sawul nǝ̀ yiu.>>
1SA 23:12 Dauda ɗì Yahweh ama, <<Aɓwana mala Keyila nǝ̀ túrǎm sǝnǝ aburana mem a ɓabù Sawul le?>> Pǝlǝa Yahweh eari wi ama, <<À nǝ̀ túr wun a ɓabui.>>
1SA 23:13 Nda Dauda andǝ aburana male mǝnana lakkì malea na kǝla gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat (600) ka, à lo sǝ à nying Keyila; à gali arǝ abân mǝnana kat à gandǝ wari kam ngga. Lang à banggi Sawul ama Dauda ɓangŋǝna nyingŋǝna Keyila ka, tamsǝ ká male abanì.
1SA 23:14 Dauda do aɓalǝ ampù a ɓabondo, sǝ ueo aɓa nzali múr ankono a ɓabondo Zif. Sawul camarǝ alta Dauda koya pwari, sǝ Ɓakuli ka, túr Dauda a ɓabuì ɗàng.
1SA 23:15 Lang Dauda na a Horesh a ɓabondo Zif ka, ok ama Sawul purna ace alte nǝ̀ twal yilǝmi.
1SA 23:16 Sǝ Jonatan muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul lo wari aban Dauda a Horesh, sǝ ɓakɓabum Dauda ɓǝ̀ kum rǝcandǝa nǝban Ɓakuli.
1SA 23:17 Banggi wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓangciu ɓǝkǝa pakko ɗàng! Acemǝnana bù tárrám Sawul pà nǝ̀ kumo ɗang. Awu nǝ yálmúr Isǝrayila, sǝ mǝ nǝ duk mǝkwaɗito. Ko tárrám Sawul nǝnggearǝì ka, sǝlǝna mǝnia ka.>>
1SA 23:18 Sǝ yià mǝnia ɓari ka, à kùrcau aɓadǝm Yahweh; Dauda ueo a Horesh, sǝ Jonatan o a là.
1SA 23:19 Pǝlǝa amǝ'Zif wari aban Sawul a Gibiya sǝ à ne wi ama, <<Dauda pà aban sǝmbǝrǝa aɓalǝ sǝm aɓa mpù a Horesh, a mgbangban mala Hakila nǝ njar-kunmur mala Jeshimon re?
1SA 23:20 Adyan ngga, sulǝo yiu, we murǝm. A pwari mǝnana kat a earce ka, sulǝo yiu, sǝ sǝm ngga, sǝm nǝ̀ pàk gìr mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ pàk ka, sǝm nǝ̀ tasǝì a ɓabuo.>>
1SA 23:21 Sawul nyesǝia wia cau ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝka wun bù, acemǝnana wu lǝ́mdǝ́nàm pěmǝɓoarne.
1SA 23:22 Ida, wu kyane, wu ɓǝltacê pepè. Wu súrǝ̀, sǝ wu sǝn ban mǝnana kǝ wari kam ngga, andǝ yana sǝni abanì, acemana à bangŋǝ́nàm ama yì ka, mǝkutan na kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 23:23 Wu sǝni, sǝ wu súrǝ̀ abân-sǝmbǝrǝa mǝnana kat kǝ sǝmbǝrǝ kam ngga; sǝ wu nyar abanam nǝ mǝsǝrǝ cau. Pǝlǝa mǝ nǝ ká sǝnǝa wun. Ɓǝ̀ nda aɓa bu-nzali man ngga, mǝ nǝ bǝlkusǝi aɓalǝ anggurkwar mala Yahuda kat.>>
1SA 23:24 Nda aɓwana mǝno lo, sǝ à aki Sawul dǝmba aban ká a Zif ka. Adyan ngga, Dauda andǝ aburana male na a ɓabondo Mawon, a ɓawanban nǝ njar-kunmur mala Jeshimon.
1SA 23:25 Sawul andǝ aburana male wari a alta Dauda. Sǝ lang Dauda okce ka, ɓunno wari a ban mbisong, sǝ kya do a ɓabondo Mawon. Lang Sawul ok anggo ka, wari a ɓabondo Mawon ace pǝrta Dauda.
1SA 23:26 Sawul wari a buì mwashat mala nkono mana Dauda nakam ngga, sǝ Dauda andǝ aburana male ka, à nda a ɓè buì mala nkonoe. Dauda na aban farǝì nǝ̀ apî Sawul, acemǝnana Sawul andǝ aburana male ka, à ndaban ɓariki à nǝ̀ gumbǝli Dauda andǝ aburana male, ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ bwalia ka.
1SA 23:27 Sǝama ɓè mǝ'na-túrbân yiu aban Sawul ama, <<Yiu akaurǝa, acemǝnana amǝ'Filisti warina nǝ munǝo arǝ aɓwana aɓa nzali ma'sǝm!>>
1SA 23:28 Nda Sawul nying pǝ̀rta Dauda, sǝ nyare o aban munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti ka. Acemani ka, à tunǝ ban mǝno ama Sela Hamalekot.
1SA 23:29 Pǝlǝa Dauda loapi ban mǝno ka, sǝ o kya do aɓalǝ ampù a Engedi.
1SA 24:1 Lang Sawul nyàrǝ́nì pǝ̀rta amǝ'Filisti a munǝo ka, aɓwana banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni, Dauda na a ɓabondo Engedi.>>
1SA 24:2 Pǝlǝa Sawul twal aburana á-tàrú mǝnana tarkia aɓa Isǝrayila kat ka, sǝ o andǝ aburana male aban alta Dauda tù a ban atali mala ambul bondo.
1SA 24:3 Amur njar ka, yiu a ban adomwan mala anzur, sǝ abanì ka, ɓè gumi-ɓa'tali nakam. Sawul kuti aɓalǝi ace mǝnana nǝ̀ nongŋo ace usǝlǝ aulǝa ka. Sǝ a ɓaɓalǝu mala mǝno yì gumi-ɓa'tali ka, Dauda andǝ aburana male na kam aban sǝmbǝrǝa.
1SA 24:4 Sǝ aburana mala Dauda ne wi ama, <<Sǝni, man ngga nda pwari mǝnana Yahweh banggo ama, <Mǝ nǝ tasǝ ɓio-mǝbura a ɓabuo, sǝ awu nǝ pàkki wi gìr mana a sǝni nda ɓoarô ka.> >> Pǝlǝa Dauda lo eamdikiban sǝ kasǝ kún nggea-daura mala Sawul.
1SA 24:5 Nǝnzǝ́mò ka, ɓabum Dauda tùllì, acemǝnana kasǝ kún nggea-daura mala Sawul ka.
1SA 24:6 Dauda banggi aburana male ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh twalbani ɓǝ̀ mǝ nǝ pàkki ɓwamǝgule mem, mana Yahweh ɗārǝi ka, mǝnia yì gìr, ama mǝ nǝ loasǝ buam arǝì ka.>>
1SA 24:7 Anggo sǝ Dauda pwanɓabum aburana male nǝ amǝnia yì acau ka, sǝ earia wia à lo arǝ Sawul nǝ munǝo ɗàng. Pǝlǝa Sawul lo, purî gumi-ɓa'tali mǝno, sǝ bwal njar o.
1SA 24:8 Anzǝm mǝno ka, Dauda lo sǝ purî gumi-ɓa'tali. Loasǝ gì tunǝ Sawul ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm!>> Lang Sawul pǝlǝ mǝsǝi a nzǝmi ka, Dauda ɓun amúr ankūnǝi sǝ ti múrí a nzali.
1SA 24:9 Dauda banggi Sawul ama, <<Palang sǝ a kǝ kwakikiro arǝ acau mala aɓwana ama, <Dauda naban alte nǝ̀ pàkkô mǝɓane?>
1SA 24:10 A pwari mǝnia ka, a sǝnǝni nǝ mǝsǝo ama Yahweh tasǝo yalung a ɓabuam a gumi-ɓa'tali; aɓea aɓwana bang ama ɓǝ̀n wal-luio, sǝama ǝn nyio nǝyilǝmu. Ən bang nǝma, <Pà mǝ nǝ loasǝ buam arǝ ɓwamǝgule mem ɗàng, acemǝnana yì ka Yahweh ɗārǝi.>
1SA 24:11 Sǝni, tárrám, kún nggea-daura mô mana ǝn kasǝi ka, ndya a buam ngga! Lang ǝn kasǝ kún nggea-daura mô ka, ǝn wal-luio ɗàng. Acemani ka, sǝlǝa sǝ ɓǝ̀ kpako ama, ǝn pà aban kanì mǝɓane ko mgbicau ɗàng. Kat andǝ amani ama ǝn pakko cauɓikea raka, a ndaban kùmsǝâm ace twal yilǝmem.
1SA 24:12 Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh pàk ɓashi anrem sǝnǝ we, sǝ ɓǝ̀ Yahweh mbweo akúnì amǝɓane mǝnana a pakkam ngga, sǝama mim ngga buam pà nǝ̀ jeo nǝ mǝɓane ɗàng.
1SA 24:13 Nda kǝla cau pasǝlǝe mǝnana ɓara-ɓara ka ama, <Ɓealɓikea kǝ pur nǝban amǝ'ɓealɓikea.> Sǝama mim ngga, buam pà nǝ̀ jeo nǝ mǝɓane ɗàng.
1SA 24:14 Arǝ yana sǝ murǝm mala amǝ'Isǝrayila puro nǝ̀ ká munǝo? Ya ɓwa na a kǝ pǝrte? Atà luna nvwa! Atà nkungga!
1SA 24:15 Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh duk mǝɓashi sǝ ɓǝ̀ kasǝcau anrem sǝnǝ we. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh sǝngi ɓá cau mem sǝ ɓǝ̀ bǝlkunam, sǝ ɓǝ̀ amsǝam a ɓabuo!>>
1SA 24:16 Lang Dauda mal ne Sawul acau man ngga, Sawul na ama, <<Gio nda man le, munem Dauda?>> Kara Sawul loasǝ gì ɓua.
1SA 24:17 Sǝ banggi Dauda ama, <<Cauɓoarna mô kútí mem, acemǝnana a pàngŋǝ́nàm mǝɓoarne, kat andǝ amani ama ǝn pakko mǝɓike ka.
1SA 24:18 A bangŋǝna gìr mǝɓoarne mǝnana a pàkkam a pwari mǝnia yalung ngga; Yahweh túrǎm a ɓabuo, sǝama a wal-luim ɗàng.
1SA 24:19 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa kum ɓimǝbura ka, nǝ̀ nying ɓimǝbura ɓǝ̀ u jam le? Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh mbweo akúnì nǝ mǝɓoarne ace gìr mǝɓoarne mǝnana a pàkkam, a pwari man yalung ngga.
1SA 24:20 Sǝni, adyan ngga ǝn sǝlǝna ama mbak-kàngkàng awu nǝ̀ duk murǝm, sǝ domurǝm mala Isǝrayila ka, nǝ̀ kum kusǝ came pepè a ɓabuo.
1SA 24:21 Ado ka, kánbam aɓa lullǝ Yahweh ama a pà wu nǝ̀ wal-lú amunem andǝ amǝ'kem ɗàng, sǝ a pà wu nǝ esǝki lullǝam a ɓala mala tárrám ɗàng.>>
1SA 24:22 Nda Dauda kánbì Sawul ka. Pǝlǝa Sawul nyare o a là, sǝ Dauda andǝ aburana male nyare à o a ban sǝmbǝrǝa malea, a mpù.
1SA 25:1 Samuyila paklú sǝ Isǝrayila kat ramba abanɓwáná, à pak-bumkiɗikea aceì, sǝ à tsǝì a ɓala male a Rama. Pǝlǝa Dauda lo wari a ɓabondo Paran.
1SA 25:2 Ɓè ɓwabura nakam a Mawon mǝnana nggaliki male na a Kamel ka; ɓwabure ka mǝgǝna na kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Ndanǝ anzur á-tàrú andǝ ambul á-mwashat. A bàkú mǝno ka ndaban mwa nyang anzur male a Kamel.
1SA 25:3 Lullǝ ɓwabure nda Nabal, sǝ lullǝ māmí nda Abigiyel. Mǝnia yì ɓwama ka kwaro sǝ ɓoarnsari; sǝ ɓwabure ka mǝ'lullô na sǝ mǝ'ɓealɓana na. Yì ka mǝ'kà Kalip na.
1SA 25:4 Dauda ka nda a ɓabondo lang ok ama Nabal naban mwa nyang anzur male ka.
1SA 25:5 Pǝlǝa tasǝ alaggana lum, sǝ banggia wia ama, <<Wu kya a Kamel aban Nabal, sǝ wu makkìkun nǝ lullǝàm.
1SA 25:6 Pǝlǝa wun nǝ̀ banggi wi ama, <Ɓǝ̀ yilǝmo sauwa, sǝ ɓǝ̀ dorǝpwala pa atò, andǝ ɓala mò andǝ koman mǝnana kat a ndanǝi ka!
1SA 25:7 Ən ok ama aburana mò naban mwako nyang anzur mô. Mǝnana ayálgír mò na atà sǝm ngga, sǝm pàkkia wia mǝɓane ɗàng, sǝ aɓalǝ anonggio mǝnana kat à nda a Kamel ka, kǝgìr malea ɓwar ɗàng.
1SA 25:8 Ɗì ka alaggana mô, sǝ yià ka, à nǝ̀ banggo. Acemani ka, eare ɓǝ̀ alaggana mem kum earmúrú a mǝsǝo, acemǝnana sǝm yiu a pwari mala lilí-banɓoarnado. Ida, pè aguro mò andǝ munio Dauda gìr mǝnana a ndanǝi ado awu nǝ gandǝnǝ pea wia ka.> >>
1SA 25:9 Nda alaggana mala Dauda wario, sǝ à banggi Nabal acau mǝnia ka, aɓa lullǝ Dauda. Pǝlǝa à kúndǝô.
1SA 25:10 Sǝ Nabal earî alaggana mala Dauda ama, <<Yana nda Dauda, sǝ yana nda mǝnia yì muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi ka? Aɓalǝ anonggio mǝnia ka, amuna-ɓala nakam pas mǝnana à ɓangŋa à nying amǝtala-ɓala malea ka.
1SA 25:11 Palang sǝ mǝ nǝ twal bǝredi mem, andǝ mùr mem, andǝ nyama mem mǝnana ǝn wal ace amǝ'mwa nyang nzur mem, sǝ mǝ nǝ pè aburana mǝnana ǝn súrǝ̀ ban mana à pùr kam raka.>>
1SA 25:12 Nda alaggana mala Dauda wulio, à o sǝ à nyare à yi banggi wi acau mǝnia ka kat.
1SA 25:13 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi aburana male ama, <<Koya ɓwabura ka ɓǝ̀ kùr rǝi nǝ nggeabyau male!>> Nda sǝ koya ɓwabura ateà ka, kùr rǝi nǝ nggeabyau male. Dauda gbal ka kùr rǝi nǝ nggeabyau male. Aburana kǝla gbǝman-ine o atà Dauda, sǝ aburana gbǝman-ɓari ue ace ɗenyinǝ atwalo malea.
1SA 25:14 Sǝama mwashat aɓalǝ alaggana mala Nabal ne Abigiyel, mālá Nabal ama, <<Dauda tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân mǝnana à pur a ɓabondo ka ace makki mǝtala-ɓala ma'sǝm kún, sǝ mǝtala-ɓala ma'sǝm ngga sanggia.
1SA 25:15 Amǝnia yì aburana ka, à pàkka sǝm mǝɓoarne kǝ̀rkǝ́r; kǝgìr mǝɓane kum sǝm ɗàng, sǝ kǝgìr ma'sǝm ɓwàr ɗàng a bàkú mǝno kat à nda atà sǝm a bondo ka.
1SA 25:16 Dù andǝ pwari, à dupa sǝm sheran, a bàkú mǝno kat sǝm nda atarǝ sǝm sǝnǝia aban yál anzur ka.
1SA 25:17 Ado ka sǝlǝa, sǝ wu pakɗenyicau amur gìr mǝnana nda ɓoaro wu pàk ka, acemǝnana gir'murmwana nakam amúr mǝtala-ɓala ma'sǝm andǝ ɓala male puppup. Sǝ yì mǝtala-ɓala ma'sǝm ngga, mǝ'ɓealɓana na, mǝnana ɓwa pà nǝ̀ gandǝnǝ nacau nǝi raka.>>
1SA 25:18 Nda Abigiyel farǝì, sǝ twal agbatali bǝredi gbǝman-ɓari, andǝ mùr-anap bàng ɓari, andǝ nyam anzur tongno mǝnana à lambi ka, andǝ mǝssa mǝnana à kàngŋì ka tasau tongno, andǝ dangŋanshi ɓǝla-anap mǝ'ime gbǝman-mwashat, andǝ kyak mala ɓǝla vwari gbǝman-ɓari, sǝ nongsǝia a nzǝm amǝdambǝriso.
1SA 25:19 Pǝlǝa ne amǝtúró male ama, <<Wu akàm dǝmba wu kyane. Mǝ nǝ kpata wun.>> Sǝama banggi burí, Nabal ɗàng.
1SA 25:20 Lang Abigiyel naban o a nzǝm mǝdambǝriso male sǝ yi sulǝ a ɓangŋaban anre ka ankono ka, kara sǝn Dauda andǝ aburana male ndya à kǝ sulǝ aban yiu nǝbani ka, sǝ à yi je.
1SA 25:21 Dauda ka bangŋǝni aburana male ama, <<Mǝsǝcau, nda ɓà sǝ ǝn yál gìr mǝnana kat mala ɓwabura mǝnia na ka a ɓabondo. Kǝɓwa iu kǝgir mǝnana male na ka ɗàng, sǝ ado ka, nyesǝnàm mǝɓike a kúnì mǝɓoarne.
1SA 25:22 Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli ɓashiam kǝ̀rkǝ́r, mim Dauda, ɓǝ̀ li nǝ dǝmbari, ǝn nying ko ɓwabura mwashat nǝyilǝmu piu, atà aɓwana mǝnana amale na ka.>>
1SA 25:23 Lang Abigiyel sǝn Dauda ka, sulǝî nzǝm mǝdambǝriso akaurǝa, sǝ ɓunno sǝ ti múrí a nzali aɓadǝm Dauda.
1SA 25:24 Kpa a kusǝ Dauda, sǝ bang ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule mem, ɓǝ̀ cauɓikê pa amuram! Sǝama ida earâm, mim guro mò, mǝ nacau nǝ we! Kwakikiro arǝ cau mem, mim guro mò!
1SA 25:25 Ida, ɓwamǝgule mem, kǝa tsǝkiro arǝ mǝnia yì mǝ'ɓealɓana, yì Nabal ka ɗàng, acemǝnana kǝla mǝnana lùllǝì pàk ka, anggo sǝ yì gbal ka pa. Lùllǝì nda Nabal, sǝ gǝm ɓwa na; sǝama mim, guro mò ka, ǝn sǝn alaggana mǝnana we ɓwamǝgule mem, a tasǝ ka ɗàng.
1SA 25:26 <<Adyan ngga, ɓwamǝgule mem, mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam, sǝ a nda kam nǝyilǝmu ka, Yahweh nda mǝnana tamsǝo arǝ sukki nkila andǝ mbweban akúnì gìr mǝnana à pàkkô ka. Acemani ka, ɓǝ̀ aɓiomǝbura andǝ aɓwana mana à kǝ alta pàkkô mǝɓane ka, pà kǝla Nabal.
1SA 25:27 Adyan ngga, ɓwamǝgule mem, ak mǝnia yì ɓoro, mim guro mò ǝn yinǝi ka, ace mǝnana wu pè alaggana mǝnana à nda atò ka.
1SA 25:28 Ida twalî guro mò ban cauɓikea male. Mǝnia ka nda acemǝnana mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh ka, nǝ̀ tamsǝkusǝ ɓala mala ɓwamǝgule mem. Sǝ acemǝnana ɓwamǝgule mem na arǝ munǝ amunǝo mala Yahweh ka, ɓǝà kǝa kum kǝ mǝɓike aɓalǝo ɗàng aɓa do-yilǝmu mô kat.
1SA 25:29 Ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa lo ama nǝ̀ pǝrto ace twal yilǝmo ka, Yahweh Ɓakuli mô nǝ̀ mbuɓi yilǝmo aɓa luru yilǝmu male a baní. Sǝ yilǝmi aɓiomǝbura ka, nǝ̀ túrí kǝla túr tali nǝ ntamso.
1SA 25:30 Sǝ lang Yahweh pàngŋǝ́nì ɓwamǝgule mem koya gìr mǝɓoarne mǝnana pàcau ace amuro, sǝ twalǝno a dumǝna murǝm amúr Isǝrayila ka,
1SA 25:31 ɓwamǝgule mem pà nǝ̀ kum bumkiɗikea, ko múr-halǝkya ama a sukkina nkila mala amǝ'kunpwasǝa ko mala mbweban akúnì gìr mǝnana à pàkkô ka ɗàng. Sǝ lang Yahweh pano limurǝm ngga, ɗenyinǝ guro mò.>>
1SA 25:32 Pǝlǝa Dauda ne Abigiyel ama, <<Ɓwangsǝban ɓǝ̀ pa aban Yahweh, Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila, mǝnana tasǝo yalung ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm yi je ka!
1SA 25:33 Tsǝkbu ɓǝ̀ pa amúr kwaro mò! Sǝ ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝko bù, mǝnana a mgbaliam yalung arǝ sukki nkila, sǝ arǝ nyesǝ mǝɓane a kúnì mǝɓane ka.
1SA 25:34 Ɓǝ̀ ana raka, mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila nakam, mǝnana tamsǝam arǝ pakko mǝɓane ka, ɓǝ̀ a yiuma akaurǝa raka, ɓǝ́ kaniama ban nǝ̀ kwar ka, kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ ue nǝyilǝmu atà aburana mala Nabal ɗàng.>>
1SA 25:35 Pǝlǝa Dauda ak agir mǝnana Abigiyel yinǝi wi ka, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Nyare o a ɓala mò aɓa dorǝpwala. Sǝni, ǝn ongŋǝna cau mò, sǝ ǝn pano gìr mǝnana a zǝm ngga.>>
1SA 25:36 Lang Abigiyel nyar ka, yi kum Nabal ramna aɓwana a ɓala male aban lili-banɓoarnado, ulang lili-banɓoarnado mala amurǝma. Nabal ka ɓabumi na aɓa pakkiɗire sǝ mba-walni kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Acemani ka, Abigiyel ne wi kǝcau ɗàng she lang ban fana ka.
1SA 25:37 Nǝ dǝmbari lang Nabal nyarǝna aɓa hakkilo male ka, māmí Abigiyel banggi wi acau mǝnia kat; kara ɓabum Nabal tùmùr, yilǝmi o, sǝ shǐ kǝla tali.
1SA 25:38 Anzǝm nongŋo lum ngga, Yahweh koè, kara wǔ.
1SA 25:39 Lang Dauda ongŋǝna ama Nabal wuna ka, bang ama, <<Ɓwangsǝban ngga ɓǝ̀ pa aban Yahweh, mǝnana bǝlnakunam amúr gìr-kǝsǝkya mǝnana Nabal pàkkam, sǝ tamsǝnam, mim guro male, arǝ mǝɓike ka. Yahweh nyesǝ́nì Nabal túró-mǝɓike male a múrí.>> Pǝlǝa Dauda túrban sǝ bangcau nǝ Abigiyel, ace twale ɓǝ̀ duk māmí.
1SA 25:40 Lang amǝ'túró mala Dauda yiu aban Abigiyel a Kamel ka, à banggi wi ama, <<Dauda túr sǝm a bano, ama ɓǝ̀ sǝm kyan nǝ we a baní, wu pǝlǝ māmí.>>
1SA 25:41 Pǝlǝa Abigiyel lo, sǝ ɓun nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali, sǝ na ama, <<Mim guro mò ka, mǝ nda mǝtúró ace lakki akusǝ amǝtúró mala ɓwamǝgule mem.>>
1SA 25:42 Osso Abigiyel lo akaurǝa, wario sǝ kya eau a nzǝm mǝdambǝriso, sǝ tongno atà amuna-mamǝna amǝ'túró-ɓala male o atè. Abigiyel o atà amǝ'na-túrbân mala Dauda, sǝ pǝlǝ mālá Dauda.
1SA 25:43 Dauda ka angŋa-dǝmba alna Ahinowam, ɓwama Jezǝril; yià mǝno kǝm ngga, à pǝlǝ amālá Dauda.
1SA 25:44 (Adyan ngga, Sawul twalna muna-ɓwama male, yì Mikal mǝnana mālá Dauda na ka, pànî Paltiyel muna-ɓwabura mala Layish, ɓwa Gallim.)
1SA 26:1 Amǝ'Zif wari aban Sawul a Gibiya, sǝ à banggi wi ama, <<Dauda pà aban sǝmbǝrǝa amur muna-nkono Hakila, tù a ban Jeshimon re?>>
1SA 26:2 Nda Sawul lo sǝ sulǝo wari a ɓabondo Zif nǝ aburana á-tàrú mala Isǝrayila atè, ace alta Dauda a ɓabondo Zif.
1SA 26:3 Sawul tsǝk kàttì male amúr muna-nkono Hakila, mǝnana nda a nkanggari njargula a takuli mala Jeshimon ngga. Sǝ Dauda ka ue a ɓabondo. Lang sǝni ama Sawul yina atè a ɓabondo ace alte ka,
1SA 26:4 Dauda tasǝ amǝ'shenzǝban, sǝ à wario à kya bwalte ama mbak-kàngkàng Sawul yina.
1SA 26:5 Pǝlǝa Dauda lo sǝ wari a ban mǝnana Sawul bwal kàttì kam ngga; sǝ Dauda sǝn ban mǝnana Sawul andǝ Abna muna-ɓwabura mala Ner, yì mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'lwa male nong kàm ngga. Sawul ka nong a tsùrú mala kàttì sǝ amǝ'lwa male gumbǝli.
1SA 26:6 Dauda nacau nǝ Ahimale ɓwa'Hitti andǝ Abishai, muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya, mǝ'eam Jowap ama, <<Ya ɓwa na atà wun nǝ̀ ká atàm aban Sawul aɓa kàttì male?>> Abishai eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nǝ ká atò.>>
1SA 26:7 Nda Dauda andǝ Abishai wario sǝ à kya kúti a kàttì mala Sawul nǝ du, sǝ à sǝni ka, Sawul na a ntulo a tsùrú mala kàttì nǝ nzo male à kwaki a nzali, tù a ban ɓamuri. Sǝ Abna andǝ amǝ'lwa ka, à nongŋo à gumbǝlì aɓalǝu.
1SA 26:8 Abishai banggi Dauda ama, <<Yalung ngga, Yahweh túrna ɓiomǝbura a ɓabuo. Adyan ngga, ɗekiam mǝ zuɓi nǝ nzo ɓǝ̀ kya kútí a nzali, nǝ zuɓiban mwashat ɓǝ̀rɓǝ̀r, sǝ pà mǝ nǝ zuɓi ɓaria ɗàng.>>
1SA 26:9 Sǝama Dauda ne Abishai ama, <<Kǝa wal-lui ɗàng! Yana nǝ̀ loasǝ bui arǝ ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh tàrni ka, sǝ ɓwe nǝ̀ ɗwanyi kumcau?>>
1SA 26:10 Sǝ Dauda lidǝmba nǝ nacau ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh na kam nǝyilǝmu ka, Yahweh nǝnggearǝì nǝ̀ wali, ko ana raka lang pwari male karǝna ka nǝ̀ wǔ, ko nǝ̀ ká munǝo sǝ à nǝ̀ wal-luí kàm.
1SA 26:11 Sǝ mim ngga, ɓǝ̀ Yahweh twalbani mǝnana mǝ loasǝ buam arǝ ɓwa mana Yahweh tàrni ka! Ado ka, twal nzo male andǝ du-mùr male, sǝ ɓǝ̀ sǝm o!>>
1SA 26:12 Nda Dauda twal nzo andǝ du-mùr mǝnana à cam a múr Sawul ka, sǝ à nying ban mǝno. Kǝɓwa sǝnia ko sǝlǝce ɗàng, sǝ kǝɓwa ateà loapi ntulo ɗàng, acemǝnana nggea ntulo mǝlime nǝban Yahweh yi sulǝ amúrià.
1SA 26:13 Pǝlǝa Dauda o a ɓè buì sǝ kya cam zak amúr mgbangban; ban mǝnana Dauda cam kam ngga tètarǝì ban mǝnana à Sawul nakam ngga.
1SA 26:14 Dauda loasǝ gì sǝ tunǝ amǝ'lwa mala Sawul, sǝ tunǝ Abna muna-ɓwabura mala Ner ama, <<A pà wunǝ earam re, Abna?>> Pǝlǝa Abna ear ama, <<A nda yana le, mǝnana a kǝ tunǝ murǝm ngga?>>
1SA 26:15 Dauda ne Abna ama, <<A nda ɓwabura re? Sǝ yana kam kǝla we a Isǝrayila? Palang sǝ a yál ɓwamǝgule mò, murǝm ɗàng? Acemǝnana ɓeɓwa yiu nǝ̀ wal murǝm, ɓwamǝgule mò.
1SA 26:16 Gìr mǝnia a pè ka, pànǝ ɓoaro ɗàng! Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, a karǝna ɓǝà wal-luio, acemǝnana a yál ɓwamǝgule mò mǝnana Yahweh tàrì ka ɗàng! Ado ka sǝnban! Nzo andǝ du-mùr mala murǝm mǝnana à cam a múrí ka, à nda ke?>>
1SA 26:17 Lang Sawul bwalta gì Dauda ka, ɗiban ama, <<Gio nda man le, munem Dauda?>> Dauda eari wi ama, <<E, giem na ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm.>>
1SA 26:18 Dauda lidǝmba nǝ nacau ama, <<Palang sǝ ɓwamǝgule mem kǝ pǝrtam, mim guro male? Mana ǝn pà? Ya gìr mǝɓane na ǝn pa?
1SA 26:19 Adyan ngga, ɓǝ̀ ɓwamǝgule mem, yì murǝm ok acau mem, mim guro male. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh nda mǝnana soakito arǝàm ngga, ɓǝ̀ Yahweh ak pàgir. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ aɓwana na ka, ɓǝ̀ suban sulǝ amúria nǝban Yahweh; acemǝnana à pǝrnam yalung, ama mǝ nggá kum nzali liɓala mala Yahweh ɗàng, sǝ à bangŋǝ́nà ama, <O, kya peri aban aɓea aɓakuli.>
1SA 26:20 Adyan ngga, kǝa eare ɓǝà sukki nkilem a nzali mǝnana nda kuko nǝ ɓadǝm Yahweh ka ɗàng, acemǝnana murǝm mala Isǝrayila purna ace alta nkungga kǝla mana ɓwa kǝ alta nyal amúr ankono ka.>>
1SA 26:21 Pǝlǝa Sawul na ama, <<Ən pángŋǝ̀nà cauɓikea. Nyare, munem Dauda. Pà mǝ nǝ pakko kǝgìr mǝɓane ɗàng, acemǝnana a twal yilǝmem nǝ gulo a pwari man yalung ngga. Ən pángŋǝ̀nà ɓwaɓana, sǝ ǝn ɓwarkina kǝ̀rkǝ́r!>>
1SA 26:22 Sǝ Dauda ear ama, <<Nzo mala murǝm nia ka! Tasǝ mwashat atà alaggana ɓǝ̀ eauwe ɓǝ̀ yi e.
1SA 26:23 Ɓakuli kǝ mbwe koyanale ka tangnakusǝi, ace ɓealɓoarna andǝ domǝsǝcau male; Yahweh ka, túrǒ a ɓabuam yalung, sǝ ǝn ɓinǝ loasǝ buam arǝ ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh ɗārǝi ka.
1SA 26:24 Kǝla mǝnana ǝn pè yilǝmo gulo yalung ngga, ɓǝ̀ yilǝmem kum gulo a mǝsǝ Yahweh, sǝ ɓǝ̀ amsǝam ɓǝn purî ɓá koya ulang tanni.>>
1SA 26:25 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi Dauda ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝko bù, munem Dauda! Awu nǝ̀ pàkki agir mǝgulke, sǝ awu nǝ kum lidǝmba aɓa komǝyenani le ka!>> Nda Dauda bwal njar male o, sǝ Sawul nyar a ɓala male ka.
1SA 27:1 Pǝlǝa Dauda pakɗenyicau a ɓabumi ama, <<Akǝ fara ka, Sawul na nǝ̀ kiɗikiam ngga. Acemani ka, gìr mǝnana ɓoaribani ka, nda mǝnana ama mǝ nǝ ɓangŋa mǝ nǝ o a nzali mala amǝ'Filisti. Anggo ka, Sawul nǝ̀ aulǝa arǝ altam aɓa bù-nzali mala Isǝrayila, sǝ mǝ nǝ api ɓabuì.>>
1SA 27:2 Nda Dauda lo sǝ wari andǝ aburana gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat (600) mǝnana à nda atè ka, aban Akish muna-ɓwabura mala Mawok, murǝm Gat.
1SA 27:3 Pǝlǝa Dauda kya do a Gat, yì andǝ aburana male, koyan ngga andǝ amǝɓala male atè, sǝ Dauda gbal ka andǝ amāmí ɓari, Ahinowam ɓwama Jezǝril, andǝ Abigiyel ɓwama Kamel, yì mā-lú mala Nabal.
1SA 27:4 Sǝ lang à banggi Sawul ama Dauda ɓangŋǝna umǝna a Gat ka, Sawul nyare alte ɗǝm ɗàng.
1SA 27:5 Pǝlǝa Dauda ne Akish ama, <<Ida, ɓǝ̀ ǝn kumǝna earmúrú a bano ka, ɓǝà pàm bân aɓa mwashat atà alá mǝnana a liro ka, ace mǝnana mǝ duk kam ngga. Ace mana sǝ mim guro mò ka mǝ nǝ do atò a là-murǝm?>>
1SA 27:6 Nda Akish pe wi Zikǝlag akǝ̀ pwari mǝno ka. Acemani ka, Zikǝlag na a bu amurǝma mala Yahuda bà yalung.
1SA 27:7 Anonggio mǝnana Dauda pa aɓa do male a nzali mala amǝ'Filisti ka, pǝlǝa mwashat nǝ azongŋo ine na.
1SA 27:8 Arǝ anonggio mǝno ka, Dauda andǝ aburana male wario sǝ à tǝlli amǝ'Geshur, andǝ amǝ'Girǝz, andǝ amǝ'Amalek. (Twal arǝ anza ɓara-ɓara aɓwapǝndǝa mǝnia ka à sauna nǝdo aɓa nzali mǝnia, tite a Shur aban ká ɗār a nzali Masar.)
1SA 27:9 A koya pwari Dauda wari nǝ munǝo arǝ ɓè bu-nzali ka, pà nǝ̀ ɗeki kǝ ɓwabura ko ɓwama nǝyilǝmu ɗàng, sǝ nǝ̀ gbǝwi anzur, andǝ andá, andǝ amǝdambǝriso, andǝ akalakadambi, sǝ agir-nggūrǝu. Pǝlǝa nǝ̀ nyar aban Akish.
1SA 27:10 Sǝ lang Akish nǝ̀ ɗiban ama, <<A ya ban sǝ wu wari ace tǝlliban yalung ngga?>> Dauda nǝ̀ ear ama, <<A ban njar-kunmur mala Yahuda,>> ko <<A njar-kunmur mala Jerameel,>> ko <<A njar-kunmur mala amǝ'Ken.>>
1SA 27:11 Dauda ɗeki kǝ ɓwabura ko ɓwama nǝyilǝmu mǝnana nǝ̀ yinǝi a Gat ka ɗàng, nǝ ɗenyicau ama, <<Cè à yi oasǝkimur sǝm, ama, <Ani sǝ Dauda pǎ.> >> Mǝnia ka nda gìr mǝnana Dauda pakkiyi pwari-pwari, lang ndaban do aɓa bù-nzali mala amǝ'Filisti ka.
1SA 27:12 Anggo sǝ Akish earnǝ Dauda, sǝ kǝ twali ama, <<Tsǝngŋǝ̀nà aɓwana male amǝ'Isǝrayila à ɓinǝnamǝsǝi; acemani ka, nǝ̀ duk mǝtúró mem tàtǝ́k.>>
1SA 28:1 Arǝ anonggio mǝno ka, amǝ'Filisti ram amǝ'lwa malea ace lwa-lwa arǝ Isǝrayila. Pǝlǝa Akish ne Dauda ama, <<Sǝlǝa ama we wunǝ aburana mô ka wun nǝ̀ o atàm atà amǝ'lwa.>>
1SA 28:2 Dauda pǝlǝa eari Akish ama, <<E, akàm sǝ awu nǝ sǝni nǝnggearǝò gìr mǝnana guro mò nǝ̀ gandǝ pè ka.>>Pǝlǝa Akish banggi Dauda ama, <<Acemani ka, mǝ nǝ tsǝo awu nǝ duk mǝ'yáltàm bà.>>
1SA 28:3 Adyan ngga, Samuyila angŋa-dǝmba pàngŋǝ̀nà-lú, sǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kat angŋa-dǝmba à ɓuanì sǝ à tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nì a Rama, yì là male. Sǝ Sawul angŋa-dǝmba pǝrna amǝ'ɗikalú andǝ amǝ'nggár, à purni ɓá nzalî.
1SA 28:4 Amǝ'Filisti ramba sǝ à yi bwal kàttì a Shunem. Sǝ Sawul ram Isǝrayila kat, sǝ à bwal kàttì a Gilbowa.
1SA 28:5 Lang Sawul sǝn amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti ka, ɓangciu pàkki wi, sǝ gǝggǝli kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 28:6 Sǝ lang Sawul alta nê mala Yahweh ka, Yahweh pè wi kǝ eare ɗang, ko aɓa lòrǝo, ko nǝban Urim, ko nǝban amǝɓangnǝa.
1SA 28:7 Pǝlǝa Sawul banggi amǝtúró male ama, <<Wu alamta ɓwama mǝnana mǝɗikalú na ka, ace mǝnana mǝ kya ɗibancau a baní ka.>> Pǝlǝa amǝtúró male eari wi ama, <<Sǝni, ɓè mǝɗikalú nakam a En-dor.>>
1SA 28:8 Anggo sǝ Sawul ɓosǝki rǝì, oasǝ aɓea agir-nggūrǝu ɗàng, sǝ wario, yì andǝ aburana ɓari atè. À yi bik ban ɓwame nǝ du. Sǝ Sawul bang ama, <<Ida, ɗikamban atà alú, sǝ wu tunǝâm ɓwa mǝnana mǝ nǝ banggo lullǝi ka, ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝ rǝì.>>
1SA 28:9 Sǝ ɓwame banggi wi ama, <<Ɓafo a sǝlǝnace gìr mǝnana Sawul pàk ka, mǝnana pǝr amǝ'ɗikalú andǝ amǝ'nggár à purî là man ngga. Ace mana sǝ a kǝ tsǝkam gbǝli mǝnana nǝ̀ kánǝ yilǝmem a lú ka?>>
1SA 28:10 Sǝama Sawul kánbi wi ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, kǝ ɓè patanni pà nǝ̀ yiu amuro ace gìr mǝnia ka ɗàng!>>
1SA 28:11 Pǝlǝa ɓwame ɗì ama, <<Yana mǝnana mǝ nǝ tunǝô wi ka?>> Sǝ ne ɓwame ama, <<Tunǝâm Samuyila.>>
1SA 28:12 Lang ɓwame sǝn Samuyila ka, sà'ɓua bang-bang. Sǝ ɓwame ne Sawul ama, <<Ace mana sǝ a swarkiam? A nda Sawul!>>
1SA 28:13 Murǝm pǝlǝa banggi wi ama, <<Ɓangciu ɓǝ̀kǝa pakko ɗàng. Mana ɗe a sǝna?>> Ɓwame ne Sawul ama, <<Ən sǝn ɓè lú aban puro nǝ ɓá nzali.>>
1SA 28:14 Sawul ɗi ama, <<Lang sǝ puro male pa?>> Eari wi ama, <<Jamgula na puro kǝ yiu ka! Mbuɓiki rǝì aɓa nggea-daura.>>Pǝlǝa Sawul sǝlǝ ama Samuyila na, pǝlǝa ɓunno sǝ ti múrí a nzali.
1SA 28:15 Pǝlǝa Samuyila banggi Sawul ama, <<Mana tsǝa sǝ a tanninǝ mim aban tunǝam ɓǝn yiu?>> Sawul ear ama, <<Mǝ nda aɓa nggikiban mǝkǝ̀rkǝ́rnì, acemǝnana amǝ'Filisti yinǝ lwa arǝàm, sǝ Ɓakuli ka pǝlǝnàm nzǝmi, sǝ yale kǝ pam eare ɗǝm ɗàng, ko nǝban amǝɓangnǝa ko aɓa lòrǝo. Acemani ka, ǝn alte nǝma ɓǝà tunǝo wu yiu wu banggam gìr mǝnana mǝ nǝ pàk ka.>>
1SA 28:16 Sǝ Samuyila banggi Sawul ama, <<Ace mana sǝ awu nǝ ɗiem, mǝnana a sǝlǝna ama Yahweh pǝlǝno nzǝmi, sǝ dumǝna ɓiomǝbura ka?
1SA 28:17 Yahweh pàngŋǝ́nò kǝla mǝnana nam sǝ ǝn banggo ka; sanǝna domurǝm a ɓabuo sǝ pànî ɓio mǝ'murkala, yi Dauda.
1SA 28:18 Acemǝnana a oki Yahweh ɗàng, sǝ a lumsǝ nggea bumlulla male mǝ'earke amur amǝ'Amalek raka, nda Yahweh pàkkô gìr mǝnia yalung ngga.
1SA 28:19 Amur mani ka, Yahweh nǝ̀ tasǝ Isǝrayila sǝ we gbal a ɓabù amǝ'Filisti! Lí ka, we wunǝ amuna-burana mô, wun nǝ̀ pà atàm. Ɗǝm ngga Yahweh nǝ̀ tasǝ amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila a ɓabù amǝ'Filisti!>>
1SA 28:20 Kara Sawul kpa a nzali sárǝ́ pǝrapǝra, ɓangciu pakki wi kǝ̀rkǝ́r ace acau mala Samuyila. Rǝcandǝa malì rǝì kat acemǝnana lì kǝgir ɗàng, dù kat andǝ pwari kat.
1SA 28:21 Pǝlǝa ɓwame yiu aban Sawul, sǝ lang sǝn ɓiki gǝggǝlya mǝnana gǝggǝli ka, ɓwame banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni, mim guro mò ka ǝn kpanata cau mò. Ən twal yilǝmem a kún buam sǝ ǝn pak gìr mǝnana a banggam ngga.
1SA 28:22 Ado ka, we gbal ka, kwakikiro arǝàm, mim guro mò. Earam mǝ yinǝo nǝ girlina bǝti, ace mǝnana wu li, sǝ wu kum rǝcandǝa mala bwal njar ma'wun aban o ka.>>
1SA 28:23 Sawul ɓinǝe, sǝ bang ama, <<Pà mǝ nǝ lìli ɗang.>> Sǝama aguro male andǝ ɓwame ɓuakiarǝi, pǝlǝa kpata cau malea. Nda loapi nzali sǝ dumnǝdo amur gyangŋan-nongŋo ka.
1SA 28:24 Ɓwama man ngga ndanǝ muna ndá-lǝsǝa a ɓala, pǝlǝa bwali sǝ pwanmyali akaurǝa. Sǝ ɗàrǝ́ muku, karki dyar bǝredi, sǝ lurǝi burè pà arǝì ɗàng,
1SA 28:25 sǝ tsǝki Sawul andǝ aguro male aɓadǝmbia, sǝ à li. Nda à lo sǝ à o, a kǝ dù mǝno ka.
1SA 29:1 Adyan ngga, amǝ'Filisti angŋa-dǝmba à ramna amǝ'lwa malea kat abanɓwáná a Afek, sǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila ka à tsǝk kàttì malea a nkanggari mgbeaɗe-mùr mǝnana nda a Jezǝril ka.
1SA 29:2 Lang amǝ'yálmúrû mala amǝ'Filisti gya aban kutio andǝ aburana malea mǝnana à gau rǝia arǝ agbǝman sǝ arǝ aá ka, Dauda andǝ aburana male gbal ka à gya aban kutio anzǝm murǝm Akish.
1SA 29:3 Amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'Filisti ɗìban ama, <<Mana amǝ'Ibǝru man pakkiyi kani?>> Akish earia wia ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda Dauda, mǝtúró mala murǝm Sawul mala Isǝrayila. Nda kani nǝdo atàm kútínì pǝlǝa mwashat. Sǝ twal a pwari mana nying Sawul ba ado ka, ǝn kumi nǝ ɓekǝ ɓwarkio ɗàng.>>
1SA 29:4 Sǝama bum amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'Filisti lul arǝ murǝm Akish, sǝ à banggi wi ama, <<Nyesǝ ɓwabura mǝna ka ɓǝ̀ o a ban mǝnana a pe wi ɓǝ̀ duk kàm ngga. Yì ka pà nǝ̀ ká atà sǝm a kún munǝo ɗàng, ace mǝnana ɓǝkǝa pǝlǝ ɓi'sǝm mǝbura a kún munǝo raka. Ya njar na ɗe ndakam nǝ̀ kumo, mǝnana ɓoaro-kutibanì, mala gilǝki-nre andǝ mǝtala-ɓala male ka, mǝnana ɓǝ̀ pà nǝ́ twal aɓamur aburana ma'sǝm raka?
1SA 29:5 Mǝnia ka nda Dauda mbo, mǝnana aɓwana tu'nggyal nǝ nggwam amurí ama, << <Sawul walna aá male, sǝ Dauda walna aá lum male ka?> >>
1SA 29:6 Pǝlǝa Akish tunǝ Dauda sǝ ne wi ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, a nda mǝ'ɓealɓoarna, sǝ puro mô andǝ kutio mô atàm aɓalǝ amǝ'lwa ka ndanǝ ɓoaro a mǝsǝàm. Ən kumô nǝ ɓekǝ mǝɓike ɗàng, twal a pwari mǝnana a yiu nǝi abanam ngga, bà yalung. Kat andǝ amani ka, amǝ'yálmúrû earnǝ we ɗàng.
1SA 29:7 Acemani ka, nyar ado, o aɓa rǝpwala, ace mǝnana wu kǝa zurǝi ɓabum amǝ'yálmúrû mala amǝ'Filisti raka.>>
1SA 29:8 Dauda banggi Akish ama, <<Mana ǝn pa? Mana a kumi arǝàm, mim guro mò, twal a pwari mǝnana ǝn yiu nǝi aɓa túró mô bà yalung, mǝnana nǝ̀ tsǝa sǝ pà mǝ nǝ ká munǝo arǝ aɓiu-mǝbura mala ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm raka?>>
1SA 29:9 Akish pa'eare ama, <<Ən sǝlǝna ama a nda ɓwa mǝ'mǝsǝcauì a mǝsǝàm kǝla mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli! Sǝama amǝ'yálmúrû mala amǝ'Filisti bangŋǝna ama, <Dauda pà nǝ̀ ká atà sǝm a munǝo ɗàng.>
1SA 29:10 Adyan ngga, lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal wunǝ amǝtúró mala mǝtala-ɓala mò mǝnana à yiu atò ka, sǝ lang banfana ka, wu bwal njar wu o.>>
1SA 29:11 Nda Dauda andǝ aburana male lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal, sǝ à bwal njar aban o a nzali mala amǝ'Filisti ka, sǝ amǝ'Filisti ka, à eau aban ká Jezǝril.
1SA 30:1 Lang Dauda andǝ aburana male yina a Zikǝlag a tàruia pwari ka, à yi sǝni ka amǝ'Amalek yina nǝ tǝlliban amur Negev andǝ Zikǝlag. À lina Zikǝlag nǝ munǝo, à pisǝni nǝ bǝsa,
1SA 30:2 sǝ à bwalkina amamǝna andǝ koyan mǝnana aɓalǝi ka bwalban-guro, amuna-mǝkeke andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule. À wal-lú kǝɓwa ateà ɗàng, sǝama à pwanǝnia, à umá nǝia.
1SA 30:3 Lang Dauda andǝ aburana male yiu a nggea-lê ka, à yi kumi ka à pisǝni. Amālia andǝ amuna-burana malea, andǝ amuna-mamǝna malea ka, à pwanǝnia à umǝna nǝia.
1SA 30:4 Pǝlǝa Dauda andǝ aburana mana atè ka, à ɓua kǝ̀rkǝ́r she lang rǝcandǝa malea malǝna ka.
1SA 30:5 Amālá Dauda kǝm ngga à umǝna nǝia, yià Ahinowam, ɓwama Jezǝril andǝ Abigiyel, ɓwama Kamel, mā-lú mala Nabal.
1SA 30:6 Ɓabum Dauda zurǝì kǝ̀rkǝ́r, acemǝnana aburane kǝ earce ama à nǝ̀ ɓukki nǝ atali; koya ɓwabura ka, bumikiɗiki kǝ̀rkǝ́r ace amuna-burana male andǝ amuna-mamǝna male. Sǝama Dauda ɓakɓabumi nǝban Yahweh Ɓakuli male.
1SA 30:7 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi pǝris Abiyata, muna-ɓwabura mala Ahimale ama, <<Yinǝam nǝ efot.>> Nda Abiyata yinǝ efot aban Dauda ka.
1SA 30:8 Dauda ɗì Yahweh ama, <<Mǝ pǝrta amǝnia yì amǝ'tǝllìban ngga le? Mǝ nǝ kasǝmurià le?>> Yahweh eari wi ama, <<Pǝrtea, acemǝnana mbak-kàngkàng awu nǝ̀ kasǝmurià, sǝ mbak-kàngkàng awu nǝ̀ amsǝ aɓwana, sǝ awu nǝ ak agir mana à pwania kat ka.>>
1SA 30:9 Nda Dauda lo aban ká andǝ aburana gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat (600) mǝnana atè ka. Lang à yi bingŋǝna myalmúr Beso ka, aɓea aɓwana atea mǝnana à nda anzǝ́mò ka à ue abanì.
1SA 30:10 Dauda andǝ aburana gbǝman-ine (400) lidǝmba nǝ pyangnǝatau; acili aburana gbǝman-ɓari (200) ka, à ɓiki aulǝa à gandǝnǝ yálì myalmúr Beso ɗàng, nda à ueo abanì ka.
1SA 30:11 Pǝlǝa à kya kum ɓè ɓwa'Masar a patal, sǝ à yinǝi aban Dauda. À pè wi bǝredi shè, sǝ à pè wi mùr nu.
1SA 30:12 Ɗǝm ngga à pè wi agbatali kyak ɓari mala ɓǝla vwari andǝ adangŋanshi ɓǝla-anap mǝ'ime ɓari. Lang linia ka, yilǝmi nyar arǝì; ɓwabure ka pàngŋǝ̀nà anonggio tàrú, du andǝ pwari li kǝgìr ɗàng.
1SA 30:13 Dauda ɗì ama, <<Yana nda mǝtala-ɓala mò? Sǝ a pur nǝ kǝshe?>> Pǝlǝa ear ama, <<Mǝ nda lagga ɓwa'Masar, muna-ɓala mala ɓwa'Amalek. Mǝtala-ɓala mem o ɗekiam, acemǝnana ǝn nong rǝkwana anongŋo tàrú mǝnia à kùtí ka.
1SA 30:14 Sǝm wari a tǝlliban a njar-kunmur mala bù-nzali mala amǝ'Keret, aɓa nzong-nzali mala Yahuda, andǝ njar-kunmur mala nzong-nzali Kalip; sǝ sǝm pisǝ Zikǝlag nǝ bǝsa.>>
1SA 30:15 Dauda ɗì ama, <<Awu nǝ gandǝ kánǝ mim aban nggǝsan mala amǝ'tǝllìban man le?>> Pǝlǝa ear ama, <<Kánbam nǝ Ɓakuli ama a pà wunǝ wal-luem, ko awu nǝ túrǎm a ɓabù mǝtala-ɓala mem ɗàng, sǝ mǝ nǝ umnǝ we aban nggǝsan mala amǝ'tǝllìban man.>>
1SA 30:16 Nda warinǝ Dauda a banì ka, sǝ à kya kumia à mesǝna a koya ban a nzali. À ndaban li andǝ nu, andǝ pe ɓamúrià banɓoarnado ace nggea gǝna-lwa mǝnana à pwani aɓa nzali mala amǝ'Filisti, sǝ aɓa bù-nzali Yahuda ka.
1SA 30:17 Pǝlǝa Dauda soa arǝia nǝ munǝo, twal a ban-mbul'mbul aban ká pwarikpǝra mala ɓè pwari. Kǝɓwa ateà au ɗàng, shekǝ alaggana gbǝman-ine (400) mǝnana à ɓangŋa a nzǝm akalakadambi, à au ka.
1SA 30:18 Dauda ak agir mǝnana kat amǝ'Amalek pwania ka, andǝ amāmí ɓari.
1SA 30:19 Kǝgìr ɓwàr ɗàng, ko mǝkyauwe ko mǝgule. Ak amuna-burana, andǝ amuna-mamǝna, andǝ gǝna-lwa, andǝ koya gir mǝnana kat amǝ'tǝllìban mǝno pwania ka; Dauda nyesǝ agir kat.
1SA 30:20 Ɗǝm ngga Dauda pwan adomwan mala anzur andǝ ambul, andǝ mala andá, sǝ pǝria aban yiu a ɓadǝm acili agirkusǝu, sǝ bang ama, <<Mǝnia ka gǝna-lwa mala Dauda na!>>
1SA 30:21 Pǝlǝa Dauda nyar a ban aburana gbǝman-ɓari mǝnana aulǝa tsǝia à gandǝnǝ o atè raka, yì aɓwana mana à nyia a myalmúr Beso ka. À pur ace ká kúllí Dauda andǝ aɓwana mana atè ka. Lang Dauda bingŋǝna tù abania ka, pǝlǝa makkia-wia-kún.
1SA 30:22 Sǝama amǝ'ɓealɓikea andǝ amǝ'ɓealɓana aɓalǝ aburana mǝnana à o atà Dauda ka, à bang ama, <<Acemǝnana à o atà sǝm raka, pà sǝm nǝ̀ pè kǝɓwa ateà kǝgìr aɓa gǝna-lwa mǝnana sǝm nyesǝia ka ɗàng! Kǝ amālia andǝ amunia nda sǝm nǝ̀ pea wia ka, sǝ koyan ngga ɓǝ̀ bwal amale ɓǝà o.>>
1SA 30:23 Sǝama Dauda na ama, <<Wun amǝ'eambǝam, wu kǝa pak anggo nǝ gìr mǝnana Yahweh pa sǝm ngga ɗàng! Yahweh yál sǝm sǝ tasǝ amǝ'tǝllìban mǝnana à yiu arǝ sǝm ngga, a ɓabù sǝm.
1SA 30:24 Yana nǝ̀ kwakikiri arǝ wun amúr cau man? Kāmbe mala ɓwa mǝnana wari a munǝo ka, nǝ̀ duk mwashat andǝ mala ɓwa mǝnana ue a ban atwalo ka.>>
1SA 30:25 Twal a pwari mǝno bà yalung ngga, mǝnia ka duk nzongcau andǝ nggurcau aban amǝ'Isǝrayila.
1SA 30:26 Lang Dauda bingŋǝna Zikǝlag ka, tasǝ aɓa gǝna-lwa mǝnana pwan ngga, aban aɓwana-mǝgule mala Yahuda, mǝnana à nda ka agyajam male ka, nǝ cau ama, <<Ɓoro nia ka ace wun, aɓa gǝna-lwa mǝnana sǝm pwan arǝ aɓibura mala Yahweh ka!>>
1SA 30:27 Aɓoronì ka, à nda ace aɓwana mǝno arǝ alá mǝnia ka: ace amǝno yì aɓwana a Betel, andǝ Ramot Negev, andǝ Jattir ka;
1SA 30:28 ace aɓwana mǝno a Aruwa, andǝ Sifmot, andǝ Eshtemowa,
1SA 30:29 andǝ Rakal ka; ace aɓwana mǝno arǝ anggea-là mala amǝ'Jerameel andǝ amǝ'Ken ngga;
1SA 30:30 ace aɓwana mǝno a Horma, andǝ Bor Ashan, andǝ Atak,
1SA 30:31 andǝ Hebǝron ngga; sǝ ace aɓwana mǝno arǝ acili abân mǝnana kat Dauda andǝ aburana male ging kam ngga.
1SA 31:1 Adyan ngga amǝ'Filisti naban munǝo arǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila; sǝ amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila ɓangŋa aɓadǝm amǝ'Filisti; à wal-lú amǝ'Isǝrayila amúr Nkono Gilbowa.
1SA 31:2 Amǝ'Filisti pǝrta Sawul andǝ amuna-burana male, à kya kasǝmurià, sǝ à wal-lú amuna-burana male, yià Jonatan, andǝ Abinadap, andǝ Malkishuwa.
1SA 31:3 Munǝo yi candǝ arǝ Sawul; amǝ'sǝlǝ túr mundi ta Sawul nǝ mundi, à tsǝki wi penye kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
1SA 31:4 Sawul ne mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male ama, <<Pusǝ nggeabyau mô sǝ wu zuɓiam nǝi, ɓǝ̀ ana raka, amǝ ɗwanyi kasǝ-ɓatau man nǝ̀ yia zuɓiam sǝ à nǝ̀ ɓangginǝ mim.>> Sǝama mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male ɓinǝe, acemǝnana ɓangciu pàkki wi kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Nda Sawul twal nggeabyau male sǝ kpa amurí ka.
1SA 31:5 Lang mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male sǝni Sawul wuna ka, kara yì gbal ka kpa amúr nggeabyau male sǝ wù atà Sawul.
1SA 31:6 Anggo sǝ Sawul andǝ amuna-burana male tàrú, andǝ mǝ-bwali-wi agirmunǝo male andǝ aburana male mǝnana atè kat ka, à wù akǝ pwari mǝ'mwashati.
1SA 31:7 Lang amǝ'Isǝrayila mǝnana à nda a buì njar-nza mala Ɓangŋaban Jezǝril andǝ amana a takuli mala Nggeasala Jodan sǝni ama, aburana mala amǝ'Isǝrayila ɓangŋǝna, sǝ Sawul andǝ amuna-burana male wukina ka, à ɓangŋa à nying alà malea; sǝ amǝ'Filisti yiu à yi do aɓalǝia.
1SA 31:8 Lang ban fana ka, amǝ'Filisti yiu ace pwan agirbura mala aɓwana mana à wuna ka, kara à yi kum lú Sawul andǝ alú amuna-burana male tàrú amúr Nkono Gilbowa.
1SA 31:9 À kasǝ ɓamur Sawul, sǝ à swár agirmunǝo male. À tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân aɓa nzali mala amǝ'Filisti kat ɓǝà hamnǝ bǝsacê a ndàmǝgule mala ankúl malea, sǝ aban aɓwana malea.
1SA 31:10 À tsǝk agirmunǝo mala Sawul a ndàmǝgule mala Ashterot, sǝ à gyar luí arǝ sheran mala Bet Shan.
1SA 31:11 Lang aɓwana mǝnana nǝdo a Jabesh-Gilǝyat ok gìr mǝnana amǝ'Filisti pàkki Sawul ka,
1SA 31:12 kara akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa malea kat lo, sǝ à gya aɓa dù mǝno kat. À kya twal lú Sawul andǝ alú amuna-burana male mǝnana arǝ sheran mala Bet Shan ngga, sǝ à yiu a Jabesh, à kya pisǝia kàm.
1SA 31:13 À pwan amuia, sǝ à lumsǝia a tǝrta nggun zāmbo a Jabesh; sǝ à gilmùr anonggio tongno-nong-ɓari.
2SA 1:1 Anzǝm lú mala Sawul, lang Dauda nyàrǝ́nì wal amǝ'Amalek ka, pǝlǝa ueo a Zikǝlag nongŋo ɓari.
2SA 1:2 A tàruia nongŋo ka, ɓè ɓwabura mǝnana pur a kàttì mala Sawul ka yiu, nǝ gìr'nggūrǝu mǝsanne arǝì nǝ tú a ɓamuri. Sǝ lang bwalǝna ban Dauda ka, ɓunno, kpa nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali.
2SA 1:3 Dauda ɗì ama, <<A pur nǝ kǝshe sǝ a yiu?>> Sǝ ɓwabure pe wi eare ama, <<Ən ɓwar nǝ ɓwaro aɓa kàttì mala amǝ Isǝrayila.>>
2SA 1:4 Pǝlǝa Dauda ɗì ama, <<Lang sǝ gìrnî pǎ? Banggam.>> Pǝlǝa eari wi ama, <<Aɓwe ɓàngŋǝ́nì kun-munǝo, sǝ ɗǝm ngga pas atà aburana ka, à wuna, sǝ Sawul andǝ muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan gbal ka, à wuna.>>
2SA 1:5 Dauda ɗì lagga mǝno banggiyi wi cau ka ama, <<Lang sǝ a sǝlǝ ama, Sawul andǝ muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan ngga à wuna?>>
2SA 1:6 Laggè bang ama, <<Mǝ nda amúr nkono Gilbowa, sǝ ǝn yakiarǝ Sawul aban eangnǝe arǝ nkongŋo male, sǝ awaru-pǝr andǝ amǝ'pǝ̀r na tù aban yiu amurí.
2SA 1:7 Lang pǝlǝ mǝsǝi a nzǝmi ka, sǝnam, pǝlǝa tunǝam, sǝ ǝn eari wi, nǝma, <Mǝ ndya ka.>
2SA 1:8 Sǝ ɗiem ama, <A nda yana?> Ən eari wi nǝma, <Mǝ nda ɓwa'Amalek.>
2SA 1:9 Pǝlǝa banggam ama, <Yiu cam a nkanggariam sǝ wu wal-luem, acemǝnana mǝ nda aɓa tanni mǝkǝ̀rkǝ́rnì mala lú, sǝ yilǝmem malaká pur ɗàng.>
2SA 1:10 Nda ǝn cam a nkanggari sǝ ǝn wal-luí ka, acemǝnana ǝn sǝlǝna nǝma pà nǝ̀ au ɗàng anzǝm mana ɓǝ̀ kpana ka. Sǝ ǝn twal mbulan-murǝm mǝnana a ɓamúrí ka andǝ mbaga mǝnana a nggwarbui ka. À ndya ǝn yinǝì ɓwamǝgule mem nǝia ka.>>
2SA 1:11 Pǝlǝa Dauda bwal nggea-daura male sannì, sǝ aburana mǝnana kat à nda atè ka, à pàk anggo gbal.
2SA 1:12 À pak-bumkiɗikea, à ɓua, sǝ à gilmur ba pwarikpǝra, ace Sawul andǝ muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan, sǝ ace aɓwana mala Yahweh andǝ ɓala Isǝrayila, acemǝnana à wal-luia a kun-munǝo ka.
2SA 1:13 Pǝlǝa Dauda ɗì lagga mǝno yinǝi wi nǝ cau ka ama, <<A pur a ya ban?>> Pǝlǝa eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda muna mala ɓwa'kúnɗàngna, ɓwa'Amalek.>>
2SA 1:14 Dauda banggi wi ama, <<Pàk lang sǝ ɓangciu pàkkô arǝ loasǝ buo ace wal-lú ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh tàrì ka ɗàng?>>
2SA 1:15 Pǝlǝa Dauda tunǝ mwashat atà alaggana male, sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Kya wal-luí.>> Nda walì sǝ wù ka.
2SA 1:16 Sǝ Dauda bang ama, <<Bafe mala nkiliò ɓǝ̀ ue amuro, acemǝnana we nǝ kuno sǝ a bang ama, <Ən wal-lú ɓwa mala Yahweh mǝnana à ɗārǝi ka.> >>
2SA 1:17 Sǝ Dauda tsǝk mǝnia yì nggyal keban ngga, sǝ keban amur Sawul andǝ muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan.
2SA 1:18 Sǝ bang ama, ɓǝ̀ à kànî amǝ'kau mala Yahuda mǝnia yì nggyal keban mǝnana à tunǝi ama Nggyal mala Nta ka; nda kam a gilǝe aɓa Malǝmce mala Jashar:
2SA 1:19 We Isǝrayila, amǝgulo mô amǝ'ɓoarɓwe ka, à walna-luia amur ankono mò. Akanggǝrang aburana kpana!
2SA 1:20 Wu kǝa nace a Gat ɗàng, wu kǝa hamnǝ ce amur anjarɓala mala Ashkelon ɗàng, cè amuna-mamǝna mala amǝ'Filisti pàkkiɗire, cè amuna-mamǝna mala amǝ'ɗwanyi-kasǝ-ɓatau pàk-banɓoarnado.
2SA 1:21 Wun ankónó mala Gilbowa, mbulo ko ncimna ɓǝkǝa nya amur wun ɗàng, ko amur aɓaban ma'wun mala pusǝ mǝsǝsa ace apaɓoro ɗang. Acemǝnana akàm sǝ à ɓǝsǝki antongŋo mala akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa. Ntongŋo mala Sawul ka à hasǝi wi mùrú ɗàng.
2SA 1:22 Nta mala Jonatan nyarnǝ te arǝ nkila, ko arǝ mùrú-nyama mala akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa mǝnana wal-luia ka ɗàng; sǝ nggeabyau mala Sawul ka nyar ɓà ɗàng.
2SA 1:23 Sawul andǝ Jonatan ngga, aɓwana earcea sǝ à pwasǝbum aɓwana. Aɓa yilǝmu andǝ lú ka, à gau ɗang. À kútì ankwang nǝ kaurǝa; à kútì a'im nǝ rǝcandǝa.
2SA 1:24 Wun amuna-mamǝna mala Isǝrayila, wu ɓua ace Sawul, acemǝnana yì nda ɓwa mǝnana oasǝa wun agir-nggūrǝu mǝɓoarne amǝɓoarsǝne, sǝ gilǝkirǝ adaura ma'wun nǝ agir-njengǝlan ngga.
2SA 1:25 Akanggǝrang aburana kpana a ban lwa! Lú Jonatan na aban nongŋo amur ankono.
2SA 1:26 Mǝ nda aɓa bumkiɗikea aceo, mǝ'eambam Jonatan; A ndanǝ ɓoaro abanam! Earcearǝu mô abanam ngga gir'ndali na kǝ̀rkǝ́r, kútì earban mala ɓwama.
2SA 1:27 Akanggǝrang aburana kpana, sǝ agirbura mala lwa uenaɓà!
2SA 2:1 Anzǝm mǝnia ka, Dauda ɗì Yahweh ama, <<Mǝ kya aɓa mwashat atà alá mala Yahuda le?>> Sǝ Yahweh banggi wi ama, <<Kyane.>> Dauda ɗiban ama, <<Ake sǝ mǝ ká?>> Yahweh banggi wi ama, <<A Hebǝron.>>
2SA 2:2 Pǝlǝa Dauda lo wari abanì andǝ amāmí gbal, Ahinoam ɓwama Jezǝril, andǝ Abigiyel mā-lú mala Nabal ɓwama Karmi.
2SA 2:3 Sǝ Dauda yinǝ aburana mǝnana à nda atè ka, koyan ngga andǝ amǝ'ɓala male; sǝ à duki arǝ alá mǝnana aɓa Hebǝron ngga.
2SA 2:4 Sǝ aburana mala Yahuda yiu a Hebǝron, sǝ à ɗārǝ́ Dauda ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm amur ɓala Yahuda. Lang à banggi Dauda ama, <<Aburana mala Jabesh-Gilǝyat na à tsǝklú Sawul ka,>>
2SA 2:5 Dauda tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân nǝ cau aban aburana mala Jabesh-Gilǝyat ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh tsǝka wun bù, ace pěmǝɓoarne mǝnia wu lǝmdǝì Sawul ɓwamǝgule ma'wun, nǝ tsǝkluí ka.
2SA 2:6 Ado ka, ɓǝ̀ Yahweh lǝmdǝa wun earcearǝu male mǝnana kǝ gǝshi raka, andǝ domǝsǝcau male. Sǝ mim gbal ka, mǝ nǝ pàkka wun mǝɓoarne ace gìr mǝnana wu pè ka.
2SA 2:7 Acemani ka, wu dum nǝ rǝcandǝa andǝ mǝsǝkàngkàngŋa, acemǝnana Sawul mǝtala-ɓala ma'wun ngga pàngŋǝ̀nà-lú, sǝ aɓwana mala Yahuda ɗārǝ́nam mǝ duk murǝm amúria.>>
2SA 2:8 Sǝama Abna muna-ɓwabura mala Ner, mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'lwa mala Sawul ka, twal Ishboshet muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul sǝ yinǝi a Mahanayim.
2SA 2:9 Tsǝì duk murǝm amur abu-nzali Gilǝyat, andǝ Ashuri, andǝ Jezǝril, andǝ Ifǝrem andǝ Benjami andǝ Isǝrayila kat.
2SA 2:10 Ishboshet muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul ka, ndanǝ apǝlǝa lumi-ine lang à tsǝì duk murǝm amur Isǝrayila ka, sǝ yì ka pàk apǝlǝa ɓari a buno-murǝm. Sǝ ɓala mala Yahuda ka, kpata Dauda.
2SA 2:11 Sauwa mala bàkú mǝnana Dauda nda murǝm a Hebǝron amur ɓala mala Yahuda ka, apǝlǝa tongno-nong-ɓari andǝ azongŋo tongno-nong-mwashat na.
2SA 2:12 Abna muna-ɓwabura mala Ner, atārǝia andǝ aburana mala Ishboshet muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul ka, à lo a Mahanayim sǝ à o a Gibiyon.
2SA 2:13 Jowap muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya andǝ aburana mala Dauda puro sǝ à kya je andǝia a guguri mǝnana a Gibiyon ngga. Nggǝsan mwashat do a buì mala guguri man, sǝ ɓè nggǝsan ngga do a nkaring mala guguri.
2SA 2:14 Abna banggi Jowap ama, <<Ado ka, ɓǝ̀ sǝm tsǝk aɓea alaggana ma'sǝm ɓǝà pur ace munǝo, ɓwa andǝ ɓwa arǝarǝia, a ɓadǝm sǝm.>> Sǝ Jowap bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ à lo.>>
2SA 2:15 Nda à lo, à cam-nǝ-came sǝ à ɓallia; aburana lum-nong-ɓari a buì mala Benjami andǝ Ishboshet muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul, sǝ aburana lum-nong-ɓari a buì mala Dauda.
2SA 2:16 Koyanale ka bwal ɓì a ɓamúrí sǝ zuɓi nkanggari-bum ɓì nǝ byau male, sǝ à kpa nzali à wǔ atārǝia. Nda tsǝa sǝ mǝno yì ban a Gibiyon ngga, à tunǝi ama, Helkat-hazurim ngga.
2SA 2:17 Mǝsǝ munǝo bangŋa a pwari mǝno. Aburana mala Dauda gandǝ Abna andǝ aburana mala Isǝrayila.
2SA 2:18 Amuna-burana mala Zeruya tàrú, à nda abanì: Jowap, andǝ Abishai, sǝ Asahel. Asahel ka, mǝɓiki mire na kǝla mbamba a bondo.
2SA 2:19 Asahel pǝrta Abna, ɓinǝ kyang atà bui-mǝli ko mǝnggare, aban pǝrte.
2SA 2:20 Pǝlǝa Abna pǝlǝ mǝsǝi a nzǝmi sǝ na ama, <<A nda le, Asahel?>> Asahel ear ama, <<E, mǝ nda.>>
2SA 2:21 Abna banggi wi ama, <<Kyang atà buo mǝlì ko mǝnggare; gbami mwashat atà alaggana, sǝ wu ak agirbura male arǝì.>> Sǝ Asahel ka, ɗeki pǝrte ɗàng.
2SA 2:22 Nyare Abna sà'arǝ Asahel ama, <<Nying pǝrtam. Kǝa tsǝem ɓǝn wal-luio ɗàng. Ɓǝ̀ ǝn wal-luio ka, lang sǝ mǝ nǝ sǝn mǝ'eambo Jowap a ɓamǝsǝi?>>
2SA 2:23 Sǝ Asahel ka, ɓinǝ kyangye. Nda Abna zuɓi a bumi nǝ tǝta nzo male ka. Nzoe kò kya pur a nzǝmi; Asahel kpa a nzali abanì sǝ wǔ a ɓadǝm Abna. Ɓwa mǝnana kat yiu a ban mǝnana Asahel kpa sǝ wù kam ngga, ɓwe cam gǝs.
2SA 2:24 Sǝ Jowap andǝ Abishai ka à pyangnǝata Abna. Lang pwari nǝ nggǝ ká kpa ka, à bwal ban mgbangban mala Ammah, tù a ban Giya, a njar ká ɓabondo Gibiyon.
2SA 2:25 Pǝlǝa aɓwana mala Benjami ram rǝia abanɓwáná anzǝm Abna, sǝ à cam amur mgbangban.
2SA 2:26 Pǝlǝa Abna tunǝ Jowap sǝ ɗì ama, <<Dumǝna púp sǝm nǝ̀ lidǝmba nǝ wal-lú rǝarǝ sǝm le? A sǝlǝ mbak ama nǝ̀ nggá duk mǝlulle a masǝlǝate? Nǝ̀ sau lang sǝ awu nǝ sà'arǝ aɓwana mô ɓǝà nying pǝrta amǝ'eambia?>>
2SA 2:27 Jowap eari wi ama, <<Kǝla mǝnana Ɓakuli na kam nǝyilǝmu ka, ɓǝ̀ a bangma cau man raka, mbak-kàngkàng aɓwana man pa nǝ̀ vwakibuia arǝ pǝrta amǝ'eambia ɗàng ba dǝmbari.>>
2SA 2:28 Nda Jowap twang njawe, sǝ aburane kat go-gǝs; à lidǝmba nǝ pǝrta Isǝrayila, ko à munǝ ɗǝm ɗàng.
2SA 2:29 Osso Abna andǝ aburana male gya nǝɓa Araba aɓa dù mǝno kat. À yàlî Nggeasala Jodan, sǝ à lidǝmba nǝ gya aɓa dǝmbari mǝno ba à yi bik Mahanayim.
2SA 2:30 Lang Jowap nyarǝnì pǝrta Abna ka, ramba amǝ'lwa male pupup abanɓwáná. Sǝni ka, aburana mala Dauda lum-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-ine andǝ Asahel ka, à pà kàm ɗàng.
2SA 2:31 Sǝama aburana mala Dauda wal-lú aburana mala Benjami gbǝman-tàrú nǝ lumi-tongno-nong-mwashat mǝnana à nda atà Abna ka.
2SA 2:32 Jowap andǝ aburana male twal lú Asahel sǝ à kya tsǝî a ɓembe mala tarrí a Betalami. Pǝlǝa à gya aɓa dù kat sǝ à yi bwal Hebǝron a kwaro-la-ban.
2SA 3:1 Munǝo mǝnana anre ɓala mala Sawul andǝ ɓala mala Dauda ka, tè sauwa. Làkkì mala aɓwana mǝnana à nda atà Dauda ka, lidǝmba nǝ gulo kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ làkkì mala aɓwana mǝnana à nda atà ɓala mala Sawul ka, camarǝ amsǝa.
2SA 3:2 À ɓǝlî Dauda amuna-burana a Hebǝron: Muna-dǝmba male nda Amnon, nǝ bu Ahinoam, ɓwama Jezǝril;
2SA 3:3 ɓaria muni nda Kileyap, nǝ bu Abigiyel, mā-lú mala Nabal, ɓwama Kamel; tàruia muni nda Absalom, nǝ bu Ma'aka, ɓoarnsarile Talmai, murǝm Geshur;
2SA 3:4 inea muni nda Adonija, nǝ bu Haggit; tongnoia muni, nda Shefatiya, nǝ bu Abital;
2SA 3:5 tongno-nong-mwashatia muni nda Itǝreyam, nǝ bu Eglah, mālá Dauda. Amuna-burana mǝnia ka, à ɓǝlî Dauda a Hebǝron.
2SA 3:6 Lang munǝo mǝnana anre ɓala mala Sawul andǝ ɓala mala Dauda lidǝmba ka, Abna camarǝ kumbi ɓamúrì rǝcandǝa kpǝm a ɓala mala Sawul.
2SA 3:7 Sawul ɗiɗyal ka ndanǝ mā-twala mǝnana à tunǝki ama Rizpa, muna-ɓwama mala Ayah ka. Ɓè fara ka, Ishboshet banggi Abna ama, <<Ace mana, sǝ a kúti aban mā-twala mala tárrám?>>
2SA 3:8 Kara Abna ka, bumi lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ cau mǝnana Ishboshet bang ngga. Pǝlǝa nyesǝi wi cau ama, <<Mǝ nda ɓamur nvwa a buì mala Yahuda le? Twal a tite ba yalung, ǝn lǝmdǝ domǝsǝcau arǝ ɓala mala tarró, Sawul andǝ aɓǝla, andǝ agyajam male. Ən tasǝ wun ɓǝ̀ wu kpa a ɓabu Dauda ɗàng. Kat andǝ amani ka, a tsǝkam-cau-arǝàm mala pàk cauɓikea nǝ ɓwama mǝnia ka!
2SA 3:9 Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli ɓashiam, sǝ yale ɓǝ̀ wal-luem, mim Abna, ɓǝ̀ ǝn pakkì Dauda gìr kǝla mǝnana Yahweh kánbi wi ama nǝ̀ pàkki wi ka, raka.
2SA 3:10 Mǝ nǝ tusǝ domurǝm ɓǝ̀ nying ɓala mala Sawul, sǝ mǝ nǝ tamsǝkusǝ bunomurǝm mala Dauda, amur Isǝrayila andǝ Yahuda, twal a Dan aban ká Biyasheba.>>
2SA 3:11 Sǝ Ishboshet ka, nyare ne Abna kǝ cau ɗǝm ɗang, acemǝnana ɓangciu pàkki wi arǝì.
2SA 3:12 Pǝlǝa Abna tasǝa amǝ'na-túrbân ɓǝà kyanbi wi aban Dauda nǝ cau ama, <<Nzali ka, mala yana ɗe? Kùrcau nǝ mim, sǝ mǝ nǝ bwalo kàm, ace yinǝ Isǝrayila kat a bano.>>
2SA 3:13 Pǝlǝa Dauda bang ama, <<Yàwá, mǝ nǝ kùrcau sǝnǝ we, sǝama, ǝn nggǝ earce gìr mwashat nǝ we: A pà wunǝ sǝn ɓamǝsǝàm ɗàng sheɓǝ̀ we, atà dǝmbe ka, a yinanǝ Mikal, muna-ɓwama mala Sawul, lang awu nǝ yiu a sǝnam ngga.>>
2SA 3:14 Pǝlǝa Dauda tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân aban Ishboshet, muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul, ɓǝà banggi wi ama, <<Pam māmám, yì Mikal, mǝnana ǝn pur'amuri mǝ alí nǝ nggú-ɓata amǝ'Filisti gbǝman-mwashat ka.>>
2SA 3:15 Anggo, Ishboshet túrban sǝ à ak Mikal arǝ burí, Paltiyel, muna-ɓwabura mala Layish.
2SA 3:16 Kat andǝ amani anggo ka, burí o atè, camarǝ ɓua aceì, amur njar kat aban ká ɗār a Bahurim. Pǝlǝa Abna banggi wi ama, <<Nyare o!>> Sǝ nyare o.
2SA 3:17 Pǝlǝa Abna nacau nǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala Isǝrayila ama, <<Banì sauwuna adyan, mana wu kǝ earce ama, wun nǝ̀ tsǝk Dauda ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm ma'wun ngga.
2SA 3:18 Ado ka, wu pè wi, ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm! Yahweh ka panacau aban Dauda ama, <Nǝ bu guro mem Dauda, sǝ mǝ nǝ amsǝ aɓwana mem, Isǝrayila, a bù amǝ'Filisti sǝ a bù aɓia-mǝbura kat.> >>
2SA 3:19 Pǝlǝa Abna nacau nǝ amǝ'tàu mala Benjami. Sǝ wari a Hebǝron, ace banggi Dauda gìr mǝnana kat Isǝrayila andǝ ɓala mala Benjami puppup earǝnace ama à nǝ̀ pàk ka.
2SA 3:20 Lang Abna andǝ aburana male lumi-ɓari atè yiu aban Dauda a Hebǝron ngga, Dauda pak girlina-nàtà ace Abna andǝ aburana mǝnana à yiu atè ka.
2SA 3:21 Pǝlǝa Abna banggi Dauda ama, <<Earam, ɓǝ̀ ǝn o mǝ kya ram Isǝrayila kat, ace ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm, ace mǝnana ɓǝà kùrcau nǝ we, sǝ ace mǝnana wu yálmúr gìr mǝnana kat ɓabumo earkice ka.>> Nda Dauda tasǝ Abna o aɓa rǝpwala ka.
2SA 3:22 Zuku ka, aburana mala Dauda andǝ Jowap nyarǝnì ban mǝnana à wari kam ace tǝlliban ngga, sǝ à yinǝ gǝna-lwa kpǝm a buia. Sǝ Abna ka, pà a ban Dauda a Hebǝron ɗàng, acemǝnana Dauda tasǝni, umǝna aɓa rǝpwala.
2SA 3:23 Lang Jowap, andǝ amǝ'lwa mǝnana kat atè à yi bwalǝna ka, aɓwana banggi Jowap ama, <<Abna, muna-ɓwabura mala Ner, yiu aban murǝm, sǝ murǝm ɗekini ɓǝ̀ o, sǝ umǝna aɓa rǝpwala.>>
2SA 3:24 Pǝlǝa Jowap wari aban murǝm, sǝ ɗì ama, <<Mana mǝnia a pê ka? Abna yiu a bano! Palang sǝ a ɗeki o? Sǝ ado ka nyarǝna umǝna!
2SA 3:25 We ka, a súrǝ́nà rǝ Abna, muna-ɓwabura mala Ner; yiu male ka, nda ace swárkiǒ, sǝ ɓǝ̀ súrǝ̀ puro mô andǝ nyare mô, sǝ ɓǝ̀ súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana kat a pakkiyi ka.>>
2SA 3:26 Jowap pǝlǝa nying ban Dauda, sǝ tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân atà Abna, ama ɓǝà banggi wi ɓǝ̀ nyare. À kya kumi a ban tūli-mùr mǝnana a Sirah ka, sǝ à nyesǝì à yinǝi. (Sǝ Dauda ka, sǝlǝce gìrnî ɗàng.)
2SA 3:27 Lang Abna nyarǝna yina a Hebǝron ngga, Jowap warinǝi aɓa ɓè muna kurǝm a kún nggea-là, kǝla nǝ̀ nacau nǝi, kǝ yia ɓari. Sǝ abanì ka, Jowap kara soa Abna nǝ byau a bumi, wal-luí, ace mbwegìr akúnì nkila mala mǝ'eambi Asahel.
2SA 3:28 Nǝnzǝ́mò, lang Dauda okce mǝnia yì gìr ka, bang ama, <<Mim sǝnǝ nzali domurǝm mem, aɓadǝm Yahweh tàtǝ́k ka, bù sǝm pà aɓa cau mala sukki nkila mala Abna muna-ɓwabura mala Ner ɗàng.
2SA 3:29 Ɓǝ̀ bafe mala nkila male sulǝ a ɓamur Jowap sǝ amur ɓala mala tárrí kat! Ɓǝ̀ ɓala mala Jowap ɓǝkǝa ɗwanyi ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝ penye mana mùrgìr kǝ sur kam, ko ndanǝ kwánó nggû, ko muna-ɓwabura mǝnana nggilung-ɓwa na, ko mǝnana à wal-luí nǝ nggeabyau, ko kǝ paktǝla girlina ka ɗàng.>>
2SA 3:30 (Jowap andǝ mǝ'eambi Abishai ka, à wal-lú Abna acemǝnana, yì na mǝnana wal-lú mǝ'eambia Asahel, a kun-munǝo a Gibiyon ngga.)
2SA 3:31 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi Jowap andǝ aɓwana mana kat andǝi ka, ama, <<Wu sàngi agir-nggūrǝu ma'wun, wu oasǝ anggubyau-doatú arǝ wun, sǝ wu ɓua aɓadǝm Abna.>> Murǝm Dauda nǝ ɓamuri ka, gya anzǝm aɓwana mana à twal kpamgbang-lú ka.
2SA 3:32 Pǝlǝa à tsǝk-lú Abna a Hebǝron; murǝm loasǝ gì ɓua a ɓembe mala Abna. Sǝ aɓwana kat ɓua Abna.
2SA 3:33 Pǝlǝa murǝm tù mǝnia yì nggyal keban ngga, amur Abna, ama: Ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ Abna wǔ kǝla wù mala gǝmɓwa le?
2SA 3:34 À tà ka abuo ɗàng, sǝ akusǝo pà aɓa nsolo ɗang. Kǝla mǝnana ɓwabura nǝ̀ kpa aɓadǝm amǝ'ɓealɓikea ka, anggo sǝ a kpa. Aɓwe kat ɓua aceì ɗǝm.
2SA 3:35 Pǝlǝa aɓwe yiu aban Dauda, sǝ à ɓuakiarǝi ɓǝ̀ lì girlina sǝ pwari na piu a kuli. Sǝ Dauda ka, kángìr ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli ɓashiam, yale ɓǝ̀ wal-luem ɓǝ̀ ǝn tsǝk girlina ko ɓè kǝgir a kunam sǝ pwari kpa ka!>>
2SA 3:36 Sǝ aɓwana kat falǝnǝ mǝnia ka, sǝ gìrnî pwasǝbumia. Yale koya gìr murǝm pè ka, pwasǝbum aɓwe kat.
2SA 3:37 Nda aɓwana kat andǝ Isǝrayila kat yi bwalte, a pwari mǝno ka, ama, murǝm ngga, buì pà aɓa wal-lú Abna, muna-ɓwabura mala Ner ɗàng.
2SA 3:38 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi amǝ'túró male ama, <<Wu sǝlǝ mbak ama, ɓwamǝgule nggea ɓwabura mǝcandǝe kpana yalung a Isǝrayila?
2SA 3:39 Yalung ngga, rǝàm-wukina, kat andǝ amani ama, mǝ nda murǝm mana à ɗārǝí ka. Aburana mǝnia, yià amuna mala Zeruya ka, à dupam nǝ kwanô kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh mbwe mǝtúró-ɓikea akúnì gìr mǝnana kārǝa arǝ ɓealɓikea male ka!>>
2SA 4:1 Lang Ishboshet, muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul ongŋǝna ama, Abna wuna a Hebǝron ngga, ɓabumi ɓunggio, sǝ Isǝrayila kat ka, múrí-kàrì.
2SA 4:2 A bàkú mǝno ka, muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul, yì Ishboshet ka, ndanǝ aburana ɓari mǝnana à nda ka amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur anggǝsan mala amǝ'lwa ace kánǝ tǝlliban ngga. Mwashat ateà ka, lullǝi ama, Baanah, sǝ ɓè ka, lullǝi ama, Rekap; yia mǝnia ka, amuna-burana mala Rimon, ɓwa Beerot a tàu mala Benjami na. (Beerot ka à ɓalli aɓa bu-nzali Benjami,
2SA 4:3 acemǝnana aɓwana mala Beerot ka, à ɓangŋa à nying Gittem, sǝ à yi do kǝla abǝri mǝnana à yiu ace dola ka, sǝ à nda kam ba yalung.)
2SA 4:4 Jonatan, muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul ka, ndanǝ muna-ɓwabura, mǝnana gbakǝri arǝ akusǝi ka. Yì ka, ndanǝ apǝlǝa tongno, sǝ cau pur a Jezǝril ama à walna Sawul andǝ Jonatan a munǝo. Mǝ'iulǝe twali ɓangŋa nǝ̀ umnǝi akaurǝa, sǝama lang nda aban ɓangŋa nǝ̀ o akaurǝa ka, kara muna kpa, nda duk gbakǝre ka. Lullǝi nda Mefiboshet.
2SA 4:5 Rekap andǝ Baanah, amuna-burana mala Rimon, ɓwa Beerot ka, à lo aban ká a ɓala mala Ishboshet. À kya bik banì nǝ pwarizǝkya, lang yì ka, ndaban nongŋo ace usǝlǝo mala pwarizǝkya ka.
2SA 4:6 Ɓwama mǝ'yál kunɓala ka nda aban nyaulǝki mǝssa-alkama; ntulo-ayiki sǝ koa ntulo; nda Rekap andǝ mǝ'eambi yi kúti zàng ngga.
2SA 4:7 Lang à kutina aɓa ɓala ka, à kum Ishboshet, ndaban nongŋo amur gyangŋan-nongŋo aɓa ndà-nongŋo male. À zuɓi, à wal-luí, sǝ à kasǝ ɓamúrí. Pǝlǝa à twal ɓamúrí sǝ à gingnǝi nǝ njar Araba dùkkù-dúkkú,
2SA 4:8 sǝ à yinǝ ɓamur Ishboshet aban Dauda a Hebǝron. Sǝ à banggi murǝm ama, <<Ɓamur Ishboshet nia ka, yì muna-ɓwabura mala Sawul, ɓiomǝbura, mǝnana alta yilǝmo ka; Yahweh mbwenî ɓwamǝgule mem, yì murǝm akúnì, amur Sawul andǝ nggurkwar male.>>
2SA 4:9 Sǝama Dauda nyesǝî Rekap andǝ mǝ'eambi Baanah, amuna-burana mala Rimon cau ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam, mǝnana akmúr yilǝmem aɓa koya tanni mana kumam ngga,
2SA 4:10 lang ɓeɓwa yiu a Zikǝlag sǝ banggam ama, <Sawul wuna ka,> ɓwê twali ama, ndarǝ yinǝàm nǝ bǝsacau mǝɓoarne. Sǝama ǝn bwal ɓwenî, ǝn wal-luí. Mǝno ka, nda tangnakusǝu mana ǝn pe wi ace bǝsacau male ka!
2SA 4:11 Sǝ acemǝnana wun aburana amǝɓealɓike, wu walna-lú mǝ'kunpwasǝa a ɓala male, sǝ amur gyangŋan-nongŋo male ka, mǝ nǝ pàkka wun gìr mǝnana ɓike-kútìbanì ka. Pà mǝ nǝ ɗice nkile a bù wun, sǝ mǝ nǝ kiɗiki wun a ɓanza re?>>
2SA 4:12 Nda Dauda, pè alaggana male nzongcau, sǝ à wal-luia ka. À kasǝki abuia andǝ akusǝia, sǝ à gyarkia tù a ban guguri mǝnana a Hebǝron ngga. Sǝama ɓamur Ishboshet ka, à twali à kya tsǝî a ɓembe-ɓa-tali mala Abna, a Hebǝron.
2SA 5:1 Pǝlǝa atau mala Isǝrayila kat yiu aban Dauda a Hebǝron, sǝ à ne wi ama, <<Sǝni, sǝm nda ka nkiliò andǝ nyamo.
2SA 5:2 Ɗiɗyal mǝnana Sawul nda murǝm amur sǝm ngga, a ndà ɓwamǝgule amur amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila. Sǝ Yahweh banggo ama, <Awu nǝ duk mǝ'yál aɓwana mem Isǝrayila, sǝ awu nǝ duk murǝm amur Isǝrayila.> >>
2SA 5:3 Akanó a Hebǝron Murǝm Dauda kùrcau nǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala Isǝrayila kat a ɓadǝm Yahweh lang à yina aban murǝm ngga. À ɗārǝ́ Dauda nǝ mùrú olif ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm amur Isǝrayila.
2SA 5:4 Dauda ka, ndanǝ apǝlǝa lumi-tàrú a ɓanza sǝ tita yálmúrû. Pàk apǝlǝa lumi-ine a buno-murǝm.
2SA 5:5 A Hebǝron ngga pàk apǝlǝa tongno-nong-ɓari nǝ azongŋo tongno-nong-mwashat nda murǝm amur Yahuda, sǝ a Urǝshalima ka, pàk apǝlǝa lumi-tàrú nǝ mǝsǝì tàrú nda murǝm amur Isǝrayila kat andǝ Yahuda.
2SA 5:6 Pǝlǝa murǝm lo andǝ aburana male sǝ à wari a Urǝshalima ace kánǝ lwa arǝ amǝ'Jebus, yì aɓwana mǝnana à nda à tita do a mǝno yì là ɗiɗyal sǝ à ndakam ngga. Amǝ'Jebus sà'arǝ Dauda ama, <<A pà nǝ kútí kani ɗang! Nggearǝ ante andǝ gbakǝre ma'sǝm kārǝ́na à nǝ̀ mgbalio.>> Yia amǝ'Jebus ka à kǝ twali ama Dauda pà nǝ̀ gandǝ kúti kano nǝ̀ ak là arǝia ɗàng, nda tsǝa sǝ à bang anggo ka.
2SA 5:7 Sǝ kat andǝ amani ka, Dauda ak ban-mǝcandǝe mala Siyona mǝnana ado à kǝ tunǝi ama Nggea-là mala Dauda ka.
2SA 5:8 A pwari mǝno ka Dauda bang ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana kat nǝ̀ kánǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'Jebus ka, dumǝna púp nǝ̀ kàr nǝ njar-tǝta'nzali mala mùr sǝ nǝ̀ bik ban amǝno yì <agbakǝre andǝ ante,> mǝnana à nda ka aɓibura mala Dauda ka.>> Acemani ka, à bang ama, agbakǝre andǝ ante pa nǝ kùtí a ɓalae ɗàng.
2SA 5:9 Anggo sǝ Dauda nyesǝ ban-mǝcandǝe pǝlǝ là do male, sǝ tunǝi ama Nggea-là mala Dauda. Sǝ Dauda ɓakiaɓa kàrì banì, tite a ban Millo aban ká a ɓalǝu.
2SA 5:10 Anggo sǝ Dauda lidǝmba nǝ gulo aɓa rǝcandǝa mala yálban, acemǝnana Yahweh Ɓakuli mǝnana Karban kat nǝ Gulo ka nda atè.
2SA 5:11 Hiram, Murǝm mala nzali Taya tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân aban Dauda, nǝ agbǝlang nggun-seda, andǝ amǝ'túró shàr-nggun andǝ gballi-nggun, andǝ amǝ'túró ɓun-tali ace ɓak sheran, sǝ à ɓakkî Dauda ɓala.
2SA 5:12 Nda Dauda yi sǝlǝ ama Yahweh dumsǝni mbak-kàngkàng yì nda murǝm amur Isǝrayila, sǝ ɗǝm ngga Yahweh hangǝlina domurǝm male atàcau mala aɓwana male Isǝrayila.
2SA 5:13 Anzǝm mǝnana Dauda tùrǝ́nǝì Hebǝron sǝ yina a Urǝshalima ka, twalki amā-twala sǝ alki amamǝna amur amǝnana ndanǝia ka, sǝ à ɓǝlî Dauda amuna-burana andǝ amuna-mamǝna amur amǝnana ndanǝia ka.
2SA 5:14 Amǝnia ka à nda ka alullǝ amuna-burana mala Dauda mǝnana à ɓǝlia a Urǝshalima ka: Shamuwa, andǝ Shobap, andǝ Natan, andǝ Solomon,
2SA 5:15 andǝ Ibǝhar, andǝ Elishuwa, andǝ Nefeg, andǝ Jafiya,
2SA 5:16 andǝ Elishama, andǝ Eliyada, sǝ Elifelet.
2SA 5:17 Lang amǝ'Filisti ok ama à ɗārǝ́na Dauda nda murǝm amur Isǝrayila ka, amǝ'Filisti kat o a alta Dauda ace gbamì. Sǝama Dauda okce, nda sulǝo wari aɓa kanggǝrang-ban ngga.
2SA 5:18 Adyan ngga amǝ'Filisti yiu, sǝ à mesǝ aɓa Ɓangŋaban Refayim.
2SA 5:19 Pǝlǝa Dauda alta nê mala Yahweh ama, <<Mǝ kyan nǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti le? Awu nǝ tasǝia aɓa buam le?>> Sǝ Yahweh earî Dauda ama, <<E, kyane. Mbak-kàngkàng mǝ nǝ tasǝ amǝ'Filisti aɓa buo.>>
2SA 5:20 Nda Dauda wari a Baal-perazim sǝ gandǝ amǝ'Filisti abanì; sǝ bang ama, <<Yahweh ar aɓalǝ aɓiam-mǝbura a ɓadǝmbam kǝla ara mala mùrɓangŋa.>> Acemani ka, tunǝ lullǝ banì ama Baal-perazim.
2SA 5:21 Amǝ'Filisti nying aɓǝ̀nzál malea a banì, sǝ Dauda andǝ aburana male pwania à umnǝia.
2SA 5:22 Amǝ'Filisti yiu ɗǝm, sǝ à yi mesǝ aɓa Ɓangŋaban Refayim.
2SA 5:23 Sǝ lang Dauda ɗìbancau a ban Yahweh ka, Yahweh banggi wi ama, <<A pa wunǝ ká arǝia [kporong] ɗàng. A kún mani ka, kàr nǝnzǝmia sǝ wu yiu arǝia nǝ ɓadǝm anggun nkǝling-kǝling.
2SA 5:24 Sǝ lang awu nǝ ok gì gya mala twalkusǝu-anzǝmarǝia ani a ɓong anggun nkǝling-kǝling ngga, gbaratè akaurǝa, acemǝnana anggo ka, Yahweh angŋǝ́nò-dǝmba purna a ɓadǝmbo ace ká wàl amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti.>>
2SA 5:25 Nda Dauda pàk gìrnî kǝla mǝnana Yahweh tsǝki wi nzongcau ka, wàl amǝ'Filisti tite a Gibiyon aban ká ɗār a Geza.
2SA 6:1 Dauda nyare ramba aburana mala Isǝrayila mǝnana à tarkia ka kat abanɓwáná, aɓwana á-lumi-tàrú.
2SA 6:2 Pǝlǝa Dauda lo andǝ aburana mǝnana kat à nda atè ka, sǝ à wari a Baala aɓa bu-nzali Yahuda, ace twal Akwati Kùrcau a ban mǝno, à nǝ̀ yinǝi, yì Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli, mǝnana à tunǝi nǝ Lullǝì, nggearǝ lullǝ Yahweh, Mǝtala Abangŋo, mǝnana do amur bunomurǝm a nre ka acerup amur Akwatinî ka.
2SA 6:3 À tamsǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli amur bǝsa keke-ndá sǝ à pur nǝi a ɓala mala Aminadap, mǝnana nda amur mgbangban ngga. Uzza andǝ Ahiyo, amuna-burana mala Aminadap ka à nda à kǝ gingnǝ bǝsa keke-ndê ka.
2SA 6:4 À pur nǝi nǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli amurí, a ɓala mala Aminadap, mǝnana nda amur mgbangban ngga. Ahiyo na aban gya a ɓadǝm Akwatini.
2SA 6:5 Sǝ Dauda andǝ ɓala Isǝrayila kat ka, à ndaban pakkiɗire, à kǝ yalke aɓadǝm Yahweh, nǝ nggyal andǝ walki adànà andǝ azangŋan, andǝ akarata-bu, andǝ awassak, andǝ akpaksha.
2SA 6:6 Sǝama lang à yina a katǝra mala Nakon ngga, ndǎ annda, pǝlǝa Uzza lǝmdǝ buì bwal Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli [ace mǝnana ɓǝkǝa kpa raka.]
2SA 6:7 Kara bumlulla mala Yahweh earke arǝ Uzza, sǝ Ɓakuli koè túrí a nzali a banì atàcau mala mǝnia yì yàl-nzong ngga. Nda Uzza wù akǝ banì a nkanggari Akwati mala Ɓakuli ka.
2SA 6:8 Sǝ bum Dauda lúllô ace ara mala bumlulla mala Yahweh amur Uzza; nda tunǝ lullǝ banì ama Perez Uzza, sǝ anggo sǝ à kǝ tunǝi piu ba yalung ngga.
2SA 6:9 Ɓangciu pàkkî Dauda arǝ Yahweh a pwari mǝno ka, sǝ bang ama, <<Lang sǝ Akwati mala Yahweh nǝ̀ yiu abanam?>>
2SA 6:10 Dauda eare nǝ̀ yinǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh aɓa Nggea-là mala Dauda ɗàng; a kún mani ka kàrnǝi a ɓala mala Obed-Edom ɓwa'Gitti.
2SA 6:11 Nda Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh ue a ɓala mala Obed-Edom azongŋo tàrú, sǝ Yahweh tsǝkî Obed-Edom bù andǝ amǝ'ɓala male kat.
2SA 6:12 Cau yiu aban Dauda ama, <<Yahweh tsǝngŋǝ́nì ɓala mala Obed-Edom bù andǝ gir mǝnana kat ndanǝi ka, atàcau mala Akwati mala Ɓakuli.>> Nda Dauda wario kya twal Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli a ɓala mala Obed-Edom, sǝ yinǝi a Nggea-là mala Dauda nǝ banɓoarnado ka.
2SA 6:13 Lang aburana mana à kǝ twal Akwati mala Yahweh twalna kusǝia tongno-nong-mwashat ka, Dauda pà gir'nkila nǝ jamnda andǝ muna-ndǎ mǝ'nyane.
2SA 6:14 Dauda oasǝ efot mala nggubyau linǝn arǝì sǝ ndaban ta'nggwam nǝ rǝcandǝa male kat aɓadǝm Yahweh.
2SA 6:15 Anggo sǝ Dauda andǝ ɓala Isǝrayila kat yinǝ Akwati mala Yahweh, nǝ ɓuà-gāwàn andǝ twang anjawe.
2SA 6:16 Sǝ lang à ndaban kúti nǝ Akwati mala Yahweh aɓa Nggea-là mala Dauda ka, Mikal, ɓoarnsarile Sawul sǝnban a mǝsǝkurǝm. Sǝ lang sǝn Murǝm Dauda aban yalke sǝ kǝ ta'nggwam a ɓadǝm Yahweh ka, kara ɓǝsǝki Dauda a ɓabumi.
2SA 6:17 À kùtí nǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh sǝ à kya tamsǝi a ban male, aɓa tara mǝnana à loasǝi aceì ka; sǝ Dauda pāki apagir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ apagir mala dotarǝu aɓadǝm Yahweh.
2SA 6:18 Anzǝm mǝnana Dauda malna pāki apagir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ apagir mala dotarǝu ka, tsǝkî aɓwana bù aɓa lullǝ Yahweh, Mǝtala Abangŋo.
2SA 6:19 Sǝ gakì aɓwe kat, aɓa ɓwabundǝa mala Isǝrayila puppup, bǝredi, andǝ nyama, andǝ kyak mala dabino, andǝ kyak mala ɓǝla-anap mǝ'ime; pè koyan ngga kāmbe, aburana andǝ amamǝna kat. Anzǝm mǝno ka aɓwana mesǝ kat, sǝ koyan ngga nyar a ɓala male.
2SA 6:20 Pǝlǝa Dauda nyare nǝ̀ ká a ɓala ace tsǝkî amǝ'ɓala male bù. Sǝama [māmí] Mikal muna-ɓwama mala Sawul puro nǝ̀ nggá kúllì, sǝ bang ama, <<Ɓafo yalung ngga murǝm Isǝrayila pànî ɓamúrì gulo kpana-kpana, mǝnana swár agir'nggūrǝì sǝ pur nǝ ɓarǝì aɓa ɗwanyi kǝsǝkya, a mǝsǝ aguro male, aburana andǝ amamǝna, kǝla mǝnana mwashat atà aburana mǝɓane kǝ pak ka!>>
2SA 6:21 Pǝlǝa Dauda earî Mikal ama, <<Mǝ nda [aban ta'nggwam] aɓadǝm Yahweh, mǝnana nying tárró andǝ ɓala male kat sǝ twalam, nyesǝam mǝ duk mǝdǝmba amur Isǝrayila aɓwana mala Yahweh ka. Acemani ka, mǝ nǝ pakkiɗire aɓadǝm Yahweh.
2SA 6:22 Mǝ nǝ tsǝk ɓamúràm aɓa kǝsǝkya mǝnana kútì mǝno ka, sǝ mǝ nǝ dum nǝ kyauwikiban a mǝsǝàm. Sǝama a mǝsǝ aguro amamǝna mǝno a bangcea ka, mǝ nǝ dum nǝ gulo!>>
2SA 6:23 Nda Mikal, muna-ɓwama mala Sawul ue nkombi na aɓa do-yilǝmu male kat.
2SA 7:1 Murǝm Dauda ka, Yahweh pe wi usǝlǝo, yállí arǝ aɓi-mǝbura mǝnana kat à gumbǝli ka, sǝ yi do a ɓala male.
2SA 7:2 Pǝlǝa murǝm ne Natan mǝɓangnǝa ama, <<Sǝni, mǝ ndya ǝn do a ɓala mǝnana à ɓè nǝ nggun-seda ka, sǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Yahweh ka nda kano a gumli.>>
2SA 7:3 Natan earî murǝm ama, <<Pàk gìr mǝnana kat a ndanǝi a ɓabumo ka, acemǝnana Yahweh na atò.>>
2SA 7:4 Sǝama àkǝ̀ dù mǝno ka Yahweh ne Natan ama:
2SA 7:5 <<Kyane kya ne guro mem Dauda ama, <Mǝnia ka nda cau mala Yahweh: A nda mǝnana awu nǝ ɓakkam ɓala mǝ duk kam ngga le?
2SA 7:6 Twal a pwarian mǝnana ǝn pusǝ amǝ Isǝrayila a Masar bà yalung ngga, ǝn duk ma aɓa ɓekǝ ɓala ɗàng. Ən nggǝ turki nǝ turkio arǝ abân, aɓa gumli kǝla ban-do mem.
2SA 7:7 Arǝ abân mǝnana kat ǝn gingnǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kat kàm ngga, ǝn ɓua nǝ kǝ ɓwa atà aɓwana-mǝgule mǝnana ǝn twalia ace yál aɓwana mem amǝ Isǝrayila ka ama, <<Ace mana sǝ wu ɓakkam ɓala nǝ nggun-seda raka>>le?>
2SA 7:8 <<Acemani ka, banggi guro mem Dauda ama: <Mǝnia ka nda cau mǝnana Yahweh Mǝtala Abangŋo kǝ bang ngga: Ən twalo a ban yál-agir a bondo, a ban gyata anzur andǝ ambul, sǝ ǝn nyesǝo a pǝlǝ mǝgulo amur aɓwana mem Isǝrayila.
2SA 7:9 Ban mǝnana kat a wari kam ngga, mǝ nda atò, sǝ ǝn twalta aɓio-amǝbura kat a ɓadǝmbo. Ado ka mǝ nǝ tsǝk lullǝo nǝ̀ zǝ́kí kpǝm, kǝla mala aɓwana amǝgulke mala ɓanza.
2SA 7:10 Mǝ nǝ kumbi aɓwana mem Isǝrayila ban-do, sǝ mǝ nǝ dumsǝia kàm, ace mǝnana ɓǝà do a nzali mǝnana malea na ka, sǝ kǝ ɓwa pà nǝ̀ zorǝia ɗǝm ɗàng. Aɓwana amǝɓealɓike pà nǝ̀ paria ɗǝm, kǝla mǝnana à pangnǝia ɗiɗyal,
2SA 7:11 tite arǝ apǝlǝa mǝnana ǝn twal akasǝla amur aɓwana mem Isǝrayila ka ɗàng. Sǝ mǝ nǝ po usǝlǝo arǝ aɓio-amǝbura. Mim Yahweh ǝn nggǝ nô ama, nǝnggearǝam, mǝ nǝ tsǝo nggurkwar mò ɓǝ̀ duk ɓala-murǝm.
2SA 7:12 Lang a yi wuna, à tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nó atà akeô ka, mǝ nǝ loasǝ mwashat atà amǝkeo, mǝnana nǝ̀ pùr a tǝrto ka, ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm a buno mô, sǝ mǝ nǝ tsǝk domurǝm male ɓǝ̀ cam nǝ rǝcandǝa.
2SA 7:13 Yì nda ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ ɓakkam ɓala, ace lullǝam ngga. Sǝ buno-murǝm mala domurǝm male ka, mǝ nǝ kwákítè nǝ̀ cam kàngkàng, málá male pà kàm ɗàng.
2SA 7:14 Mǝ nǝ duk tárrû abaní, sǝ yì ka nǝ̀ duk munem. Ɓǝ̀ pàk cauɓikea ka, mǝ nǝ gilǝki, mǝ nǝ kwarkiri nǝ nkamso, kǝla mǝnana koya tárrú nǝ̀ pàngnǝ muni ka.
2SA 7:15 Sǝ pěmǝɓoarne aɓa earcearǝu mem mana kǝ dǝurǝ raka, pà nǝ̀ nyingte, kǝla mǝnana ǝn twali arǝ Sawul ka ɗàng, yì Sawul mǝnana ǝn pusǝì ace mǝnana wu duk murǝm ngga.
2SA 7:16 Ɓala mò andǝ domurǝm mò ka, à nǝ̀ lidǝmba a ɓadǝmbam, tè pà nǝ̀ mal ɗang, sǝ buno-murǝm mò ka, nǝ̀ cam kàngkàng masǝlǝate pà kàm ɗàng.> >>
2SA 7:17 Natan banggi Dauda acau mǝnia ka kat kǝla mǝnana à lǝmdǝì wi aɓa sǝna mǝnia kat ka.
2SA 7:18 Pǝlǝa Murǝm Dauda wario sǝ kya do aɓadǝm Yahweh, sǝ bang ama: <<Mǝ nda yana, sǝ mana nda ɓala mem, mǝnana We Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli, a pakki agir mǝnia kat acem ngga?
2SA 7:19 Sǝ kat andǝ amani ka, mǝno a mǝsǝo, We Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli ka, gìr mǝ kyauwe na, acemǝnana a nyare a nacau amur ɓala mem, mim guro mò, amur gìr mǝnana awu nǝ̀ pè, arǝ anza mǝnana à nǝ̀ yiu kuko ka. Anggo sǝ a kǝ pangnǝ aɓwapǝndǝa kat le, We Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli?
2SA 7:20 Mana ɗǝm mim Dauda, mǝ nǝ gandǝ banggo? A súrǝ́nà yan nda mim, guro mò, We Mǝtalabangŋo Yahweh.
2SA 7:21 Nda atàcau mala pacau mò, sǝ aɓa kpata kàne mò sǝ a pàk mǝnia yì gìr mǝgule ka, sǝ a lǝmdǝí abanam mim guro mò, ace mǝnana mǝ sǝlǝce ka.
2SA 7:22 Acemani ka, gulo ka mona, We Mǝtalabangŋo Yahweh! Kǝ ɓwa pà kàm kǝla we ɗàng, sǝ kǝ Ɓakuli pa kàm ɗàng she we, kǝla mǝnana sǝm oè nǝ kir sǝm ngga!
2SA 7:23 Ya nzali mala aɓwapǝndǝa na kam mwashat a ɓanza kǝla aɓwana mô Isǝrayila, mǝnana We Ɓakuli malea a pur ace ká akmúria kǝla aɓwana ace ɓamúrò, sǝ ace kumbì ɓamúrò lullǝu ka? A pàkki agir mǝgulke andǝ agir kàrmúrû acea, nǝ pǝr anzali mala aɓwapǝndǝa andǝ aɓakuli malea a ɓadǝmbia, yia aɓwana mô mǝnana a akmúria a Masar ka.
2SA 7:24 A tsǝk Isǝrayila ɓǝ̀ duk aɓwana mô tàtǝ́k, sǝ We Yahweh ka a dumǝna Ɓakuli malea.
2SA 7:25 Sǝ adyan ngga, We Yahweh Ɓakuli, cau mǝnana a ne amuram mim guro mò sǝ amur ɓala mem ngga, lùmsǝì ɓǝ̀ kum came tàtǝ́k. Pè kǝla mǝnana a ne ka,
2SA 7:26 ace mǝnana lullǝo ɓǝ̀ dum nǝ gulo tàtǝ́k ka. Sǝ aɓwana nǝ̀ bang ama, <Yahweh, Mǝtala Abangŋo, nda Ɓakuli amur Isǝrayila!> Sǝ ɓala mala guro mò, mim Dauda ka ɓǝ̀ lidǝmba aɓadǝmbo tàtǝ́k,
2SA 7:27 acemǝnana We Yahweh mǝnana a Karban Kat nǝ Gulo, yì Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila ka, a lǝmdǝni abanam, mim guro mò ama, awu nǝ ɓakkâm ɓala. Nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ mim guro mò ka, ǝn kum mǝsǝkàngkàngŋa mala pakhiwi a bano ani ka.
2SA 7:28 Ado ka, We Yahweh Ɓakuli, a nda Ɓakuli, sǝ acau mò ka mǝsǝcau na. A panacau mala mǝnia yì gìr mǝɓoarne ka abanam, mim guro mò.
2SA 7:29 Acemani ka, ɓǝ̀ bumo pwasǝo wu tsǝki ɓala mala guro mò bù, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ lidǝmba tàtǝ́k aɓadǝmbo. We Yahweh Ɓakuli ka, a angŋa-dǝmba a nanacau, sǝ nǝ tsǝkbu mò ka, ɓala mala guro mò nǝ̀ kum tsǝkbu tàtǝ́k.>>
2SA 8:1 Anzǝm mǝnia ka, Dauda gandǝ amǝ'Filisti a lwa, sǝ yinǝia aɓata rǝcandǝa male; sǝ ak nggea-là Meteg Ammah a ɓabù amǝ'Filisti.
2SA 8:2 Ɗǝm ngga, Dauda gandǝ nzali Mowap a lwa. Pǝlǝa tsǝk amǝ'Mowap à nonggi a nzali a nkanggari-arǝia. Karǝki sarǝa mala nongŋo malea nǝ nggúr. Abanì ɓari aɓa gauwe tàrú mala aɓwana mǝno ka, wal-luia, sǝ nying banì mwashat nǝyilǝmu. Amǝ'Mowap duk aguro mala Dauda, sǝ à yinǝì wi nǝ agir-cemi.
2SA 8:3 Lang Hadadeza muna-ɓwabura mala Rehop, murǝm Zoba puro ace ká nyesǝ bu-nzali mǝnana a ban Nggeasala Yiufǝretis, aɓata rǝcandǝa male ka, Dauda gandǝi a lwa amur njar.
2SA 8:4 Dauda gbami amǝpǝr á-mwashat nǝ gbǝman-tongno-nong-ɓari (1,700) andǝ asoje-kusǝu á-lumi-ɓari (20,000) arǝ murǝm Zoba. Sǝ Dauda kasǝki amazo kusǝ apǝr mǝno kat, sǝama nying aɓea ɗǝkǝm mǝnana à nǝ̀ nggǝ ɓangnǝ awaru-pǝr gbǝman-mwashat ka (100).
2SA 8:5 Sǝ lang amǝ'Aram mala Damaska yiu ace bwalì Hadadeza murǝm Zoba munǝo ka, Dauda wal-lú amǝ'lwa malea á-lumi-ɓari-nong-ɓari (22,000).
2SA 8:6 Dauda tamsǝ anggǝsan mala amǝ'lwa aɓalǝ amǝ'Aram a Damaska. Amǝ'Aram duk aguro mala Dauda, sǝ à yinǝì wi nǝ agir-cemi. Yahweh pè Dauda limurǝm arǝ abân mǝnana kat wari kam ngga.
2SA 8:7 Dauda ak atongŋo bolo-njengǝlan mǝnana à nda a bù amǝgulo mala Hadadeza ka, sǝ yinǝia a Urǝshalima.
2SA 8:8 Ɗǝm ngga, Murǝm Dauda pwan bolo-bángŋá kpǝm a Teba andǝ Berotai, anggea-là mala Hadadeza.
2SA 8:9 Lang Toyi murǝm Hamat ok ama Dauda gandǝna amǝ'lwa mala Hadadeza puppup ka,
2SA 8:10 pǝlǝa tasǝ Joram muna-ɓwabura male aban Murǝm Dauda, ɓǝ̀ kya makki-wi-kûn sǝ ɓǝ̀ tsǝki wi bù ace limurǝm mǝnana kum a lwa amur Hadadeza ka. Toyi pàk anggo acemǝnana ɗiɗyal ka Hadadeza camarǝ lwa-lwa andǝ Toyi tùtù. Joram yinǝì murǝm Dauda agirtúró mǝnana à pea nǝ bolo-azǝrfa, andǝ bolo-njengǝlan, andǝ bolo-bángŋá ka a buì.
2SA 8:11 Murǝm Dauda tàr amǝnia yì agir ka ace Yahweh, atārǝia andǝ bolo-azǝrfa andǝ bolo-njengǝlan mana ea arǝ anzali mǝnana ɓunnia ka:
2SA 8:12 yià anggea-là mala Aram, andǝ Mowap, andǝ amala amǝ'Amon, andǝ amǝ'Filisti, andǝ amǝ'Amalek. Tària kat andǝ agǝna-lwa mǝnana pwania arǝ Hadadeza muna-ɓwabura mala Rehop, murǝm Zoba ka.
2SA 8:13 Lullǝ Dauda zǝ́kí, lang nyarǝni wal-lú aburana á-lum-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-tàrú (18,000) mala amǝ'Aram a Ɓangŋaban Tuɓamur ka.
2SA 8:14 Pǝlǝa tamsǝ anggǝsan mala amǝ'lwa male a Edom, sǝ amǝ'Edom kat pǝlǝ aguro male. Yahweh pè Dauda limurǝm arǝ abân mǝnana kat wari kam ngga.
2SA 8:15 Nda Dauda yálmúr Isǝrayila kat ka; sǝ pàkgìr aɓa mǝsǝcau andǝ ɓealɓoarna ace aɓwana male kat.
2SA 8:16 Jowap mǝnana nggè nda Zeruya ka, nda mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur amǝ'lwa mala Dauda; Jehoshafat muna-ɓwabura mala Ahilud nda mǝ'tsǝkacau aɓa malǝmce;
2SA 8:17 Zadok muna-ɓwabura mala Ahitup andǝ Ahimale muna-ɓwabura mala Abiyata ka, à nda ka apǝris; Serayia ka, mǝgilǝgir mala murǝm na;
2SA 8:18 Benaya muna-ɓwabura mala Jehoyada ka nda ɓwamǝgule mala amǝ'Keret andǝ amǝ'Pelet; sǝ amuna-burana mala Dauda ka, à nda ka apǝris.
2SA 9:1 Pǝlǝa Dauda ɗìban ama, <<Kǝɓwa ueo atà amǝ'ɓala mala Sawul, mǝnana mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝì wi pěmǝɓoarne atàcau mala Jonatan ngga re?>>
2SA 9:2 Adyan ngga, ɓè mǝturo-ɓala nakam a ɓala mala Sawul, lùllǝì ama Ziba. À tunǝi, sǝ yiu aɓadǝm Dauda. Pǝlǝa murǝm Dauda ɗì ama, <<A nda Ziba le?>> Ziba ear ama, <<E, mǝ nda, mim guro mò.>>
2SA 9:3 Murǝm ɗì ama, <<Kǝɓwa pà kàm a ɓala mala Sawul mana ue mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝì wi pěmǝɓoarne mala Ɓakuli ka re?>> Ziba earî murǝm ama, <<Ɓè muna-ɓwabura mala Jonatan nakam; gbakǝre na arǝ akusǝi kǝm.>>
2SA 9:4 Murǝm ɗìban ama, <<Ndake?>> Ziba pe wi eare ama, <<Nda a ɓala mala Makir muna-ɓwabura mala Ammiyel a Lo-Debar.>>
2SA 9:5 Pǝlǝa murǝm Dauda túrban a ɓala mala Makir muna-ɓwabura mala Ammiyel, a Lo-Debar, sǝ à kya yinǝ Mefiboshet.
2SA 9:6 Lang Mefiboshet muna-ɓwabura mala Jonatan, mǝ'kà Sawul yina aban Dauda ka, yi ɓun a nzali ace pe wi gulo. Dauda tunǝban ama, <<Mefiboshet!>> Pǝlǝa Mefiboshet ear ama, <<Mǝ ndya ka, mim guro mò.>>
2SA 9:7 Dauda ne wi ama, <<Ɓangciu ɓǝkǝa pakko ɗàng, acemǝnana mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝo pěmǝɓoarne atàcau mala tárró Jonatan. Mǝ nǝ nyesǝô anzali mala keò Sawul, sǝ awu nǝ̀ nggǝ ligirlina a kpamgbang-lǐ mem.>>
2SA 9:8 Nda Mefiboshet nyare ɓun a nzali sǝ bang ama, <<Mǝ nda yana mǝnana awu nǝ̀ ɗenyinǝ mim ngga? Yì mim guro mò mǝnana ǝn kútì luna nva nǝ gulo raka.>>
2SA 9:9 Pǝlǝa Dauda tunǝ Ziba, mǝtúró mala Sawul, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Ən pani Mefiboshet mǝ'kà mǝtala-ɓala mò agir mǝnana kat amala Sawul andǝ ɓala male na ka.
2SA 9:10 We wunǝ amuna-burana mô, sǝ amǝ'túró-ɓala mò ka, wun nǝ̀ nggǝ rikì wi ɓaban male, sǝ wun nǝ̀ nggǝ yinǝi wi agirɓaban male, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ wu kúmbi muna-ɓwabura mala mǝtala-ɓala mò girlina mǝnana nǝ̀ lì ka. Sǝama Mefiboshet mǝ'kà mǝtala-ɓala mò ka, nǝ̀ nggǝ ligirlina a kpamgbang-lǐ mem koya pwari.>> (A bàkú mǝno ka, Ziba ndanǝ amuna-burana lum-bwamdǝ-tongno andǝ amǝ'túró-ɓala lumi-ɓari.)
2SA 9:11 Pǝlǝa Ziba banggi murǝm ama, <<Mim guro mò ka, mǝ nǝ̀ pàk gìr kat kǝla mǝnana we, mǝtala-ɓala mem, yì murǝm, a nam ama mǝ pak ka.>> Nda Mefiboshet ligirlina a kpamgbang-lǐ mala murǝm Dauda, kǝla mwashat aɓalǝ amuna-burana mala murǝm ngga.
2SA 9:12 Mefiboshet ndanǝ muna-ɓwabura lo-ɓwa, lùllǝì ama Mika. Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à ndanǝdo a ɓala mala Ziba ka, à duk amǝ'túró mala Mefiboshet.
2SA 9:13 Nda Mefiboshet do a Urǝshalima, acemǝnana kǝ ligirlina a kpamgbang-lǐ mala murǝm koya pwari ka. Yì ka, gbakǝre na arǝ akusǝi kǝm.
2SA 10:1 Anzǝm mǝnia ka, Nahash murǝm mala amǝ'Amon paklú, sǝ Hanun muna-ɓwabura male eau a buno-murǝm.
2SA 10:2 Pǝlǝa Dauda bang ama, <<Mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝì Hanun muna-ɓwabura mala Nahash pěmǝɓoarne kǝla mǝnana tárrí lǝmdǝam pěmǝɓoarne ka.>> Nda Dauda tasǝ aɓea amǝ'túró male ace giriki Hanun atàcau mala lú mala tárrí ka. Lang amǝ'túró mala Dauda yiu a nzali mala amǝ'Amon ngga,
2SA 10:3 amǝgulo mala amǝ'Amon banggi Hanun ɓwamǝgule malea ama, <<A kǝ sǝni kǝla Dauda naban gusǝlǝ tárró, mǝnana tasǝ amǝgirikiban a bano ka le? Awo, Dauda tasǝia a bano ace shenzǝ nggea-là ma'sǝm andǝ pelǝki ɓalǝi, ace mǝnana ɓǝà yinǝ kpa-kiɗìkì male ka!>>
2SA 10:4 Nda Hanun gbami amǝtúró mala Dauda, sǝ mwaki koyan atea ka gauwa-tsùrú mala mbotokuni. Pǝlǝa kasǝki anggea-daura malea aɓalǝu yi sulǝ a ɓunnia, sǝ tasǝia ɓǝà o.
2SA 10:5 Lang à banggi Dauda mǝnia yì cau ka, tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân ɓǝà kya kumia, sǝ ɓǝà banggia wia ama, <<Wu ue a Jeriko sheɓǝ̀ ambotokun wun twangŋǝna ka, sǝ wu nyar a là.>> Acemǝnana gìr mǝno à pàkkia wia ka tsǝia aɓa kǝsǝkya kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
2SA 10:6 Lang amǝ'Amon sǝni ama à pàngŋǝ̀nà gìr mǝnana tsǝa Dauda nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝia ka, à túrban sǝ à pà boalo aban amǝ'lwa mala aɓea anzali ɓǝà yi camatea: asoje-kusǝu á-lumi-ɓari (20,000) mala amǝ'Aram mala bu-nzali Bet-Rehop andǝ amǝ'Aram mala bu-nzali Zoba, andǝ murǝm mala Ma'aka nǝ aburana á-mwashat (1,000) atè, sǝ aburana á-lum-nong-ɓari (12,000) mala bu-nzali Top.
2SA 10:7 Lang Dauda okce ka, tasǝ Jowap andǝ amǝ'lwa puppup, yià akanggǝrang aburana, ɓǝà kya munǝo arǝia.
2SA 10:8 Amǝ'Amon puro, sǝ à tsaɗi akunarǝia a bankutio mala kún nggea-là [Rabba] ace munǝo, sǝ amǝ'Aram mala Zoba andǝ Rehop, andǝ aburana mala Top andǝ Ma'aka ka, à twal bancame malea tarang a ɓawan.
2SA 10:9 Lang Jowap sǝni ama nzong-kún'munǝo nakam aɓadǝmbi sǝ ɓè nakam a nzǝmi, ace yiu arǝì ka, tàrki aɓea aburana aɓalǝ aburana mǝnana à ɓoarî acili aburana kat a Isǝrayila ka, pǝlǝa tamsǝia aɓa gilǝrǝu ace tùl andǝ amǝ'Aram.
2SA 10:10 Sǝ acili aburana ka, Jowap nyia a ɓabù mǝ'eambǝi Abishai, sǝ tamsǝia aɓa gilǝrǝu ace tùl andǝ amǝ'Amon.
2SA 10:11 Jowap ne Abishai ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ amǝ'Aram kutiam nǝ rǝcandǝa ka, awu nǝ yiu ace bwalàm; sǝ ɓǝ̀ amǝ'Amon kútiǒ nǝ rǝcandǝa ka, mǝ nǝ ká ace bwalò.
2SA 10:12 Ɓǝ̀ mǝsǝ sǝm candǝe, sǝ ɓǝ̀ sǝm munǝ nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa ace aɓwana ma'sǝm, sǝ ace anggea-là mala Ɓakuli ma'sǝm! Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh pàk gìr mǝnana ɓoari wi a mǝsǝi ka.>>
2SA 10:13 Nda Jowap andǝ amǝ'lwa mǝnana à nda atè ka, à sung tù ace munǝo arǝ amǝ'Aram, kara amǝ'Aram ndǝli nǝ mire aɓadǝmbi.
2SA 10:14 Sǝ lang amǝ'Amon sǝni ama amǝ'Aram ɓangŋǝna ka, yià gbal ka à ndǝli nǝ mire aɓadǝm Abishai, sǝ à kya kutikio aɓa nggea-là malea. Pǝlǝa Jowap nyarî munǝo arǝ amǝ'Amon, sǝ yiu a Urǝshalima.
2SA 10:15 Sǝama lang amǝ'Aram sǝnǝni ama amǝ'Isǝrayila gandǝnia ka, à nyare à ram rǝia abanɓwáná.
2SA 10:16 Pǝlǝa Hadadeza murǝm Zoba túrban nǝ cau aban amǝ'Aram mǝnana à nda a takuli mala Nggeasala Yiufǝretis ka; sǝ à yiu a Helam; sǝ Shobak mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'lwa mala Hadadeza duk múrià.
2SA 10:17 Lang Dauda okce ka, ram Isǝrayila kat abanɓwáná, à yàlî Nggeasala Jodan, sǝ à wari a Helam. Pǝlǝa amǝ'Aram gilǝrǝia a nzong-kún'munǝo ace ká je andǝ Dauda, sǝ à soa munǝo arǝì.
2SA 10:18 Sǝama amǝ'Aram ndǝli nǝ mire aɓadǝm Isǝrayila; sǝ Dauda wal-lú amǝkok awaru-pǝr gbǝman-tongno-nong-ɓari (700) andǝ amǝpǝr á-lumi-ine (40,000), sǝ Shobak mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'lwa malea ka, à kwarí, sǝ wù abanì.
2SA 10:19 Lang amurǝma mǝnana kat à nda aɓata Hadadeza sǝni Isǝrayila gandǝnia ka, à alta dorǝpwala nǝ Isǝrayila, sǝ à duk aguro malea. Nda ɓangciu pàkki amǝ'Aram arǝ ká bwali amǝ'Amon ɗǝm ngga.
2SA 11:1 Nǝ kún gbangŋan, a bù-pǝlǝa mǝnana amurǝma kǝ umnǝi a lwa ka, Dauda tasǝ Jowap andǝ amǝtè andǝ [amǝ'lwa mala] Isǝrayila puppup ɓǝà o a munǝo arǝ amǝ'Amon. À kya kiɗiki amǝ'Amon, sǝ à kàrì Rabba, nggea-là malea a ɓalǝu. Sǝ yì Dauda ka ue a Urǝshalima.
2SA 11:2 A ɓè pwarikpǝra ka, Dauda loapi ban nongŋo sǝ ndaban gya a múr-kurǝm mala palta, kara sǝn ɓè ɓwama aban sussǝo. Mǝnia yì ɓwama ka ɓoarnsari kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
2SA 11:3 Pǝlǝa Dauda túrban ɓǝà kya ɗice yana nda mǝno yì ɓwama ka. Ɓwa mǝnana à túrí ka nyare yi banggi wi ama, <<Ɓwame ka lùllǝì nda Basheba muna-ɓwama mala Eliyam, sǝ yì nda mālá Yuriya ɓwa'Hitti.>>
2SA 11:4 Pǝlǝa Dauda túr amǝ'na-túrbân ɓǝà kya yinǝi; sǝ lang ɓwame yina a palta ka, Dauda yi nong nǝi. (Mǝno yì ɓwama ka ndo kǝ mal lakɓamuru male anzǝm sukkio mala nkila bumkwana male ka.) Pǝlǝa ɓwame nyare o a ɓala male.
2SA 11:5 Nǝnzǝ́mò lang Basheba yi sǝlǝ ama muna kpana a bumi ka, túrban ɓǝà kya banggi Dauda ama zongŋo kutini.
2SA 11:6 Pǝlǝa Dauda túrban nǝ cau aban Jowap ama, <<Tàsǝâm Yuriya ɓwa'Hitti ɓǝ̀ yiu.>> Nda Jowap tasǝta Yuriya aban Dauda ka.
2SA 11:7 Lang Yuriya yina aban Dauda ka, Dauda ɗi ama, <<Lang Jowap andǝ amǝ'lwa? Sǝ lang ká mala munǝo?>>
2SA 11:8 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi Yuriya ama, <<Kya a ɓala mò, sǝ wu lakki akusǝo.>> Nda Yuriya nying palta, sǝ murǝm tasǝban nǝ ɓoro ama ɓǝà pe wi.
2SA 11:9 Sǝama Yuriya ka, o a ɓala male ɗàng; nongŋo a kún ɓala mala murǝm atārǝia andǝ amǝ'túró mala mǝtala-ɓala male kat.
2SA 11:10 Lang à banggi Dauda ama Yuriya o a ɓala male raka, Dauda ɗì Yuriya ama, <<A nyari gya mǝsauwe adyan. Palang sǝ a wari a ɓala mò ɗàng?>>
2SA 11:11 Yuriya earî Dauda ama, <<Akwati Kùrcau, andǝ Isǝrayila andǝ Yahuda ka, à ndaban do aɓalǝ agumli; sǝ ɓwamǝgule mem Jowap andǝ aburana mala mǝtala-ɓala mem ngga, à nda a kàttì a patal. Palang sǝ ado ka mǝ nǝ ká a ɓala mem, mǝ li sǝ mǝ nu, sǝ mǝ nong nǝ māmám? Ən kanbo nǝ yilǝmo, pà mǝ nǝ pàk gìr kǝla man ɗang!>>
2SA 11:12 Pǝlǝa Dauda ne Yuriya ama, <<Kúndǝ nongŋo mwashat ɗǝm, sǝ lí ka mǝ nǝ nyio wu nyare.>> Nda Yuriya ueo a Urǝshalima a pwari mǝno andǝ pwari mǝnana anzǝm mǝno ka.
2SA 11:13 Pǝlǝa Dauda tunǝ Yuriya ɓǝ̀ yiu ɓǝ̀ lìli sǝ ɓǝ̀ nu atè, sǝ tsǝk Yuriya mba-walì. Sǝama nǝ pwarikpǝra ka, Yuriya puro wario kya nongŋo a kala male aɓalǝ aguro mala mǝtala-ɓala male; wari a ɓala male ɗàng.
2SA 11:14 Banfana nǝ dǝmbari ka, Dauda gilǝ cauterǝa aban ká aban Jowap sǝ pè Yuriya ɓǝ̀ kya pe wi.
2SA 11:15 Aɓa mǝno yì cauterǝa ka, Dauda narǝ ne Jowap ama, <<Tasǝ Yuriya a dǝmba a kun-munǝo a ban mǝnana munǝo candǝ kam ngga. Sǝ wu nyar nǝ ta wun, wu nying Yuriya ace mǝnana ɓǝà walì ɓǝ̀ wú.>>
2SA 11:16 Nda lang Jowap yinanǝ amǝ'lwa, à kárìna nggea-là Rabba ka, tasǝ Yuriya ɓǝ̀ o a buì mǝnana sǝlǝna ama a kàm sǝ akanggǝrang aburana mala aɓia-mǝbura pàk ka.
2SA 11:17 Lang amǝ'lwa mala aɓia-mǝbura mǝnana aɓa nggea-là purna sǝ à soa munǝo arǝ Jowap ka, à wal aɓea amǝ'lwa mala Dauda. Yuriya ɓwa'Hitti ka nda atà aɓwana mǝnana à walia ka.
2SA 11:18 Pǝlǝa Jowap tasǝban nǝ cau ɓǝà kya ne Dauda amur gìr mǝnana kat kǝ kumban a kún lwa ka.
2SA 11:19 Sǝ banggi mǝ'na-túrbân cau ama, <<Anzǝm mana a malǝna banggi murǝm acau mala agir mǝnana kat à kumban ngga,
2SA 11:20 yakǝla bum murǝm nǝ̀ lúllô sǝ nǝ̀ ɗiban ama, <Palang sǝ wu gbàshìban nggea-lê nǝ munǝo? Wu sǝlǝ mbo ama à nǝ̀ túr mundi nǝ múr sheran?
2SA 11:21 Yana wal-lú Abimale muna-ɓwabura mala Jerubbeshet? Ɓwama na mǝnana túr muna-taligo nǝ múr sheran amurí, sǝ wali wù ka re? Palang sǝ wu wari tù aban sheran?> Pǝlǝa awu nǝ ne wi ama, <Guro mò, yì Yuriya ɓwa'Hitti gbal ka wuna.> >>
2SA 11:22 Nda mǝ'na-túrbân mǝno puro o, sǝ yi banggi Dauda acau mǝnana kat Jowap tasǝi ɓǝ̀ yi nea ka.
2SA 11:23 Mǝ'na-túrbân mǝno ne Dauda ama, <<Bù aɓisǝm-mǝbura twalki arǝ sǝm, sǝ à pur atà sǝm a patal ace munǝo arǝ sǝm, sǝama sǝm cambia wia kàngkàng aban ká ɗār a bankutio mala kún nggea-lê.
2SA 11:24 Pǝlǝa amǝ'nta malea túr amundi nǝ múr sheran arǝ sǝm aguro mò, sǝ aɓea aɓwana atà aburana mala murǝm wù. Guro mo, yì Yuriya ɓwa'Hitti gbal ka wuna.>>
2SA 11:25 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi mǝ'na-túrbân mǝno ama, <<Banggi Jowap mǝnia yì cau ka ama, <Kǝa ɗeki mǝnia yì gìr kumban ngga ɓǝ̀ zurǝì ɗenyicau mò ɗàng, acemǝnana nggeabyau kǝ tàr ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ wal ka ɗàng. Wu lidǝmba nǝ nggiki nggea-lê nǝ munǝo, sǝ wu kiɗiki.> Ɓakɓabumi nǝ amǝnia yì acau ka.>>
2SA 11:26 Lang Basheba, mālá Yuriya ongŋǝna ama burí wuna ka, keban ace burí.
2SA 11:27 Anzǝm mǝnana Basheba malǝna ɓua burí ka, Dauda twali yinǝi a ɓala male yi duk māmí, sǝ ɓǝlî wi muna-ɓwabura. Sǝama mǝnia yì gìr Dauda pè ka, kiɗikibum Yahweh.
2SA 12:1 Yahweh túr Natan mǝɓangnǝa aban Dauda. Lang Natan yina aban Dauda ka, bang ama, <<Aburana nakam ɓari aɓa ɓè nggea-là, mwashat ka mǝkume na sǝ ɓì ka mǝ'tǝ̀r na.
2SA 12:2 Mǝkume ka ndanǝ andá andǝ anzur pas,
2SA 12:3 sǝ mǝ'tǝ̀r ka pànǝ kǝgìr ɗàng she kǝ mǝ-nzur mǝnana kúrrô lǝsǝì gul andǝ amuni ka. Mǝnia yì muna-nzur ka kǝ lili aɓa kwar mǝ'mwashati andǝ mǝtale, kǝ nù mùr aɓa kwar nû mùr male, sǝ pak ka mǝtale nǝ̀ nongsǝì a byalí. Mǝnia yì muna-nzur a baní ka nda kǝla ɓoarnsarile.
