2SA 12:4 <<A ɓè pwari ka, bǝri yipì mǝkume a ɓala male. Mǝkume ka earce ama nǝ̀ wàl mwashat atà agirkusǝu male nǝ̀ pak girlina ace bǝri mǝnana sulǝ a baní ka ɗàng; a kún mani ka, wario kya bwal kǝ muna-nzur mwashat mala mǝ'tǝ̀r man wàlì, lambǝî bǝri male.>>
2SA 12:5 Bum Dauda lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r arǝ mǝkume man. Kángìr aban Natan ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, ɓwa mǝnana pak mǝnia yì gìr ka ɓoaro ɓǝà wal-luí!
2SA 12:6 Dumǝna púp nǝ̀ mbwekî mǝ'tǝ̀r man anzur ine a kúnì mwashat, ace mǝnia yì gìr pè ka, acemǝnana pànǝ sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr ɗàng.>>
2SA 12:7 Natan ne Dauda ama, <<A nda kǝ ɓwe! Yahweh Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila na ama: <Ən ɗārǝo a duk murǝm amur Isǝrayila, sǝ ǝn amsǝo a ɓabù rǝcandǝa mala Sawul.
2SA 12:8 Ən po ɓala mala mǝtala-ɓala mò andǝ amāmí aɓata yálban mò. Ən po ɓala mala Isǝrayila andǝ mala Yahuda. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝnia kat ka karǝo raka, ɓǝ́n pano mǝnana kútì ka.
2SA 12:9 Ace mana sǝ a būrǝce cau mala Yahweh, ace pàk gìr mǝnana mǝɓike na ka a mǝsǝì? A wal-lú Yuriya ɓwa'Hitti nǝ nggeabyau mala amǝ'Amon, sǝ a twal māmí ɓǝ̀ duk mô.
2SA 12:10 Twal ado aban ká a dǝmba ka, ɓala mò pà nǝ̀ usǝlǝi lú mala aɓwana kam mǝnana à nǝ̀ walia nǝ nggeabyau ka ɗàng, acemǝnana a ɓǝsǝkiam, sǝ a twal mālá Yuriya ɓǝ̀ duk māmó.>
2SA 12:11 <<Yahweh bang ama: <Ace man yì gìr a pe ka, Mǝ nǝ tsǝk zunggǝliban ɓǝ̀ lo arǝò a ɓala mò. Akǝ mǝsǝo Mǝ nǝ twal amāmó Mǝ nǝ pe ɓè ɓwa mǝnana nda a bano tù ka; nǝ̀ nongnǝia a ɓaɓwa bwāng.
2SA 12:12 A pê aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa, sǝ Mim ngga, Mǝ nǝ tsǝk mǝnia yì gìr ka ɓǝ̀ yi pa nǝ pwari a kùli, a ɓamǝsǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kat.> >>
2SA 12:13 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi Natan ama, <<Ən pangŋǝ́nì Yahweh cauɓikea.>> Sǝ Natan eari wi ama, <<Yahweh twalǝno banì. A pà nǝ̀ wù ɗàng.
2SA 12:14 Sǝama acemǝnana a pakce Yahweh ɓà nǝ mǝno yì gìr a pe ka, muna mǝnana à ɓǝ̀lô ka nǝ̀ wú.>>
2SA 12:15 Pǝlǝa Natan nyare o a ɓala male. Sǝ Yahweh tsǝk muna mǝnana mālá Yuriya ɓǝlî Dauda ka bwal nǝ rǝkwana.
2SA 12:16 Dauda zǝmbî Yahweh ace mune. Gilmùr sǝ kya kuti a ɓala, mal dù kat ndaban nongŋo a nzali.
2SA 12:17 Aɓwana-mǝgule mala ɓala male yiu abani ace loasǝe ɓǝ̀ loapi nzali ɓǝ̀ li girlina andǝia, sǝama ginǝe.
2SA 12:18 A tongno-nong-ɓaria nongŋo ka, mune paklú. Ɓangciu pàkki amǝ'túró-ɓala mala Dauda arǝ banggi wi ama mune pàngŋǝ̀nà-lú, acemǝnana à pakɗenyicau ama, <<Lang mune ndanǝ yilǝmu piu ka, sǝm ne wi cau sǝ kwakikiri arǝ sǝm ɗàng. Lang ado sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ ne wi ama mune wuna? Earka, nǝ̀ pàkki ɓamurì gìr mǝɓane.>>
2SA 12:19 Sǝama lang Dauda sǝn amǝ'túró-ɓala male naban sherǝki-acau arǝarǝia ka, yi sǝlǝ ama mune wuna. Nda Dauda ɗia ama, <<Mune wuna le?>> À ear ama, <<E, wuna.>>
2SA 12:20 Pǝlǝa Dauda loapi nzali, sǝ sussǝo, hasǝ mùrú, sǝ nggaɗi agir-nggūrǝu male. Sǝ o a ɓala mala Yahweh kya peri. Osso nyare yiu a ɓala male sǝ bang ama ɓǝà pe wi girlina; à yinǝi wi nǝ girlina sǝ lìli.
2SA 12:21 Pǝlǝa amǝ'túró-ɓala mala Dauda ɗì ama, <<Mana man a pàk ka? A gilmùr sǝ a pak-bumkiɗikea ace munio lang ndanǝ yilǝmu ka, sǝama lang mune wuna ka, a lo sǝ a li girlina.>>
2SA 12:22 Dauda ear ama, <<Lang mune na nǝyilǝmu piu ka, ǝn gilmùr sǝ ǝn pak-bumkiɗikea acemǝnana ǝn pakɗenyicau ama, <Yana sǝlǝa ko ear ka Yahweh nǝ̀ ɓwamuram, sǝ nǝ̀ nying mune nǝyilǝmu?>
2SA 12:23 Sǝama ado ka, mune wuna; palang sǝ mǝ nǝ gilmùr? Mǝ nǝ gandǝnǝ nyesǝ mune ɗǝm le? Mǝ nǝ ká abaní. Yì ka pà nǝ̀ nyar abanam ɗàng.>>
2SA 12:24 Dauda giriki māmí Basheba, sǝ kúti abani, nong nǝi. Basheba ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura, sǝ tunǝi ama Solomon. Yahweh earce mune,
2SA 12:25 sǝ tasǝ cau nǝban Natan mǝɓangnǝa ama ɓǝà tunǝ mune ama Jedidia.
2SA 12:26 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka Jowap narǝ munǝ arǝ Rabba, nggea-là mala amǝ'Amon, sǝ angŋǝna kanggǝrang-ban mala murǝm malea.
2SA 12:27 Jowap pǝlǝa tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân aban Dauda nǝ cau ama, <<Ən munǝna arǝ Rabba, sǝ ǝn angŋǝna máɗí-mùr malea arǝia.
2SA 12:28 Ado ka, ramba acilia amǝ'lwa abanɓwáná sǝ wu gumbǝli nggea-lê wu e; ɓǝ̀ ana raka, mǝ nǝ e, sǝ à nǝ̀ tunǝi nǝ lullǝam.>>
2SA 12:29 Nda Dauda ramba amǝ'lwa kat abanɓwáná, sǝ wari a Rabba, munǝ arǝ nggea-lê sǝ e ka.
2SA 12:30 Sǝ ak mbulan-murǝm mǝnana a ɓamur murǝm malea ka, sǝ à oasǝì Dauda a ɓamuri. Mbulan-murǝmì ka à pè nǝ bolo-njengǝlan sǝ à nbákí nǝ amǝsǝ tali-gǝna; dǝmbǝrya male na talent mwashat. Dauda pwan gǝna-lwa kpǝm a nggea-lê.
2SA 12:31 Ɗǝm ngga, Dauda pusǝ aɓwana mǝnana aɓa nggea-lê ka, sǝ tsǝia púp arǝ atúró mǝcandǝe ɓǝà pea nǝ byau zanzǝki nggun, andǝ asoro bolo-candǝa, andǝ abero bolo-candǝa. Sǝ tsǝia ɗǝm aɓa túró ɓak tobali. Pàkkî anggea-là mala amǝ'Amon amǝnia yì gìr ka kat. Pǝlǝa Dauda andǝ amǝ'lwa kat nyar a Urǝshalima.
2SA 13:1 Adyan ngga, Absalom muna-ɓwabura mala Dauda ka ndanǝ mǝ'nggaula mǝɓoarnsarì, lùllǝì ama Tamar; sǝ Amnon muna-ɓwabura mala Dauda ka earce Tamar.
2SA 13:2 Amnon ngga suno mǝ'nggaule Tamar ɓākì kǝ̀rkǝ́r gandǝa tsǝk ɓamurì bwal nǝ rǝkwana. Sǝama Amnon kǝ sǝni ndanǝ kwano sǝ nǝ̀ pakki wi kǝgìr acemǝnana yì Tamar ka súrǝ̀ ɓwabura ɗàng.
2SA 13:3 Sǝ Amnon ngga ndanǝ gyajam, lullǝì ama Jonadap muna-ɓwabura mala Shimeya, mǝ'eam Dauda. Jonadap ka mǝkutan na kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
2SA 13:4 Jonadap ɗì Amnon ama, <<Palang sǝ akǝ̀ kiɗiki ɓamǝsǝo anggo kǝ̀rkǝ́r koya dǝmbari ka, we muna-ɓwabura mala murǝm? A pà nǝ banggam re?>> Amnon ne wi ama, <<Ən nggǝ earce Tamar, mǝ'nggaula mǝ'eambǝam Absalom.>>
2SA 13:5 Jonadap banggi wi ama, <<Nongnǝ-nongŋo amúr gyangŋan-nongŋo mô, sǝ wu ɓosǝki rǝo kǝla a pà jam ɗàng. Ɓǝ̀ tárró yiu ace sǝno ka, ne wi ama, <Ida, nying mǝ'nggaulem Tamar ɓǝ̀ yi pam bǝredi mǝ shê, sǝ ɓǝ̀ lam girlina a mǝsǝam, ace mǝnana mǝ sǝni sǝ mǝ lî a buì ka.> >>
2SA 13:6 Nda Amnon nongnǝ-nongŋo, sǝ ɓosǝki rǝì kǝla pà jam ɗàng. Lang murǝm yiu a sǝne ka, Amnon banggi murǝm ama, <<Ida, nying mǝ'nggaulem Tamar ɓǝ̀ yi pàkkam agbatali kyak ɓari a mǝsǝam, ace mǝnana mǝ li a ɓabuì ka.>>
2SA 13:7 Pǝlǝa Dauda túrban nǝ cau aban Tamar a ɓala ama, <<Ida, kya ɓala mala mǝ'eambo Amnon ado, kya lambì wi girlina.>>
2SA 13:8 Nda Tamar wari a ɓala mala mǝ'eambi Amnon, sǝ kumi ndaban nongŋo. Pǝlǝa Tamar twal dyar bǝredi, pàk agbatali kyak nǝi a mǝsǝ Amnon, sǝ lurǝia.
2SA 13:9 Pǝlǝa yinǝ agbatali kyak man aɓa tasau yi tamsǝi wi a ɓadǝmbi; sǝama Amnon ɓinǝ shè. Amnon bang ama, <<Wu pusǝ koyana ka ɓǝ̀ purî ban mǝnia ka.>> Sǝ koyan ngga puro nyì.
2SA 13:10 Pǝlǝa Amnon banggi Tamar ama, <<Yinǝ girline aɓa ndà-nongŋo mem, ace mǝnana mǝ li a ɓabuo ka.>> Sǝ Tamar twal agbatali kyak mǝnana pea ka, sǝ yinǝì mǝ'eambi Amnon aɓa ndà-nongŋo male.
2SA 13:11 Lang yina nǝia abaní tù ɓǝ̀ lì ka, kara Amnon gbami, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Mǝ'nggaulem, yiu mǝ nongnǝ we!>>
2SA 13:12 Tamar ne wi ama, <<Awo, mǝ'eambǝam, kǝa kiɗikiam ɗàng! Gìr kǝla mǝnia ka, ɓǝà kǝa pè a Isǝrayila ɗàng. Kǝa pàk mǝnia yì gìr-kǝsǝkya mala ɓwaɓana ɗàng.
2SA 13:13 Sǝ mim ngga, aya bân sǝ mǝ tsǝk muram atàcau mala kǝsǝkya? Sǝ we ka, awu nǝ̀ duk mwashat aɓalǝ agǝmɓwa amǝɓealɓike a Isǝrayila. Ida, nacau nǝ murǝm; acemǝnana yì ka pà nǝ̀ giro nǝ mim ɗang.>>
2SA 13:14 Sǝ Amnon ngga ɓinǝ kwakikiri arǝì, sǝ acemǝnana kútì nǝ rǝcandǝa ka, gbárí, kiɗiki.
2SA 13:15 Anzǝm mǝno ka, Amnon twal nǝ nggea ɓinǝmǝsǝu mǝgule arǝ Tamar. Yale ɓinǝmǝsǝu mǝnana ɓinǝi nǝi ka, gulo kútì suno mana oè aceì a tadǝmbe ka. Amnon ne Tamar ama, <<Lo, puro o!>>
2SA 13:16 Sǝ Tamar banggi wi ama, <<Awo, mǝɓane mǝnia a kǝ pè nǝ pǝram ngga, ɓiki kǝ̀rkǝ́r kútì gìr mǝnana a pángnǝ́nàm ngga.>> Sǝ yì Amnon ngga, kwakikiri arǝì ɗàng.
2SA 13:17 Pǝlǝa tunǝ lagga male mǝtúró-ɓadǝmbi sǝ ne wi ama, <<Usheni, pusǝ ɓwama mǝnia ka, ramtè a nza adyadyan ɓǝ̀ upi ɓadǝmbam, sǝ wu kumli kunkurǝm anzǝmi.>>
2SA 13:18 Nda mǝtúró-ɓadǝm Amnon pusǝ Tamar, ramtè a nza sǝ kumli kunkurǝm anzǝmi ka. Tamar ka ndanǝ daura mǝlime mǝnana bwal ban akusǝi nǝ abui mǝsake ka arǝì, acemǝnana mǝnia ka nda ulang daura mana amuna-mamǝna mala murǝm mana à malaká súrǝ̀ ɓwabura raka, à kǝ oasǝ arǝia ka.
2SA 13:19 Tamar ɗàrǝ́ tú, soe a ɓamúrí, sǝ bwal daura mǝlime mǝnana bwal ban akusǝi nǝ abui mǝsake, mǝnana arǝì ka, sannì. Tsǝk abui a ɓamúrí, sǝ loasǝ gì kǝ ɓua aban o.
2SA 13:20 Absalom mǝ'eam Tamar, ɗì Tamar ama, <<Mǝ'eambo Amnoê ka tsǝo-púp nongnǝ we le? Ado ka, pwalo kǝa ɓua ɗàng, mǝ'nggaulem; yì ka mǝ'eambo na, kǝa tsǝk cau mǝnia ka a ɓabumo ɗàng.>>Nda Tamar ueo anggo nǝmurǝì aɓa bumkiɗikea a ɓala mala mǝ'eambi Absalom ngga.
2SA 13:21 Lang murǝm Dauda ok acau mǝnia kat ka, bumi lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
2SA 13:22 Absalom ne Amnon kǝ cau, ko mǝɓoarne ko mǝɓane ɗàng. Absalom ɓinǝmǝsǝ Amnon, acemǝnana kiɗikina mǝ'nggaule Tamar.
2SA 13:23 Anzǝm mana apǝlǝa ɓari kutina ka, Absalom ramba amǝ'túró male ace mwaki wi nyang anzur male a Ba'al Hazo, là mǝnana nda tù a nzong-nzali Ifǝrem ngga. Sǝ tunǝ amuna-burana mala murǝm ɓǝà yiu atè ace lili-banɓoarnado abanì.
2SA 13:24 Pǝlǝa Absalom wari aban murǝm Dauda, sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni, mim guro mò ka ǝn tunǝna amǝ'mwa-nyang nzur ace mwakam nyang anzur mem. Ida, ɓǝ̀ murǝm andǝ amǝ'túró male yiu ace lili-banɓoarnado atà sǝm.>>
2SA 13:25 Sǝama murǝm banggi Absalom ama, <<Awo, munem, pà sǝm nǝ̀ ká kat ɗàng, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm nggá dupo twalo raka.>> Kat andǝ amani ama Absalom ɓuaki arǝì ka, ɓinǝe pà nǝ̀ ká ɗàng, sǝama tsǝki wi bù.
2SA 13:26 Pǝlǝa Absalom bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a pà wunǝ ká raka, ida, ɗeki mǝ'eambǝam Amnon ɓǝ̀ kya atà sǝm.>> Murǝm ɗì ama, <<Ace mana sǝ a kǝ earce ama ɓǝ̀ kya atò?>>
2SA 13:27 Sǝama Absalom nyare ɓuaki arǝì, nda murǝm Dauda nying Amnon andǝ amuna-burana mala murǝm kat à o atà Absalom ngga.
2SA 13:28 Absalom tsǝki amǝtúró male cau ama, <<Wu tsǝkmǝsǝ wun arǝ Amnon, lang nda aɓa banɓoarna mala walo-mba, sǝ ǝn bangga wun nǝma, <Wu wali> ka, pǝlǝa wun nǝ̀ wal-lui. Cè ɓangciu pàkka wun ɗàng; mǝ nda mǝnana ǝn bangga wun nǝma ɓǝ̀ wu pè ka re? Wu cam kàngkàng, sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝsǝ wun candǝe.>>
2SA 13:29 Alaggana mala Absalom pàkkî Amnon kǝla mǝnana Absalom banggia wia ka. Nda amuna-burana mala murǝm lo, sǝ koyana ateà ka, eau a nzǝm pǝr-mǝdambǝriso male, sǝ à ɓangŋa akaurǝa à o.
2SA 13:30 Lang à nda piu a njargula ka, cau yi bik ban Dauda ama, <<Absalom walna amuna-burana mala murǝm, sǝ kǝɓwa au ateà ɗàng.>>
2SA 13:31 Pǝlǝa murǝm lo, san daura male, sǝ nongŋo a nzali; amǝtúró male mǝnana kat à nda ban came abanì ka, à sanggia adaura malea gbal.
2SA 13:32 Jonadap, muna-ɓwabura mala Shimeya, mǝ'eam Dauda, na ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule mem ɓǝkǝa twali ama amuna-burana male, amuna-murǝm na kat à wal-luia ka ɗàng; Amnon nǝmurǝi na wù ka. Mǝnia ka nda gìr mǝnana Absalom kànì a ɓabumi nǝ̀ pè, twal a pwari mǝnana Amnon gbárí mǝ'nggaule Tamar ka.
2SA 13:33 Acemani ka, ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm ɓǝkǝa falǝnǝ cau mana ama, amuna-burana mala murǝm na kat à wù ka ɗàng; Amnon na nǝmurǝi wù ka.>>
2SA 13:34 Sǝ anggo ka, Absalom ɓangŋǝna. Lagga mǝnana cam yale amur nggea-là ka loasǝ mǝsǝi sǝ pelǝban, kara sǝn aɓwana pas aban yiu nǝ njargula mana a nzǝmi ka, a nkanggari mgbangban.
2SA 13:35 Jonadap banggi murǝm ama, <<Sǝni, amuna-burana mala murǝm nia à kǝ yiu ka! Nda kǝla mǝnana guro mò ne ka.>>
2SA 13:36 Tù anzǝm mǝnana Jonadap malǝna nacau ka, amuna-burana mala murǝm yi tusǝo, sǝ à loasǝ già, à ɓua. Murǝm andǝ amǝtúró male kat gbal ka, à ɓua, nggea ɓua mǝkwanbani.
2SA 13:37 Sǝ Absalom ngga ɓangŋa o aban Talmai muna-ɓwabura mala Ammihud, murǝm mala Geshur, sǝ ue kano pǝlǝa tàrú. Twal anonggio pas Dauda ɓua ace muna-ɓwabura male, Amnon;
2SA 13:39 sǝama lang murǝm Dauda kumǝna girikiban amur lú mala Amnon ngga, ɓabumi o arǝ Absalom, sǝ pak-nzal sǝne.
2SA 14:1 Adyan ngga, Jowap muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya yi sǝlǝ ama, ɓabum murǝm nyarǝna aban Absalom.
2SA 14:2 Pǝlǝa Jowap túrban atà ɓè ɓwama mǝ'sǝlǝe, mǝnana ndanǝdo a Tekowa ka, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Ɓosǝki rǝo kǝla a nda aɓa ɓua-lú, sǝ wu oasǝ anggubyau ɓua-lú. Kǝa hasǝ mùrú ɗàng; pǎ kǝla ɓwama mǝnana twalǝna anonggio pas nda aɓa bumkiɗikea ace ɓwa male mǝnana wù ka.
2SA 14:3 Sǝ wu kya aban murǝm, wu ne wi cau mǝnana mǝ nǝ banggo wu na ka.>> Sǝ Jowap pe wi cau a kúni.
2SA 14:4 Lang ɓwama Tekowa man warina aban murǝm ngga, sárǝ́ nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali nǝ pagulo, sǝ na ama, <<Amsǝam, murǝm.>>
2SA 14:5 Sǝ murǝm ɗì ama, <<Mana gyammo?>> Pǝlǝa ear ama, <<Mǝ nda mā-lú, burém wuna.
2SA 14:6 Sǝ guro mò ka ndanǝ amuna-burana ɓari, sǝ à munǝo arǝaria a dalang. Kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ gauwia ɗàng; man mwashat ka wal ɓi, wal-luí.
2SA 14:7 Sǝ adyan ngga, aɓǝla mem kat longŋǝna amuram, a na ama, <Pà ɓwa mana wal mǝ'eambi ka, ace mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ wal-lui a kún yilǝmi mǝ'eambi mǝnana wal-lui ka. Ɓǝ̀ ǝn pak mǝnia ka à nǝ̀ kiɗiki mǝliɓala gbal. Anggo sǝ à nǝ̀ limgi nkalang bǝsa mem mǝnana ue ka, sǝ à pà nǝ̀ nyinggi burém lullǝu ko mǝ'kau a ɓanza ɗàng.> >>
2SA 14:8 Pǝlǝa murǝm ne ɓwama man ama, <<O a ɓala mò, sǝ mǝ nǝ tsǝa à nǝ̀ tsǝkiro.>>
2SA 14:9 Osso ɓwama Tekowa man ne murǝm ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ aɓwana kum cauɓikea aɓa cau mǝnia a twal ace bwalam ngga, ɓǝ̀ bafe mala cauɓike do a muram, ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm, sǝ ɓǝ̀ do amur ɓala mala tárrám; ɓǝ̀ murǝm andǝ bunomurǝm male ɓǝ̀ dum nǝ ɗwanyicau-arǝǔ.>>
2SA 14:10 Murǝm ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa na kǝ cau amuro ka, yinǝi abanam, sǝ pà nǝ jeo ɗǝm ɗàng.>>
2SA 14:11 Pǝlǝa ɓwame na ama, <<Ida, ɓǝ̀ murǝm zǝmbi Yahweh Ɓakuli male ama mǝ'mbweban-akúnì nkila mana à sukki ka, ɓǝkǝa wal-lú ɗǝm ɗàng, sǝ ɓǝ̀ munem ngga, ɓǝà kǝa kiɗiki ɗàng.>> Sǝ murǝm bang ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam ngga, nyang mur munio mwashat pà nǝ̀ kpa a nzali ɗàng.>>
2SA 14:12 Pǝlǝa ɓwama man na ama, <<Ida, nying guro mò ɓǝ̀ nacau nǝ ɓwamǝgule mem, yi murǝm.>> Sǝ murǝm banggi wi ama, <<Nacau.>>
2SA 14:13 Osso ɓwame na ama, <<Palang sǝ a twal cau mǝɓane a bumo kǝla mǝnia ka, arǝ aɓwana mala Ɓakuli? Acemǝnana twalkusǝu mǝnia murǝm twal amur cau man ngga, kasǝni ɓamúrì ɓashi, mǝnana ɓinǝ nyesǝ muni ɓǝ̀ nyar a là ka, muni mana pǝri o a ɓè nzali ka.
2SA 14:14 Sǝm kat ka dumǝna púp sǝm nǝ̀ nggá wú; sǝ sǝm nda kǝla mùr mǝnana à solǝi a nzali, sǝ à pà nǝ̀ gandǝ rambi ɗǝm raka. Ɓakuli ka pà nǝ̀ twal yilǝmu ɗàng; kǝ pak njar mala nyesǝ ɓwa mǝnana a pǝri a là ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝkǝa ue a nza raka.
2SA 14:15 Sǝ adyan ngga, ǝn yiu ace banggi ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm mǝnia yì cau ka, acemǝnana aɓwe tsǝem ɓangciu pakkam. Sǝ mim guro mò ka ǝn pakɗenyicau ama, mǝ nǝ bangcau nǝ murǝm; yakǝla nǝ̀ pè guro male gìr mǝnana zǝm ngga.
2SA 14:16 Ən sǝlǝna ama murǝm nǝ̀ kwakikiri, sǝ nǝ̀ amsǝam a ɓabù ɓwa mana kǝ alte nǝ̀ wal-lú munem sǝ nǝ̀ kiɗikiam, sǝ anggo ka nǝ̀ twalta sǝm aɓa nzali liɓala mǝnana Ɓakuli pê aɓwana male ka.
2SA 14:17 Sǝ adyan ngga, mim guro mò, ǝn nggǝ na nǝma, <Ida, ɓǝ̀ cau mala ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm yinǝàm nǝ usǝlǝo,> acemǝnana ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm ngga, nda kǝla mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli mana kǝ súrǝ̀ mǝɓoarne andǝ mǝɓike ka. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh Ɓakuli mô do atò!>>
2SA 14:18 Pǝlǝa murǝm earî ɓwama man ama, <<Cè a sǝmbǝrǝam kǝgir mǝnana mǝ nǝ ɗio ka ɗàng.>>Sǝ ɓwame na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm ɓǝ̀ nacau.>>
2SA 14:19 Murǝm ɗì ama, <<Bù Jowap pa aɓa mǝnia yì gìr a pàkki kat ka ɗang?>> Ɓwama man eare sǝ na ama, <<Kǝla mana a ndakam nǝyilǝmu ka, ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm, ɓwa pà nǝ̀ kyang atà bu-mǝli ko mǝnggare lang ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm ɗiban ngga ɗàng. E, guro mò Jowap nda mǝnana banggam ama mǝ pak gìr mǝnia ka; yì na tsǝkam acau mǝnia kat a kunam ngga.
2SA 14:20 Guro mò Jowap na mǝnana pàk mǝnia yì gìr ka, ace mana ɓǝ̀ tsǝo wu nggaɗi ɗenyicau mò amur gìr mǝnana kǝ̀ u ka. Sǝama ɓwamǝgule mem ngga ndanǝ kwaro kǝla kwaro mala mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli ace súrǝ̀ agir mǝnana kat a ɓanza ka.>>
2SA 14:21 Pǝlǝa murǝm ne Jowap ama, <<Adyan ngga, ǝn earǝ́nò wu pak gìr mǝnana a earkiyice ka. Kyane kya nyesǝ laggè, yi Absalom.>>
2SA 14:22 Pǝlǝa Jowap kpa nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali, pe murǝm gulo sǝ tsǝki wi bù. Sǝ Jowap na ama, <<Yalung sǝ guro mò sǝlǝ ama ǝn kumǝna earmúrú a bano, ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm, mǝnana a panam gìr mǝnana ǝn zǝm ngga.>>
2SA 14:23 Nda Jowap lo sǝ wari a Geshur, sǝ kya nyesǝ Absalom a Urǝshalima ka.
2SA 14:24 Sǝ murǝm bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ kya do a ɓala male zak; ɓǝ̀ kǝa yiu a ɓadǝmbǝam ɗàng.>> Nda Absalom do a ɓala male zak, sǝ yiu aɓadǝm murǝm raka.
2SA 14:25 Adyan ngga, kǝɓwa pà kàm a Isǝrayila mana aɓwana ɓwangsǝi ace ɓoarjam male kǝla Absalom ngga ɗàng. Twal a ɓakusǝi kya pur a kwar ɓamuri ka, kǝ mǝɓane pà kàm arǝì ɗàng.
2SA 14:26 Kǝ kasǝki nyang múrí a masǝlǝata koya pǝlǝa; ɓǝ̀ dǝmbǝrì wi ka, kǝ kasǝki; ɓǝ̀ kārǝ́ dǝmbǝrya mala nyang múrí ka, kǝ bik shekel gbǝman-ɓari, aɓa kpata shekel mala murǝm.
2SA 14:27 À ɓǝlî Absalom amuna-burana tàrú, sǝ muna-ɓwama mwashat mana lullǝì ama Tamar ka. Tamar ka ɓwama mǝɓoarnsari na.
2SA 14:28 Absalom ngga do lùmsǝ apǝlǝa ɓari a Urǝshalima, kúti aɓadǝm murǝm ɗàng.
2SA 14:29 Pǝlǝa Absalom túrban atà Jowap, ace mǝnana nǝ̀ túrí aban murǝm ngga, sǝ Jowap ka yiu abaní ɗàng. Nyare túrban atè ɓaria, sǝ Jowap ka ɓinǝ yiu.
2SA 14:30 Pǝlǝa Absalom ne amǝtúró male ama, <<Wu sǝni, ɓaban mala Jowap ka nda nzong andǝ mem, sǝ ndanǝ mǝssa-bálì kam. Wu kyane, wu soaki wi bǝsa.>> Nda amǝtúró mala Absalom wario sǝ à soaki ɓabanì bǝsa ka.
2SA 14:31 Jowap lo sǝ wari aban Absalom a ɓala male, sǝ ɗì ama, <<Ace mana sǝ amǝ'túró mô kya soaki ɓaban mem bǝsa?>>
2SA 14:32 Absalom pè wi eare ama, <<Nda acemǝnana ǝn túrban atò ama, wu yiu ɓǝ̀n túrǒ aban murǝm ngga, sǝ a ɓinǝ yiu. Ən earce nǝma wu kya aban murǝm sǝ wu ɗikamì ama, <Ace mana sǝ ǝn nying Geshur sǝ ǝn yiu kani? Nǝ̀ ɓoaribani ɓǝ̀ mǝ nda kano piu ka.> Ado ka, ǝn nggǝ earce nǝma wu pak njar acem ɓǝ̀n kúti aɓadǝm murǝm; sǝ ɓǝ̀ kumam nǝ kǝ cauɓikea arǝàm ngga, ɓǝ̀ wal-luem.>>
2SA 14:33 Pǝlǝa Jowap wari aban murǝm sǝ ne wi mǝnia yì cau ka. Pǝlǝa murǝm túrban atà Absalom ɓǝ̀ yi kúti abaní. Sǝ Absalom yiu aɓadǝm murǝm, sǝ kūndǝ nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali aɓadǝm murǝm; sǝ murǝm gingsǝi kùrì zǝp.
2SA 15:1 Anzǝm mǝnia ka, Absalom kumbi ɓamurì waru-pǝr andǝ apǝr, andǝ aburana lumi-tongno ɓǝà kǝ ɓang a ɓadǝmbi.
2SA 15:2 Pàkka, Absalom nǝ̀ lo nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal sǝ nǝ̀ cam a gírí njargula mala kun-nggealà. Sǝ lang kǝ ɓwa nǝ̀ yiu a wuliban aɓadǝm murǝm ace kasǝ-ɓashi ka, Absalom nǝ̀ tunǝi, sǝ nǝ̀ ɗi ama <<A pur aya la?>> Sǝ ɓǝ̀ na ama <<Guro mò pur a bu-nzali mala Isǝrayila man ko mǝno ka,>>
2SA 15:3 Absalom nǝ̀ banggi wi ama, <<Sǝni acau mò ka à ɓoaro sǝ ɓafo na, sǝama kǝɓwa pà kàm mǝnana murǝm twali ɓǝ̀ oeo ka ɗàng.>>
2SA 15:4 Pǝlǝa Absalom nǝ na ama, <<Sǝni, ɓǝ̀ à na ama mǝ nda mǝɓashi aɓa nzali man ngga, ɓǝ́ koyan mana ndanǝ ɓekǝ kúnɓuana ko wuliban ngga, nǝ̀ yinǝi abanam, sǝ mǝ nǝ pàk ɓashi-mǝsǝcau.>>
2SA 15:5 Sǝ koya pwari ɓwa sung abaní ace pe wi gulo ka, nǝ̀ sárǝ́ abui, nǝ̀ bwali sǝ nǝ̀ kùrrì zǝp.
2SA 15:6 Anggo sǝ Absalom kǝ pakki amǝ Isǝrayila mana à yiu aban murǝm ace ɓashi ka. Ani sǝ Absalom iu ɓabum aburana mala Isǝrayila.
2SA 15:7 Anzǝm apǝlǝa ine ka, Absalom ne murǝm ama, <<Ida, earam ɓǝn kya a Hebǝron ace mbwe kángir mem mana ǝn kánbi Yahweh ka.
2SA 15:8 Lang mǝ nda aban do a Geshur a nzali Aram ngga, ǝn pacau nǝ kána, ama, <Mǝsǝcau ɓǝ̀ Yahweh nǝ̀ nyesǝam a Urǝshalima ka, mǝ nǝ nggá peri abaní.> >>
2SA 15:9 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi wi ama, <<Kya aɓa rǝpwala.>> Nda lo sǝ o a Hebǝron ngga.
2SA 15:10 Sǝama Absalom tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân aban atau mala Isǝrayila kat, aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa, nǝ cau ama, <<Lang wu ongŋǝna ɓua mala njawe ka, tsuk-tsuk wu bang ama, <Absalom nda murǝm a Hebǝron!> >>
2SA 15:11 Absalom umnǝ aburana gbǝman-ɓari mǝnana tunǝia à pur a Urǝshalima andǝi ka, sǝ à wari aɓa kunpwasǝa malea, sǝ à sǝlǝ kǝ cau ɗàng.
2SA 15:12 Sǝ lang Absalom na aban pāki apagir mala gir'nkila ka, túrban atà Ahitofel ɓwa'Gilo, mǝkwarkir Dauda, a Gilo là male. Kùrkûn malea candǝe, sǝ aɓwana mana à nda atà Absalom ngga à lidǝmba nǝ lakki.
2SA 15:13 Sau ɗang ɓè mǝ'na-túrbân yiu aban Dauda sǝ ne wi ama, <<Ɓabum aburana mala Isǝrayila umǝna atà Absalom.>>
2SA 15:14 Pǝlǝa Dauda ne aguro male mana kat atè a Urǝshalima ka ama, <<Wu lo, ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɓangŋa akaurǝa, ɓǝ̀ ana raka pà sǝm nǝ̀ apî Absalom ɗàng. Wu o akaurǝa, cè kasǝmúr sǝm tù, sǝ yinǝ mǝɓike amur sǝm, sǝ nǝ̀ wal-lú koyan mǝnana nda aɓa nggea-là ka nǝ nggeabyau.>>
2SA 15:15 Aguro mala murǝm ne murǝm ama, <<Sǝni, sǝm aguro mò ka, sǝm nda aɓa gilǝrǝu ace pàk gìr mǝnana kat we mǝtala-ɓala ma'sǝm murǝm, a twalo awu nǝ pàk ka.>>
2SA 15:16 Nda murǝm pur andǝ amǝ'ɓala male kat atè. Sǝama murǝm nying amā-twala lum ɓǝà ueo ace tsǝkir ɓala.
2SA 15:17 Sǝ murǝm puro, andǝ aɓwe kat atè. Sǝ à yi cam a masǝlǝata là.
2SA 15:18 Pǝlǝa amǝgulo male kat cam a nkanggari, sǝ amǝ'Keret andǝ amǝ'Pelet kat gya sǝ à kùtí a ɓadǝmbi. Sǝ amǝ'Gitti kat, yì aburana gbǝman-tongno-nong-mwashat mana à kpate a Gat ka, à gya à yi kutio aɓadǝm murǝm.
2SA 15:19 Pǝlǝa murǝm ne Ittai ɓwa'Gitti ama, <<Palang sǝ a o atà sǝm gbal? Nyare, o kya do atà murǝm, acemǝnana we ka, a nda bǝri-ɓwa, sǝ ɗǝm ngga a nying nzali mô sǝ a yiu ace àwá. Nyar a ɓala mò.
2SA 15:20 Kǝ yilung sǝ a yiu, sǝ yalung ngga mǝ nǝ tsǝo a sokki-kún atà sǝm le? Yale ǝn súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana ǝn kákiyi kam ngga? Nyare o, twal amǝ'eambo atò. Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh lǝmdǝo earcearǝu mǝnana kǝ nggaɗi raka andǝ domǝsǝcau.>>
2SA 15:21 Sǝ Ittai earî murǝm ama, <<Mbak-kàngkàng Yahweh nakam, sǝ ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm na kam nǝyilǝmu ka, ban mǝnana kat ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm nǝ̀ pàk kàm, ko aɓa lú ko yilǝmu ka, a kǝ banì sǝ mim guro mò nǝ̀ pa.>>
2SA 15:22 Pǝlǝa Dauda ne Ittai ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ nda ana ka, fa.>> Pǝlǝa Ittai ɓwa'Gitti gya kutio, andǝ aburana male kat, andǝ amuna mǝkeke mǝnana kat atè ka.
2SA 15:23 Sǝ là kat kpa ɓua bang-bang lang Dauda andǝ aɓwana mǝnana atè kat nǝ̀ nggǝ kúti ka. Sǝ murǝm yàlî ɓangŋaban Kidǝron, sǝ aburana male kpa, sǝ yià kat à twal njargula o a ɓabondo.
2SA 15:24 Pǝlǝa Abiyata yiu, sǝ Zadok yiu gbal andǝ amǝ'Lawi kat, nǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli a buia. Sǝ à yi tamsǝ Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli a nzali she lang aɓwana kat kutina, à purǝnì ɓá nggea-là ka.
2SA 15:25 Pǝlǝa murǝm ne Zadok ama, <<Wu nyesǝ Akwati Kùrcau aɓa nggea-là. Ɓǝ̀ ǝn kum earmúrú a mǝsǝ Yahweh ka, nǝ̀ nyesǝam sǝ nǝ̀ tsǝa ɓǝn sǝni, andǝ bando male.
2SA 15:26 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ na ama, <Banɓoaram arǝò raka,> mǝ ndya ka, ɓǝ̀ pakkam gìr mǝnana sǝni nda ɓoari wi ka.>>
2SA 15:27 Murǝm banggi Zadok pǝris ɗǝm ama, <<A nda mǝ'sǝna re? Nyare o aɓa nggea-là aɓa rǝpwala, we wunǝ amuna-burana mô ɓari, Ahimaz andǝ Abiyata.
2SA 15:28 Sǝni, mǝ nǝ kúndǝô a ban yálì nkaring mùr nǝ njar mana umnǝ ɓabondo ka, she ɓǝn angŋa cau a bano ka.>>
2SA 15:29 Osso Zadok andǝ Abiyata twal Akwati Kùrcau mala Ɓakuli, à nyesǝi a Urǝshalima, sǝ à ue kano.
2SA 15:30 Sǝ Dauda ka eau a bum Nkono Olif, kǝ ɓua aban ká nǝ ɓakusǝi, sǝ gìr múrí. Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat atè ka, à gìr múrià sǝ à kǝ eauwe, nǝ ɓua a kunia aban ká.
2SA 15:31 Ɓeɓwa ne Dauda ama, <<Ahitofel na aɓalǝa amǝ'kùrkûn atà Absalom.>> Pǝlǝa Dauda pakhiwi ama, <<Yahweh, ida, nyesǝ kwarkiru mala Ahitofel ɓǝ̀ duk cau mǝɓangge.>>
2SA 15:32 Lang Dauda bik ɓong Nkono Olif, a ban mǝnana aɓwana kǝ peri kàm aban Ɓakuli ka, Hushai ɓwa'Arki yiu ace je andǝi, nǝ daura-murɓe male mǝnana à sannì ka, sǝ tú na a ɓamuri.
2SA 15:33 Dauda ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a o atàm ngga, awu nǝ dupam twalo.
2SA 15:34 Sǝama ɓǝ̀ a nyar a nggea-là, sǝ a ne Absalom ama, <Mǝ nǝ duk guro mò, murǝm; kǝla mǝnana mǝ nda guro mala tárró ɗiɗyal ka, anggo sǝ mǝ nǝ duk guro mò adyan> ngga, anggo sǝ awu nǝ gandǝâmce kwarkiru mala Ahitofel.
2SA 15:35 Zadok andǝ Abiyata yià apǝris ka, à pà atò kano re? Acemani ka, gìr mǝnana kat a oê a ɓala mala murǝm ngga, banggi Zadok andǝ Abiyata yià apǝris.
2SA 15:36 Sǝni, amuna-burana malea ɓari, Ahima'az muna-ɓwabura mala Zadok, andǝ Jonatan muna-ɓwabura mala Abiyata ka, à nda kano ateà. Wun nǝ̀ túriá abanam nǝ cau mǝnana kat wu ok ka.>>
2SA 15:37 Nda Hushai, gyajam mala Dauda, yiu aɓa nggea-là ka; yiu male karǝ nǝ kutio mala Absalom aɓa Urǝshalima.
2SA 16:1 Lang Dauda kutini ɓong nkono ka, Ziba guro mala Mefiboshet kya kumi nǝ amǝdambǝriso ɓari mǝnana à twal agbatali bǝredi gbǝman-ɓari, andǝ adangŋanshi ɓǝla-anap mǝ'ime gbǝman-mwashat, sǝ ɓǝla-vwari gbǝman-mwashat, andǝ sambǝram mana à lùmsǝì nǝ mùr-anap ka.
2SA 16:2 Pǝlǝa murǝm ɗì Ziba ama, <<Ace mana sǝ a yinǝ amǝnia yì agir ka?>> Pǝlǝa Ziba eari wi ama, <<Amǝdambǝriso mǝnia ka à nda ace amǝ'ɓala murǝm ɓǝà kǝ eau a nzǝmia, sǝ bǝredi andǝ ɓǝla-vwari ka, à nda ace alaggana ɓǝà shea, sǝ mùr-anap ka, nda ace aɓwana mǝnana à aulǝa aɓa pǝɗanban ngga.>>
2SA 16:3 Murǝm nyare ɗì ama, <<Muna-ɓwabura mala mǝtala-ɓala mò ka nda ke?>> Ziba banggi murǝm ama, <<Nda a Urǝshalima; yì ka bang ama, Yalung ngga ɓala mala Isǝrayila nǝ̀ nyesǝî wi domurǝm mala tárrí.> >>
2SA 16:4 Murǝm pǝlǝa banggi Ziba ama, <<Sǝni, agir mǝnana kat à mala Mefiboshet na ka à dumǝna amô.>> Sǝ Ziba bang ama, <<Ən ɓun aɓadǝmbo; eare ɓǝn kum earmúrú a bano, we ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm.>>
2SA 16:5 Lang Murǝm Dauda yiu a Bahurim ngga, ɓè ɓwabura mǝnana pur a nggurkwar mala ɓala mala Sawul, lullǝi ama Shimeyi, muna-ɓwabura mala Gera ka, pur aban yiu, sǝ lang yina ka, camarǝ sáng Dauda.
2SA 16:6 Ɓukki Dauda nǝ̀ atali, sǝ ɓukki aguro mala murǝm Dauda gbal, sǝ anggo ka, aɓwana kat andǝ akanggǝrang aburana ka à nda a koya buì mala Dauda.
2SA 16:7 Sǝ Shimeyi kǝ sangban ama, <<Upi ban mǝnia ka, upi ban mǝnia ka, we mǝ'sukki-nkila, we ɓwa mǝɓane!
2SA 16:8 Yahweh mbweno a kúnì nkila mala amǝ'ɓala mala Sawul mǝnana kat a sukki, sǝ a ak bunomurǝm male ka. Yahweh pana domurǝmì a ɓabu munio Absalom. Sǝni, ɓealɓikea mô yina amuro acemǝnana a nda mǝ'sukki-nkila.>>
2SA 16:9 Pǝlǝa Abishai muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya banggi murǝm ama, <<Ace mana sǝ lu-nvwa mǝnia nǝ̀ sáng ɓwamǝgule mem, yì murǝm? Ɗekiam mǝ kyane mǝ kasǝ ɓamuri.>>
2SA 16:10 Sǝama murǝm bang ama, <<Mana kpapi sǝm sǝnǝa wun le, wun amuna-burana mala Zeruya? Ɓǝ̀ nda aban sangban acemǝnana Yahweh banggi wi ama, <Sáng Dauda> ka, yana ɗe nǝ̀ bang ama, <Palang sǝ a pak ana?> >>
2SA 16:11 Pǝlǝa Dauda ne Abishai andǝ aguro male kat ama, <<Wu sǝni, munem mǝnana ǝn ɓǝli nǝ tam ngga, nda aban alta yilǝmem; palang sǝ nǝ̀ duk gir'ndali nǝ ɓwa'Benjami mǝnia ka? Ɗeki ɓǝ̀ sangban, acemǝnana Yahweh na mǝnana banggi wi ama ɓǝ̀ sangban ngga.
2SA 16:12 Yakǝla Yahweh nǝ̀ sǝn mǝɓane mǝnana à pàkkam ngga, sǝ nǝ̀ mbwem a kúnì nǝ mǝɓoarne atàcau mala sangban male yalung.>>
2SA 16:13 Nda Dauda andǝ aburana male lidǝmba aban o amur njargula, sǝ Shimeyi kǝ gya a nkanggari nkono, a nkāɓe nǝ Dauda, sǝ kǝ sanggi, kǝ túrki wi atali, sǝ kǝ loasǝi wi tú.
2SA 16:14 Lang murǝm andǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda atè, à yi bwal ban Nggeasala Jodan ngga, à aulǝna. Pǝlǝa à usǝlǝ abanì.
2SA 16:15 Ado ka, Absalom andǝ aɓwana kat, yì aburana mala Isǝrayila, à yiu a Urǝshalima, sǝ Ahitofel ka nda atè.
2SA 16:16 Sǝ lang Hushai ɓwa'Arki, gyajam mala Dauda yiu aban Absalom ngga, yi ne Absalom ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ yilǝmio sauwa we murǝm! Ɓǝ̀ yilǝmio sauwa we murǝm!>>
2SA 16:17 Pǝlǝa Absalom banggi Hushai ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda earcearǝu mǝnana awu nǝ lǝmdǝì gyajam mô le? Ace mana sǝ a o atà gyajam mô ɗang?>>
2SA 16:18 Hushai eari wi ama, <<Awo, ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh, andǝ aɓwana mǝnia, andǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kat twal ka, mǝ nǝ duk male, sǝ mǝ nǝ ue atè.
2SA 16:19 Sǝ ɗǝm ngga, yana mǝ nǝ duk guro male? Muni na re? Kǝla mǝnana ǝn duk guro mala tárró ka, anggo gbal sǝ mǝ nǝ duk guro mò.>>
2SA 16:20 Pǝlǝa Absalom ne Ahitofel ama, <<Pà sǝm kwarkiru mô. Mana ɓǝ̀ sǝm pa?>>
2SA 16:21 Ahitofel banggi Absalom ama, <<Kyane kya nongnǝ amā-twala mala tárró mǝnana ɗekia ɓǝ̀ à kǝ tsǝkir ɓala ka, sǝ Isǝrayila kat nǝ̀ okce ama a pani tárró kǝsǝkya a ɓaɓwa, sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda atò ka, à nǝ̀ kum mǝsǝkang-kangŋa.>>
2SA 16:22 Nda à tsǝkî Absalom tara a múr-kurǝm, pǝlǝa Absalom nongnǝ amā-twala mala tárrí a mǝsǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kat ka.
2SA 16:23 Absalom kpata kwarkiru mala Ahitofel kǝla mǝnana Dauda pàk ka. Koya cau mǝnana pur a kún Ahitofel ka, à kǝ sǝn sǝlǝe aɓalǝi kǝla cau mǝnana pur a kún Ɓakuli nǝnggearǝì ka.
2SA 17:1 Ahitofel ne Absalom ɗǝm ama, <<Ɗeki ɓǝ̀n twal aburana á-lum-nong-ɓari, sǝ mǝ nǝ lo mǝ nǝ pyangnǝ atà Dauda a du man yalung ngga.
2SA 17:2 Lang aulǝna sǝ ɓabumi ɓungina ka, mǝ nǝ eau amurí, sǝ mǝ nǝ pe wi ɓangciu, sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda atè kat ka, à nǝ̀ ɓang nǝ mire. Kǝ murǝm nǝmurǝi nda mǝ nǝ wal-luí ka,
2SA 17:3 sǝ mǝ nǝ nyesǝô aɓwana mǝno kat a bano. Kǝ yilǝmi ɓwa mwashat nda mǝnana a alkiyite ka, sǝ aɓwana kat ka, à nǝ̀ do aɓa rǝpwala.>>
2SA 17:4 Sǝ mǝno yì kwarkiru ka pwasǝbum Absalom andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala Isǝrayila kat.
2SA 17:5 Pǝlǝa Absalom bang ama, <<Wu tunǝ Hushai ɓwa'Arki gbal ɓǝ̀ sǝm o cau mǝnana nǝ na ka.>>
2SA 17:6 Sǝ lang Hushai yina aban Absalom ngga, Absalom ne wi ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda cau mǝnana Ahitofel bang ngga; ɓǝ̀ sǝm pak kǝla mǝnana na ka le? Ɓǝ̀ pa anggo raka, we ka bangŋa.>>
2SA 17:7 Pǝlǝa Hushai ne Absalom ama, <<Mǝnia adyan ngga, cau mǝnana Ahitofel bang ngga, mǝɓoarne na ɗang.>>
2SA 17:8 Hushai bang ama, <<A sǝlǝna ama tárró andǝ aburana male ka, akanggǝrang aɓwana na, sǝ à ndanǝ bumlulla mǝkǝ̀rkǝ́rnì kǝla nyam-candǝa mǝnana à gauwi andǝ amuni a ɓawanban ngga. Ko anggo raka, tárró ka gbani lwa na; pà nǝ̀ nong atà aɓwana aɓa dù ɗàng.
2SA 17:9 Sǝni, ko ado ka, sǝmbǝrǝna a ɓekǝ tūli, ko a ɓekǝ ban. Ɓǝ̀ puro sǝ yiu arǝ wun nǝ munǝo, sǝ wal atà aburana mô kpokyak ka, cau nǝ̀ mesǝ ama, <À walna aɓwana mǝnana à nda atà Absalom ngga.>
2SA 17:10 Ko nggearǝ ɓwabura-ɓwa mǝnana ɓabumi na kǝla ɓabum im ngga, ɓangciu nǝ̀ pakki wi, sǝ ɓabumi nǝ̀ tùmùr, acemǝnana Isǝrayila kat ka sǝlǝna ama tárró ka kanggǝrang ɓwabura na, sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda atè ka, amǝ'mǝsǝkàng-kàngŋa na.
2SA 17:11 Sǝama kwarkiru mem ngga, nda mǝnana ama Isǝrayila kat ɓǝ̀ ramba a bano abanɓwáná, twal a Dan, aban ká a Biyasheba; lakki malea ɓǝ̀ pa kǝla sala a kún nggeamùr, sǝ wu kya a lwa nǝ nggearǝo.
2SA 17:12 Pǝlǝa sǝm nǝ̀ ká amurí a ɓè ban mǝnana à nǝ̀ gandǝ kume kàm ngga, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ sulǝ amurí kǝla sulǝo mala ncimna a nzali, sǝ yì andǝ aburana mǝnana à nda atè ka, kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ au ɗàng.
2SA 17:13 Ɓǝ̀ nyar nǝnzǝmi sǝ kúti a ɓekǝ nggea-là ka, Isǝrayila kat ka nǝ̀ yinǝ anggur ɓǝ̀ kàrì nggea-lê, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ nunni aɓa ɓangŋaban, sheɓǝ̀ tali mwashat pa kàm mǝnana nǝ̀ ue kam raka.>>
2SA 17:14 Pǝlǝa Absalom andǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kat bang ama, <<Kwarkiru mala Hushai ɓwa'Arki ɓoarî mala Ahitofel.>> (Yahweh ka, angŋǝna dǝmba tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà ama nǝ̀ kiɗiki kwarkiru mǝɓoarne mala Ahitofel, ace mǝnana Yahweh nǝ̀ yinǝ gir'murmwana amur Absalom ngga.)
2SA 17:15 Pǝlǝa Hushai banggi Zadok andǝ Abiyata yià apǝris ama, <<Kwarkiru mǝnana Ahitofel pe Absalom andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Isǝrayila ka, ndya ani ka, sǝ mim ngga kwarkiru mana ǝn pa ka, ani sǝ pa.
2SA 17:16 Ado ka, túrban tsuk-tsuk ɓǝà banggi Dauda ama, <Kǝa nong a kún nggeasala, ban yàl nkaring mala ká a ɓabondo yalung ɗàng; ɓariki yàl a nkaring,> ɓǝ̀ ana raka, murǝm andǝ aɓwana mǝnana atè kat ka, à nǝ̀ kiɗikia.>>
2SA 17:17 Adyan ngga, Jonatan andǝ Ahimaz ka, à nda aban kúndǝô a En-Rogel. Ɓè guro muna-ɓwama na kǝ wario kǝ banggia wia, sǝ yià gbal ka à nǝ̀ ká à nǝ̀ banggi Murǝm Dauda, ace mǝnana ɓǝà kǝa sǝnia aban kúti aɓa nggea-là raka.
2SA 17:18 Sǝama ɓekǝ lagga sǝnia sǝ kya ne Absalom. Anggo sǝ yià kǝm ngga à o tsuk-tsuk, sǝ à bik ɓala mala ɓekǝ ɓwabura a Bahurim mǝnana ndanǝ tūli-mùr a ɓala male ka. Sǝ à sulǝ aɓa tūli-mùrnî.
2SA 17:19 Pǝlǝa mālá ɓwabure twal kál-anzǝgir, sárǝí a kún tūli-mùrnî sǝ anzǝ mǝsǝsa amurí. Kǝɓwa sǝlǝce gìr mǝnana pàk ka ɗàng.
2SA 17:20 Lang aguro mala Absalom yiu aban ɓwame a ɓala ka, à ɗi ama, <<Ahimaz andǝ Jonatan ngga à ndake?>> Pǝlǝa ɓwame banggia wia ama, <<À yàlnà a nkaring guguri.>> Lang à kya altea sǝ à gandǝ kumia raka, à nyar a Urǝshalima.
2SA 17:21 Anzǝm mǝnana à umǝna ka, aburane eapi ɓá tūli-mùrnî, sǝ à wario à kya ne Murǝm Dauda. À banggi Dauda ama, <<Lo, o tsuk-tsuk kya yàl a nkaring mùr, acemǝnana Ahitofel pana kwarkiru amuro ani.>>
2SA 17:22 Pǝlǝa Dauda lo andǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda atè ka, sǝ à kya yàlî Mùr Jodan. Kaniama ban nǝ̀ fa ka, kǝ ɓwa pà kàm mǝnana malaká yàlî Jodan raka ɗàng.
2SA 17:23 Lang Ahitofel sǝni ama à kpata kwarkiru male raka, sárǝ́ gir-do a nzǝm mǝdambǝriso male, lo o a nggea-là male. Wario kya tsǝk ɓala male a nggùnì sǝ gyar ɓamúrì, wǔ, sǝ à tsǝì a ɓembe-ɓa-tali mala tárrí.
2SA 17:24 Pǝlǝa Dauda yiu a Mahanayim. Sǝ Absalom andǝ aburana mala Isǝrayila kat ka, à yàlî Mùr Jodan.
2SA 17:25 Absalom angŋa-dǝmba tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà Amasa amur amǝlwa, a kúnì Jowap. Amasa ka muna-ɓwabura mala ɓè ɓwa na, mǝnana à kǝ tunǝi ama Itǝra, ɓwa'Ishmayel, mǝnana al Abigiyel muna-ɓwama mala Nahash, mǝ'eam Zeruya, nggea Jowap ka.
2SA 17:26 Sǝ Isǝrayila andǝ Absalom ngga à tsǝk kàttì a nzali Gilǝyat.
2SA 17:27 Lang Dauda yiu a Mahanayim ngga, Shobi muna-ɓwabura mala Nahash, ɓwa'Amon mǝnana pur a Rabba, andǝ Makir muna-ɓwabura mala Amiyel mǝnana pur a Lo-debar ka, andǝ Barzilayi ɓwa'Gilǝya mǝnana pur a Rogelim ngga,
2SA 17:28 à yinǝ akal-nongŋo, andǝ ankenye, andǝ ankwaring-dǝɓang, sǝ mǝssa mǝnana à lurǝi ka, andǝ mǝssa-alkama, andǝ mǝssa-bálì, andǝ muku, andǝ gwalong, andǝ mǝsǝ-nkunding,
2SA 17:29 andǝ mur-nyi, sǝ kiura mǝbwale, andǝ anzur, andǝ kiura-mǝpange, à pe Dauda andǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda atè ka ɓǝà li, acemǝnana à bang ama, <<Aɓwana mǝnia ka nzala walǝnia, à aulǝna, sǝ mǝsamur walǝnia aɓa pǝɗanban.>>
2SA 18:1 Pǝlǝa Dauda ramba aburana mǝnana à nda atè ka, sǝ tsǝk amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala aá andǝ amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala agbǝman amúrià.
2SA 18:2 Pǝlǝa Dauda tasǝ amǝ'lwa ɓǝà kyane; tsǝk banì mwashat aɓa gauwe tàrú malea aɓata sàrǝ̀ban mala Jowap, sǝ ɓè banì mwashat aɓa gauwe tàrú ka, nda aɓata sàrǝ̀ban mala Abishai muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya, mǝ'eam Jowap, sǝ tàruia banì mwashat aɓa gauwe tàrú ka, nda aɓata sàrǝ̀ban mala Ittayi ɓwa'Gitti. Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi aburane ama, <<Mim nǝ ɓamúràm gbal ka, mǝ nǝ ká sǝnǝa wun.>>
2SA 18:3 Sǝama aburane ne wi ama, <<A pà wu nǝ pur ace ká [munǝo] atà sǝm ɗàng. Acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɓang ngga, à pa nǝ̀ falǝnǝ sǝm ɗàng. Sǝ ko ɓǝ̀ gauwa-tsùrú ma'sǝm wù ka, à pa nǝ̀ falǝnǝ sǝm ɗàng. Sǝ we ka, a nda akúnì lakki mala aɓwana ma'sǝm á-lum. Acemani ka, nǝ̀ ɓoaribani wu tasǝa sǝm gbasha nǝ ɓá nggea-là.>>
2SA 18:4 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggia wia ama, <<Koyagir mǝnana kat, wu sǝni nda ɓoaro kutibani ka, mǝ nǝ pe.>> Nda murǝm cam a nkanggari bankutio [mala Mahanayim], sǝ aburana male kat ging-gya twalkusǝu-anzǝmarǝia sǝ à kǝ kutio aban puro arǝ anggǝsanì malea, mala agbǝman andǝ aá.
2SA 18:5 Pǝlǝa murǝm tsǝki Jowap andǝ Abishai andǝ Ittai nzongcau ama, <<Lagga man, yì Absalom ngga, wu pangnǝi ɓukɓuk, acem.>> Sǝ amǝ'lwa kat ok cau mǝno murǝm ne amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban, amur Absalom ngga.
2SA 18:6 Nda amǝ'lwa mala Dauda purî ɓá nggea-là aban ká lwa arǝ Isǝrayila. Mǝnia yì munǝo ka, à pe a ndà-nggun mala bu-nzali Ifǝrem.
2SA 18:7 Akano ka, amǝ'lwa mala Dauda gandǝ amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila. Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à wal-luia ka, à nda kpǝm. À wal-lú aɓwana á-lumi-ɓari (20,000).
2SA 18:8 Kara lwa ara ak ɓá nzali kat, sǝ ɓwabundǝa wù kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Yale làkkì mala aɓwana mǝnana à wù atàcau mala agir'mur'mwana mǝnana kum aɓwe aɓa ndà-nggun ngga, kútì làkkì mala aɓwana mǝnana à wal-luia nǝ nggeabyau ka.
2SA 18:9 Lang munǝo na arǝ lidǝmba ka, Absalom kya jakiarǝ aburana mala Dauda. Sǝ yì ka, ɓariki nǝ̀ ɓangŋa a nzǝm pǝr-mǝdambǝriso male ace àwá, sǝama lang pǝr-mǝdambǝriso ɓangŋa kúti aɓata ɓè nggun mǝgule mana abu-nggunì na zukǝtǝp ka, kara ɓamúrí gbāli a nre ka abu-nggunì. Sǝ pǝr-mǝdambǝrisonî lidǝmba nǝ o, ɗeki aban gyare a nre bumkuli andǝ nzali.
2SA 18:10 Mwashat aɓalǝ aburana mala Dauda sǝn mǝnia yì gìr ka, sǝ banggi Jowap ama, <<Ən sǝn Absalom aban gyare arǝ ɓè bu-nggun mǝgule.>>
2SA 18:11 Jowap pǝlǝa ɗì ɓwabure ama, <<Mana! A sǝni? Palang sǝ a ɓinǝ wal-luí, a túrí a nzali akǝ̀ banì ɗàng? Yale ɓǝ́n pano amǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa shekel lum andǝ nggur-ɓunu mala amǝ'lwa.>>
2SA 18:12 Sǝ ɓwabure eari wi ama, <<Ko ɓǝ̀ a pam amǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa shekel á-mwashat aɓa buam ngga, pà mǝ nǝ tsǝk buam arǝ muna-ɓwabura mala murǝm ɗàng, acemǝnana sǝm kat ka, sǝm oè nǝ kir sǝm, lang murǝm tsǝko nzongcau wunǝ Abishai andǝ Ittai, ama, <Wu tsǝkir mǝlagga, yì Absalom, acem.>
2SA 18:13 Sǝ ɓǝn mangŋǝna murǝm, ǝn walna-lú muna-ɓwabura male ka, murǝm nǝ̀ yia sǝlǝ nǝnzǝ́mò ama, mǝ nda mǝnana ǝn wal-lú muni ka, sǝ we nǝ nggearǝo ka, awu nǝ nyem.>>
2SA 18:14 Pǝlǝa Jowap bang ama, <<Mim ngga, pa mǝ nǝ kiɗiki pwari kǝla mǝnia sǝnǝ we ɗàng.>> Pǝlǝa Jowap twal ankongŋo tàrú a bui, wari aban Absalom, mǝnana nda nǝyilǝmu piu, aban gyare a bu-nggun mǝgule ka. Pǝlǝa zuɓiki nǝ ankongŋo mǝno ka a kun-ɓalǝi.
2SA 18:15 Pǝlǝa lum aɓalǝ amǝ'bwal-agirmunǝo mala Jowap, gumbǝli Absalom a ɓalǝu, à tǝmnggi, sǝ à wal-luí.
2SA 18:16 Pǝlǝa Jowap twang njawe, nda amǝ'lwa male nyarî pǝrta amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila, acemǝnana Jowap tamsǝia ka.
2SA 18:17 À twal Absalom, à túrí aɓa tūli mǝlime aɓa ndà-nggun, sǝ à ramba atali amurí gum-gum. Sǝ anggo ka, amǝ Isǝrayila kat ɓangŋǝna, koyanale ka umǝna a ɓala male.
2SA 18:18 (Mǝnana Absalom malaká wù raka, tsǝkî ɓamúrì nggea tali, a Ɓangŋaban mala Murǝm, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ duk gir'lǝmndǝa ace lidǝmba mala lullǝi ka. Acemǝnana pakɗenyicau ama, <<Mim ngga, ǝn panǝ muna-ɓwabura mana nǝ lidǝmba nǝ lullǝam a ɓanza, mana à nǝ̀ nggǝ ɗenyinǝ mim nǝi ka ɗàng.>> Pǝlǝa tunǝ nggea tali mǝno nǝ lullǝì. Anggo sǝ à kǝ tunǝi ama, <Nggea tali mala Absalom,> ba yalung.)
2SA 18:19 Pǝlǝa Ahima'az muna-ɓwabura mala Zadok bang ama, <<Came, ɓǝn ɓangŋa, ɓǝn kyan nǝ bǝsacau man aban murǝm; mǝ nǝ nggá ne wi ama Yahweh kasǝna-ɓashi, angŋamurí a bù aɓi-mǝbura.>>
2SA 18:20 Pǝlǝa Jowap ne wi ama, <<A nda mǝnana awu nǝ ká nǝ mǝnia yì bǝsacau yalung ngga ɗàng. Awu nǝ gandǝnǝ ká nǝi wi nǝ cê a ɓè pwari, sǝama dumǝna púp a pà wu nǝ ká nǝ cê yalung ɗàng, acemǝnana muna-ɓwabura mala murǝm [yì Absalom] ngga, pàngŋǝ̀nà-lú.>>
2SA 18:21 Pǝlǝa Jowap ne ɓè ɓwa'Kush ama, <<We, kya banggi murǝm gìr mǝnana a sǝni ka.>> Pǝlǝa ɓwa'Kush ɓun aɓadǝm Jowap, sǝ ɓangŋa aban o.
2SA 18:22 Pǝlǝa Ahima'az, muna-ɓwabura mala Zadok ne Jowap ɗǝm ama, <<Ko palang le ka, ida, came mǝ ɓangŋa atà ɓwa'Kush mǝno.>> Sǝ Jowap pe wi eare ama, <<Muna-ɓwabura mem, ace mana sǝ a kǝ earce ama a nǝ ká? We ka, a panǝ kǝ tangnakusǝu mǝnana awu nǝ̀ kum ace mǝnia yì bǝsacau ka ɗang.>>
2SA 18:23 Pǝlǝa Ahima'az bang ama, <<Ko palang le ka, mǝ nǝ ɓangŋa, mǝ nǝ ká.>> Pǝlǝa Jowap bang ama, <<Ɓangŋa!>> Pǝlǝa Ahima'az ɓangŋa, um nǝ njar ɓawanban, sǝ ɓangŋa akì ɓwa'Kush dǝmba.
2SA 18:24 Lang Dauda na ban do anre kúnɓala mana nǝ ɓalǝu andǝ mana nǝ nza mala nggea-lê ka, mǝ'sǝn múr nggea-là eau a kuli amur kún nggea-là nǝ rǝ sheran. Lang loasǝ mǝsǝi sǝnban ngga, kara sǝn ɓè ɓwabura aban ɓang nǝmurǝi aban yiu nǝbania.
2SA 18:25 Pǝlǝa mǝ'sǝn múr nggea-là tunǝ murǝm sǝ banggi wi gìr mǝnana sǝn ngga. Murǝm pǝlǝa bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwe na nǝmurǝi ka, dumǝna púp ndanǝ bǝsacau.>> Sǝ ɓwe kǝ gbàshìban tù kǝ yiu.
2SA 18:26 Pǝlǝa mǝ'sǝn múr nggea-là sǝn ɓè ɓwabura aban yiu nǝ mire, pǝlǝa tunǝ mǝ'yál kunɓala sǝ bang ama, <<Sǝni, ɓè ɓwabura nia ɗǝm kǝ yiu nǝ mire nǝmurǝi ka!>> Pǝlǝa murǝm bang ama, <<Yì gbal ka, dumǝna púp ndaban yinǝ bǝsacau.>>
2SA 18:27 Pǝlǝa mǝ'sǝn múr nggea-là na ama, <<Ən nggǝ sǝni, ɓwa mǝdǝmbe ka, kǝ ɓangŋa kǝla Ahima'az muna-ɓwabura mala Zadok.>> Murǝm pǝlǝa bang ama, <<Yì ka, ɓwa mǝɓoarne na. Ndaban yinǝ bǝsacau mǝɓoarne.>>
2SA 18:28 Pǝlǝa Ahima'az loasǝ gì tunǝ murǝm sǝ ne wi ama, <<Koman kat ka, nda pepè!>> Pǝlǝa yì ka, ɓùn aɓadǝm murǝm nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali, sǝ bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwangsǝban pa aban Yahweh Ɓakuli mô, mǝnana pàna amǝ'mgbicau a ɓabuo ka, yià mǝnana à loasǝ buia arǝ ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm ngga.>>
2SA 18:29 Pǝlǝa murǝm ɗìban ama, <<Nggearǝ lagga, yì Absalom ngga, nda jam le?>> Pǝlǝa Ahima'az pa eare ama, <<Lang Jowap guro mò tasǝam ama ɓǝn yiu ka, ǝn sǝn ban ngga, zurina kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Sǝama, ǝn súrǝ̀ mana girni na ɗang.>>
2SA 18:30 Pǝlǝa murǝm bang ama, <<Nyar a nkanggariban, kúndǝô.>> Nda yi ka, nyar a nkanggariban, sǝ cam a kǝ banì.
2SA 18:31 Pǝlǝa ɓwa'Kush yi tusǝo, sǝ bang ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm, ok mǝnia yì bǝsacau mǝɓoarne ka! Yahweh amsǝno yalung, a ɓabù aɓwana mǝnana kat à mgbicau arǝò ka.>>
2SA 18:32 Pǝlǝa murǝm ɗì ɓwa'Kush ama, <<Mǝlagga Absalom ngga, nda jam le?>> Pǝlǝa ɓwa'Kush pa eare ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ aɓi-mǝbura kat mala ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm, andǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à mgbicau arǝì ace ɓealɓikea ka, ɓǝà pa kǝla mǝno yì lagga ka!>>
2SA 18:33 Pǝlǝa murǝm ngga, rǝì twal ɓǝla. Sǝ eauwe, wari a kurǝm-kuli mana amur kunɓala ka, ɓua kàm. A njar aban ká ka, kǝ ɓua kǝ na ama: <<Oi, muna-ɓwabura mem Absalom! Muna-ɓwabura mem, muna-ɓwabura mem Absalom! Ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝa ama, mǝ nda mǝnana ǝn wú a kunio ka, ɓǝ́ ɓoarna, oi muna-ɓwabura mem Absalom, muna-ɓwabura mem!>>
2SA 19:1 Pǝlǝa à banggi Jowap ama, <<Sǝni, murǝm ngga, ndaban ɓua sǝ kǝ keban ace Absalom.>>
2SA 19:2 Limurǝm mǝnana à kumi a pwari mǝno ka, yi pǝlǝia amǝ'lwa kat ɓua-lú, acemǝnana a pwari mǝno ka, aɓwe ok ama, <<Murǝm na ban pak-bumkiɗikea ace muni.>>
2SA 19:3 Sǝ aburane kùtí zàng aɓa nggea-lê [Mahanayim] a pwari mǝno, kǝla aɓwana mǝnana à ɓangŋa a kun-munǝo, kǝsǝkea pakkia wia, sǝ à swár zàng à kùtí aɓa nggea-là ka.
2SA 19:4 Murǝm ngga gìr ɓamǝsǝi, sǝ sa a ɓua, kǝ na ama, <<Oi, muna-ɓwabura mem Absalom! Oi, Absalom, muna-ɓwabura mem, muna-ɓwabura mem!>>
2SA 19:5 Pǝlǝa Jowap kùtí aɓa ɓala, aban murǝm, sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Yalung ngga, a panì aburana mô kat kǝsǝkea, yià aɓwana mǝnana à nda à amsǝ yilǝmo andǝ ayilǝmi amuna-burana andǝ amuna-mamǝna mô, andǝ ayilǝmi amāmó andǝ amā-twala mô ka.
2SA 19:6 We ka, a kǝ earce aɓwana mana à kǝ ɓinǝmǝsǝo ka, sǝ a kǝ ɓinǝmǝsǝ aɓwana mana à kǝ earceo ka. Acemǝnana yalung ngga, a lǝmdǝni bwāng ama, amǝ'sàrǝ̀ban andǝ aburana mô ka, à nda ka kǝgir a bano ɗàng. Mim ngga, ǝn sǝlǝna ama, ban nǝ ɓoaro yalung, mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Absalom ngga nda nǝyilǝmu, sǝ sǝm kat ka, sǝm wukina ka.
2SA 19:7 Adyan ngga, puro kya ɓakɓabum aburana mô. Mim ngga, ǝn kánagìr nǝ Yahweh, ɓǝ̀ a puro, a wari raka, kǝ ɓwabura pà kàm mǝnana nǝ̀ ue atò, a bu-dù man yalung ngga ɗàng. Sǝ mǝnia yì gìr ka, nǝ̀ duk mǝɓike kǝ̀rkǝ́r, mǝnana kútì agir'murmwana mǝnana kat à kumo, twal a lagga mò, ba yalung ngga.>>
2SA 19:8 Pǝlǝa murǝm lo, kya do a ban-do male a kún nggea-là. Lang à banggi aɓwana ama, <<Murǝm na aban do a kún nggea-là ka,>> pǝlǝa yià kat ka, à yiu aɓadǝmbi. (Aɓa mǝno anggo ka, amǝ Isǝrayila [mǝnana à nda atà Absalom ngga] à angŋa-dǝmba à ɓangŋǝna, koyan ngga nyarna a ɓala male.)
2SA 19:9 Sǝ aɓalǝ atau mala Isǝrayila ka, aɓwana camarǝ makgir arǝarǝia, à kǝ bang ama, <<Murǝm ngga, nda mǝnana akmúr sǝm a ɓabu aɓisǝm-mǝbura ka; yi ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana amsǝ sǝm a ɓabu amǝ'Filisti ka. Sǝ adyan ngga, ɓangŋǝna nyingŋǝna nzali ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ apî Absalom ngga;
2SA 19:10 sǝ Absalom, mǝnana sǝm ɗārǝí, ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm amur sǝm ngga, wuna a kun-munǝo. Sǝ palang ado sǝ wu na kǝ cau, ace nyesǝ murǝm ɗàng?>>
2SA 19:11 Pǝlǝa Dauda tasǝ mǝnia yì cau ka, aban Zadok andǝ Abiyata, yià apǝris, ama: <<Wu ɗikâm aɓwana-mǝgule mala Yahuda ama, <Palang ado, sǝ wun nda ka aɓwana mana, she nǝnzǝ́mò, sǝ wun nǝ̀ nyesǝ murǝm a ɓala male ka, yi mǝnana gìr mana kat à bangŋi aɓa Isǝrayila ka, kutina a kir murǝm ngga?
2SA 19:12 Wu nda ka amǝ'eambǝam; wu nda ka nggūrǝam andǝ nkila mem! Sǝ ace mana sǝ wun nda ka aɓwana mǝnana she nǝnzǝ́mò sǝ wun nǝ̀ nyesǝ murǝm a palta ka?>
2SA 19:13 Sǝ wu ne Amasa ama, <We ka, a nda nggūrǝam andǝ nkila mem re? Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli pakkam gìr, yale ɓǝ̀ wal-luem, yi mana ɓǝn twalo a duk mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur amǝ'lwa mem, a kúnì Jowap raka.> >>
2SA 19:14 Nda Amasa pwanɓabum aburana mala Yahuda kat, kǝla ɓwa mwashat, sǝ à tasǝî murǝm cau ama, <<Nyar aban sǝm, we wunǝ aburana mana kat à nda atò ka.>>
2SA 19:15 Pǝlǝa murǝm nyare, yiu a Jodan. Adyan ngga, aburana mala Yahuda yina a Gilgal, ace mǝnana ɓǝà kya kum murǝm, sǝ ɓǝà yinǝi a nkaring Mùr Jodan ngga.
2SA 19:16 Sǝ Shimeyi, muna-ɓwabura mala Gera, ɓwa'Benjami, mana pur a Bahurim ngga, fà rǝì akaurǝa andǝ aburana mala Yahuda, à wari a kúllí Murǝm Dauda.
2SA 19:17 Yiu atārǝia andǝ aburana a tàu mala Benjami, ɓwa á-mwashat, andǝ Ziba, muna-ɓala mala Sawul, mǝnana yiu andǝ amuna-burana male lum-nong-tongno, andǝ amǝ'túró-ɓala male, lumi-ɓari ka. Yia ka, à fà rǝia, à wari a kúllí murǝm, a Jodan.
2SA 19:18 Yia ka, à yàlî mùr Jodan, a ban yàl nkaring, ace eamsǝki amǝ'ɓala mala murǝm a nkaring, ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ pwasǝbum murǝm ngga. Pǝlǝa Shimeyi, muna-ɓwabura mala Gera, ɓùn amur ankūnǝi a nzali, aɓadǝm murǝm,
2SA 19:19 sǝ banggi wi ama, <<We murǝm, ɓwamǝgule mem, ida, twàlâm-ban cauɓikea mem, cè a ɗenyinǝ gir mǝɓike mǝnana guro mò pá a pwari mǝnana ɓwamǝgule mem nying Urǝshalima ka ɗàng. Ida, murǝm ɓǝkǝa bwal mǝnia yì gìr ka a ɓabumi ɗàng.
2SA 19:20 Acemǝnana mim guro mò ka, ǝn sǝlǝna nǝma, ǝn pangŋa cauɓikea. Nda gir mǝnana tsǝa sǝ mim, aɓalǝ aɓwana kat, mala ɓala mala Yisǝfu ka, ǝn ak dǝmba, ǝn yiu, mǝ nǝ yia kum murǝm, ɓwamǝgule mem ngga.>>
2SA 19:21 Pǝlǝa Abishai, muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya bang ama, <<Ɓoaro Shimeyi ka, ɓǝà wal-luí, acemǝnana yì ka sú ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh ɗārǝi ka re!>>
2SA 19:22 Sǝama Dauda bang ama, <<Man oasǝ wun arǝàm le, wun amuna-burana mala Zeruya, mǝnana wun nǝ̀ dupam kǝla ɓibura a pwari man yalung ngga? Ɓoaro ɓǝà wal-lú kǝɓwa aɓa Isǝrayila a pwari man yalung ngga le? Mim ngga, ǝn sǝlǝ mbak ama, yalung ngga mǝ nda murǝm amur Isǝrayila re?>>
2SA 19:23 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi Shimeyi ama, <<A pà wu nǝ wù ɗàng.>> Anggo sǝ murǝm kánbi wi.
2SA 19:24 Sǝ Mefiboshet, mǝ'kà Sawul gbal ka, wario kya kum murǝm. Yi ka, lak akusǝi ɗàng, amsǝ mbotakuni ɗàng sǝ yale lak agir-nggūrǝu male ɗàng, twal a pwari mǝnana murǝm nying là, sǝ uk ka, ba pwari mǝnana murǝm nyar nǝi jam ngga.
2SA 19:25 Lang nying Urǝshalima, sǝ yiu aban murǝm ngga, murǝm ɗì ama, <<Palang sǝ a ɓinǝ ká atàm, Mefiboshet?>>
2SA 19:26 Mefiboshet pa eare ama, <<We ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm, mǝturo-ɓala mem Ziba, nda mǝnana swarkiam ngga. Mim guro mò ka, mǝ nda gbakǝre, nda ǝn banggi wi nǝma, <Tsǝkam gir-do anzǝm mǝdambǝriso, ace mǝnana ɓǝn koè ɓǝ̀ sǝm u sǝnǝ murǝm>ngga.
2SA 19:27 Sǝ yì ado ka, yi mangŋa guro mò, aban ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm. Sǝama, ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm ngga, nda kǝla mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli; acemani ka, pàk gìr mǝnana kat pwasǝbumo ka.
2SA 19:28 Mim sǝnǝ amǝ'ɓala mala tárrám ngga, ɓǝ́ a walna sǝm, sǝama a kún mani ka, a earam mǝ li girlina a ban-li mô. Ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm, mana ɗǝm ado mǝ nǝ zǝmba, mǝnana nǝ̀ kútì mǝno ka?>>
2SA 19:29 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi wi ama, <<Cau mana a ne ka, karǝna anggo. Mim ngga, ǝn tsǝngŋa nzongcau ama, ɓǝà gau nzali ma'wun, anre wun, wun nǝ Ziba, a tsùrú.>>
2SA 19:30 Sǝ Mefiboshet banggi murǝm ama, <<Ɗeki ɓǝ twal koyagir ka, yi mana yalung ado ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm nyarǝna jam ngga.>>
2SA 19:31 Barzilayi, ɓwa'Gilǝya gbal ka, pur a Rogelim, sǝ wari atà murǝm ace tsǝkte aban yàlî Nggeasala a Jodan, sǝ nǝ̀ tsǝiandà aban o a là.
2SA 19:32 Barzilayi ka, jamgula na, apǝlǝa male na lumi-tongno-nong-tàrú. Yi ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana ɗenyinǝ murǝm, linǝi, aɓa do male kat a Mahanayim ngga, acemǝnana yì ka, mǝgǝna na kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
2SA 19:33 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi Barzilayi ama, <<Fa, ɓǝ̀ sǝm yàl a nkaring sǝnǝ we, ace mǝnana wu kya do a banam a Urǝshalima ka. Sǝ mim ngga, mǝ nǝ ɗenyinǝ we abanì.>>
2SA 19:34 Pǝlǝa Barzilayi pe murǝm eare ama, <<Apǝlǝa uekam shen, mala do nǝyilǝmu, mǝnana ɓoaro mǝ o a Urǝshalima sǝnǝ murǝm ngga?
2SA 19:35 Adyan ngga, mǝ ndanǝ apǝlǝa lumi-tongno-nong-tàrú a ɓanza. Mǝ nǝ gandǝ gauta gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ ɓoaram ngga, andǝ mǝnana pà nǝ̀ ɓoaram raka le? Mim guro mò ka, mǝ nǝ gandǝ ok ɓoaro mala girlina ko girnùná ɗǝm le? Mǝ nǝ gandǝ ok gì aɓwana aban tu'nggyal ɗǝm le? Palang ado, sǝ mim guro mò ka, mǝ nǝ duk ɓè twalo aban ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm?
2SA 19:36 Ən kārǝa mǝ kum tangnakusǝu mǝgule kǝla mǝnia ka ɗàng. Mim guro mò ka, mǝ nǝ yàlî Jodan atārǝia andǝ murǝm aban ká dǝmba bǝti.
2SA 19:37 Ida, nying guro mò, ɓǝ̀ nyare ɓǝ̀ o, ace mǝnana ɓǝn kya wú a là mem, tù aban ɓembe mala tárrám andǝ nggem. Sǝama, guro mò, yì Kimham ngga, ndya ka. Nyì ɓǝ̀ yàl a nkaring atò, ɓwamǝgule mem, murǝm. Pakki wi gìr mǝnana kat, a sǝni nda ɓoar a mǝsǝo ka.>>
2SA 19:38 Pǝlǝa murǝm bang ama, <<Kimham ngga, sǝm nǝ̀ yàl a nkaring sǝnǝi, sǝ mǝ nǝ pakki wi gìr mǝnana kat a sǝni nda ɓoar ka. Sǝ gìr mǝnana kat a earkiyice abanam ngga, mǝ nǝ pakko wi.>>
2SA 19:39 Pǝlǝa aɓwana kat, yàlî Nggeasala Jodan; sǝ lang murǝm yàlǝ́nì nkaring ngga, mǝn abui kùr Barzilayi zǝp, tsǝki wi bù, sǝ tsǝiandà. Nda Barzilayi nyare o a là male ka.
2SA 19:40 Pǝlǝa murǝm kutio wari a Gilgal, sǝ Kimham o atè. Aɓwana mala Yahuda kat, andǝ gauwa-tsùrú mala amǝ Isǝrayila, tsǝkta murǝm amur njar, aban o a là.
2SA 19:41 Banì sau ɗang, aburana mala Isǝrayila kat yiu aban murǝm, sǝ à ɗì ama, <<Palang sǝ amǝ'eam sǝm, aburana mala Yahuda, iuo arǝ sǝm sǝ à eamsǝ murǝm andǝ amǝ'ɓala male, à yàlî Jodan, atārǝia andǝ aburana male kat?>>
2SA 19:42 Pǝlǝa aburana mala Yahuda pe aburana mala Isǝrayila eare ama, <<Nda acemǝnana murǝm ngga, ɓǝla-nggurkwar ma'sǝm na ka. Sǝ palang ado sǝ bum wun lúllô amur mǝnia yì gìr ka? Ado ka, sǝm lì ɓekǝ gìr mala murǝm le? Sǝ wu sǝni sǝm twal ɓekǝ gìr abaní ace ɓamurǝ sǝm le?>>
2SA 19:43 Pǝlǝa aburana mala Isǝrayila, pe aburana mala Yahuda eare ama, <<Sǝm ngga, sǝm ndanǝ atau lum aɓa domurǝm, acemani ka, rǝcandǝa mǝnana sǝm ndanǝi mala bang ama Dauda ka murǝm ma'sǝm na ka kútì ma'wun. Mana tsǝa ado sǝ wu ɓǝsǝki sǝm? Sǝm nda mǝnana sǝm tita nacau mala nyesǝ murǝm ma'sǝm ngga re?>> Sǝama nacau mala aburana mala Yahuda nǝ bumpina ka, kútì mala aburana mala Isǝrayila.
2SA 20:1 Ɓè ɓwabura mǝ'ɓealɓana na kam, lullǝi ama Sheba, muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri, a tàu mala Benjami. Yì ka, ɓua njawe sǝ bang ama, <<Sǝm pànǝ kǝ kāmbe aɓa Dauda ɗàng, Sǝ sǝm pànǝ kǝ nzali liɓala aɓa muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi ɗàng. Isǝrayila, koyanale ka ɓǝ̀ nyar a gumli male!>>
2SA 20:2 Nda aburana mala Isǝrayila kat nying Dauda, sǝ à kpata Sheba muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri ka. Sǝama aburana mala Yahuda lanzǝ atà murǝm malea, twal a Jodan aban ká Urǝshalima.
2SA 20:3 Lang Murǝm Dauda nyar a ɓala male a Urǝshalima ka, pwan amā-twala male lum mǝnana nyia ace ɗenyinǝ ɓala ka, tsǝia a ɓè ɓala, sǝ tamsǝ amǝ'yálban ɓǝà kǝ yália. Kǝ pea wia gìr mǝnana kat à paktǝle ka, sǝama pak-ɓwama nǝia ɗàng. À kasǝkunia a ɓala ba pwari lú malea, à do kǝla amā-lú.
2SA 20:4 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi Amasa ama, <<Rambam aburana mala Yahuda abanɓwáná aɓa nongŋo tàrú, sǝ wu yiu wunǝia.>>
2SA 20:5 Nda Amasa puro ace ká tunǝ aburana mala Yahuda abanɓwáná ka, sǝama banì sauwa kútì anonggio mǝnana murǝm kasǝi wi ka.
2SA 20:6 Sǝ Dauda banggi Abishai ama, <<Adyan ngga, Sheba muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri nǝ̀ pàkka sǝm gìr mǝɓane nǝ̀ kútì mǝnana Absalom pàk ka. Twal aburana mem, sǝ wu ɓangŋa atè, ɓǝ̀ ana raka nǝ̀ kumbi ɓamúrì akanggǝrang anggea-là, sǝ nǝ̀ ɓwar arǝ sǝm.>>
2SA 20:7 Nda aburana mala Jowap andǝ amǝ'Keret andǝ amǝ'Pelet andǝ akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa kat purî ɓá Urǝshalima, aɓata sàrǝ̀ban mala Abishai, sǝ à oa pǝrta Sheba muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri.
2SA 20:8 Lang à yi bik ban tali mǝgule a Gibiyon ngga, Amasa yi kumia. Jowap ka, ndanǝ adaura-murǝm male mala amǝ'lwa arǝì, nǝ nggeabyau aɓa ndè mǝnana marǝ nggurrì a taɓuni ka. Lang Jowap sungŋo nǝ̀ ká a ban Amasa ka, nggeabyaunì swárô kpa a nzali.
2SA 20:9 Jowap ɗì Amasa ama, <<Mǝ'eambǝam, a nda jam le?>> Pǝlǝa bwal Amasa a mbotokuni nǝ bui-mǝli, ace mǝnana nǝ̀ kùrrì zǝp, mala makkun ngga.
2SA 20:10 Sǝ Amasa ka, sǝn byau mǝnana a bù Jowap ka ɗàng. Nda Jowap zuɓi Amasa nǝ byau a bumi, sǝ amuna-lungŋe solǝ a nzali. Amasa wǔ, nǝ zuɓiban mwashat ɓǝ̀rɓǝ̀r. Pǝlǝa Jowap andǝ mǝ'eambi Abishai pǝrta Sheba muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri.
2SA 20:11 Mwashat aɓalǝ alaggana mala Jowap cam amur lú Amasa, sǝ loasǝ gì na ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana kat earmúr Jowap, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat nda anzǝm Dauda ka, ɓǝ̀ kpata Jowap!>>
2SA 20:12 Amasa nongŋo aban mgbangtǝki aɓa nkila male a tsùrú mala njargula, sǝ koya mǝ'lwa mǝnana yiu a banì ka, go kusǝi came. Sǝ lang lagga man sǝni ama koyan mǝnana yiu a ban Amasa ka, cam piu ka, nda sungsǝki Amasa ɓǝ̀ gǝshì múr njargula, warinǝi a ɓawan, sǝ kùmsǝi wi kungtung amurí ka.
2SA 20:13 Lang à gǝshina lú Amasa nyingŋǝ̀nà múr njargula ka, aɓwana kat o atà Jowap ace pǝrta Sheba, muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri.
2SA 20:14 Sheba gya atà atau mala Isǝrayila kat yi pur a Abel-Bet-Ma'aka, andǝ ɓá bù-nzali mala amǝ'Beri puppup; à ramba abanɓwáná, sǝ à o atè.
2SA 20:15 Amǝ'lwa mala Jowap kat yiu sǝ à gumbǝli nggea-là Abel-Bet-Ma'aka sǝ Sheba na aɓa nggea-lê. Pǝlǝa à ɓak mgbangban mǝnana eau a kuli aban ká arǝ nggea-lê, sǝ kya cam nǝ nza arǝ kanggǝrang tali mǝnana nggea-lê cam amurí ka. Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat atà Jowap ka, à kùtí a tǝmgi kusǝ sheranî, ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ me a nzali ka.
2SA 20:16 Pǝlǝa ɓè ɓwama mǝ'sǝlǝe tunǝban nǝɓa nggea-lê ama, <<Wu kwakikir wun! Wu kwakikir wun! Ida, wu ne Jowap ama ɓǝ̀ yiu kani ace mǝnana mǝ bangcau nǝi ka.>>
2SA 20:17 Lang Jowap sung tù aban ɓwame ka, ɓwame ɗi ama, <<A nda Jowap le?>> Jowap ear ama, <<E, mǝ nda.>> Pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Kwakikiro arǝ cau mǝnana guro mò nǝ̀ banggo ka.>> Jowap eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda ǝn nggǝ oeo ka.>>
2SA 20:18 Pǝlǝa ɓwame nacau, ama, <<A pwarian ngga aɓwana kǝ̀ bang ama, <Wu alta kwarkiru a Abel,> sǝ anggo sǝ à gilǝki cau.
2SA 20:19 Sǝm nda aɓalǝ aɓwana mana à earce dorǝpwala andǝ domǝsǝcau a Isǝrayila ka. Wun ndarǝ alte ama wun nǝ̀ wal-lú nggea-là mǝnana nggeau na a Isǝrayila ka. Palang sǝ wun nǝ̀ kiɗiki nzali liɓala mǝnana mala Yahweh na ka?>>
2SA 20:20 Jowap pe wi eare ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sappi banam, ɓǝ̀ sappi banam mǝnana ama mǝ pisǝì ko mǝ bǝbbǝriki ka.
2SA 20:21 Cê pa anggo ɗàng. Ɓè ɓwabura na ǝn alkiyite ka, lullǝi ama Sheba muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri, ɓwa nzali múr-ankono mala Ifǝrem. Yì ka loasǝ bui aɓa mgbicau arǝ murǝm, nggearǝ murǝm Dauda. Wu pa mǝnia yì ɓwabura ka, sǝ mǝ nǝ nying nggea-lê.>> Ɓwame ne Jowap ama, <<Sǝni, sǝm nǝ̀ túrò ɓamuri amúr sheran.>>
2SA 20:22 Pǝlǝa ɓwame wari nǝ kwaro male aban aɓwana mǝnana kat aɓa nggea-lê ka. À kasǝ ɓamur Sheba muna-ɓwabura mala Bikǝri, sǝ à túrì Jowap. Nda Jowap twang njawe, sǝ aburana male mesǝe, à nying nggea-lê, koyan ngga nyar a là male ka. Pǝlǝa Jowap nyar a Urǝshalima aban murǝm.
2SA 20:23 Jowap nda gbani amur amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila kat; Benaya muna-ɓwabura mala Jehoyada nda mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amur amǝ'Keret andǝ amǝ'Pelet,
2SA 20:24 Adoniram nda ɓwamǝgule amur aɓwana mana à tsǝia aɓa túró púp ka, sǝ Jehoshafat muna-ɓwabura mala Ahilud nda mǝ'twalcau aɓa malǝmce;
2SA 20:25 Sheva nda mǝgilǝgir, sǝ Zadok andǝ Abiyata ka, à nda ka apǝris,
2SA 20:26 sǝ Ira ɓwa'Jayir gbal ka, pǝris mala Dauda na.
2SA 21:1 A nza mala yálmúrû mala Dauda ka, nzal-gula kpa mǝnana twal apǝlǝa tàrú a nzǝmarǝia ka, nda Dauda alta ɓamǝsǝ Yahweh ka. Sǝ Yahweh bang ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda atàcau mala Sawul andǝ ɓala-nkila male, acemǝnana wal-lú amǝ'Gibiyon.>>
2SA 21:2 Nda murǝm Dauda tunǝ amǝ'Gibiyon sǝ nacau nǝia ka. (Amǝ'Gibiyon ngga à pur a nggurkwar mala Isǝrayila ɗàng; à nda ka amǝ'Amor mǝnana à ueo, mana amǝ Isǝrayila kánbia wia ama à nǝ̀ ɗekia nǝyilǝmu ka; sǝama Sawul alte nǝ̀ twaltea aɓa bumpina male ace aɓwana mala Isǝrayila andǝ Yahuda).
2SA 21:3 Sǝ Dauda ɗì amǝ'Gibiyon ama, <<Mana ɓǝn pa ace wun? Sǝ mana ɓǝn pa a kúnì mǝɓane mǝnana à pàkka wun, mǝnana nǝ̀ tsǝa wun nǝ̀ tsǝki aɓwana mala Yahweh bù ka?>>
2SA 21:4 Pǝlǝa amǝ'Gibiyon earî wi ama, <<Cau mǝnana anre sǝm sǝnǝa Sawul andǝ ɓala male ka, bolo-zǝnariya ko bolo-njengǝlan pà nǝ̀ gilǝki ɗàng; sǝ pà aɓa rǝcandǝa ma'sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm wal-lú kǝɓwa a Isǝrayila ɗàng.>> Sǝ Dauda ɗia ama, <<Sǝ mana ado wu kǝ earce ama mǝ pa ace wun?>>
2SA 21:5 À earî murǝm ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana wal-lú sǝm, sǝ hamce ama nǝ̀ twalta sǝm, ace mǝnana kǝɓwa atà sǝm ɓǝkǝa ue nǝyilǝmu a ɓekǝ ban aɓa nzong-nzali mala Isǝrayila raka,
2SA 21:6 ɓǝà pa sǝm aɓwana tongno-nong-ɓari atà amuna-burana male, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ gyaria aɓadǝm Yahweh a Gibiya, là mala Sawul, yì ɓwa mǝnana Yahweh tàrì ka.>> Sǝ murǝm bang ama, <<Mǝ nǝ pa wunia.>>
2SA 21:7 Sǝama ace kána mǝnana anre Dauda andǝ Jonatan a ɓadǝm Yahweh ka, murǝm nying Mefiboshet muna-ɓwabura mala Jonatan mǝ'kà Sawul ɓǝ̀ auwa.
2SA 21:8 Pǝlǝa murǝm twal amuna-burana ɓari, Armoni andǝ Mefiboshet, amuna mala Rizpa ɓoarnsarile Aiya mǝnana ɓǝlî Sawul ka, andǝ amuna-burana tongno, mǝnana Merap ɓoarnsarile Sawul ɓǝlî Adǝriyel muna-ɓwabura mala Barzilayi ɓwa Mehola ka.
2SA 21:9 Dauda tasǝ amuna-burana mǝnia ka a ɓabu amǝ'Gibiyon, sǝ à gyaria amur ɓè muna-nkono aɓadǝm Yahweh; yià mǝno tongno-nong-ɓari ka à wù atārǝia. À wal-luia aɓalǝ anonggio mǝdǝmbe mala pwan-gìrɓaban, a bàkú tita pwan mǝssa-bálì.
2SA 21:10 Pǝlǝa Rizpa ɓoarnsarile Aiya twal lagir-doatu, sǝ sárǝi ace ɓamúrì amur tali, a bàkú tita pwan-gìrɓaban ba kpa mala mbulo nǝ kuli amur aluî. Sǝ earî anyal a bumkuli ɓǝà sulǝ amuria nǝ pwari, ko anyam-bondo nǝ du ɗàng.
2SA 21:11 Aɓwana yi banggi Dauda gìr mǝnana Rizpa ɓoarnsarile Aiya, mā-twala mala Sawul pàk ka.
2SA 21:12 Pǝlǝa Dauda wario kya pwan amú Sawul andǝ amú muna-ɓwabura male Jonatan a ban aburana mala Jabesh-Gilǝyat. Amǝ Jabesh-Gilǝyat ka à akdǝmba à kya iu amuia a nzawara mala Bet-shan, ban mǝnana amǝ'Filisti gyaria kam, a pwari mǝnana amǝ'Filisti wal-lú Sawul amur Nkono Gilbowa ka.
2SA 21:13 Dauda twal amú Sawul andǝ amú muni Jonatan a ban mǝno sǝ yinǝia. Ɗǝm ngga à ramba amú aburana mǝno mǝnana à gyaria ka.
2SA 21:14 À lumsǝ amú Sawul andǝ amú muni Jonatan a ɓembe-ɓa-tali mala tárrí Kish a Zela aɓa bu-nzali Benjami. Koman kat ka à pè kǝla mǝnana murǝm bang ngga. Anzǝm mǝno ka, sǝ Ɓakuli ok hiwi ace nzalî.
2SA 21:15 Ɓè fara ka, munǝo lo ɗǝm a nre ka amǝ'Filisti andǝ amǝ'Isǝrayila. Dauda andǝ aburana male atè wari a mǝno yì munǝo ka, sǝ lang à nda aɓa munǝo arǝ amǝ'Filisti ka, Dauda aulǝa.
2SA 21:16 Pǝlǝa Isǝbibenop, ɓwa'Filisti, mwashat atà amǝ'kau mala akáɓá-ɓwa, mǝnana dǝmbǝrya mala kaɗa male ka, tyang tàrú nǝ gauwa-tsùrú na (3.5), sǝ kùr rǝi nǝ bǝsa nggeabyau ka, bang ama nǝ̀ wal-lú Dauda.
2SA 21:17 Sǝama, Abishai muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya, yiu yi bwalì Dauda kàm, sǝ wal-lú ɓwa'Filistinî. Pǝlǝa aburana mala Dauda kánbi wi ama, <<A pà wunǝ yiu a lwa ɗǝm atà sǝm ɗàng, ace mǝnana wu kǝa limgi tǎlaban mala Isǝrayila raka.>>
2SA 21:18 Anzǝm mǝno ka ɓè munǝo lo ɗǝm andǝ amǝ'Filisti a Gop. A bàkú mǝno ka, Sibekai ɓwa Husha, wal-lú Saf, mwashat atà amǝ'kau mala akáɓá-ɓwa.
2SA 21:19 A ɓè munǝo ɗǝm andǝ amǝ'Filisti a Gop ka, Elhanan muna-ɓwabura mala Jaare-oregim, ɓwa'Betalami, wal-lú mǝ'eam Golaya ɓwa'Gitti, mǝnana tondong kaɗa male nyane kǝla muna-nggun-so ka.
2SA 21:20 Ɓè munǝo lo ɗǝm a Gat. A banì ka ɓè ɓwabura nakam kaɓa nggurung mǝnana a koya bui ka, ndanǝ amuna-bu tongno-nong-mwashat, sǝ amuna-kusǝu tongno-nong-mwashat a koya kusǝi; kpapi kat ka à nda lumi-ɓari-nong-ine; yì gbal ka mǝ'kau mala akáɓá-ɓwa na.
2SA 21:21 Sǝ lang ɓǝsǝki Isǝrayila ka, Jonatan muna-ɓwabura mala Shimeyi, mǝ'eam Dauda wal-lui.
2SA 21:22 Akáɓá-ɓwa mǝnia ine ka, amǝ'kau mala akáɓá-ɓwa mala Gat na, sǝ à wù nǝ bù Dauda andǝ aburana male.
2SA 22:1 Sǝ Dauda bang acau mala nggyal mǝnia ka aban Yahweh, a bàkú mǝnana amsǝi a bù aɓi-mǝbura kat, sǝ a bù Sawul ka
2SA 22:2 ama, <<Yahweh nda tali mem, ban-sǝmbǝrǝa mem andǝ mǝ'amsǝam;
2SA 22:3 We Ɓakuli, tali mem, mǝnana aɓalǝo sǝ ǝn nggǝ kum ban-auwa ka; ntongŋo mem andǝ rǝcandǝa mala amsǝban mem, kanggǝrang-ban andǝ ban-auwa mem; mǝ'amsǝam a ɓabù ɓìkìbura.
2SA 22:4 Ən ɓua aban Yahweh, yì mǝnana kārǝ́na ɓǝà ɓwangsǝi ka; Anggo sǝ mǝ nǝ kum amsǝban a ɓabù aɓiam-mǝbura.
2SA 22:5 Lú gumbǝliam kǝla eaki-nkono mala mùr; mùrɓangŋa mala kiɗikiban ɓakiam;
2SA 22:6 Anggur mala Shewol taɓǝlikiam; agbǝli mala lú puratam.
2SA 22:7 Aɓa nggikiban mem ngga, ǝn ɓua aban Yahweh, ǝn ɓua aban Ɓakuli mem. Ok giem aɓa ndà male; sǝ ɓua mem ace gbasha kúti a kiri.
2SA 22:8 Pǝlǝa ɓanza dǝurǝo sǝ gǝggǝli, akusǝɓa mala kuli ɓǝl-ryak'ryak sǝ à dǝurǝkio; à gǝggǝli acemǝnana bumi-lullo.
2SA 22:9 Yele pur a ɓá lullǝi; bǝsa mǝ'earke pur a ɓá kúni, nkalang mǝnana nggangsǝ ka ear-bǝsa nǝ baní.
2SA 22:10 Dìlì kuli sǝ sulǝo, pǝndǝa mǝcikciki na aɓata akusǝi.
2SA 22:11 Eau a nzǝm cerup sǝ yàlé; e, à sǝni a nkpamtari gung.
2SA 22:12 Tsǝk pǝndǝa mǝnana gumbǝlì ka, pǝlǝ tara male, pǝrɓang mana lùmsǝ nǝ mur ka kàrì.
2SA 22:13 Tǎlaban mana aɓadǝmbi ka, tsǝk nkalang bǝsa lo earke.
2SA 22:14 Yahweh sa a kuli kǝla mgbarangce. Ɓakuli mana Karban Kat nǝ Gulo ka loasǝ gì.
2SA 22:15 Túr amundi sǝ mesǝ aɓi-mǝbura, liki'nzama male zurìmúria.
2SA 22:16 Abân-mǝlime mala nggeamùr ndǝlya, akusǝɓa mala ɓanza nong kwas, lang Yahweh gimban, sǝ pyau n'yali a ɓá lullǝi ka.
2SA 22:17 Sárǝ́ bui nǝ kuli sǝ twalam; eamsǝam a ban-mǝlime aɓa nggeamùr.
2SA 22:18 Amsǝam a ɓabù ɓiam-mǝbura mǝ'rǝcandǝe, a ɓabù aɓwana mana à ɓinǝmǝsǝàm ngga, acemǝnana rǝcandǝa malea ɓākì mem.
2SA 22:19 À sulǝ amuram a pwari murɓikea mem, sǝama Yahweh pam gbasha.
2SA 22:20 Sǝ ɗǝm ngga pusǝam, yinǝ mim aɓa dalang. Amsǝam, acemǝnana bumipwasǝ arǝàm.
2SA 22:21 Yahweh pàngnǝ mim kǝla mǝnana karǝ arǝ ɓealɓoarna mem ngga; pam tangnakusǝ ɗwanyicau-arǝǔ mem.
2SA 22:22 Ən kpanata anjargula mala Yahweh, sǝ ǝn kyanggi Ɓakuli mem aban ká pàk ɓealɓikea ɗang.
2SA 22:23 Anggurcau male kat ka, à nda aɓadǝmbam, sǝ ǝn kyanggi anê male ɗàng.
2SA 22:24 Mǝ nda jik aɓadǝmbi. Ən bwal ɓamúràm arǝ cauɓikea.
2SA 22:25 Acemani ka Yahweh panam tangnakusǝu kǝla mana karǝ arǝ ɓealɓoarna mem ngga, kǝla mana karǝ arǝ doɓoarnsari mem aɓadǝmbi ka.
2SA 22:26 Aban amǝ lǝmdǝ mǝsǝswatǝr ka, awu nǝ lǝmdǝ mǝsǝswatǝr, aban amǝ'ɗwanyicau-arǝu ka, awu nǝ lǝmdǝ ɓamúrò, a nda mǝ'ɗwanyicau-arǝu.
2SA 22:27 Aban amǝ'doɓoarnsari ka, awu nǝ lǝmdǝ ɓamúrò mǝ'doɓoarnsari, aban amǝ'kìɗìkì ka, awu nǝ lǝmdǝ ɓamúrò mǝɓìkìdo.
2SA 22:28 Awu nǝ amsǝ aɓwana mǝnana à paria ka, sǝama amǝsǝo na arǝ amǝtwàlɓamúrû, ace nyesǝia a nzali.
2SA 22:29 A nda pitǝla mem, Yahweh. Yahweh kǝ̀ tâ aɓa pǝndǝa mem.
2SA 22:30 Nǝ we ka, mǝ nǝ gandǝ loasǝtà amǝ'tǝllìban, nǝ pagbasha mala Ɓakuli mem ngga, mǝ nǝ yàlî múr sheran.
2SA 22:31 Mala Ɓakuli ka, njar male na jik. Cau mala Yahweh ka à mwamǝni. Yi ka, ntongŋo na aban aɓwana mana à kùmsǝ a baní ka.
2SA 22:32 Yana nda Ɓakuli, ɓǝ̀ Yahweh na raka? Sǝ yana nda tali, ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli na raka?
2SA 22:33 Ɓakuli nda ban-auwa mǝcandǝe mem, sǝ kǝ tsǝk njar mem ɓǝ̀ duk jik.
2SA 22:34 Tsǝk akusǝam ɓǝà soa nzali kǝla mala mbamba, sǝ tamsǝam amur abân mǝ'dāhre.
2SA 22:35 Kǝ kanì abuam munǝo, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ anggwarbuam gandǝ kar nta mala bolo-bángŋá.
2SA 22:36 Sǝ ɗǝm ngga à panam ntongŋo mala amsǝban mô; sǝ pagbasha mô dumsǝnam a gulo.
2SA 22:37 A tangsǝna njar ace akusǝam, ace mǝnana akusǝam ɓǝà kǝa shambǝrǝ raka.
2SA 22:38 Ən pǝrnata aɓiam-mǝbura, sǝ ǝn kiɗikinia. Ən pǝlǝ nzǝmam ɗàng she lang ǝn malnia ka.
2SA 22:39 Ən twalnatea, ǝn zuɓikia sǝ à gandǝ lo ɗang. E, à kpaki a nzali a kusǝam.
2SA 22:40 A mārǝnam nǝ rǝcandǝa ace munǝo; Aɓwana mǝnana à lo arǝàm ngga, a ɓunginia aɓatam.
2SA 22:41 A tsǝ́ngŋǝ̀nà aɓiam-mǝbura à pǝlǝam nzǝmia, ace mǝnana ɓǝn kiɗiki aɓwana mǝnana à ɓinǝmǝsǝam ngga.
2SA 22:42 À pelǝban, sǝ kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ amsǝia ɗàng; à ɓua aban Yahweh, sǝ okia wia ɗàng.
2SA 22:43 Pǝlǝa ǝn goea kǝla muku nzali. Ən nyakia sǝ ǝn parkia kǝla dǝɓang a njarɓala, sǝ ǝn mesǝkia.
2SA 22:44 A amsǝnam aɓa kúnɓuàna sǝnǝ aɓwana mem. A tsǝ́ngŋǝ̀nám ǝn dumǝna múrû amur anzali. Aɓwana mana ǝn súrǝ̀ia raka, à pàk túróɓadǝmbu aɓadǝmbam.
2SA 22:45 Amǝkúnɗàngna nǝ̀ paɓamuria abanam, Lang à ok cau nǝ o ani amuram ngga, à nǝ̀ oakam.
2SA 22:46 Ɓabum amǝkúnɗàngna nǝ̀ ɓungio, à nǝ̀ purkî ɓalǝ abân-sǝmbǝrǝa malea, sǝ à nǝ̀ yiu nǝ rǝɓǝla.
2SA 22:47 Yahweh na nǝ yilǝmu! Ɓwangsǝban ɓǝ̀ pa aban Tali mem! Gulo ka mala Ɓakuli na, Tali mala amsǝban mem.
2SA 22:48 Yì nda Ɓakuli mǝnana mbwekiyiam akúnì, mǝnana kǝ yinǝ aɓwapǝndǝa aɓatam,
2SA 22:49 mǝnana pusǝam ǝn purì bù aɓiam-mǝbura ka. E, a kǝ loasǝam mǝ kútì aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ lo arǝàm ngga. A kǝ amsǝam a bù ɓwa mǝɓìkìbura.
2SA 22:50 Acemani ka, mǝ nǝ po yàwá, we Yahweh, aɓalǝ anzali, sǝ mǝ nǝ tùki anggyal ɓwangsǝki lullǝo.
2SA 22:51 Pè murǝm male amsǝban mǝgule, sǝ kǝ lǝmdǝì ɓwa male mana ɗārǝì ka, earcearǝu mǝnana kǝ gǝshi raka, aban Dauda andǝ amǝɓala male tàtǝ́k.>>
2SA 23:1 Amǝnia ka, à nda ka masǝlǝata acau mala Dauda: Acau mǝnana à pùr a kún Dauda muna-ɓwabura mala Jeshi; acau mala ɓwa mǝnana à loasǝi a buno gulo, yì ɓwa mǝnana Ɓakuli mala Yakupu ɗārǝì ka, yì mǝ'ngyal ɓoarna mala Isǝrayila:
2SA 23:2 Bangŋo mala Yahweh bangcau nǝ kunam, cau male na a lasǝam.
2SA 23:3 Ɓakuli mala Isǝrayila nanacau, Tali mala Isǝrayila nanàm ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana kǝ yálmúr aɓwana nǝ ɓealɓoarna, mǝnana kǝ yálmúrû nǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli ka,
2SA 23:4 nǝ̀ pa kǝla tǎlaban mala dǝmbari, lang pwari nǝ nggǝ eau ka, dǝmbari mǝnana pànǝ apǝrɓang raka, lang lolloapì bondo nǝ nggǝ to a nzali, aɓa tā-pwari anzǝm nya mala mbulo ka.
2SA 23:5 Aɓa mǝsǝcau ka, anggo sǝ ɓala mem pa aban Ɓakuli re? Yì ka kutina aɓa kùrcau nǝ mim, pàcau mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka, kùrcau mǝnana gilǝkice aɓa koyagir, sǝ kwakite kàngkàng ngga. Mǝno nda amsǝban mem kat, andǝ suno mem kat. Pà nǝ̀ tsǝì ɓǝ̀ gul re?
2SA 23:6 Sǝama amǝ'ɓealɓikea ka, à nda kǝla azwe mǝnana à nǝ̀ sukkia ka, acemǝnana kǝɓwa pa nǝ̀ jea nǝ bui ɗàng.
2SA 23:7 Ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ jea ka, dumǝna púp nǝ̀ kùr rǝi nǝ gara-bolo ko gara nzo. Sǝ à nǝ̀ pisǝia a bǝsa kàng a kǝ banì.>>
2SA 23:8 Amǝnia ka, à nda ka alullǝ akanggǝrang aɓwana mǝnana Dauda ndanǝia ka: Joshep-Basshebet ɓwa Tachemon, nda mǝdǝmba mala amǝgulo-lwa, sǝ à tunǝi ɗǝm ama Adino, ɓwa Ezni; wal-lú aɓwana gbǝman-tongno-nong-tàrú (800) aɓa lwa mwashat.
2SA 23:9 Ɓwa mǝnana kpate ka, nda Eleaza muna-ɓwabura mala Dodo, muna-ɓwabura mala Ahohi; nda mwashat atà akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa tàrú mana atà Dauda, lang à cam kàngkàng a kún amǝ'Filisti mǝnana à yi ramba abanɓwáná ace lwa, sǝ aburana mala Isǝrayila nyar nǝtea ka.
2SA 23:10 Yì ka, lo sǝ wal amǝ'Filisti ba aulǝa pàkki wi, gandǝa buì shiuri arǝ nggeabyau; sǝ a mǝno yì pwari ka, Yahweh yinǝ limurǝm mǝgule; sǝ lang amǝ'lwa nyare à yiu anzǝmi ka, kǝ gìr mǝnana à pàk ka, nda pwan gǝna-lwa mala aɓiu-mǝbura mǝnana à wal-luia ka.
2SA 23:11 Sǝ Shamma muna-ɓwabura mala Agi ɓwa Harar kpa. Lang amǝ'Filisti ram rǝia abanɓwáná a Lehi a ban ɓè ɓaban mǝnana lùmsǝ nǝ gwalong ngga, acili amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila ɓanggi amǝ'Filisti.
2SA 23:12 Sǝama yì Shamma ka cam a tsùrú mala ɓabanì, munǝ ace, sǝ wal amǝ'Filisti, sǝ Yahweh yinǝì Isǝrayila limurǝm mǝgule.
2SA 23:13 Pǝlǝa akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa mǝnia tàrú aɓalǝ amǝgulo lumi-tàrú mala amǝ'lwa ka, à sulǝo sǝ à yiu aban Dauda a gumi-ɓa'tali mǝnana a Adulam ngga nǝ kún pwan-gìrɓaban, a bàkú mǝnana amǝ'lwa mala amǝ'Filisti duk-katti a ɓangŋaban Refayim ngga.
2SA 23:14 A mǝno yì bàkú ka, Dauda na a kanggǝrang-ban, sǝ amǝ'Filisti ka, à angŋa Betalami sǝ à tamsǝna ɓè nggǝsan mala amǝ'lwa malea abanì.
2SA 23:15 Sǝ Dauda ɓua mǝsamur kǝ̀rkǝ́r, na ama, <<Mǝsamur mala mùr tūli-mùr mǝnana a kún là mala Betalami ka, walnam kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Mǝ nǝ earce, ɓǝ̀ ɓeɓwa nǝ̀ ɗàrǝa nǝ̀ pàm ngga!>>
2SA 23:16 Akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa man tàrú ka, à ar nǝɓalǝ amǝlwa mǝnana aɓa kàttì mala amǝ'Filisti ka, à kya ɗàrǝ́ mùr a tūli-mùr mǝnana a kún là mala Betalami ka, sǝ à twali à yinǝì Dauda. Sǝama ɓinǝ nuie; solǝi a nzali aɓadǝm Yahweh.
2SA 23:17 Bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sappi banam, Yahweh, mǝnana ɓǝn nu mùr man ngga! Mǝnia ka nkila mala aburana na mǝnana à twal yilǝmia a kún buia ka re?>> Acemani ka, Dauda nu mùrnî ɗàng. Akanggǝrang aburana man tàrú ka, à na à pàk amǝnia yì agir ka.
2SA 23:18 Abishai, mǝ'eam Jowap, muna-ɓwabura mala Zeruya nda ɓwamǝgule amur amǝ'lwa mǝno lumi-tàrú ka. Pàktúró nǝ kaɗa male a munǝo arǝ aburana gbǝman-tàrú (300), sǝ wal-luia, sǝ kum lullǝu atà akanggǝrang amǝlwa mǝno tàrú ka.
2SA 23:19 Yì na mǝnana lullǝì zǝ́kí kútì mala aɓwana man lumi-tàrú ka, acemani ka, à twali pǝlǝ mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban amuria; sǝama, à ɓalli aɓalǝ amǝ'lwa man tàrú ka ɗàng.
2SA 23:20 Benaya muna-ɓwabura mala Jehoyada ka, kanggǝrang ɓwa na mǝnana pur a Kabzil ka; pàkki agir gyambǝliban mǝgulke. Yì na mǝnana wal amuna-burana ɓari mala Ariyel ɓwa Mowap ka. Ɗǝm ngga, a pwari mana talimbulo kpani ka, sulǝ atà im aɓa tūli, sǝ wal-luí kàm.
2SA 23:21 Wal-lú ɓè ɓwa'Masar, kaɓa ɓwa. Ɓwa'Masar mǝno ka, ndanǝ nkongŋo a bui, sǝama Benaya sulǝ atè nǝ gara-kwalta, ak nkongŋo a bu ɓwa'Masarnî, sǝ wal-luí nǝi.
2SA 23:22 Amǝno ka, à nda ka agir mǝnana Benaya muna-ɓwabura mala Jehoyada pea ka, sǝ kumbi ɓamúrì lullǝu atà akanggǝrang amǝ'lwa mǝno tàrú ka.
2SA 23:23 Lullǝì zǝ́kí kútì mala aɓwana man lumi-tàrú ka, sǝama bwalta amǝno tàrú ka ɗàng. Sǝ Dauda twali tsǝì, duk ɓwamǝgule amur amǝ'yáltè.
2SA 23:24 Aɓea aɓwana aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝno lumi-tàrú ka, à nda ka: Asahel mǝ'eam Jowap; Elhanan muna-ɓwabura mala Dodo ɓwa Betalami;
2SA 23:25 Shamma ɓwa Harot, Elika ɓwa Harot;
2SA 23:26 Helez ɓwa Palti; Ira muna-ɓwabura mala Ikkesh ɓwa Tekowa;
2SA 23:27 Abiyeza ɓwa Anatot; Mebunayi ɓwa Hushati;
2SA 23:28 Zalmon ɓwa Ahohi; Maharayi ɓwa Netofa;
2SA 23:29 Helep muna-ɓwabura mala Baana ɓwa Netofa; Ittayi muna-ɓwabura mala Ribayi ɓwa Gibiya mala bu-nzali Benjami;
2SA 23:30 Benaya ɓwa Piraton; Hiddayi ɓwa mala amealmur Gaash;
2SA 23:31 Abi-albon ɓwa Arbati; Azǝmavet ɓwa Barhum;
2SA 23:32 Eliyaba ɓwa Shaalboni; amuna-burana mala Jashen; sǝ Jonatan;
2SA 23:33 Shamma ɓwa Harar; Ayiyam muna-ɓwabura mala Sharar ɓwa Arar;
2SA 23:34 Elifelet muna-ɓwabura mala Ahasbayi, muna-ɓwabura mala ɓwa Ma'aka; Eliyam muna-ɓwabura mala Ahitofel ɓwa Gilo;
2SA 23:35 Hezǝro ɓwa Kamel; Pa'arayi ɓwa Arbi;
2SA 23:36 Igal muna-ɓwabura mala Natan ɓwa Zoba; Bani ɓwa Gad;
2SA 23:37 Zelek ɓwa Amon; Naharayi ɓwa Beerot, mǝ-bwal-agirmunǝo mala Jowap muna-ɓwabura mala Zuriya;
2SA 23:38 Ira ɓwa Itǝri; Garep ɓwa Itǝri;
2SA 23:39 sǝ Yuriya ɓwa Hitti. Yià kat ka, à nda lumi-tàrú bwamdǝ tongno-nong-ɓari (37).
2SA 24:1 Ɗǝm ngga bumlulla mala Yahweh earki amur Isǝrayila, soakita Dauda arǝia ɓǝ̀ banggia wia ama, <<Wu kyane wu ɓal amǝ Isǝrayila andǝ amǝ Yahuda.>>
2SA 24:2 Pǝlǝa murǝm banggi Jowap mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala amǝ'lwa mǝnana atè ka ama, <<Wu kya aɓalǝ atau mala Isǝrayila tite a Dan aban ká Biyasheba, sǝ wu pwan alullǝ amǝ'lwa, ace mǝnana ɓǝn súrǝ̀ lakki malea.>>
2SA 24:3 Sǝ Jowap ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh Ɓakuli mô hatǝki aɓwana kusǝ gbǝman, sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝsǝ ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝni. Sǝama mana tsǝa sǝ ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm earce nǝ̀ pàk mǝnia yì gìr ka?>>
2SA 24:4 Kat andǝ mani ka, cau mala murǝm par mala Jowap andǝ amǝsà'arǝ amǝ'lwa, pǝlǝa à nying ɓadǝm murǝm, à o a pwan alullǝ amǝ'lwa mala Isǝrayila.
2SA 24:5 À yàl nkaring Jodan, à kya tsǝk kàttì a Aruwa, a njar-kunmur mala nggea-là mǝnana a tsùrú mala ɓangŋaban, a bu-nzali Gad ka. À lo kano ka, à wari a Jaza.
2SA 24:6 Pǝlǝa à yiu a Gilǝyat, andǝ bu-nzali mala Tatim-Hodshi, sǝ à yiu a Dan-jaan, sǝ à pǝlǝa aban ká a Sidon;
2SA 24:7 sǝ à yiu a kanggǝrang-ban mala Taya andǝ anggea-là mala amǝ'Hivi andǝ mala amǝ'Kan'ana kat; sǝ à pur aban ká nǝ [Negev], njar-kunmur mala Yahuda a Biyasheba.
2SA 24:8 Sǝ lang à gingŋǝ́na aɓa nzalî kat ka, à yi bik Urǝshalima a masǝlǝata zongŋo tongno-nong-ine nǝ anongŋo lumi-ɓari.
2SA 24:9 Jowap pe murǝm lakkì mala aɓwana mǝnana à ɓallia ka: aɓa Isǝrayila ka, akanggǝrang aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ bwal nggeabyau ka, à nda á-gbǝman-tongno-nong-tàrú (800,000), sǝ amǝ Yahuda ka, à nda á-gbǝman-tongno (500,000).
2SA 24:10 Ɓabum Dauda tè anzǝm mana ɓallǝna aɓwana ka. Sǝ Dauda ne Yahweh ama, <<Ən pàngŋǝ́nà cauɓikea mǝgule nǝ gìr mǝnana ǝn pàk ka. Sǝama ado ka, ida, Yahweh twalî guro mò ban mǝɓane mǝnana pàk ka, acemǝnana ǝn pàngŋǝ́nà gìr ɓwaɓana.>>
2SA 24:11 Sǝ lang Dauda lo nǝ dǝmbari ka, cau mala Yahweh yiu aban mǝɓangnǝa Gad, mǝ'sǝna mala Dauda ama,
2SA 24:12 <<Kya banggi Dauda ama, <Yahweh kǝ na ama, mǝ nda rǝ po agir tàrú. Twal mwashat atea, mǝnana Mǝ nǝ yinǝi amuro ka.> >>
2SA 24:13 Nda Gad yiu aban Dauda sǝ banggi wi cê ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ nzal-gula mala pǝlǝa tàrú yipo aɓa nzali mô le, ko awu nǝ ɓang a ɓadǝmba aɓio-mǝbura sǝ à nǝ̀ nggǝ pǝrto mala azongŋo tàrú le, ko ɓǝ̀ kwánó-twàl-là sulǝ aɓa nzali mô mala nongŋo tàrú? Ado ka, ɓalkiɓabumo sǝ wu nam, ya pa'eare na ɓabumo twalo, ace mǝnana mǝ kya banggi ɓwa mǝnana túrǎm ngga.>>
2SA 24:14 Pǝlǝa Dauda banggi Gad ama, <<Mǝ nda aɓa nggikiban kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Nǝ̀ ɓoaribani ɓǝ̀ sǝm kpa a ɓabù Yahweh, acemǝnana mǝsǝswatǝr male gulo; pà mǝ nǝ eare ɓǝ̀ sǝm kpa a ɓabù ɓwapǝndǝa ɗang.>>
2SA 24:15 Nda Yahweh tasǝ kwánó-twàl-là amur Isǝrayila, twal a dǝmbari mǝno aban ká masǝlǝata anonggio mǝnana à kasǝ ka. Sǝ aburana á-lumi-tongno-nong-ɓari (70,000) wǔ, twal a Dan aban ká a Biyasheba.
2SA 24:16 Lang mǝturonjar mala Yahweh sárǝ́ bui sǝ lǝmdǝi nǝban Urǝshalima ace kiɗike ka, Yahweh nggaɗi ɗenyicau male arǝ mǝno yi gir'murmwana ka, sǝ ne mǝturonjar mǝnana kǝ kiɗiki aɓwana ka ama, <<Karǝna! Ado ka nyesǝ buo.>> Sǝ mǝturonjar mala Yahweh ka, nda a katǝra mala Arauna ɓwa'Jebus.
2SA 24:17 Dauda sǝn mǝturonjar mǝnana kǝ kiɗiki aɓwana ka. Pǝlǝa ne Yahweh ama, <<Sǝni, mǝ nda mǝnana ǝn pak cauɓikea ka; mǝ nda mǝnana ǝn pak mǝɓike ka. Sǝ anzur mǝnia ka, mana à pa? Ida, ɗeki buo ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝ arǝàm sǝnǝ ɓala mala tárrám.>>
2SA 24:18 Gad yiu aban Dauda a mǝno yì pwari ka, sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Eauwe, kya ɓakkì Yahweh gyangŋan a katǝra mala Arauna ɓwa'Jebus.>>
2SA 24:19 Nda Dauda lo aɓa kpata cau mala Gad kǝla mǝnana Yahweh na ka.
2SA 24:20 Lang Arauna dili mǝsǝi sǝ sǝn murǝm andǝ amǝtúró male dǝshini aban yiu ka, pǝlǝa wario kya ɓun a ɓadǝm murǝm nǝ ɓamǝsǝi a nzali.
2SA 24:21 Sǝ Arauna bang ama, <<Mana yinǝ ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm abanam, mim guro male?>> Dauda banggi wi ama, <<Ace kúr katǝra a buo, ace mǝnana mǝ ɓakkì Yahweh gyangŋan, ace tamsǝ mǝnia yi kwánó-ɓikea ka, ɓǝ̀ nying aɓwe.>>
2SA 24:22 Arauna ne Dauda ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwamǝgule mem murǝm twali sǝ ɓǝ̀ paɓoro mala gìr mǝnana ɓoari wi ka. Sǝni, ajamnda mem nia ka, twalia ace paɓoro mala pisǝe kǝring. Sǝ agara nyagir andǝ anggun-rya malea nia ka ace gimsa.
2SA 24:23 Agir mǝnia kat ka, we murǝm, mim Arauna ǝn panì murǝm.>> Sǝ Arauna banggi murǝm ɗǝm ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Yahweh Ɓakuli mô ak ɓoro mô.>>
2SA 24:24 Sǝama murǝm ne Arauna ama, <<Awo; mǝ nǝ kúrí nǝ kúró. Pà mǝ nǝ paɓoro mala pisǝe kǝring aban Yahweh Ɓakuli mem sǝ ǝn mbwe kǝgìr ace raka ɗàng.>> Nda Dauda kúr katǝranî andǝ ajamndè a kún mǝsǝboalo shekel lumi-tongno ka.
2SA 24:25 Dauda ɓakkî Yahweh gyangŋan abanì, sǝ pa agir'nkila mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ apaɓoro mala dotarǝu. Pǝlǝa Yahweh ok hiwi male amur nzalinì, sǝ twalî Isǝrayila kwánó-ɓikê.
MAT 1:1 Aɓa malǝmce ka tàu mǝnana Yesu Kǝrǝsti, Mǝkà Dauda, Mǝkà Ibǝrayim, pùr kàm ngga ndya ka:
MAT 1:2 Ibǝrayim ɓǝl Ishaku, Ishaku ɓǝl Yakupu, Yakupu ɓǝl a Yahuda andǝ amǝ'eambi,
MAT 1:3 Yahuda ɓǝl Parisa andǝ Zera. Nggea nda Tamar. Parisa nda tár Hezǝron, Hezǝron ɓǝl Ram,
MAT 1:4 Ram ɓǝl Aminadap, Aminadap ɓǝl Nashon, Nashon ɓǝl Salmon,
MAT 1:5 Salmon ɓǝl Boaza. Ngge nda Rahap. Boaza ɓǝl Obet. Nggea Obet nda Rut. Obet ɓǝl Jeshi,
MAT 1:6 Sǝ Jeshi yi ɓǝl murǝm Dauda. Dauda ɓǝl Solomon. Nggea Solomon ɗiɗyal ka mā-lú mala Yuriya na.
MAT 1:7 Solomon ɓǝl Riabwam. Riabwam ɓǝl Abija. Abija ɓǝl Asa.
MAT 1:8 Asa ɓǝl Jehoshafat. Jehoshafat ɓǝl Joram. Joram ɓǝl Uzziya.
MAT 1:9 Uzziya ɓǝl Jotam. Jotam ɓǝl Ahas. Ahas ɓǝl Hezekiya,
MAT 1:10 Hezekiya ɓǝl Manasa. Manasa ɓǝl Amon. Amon ɓǝl Josiya,
MAT 1:11 sǝ Josiya yi ɓǝl Jekonaya andǝ amǝ'eambi (a bàkú mana a bwal amǝ Isǝrayila a nzali malea à um nǝia guro a nzali Babila ka).
MAT 1:12 A nzǝm mana à umna nǝia a Babila ka Jekonaya ɓǝl Shaltiyel. Shaltiyel ɓǝl Jerubabel.
MAT 1:13 Jerubabel ɓǝl Abiuda. Abiuda ɓǝl Iliyakim. Iliyakim ɓǝl Azura.
MAT 1:14 Azura ɓǝl Zadok. Zadok ɓǝl Akim. Akim ɓǝl Eliyu.
MAT 1:15 Eliyu ɓǝl Eleaza. Eleaza ɓǝl Matan. Matan ɓǝl Yakupu.
MAT 1:16 Sǝ Yakupu yi ɓǝl Yisǝfu, bura Maryamu. Maryamu nda yi ɓǝl Yesu, mana à tunǝki ama Kǝrǝsti ka.
MAT 1:17 Lǝmdǝ ama tite arǝ Ibǝrayim yi bwal ban Dauda ka anza lum-nong-ine na. Sǝ lo a ban Dauda yi bwal bákú mala pwanban aban o a Babila ka anza lum-nong-ine na. Sǝ lo a bàkú mala pwanban aban o a Babila yi bwal ban Kǝrǝsti ka anza lum-nong-ine na.
MAT 1:18 Ani sǝ ɓǝl Yesu Kǝrǝsti pa. Nggè, yì Maryamu ka Yisǝfu pùr amurí nǝ̀ ali. Maryamu ka malaká yiu a ɓala mala Yisǝfu peatu ɗàng, sǝ muna kpa a bumi nǝ kanì mala Bangŋo Mǝfele.
MAT 1:19 Burí Yisǝfu, acemǝnana yì ka, ɓwa mǝɓoarne na ka, eare ama nǝ̀ pè wi kirsakya a mǝsǝ aɓwana ɗàng. Yì ka, pàk ɗenyicau ama à nǝ̀ gauwa aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa.
MAT 1:20 Lang nda mur mǝnia yì ɗenyicau ka, mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo yi pusǝrǝi a baní a lòrǝo. Mǝturonjar banggi wi ama, <<Yisǝfu Mǝkà Dauda, ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakko arǝ twal Maryamu ɓǝ̀ duk māmó ɗàng. Acemǝnana muna mana a bumi ka pě mala Bangŋo Mǝfele na.
MAT 1:21 Yì ka, nǝ̀ ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura, sǝ awu nǝ tsǝki wi lullǝu ama Yesu, acemǝnana nǝ̀ yia amsǝ aɓwana male aɓalǝ acauɓikea malea ka.>>
MAT 1:22 Agir mǝnia kat ka à yì pa anggo ace mǝnana ɓǝà lùmsǝ cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo mana puro a kún mǝɓangnǝa male ama:
MAT 1:23 <<Nsari nǝ̀ kum muna-bum, nǝ̀ ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura, à nǝ̀ tunǝi ama Immanuyel,>> ɓālǝi ama, <<Ɓakuli nda atà sǝm.>>
MAT 1:24 Lang Yisǝfu loapi ntulo ka, pàk gìr mana mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo banggi wi ka; twal Maryamu ɓǝ̀ duk māmí.
MAT 1:25 Sǝ yì ka, pak ɓwama nǝi ɗang yi pur a gbáshí muna-ɓwabura male, pǝlǝa tsǝki muna lullǝu ama Yesu.
MAT 2:1 À ɓǝl Yesu a Betalami, a nzali Yahudi, a bàkú mǝnana Hirǝdus nda murǝm ngga. Tù anzǝm ɓǝl Yesu ka, amǝ'sǝlǝe amur anlero pur nǝ takuli sǝ à yiu a Urǝshalima,
MAT 2:2 à yì ɗiban ama, <<Murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi mǝnana à loa ɓǝle ka, nda ake? Sǝm sǝn nlero mala ɓǝle a takuli, nda sǝm yiua peri a baní ka.>>
MAT 2:3 Lang murǝm Hirǝdus ok mǝnia yì cau ka, ban ɓiki wi andǝ aɓwana kat a Urǝshalima mǝnana à ok ce ka.
MAT 2:4 Pǝlǝa tunǝ agbani pǝris andǝ amǝ'kànì Nggurcau rambia, sǝ ɗia cè ban mǝnana à nǝ̀ ɓǝl Kǝrǝsti kàm ngga.
MAT 2:5 Sǝ à ne wi ama, <<A Betalami a bu-nzali Yahudi. Mǝnia ka nda cau mǝnana mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli gilǝ ka:
MAT 2:6 << <We Betalami, a nzali Yahudi, a gatti pale ɗàng atà amurǝma mala nzali Yahudi. Acemǝnana a ɓālǝo sǝ murǝm nǝ̀ puro, mǝnana nǝ̀ yál aɓwana mem amǝ Isǝrayila ka.>>>
MAT 2:7 Hirǝdus pǝlǝa tunǝ amǝ'sǝlǝgir mǝnia ka aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa sǝ ɗia pepè pwari mana à sǝna nleroe nǝi ka.
MAT 2:8 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Wu kyane a Betalami wu kya alta ban munê ɓukɓuk, ɓǝ̀ wu kumǝni ka, wu nyare wu yi banggàm, mim gbal ka mǝ nǝ ká peri a baní.>>
MAT 2:9 Lang à ongŋǝna cau mala murǝm ngga, à pǝlǝa à bwal njar malea aban o. Sǝ à nda rǝ o ka, kara à sǝn nlero mǝnana à sǝni ɗiɗyal a takuli ka, puro akia wia dǝmba aban ká, sǝ yi came amur ban mǝnana munê pàk kàm ngga.
MAT 2:10 Banɓoaria wia kǝ̀rkǝ́r arǝ sǝn mǝnia yì nlero ka.
MAT 2:11 À nǝ̀ kutio a ɓala ka, à sǝn muna andǝ ngge Maryamu, sǝ à ɓunno a ɓadǝmbi, à peri. Pǝlǝa à panzǝki agǝna malea sǝ à pè wi aɓoro mala bolo-njengǝlan, andǝ myang-kwarra andǝ mǝr.
MAT 2:12 Ɓakuli nunkiria a lòrǝo ama ɓǝà kǝa nyare a ban Hirǝdus ɗàng. Pǝlǝa à twal ɓè njargula ɗàng à nyare a nzali malea.
MAT 2:13 Lang amǝ'sǝlǝe amur anlero umna ka, mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo pusǝrǝi a ban Yisǝfu a lòrǝo sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Lo twal muna andǝ ngge wu ɓangŋa wu o a nzali Masar. Wu duk kano she ɓǝ̀n bangŋǝno ama wu nyar ka, acemǝnana Hirǝdus ka nda nǝ̀ nggá alta muna ama nǝ̀ wal-luí.>>
MAT 2:14 Sǝ Yisǝfu lo twal muna andǝ ngge àkǝ̀ bu dui sǝ à o a nzali Masar.
MAT 2:15 Akanó sǝ kya do bà lú mala Hirǝdus. Mǝnia ka yi lumsǝ cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo mana pur a kun mǝɓangnǝa male ama, <<Aɓa nzali Masar sǝ ǝn tunǝ munem.>>
MAT 2:16 Lang Hirǝdus yi sǝlǝ ama amǝno yì amǝ'sǝlǝgir ɓosǝkini ka, bumi lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Pǝlǝa tasǝ asoje a Betalami andǝ alá mana a nkanggari ka à wal-lú amuna-burana mǝkèke mǝnana kat pǝlǝa malea ɓari andǝ a mǝnana à bwal raka, kārǝí arǝ pwari mǝnana ongŋǝna cê nǝi a kun amǝ'sǝlǝgir ka.
MAT 2:17 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka sǝ cau mǝnana pur a kun Irimiya mǝɓangnǝa ka yi lumsǝo, mana ama:
MAT 2:18 <<À ok ɓuà mala ɓeɓwa a Rama, ɓuà keban andǝ bumkiɗikea mǝ'kǝ̀rkǝ́r nì. Rahila na kǝ ɓuà ace amuni ka. Ɓinǝ girikiban, acemǝnana à wukina kat.>>
MAT 2:19 A nzǝm lú mala Hirǝdus ka, mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo pusǝrǝi a ban Yisǝfu a lòrǝo a nzali Masar.
MAT 2:20 Mǝturonjar ne wi ama, <<Lo twal muna andǝ ngge, nyare a nzali Isǝrayila, ace mǝnana Hirǝdus andǝ aɓwana mana à alkiyita yilǝmi muna ka à wukina.>>
MAT 2:21 Pǝlǝa Yisǝfu lo twal muna andǝ ngge, sǝ à nyare a nzali Isǝrayila.
MAT 2:22 Sǝ lang Yisǝfu ok ama Arkilawus nda duk murǝm Yahudi a nzǝm lú mala tárrí Hirǝdus ka, ɓangciu pakki wi arǝ ká a Yahudi. Sǝ mǝturonjar nunkiri a lòrǝo ka, pǝlǝa o a buì mala amǝ Galili.
MAT 2:23 Nda à wario à kya do a ɓekǝ là mǝnana à tunǝki ama Nazarat ka. Mǝnia ka nda lùmsǝ cau mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mana ama, <<À nǝ̀ tunǝi ama ɓwa Nazarat.>>
MAT 3:1 Arǝ abákú mǝno ka, Yohana Mǝbatisǝma yiu kǝ hamnǝ cau aɓa pǝɗanban a njenza a bu-nzali Yahudi
MAT 3:2 kǝ na ama, <<Wu pwanzali wu pǝlǝ nzǝm wun arǝ acauɓikea ma'wun, ace mǝnana Domurǝm mala kùli gbashina.>>
MAT 3:3 Yohana Mǝbatisǝma ka nda ɓwa mǝnana Ishaya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli bang ce ama: <<Ɓè ɓwa kǝ hama nǝ giu mǝcandǝe aɓa pǝɗanban a njenza kǝ na ama, <Wu gilǝki tanjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo. Wu tamsǝ anjarkusǝu ace pǝrapǝra.> >>
MAT 3:4 Agir-nggūrǝu mala Yohana mana oasǝ ka à tea nǝ nyang kalakadambi. Nggur-ɓunu male ka nggú na. Girlina male ka doshi na andǝ nyi-pu.
MAT 3:5 Ɓwapǝndǝa pur aɓa nggea-là Urǝshalima, andǝ aɓea la a bu-nzali Yahudi kat, andǝ bareban mala Nggeasala Jodan kat, à o a baní.
MAT 3:6 À bang acauɓikea malea, sǝ pakkia wia batisǝma a Nggeasala Jodan.
