MAR 5:30 Anggo ka kara Yesu sǝlǝ ama rǝcandǝa purna arǝì. Pǝlǝ rǝì aban ɓwabundǝa, sǝ ɗiban ama, <<Yana je daura mem?>>
MAR 5:31 Alaggana male eari wi ama, <<A kǝ sǝn ɓwapǝndǝa mana kǝ nggikio ka, a nyare a ɗiban ama, <Yana jem le?> >>
MAR 5:32 Yesu lidǝmba nǝ sǝnban ɓwa mǝnana pak mǝnia yì gìr ka.
MAR 5:33 Ɓwama man sǝlǝna rǝ gir mǝnana kumi ka, puro yiu nǝ ɓangciu yi kpa a ɓadǝmbi, nǝ rǝɓǝla, bǝ́lì wi mǝsǝcau kat.
MAR 5:34 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Munem, gūliarǝu mô a rǝàm twalǝno ban rǝkwana. O aɓa rǝpwala. Tanni mò malǝna.>>
MAR 5:35 Kun Yesu malaká pwal ɗang, aɓea ɓwana mǝnana à pur nǝ ɓala mala Jarus, ɓwamǝgule mala ndakpapi ka, à nǝ̀ yia tusǝo. À yì ne wi ama, <<Munio pàngŋǝ̀nà lú, kǝa pe Malǝm tanni ɓà ɗang.>>
MAR 5:36 Yesu tsǝkia wia kir ce ɗàng, pǝlǝa ne ɓwamǝgule ndakpapi ama, <<Cala ɓangciu pakko ɗàng. Makɓalǝo a rǝàm.>>
MAR 5:37 Pǝlǝa Yesu tamsǝ ɓwabundǝa. Eari kǝɓwa ɓǝ̀ kya atè ɗàng, she Bitǝrus, andǝ Jemis sǝ Yohana, mǝ'eam Jemis.
MAR 5:38 Lang à bingŋǝna ɓala mala Jarus, yì ɓwamǝgule ndakpapi ka, Yesu kya kum ban ngga zurina kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ loàsǝ̀ban mala ɓwapǝndǝa aban ɓua andǝ makki'zwalo.
MAR 5:39 Yi kutio a ɓala, pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Mana pur arǝ wun sǝ wu kǝ ɓua, wu mesǝke ani watsak? Muna ka wu ɗàng, nda a ntulo!>>
MAR 5:40 Kara à oali nǝ oalo. Yesu pǝlǝa pǝria pusǝia a nza kat, sǝ tunǝ tár muna andǝ ngge, andǝ alaggana male mǝnana atè ka, à kutio aɓa ndà aban mǝnana muna nong kam ngga.
MAR 5:41 Kya bwali a garabui sǝ ne wi ama, <<Talita kum!>> Ɓālǝi ama, <<Muna-ɓwama, lo!>>
MAR 5:42 Kara mǝnia yì muna-ɓwama, mǝnana apǝlǝa male na lum-nong-ɓari ka, lo sǝ tita gya! Ko yan ngga ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
MAR 5:43 Yesu tsǝkia wia nzongcau mǝcandǝe ama ɓǝà kǝa ne kǝɓwa ce ɗang. Pǝlǝa banggia wia ɓǝa pe muna-ɓwame girlina ɓǝ̀ li.
MAR 6:1 Yesu pǝlǝa nying mǝno yì bu-nzali ka, nyare andǝ alaggana male a Nazarat, la male.
MAR 6:2 A pwari Sabbat mǝnana kar ka, yì pwari usǝlǝo mala amǝ Yahudi, Yesu tita kanigir aɓa ndakpapi. Aɓwana mǝnana kat à oe ka, à ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, pǝlǝa à ɗiban ama, <<Ake sǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka kum mǝnia yì sǝlǝe andǝ rǝcandǝa mala pakkia ulang amǝnia yì agir-ndali ka?
MAR 6:3 Kafinta man na mbak? Yì nda muna mala Maryamu mbo, sǝ amǝ'eambi Jemis, Yisǝfu, Yahuda andǝ Shiman, andǝ amǝ'eambi amuna mamǝna pa kani aban sǝm re?>> Kara bumia kiɗiki arǝì, à ginǝ earnǝi.
MAR 6:4 Yesu pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ka, à kǝ pe wi gulo a koya ban ngga, she àkǝ̀ la male, aɓalǝ aɓwana male, a nggearǝ kǝ amǝ ɓala male.>>
MAR 6:5 Ace ɗwanyi earnǝban malea arǝì ka gandǝ pakkia kǝ túró mǝgulke ɗang, kǝ amǝkwánó shen à nda ka mǝnana tsǝkbu amúrià sǝ twalia wia ban rǝkwana ka.
MAR 6:6 Ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ ɗwanyi pa ɓamuru malea a baní. Pǝlǝa kutio arǝ amuna-là kǝ kanigir kam.
MAR 6:7 Yesu tunǝ alaggana male mana lum-nong-ɓari ka, tasǝia ɓari-ɓari, pea wia rǝcandǝa amur akukwar.
MAR 6:8 Kwarkiria ani: <<Wu kǝa twal kǝgìr ace gya ɗang, ko girlina, ko luru, ko boalo a lǝpan. Kǝ gara gya nda wu nǝ̀ twal ka.
MAR 6:9 Wu oasǝ ankura, wu kǝa twal daura ɓari ɗang.>>
MAR 6:10 Nyare banggia wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ya ɓala na wu kútí kam sǝ à ak wun ngga, wu do a ɓalae she pwari mǝnana wun nǝ̀ nying le ka.
MAR 6:11 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ wu wari àkǝ̀ ban sǝ à ɓinǝ ak wun ko à ginǝ cau ma'wun ngga, wu kǝtǝriki tú mǝnana a kusǝ wun ngga, ɓǝ̀ wun nǝ̀ nying banì ka. Ɓǝ̀ dupia wia gir'lǝmdǝa ama, bu wun pa aɓa ɓashi mǝnana nǝ̀ yiu amúrià ka ɗàng!>>
MAR 6:12 Pǝlǝa alaggane puro, à kǝ hambi aɓwana ama ɓǝa pwanzali ɓǝa ɗeki buia arǝ acauɓikea malea.
MAR 6:13 À pusǝki akukwar arǝ aɓwana pas, à hasǝ mùrú amur amǝ rǝkwana pas, sǝ à twalia wia ban arǝkwana.
MAR 6:14 Murǝm Hirǝdus Antipas ok ce amǝnia yì agir ka, acemǝnana lullǝ Yesu akiban. Aɓea aɓwana kǝ na ama, <<Yohana Mǝbatisǝma na loapi ɓembe ka! Nda gìr nî sǝ kum mǝnia yì rǝcandǝa pakki agir-ndali ka.>>
MAR 6:15 Aɓea aɓwana ama, <<Iliya na.>> Sǝ aɓea aɓwana ka à bang ama, <<Ɓè kǝ mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ulang amǝnana a pwarian ngga nda.>>
MAR 6:16 Lang Hirǝdus ok ce ka, na ama, <<Yohana Mǝbatisǝma mǝnana ǝn kasǝ meali ka, nda loapi ɓembe ka!>>
MAR 6:17 Hirǝdus nǝ nggearǝì ka tasǝna aɓwana à kya bwalǝna Yohana, à oasǝni a ndàkurban. Pak mǝnia ka ace Hirǝdiya, mala mǝ'eambi Filip, mǝnana yì, yì Hirǝdus ali atè ka.
MAR 6:18 Nda acemǝnana Yohana Mǝbatisǝma ka, camarǝ ne Hirǝdus ama, <<Nggurcau ear ama wu dum nǝ mala mǝ'eambo ɗang!>>
MAR 6:19 Nda gìr nî sǝ Hirǝdiya bwal Yohana a bumi, kǝ earce wal-luí ka, sǝ ɓǝ̀ pà nǝ́ eare mala Hirǝdus raka, pà nǝ̀ gandǝ pakki wi kǝgìr ɗang.
MAR 6:20 Hirǝdus ka, kǝ ɓanggi Yohana; sǝ acemǝnana sǝlǝna ama Yohana ka ɓwa mǝɓoarne na, ɗǝm ngga ɓwa mala Ɓakuli na ka, kǝ yállí, eare ama kǝgìr je ɗang. A koya pwari sǝ ɓǝ̀ Yohana bangcau andǝ Hirǝdus ka, ban kǝ ɓiki Hirǝdus kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Sǝ kat andǝ amani ka, kǝ earce kwakikiri arǝ Yohana.
MAR 6:21 A masǝlǝate ka Hirǝdiya kum dǝmbǝu, a pwari pakkiɗire ɓǝlban mala Hirǝdus. À lamgi agirlina, à turkiban arǝ amǝtè, andǝ akasǝla, andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mǝnana a bu-nzali Galili ka.
MAR 6:22 Muna-ɓwama mala Hirǝdiya puro aɓa tūli sǝ ta'nggwam nǝ ta ana, ban ɓoari Hirǝdus andǝ abǝri mǝnana tunǝia li ka. Gandǝa Murǝm banggi muna-ɓwama ama, <<Zǝm ko mana gir nî kat a earki ce ka, mǝ nǝ po wi.>>
MAR 6:23 Murǝm pe wi cau ama, <<Gìr mǝnana kat a zǝmbam ngga, ko ɓǝ̀ mǝ nǝ gau nzali domurǝm mem a ɓalǝu ka, mǝ nǝ po wi.>>
MAR 6:24 Kara muna-ɓwama man nyare aban ngge, ɗì ama, <<Mana ado mǝ nǝ zǝm le?>> Ngge ne wi ama, <<Ne wi ama ɓǝa po ɓamur Yohana Mǝbatisǝma.>>
MAR 6:25 Kara nyare a kaurǝa aban murǝm sǝ ne wi ama, <<Ən nggǝ earce nǝma wu pam ɓamur Yohana Mǝbatisǝma aɓa tasau àkǝ̀ dyadyan!>>
MAR 6:26 Ɓabum murǝm kiɗiki kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ ace kána mǝnana kána a ɓamǝsǝ abǝri male ka, gandǝ ginǝì wi ɗàng.
MAR 6:27 Àkǝ̀ banì sǝ murǝm tasǝ mǝwalki alú, ne wi ama ɓǝ̀ kyane a ndàkurban, ɓǝ̀ kasǝ ɓamur Yohana sǝ ɓǝ̀ yinǝi. Ɓwabure pǝlǝa wario kya kasǝ ɓamur Yohana a ndàkurban
MAR 6:28 sǝ yinǝi aɓa tasau yi pe muna-ɓwame. Yì gbal ka kutio kya pe nggè.
MAR 6:29 Lang alaggana mala Yohana ok ce ka, à wario à kya twal lui à yì tsǝì a ɓembe.
MAR 6:30 Amǝ'mishan mala Yesu nyàrî túró hama sǝ à yiu a baní, à naki wi ce agir mǝnana kat à pakki ka andǝ agir mǝnana à kànì ka.
MAR 6:31 Yesu pǝlǝa na ama, <<Wu fani sǝm nǝ̀ sunyi aban mǝnana kǝɓwa pà kàm raka, wu kya usǝlǝo.>> Bang anggo acemǝnana ɓwapǝndǝa pas camarǝ yiu sǝ à kǝ o, ko à kum njar à lili ɗang.
MAR 6:32 Nda à eauwe a waru aban ká aban mǝnana kǝɓwa pà kàm raka, yia na nǝmurǝia.
MAR 6:33 Ɓwapǝndǝa pas mǝnana à sǝnia aban o ka, à súrǝ̀ia, pǝlǝa à ɓangŋa a kun nggeamùr aban ká. Ɓwapǝndǝa puro à koya la ka nǝ kusǝia, à kya kasǝ múrià.
MAR 6:34 Lang Yesu nǝ̀ eapi waru ka, sǝn làkkì mala ɓwapǝndǝa, mǝsǝswatǝr malea bwali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, acemǝnana à nda kǝla anzur mǝnana yalgir pa ateà raka. Pǝlǝa tita kania wia agir pas.
MAR 6:35 Anggo ka pwari na arǝ ká kpa, alaggana male yiu a baní à yì ne wi ama, <<Ban mǝnia ka kǝɓwa pà kàm ɗang, ɗǝm ngga pwari kpana.
MAR 6:36 Ɓoaro male ka, ɗeki aɓwana ɓǝa o arǝ amuna-là aban mǝnana à nǝ̀ kum girlina kam ngga.>>
MAR 6:37 Sǝ Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wu pea wia ɓe kǝgìr ɓǝa li.>> À ɗì ama, <<Sǝm nǝ̀ kum ake? Sǝm nǝ̀ nggá pak túró boalo mala zongŋo tongno-nong-tàrú sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ kur girlina mǝnana nǝ̀ karǝ amǝnia yia aɓwana ka le?>>
MAR 6:38 Pǝlǝa Yesu ɗia ama, <<Bǝredi na shen a bu wun? Wu kyane wu sǝnban.>> À kya sǝnban sǝ à yì ne wi ama, <<Sǝm ndanǝ bǝredi tongno nǝ nji ɓari.>>
MAR 6:39 Yesu pǝlǝa nea wia ama ɓǝa tsǝk aɓwana kat ɓǝa do mbop-mbop amur bondo mǝpwale.
MAR 6:40 Pǝlǝa à do mbop-mbop. Aɓea aɓwana ka à do gbǝman-gbǝman, sǝ aɓea ka, à do lumi tongno-tongno.
MAR 6:41 Pǝlǝa Yesu twal agbatali bǝredi mǝnia tongno andǝ anji ɓari ka a buì. Loasǝ mǝsǝì a kùli, pak hiwi amúrià. Pǝlǝa ɓwanggi agbatali bǝredi, pe alaggana male ɓǝa gakkia aɓwana. Ɗǝm ngga ɓwanggi anji mǝnia ɓari ka pea wia, ace mǝnana koyan ngga ɓǝ̀ kùmô.
MAR 6:42 Ɓwapǝndǝa man kat ka à lìli à ɗǝmbǝo.
MAR 6:43 Alaggana ram cili ɓwangine bǝredi andǝ nji mǝnana ue ka, à lùmsǝ azace lum nong-ɓari.
MAR 6:44 Aburana nǝmurǝia mǝnana à lìli ka, ɓwa á-tongno na.
MAR 6:45 Tù anzǝm mǝno ka, Yesu tsǝk alaggana male ama ɓǝà eauwe a waru, ɓǝà aki dǝmba ɓǝà o a Beseda, sǝ yì ka, kúndǝô nǝ̀ ne aɓwabundǝa ɓǝà o a la.
MAR 6:46 Anzǝm mǝnana tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà aɓwana a ndà ka, pǝlǝa eauwe o a pak hiwi amur nkono.
MAR 6:47 Lang ban bwalǝna ka, alaggana male ka à nda aɓa waru aɓa gauwa mala nggeamùr, sǝ Yesu ka nda nǝmurǝì a nza.
MAR 6:48 Sǝn alaggana male ka à nǝ̀ nggǝ tanniki nǝ samsǝa kǝ̀rkǝ́r arǝ gung andǝ eaki-nkono mala mùr, acemǝnana gung soea. Nǝ du anzǝm ɓaria ɓua mala nggu ka, Yesu yi gbashi bania, kǝ gya amur mùr. Yi pa kǝla nǝ̀ kutia.
MAR 6:49 À nǝ̀ sǝni aban gya amur nggeamùr ka, à twali ama kukwar na. À mak'zwalo bàng-bàng,
MAR 6:50 acemǝnana yia kat ka à sǝni, sǝ ǝn'ò pakkia wia kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Anggo ka, Yesu sà'arǝia ama, <<Wu candǝ mǝsǝ wun! Mǝ nda. Ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakka wun ɗang!>>
MAR 6:51 Pǝlǝa yiu eauwe ateà a waru, gung nyare kur kǝs-kǝs. Yia ka à ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, nǝ gya male amur mùr,
MAR 6:52 sǝ ɗǝm ngga, acemǝnana yia ka à bwalta ɓá gir'ndali mala linǝ́ aɓwana á-tongno nǝ bǝredi ka ɗang, ɗenyicau malea shilina, à gandǝ é ɗang.
MAR 6:53 Lang à eauna ka, à kya kpashi nǝ bu-nzali Jenasaret, à kùr waru akanó a kunto.
MAR 6:54 Lang à nǝ̀ eapi waru ani ka, ɓwapǝndǝa kara sǝlǝ ama Yesu na.
MAR 6:55 Pǝlǝa à purkio nǝ mire, à pwan amǝkwánó amur aleso, à warinǝia aban mǝnana à ok gǝshì kam ngga.
MAR 6:56 Koya ban Yesu kar kam ngga: aɓalǝ amuna-là, andǝ alamǝgule, andǝ anzǝm alá ka, à nongsǝ amǝ rǝkwana a kun alimo. À zǝmbi wi ama ko ɓǝ̀ kun daura male na ka, à nǝ̀ je; sǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à je ka, à kum sonzǝban.
MAR 7:1 A ɓè pwari ka aɓea amǝ Farisi andǝ aɓea malǝm Nggurcau mala Musa mǝnana à pur nǝ Urǝshalima ka, à yì ram rǝia a ban Yesu.
MAR 7:2 À sǝn aɓea alaggana mala Yesu ka, à kǝ lili nǝ abu mǝ pǝndǝke. Lǝmdǝ ama à lak abuia ɗàng.
MAR 7:3 (Amǝ Farisi andǝ acili amǝ Yahudi kat ɓǝ̀ à nǝ̀ lìli ka, she à nǝ̀ lákkí abuia kǝla mǝnana kúncau kànì ka; à bwal kúncau mǝnana à kumô a bu akeâ ka.
MAR 7:4 Ɓǝ̀ à nyàrî limo ka, à pà nǝ̀ li kǝgìr ɗàng, she ɓǝà lákkína a rǝia nǝ mùr ka. À kǝ kpata aɓea akúncau kàm pas, kǝla pàkkiagir mala lákkí akwar, andǝ ankwaring, andǝ ankenye bolo, andǝ abuno-banli.)
MAR 7:5 Nda amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa ɗì Yesu ama, <<Palang sǝ alaggana mô ka à kǝ kpata kúncau mana aká sǝm nyingga sǝm ngga ɗàng? À kǝ lili nǝ abu mǝ pǝndǝke.>>
MAR 7:6 Pǝlǝa Yesu earia wia ama: Wun amǝ'kúnɓárína, ɓangnǝa mala Ishaya amur wun ngga, mǝsǝcau na, yi mǝnana gilǝa ama: <<Amǝnia yì aɓwana ka à kǝ pam gulo nǝ mburkunia, sǝ ɓabumia ka, nda kuko nǝ mim.
MAR 7:7 À kǝ peri a banam aɓa nyir, akanìgìr malea ka, anggurcau mala ɓwapǝndǝa na!>>
MAR 7:8 Wu fa ka anzongcau mala Ɓakuli wu sukkia, sǝ wu karǝ akúncau mala ɓwapǝndǝa wu bwalia kàngkàng.
MAR 7:9 Nyare nea wia ama: Wu twali ama wu ndanǝ kutan mǝnana wu ginǝki anzongcau mala Ɓakuli, ace mǝnana wun nǝ̀ bwal a ma'wun akúncau ka!
MAR 7:10 Musa ka bangga wun mbo ama, <<Pè tárró andǝ nggo gulo,>> sǝ ɗǝm ngga bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa sanggi tárrí ko sanggi nggè ka, ɓǝà wal-luí>> re?
MAR 7:11 Sǝ wun ngga, wu na ama ɓǝ̀ ɓwa ndanǝ ɓe kǝgìr mǝnana nǝ̀ pe tárrí ko nggè ace bwalia wia kàm, sǝ ginǝ pea wia, bang ama, <<Mǝnia ka ǝn pani Ɓakuli>> ka, ɓiki ɗang.
MAR 7:12 Mǝno ka wu ndarǝ ne ɓwe ɓǝ̀ kǝa ɗenyi nǝ tárrí ko nggè nǝ gir mǝnana à ɗwanyi ka ɗàng.
MAR 7:13 Anggo sǝ kanigir mǝnana wu ak a bu aká wun sǝ wu kǝ pea aɓwana ka, kǝ twal bancame mala cau mala Ɓakuli, kǝ nyesǝi ɓà. Aɓea gir nda kam pas kǝla amǝno mǝnana wu kǝ pea ka.
MAR 7:14 Yesu nyare tunǝ ɓwabundǝa a bani tù ɓǝà okcau. Nea wia ama, <<Wu kwaki kir wun kat wu o, sǝ wu ɓariki wu bwalta tǝr mǝnia yì cau ka.
MAR 7:15 Gìr mǝnana nǝ nza sǝ kǝ kutio a bum ɓwa ka, nda mǝnana kǝ pǝndǝki ɓwe a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli ka ɗàng; gìr mǝnana kǝ puro a ɓabum ɓwa ka, nda mǝnana nǝ̀ pǝndǝki ɓwa ka.
MAR 7:16 (Ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝ kiru okban ngga, ɓǝ̀ o.>>)
MAR 7:17 Anzǝm mana Yesu nyìngŋǝ̀nà ɓwapǝndǝa sǝ kutina a ɓala ka, alaggana male yiu a bani à yì ɗî ɓá mǝnia yì kanicau ka.
MAR 7:18 Pǝlǝa Yesu ɗia ama, <<Wun gbal ka ɓamur wun dǝmbǝri le? Wu sǝlǝ mbo ama girlina mǝnana nǝ nza sǝ ɓwa li sǝ kutio arǝì ka, pà nǝ̀ gandǝ tsǝi nǝ̀ pǝndǝki ɗang?
MAR 7:19 Girlina ka kǝ kutio a ɓabum ɓwa ɗàng; aɓa munalungye a bumi sǝ kǝ kutio sǝ nǝ̀ nggá pur a nza.>> (Mǝnia yì cau Yesu ne ka, lǝmdǝ ama koya girlina ka mǝɓoarnsari na a ban Ɓakuli.)
MAR 7:20 Lidǝmba na ama: Gìr mǝnana kǝ pur nǝ ɓabum ɓwa ka, nda gìr mǝnana pǝndǝkiyi ɓwa ka.
MAR 7:21 Acemǝnana nda nǝ ɓalǝu, a ɓabum ɓwa, sǝ aɗenyicau mǝɓane kǝ puro, kìɗìkì mala nongginǝban, ǝn'í, walki alú, panzǝzana,
MAR 7:22 nzumon, bwal ɓwa a bum, swarkiban, shamgir mala ɓwa, twal lullǝu, gusǝlǝ-múrû andǝ ɓwaɓana.
MAR 7:23 Amǝnia yì agir mǝɓane kat ka, à kǝ pur aɓa ɗenyicau mala ɓwa; à nda ka gir mǝnana à kǝ pǝndǝki ɓwa ka.
MAR 7:24 Yesu nying bu-nzali Galili, o a bu-nzali Taya andǝ Sidon. Kutio a ɓè ɓala, sǝ eare ama ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa ɓǝ̀ sǝlǝ ce ɗàng; kat andǝ amani ka, aɓwana sǝlǝa.
MAR 7:25 Sau ɗang, ɓè ɓwama nda kam mǝnana muni muna-ɓwama ka ndanǝ kukwar mǝɓike a ɓa'nyami ka, ok ce Yesu, kara yiu yi kpa a ɓadǝmbi.
MAR 7:26 Ɓwame ka ɓwa Yahudi na ɗang, ɓwa Gǝrik na, à ɓǝli a bàrèban Fonishiya aɓa bu-nzali Suriya. Yi zǝmbi Yesu ɓǝ̀ pusǝ kukwar mǝnana arǝ muni ka.
MAR 7:27 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ amuna, amǝɓala mem, amǝ Yahudi, ɓǝà li ɓǝà ɗǝmbo peatu. Acemǝnana ɓoaro ɓǝà twal girlina mala amuna ɓǝà túrì anvwa, aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka ɗàng.>>
MAR 7:28 Pǝlǝa ɓwame ne Yesu ama, <<Mǝna ka mǝsǝcau na, Ɓwamǝgule, sǝama ko a ban li ka anvwa kǝ kumô à kǝ li ɓwangine mala girlina mala amuna mǝnana kǝ sukkio a nzali ka.>>
MAR 7:29 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ace cau mò mǝno a bangŋi ka, kyane, kukwar purni rǝ munio!>>
MAR 7:30 Pǝlǝa ɓwame nyare a ɓala kya kum muni aban nongŋo ɗǝong aɓa kala, kukwar purni ɓa'nyami.
MAR 7:31 Yesu pǝlǝa nying bu-nzali Taya, ara a Sidon, kya puro a kún nggeamùr Galili, aɓa bu-nzali Dekapolis.
MAR 7:32 Aɓea aɓwana yinǝi wi nǝ ɓeɓwa mǝnana mǝkir'ara na sǝ mǝtalasǝ-ɓunna na. À zǝmbi wi ɓǝ̀ tsǝk bu amur ɓwe ɓǝ̀ sonzǝi.
MAR 7:33 Yesu pusǝ ɓwe zak à purî ɓalǝ aɓwabundǝa, sǝ oasǝ amunabuì aɓa kir ɓwabure, pǝlǝa tau ntāra arǝ amunabuì sǝ tsǝki ɓwe a lasǝi.
MAR 7:34 Yesu pǝlǝa loasǝ mǝsǝì a kùli, tusǝ ɓālǝi nǝ mǝsǝswatǝr, sǝ na ama, <<Efata!>> Tǝri ama, <<Mǝnnǎ!>>
MAR 7:35 Kara akir ɓwabure mǝnnǎ, sǝ tita okban. Talasǝi panzǝa, kǝ nacau pepe.
MAR 7:36 Yesu pǝlǝa ne ɓwabundǝa ama ɓǝà kǝa ne kǝɓwa ce ɗàng. Kǝla à tsǝkta aɓwana nǝ tsǝa, ama ɓǝà ar cê, à kutio aban bang cè.
MAR 7:37 Gìr nî pea wia ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, à camarǝ ɓǝsǝlǝki ce ama, <<Koya gìr mana kǝ pè ka mǝɓoarne na!>> À nyare à na ama, <<Nggearǝ amǝ kir'ara ka kǝ tsǝia à kǝ okban, sǝ amǝ talasǝɓunna ka, pea wia nacau!>>
MAR 8:1 Aɓalǝ amǝno yia apwari ka, ɓwabundǝa yi ram kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Girlina pa kàm à nǝ̀ li ɗang. Yesu pǝlǝa tunǝ alaggana male sǝ nea wia ama,
MAR 8:2 <<Mǝsǝswatǝr mala ɓwapǝndǝa man bwalam kǝ̀rkǝ́r. À ndakani atàm nongŋo tàrú yalung, sǝ ko kǝgìr pà kàm à nǝ̀ li ɗang.
MAR 8:3 Ɓǝ̀ ǝn tasǝtea ama ɓǝa o nǝ nzala ka, mǝsǝpǝndǝa nǝ̀ mea a njargula, acemǝnana aɓea aɓwana ateà ka a puro aban sauwa.>>
MAR 8:4 Alaggana male pǝlǝi wi ama, <<A ya ban a ɓabondo man sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ kum girlina mana nǝ̀ linǝ́ ɓwapǝndǝa man ngga?>>
MAR 8:5 Yesu ɗia ama, <<Agbatali bǝredi shen a bu wun ɗe?>> À eare ama, <<Tongno-nong-ɓari.>>
MAR 8:6 Nda Yesu ne ɓwabundǝa ama ɓǝa dum nǝ do a nzali. Sǝ twal agbatali bǝredi mana tongno-nong-ɓari ka, oaso pakki Ɓakuli yàwá, sǝ ɓwanggia. Pea alaggana male ɓǝa gaki aɓwabundǝa, sǝ à gaki gbal.
MAR 8:7 À ndanǝ amǝ nji a buia bǝti. Yesu pǝlǝa pak yàwá amúrià gbal, sǝ banggia wia ama ɓǝa gaki aɓwana.
MAR 8:8 Ɓwapǝndǝa lili, à ɗǝmbǝo. Anzǝm man ngga, alaggana male tàrki cili aɓwangina girlina mǝnana à ueo ka, à lùmsǝ azace mǝgulke tongno-nong-ɓari.
MAR 8:9 Aburana kǝla á-ine à nda aɓalǝ aɓwabundǝa aban nì. Pǝlǝa Yesu ne ɓwabundǝa ama ɓǝa mǝsǝe, ɓǝà o a là.
MAR 8:10 Lang tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà aɓwana a ndà ka, yi eauwe a waru andǝ alaggana male, pǝlǝa à nyare a bu-nzali mala ban mǝnana à tunǝki ama Dalmanuta ka.
MAR 8:11 Lang amǝ Farisi ongŋǝna ama Yesu yina ka, à yiu à yì tita makgìr andǝi. À nǝ̀ kārǝki ka, à ɗì ama ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝia wia gir'lǝmdǝa nǝ ban Ɓakuli, mǝnana nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ rǝcandǝa male ka.
MAR 8:12 Pǝlǝa Yesu tusǝ ɓālǝi kpǝm aɓa bangŋo male, sǝ na ama, <<Palang sǝ aɓwana mǝnana a nza man kǝ earce sǝn gir'lǝmdǝa mǝ'pa ndali? Ən nggǝ na wun mǝsǝcau, pa mǝ nǝ pe aɓwana mǝnana a nza man kǝ gir'lǝmdǝa ɗang.>>
MAR 8:13 Pǝlǝa ɗekia, eauwe a waru, nyare a kusǝì o a ɓè nkaring nggeamùr.
MAR 8:14 Alaggana ka ɓalǝia lorǝo à yiu nǝ girlina abuia ɗang, kǝ gbatali bǝredi mwashat na à ndanǝi aɓa waru ka.
MAR 8:15 Lang à ndarǝ o aɓa waru ka, Yesu nun kiria ama, <<Wu parkir wun arǝ yis mala amǝ Farisi andǝ mala Hirǝdus.>>
MAR 8:16 À tita naki ce arǝarǝia ama bang anggo acemǝnana à yinǝ bǝredi a buia raka.
MAR 8:17 Yesu sǝlǝna rǝ cau mǝnana à nakiyi ka, pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Palang sǝ wu kǝ naki acau arǝarǝ wun ama wu twal bǝredi a bu wun ɗang? Nggearǝ wun ngga, wu kǝ gandǝ súrǝ̀ gir ko wu bwalta gìr mbo? Ɓabum wun na più aɓa candǝe, kǝ gandǝ twal cau ɗang?
MAR 8:18 Amǝsǝ wun andǝ akir wun girki le? Ɓalǝ wun kasǝ arǝ kǝ cau re?
MAR 8:19 Mǝnana ǝn linǝ́ aɓwana á-tongno nǝ agbatali bǝredi tongno ka, cili mǝnana ueo, wu tàrki ka, wu pwano arǝ azace shen ɗe?>> À ear ama, <<Lum nong-ɓari.>>
MAR 8:20 Yesu nyare ɗia ama, <<Sǝ mǝnana ɗǝm ǝn linǝ́ aɓwana á-ine nǝ agbatali bǝredi tongno-nong-ɓari ka, cili mǝnana ueo, wu tàrki ka, wu pwan arǝ azace shen?>> À eare ama, <<Tongno-nong-ɓari.>>
MAR 8:21 Pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Ado ka wu súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana ǝn banggi cau amurí ka re?>>
MAR 8:22 À yì bik Beseda. Aɓea aɓwana yiu nǝ ɓe nte. À yì zǝmbi Yesu ama ɓǝ̀ tsǝk buì arǝì, ɓǝ̀ mǝnbi wi mǝsǝì.
MAR 8:23 Yesu bwal nte a garabui pusǝì anzǝm la. Pǝlǝa tappî ntāra a mǝsǝì sǝ tsǝk buì a murí, sǝ ɗì ama, <<A kǝ sǝn kǝgìr ado le?>>
MAR 8:24 Pǝlǝa nte man loasǝ múrí a kùli, na ama, <<E, ǝn nggǝ sǝn aɓwana, sǝ ǝn nggǝ sǝnia pepe ɗang. À nda kǝla anggun mǝnana à kǝ ging ngga.>>
MAR 8:25 Yesu nyare tsǝk abui a mǝsǝ nte mǝno ɗǝm, kara amǝsǝì mǝn gamama, kǝ sǝnban gǝraɗau.
MAR 8:26 Yesu tasǝ te ama ɓǝ̀ o a la, ne wi ama, <<Ce a kar nǝ ɓá mǝnia yì muna-là ka ɗàng, ɓǝ̀ awu nǝ o ka.>>
MAR 8:27 Yesu lo andǝ alaggana male à nying bu-nzali Galili, à o arǝ amuna-là tù nǝ ban nggea-là Kaisariya Filipi. Amur njar ka, Yesu ɗia ama <<Aɓwana kǝ bang ama mǝ nda yana?>>
MAR 8:28 À eari wi ama, <<Aɓea ɓwana kǝ na ama, a nda Yohana Mǝbatisǝma, aɓea ɓwana ka ama, a nda Iliya, sǝ aɓea ɓwana ka ama a nda ɓekǝ mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli.>>
MAR 8:29 Pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Sǝ wun ngga, wu na ama mǝ nda yana?>> Bitǝrus eare ama, <<A nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban.>>
MAR 8:30 Yesu nunkiria ama ɓǝa kǝa ne kǝɓwa cau amurí ɗang.
MAR 8:31 Pǝlǝa tita banggia wia gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ kumi ka. Na ama, <<Muna mala Ɓwa ka nǝ̀ nu tanni ɗàngɗáng. Aɓwana-mǝgule andǝ agbani pǝris, andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa nǝ̀ ɓinǝ mǝsǝì, à nǝ̀ wal-luí. Sǝ a tàruià nongŋo ka, nǝ̀ lo nǝ yilǝmu.>>
MAR 8:32 Banggia wia mǝnia yì cau ka bwāng. Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus tunǝi a nkanggariban, gimbi arǝ cau mǝnana ne ka.
MAR 8:33 Yesu pǝlǝ rǝi sǝn alaggana male, pǝlǝa sà arǝ Bitǝrus ama, <<Gǝshi banam, we Shetan! Ɗenyicau mo ka mala Ɓakuli na ɗang, mala ɓwapǝndǝa na!>>
MAR 8:34 Pǝlǝa tunǝ ɓwabundǝa, andǝ alaggana male, nea wia ama: Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa twal ama nǝ̀ duk mǝkpatam ngga, dumǝna púp ɓwe nǝ̀ nying kpata agir mala ɓamúrì. Ɓwe nǝ̀ twal takusǝam aɓa gandǝrǝu mala nutanni andǝ lú ulang mem amur nggun-gangndǝi, sǝ nǝ̀ yiu atàm arǝ aban mǝnana kat mǝ nǝ ká akàm ngga.
MAR 8:35 Acemǝnana ɓwa mana kǝ earce amsǝ yilǝmi ka, nǝ̀ ɗwanyibanì, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana turta yilǝmi acem andǝ ce Cau Amsǝban ngga, nǝ̀ kumi.
MAR 8:36 Mana nǝ̀ purî ɓwa yì mǝnana ɓǝ̀ kum girbunda mala ɓanza kat, sǝ turta yilǝmi ka?
MAR 8:37 Mana gir nì na ɓwa na nǝi nǝ̀ pe Ɓakuli ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka?
MAR 8:38 Ɓwa mǝnana kat kǝsǝkya kǝ pakki wi arǝàm sǝ arǝ cau mem aɓa mǝnia yì ɓanza mǝ ɗwanyi do nǝ mǝsǝcau aban Ɓakuli, andǝ mǝnana lùmsǝ nǝ cauɓikea ka, mim Muna mala Ɓwa ka, kǝsǝkya nǝ̀ pàkkam gbal arǝì a pwari mǝnana mǝ nǝ nyar nǝi aɓa ɓoarɓwa mala Tárrám, andǝ amǝturonjar mǝfele male ka.
MAR 9:1 Yesu lidǝmba nǝ nacau ama: Ɓafo, ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, aɓalǝ wun mǝnia wu cam ngga, aɓea aɓwana nakam mǝnana à pà nǝ̀ wu raka, she ɓǝa sǝna Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli yina nǝ rǝcandǝa ka.
MAR 9:2 Anzǝm nongŋo tongno-nong-mwashat ka, Yesu tunǝ Bitǝrus, sǝ Jemis, sǝ Yohana. Pǝlǝa um nǝia amur nkono mǝ'dāhre, nǝmurǝia. Akanó ka rǝ Yesu twalo nggaɗi àkǝ̀ ɓamǝsǝia.
MAR 9:3 Anggubyau rǝì pwasǝ tyal-tyal mǝnana kǝɓwa pà kàm a ɓanza mǝnia ka nǝ̀ gandǝ lak gìr nǝ̀ fa anggo raka.
MAR 9:4 Kara Iliya, andǝ Musa, à pusǝrǝia à kǝ nacau nǝ Yesu.
MAR 9:5 Bitǝrus ne Yesu ama, <<Malǝm, yàwá, mǝnana ado sǝm ndakani ka. Sǝm nǝ̀ kar gumli tàrú, mwashat ka nda aceo, mwashat ka nda ace Musa, sǝ man mwashat ka nda ace Iliya.>>
MAR 9:6 Yì andǝ aɓi ka ɓangciu bwalia kǝ̀rkǝ́r, yàle súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana nakiyi cau amurí ka ɗang.
MAR 9:7 Pǝlǝa pǝrɓang puro yi gir múrià. Gi Ɓakuli pur nǝ ɓá pǝrɓang ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda Munem mǝnana ǝn earkiyi ace raka. Wu oki wi.>>
MAR 9:8 À nǝ̀ loasǝ mǝsǝia ka, ko à sǝn kǝɓwa ɗang, kǝ Yesu na nǝmurǝì.
MAR 9:9 À nda aban sùlǝî mur nkono ka, Yesu nunkiria nea wia ama, <<Wu kǝa ne kǝɓwa ce gìr mǝnana wu sǝn ngga ɗang, she ɓǝ̀ Muna mala Ɓwa longŋǝni ɓembe ka.>>
MAR 9:10 Pǝlǝa à bwal ce gbal àkǝ̀ rǝarǝia, à kutio amur naki acau amur, <<Loapi ɓembe ka ɓālǝi nda mana?>>
MAR 9:11 Pǝlǝa à ɗì Yesu ama, <<Palang sǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa bang ama, Iliya nǝ̀ aki Kǝrǝsti dǝmba yiu?>>
MAR 9:12 Yesu earia wia ama, <<E, Iliya nǝ̀ yiu a dǝmba, nǝ̀ yia gilǝki agir kat ɓǝà duk pepè. Sǝ Malǝmce ka, na gbal mbo ama, Muna mala Ɓwa ka nǝ̀ tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r sǝ à nǝ̀ ɓinǝi?
MAR 9:13 Sǝa ma ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, Iliya angŋǝna dǝmba yina, sǝ à pangŋǝni koya gìr mǝnana yia ka à earce ka, kǝla mǝnana à gilǝì amurí ka.>>
MAR 9:14 Lang à nyarǝna aban acili alaggana ka, à sǝn ɓwapǝndǝa kǝ̀rkǝ́r rambǝa a rǝia, sǝ aɓea amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa na aban makgìr andǝia.
MAR 9:15 Lang ɓwabundǝa nǝ̀ sǝn Yesu ka, à ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ à swár a mire à yì makki wi kun.
MAR 9:16 Yesu ɗì ka laggana male ama, <<Mana gir ni wu makkiyigìr wunǝia amurí?>>
MAR 9:17 Ɓè ɓwa aɓa ɓwabundǝa kasǝa ama, <<Malǝm, ǝn yiu nǝ munem a bano ace mǝnana wu twali ban rǝkwana ka. Ndanǝ kukwar arǝì, mǝnana kǝ eari wi nacau raka.
MAR 9:18 Ɓǝ̀ loarǝi ka, nǝ̀ me a nzali, ntāra nǝ̀ gupi a kúni, nǝ̀ nggǝ go minǝì, sǝ nǝ̀ shiuri kwanggong. Nda ǝn ne alaggana mo nǝma ɓǝa pusǝì sǝ à gandǝi ɗang.>>
MAR 9:19 Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wun amǝ ɗwanyi earnǝ Ɓakuli! Banem nǝ̀ sau lang atà wun sǝ wu nǝ̀ kani earnǝ cau? Banem nǝ̀ sau lang aban twal gandǝa nǝ wun? Wu yinǝàm nǝ munê!>>
MAR 9:20 À pǝlǝa à yiu nǝ muna. Lang kukwar nǝ̀ sǝn Yesu ka, kara kàr muna dǝkǝrǝki kǝ̀rkǝ́r, túrí a nzali. Muna camarǝ ɗǝnggǝliki, ntāra kǝ gupi a kúni.
MAR 9:21 Yesu ɗì tár muna ama, <<Aya pwari sǝ mǝnia yì gìr ka tikì tè?>> Pǝlǝa eare ama, <<Tikì tè a muntulo.
MAR 9:22 A ɓè pwari ka kǝ me a bǝsa ko a mùr, ama nǝ̀ wal-luí. Sǝa ma ɓǝ̀ a nǝ gandǝi ka, sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr ma'sǝm, bwala sǝm nggam!>>
MAR 9:23 Yesu ɗì ama, <<Ace mana sǝ a na ama, <ɓǝ̀ a nǝ gandǝi ka?> Ko man ngga nǝ̀ gandǝ pa a ban ɓwa mǝnana earnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli nǝ ɓabumi kat ka.>>
MAR 9:24 Tár muna ear nǝ rǝɓǝla ama, <<Ən earǝna ǝn pana ɓamúràm, bwalàm nggàm ɓǝ̀ ǝn limurǝm amur ɗwanyi paɓamuru mem!>>
MAR 9:25 Lang Yesu sǝn ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ nggǝ kana aban yiu ka, kara sà arǝ kukwar ama, <<We kukwar mala kir ara andǝ mala talasǝɓunna, ǝn nggǝ banggo nǝma, purrì rǝì, cea nyare a kútí kam ɗǝm ɗàng!>>
MAR 9:26 Kukwar mak'zwalo, pūrǝki muna wak, sǝ purî nyami. Muna nong kpoklyak, kǝla wu nǝ wú, gandǝa aɓea aɓwana bang ama, <<Wuna!>>
MAR 9:27 Yesu bwali a garabui, loasǝi amur akusǝi, pǝlǝa lo came.
MAR 9:28 Anzǝm mana Yesu nyarǝna a ɓala ka, alaggana male ɗiì a sǝmbǝrǝa, ama, <<Palang sǝ sǝm gandǝ pusǝ mǝno yì kukwar ka ɗàng?>>
MAR 9:29 Yesu nea wia ama, <<Ulang mǝnia yì kukwar ka, kǝ hiwi andǝ gilmùr nda nǝ̀ pusǝì ka.>>
MAR 9:30 À ɗeki ban mǝno à ara aɓa bu-nzali Galili. Yesu ear ama ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana à ndakam ngga ɗàng,
MAR 9:31 acemǝnana nda aban kani alaggana male gìr. Nea wia ama, <<Muna mala Ɓwa ka, à nǝ̀ kurakuro nǝi a ban aɓwana. À nǝ̀ wal-luí, sǝ a tàruià nongŋo ka nǝ̀ lo nǝ yilǝmu.>>
MAR 9:32 Sǝ ko à bwalta gìr mǝnana banggiyi ka ɗàng, sǝ ɓangciu pakkia wia ɓǝà ɗì amurí.
MAR 9:33 Pǝlǝa à yiu a Kapanahum. Yi dumǝna a ɓala ka, Yesu ɗì ka laggana male ama, <<Mana wu makkiyigìr amurí a tanjar aban yiu?>>
MAR 9:34 Pǝlǝa à do kunia ɗǝong, acemǝnana a njargula ka, à makgìr amur ko yana aɓalǝia nda ɓwamǝgule kat.
MAR 9:35 Lang Yesu dumǝna nǝ do ka, pǝlǝa tunǝ alaggana male lum nong-ɓari, nea wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa earce duk mǝdǝmba ka, dumǝna púp ɓwe nǝ̀ duk mǝ'nzǝ́mò, sǝ nǝ̀ duk guro mala aɓi kat.>>
MAR 9:36 Pǝlǝa loasǝ muna mǝkyauwe tamsǝi a ɓadǝmbia. Núnní a nkanggari rǝi, sǝ nea wia ama,
MAR 9:37 <<Ɓwa mǝnana ak muna kǝla mǝnia aɓa lullǝam ngga, Mǝ nda akiyiam ngga. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana em ngga, Mǝ nda akiyiam nǝmurǝam ngga ɗàng, nda ban ak Tárrám mǝnana tasǝam ngga.>>
MAR 9:38 Yohana ne wi ama, <<Malǝm, sǝm sǝn ɓè ɓwabura aban pusǝki akukwar aɓa lùllǝò, sǝ sǝm pǝrki, acemǝnana yì ka, pa aɓalǝ sǝm ɗang.>>
MAR 9:39 Yesu ne wi ama: Ce wu pǝrki ɗàng. Kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ pak gìr'ndali aɓa lullǝam, sǝ nyar tù nǝ̀ bang mǝɓane a muram ɗàng.
MAR 9:40 Ɓwa mǝnana kat ɓinǝ ce sǝm raka, nda atà sǝm.
MAR 9:41 Ɓafo ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, ɓǝ̀ koyana sǝ pà wun mùr-nùná aɓa lullǝam, acemǝnana wu nda ka mala Kǝrǝsti ka, pà nǝ̀ ɗwanyi tangnakusǝi ɗàng.
MAR 9:42 Ɓǝ̀ koyana sǝ tsǝk mwashat aɓalǝ amuna mǝnana à earnǝ mim, sǝ pàk cauɓikea ka, nǝ̀ ɓoaribani ɓǝà ɗurri wi nggea taligo a meali, sǝ ɓǝà túrí aɓa nggeamùr.
MAR 9:43 Ace mani ka, ɓǝ̀ buo kǝ cio a kǝ pak cauɓikea ka, kasǝi kpat. Nǝ̀ ɓoaribani wu kutio a yilǝmu mana málá male pà kàm raka nǝ bu mwashat, amur mana a nǝ dum nǝ abuo ɓari sǝ à nǝ̀ túrǒ aɓa lú-bǝsa, aban mǝnana bǝsa male kǝ limgi raka.
MAR 9:45 Ɓǝ̀ kusǝo nda kǝ cio a kǝ pak cauɓikea ka, kasǝi kpat. Nǝ̀ ɓoaribani wu kutio a yilǝmu mana málá male pà kàm raka nǝ kusǝu-kasǝa, amur mana a nǝ dum nǝ akusǝu ɓari sǝ à nǝ̀ túrǒ aɓa lú-bǝsa ka.
MAR 9:47 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝsǝo nda kǝ cio a kǝ pak cauɓikea, pusǝì túrí! Nǝ̀ ɓoaribani wu kutio a domurǝm mala Ɓakuli nǝ mǝsǝu mwashat, amur mana a nǝ dum nǝ amǝsǝu ɓari sǝ à nǝ̀ túrǒ aɓa lú-bǝsa ka.
MAR 9:48 Akanó ka <<nggwaso mana nǝ̀ nggǝ lia ka, pà nǝ̀ wu ɗàng, sǝ bǝsa mana nǝ̀ nggǝ pisǝkia ka, pà nǝ̀ limgi ɗang.>>
MAR 9:49 Koyan ngga nǝ bǝsa sǝ à nǝ̀ tsǝì nǝ̀ ɓoarnsari.
MAR 9:50 Tuɓamur ka ɓoaro, sǝ ɓǝ̀ cyauwe male purrínì wi ka, nǝ mana sǝ à nǝ̀ tsǝì nǝ̀ cyàu ɗǝm? Wu dum nǝ ɓealu kǝla tuɓamur arǝarǝ wun, wu dum nǝ dorǝpwala arǝarǝ wun.
MAR 10:1 Yesu ɗeki Kapanahum, wari a bu-nzali Yahudi, a nkaring Mùr Jodan. Ɓwabunda yi ram ɗǝm a bani à kàrì aɓalǝu, pǝlǝa kania wia gìr kǝla mǝnana pàkkiyi ka.
MAR 10:2 Aɓea amǝ Farisi yiu à yì kārǝki nǝ ɗiban ama, <<Nggurcau eare ama ɓǝ̀ ɓwa ɓǝ̀ pǝr māmí le?>>
MAR 10:3 Yesu pǝlǝa earia wia nǝ ɗiban ama, <<Mana ɗe Musa bang aɓa nggurcau amur gau-doɓala?>>
MAR 10:4 À nyesǝi wi ama, <<Musa eare ama, ɓǝ̀ ɓwa ɓǝ̀ gilǝî ɓwama takada gau doɓala, sǝ ɓǝ̀ tasǝ takwari ɓǝ̀ o.>>
MAR 10:5 Yesu nea wia ama, <<Nda ace murcandǝa ma'wun sǝ Musa gilǝa wun mǝnia yì nggurcau ka.
MAR 10:6 Sǝ mǝno ka nda njar mala Ɓakuli ɗang. A tita pusǝ ɓanza ka, <Ɓakuli pusǝ ɓwapǝndǝa, ɓwabura andǝ ɓwama,> kǝla mana Malǝmce na ka.
MAR 10:7 <Ace mani ka, ɓwabura nǝ̀ nying tárrí andǝ ngge, nǝ̀ yia lanzǝa arǝ māmí.
MAR 10:8 Yia ɓari ka à dumǝna nggūrǝu mǝ'mwashati.> À pa ɗǝm ɓari ɗàng, à nda mwashat.
MAR 10:9 Ace mani ka, gìr mǝnana Ɓakuli kpapi ka, ɓwa ɓǝ̀ kǝa gauwi ɗàng.>>
MAR 10:10 Lang à nyarǝna a ɓala ka, alaggana mala Yesu ɗì amur mǝnia yì cau ka.
MAR 10:11 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ koyana sǝ pǝr māmí sǝ al ɓe ɓwama ka, nda rǝ pakki ɓwama mǝdǝmbe cauɓikea mala nongnǝban a nza nǝ doɓala nǝ ɓaria ɓwama.
MAR 10:12 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɓwama nda gbal nying burí, sǝ kya al ɓe ɓwabura ka, nda rǝ pak cauɓikea mala nongnǝban a nza nǝ doɓala.>>
MAR 10:13 Aɓea ɓwana yiu nǝ amuna aban Yesu ɓǝ̀ tsǝkia bu, pǝlǝa alaggana male lo à sà a rǝia.
MAR 10:14 Lang Yesu nǝ̀ sǝn mǝnia yì gìr ka, bumi lúllô arǝ alaggana male. Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Wu ɗekia amuna ɓǝa yiu abanam, wu kǝa pǝria ɗang. Acemǝnana domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka, nda ace aɓwana mǝnana à nda kǝla amǝnia yia amuna ka.
MAR 10:15 Ən nggǝ bangga wun ɓafo, ɓwa mǝnana pà nǝ̀ ak domurǝm mala Ɓakuli kǝla muna mǝkyauwe raka, pà nǝ̀ kútí kam ɗàng.>>
MAR 10:16 Pǝlǝa twal amuna a kikili, sǝ tsǝk buì a ɓamur koyan ateà ka, sǝ tsǝkia wia bu.
MAR 10:17 Lang Yesu longŋǝna nǝ̀ o ka, ɓeɓwa ɓangŋa atè kya kū`ndǝó a ɓadǝmbi, sǝ zǝmbi wi ama, <<Malǝm mǝɓoarne, mana gir ni mǝ nǝ pa sǝ mǝ nǝ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka?>>
MAR 10:18 Yesu ɗì ama, <<Palang sǝ a tunǝam ama Malǝm mǝɓoarne? Kǝɓwa pà kàm mǝɓoarne na ɗang, kǝ Ɓakuli na nǝmurǝì ɓǝ̀rɓǝ̀r.
MAR 10:19 A súrǝ̀ anzongcau mǝnia ka: <Kǝa wal-lú ɗang, kǝa pak cauɓikea nongnǝban a nza nǝ doɓala ɗang, kǝa iun'í ɗang, kǝa na nyir ɗang, kǝa ɓǝmbǝriban ɗang, gusǝlǝ tárró andǝ nggo.> >>
MAR 10:20 Pǝlǝa ɓwabure na ama, <<Malǝm, yàle mǝ nda muna sǝ ǝn bwal amǝnia yì anzongcau ka.>>
MAR 10:21 Yesu sǝni sǝnban earcearǝu, pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Gìr mwashat sǝ a ɗwanyi, o, kya mak girkuma mo kat, sǝ wu gakì amǝ'tǝ̀r boale, awu nǝ kum gǝna a kùli. Sǝ wu yiu wu yi kpatam.>>
MAR 10:22 Lang nǝ̀ ok mǝnia yì cau ka, nun nggúr a dǝmbǝi. Pǝlǝ rǝì o nǝ ɓabumkiɗikea, acemǝnana yì ka, ndanǝ kume kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
MAR 10:23 Yesu pǝlǝ rǝì sǝnban, pǝlǝa ne alaggana male ama, <<Amǝkume ka, nǝ kwanbia wia sǝ à nǝ̀ kutio a domurǝm mala Ɓakuli!>>
MAR 10:24 Cau male pakki alaggana male ndali. Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wun amuna, kutio a domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka kwano na a gir nì ɗang fa!
MAR 10:25 Kutio mala mǝkume aɓa domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka kwano kútì kutio mala kalakadambi a tūli nlerǝman.>>
MAR 10:26 Alaggana ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r. À ɗiki rǝarǝia ama, <<Sǝ yana ado nǝ̀ au le?>>
MAR 10:27 Yesu sǝnia kyap-kyap, sǝ na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ mala ɓwapǝndǝa na ka, mǝ gandǝe pà kàm ɗang, sǝama pa anggo aban Ɓakuli ɗang. Aban Ɓakuli ka koman ngga nǝ̀ gandǝ pa.>>
MAR 10:28 Bitǝrus pǝlǝa kasǝi ama, <<Sǝni, sǝm ɗekina koyagir ka, sǝm yiu a kpato!>>
MAR 10:29 Yesu pǝlǝi wi ama, <<Ɓafo na, ǝn nggǝ na wun ngga, ɓǝ̀ ɓwa ɗeki ɓala, ko amǝ'eambi amuna-burana, andǝ amuna-mamǝna, ko nggè ko tárrí, ko amuna, ko aɓaban acem andǝ ce hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban ngga,
MAR 10:30 nǝ̀ kum tangnakusǝi. A ɓanza mǝnia ka, nǝ̀ kum aɓala, amǝ'eambu aburana andǝ amamǝna, anggeau, amuna, andǝ aɓaban; amǝnana làkkì malea nǝ̀ ká kusǝ gbǝman mala amǝnana ɗekia ka. Nǝ̀ kumia atārǝia andǝ nutanni gbal. Sǝ a ɓanza mǝnana kǝ yiu ka nǝ̀ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka.
MAR 10:31 Aɓwana pas mǝnana à nda tyang-tyang ado ka, à nǝ̀ nggá būrǝcea, sǝ amǝnana à būrǝcea ado ka, à nǝ̀ nggá duk tyang-tyang.>>
MAR 10:32 À nda aban o a Urǝshalima ka, Yesu ak dǝmba kǝ ká sǝ alaggana male na atè. Alaggana male ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ acili aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ yiu ateà ka ɓangciu pakkia wia, acemǝnana a Urǝshalima ka, aɓwana nda kam pas mǝnana à ɓinǝmǝsǝì ka. Pǝlǝa Yesu tunǝ alaggana male lum-nong-ɓari a giriban, sǝ banggia wia koyagir mǝnana nǝ̀ nggá kumi ka.
MAR 10:33 Nea wia ama, <<Sǝm ndya sǝm kǝ eauwe aban o a Urǝshalima ka. Muna mala Ɓwa ka à nǝ̀ nggá kúrnà kúró nǝi, a ban agbani pǝris andǝ amǝkani Nggurcau mala Musa. À nǝ̀ kasǝi wi ɓashi lú, sǝ à nǝ̀ tasǝi a bu aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka.
MAR 10:34 Yia ka à nǝ̀ oali, à nǝ̀ tapî ntāra arǝì, à nǝ̀ koè, sǝ à nǝ̀ wal-luí. Sǝa ma anzǝm anongŋo tàrú ka nǝ̀ lo nǝ yilǝmu.>>
MAR 10:35 À nǝ̀ nggǝ ká a njar ka, Jemis andǝ Yohana, amuna-burana mala Zabadi, à yiu a baní tù à yì ne wi ama, <<Malǝm, sǝm nggǝ earce ama wu pakka sǝm gìr mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ zǝmbo wu pak ka!>>
MAR 10:36 Yesu pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Mana wu earkiyice mǝ pakka wun?>>
MAR 10:37 À eari wi ama, <<Pwari mǝnana a nǝ do a buno-murǝm mǝɓoarɓwe mò ka, ɓǝ̀ mwashat atà sǝm ɓǝ̀ do a buo mǝlì, sǝ ɓeɓwa ɓǝ̀ do a buo mǝ'nggare aɓa ɓoarɓwa mò.>>
MAR 10:38 Yesu earia wia ama, <<Wu súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana wu zǝmgiyi ka ɗàng. Wun nǝ̀ gandǝ nu aɓa kwap mala tanni mǝnana málá mǝ nǝ nu kàm ngga, ko wun nǝ̀ gandǝ ak batisǝma mala walban lú kǝla mǝnana dumǝnam púp à nǝ̀ wal luem ngga le?>>
MAR 10:39 À pǝlǝa à eare ama, <<Sǝm nǝ̀ gandǝi.>> Yesu nea wia ama, <<Ɓafo na wun nǝ̀ nu aɓa kwap mǝnana dupǝnam púp mǝ nǝ nu kàm ngga, sǝ à nǝ̀ pakka wun batisǝma mǝnana dumǝnam púp à nǝ̀ pakkam ngga.
MAR 10:40 Sǝa ma, pa aɓa buam ɓǝ̀n tsǝk ɓwa ɓǝ̀ do atà buam mǝlì, ko a buam mǝ'nggare ka ɗàng. Ɓakuli gilǝki amǝno yì aban ngga ace aɓwana mǝnana tarkia ka.>>
MAR 10:41 Lang acilia alaggana mana lum nǝ̀ ok gìr mǝno Jemis andǝ Yohana alkite ka, bumia lúllô.
MAR 10:42 Pǝlǝa Yesu tunǝia à yì ramba, sǝ nea wia ama, <<Kǝla mana wu sǝlǝ ka, aɓwana mǝnana à súrǝ̀ia ama à nda ka murǝma, ko à nda ka ɓwana-mǝgule a ɓanza man ngga, à kǝ lǝmdǝ rǝcandǝa amur aɓwana mana à nda aɓatea ka.
MAR 10:43 Sǝa ma atà wun ngga, pà nǝ̀ pa anggo ɗàng. Ɓwa mǝnana kǝ earce nǝ̀ duk ɓwamǝgule atà wun ngga, dumǝna púp nǝ̀ duk rítǎu mala acilia.
MAR 10:44 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana earce ama nǝ̀ duk mǝ dǝmbaka, dumǝna púp nǝ̀ duk guro mala aɓi kat.
MAR 10:45 Ko nggearǝ Muna mala Ɓwa ka yiu ace mǝnana nǝ̀ do sǝ ɓǝ̀ aɓwana pakki wi túró ka ɗàng. Yì ka, yiu ace mǝnana nǝ̀ pakki aɓwana túró, sǝ ɓǝ̀ pà yilǝmi ace amsǝɓwabundǝa pas.>>
MAR 10:46 Yesu andǝ alaggana male yi bik Jeriko. Lang a nda aban purrì ɓá Jeriko ka, aɓwana pas kana ateà. Ɓè nte nda kam lùllǝì ama Bartimawus, muna mala Timawus, dumǝna a girǝi njargula aban zǝmgi agir.
MAR 10:47 Lang nǝ̀ ok ama Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat nda kǝ kútí ka, tita loasǝ gi kǝ na ama, <<Yesu, Mǝkà Dauda, sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr mem!>>
MAR 10:48 Aɓwana pas loarǝì, à pyau wi ɓǝ̀ pwalo. Kara nyare loasǝ gi kàm kpǝm ama, <<Mǝkà Dauda, sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr mem!>>
MAR 10:49 Lang Yesu oè ka, pǝlǝ rǝì sǝ came, na ama, <<Wu tunǝì ɓǝ̀ yiu.>> Pǝlǝa à tunǝì yì nte, à ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ banɓoaro, lo, nda kǝ tunǝo ka.>>
MAR 10:50 Kara túr gìrkùmsǝo male anggo, lo pǝrpǝr yiu a ban Yesu.
MAR 10:51 Yesu ɗì ama, <<Mana a earce ama mǝ pakko?>> Nte man pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Malǝm, ǝn nggǝ earce sǝnban!>>
MAR 10:52 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Kyane, gūliarǝu mo arǝ Ɓakuli twalǝno ban rǝkwana.>> Àkǝ̀ banì kara sǝnban, pǝlǝa kpata Yesu aban o a njargula.
MAR 11:1 Lang Yesu andǝ alaggana male mala à nǝ̀ bik Urǝshalima ka, à yì bwal ban alá Betafaji andǝ Betani, amur Nkono mala anggun Olif. Yesu tasǝ ɓari aɓalǝ alaggana male,
MAR 11:2 nea wia ama, <<Wu kyane a muna-là mǝnana a dǝm wun ngga. Wun nǝ̀ kútí kam ani ka, wun nǝ̀ kum mǝdambǝriso mǝnana kǝɓwa malaká eau a nzǝmi raka. Wu panzǝi wu yiu nǝi kani.
MAR 11:3 Ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa ɗì wun ama palang sǝ wu kǝ panzǝi le ka, wu ne wi ama, <Ɓwamǝgule ma'sǝm kǝ earce. Banì pà nǝ̀ sau ɗang nǝ̀ nyesǝi.> >>
MAR 11:4 Pǝlǝa alaggana mǝnia ɓari ka à wario à kya kum mǝdambǝriso à kùrni a kun ɓala a girǝi njargula.
MAR 11:5 À nda ban panzǝe ka, aɓea aɓwana mǝnana à ndakam aban came ka, à ɗiban ama, <<Mana wu pakkiyia, wu nda ban panzǝ mǝdambǝriso mǝna?>>
MAR 11:6 Pǝlǝa à nyesǝia wia cau kǝla mǝnana Yesu nea wia ka. Pǝlǝa à nyinggia wia mǝdambǝriso, à um nǝi.
MAR 11:7 Lang à yina nǝ mǝdambǝriso aban Yesu ka, à makki adaura malea a nzǝmi, pǝlǝa Yesu eauwe do amurí.
MAR 11:8 Aɓwana pas atà ɓwabundǝa sárǝ́ki adaura malea a tanjargula, sǝ aɓea ɓwana ka, malea ka ambú ka nggun nda à kasǝkya, à sarǝkia a tanjargula ka.
MAR 11:9 Aɓwana mǝnana a ɓadǝm Yesu andǝ aɓwana mǝnana a nzǝmi aban ká ka, à loasǝ già ama, <<Wu ɓwangsǝ Ɓakuli! Tsǝkbu ɓǝ do amur ɓwa mana kǝ yiu aɓa lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo ka!
MAR 11:10 Ɓǝ̀ tsǝkbu do amur domurǝm mana kǝ yiu, mala kà-sǝm Dauda ka! Ɓwangsǝban a ban Ɓakuli kano a kùli!>>
MAR 11:11 Anggo sǝ Yesu kutio aɓa Urǝshalima, pǝlǝa wari aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. Loasǝ mǝsǝì sǝn koman ngga, sǝ acemǝnana pwari kutina ka, pǝlǝ kusǝì puro, o a Betani andǝ alaggana male mana lum nong-ɓari ka.
MAR 11:12 Ban fa ka, à nying Betani à nyare a Urǝshalima. Yesu ka ok nzala.
MAR 11:13 Lang nǝ̀ sǝn nggun vwari a ɓadǝmbi nǝ ambuí ka, kyangye aban ká a baní ama yakǝla nǝ̀ kum ɓǝle kàm. Yiu ka yi kum kǝgìr ɗàng, kǝ mbuí na nǝmurǝì, acemǝnana kunɓǝla mala vwari malaká karǝ ɗang.
MAR 11:14 Pǝlǝa Yesu ne nggunî ama, <<Kǝ ɓwa pà nǝ̀ li ɓǝleo ɗǝm ɗàng!>> Alaggana male ok mǝnia yì cau ne ka.
MAR 11:15 Anzǝm mana Yesu andǝ alaggana male yi bwalǝna Urǝshalima ka, pǝlǝa kutio aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, kara tita pǝr aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kúrkúró andǝ makki agirkúró aɓa Ndàmǝgule ka. Ramgi ta atebǝl mala amǝ nggaɗi boalo andǝ abenci mala amǝ makki akutumurǝm.
MAR 11:16 Sǝ eare ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa kútí nǝ girkúró aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ɗang.
MAR 11:17 Pǝlǝa tita kania wia gìr. Nea wia ama, <<À gilǝ mbo a Malǝmce ama, <Ɓala mem ngga, à nǝ̀ tunǝi ama ɓala hiwi ace aɓwana arǝ anzali kat,> sǝ wu ngga, wu nyesǝi pǝlǝ npu mala amǝ'ɓǝmbǝriban!>>
MAR 11:18 Agbani pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa ok mǝnia yì cau ka. Pǝlǝa à tita alta njar mǝnana à nǝ̀ wal-luí nǝi ka. Sǝ yia ka, ɓangciu kǝ pakkia wia arǝì, acemǝnana ɓwapǝndǝa kat ka ndali nǝ kanigir male.
MAR 11:19 Lang pwari kpana ka, Yesu andǝ alaggana male purrì ɓá nggea-là.
MAR 11:20 Ban fana nǝ dǝmbari à nǝ̀ nggǝ kútí nǝ ban nggun vwari mǝnana Yesu suí ka, kara à sǝni ka imǝna, yi bwal a nlerǝe.
MAR 11:21 Ɓalǝ Bitǝrus kasǝa arǝ cau mǝnana Yesu banggi nggunî ka, pǝlǝa ne Yesu ama, <<Malǝm, sǝni! Nggun vwari mǝnana a suí ka imǝna!>>
MAR 11:22 Yesu ear ama, <<Wu pà ɓabum wun arǝ earnǝ Ɓakuli.
MAR 11:23 Ən nggǝ bangga wun mǝsǝcau, koyana sǝ ne nkono man ama, <Lo o, kya kpa aɓa nggeamùr> sǝ ɓǝ̀ earnǝi a yilǝmi, sǝ ɓabumi tuti amur cau mǝnana bang ngga raka, cau mǝnana bang ngga nǝ̀ yia pa.
MAR 11:24 Ace mani ka ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, ɓǝ̀ mana wu zǝmba aɓa hiwi ka, wu ear ama wu kumǝni. Anggo ka sǝ nǝ̀ duk ma'wun.
MAR 11:25 <<Ɓǝ̀ wu came aban pak hiwi, sǝ wu ndanǝ kǝgìr a bum wun arǝ kǝɓwa ka, wu twalbani, ace mǝnana Tár wun mǝnana a kùli ka ɓǝ̀ twala wun ban acauɓikea ma'wun.
MAR 11:26 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ wu twalbani raka, anggo sǝ Tár wun mǝnana a kùli ka, pà nǝ̀ twala wun ban acauɓikea ma'wun ɗàng.>>
MAR 11:27 Sǝ à nyare à yiu ɗǝm a Urǝshalima. Lang Yesu nda aban gya aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, agbani pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule yiu a baní.
MAR 11:28 À yì ɗì ama, <<Nǝ́ ya rǝcandǝa nani sǝ a kǝ pakki amǝnia yì agir ka, sǝ yana mǝnana po rǝcandǝa mala pakkia ka?>>
MAR 11:29 Yesu eari wia ama, <<Mǝ nǝ ɗì wun, ɗìban mwashat. Ɓǝ̀ wu bangŋǝ́nàm gìr mǝnana ǝn ɗî wun ngga, sǝ mǝ nǝ bangga wun rǝ ɓwa mǝnana pam mǝnia yì rǝcandǝa sǝ ǝn nggǝ pakki amǝnia yì agir ka.
MAR 11:30 Wu banggàm, batisǝma mala Yohana ka, pur nǝ kuli le ko nǝ ban ɓwapǝndǝa?>>
MAR 11:31 À pǝlǝki ce arǝarǝia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm bang ama, pur nǝ kuli ka, nǝ̀ ɗì sǝm mana tsǝa sǝ sǝm ginǝ earnǝ Yohana.
MAR 11:32 Sǝ pa sǝm nǝ̀ na gbal ama pur nǝ ban ɓwapǝndǝa ɗang.>> Ɓangciu pakkia wia arǝ bang anggo, acemǝnana koyan ngga twali ama Yohana ka mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mǝɓafoe na.
MAR 11:33 Pǝlǝa à nyesǝî Yesu cau ama, <<Sǝm súrǝì ɗàng.>> Yesu nea wia ama, <<Mim gbal ka pà mǝ nǝ na wun rǝ ɓwa mǝnana pam mǝnia yì rǝcandǝa ǝn nggǝ pakkina agir nǝi ka ɗàng.>>
MAR 12:1 Yesu tita kania wia gìr nǝ kanicau ama: Ɓè ɓwa tsǝk ɓaban nggun anap. Kàrì nǝ nkāndan, sǝ tǝm tūli aɓa tali ace kambǝ mur ɓǝlanggun anap. Ɓak ban mǝ'dāhre mǝnana à nǝ̀ nggǝ cam amurí aban yál ɓaban ngga. Pǝlǝa nyesǝ ɓaban nì pana haya nǝi a bu amǝ'rya, sǝ kutio o a bǝri a ɓe nzali.
MAR 12:2 Kunɓǝla mala anap karna ka, pǝlǝa tasǝ ɓe mǝtúró ɓala male aban amǝ'rya ɓǝa kya aki wi ɓǝla anap a ɓaban.
MAR 12:3 Sǝ amǝ'rya bwal mǝtúró ɓala man, à walki, sǝ a tasǝ takwari o nǝ ɓabui.
MAR 12:4 Nyare mǝtala ɓaban tasǝ ɓe mǝtúró ɓala abania. À yì wali à tsǝki wi penye a ɓamúrí, à pe wi kǝsǝkya kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
MAR 12:5 Nyar ɗǝm tù tasǝ ɓe mǝtúró ɓala. Mǝnia ka à yì wal-luí. Pǝlǝa tasǝ aɓea amǝtúró ɓala pas, aman ngga à kwea, acilia ka à wal-luia.
MAR 12:6 Kǝ ɓwa mwashat mǝnana ueo mǝtala ɓaban nǝ̀ túr ka, muna male mana earkiyi ace raka nda. Túrí a nggea tankwang kat, ne ɓamúrì ama, <<À nǝ̀ pè munem gulo.>>
MAR 12:7 Kara amǝ'rya ne a rǝia ama, <<Muna mala mǝtala ɓaban, mǝnana nǝ̀ liɓala ka nda man. Wu ɗeki ɓǝ̀ yiu, sǝm nǝ̀ yia wal-luí, sǝ mǝnia yì ɓaban ngga nǝ̀ duk ma'sǝm!>>
MAR 12:8 Pǝlǝa à bwali à wali wú, à twali à túrí anzǝm ɓaban.
MAR 12:9 Sǝ mana ado mǝtala ɓaban nǝ̀ pa? Nǝ̀ yiu nǝ̀ yia wal-lú ka amǝ'rya mǝno ka, sǝ nǝ̀ nyesǝ ɓaban nǝ̀ pea aɓea aɓwana.
MAR 12:10 Wun ngga wu ɓal mǝnia yì ban ngga mbo aɓa Malǝmce, mǝnana ama: <<Tali mǝnana amǝɓa ɓinǝi ka, nda ɗǝm yi bwal kusǝɓa kàngkàng ngga.
MAR 12:11 Mǝnia yì gìr ka Mǝtalabangŋo na pe ka, sǝ gìr ndali na aban sǝm?>>
MAR 12:12 Pǝlǝa aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi alta njargula mǝnana à nǝ̀ bwali nǝi ka, acemǝnana à sǝlǝna ama bang mǝnia yì kanicau ka a rǝia. Sǝa ma acemǝnana àkǝ̀ ɓanggi ɓwabundǝa ka, à ɗeki à pǝlǝ rǝia, à o.
MAR 12:13 Anzǝm man ngga, à tasǝî Yesu aɓea amǝ Farisi andǝ aɓwana mala Hirǝdus ace mǝnana ɓǝà bwali aɓa nacau male ka.
MAR 12:14 À yiu a baní à yì na ama, <<Malǝm, sǝm sǝlǝna ama we ka a kǝ came amur mǝsǝcau. Kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ púrǝǒ atà buì male ka ɗàng, acemǝnana ɓwapǝndǝa kat a bano ka à twalia à nda mwashat. A kǝ kani njargula mala Ɓakuli nǝ mǝsǝcau. Sǝm nggǝ earce wu bangga sǝm; nggurcau eare ama ɓǝ̀ sǝm mbwe boalo-cemi a ban Kaisar, yì murǝm mǝgule mala amǝ Roma le, ko pà a njarì ɗang?
MAR 12:15 Ɓǝ̀ sǝm mbwe le ko ɓǝ̀ sǝm ngga mbwe ɗàng?>> Yesu ka sǝlǝna kutan malea, pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Palang sǝ wu kǝ earce tambam? Wu yinǝàm nǝ mǝsǝboalo ma'wun mǝ sǝni!>>
MAR 12:16 À pǝlǝa à yinǝi wi nǝ mǝsǝboalo, sǝ ɗia ama, <<Foto ɓamǝsǝ yana mǝnia, sǝ parbu mala yana mana amurí ka?>> À eari wi ama, <<Mala Kaisar na.>>
MAR 12:17 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wu pe Kaisar gìr mǝnana mala Kaisar na ka, sǝ wu pe Ɓakuli gir mǝnana mala Ɓakuli na ka.>> Kara yia ka à ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ nyesǝcau male.
MAR 12:18 Pǝlǝa amǝ Saduki, mǝnana à bang ama loapi ɓembe pa kàm raka, à yiu a baní nǝ ɗiban.
MAR 12:19 À na ama, <<Malǝm, Musa gilǝa sǝm ama ɓǝ̀ mǝ'eam ɓwa wu sǝ ɗeki māmí amuna pa a buì raka, ɓwa mǝno ka dupi wi púp ɓǝ̀ twal mālá lú, ɓǝ̀ ɓǝli mǝ'eambi amuna.
MAR 12:20 Aɓea amǝ'eambu nakam tongno-nong-ɓari. Mǝdǝmbe al ɓwama, sǝ wu, ɗeki kǝ muna ɗang.
MAR 12:21 Ɓwa mǝnana kpa nzǝmi ka twal mālá lú, a do andǝ yi. Yì gbal ka yi wú, ɗeki kǝ muna ɗang. Anggo gbal nǝ tàruià.
MAR 12:22 Yi mal múrià kat, yia mǝnia tongno-nong-ɓari ka, ko kǝɓwa kum muna ɗang. A masǝlǝate ka ɓwame yi wu gbal.
MAR 12:23 Ado ka, à pwari mǝnana aɓwana nǝ̀ loapi ɓembe nǝi ka, ɓwame ka nǝ̀ duk mālá yana aɓalǝia, yi mǝnana yia kat à dum nǝi ka?>>
MAR 12:24 Yesu earia wia ama: Ɓwarkio ma'wun ngga nda mǝnana ama wu súrǝ̀ Malǝmce andǝ rǝcandǝa mala Ɓakuli ɗang.
MAR 12:25 A pwari lo mala alú a ɓembe ka, alban pà kàm ɗàng. Aɓwana nǝ̀ do kǝla amǝturonjar a kùli.
MAR 12:26 Sǝ amur cau mala lo mala alú ka, wu ɓal mbo aɓa malǝmce mala Musa, amur mǝ'nkwarki mǝnana kǝ earki bǝsa ka? Nda anzǝm mǝnana a Ibǝrayim andǝ Ishaku andǝ Yakupu wukina, sǝ apǝlǝkia pas yi kutikina ka, sǝ Ɓakuli yi bangcau nǝ Musa ama, <<Mǝ nda Ɓakuli mala Ibǝrayim, andǝ Ɓakuli mala Ishaku, andǝ Ɓakuli mala Yakupu.>>
MAR 12:27 Mǝnia ka lǝmdǝ ama yì ka, Ɓakuli mala alú na ɗang; mala aɓwana mǝnana nǝ yilǝmu ka nda. Wun ngga, wu ɓwarki kǝ̀rkǝ́r!
MAR 12:28 Ɓè malǝm Nggurcau mala Musa nda aban came a banì kǝ ok cau mǝno amǝ Saduki kǝ makgìr amurí andǝ Yesu ka. Lang sǝni Yesu nyesǝnia wia cau pepe ka, pǝlǝa ɗì Yesu ama, <<Aɓalǝ anzongcau kat ka, mǝyenani nda kútì aɓea kat?>>
MAR 12:29 Yesu eare ama, <<Mǝgule mǝnana kútìban kat ka nda mǝnia ka: <Wu kwaki kir wun, wun amǝ Isǝrayila, Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli ma'sǝm ngga, nda mwashat.
MAR 12:30 Earce Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli mo nǝ ɓabumo kat, andǝ yilǝmo kat, andǝ ɗenyicau mo kat, andǝ rǝcandǝa mo kat.>
MAR 12:31 Ɓaria nda mǝnia: <Earce ɓio mǝ'murkala kǝla mǝnana a earce ɓamuro ka.> Kǝ ɓè nzongcau pà kàm kútì amǝnia ka ɗàng.>>
MAR 12:32 Malǝm Nggurcau mala Musa eari Yesu ama, <<Kǝ ndo a bangŋi ka, Malǝm! A ɓwarki ɗang, yi mana a na ama, Ɓakuli ka nda mwashat, kǝ ɓe pà kàm ɗang. Kǝ Yì na nǝmurǝì.
MAR 12:33 Ɓǝ̀ ǝn earce nǝ ɓabumam kat, nǝ sǝlǝe mem kat, nǝ rǝcandǝa mem kat, sǝ ɓǝ̀ ǝn earce ɓiam mǝ'murkala kǝla mǝnana ǝn earce ɓamúràm ngga. Mǝnia ka kǝ pwasǝbum Ɓakuli kútì apagir mala pisǝe kǝring andǝ pāki agir'nkila kat.>>
MAR 12:34 Lang Yesu sǝni ɓwabure nyesǝna cau aɓa sǝlǝe ka, pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<We ka, a pa kuko nǝ ban domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ɗang.>> Anzǝm mǝno ka, kǝɓwa nyare ɗì ɓekǝ cau ɗang.
MAR 12:35 Lang Yesu na aban kanigir a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, ɗiban ama, <<Palang sǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa kǝ bang ama Kǝrǝsti ka muna mala Daudana?
MAR 12:36 Dauda nǝ nggearǝì ka, nacau aɓa Bangŋo Mǝfele ama: <<Mǝtalabangŋo ne Mǝtalem ama, <Do a buno gulo, atà buam mǝlì she ɓǝ̀ ǝn nyesǝna aɓio-mǝbura a ɓakusǝo ka.>
MAR 12:37 Yi mǝnana Dauda nǝ ɓamúrì tunǝ Kǝrǝsti ama, <Mǝtalem> ngga, lang sǝ Kǝrǝsti nǝ̀ duk muni?>> Ɓwabunda kwaki kiria arǝì nǝ banɓoarnado.
MAR 12:38 Yesu aɓa kanigir male ka, nea wia ama: Wu parkir wun arǝ amǝkani Nggurcau mala Musa! Acemǝnana yia ka, à earce gya aɓalǝ anggea daura aban ak makkun aɓa limo.
MAR 12:39 Yia ka, à kǝ earce ban-do mǝɓoarne aɓalǝ andakpapi andǝ aban-pakkiɗire.
MAR 12:40 Yia nda à kǝ ɓǝmbǝri amā-lú arǝ agirkuma malea, sǝ à nǝ̀ ɓosǝki aɓwana nǝ pakki ahiwi mǝsauwe mala lǝmdǝ ɓamuria ama yia ka amǝ fele na. Ace mǝno ka ɓashi malea nǝ̀ gul kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
MAR 12:41 Yesu na aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, do nǝ ban mana à kǝ turki boalo kam ngga. Mǝsǝì ueo arǝ ɓwapǝndǝa mǝnana kǝ turki boalo aɓa kwar ak boalo ka. Amǝkume pas turki aboalo kpǝm.
MAR 12:42 Ɓè mǝ'tǝ̀r mā-lú yiu yi tsǝk anini ɓari, mǝnana bwalta kwapo mwashat raka.
MAR 12:43 Yesu tunǝ alaggana male a baní, sǝ nea wia ama, <<Ən nggǝ na wun ɓafo, mǝnia yì mā-lú mǝ'tǝ̀r man ngga, nda túr gìr mana kútìban kat aɓa kwar ak boalo ka.
MAR 12:44 Acemǝnana acili aɓwana kat ka, à tù nǝ tú aɓa kume malea, sǝ yì ka, kǝgìr mana ueo nǝ̀ linali nǝi ka, nda yi túrí kat ka.>>
MAR 13:1 Lang Yesu na aban purrì ɓá Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, ɓeɓwa atà alaggana male ne wi ama, <<Malǝm, sǝn sǝlǝcame andǝ gulo mala ɓah mǝnia! Sǝn ɓoarjam mala anggea tali mǝnana à ɓe nǝi ka!>>
MAR 13:2 Yesu ear ama, <<Wu sǝn aɓah mǝgulke mǝnia ka re? À nǝ̀ yia arkia kat à nǝ̀ sukkia a nzali. Kǝ ɓe tali pà kàm mǝnana nǝ̀ nongŋo amur ɓi ka ɗang!>>
MAR 13:3 Nǝ nzǝ́mò , lang Yesu dumǝna amur Nkono Olif, mǝnana ɓangŋaban na gau nrea andǝ Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, Bitǝrus, andǝ Jemis, andǝ Yohana, sǝ Andǝru, à yiu a baní nǝmurǝì sǝ à ɗì cau.
MAR 13:4 À na ama, <<Bangga sǝm, aya pwari sǝ amǝnia yì agir ka à nǝ̀ pa? Sǝ mana nda gir'lǝmdǝa ama amǝnia yia agir kat ka à malá à nǝ̀ lùmsǝo?>>
MAR 13:5 Yesu nea wia ama: Wu tsǝkir wun ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa ɓǝ̀ kǝa ɓosǝki wun ɗàng.
MAR 13:6 Aɓwana pas nǝ̀ yiu à nǝ̀ nggǝ bang ama, <<Mǝ nda Kǝrǝsti.>> À nǝ̀ pak túró nǝ lullǝam à nǝ̀ ɓosǝki aɓwana pas.
MAR 13:7 Ɓǝ̀ wu ok ce a'lwa ko na'ongŋale amur cau mala a'lwa ka, ɓǝ̀ ɓalǝ wun ɓǝ̀ kǝa kasǝki ɗang. Amǝnia yì agir ka dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ pa, sǝ masǝlǝata ɓanza ka nda peatu, nǝ̀ yiu.
MAR 13:8 Ɓè kun nǝ̀ lo nǝ lwa arǝ ɓe kun, sǝ nzalimurǝm nǝ̀ lo nǝ lwa arǝ ɓe nzalimurǝm. Dǝurǝo mala nzali nǝ̀ pa arǝ aban ɗàngɗáng aɓa ɓanza, sǝ nzala gbal ka nǝ̀ kpa. Sǝa ma, amǝnia ka tita gìr'mur'mwana na peatu.
MAR 13:9 Wu do nǝ yál ɓamur rǝ wun! À nǝ̀ oasǝki mur wun aban amǝ ɓashi, à nǝ̀ kwak wun arǝ andakpapi. Sǝ acemǝnana wu nda ka amǝ kpatam ngga, à nǝ̀ kánǝ wun a ɓashi a ɓadǝmba anggwamna andǝ amurǝma. Aɓa mǝno anggo ka wun nǝ̀ kùmô wun nǝ̀ duk amǝ'nakunam abania.
MAR 13:10 Sǝ Cau Amsǝban ngga, nda gìr mana dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ hamnǝi atadǝmbe arǝ anzali kat ka.
MAR 13:11 Sǝ ɓǝà bwal wun, à warinǝ wun aɓa ɓashi ka, ɓǝ̀ ɓalǝ wun ɓǝ̀ kǝa akdǝmba kasǝkya arǝ cau mǝnana wun nǝ̀ na ka ɗàng. Kǝ cau mǝnana à nǝ̀ pa wun a ɓabum wun àkǝ̀ banì ka, nda wun nǝ̀ na ka. Acemǝnana wun nda wun nǝ̀ na ce ka ɗàng, Bangŋo Mǝfele na.
MAR 13:12 Mǝ'eambǝu nǝ̀ pà mǝ'eambi ɓǝa wal-luí. Tárrú nǝ̀ pà muni. Amuna nǝ̀ lo arǝ atárrià andǝ anggea à nǝ̀ tsǝa ɓǝà wal-luia mak.
MAR 13:13 Ɓwapǝndǝa kat nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ wun acemǝnana wu nda ka amǝ kpatam ngga, sǝ ɓwa mana shak minǝì kàngkàng, aɓa gūlì arǝàm aban ká a masǝlǝate ka, ɓwe nǝ̀ àwá.
MAR 13:14 A pwari mǝno ka ɓǝ̀ wu sǝna <<yì gìr mɓeami mǝnana nǝ̀ yiu nǝ pǝndǝkea mala Ndàperi, sǝ nǝ̀ tsǝa aɓwana nǝ̀ ginǝki kutio kam,>>yi kutina camǝna aban mǝfele, ban mana ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ came abanì raka, mǝ ɓalgìr ka ɓǝ̀ sǝlǝa! Aɓwana mana à do a nzali Yahudi ka, ɓǝà ɓangŋa ɓǝà o amur ankono.
MAR 13:15 Ɓwa mǝnana amur kurǝm male ka, ɓǝ̀ sulǝ ka, ɓǝ̀ kǝa na ama nǝ̀ kútí a ɓala nǝ̀ twal kǝgìr sǝ nǝ̀ ɓang ɗàng.
MAR 13:16 Ɓwa mǝnana nda a ɓabondo ka, ɓǝ̀ kǝa nyare ama nǝ̀ twal nggea-daura male ɗàng.
MAR 13:17 Caukwanban na, aɓalǝ anonggio mǝno, nǝ amamǝna mana nǝ amuna a bumia andǝ amǝnana nǝ amuna a kun kiura ka!
MAR 13:18 Wu pak hiwi ama amǝnia yia agir ka ɓǝà kǝa pak nǝ kún mbulo ɗang.
MAR 13:19 Acemǝnana amǝno yia anongge ka, a mala tanni na kǝ̀rkǝ́r, mǝnana ulangni pà kàm àkǝ̀ bàkú raka, twalo a shareta ɓanza mǝnana Ɓakuli pusǝna ɓanza ka, yi bwal ado mǝno ka, sǝ à pà nǝ̀ kum ulangni gbal a dǝmba ɗàng.
MAR 13:20 Ɓǝ̀ Mǝtalabangŋo kasǝ ma acilia nonggeo mǝno raka, kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ au ɗàng. Sǝ ace aɓwana male mǝnana tarkia nǝ nggearǝì ka, amsǝna acili anongge.
MAR 13:21 Aɓalǝ amǝno yia apwari ka, ɓǝ̀ ɓwa bangga wun ama, <<Wu sǝni, Kǝrǝsti ndya ka!>> Ko, <<Wu sǝni, ndako ka!>> Wu kǝa ear ɗang.
MAR 13:22 Acemǝnana akǝrǝsti mǝ'nyirnì andǝ amǝ'ɓangnǝa mǝ'nyirnì à nǝ̀ purkio, à nǝ̀ pakki agir-lǝmdǝa andǝ agir-ndǝlǝki ɗàngɗáng, ace ɓosǝki aɓwana mǝnana Ɓakuli tarkia ka, ɓǝ̀ à nǝ̀ gandǝi ka.
MAR 13:23 Ace mani ka, wu tsǝkir wun, ǝn angŋa dǝmba ǝn bangŋǝna wun kaniama ɓǝà pa.
MAR 13:24 Aɓalǝ amǝno yia anonggio anzǝm nggea tanni ka, À nǝ̀ kongsǝ pwari aɓa pǝndǝa. Sǝ zongŋo ka pà nǝ̀ ta ɗàng.
MAR 13:25 Anlero nǝ̀ pur a kùli à nǝ̀ sukkio. Agir mǝgulke mǝnana a kùli ka, à nǝ̀ dǝurǝkya.
MAR 13:26 A nzǝm mǝno ka sǝ ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ sǝn Muna mala Ɓwa aban yiu aɓalǝ apǝrɓang nǝ rǝcandǝa mǝgule andǝ ɓoarɓwa.
MAR 13:27 Sǝ nǝ̀ tasǝ amǝturonjar male ɓǝà yi ramgi aɓwana male mǝnana tarkia ka aɓa ɓanza kat; nǝ takuli, nǝ njar-nzali, nǝ njar-kúnmur, sǝ nǝ njar-nza, arǝ aban kat, aban ká arǝ akúnbân mala ɓanza andǝ akúnbân mala kùli.
MAR 13:28 Wu kànì gìr arǝ nggun vwari. Ɓǝ̀ ambui tinata pǝlǝ pwale sǝ à nǝ̀ nggǝ to lolloapì ambui ka, wu sǝlǝ ama mbulo malanǝ̀ sulǝo.
MAR 13:29 Ana gbal ɓǝ̀ wu sǝn amǝnia yia agir à nǝ̀ nggǝ pakki ka, wu sǝlǝ ama yiu mem gbàshìnà, nda a nggearǝ kunɓala.
MAR 13:30 Ən nggǝ bangga wun ɓafo, nza man ngga, pà nǝ̀ kútí ɗang, she ɓǝ̀ amǝnia yia agir pángŋǝ̀nà ka.
MAR 13:31 Nzali andǝ kùli ka tea nǝ̀ malâ, sǝ cau mem ngga tè pà nǝ̀ mal ɗang.
MAR 13:32 Kǝ ɓwa súrǝ̀ pwari ko bu-pwari mǝnana agir mǝnia nǝ̀ nggá pang nǝi ka ɗang. Amǝturonjar mǝnana a kùli gbal ka, à súrǝì ɗang. Nggearǝ mim Muna mala Ɓakuli ka, ǝn súrǝì ɗang. Kǝ Tárrám nǝmurǝì nda mana sǝlǝ ka.
MAR 13:33 Wu do aɓa gilǝrǝu, wu dum nǝ mǝsǝ wun; acemǝnana wu súrǝ̀ pwari mǝnana bu-pwari mǝno nǝ̀ yiu nǝi ka ɗang.
MAR 13:34 Yiu mala Muna mala Ɓwa ka à nǝ̀ kànì arǝ ɓwa mǝnana lo nǝ̀ o a bǝri ka. Nǝ̀ ɗeki ɓala ka, nying túró a bu aguro male, koyan ngga nǝ túró mǝnana nǝ̀ nggǝ pak ka. Sǝ ne mǝ'yál kunɓala ɓǝ̀ kundǝmur nyare male.
MAR 13:35 Ace mani ka, wu do nǝ mǝsǝ wun aɓa gilǝrǝu, acemǝnana wu súrǝ̀ pwari mǝnana Mǝtala ɓala nǝ̀ nyar nǝi ka ɗàng; ko nǝ pwarikpana, ko nǝ ɓadu, ko nǝ ɓua mala nggǔ, ko nǝ dǝmbari.
MAR 13:36 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ yiu nǝ gya yasǝlǝban ngga, ɓǝ̀ kǝa kum wun a ntulo ɗàng.
MAR 13:37 Mǝ ndarǝ na wun cau mana ǝn nggǝ ne koyana le ka, wu dum nǝ mǝsǝ wun aɓa gilǝrǝu!
MAR 14:1 Anongŋo ɓari a dǝm Lamsan mala Yàlîmurû andǝ Lamsan mala Bǝredi mǝnana Yis pa arǝì raka, agbani pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa ka, à nda ban alta njar aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa, mǝnana à nǝ̀ bwalǝna Yesu nǝi à nǝ̀ wal-luí ka.
MAR 14:2 À eare ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ kǝa pa a pwari pakkiɗire ɗang, ɓǝ̀ ana raka ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ lo arǝ sǝm.>>
MAR 14:3 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka Yesu na aɓa Betani, nda aban lili a ɓala mala Shiman mǝnana mǝdakali na ɗiɗyal ka. Ɓè ɓwama kutio nǝ muna-bang mǝnana à ɓe nǝ tali alabasta ka, nǝ mùrú mǝ'rǝmɓoarne aɓalǝi, mǝnana boale pa bǝti raka. Mùruî ka nard na nǝmurǝì, à zurǝi andǝ kǝgìr ɗàng. Ɓwama man yi ɓun girkun muna-bang pǝlǝa solǝì Yesu mùruî a ɓamúrí.
MAR 14:4 Aɓea aɓwana mǝnana atà Yesu aban li ka, bumia kiɗiki, à ne arǝarǝia ama, <<Ace mana sǝ à kiɗiki mùrú mǝnia ka anggo?
MAR 14:5 Acemǝnana mǝnia yì mùrú ka à nǝ̀ gandǝ me amur gìr mǝnana kútì boalo dinari gbǝman tàrú, sǝ boale ka à nǝ̀ gakkia amǝ'tǝ̀r!>> À munǝki arǝ ɓwama mǝno kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
MAR 14:6 Sǝ Yesu ka na ama: Wu ɗeki ɓwama man ɗǝong. Ace mana sǝ wu kǝ peki le? Yì ka, pàngŋǝ́nàm gìr mǝɓoarne.
MAR 14:7 Wu nda a tarǝ wun wunǝ amǝ'tǝ̀r pwari-pwari. Wu nǝ̀ gandǝ pakkia wia pepe ko aya pwari bum wun kànì ka. Sǝ mim ngga, pà wu nǝ̀ kumam ko aya pwari ka ɗang.
MAR 14:8 Yì ka, pàngŋǝ̀nà gìr mǝnana gandǝi ka, ak dǝmba soapam mùrú a nggūrǝam, acau mala cem a ɓembe.
MAR 14:9 Ɓafo, ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, ɓǝ̀ aya ban a ɓanza mǝnana kat à nǝ̀ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban nggam ngga, gìr mǝnana mǝnia yì ɓwama pe ka, à nǝ̀ ɗenyi nǝi, à nǝ̀ na ce.
MAR 14:10 Pǝlǝa Yahuda Iskariyoti, mwashat aɓalǝ alaggana mana lum-nong-ɓari ka, puro wari aban agbani pǝris, nǝ̀ nggá mak Yesu.
MAR 14:11 Banɓoaria agbani pǝris nǝ ok mǝnia yì cau ka, pǝlǝa à eare ama à nǝ̀ pe wi boalo. Yì gbal ka tita alta njar mǝnana nǝ̀ pea wia Yesu nǝi ka.
MAR 14:12 Nda a pwari mǝnana à tinata Lamsan mala Bǝredi mana Yis pa arǝì raka, kǝ pwari mǝnana à kasǝkiyi meal mǝgam mala Lamsan Yàlîmurû nǝi ka. Alaggana mala Yesu ɗì ama, <<Aya ban sǝ a kǝ earce ɓǝ̀ sǝm nggea gilǝkio ban ace li girlina Yàlîmurû?>>
MAR 14:13 Pǝlǝa tasǝ aɓea alaggana male ɓari, nea wia ama, <<Wu kyane a nggea-là, ɓǝ̀ wun nǝ̀ nggá kútí ka, wun nǝ̀ gāsǝ wunǝ ɓe ɓwabura nǝ bàng-mùr a kwari, wu kya atè.
MAR 14:14 Ɓǝ̀ aya ɓala sǝ kútí ka, wu ne mǝtala ɓalae ama, <Malǝm kǝ ɗiban ama, kurǝm mala abǝri mǝnana mǝ nǝ li girlina Yàlîmurû kam sǝnǝa alaggana mem ngga ndake?>
MAR 14:15 Nǝ̀ lǝmdǝa wun kurǝm kùli mǝgule, mana à gilǝkina ɓālǝi pepè ka. Wu kya pakka sǝm girlina kam.>>
MAR 14:16 Pǝlǝa alaggane o, à kya kutio a nggeale, sǝ à kya kum agir kǝla mǝnana Yesu nea wia ka, sǝ à pak girlina Yàlîmurû kam.
MAR 14:17 Nǝ pwari kpǝra ka, Yesu yiu andǝ alaggana male mana lum-nong-ɓari ka.
MAR 14:18 Lang à yì dumǝna aban li ka, Yesu na ama, <<Ɓafo, ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, ɓwa mwashat aɓalǝ wun aban li atàm, nǝ̀ nggá mem.>>
MAR 14:19 Bumia kiɗiki, sǝ koyan aɓalǝia ka ɗì ama, <<Mǝ nda le?>>
MAR 14:20 Yì ka, earia wia ama, <<Mwashat aɓalǝ wun lum-nong-ɓari, mǝnana kǝ oasǝ buì atàm ado a kwar ka, nda.
MAR 14:21 Muna mala Ɓwa ka nǝ̀ wu púp, kǝla mana à gilǝì amurí aɓa Malǝmce ka. Sǝama, caukwanban na nǝ ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ mak Muna mala Ɓwa ka! Nǝ̀ ɓoaribanì, yi mǝnana mǝnia yì ɓwa ka à ɓǝli raka!>>
MAR 14:22 Lang à nda amur li girlina ka, Yesu twal bǝredi, sǝ pak yàwá, sǝ ɓwani, pea alaggana male, nea wia ama, <<Wu é wu she, nggūrǝam ma.>>
MAR 14:23 Pǝlǝa twal kwap, pak yàwá, sǝ pea wia, à nu àkǝ̀ ɓālǝi yia kat.
MAR 14:24 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda nkílèm mana à sukki ace aɓwana pas ka. Nda nkila mana tsǝkiyi bǝsa kùrcau mǝnana Ɓakuli pa aban aɓwana male, aɓa túró ka.
MAR 14:25 Ən nggǝ na wun ɓafo, pa mǝ nǝ nu mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap man ɗǝm ɗàng, she a pwari mǝno, mǝ nǝ nui bǝshe a domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka.>>
MAR 14:26 Anzǝm mana à tuna nggyal ka, à puro à o a Nkono Olif.
MAR 14:27 A njar aban o ka Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wun kat wu nǝ̀ ɓangŋa wu nǝ̀ nyem, acemǝnana à gilǝa a muram aɓa Malǝmce ama, << <Ɓakuli nǝ̀ wal yálgír, sǝ anzur ka à nǝ̀ mesǝke.>
MAR 14:28 Sǝa ma anzǝm mǝnana ǝn longŋǝni ɓembe nǝ yilǝmu ka, mǝ nǝ akà wun dǝmba aban ká a Galili, sǝm nǝ̀ nggá je kam.>>
MAR 14:29 Bitǝrus pǝlǝi wi ama, <<Ko ɓǝa aɓwana kat à nǝ̀ ɓangŋa à nǝ̀ nyio ka, mem ngga pà mǝ nǝ ɓang ɗang!>>
MAR 14:30 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ɓafo, ǝn nggǝ no ama, yalung, nǝ bu du mǝnia ka, kaniama ɓǝ̀ nggu ɓua kúni ɓari ka, we nǝ nggearǝo a nǝ makgirem kusǝ tàrú ama, a súrǝàm ɗang.>>
MAR 14:31 Bitǝrus ɓinǝcau kpékpé ama, <<Ko ɓǝà na ama dupǝnam púp ama mǝ wu sǝnǝ we ka, pà mǝ nǝ makgìr súrǝ̀o ɗàng.>> Acilia alaggana kat gbal ka à na kǝ cau mǝ'mwashati.
MAR 14:32 Pǝlǝa Yesu andǝ alaggana male o a ɓekǝ ban ndakam à tunǝki ama Gefsemani aɓalǝ anggun olif. Yesu ne alaggana male ama, <<Wu duk kani, mǝ nǝ nggá pak hiwi.>>
MAR 14:33 Twal Bitǝrus, andǝ Jemis, andǝ Yohana atè, sǝ tita bumkiɗikea kǝ̀rkǝ́r, ban pakki wi ɓà.
MAR 14:34 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Yilǝmem ngga nda aɓa tanni kǝla ɓǝ̀ purî rǝàm. Wu duk kani nǝ mǝsǝ wun atàm.>>
MAR 14:35 Kutio o a dǝmba anggo, kya kpa nzali, sǝ pak hiwi ama ɓǝ̀ nǝ̀ gandǝnǝ pa ka, pwari tanni mǝnana kǝ yiu ka ɓǝ̀ sharibani.
MAR 14:36 Na ama, <<Dâ, gìr kat a bano ka kǝ gandǝ pa. Ən nggǝ zǝmbô, gǝsham mǝnia yì kwap mala tanni ka. Kat andǝ amani ka, ɓǝ̀ kànì mala ɓabumo ɓǝ̀ pa, mem na ɗang.>>
MAR 14:37 Pǝlǝa nyare yiu aban alaggana male yi kumia ka à nda a ntulo. Ne Bitǝrus ama, <<Shiman, a nda ntulo le? A pà nǝ gandǝ do nǝ mǝsǝo atàm ko bu-pwari mwashat ɗang re?
MAR 14:38 Wu dum nǝ mǝsǝ wun, wu pak hiwi, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ wu kǝa kutio aɓa kārǝkiban ɗang. Bangŋo ka earǝna, sǝ nggūrǝu ka, yauwiki.>>
MAR 14:39 Yesu nyar ɗǝm a kusǝì, o kya pak hiwi; ɓǝsǝlǝ kǝ cau mǝ'mwashati.
MAR 14:40 Lang nyare yiu aban alaggana male ka, yi kumia ɗǝm a ntulo, acemǝnana mǝsǝia dǝmbǝrikina. À súrǝ̀ cau mǝnana à nǝ̀ ne wi ka ɗàng.
MAR 14:41 Lang nyar abania tàruià ka, banggia wia ama, <<Wu nda a ntulo più aban usǝlǝo le? Kārǝ́na! Pwari pàngŋǝ̀nà! Wu sǝni, Muna mala Ɓwa ka à mangŋǝ́nì a ban amǝ'cauɓikea.
MAR 14:42 Wu lo, ɓǝ̀ sǝm o! Mǝ'mem ngga, ndya kǝ yiu ka!>>
MAR 14:43 Anggo kun Yesu malaká pwal ɗàng, Yahuda, mwashat aɓalǝ aman lum-nong-ɓari ka nǝ̀ yia tusǝo. Ndanǝ aɓwana atè pas nǝ akafe andǝ agbǝlang gara abuia, aɓwana mana agbani pǝris, andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule tasǝia ka.
MAR 14:44 Ɓwa mǝnana me, yì Yahuda ka, angŋa dǝmba kàninià wia ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana mǝ nǝ kùrrì zǝp ka, nda kǝ ɓwe. Wu bwali, wu tà buì kàngkàng, wu um nǝi.>>
MAR 14:45 Yiu mala Yahuda ka yi kútí nǝ kutio aban Yesu, ne wi ama, <<Malǝm!>> Sǝ kùrrì zǝp.
MAR 14:46 Pǝlǝa acilia aɓwana mǝno yiu à gbami Yesu à bwali taptap.
MAR 14:47 Sǝ ɓeɓwa mwashat aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnana atà Yesu ka, kwetǝ kafe male, kwarǝna guro mala pǝris mǝgule nǝi, kasǝ kiri kpat.
MAR 14:48 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wu yiu nǝ akafe andǝ agbǝlang gara ace bwalam kǝla mǝ nda mǝɓǝmbǝriban?
MAR 14:49 Ko aya pwari ka mǝ nda sǝnǝa wun, aban kanigir aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. Mana tsǝa sǝ wu bwalam ɗang? Sǝama mǝnia ka pa anggo acemǝnana ɓǝà lùmsǝ cau mala Malǝmce.>>
MAR 14:50 Pǝlǝa alaggana male ɓangŋa, à ɗeki.
MAR 14:51 Ɓè lagga ndakam kǝ kpa ateà a nzǝ́mò , yì ka, daura pa arǝì ɗàng, she kǝ gìrkùmsǝo nda mǝnana arǝì ka. Aburana mǝno ɓariki ama à nǝ̀ bwali,
MAR 14:52 kara panzǝ lagir, ɓangŋa, um nǝ ɓate.
MAR 14:53 À warinǝ Yesu a ɓala mala pǝris mǝgule, ban mǝnana agbani apǝris, andǝ akapana, andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, yi ram kam ngga.
MAR 14:54 Bitǝrus ka kpate kuko, kya kutio chatchat aɓa ɓala mala Pǝris Mǝgule. A kàm ngga, kya do atà amǝ'yálban aban dandǝ rǝì a kun bǝsa.
MAR 14:55 Akanó aɓalǝi ka, agbani pǝris andǝ amǝ'ɓashi mala amǝ Yahudi kat, à nda aban alta cau mǝnana nǝ̀ pur a kun Yesu mǝnana à nǝ̀ pàngŋǝ̀nà túró nǝi ace wal-luí ka, sǝ ko à kum ɗang.
MAR 14:56 Aɓwana pas yi naki anyir amurí, sǝ kat andǝ amani ka, kunia yiu mwashat ɗang.
MAR 14:57 A masǝlǝate ka, aɓea aɓwana lo a came, a na mǝnia yì nyir ka amur Yesu, ama,
MAR 14:58 <<Sǝm oè bang ama, <Mǝ nǝ arki Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli mǝnana à ɓè nǝ bu ka, sǝ anzǝm nongŋo tàrú ka, mǝ nǝ ɓak ɓè mǝnana à ɓè nǝ bu raka.> >>
MAR 14:59 Ko a nggearǝ ɓá mani mǝno ka, kunia yiu ɗàngɗáng.
MAR 14:60 Pǝlǝa pǝris mǝgule lo came amúrià, sǝ ɗì Yesu ama, <<A pà nǝ bǝl kuno re? A panǝ cau mana awu nǝ na amur acau mǝnana aɓwana mǝnia kǝ na amuro ka re?>>
MAR 14:61 Sǝ Yesu ka duk kúni più, na kǝ cau ɗàng. Nyare pǝris mǝgule ɗì ama, <<A nda Kǝrǝsti, yì Muna mala Ɓakuli le?>>
MAR 14:62 Yesu ear ama, <<Mǝ nda! <<Sǝ pà nǝ̀ sau ɗang wun nǝ̀ sǝn Muna mala Ɓwa aban do, a buno mala rǝcandǝa, a bù-mǝlì mala Ɓakuli, aban yiu aɓalǝ apǝrɓang nǝ kuli.>>
MAR 14:63 Pǝris mǝgule kara bwal daura male sannì kǝr, ace lǝmdǝ kàrmúrû male, sǝ ɗiban ama, <<À yá ulang amǝ'nakún ɗǝm sǝm alkiyitea?
MAR 14:64 Wu ongŋǝna cauɓana mǝnana ne amur Ɓakuli ka, sǝ mana wu na?>> Yia kat ka à kasǝi wi ɓashi lú, ama kārǝ́na ɓǝ̀ wú.
MAR 14:65 Aɓea aɓwana ateà à tita tàkki wi ntāra arǝì, à kur amǝsǝì, sǝ à tulki nǝ abuia, à na ama, <<Bangga sǝm, ko yana walo!>> Sǝ amǝ'yálban bwali à kǝ kwaki a takiri, aban umnǝe.
MAR 14:66 Bitǝrus ka nda più nǝ nzali a banfana aɓa ɓala. Ɓè muna ɓwama, muna-ɓala mala pǝris mǝgule, yiu.
MAR 14:67 Lang nǝ̀ sǝn Bitǝrus aban do a kun bǝsa ka, sǝni kyap-kyap, sǝ ne wi ama, <<We gbal ka a nda atà Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat!>>
MAR 14:68 Bitǝrus pǝlǝa tǝmce, na ama, <<Ən súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana a nakiyi cau amurí ka ɗàng.>> Pǝlǝ kusǝì ka puro nǝ kunɓala. Kara nggu ɓua.
MAR 14:69 Lang muna ɓwama, muna-ɓala sǝni kano ka, ne aɓwana mǝnana à cam a banì ka ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, nda ateà!>>
MAR 14:70 Bitǝrus nyare tǝmce ɗǝm. Zuku ka aɓwana mǝnana à cam a banì ka, à ne Bitǝrus ama, <<Mǝsǝcau, a nda aɓalǝia, acemǝnana a nda ɓwa Galili!>>
MAR 14:71 Bitǝrus ka kutia kángìr ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ súban yiu a muram ɓǝ̀ nyir na ǝn nakiyi ka; mǝnia yì ɓwa wu nakiyi ce ka ǝn súrǝì ɗàng!>>
MAR 14:72 Banì sau ɗang, nggu ɓua ɓaria kúni. Kara ɓalǝ Bitǝrus kasǝ arǝ cau mǝnana Yesu ne wi ama, <<Kaniama ɓǝ̀ nggu ɓua kúni ɓari ka, a nǝ bang kusǝ tàrú ama a súrǝàm ɗàng.>> Sǝ Bitǝrus kpa ɓua.
MAR 15:1 Nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal ka, agbani pǝris andǝ akapana, andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, andǝ amǝ'ɓashi kat, à yì ear amur cau mwashat. À ta bu Yesu, à um nǝi aban Bilatus.
MAR 15:2 Bilatus ɗì Yesu ama, <<A nda murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi le?>> Yesu eari wi ama, <<E, kǝ ndo a ne ka.>>
MAR 15:3 Agbani pǝris yiu nǝ acau ɗàngɗáng amurí.
MAR 15:4 Pǝlǝa Bilatus nyare ɗì ama, <<A pa wu nǝ na kuno re? Mana awu nǝ na amur mǝnia yì acau ɗàngɗáng à kǝ nea a muro ka!>>
MAR 15:5 Yesu nyare loasǝ kúni ɗǝm ɗàng. Gìr nî pè Bilatus ndali.
MAR 15:6 A koya Lamsan Yàlîmurû ka, Bilatus kǝ panzǝ pursǝna mwashat mǝnana aɓwana zǝmba ace ka.
MAR 15:7 Ɓè pursǝna nakam lùllǝì ama Barabbas, à kùrrì acemǝnana yì andǝ aɓea amǝ'candǝmúrû ka, à wal-lú a pwari zunggǝli mala là.
MAR 15:8 Ɓwabunda kutio aban Bilatus, à yì zǝmbi wi ama, ɓǝ̀ pàk gìr mǝnana pakkiyia wia ka.
MAR 15:9 Bilatus ɗiban ama, <<Wu earce mǝ panzǝa wun Murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi le?>>
MAR 15:10 Yì ka, sǝlǝna ama, ace mwararǝu sǝ agbani pǝris yiu nǝ Yesu a baní.
MAR 15:11 Sǝ agbani pǝris soakita ɓwapǝndǝa ama ɓǝà ne Bilatus ɓǝ̀ panzǝ Barabbas a kun Yesu.
MAR 15:12 Bilatus pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Sǝ mana ado mǝ pakki man yì ɓwa wu tunǝki ama murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi ka?>>
MAR 15:13 A lo gǝu ama, <<Gballì a nggun-gangndǝi!>>
MAR 15:14 Bilatus ɗia ama, <<Ace mana? Ya cauɓikea na pàk le?>> À nyare à loasǝ già kǝ̀rkǝ́r ama, <<Gballì a nggun-gangndǝi!>>
MAR 15:15 Sǝ acemǝnana Bilatus earce ama nǝ̀ pwasǝbumia ka, pǝlǝa panzǝia wia Barabbas. Tsǝa à kwak Yesu, pǝlǝa pea asoje mala amǝ Roma ɓǝà kya gbàllì a nggun-gangndǝi.
MAR 15:16 Asoje umnǝ Yesu a palta a ban-mǝgule mala nggwamna, pǝlǝa à yì rambǝ acili asoje kat.
MAR 15:17 À makki wi daura murǝm arǝì, à mārǝ́ mbulan nǝ zwe, à oasǝi wi a ɓamúrí.
MAR 15:18 Pǝlǝa à tita tunǝki ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝo pwalo, murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi!>>
MAR 15:19 À walki a ɓamúrí nǝ gara. À tappî ntāra, à kū`ndǝó amur ankūnǝia kǝla à nda ban pe wi gulo.
MAR 15:20 Anzǝm mǝnana à pangŋǝni wi amǝnia yì agir oalban ngga, à swár daura murǝm mana à oasǝi wi ka, pǝlǝa à túrì wi amale yì adaura. Sǝ à pusǝì aban ká gbàlle.
MAR 15:21 Ɓè ɓwa Sayirin nda ban kutio, lùllǝì ama Shiman, tár a Alizanda andǝ Rufus, pur nǝ muna-là aban yiu a nggea-là. Asoje tsǝì púp ɓǝ̀ twal nggun-gangndǝi mala Yesu.
MAR 15:22 À warinǝ Yesu a ban mǝnana à tunǝki ama Golgota, ɓālǝi ama, <<Ban mǝnana nda kǝla nkpoula Ɓamuru>> ka.
MAR 15:23 À pe wi mùr-anap mana à zurǝì andǝ mǝr ka ama ɓǝ̀ nu, sǝ ginǝki.
MAR 15:24 Pǝlǝa à gbàllì amur nggun-gangndǝi. À kocàca, à gaki agir-nggūrǝu male.
MAR 15:25 A bu-pwari tongno-nong-ine mala dǝmbari sǝ à gbàllì.
MAR 15:26 Cauɓikea mana à bang ama pak ka, à gilǝì a kùli amurí arǝ nggun-gangndǝi ama: <<MURƏM MALA AMƏ YAHUDI>>
MAR 15:27 À gbàllì atārǝia andǝ amǝ'ɓǝmbǝriban ɓari, man a buì mǝlì sǝ man a buì mǝ'nggare.
MAR 15:29 Aɓwana, amǝgya kutio kǝ sanggì, à kǝ piki múrià, à kǝ na ama, <<Kui! We ɓwa mǝnana a nǝ arki Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, sǝ a nǝ ɓe aɓa nongŋo tàrú ka.
MAR 15:30 Sùlǝî mur nggun-gangndǝi, amsǝ ɓamur rǝò!>>
MAR 15:31 Ana gbal sǝ agbani pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, à kǝ naki acau arǝia nǝ akún oalban arǝ Yesu ama, <<Amsǝ aɓwana, sǝ gandǝ amsǝ ɓamur rǝì ɗàng!
MAR 15:32 Ɓǝ̀ yì nda Kǝrǝsti, Murǝm mala amǝ Isǝrayila ka, ɓǝ̀ sùlǝî múr nggun-gangndǝi adyan! Ɓǝ̀ sǝm sǝni, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ paɓamur sǝm a baní!>> Aɓwana mǝnana à gbàllia a nggun andǝi ka, yia gbal ka à sanggì.
MAR 15:33 Lang pwari zǝkina ka, pǝndǝa yi gir ban kat bwal bu-pwari tàrú mala pwarikpǝra.
MAR 15:34 Nǝ bu-pwari tàrú mala pwarikpǝra ka, Yesu mǝn kúni bang ama, <<Eloi, Eloi, lama sabatani?>> Ɓālǝi ama, <<Ɓakuli mem, Ɓakuli mem, palang sǝ a túràm nzǝ́mó?>>
MAR 15:35 Lang aɓea aɓwana mana à cam a banì, à oè ka, à na ama, <<Wu oè, nda ban tunǝki Iliya.>>
MAR 15:36 Ɓè ɓwa ɓangŋa kya par soso aɓa mùr-anap mǝhangŋe, sǝ tsǝì a kun tondong, pǝlǝa lǝmdǝì Yesu ama ɓǝ̀ nu. Pǝlǝa ɓwe bang ama, <<Ɗeki, sǝm nǝ̀ sǝni, yakǝla Iliya nǝ̀ yiu nǝ̀ yia sùlǝì.>>
MAR 15:37 Yesu mak'zwalo bàng-bàng, pǝlǝa yilǝmi puro.
MAR 15:38 Kara lagir mǝtangŋe mǝnana à kasǝna ban mǝfele nǝi, mana aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, san aɓalǝu ɓari, twal a kùli yi zur a nzali.
MAR 15:39 Ɓwamǝgule mala asoje mǝnana came pǝlǝ ɓamǝsǝi nǝ ban Yesu ka, lang ok ɓua mala Yesu, sǝ sǝn wu male ka, bang ama, <<Ɓafo, mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, Muna mala Ɓakuli na!>>
MAR 15:40 Aɓea amamǝna cam a banì zak, à kǝ sǝnban. Maryamu Ɓwa Magdala, Maryamu nggea Jemis mǝkyauwe andǝ Yisǝfu, sǝ Salomi à nda aɓalǝ amamǝne.
MAR 15:41 A Galili ka, amǝnia yia amamǝna ka, à nda à pàkkî Yesu gbasha ka. Aɓea amamǝna mǝnana à yiu atārǝia a Urǝshalima ka à ndakam gbal.
MAR 15:42 Agir mǝnia ka, à yì pa a pwari Jumma, mǝnana nda pwari gilǝrǝu ace pwari Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo ka, nǝ pwarikpǝre.
MAR 15:43 Yisǝfu ɓwa Arimatiya, mana nda aɓalǝ amǝkùrcau mala amǝ Yahudi, sǝ yì nǝ ɓamúrì ka, ndaban kundǝ yiu mala domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka, wario nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa a ban Bilatus, kya zǝm lú Yesu.
MAR 15:44 Lang Bilatus ongŋǝna ama Yesu wuna ka, gìr nî pe wi ndali. Pǝlǝa tunǝ ɓwamǝgule mala asoje ɗì ko Yesu wuna.
MAR 15:45 Lang ongŋǝna a kun ɓwamǝgule mala asoje ama Yesu wuna ka, pǝlǝa pè Yisǝfu lú Yesu.
MAR 15:46 Yisǝfu pǝlǝa kúr anggurbyau tsǝkban, yiu yi sulǝ lú, marǝki nǝ anggurbyau, sǝ tsǝì a ɓembe mǝnana à tǝmi a bum tali ka. Ramta tali girna kúni nǝi.
MAR 15:47 Maryamu Ɓwa Magdala andǝ Maryamu nggea Yisǝfu sǝn ban mǝnana à tsǝì kam ngga.
MAR 16:1 Lang Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo kutina ka, Maryamu Ɓwa Magdala, andǝ Maryamu nggea Jemis, andǝ Salomi, à kúr amuku agir-mǝ'kuskushi mala pà rǝmban mǝɓoarne ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ ká à nǝ̀ hasǝi lú Yesu ka.
MAR 16:2 Nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal a pwari Ladi, pwari nǝ̀ eau ani ka, à bwalǝna njargula aban ká a ɓembe.
MAR 16:3 Pǝlǝa à kǝ ɗiki rǝarǝia ama, <<Yana nǝ̀ gǝsha sǝm tali mǝnana a girna kun ɓembe nǝi ka?>>
MAR 16:4 Lang à nǝ̀ loasǝ mǝsǝia ka, kara à sǝn nggea tali mǝgule man ngga à gǝshini.
MAR 16:5 À nǝ̀ kutio a ɓembe ka, à sǝn ɓe lagga nǝ daura mǝpwasǝe dumǝna atà bù-mǝlì. Ɓangciu pakkia wia.
MAR 16:6 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Wu kǝa ɓang ɗàng. Wu nda ban sǝnban Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat, mǝnana à gbàllì ka. Longŋǝna! Pa kani ɗang. Wu sǝn ban mǝnana à nongsǝi kàm ngga.
MAR 16:7 Ado ka wu kyane wu kya ne alaggana male andǝ Bitǝrus ama nda nǝ̀ akà wun dǝmba ká a bu-nzali Galili. Akanó ka wun nǝ̀ nggá sǝni, kǝla mǝnana na wun ngga.>>
MAR 16:8 Amamǝna man puro à nying ɓembe nǝ mire aban o nǝ rǝɓǝla, ban pakkia wia ɓà. À ne kǝɓwa ce ɗàng, acemǝnana ɓangciu pakkia wia.
MAR 16:9 [Lang Yesu longŋǝna nǝ yilǝmu a pwari Ladi ka, yi pusǝrǝi a ban Maryamu Ɓwa Magdala mǝnana pusǝ akukwar tongno-nong-ɓari arǝì ka.
MAR 16:10 Pǝlǝa wario kya ne alaggana male mana à nda andǝi ɗiɗyal ka. À nda ban ɓua, à nda rǝ pak bumkiɗikea.
MAR 16:11 Sǝ lang à ok ama Yesu ndanǝ yilǝmu, sǝ yì, yì Maryamu ɓwa Magdala sǝnǝni ka, à ear ɗang.
MAR 16:12 Anzǝm man ngga, Yesu yi pusǝrǝi a ban aɓea alaggana male ɓari nǝ ɓamǝsǝu mǝnana à súrǝì nǝi raka, lang à nda njar aban ká a nzǝm nggea-là ka.
MAR 16:13 À nyare à yì ne aɓia, sǝ yia gbal ka à eare ama mǝsǝcau na ɗang.
MAR 16:14 Nǝ nzǝ́mò ka Yesu yi pusǝrǝi a ban alaggana man lum-nong-mwashat ka aban li girlina atārǝia. Pǝlǝa nunkiria ace ɗwanyi earnǝ cau andǝ murcandǝa malea mǝnana à ɓinǝ akcau mala aɓwana mǝnana à sǝni anzǝm loapi ɓembe male ka.
MAR 16:15 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama: Wu kyane aɓa ɓanza kat, wu hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban a ban ɓwapǝndǝa kat.
MAR 16:16 Ɓwa mǝnana ak Cau Amsǝban, paɓamuri, sǝ à pakki wi batisǝma ka, nǝ̀ àwá, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana ɓinǝ ak Cau Amsǝban, paɓamuri raka, ɓashi nǝ̀ sulǝ amurí.
MAR 16:17 Aɓwana mǝnana à paɓamuria a banam ngga, amǝnia yia agir-lǝmdǝa ka à nǝ̀ kpatea: Aɓa lullǝam à nǝ̀ pusǝ akukwar, à nǝ̀ nakia cau nǝ abǝsa kún.
MAR 16:18 À nǝ̀ kpa an'yau nǝ buia, sǝ ɓǝà nu barya ka, pà nǝ̀ pakkia wia kǝgìr ɗàng. À nǝ̀ tsǝk buia amur amǝkwánó, sǝ amǝkwánó ka rǝia nǝ̀ kum rǝcandǝa.
MAR 16:19 Anzǝm mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu nania cau ka, kara à twali à um nǝi a kùli, kya do a bù-mǝlì mala Ɓakuli.
MAR 16:20 Pǝlǝa alaggana male puro à oa hamnǝ cau a koya ban ngga. Mǝtalabangŋo pak túró nǝia sǝ tsǝa aɓwana earnǝ cau malea nǝ agir-ndali mǝnana à kǝ gyata ce ka.]
LUK 1:1 Aɓwana pas twalî ɓamuria à nǝ̀ gilǝ cau amur agir mǝnana Ɓakuli pea aɓalǝ sǝm ngga.
LUK 1:2 Cau mǝnana à gilǝ ka nda kǝ̀ mǝnana à oe a kún aɓwana mǝnana à sǝn agirnì nǝ mǝsǝia a nggea dǝmbe, sǝ à hamnǝ cê ka.
LUK 1:3 Ace mani ka, we Ɓwamǝgule Tiyofulus, ǝn bǝl atǝ́r acê pepe, sǝ ǝn sǝni ka ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ ǝn gilǝo wia kǝla mǝnana à kwaɗi rǝia ka.
LUK 1:4 Ən pak mǝnia ka ace mǝnana wu súrǝ̀ mǝsǝcau mala agir mǝnana à kanio ka.
LUK 1:5 A do'nza mala Hirǝdus, murǝm mala bu-nzali Yahudi ka, ɓè pǝris nakam lùllǝì ama Zakariya a buì mala Abija. Māmí ka lùllǝì ama Alisabatu; yì gbal ka nda a tàu mala Haruna.
LUK 1:6 Yia kǝm ngga amǝ'ɓealɓoarna na aɓadǝm Ɓakuli. À kǝ kpata anzongcau andǝ angguracau mala Mǝtalabangŋo, à eare ama à nǝ̀ ɓwarkio a kǝɓè ɗàng.
LUK 1:7 Sǝ yia ka ko à pànǝ muna ɗang, acemǝnana Alisabatu ka nkombi na, sǝ yia kǝm ngga à ena.
LUK 1:8 A ɓè pwari mwashat Zakariya nda ban pak túró male mala Pǝris aɓadǝm Ɓakuli, aɓalǝ anonggio mǝnana tàu malea ndanǝ túró ka.
LUK 1:9 A kàné mala kúncau mala túró pǝris ka, Zakariya nda ɓwa mana twalban kpa amurí nǝ̀ kutio aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli nǝ̀ pisǝ muku-gìr mala loasǝ yele mǝ'rǝmɓoarne, ace paɓoro aban Ɓakuli ka.
LUK 1:10 Lang pwari loasǝ yele mǝ'rǝmɓoarne ace paɓoro aban Ɓakuli kārǝ́na ka, ɓwapǝndǝa ramba a nza aban pak hiwi.
LUK 1:11 Mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli yi pusǝrǝi a baní, cam nǝ bù-mǝlì mala gyangŋan mala myang-loasǝ-yele mǝ'rǝmɓoarne.
LUK 1:12 Lang Zakariya loasǝ mǝsǝì sǝni ka, ɓangciu pakki wi, yàl hǝrkit.
LUK 1:13 Pǝlǝa mǝturonjar ne wi ama: <<Zakariya, ce a ɓang ɗàng! Ahiwi mò ka Ɓakuli ongŋǝnia, māmó Alisabatu nǝ̀ ɓǝ̀lô muna sǝ awu nǝ pè wi lullǝu ama Yohana.
LUK 1:14 Bumo nǝ̀ pwasǝo, a nǝ dum nǝ banɓoarnado, sǝ aɓwana pas ka bumia nǝ̀ pakkiɗire ace ɓǝle.
LUK 1:15 Mǝnia yì muna ka, nǝ̀ duk ɓwamǝgule a ɓadǝm Mǝtalabangŋo. Ɓǝ̀ kǝa nu mba ko ɓè kǝgìr mǝnana nǝ̀ walban ngga ɗàng. Yì ka, nǝ̀ lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli, a bum ngge.
LUK 1:16 Nǝ̀ tsǝk amǝ Isǝrayila pas à nǝ̀ nyare aban Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli malea.
LUK 1:17 Nǝ̀ akì Mǝtalabangŋo dǝmba, nǝ̀ pak túró aɓa bangŋo andǝ rǝcandǝa, ulang mala Iliya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli. Nǝ̀ yinǝ dotarǝu mala atárrú andǝ amunia. Nǝ̀ nyesǝ amǝ'mgbikiru ɓǝà kum sǝlǝe mala amǝ ɓealɓoarna, ace tsǝk aɓwana ɓǝà gilǝrǝia ace yiu mala Mǝtalabangŋo.>>
LUK 1:18 Pǝlǝa Zakariya ɗì mǝturonjar ama, <<Lang sǝ mǝ nǝ sǝlǝ ama gìr mǝnana a bang ngga anggo sǝ nǝ̀ pa? Acemǝnana mim ngga ǝn ena, sǝ māmám gbal ka ena.>>
LUK 1:19 Mǝturonjar eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda Jibǝrayilu mǝnana camgiyi a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli ka. Ɓakuli tasǝam ɓǝ̀ ǝn yi banggo mǝnia yì cau mǝɓoarne ka.
LUK 1:20 Sǝ ado ka, acemǝnana a earnǝ cau mem raka, mǝnana nǝ̀ yia duk mǝsǝcau a pwari male ka, kuno girna; a pà wu nǝ nacau ɗàng, she pwari mǝnana amǝnia yì agir dumǝna mǝsǝia ka.>>
LUK 1:21 Anggo ka, ɓwapǝndǝa nda arǝ kundǝ Zakariya, à kǝ ndali, lang sǝ banì sauwa anggo kǝ̀rkǝ́r aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 1:22 Lang purna ka, gandǝ nea wia cau ɗàng. Kara à sǝlǝ ama sǝnǝna gìr aɓa bangŋo, aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. Acemǝnana camarǝ lǝmdǝkia wia cau nǝ bui, sǝ ko gandǝ mǝn kúni na kǝ cau ɗàng.
LUK 1:23 Lang anonggio mala túró mala Zakariya malǝna ka, pǝlǝa nyare a ɓala.
LUK 1:24 Anzǝm man ngga māmí Alisabatu kum muna a bumi. Zongŋo tongno ko sǝn nza ɗàng, kǝ na ama,
LUK 1:25 <<Mǝtalabangŋo nǝ̀ pakkam mǝnia ka. Aɓalǝ anonggio man ngga lǝ́mdǝ́nàm ɓwamuru male, sǝ twalǝ́nàmban kǝsǝkya aɓalǝ aɓwana.>>
LUK 1:26 Aɓa tongno-nong-mwashatia zongŋo mala kum muna-bum mala Alisabatu ka, Ɓakuli túr mǝturonjar Jibǝrayilu a ɓè là aɓa nzali Galili mǝnana à tunǝki ama, Nazarat ka.
LUK 1:27 Turi nǝ cau aban ɓè nsari lùllǝì ama Maryamu, mǝnana ɓeɓwa lùllǝì ama Yisǝfu, Mǝkà Dauda pur amurí nǝ̀ ali ka.
LUK 1:28 Mǝturonjar kutia bani ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝo pwalo! We mǝnana a ndanǝ ɓwamuru mala Ɓakuli ka, Mǝtalabangŋo na to.>>
LUK 1:29 Mǝnia yì cau mǝturonjar ne ka, pè Maryamu ɗenyicau kǝ̀rkǝ́r, kara kutia ndali ama, ya ulang makkun nda man.
LUK 1:30 Pǝlǝa mǝturonjar ne wi ama, <<Maryamu, ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakko ɗàng, a kumǝna earmúrú aban Ɓakuli.
LUK 1:31 Awu nǝ kum muna a bumo, a nǝ ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura, sǝ a nǝ tsǝki wi lullǝu ama Yesu.
LUK 1:32 Nǝ̀ duk ɓwamǝgule, sǝ à nǝ̀ tunǝi ama Muna mala Ɓakuli mana Karban nǝ Gulo kat ka. Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli nǝ̀ pe wi buno-murǝm mala kè Dauda.
LUK 1:33 Nǝ̀ duk gbani amur amǝ Isǝrayila tàtǝ́k, sǝ domurǝm male ka masǝlǝate pà kàm ɗàng.>>
LUK 1:34 Pǝlǝa Maryamu ne mǝturonjar ama, <<Lang sǝ mǝnia ka nǝ̀ pǎ, yi mǝnana mǝ nda nsari, ǝn súrǝ̀ ɓwabura raka?>>
LUK 1:35 Mǝturonjar eari wi ama, <<Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli nǝ̀ sulǝo amuro. Rǝcandǝa mala Ɓakuli mana Karban nǝ Gulo kat ka, nǝ̀ yia zuppi amuro, sǝ Muna Mǝfele mǝnana a nǝ ɓǝli ka, à nǝ̀ tunǝi ama, Muna mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 1:36 Nggearǝ ɓǝla mô Alisabatu ka, ndanǝ muna a bumi aɓa ě male. Yì mǝnana nkombi na ka, gongŋǝna nǝ azongŋo tongno-nong-mwashat.
LUK 1:37 Kǝgìr pà kàm mǝnana Ɓakuli pa nǝ̀ pè raka.>>
LUK 1:38 Maryamu eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda guro mala Mǝtalabangŋo. Ɓǝ̀ ce do kǝla mǝnana a na ka.>> Mǝturonjar pǝlǝa o ɗeki.
LUK 1:39 Anzǝm anonggio bǝti ka Maryamu lo tsuk-tsuk aban o a ɓè là a bu-nzali múr ankono mala nzali Yahudi.
LUK 1:40 Kya kutio a ɓala mala Zakariya, pǝlǝa makki Alisabatu kun.
LUK 1:41 Lang Alisabatu ok makkun mala Maryamu ka, muna mǝnana a bumi ka yàl hǝrkit, sǝ Alisabatu lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele.
LUK 1:42 Sǝ loasǝ gi kǝ̀rkǝ́r, banɓoarnado tsǝì na ama: <<A ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli aɓalǝ amamǝna, sǝ muna mǝnana a nǝ ɓǝl ka, ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli gbal!
LUK 1:43 Lang sǝ múrɓoarna mem yipàm anggo, yi mǝnana nggeau mala Mǝtalem yiu a banam ngga?
LUK 1:44 Lang ǝn ok makkun mô ka, muna mǝnana a bumam ngga yàl nǝ banɓoarnado.
LUK 1:45 A ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli, ace eare mǝnana a ear ama, cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo a bano ka, nǝ̀ yia lumsǝo.>>
LUK 1:46 Maryamu na ama: <<Yilǝmem ngga kǝ ɓwangsǝki Mǝtalabangŋo;
LUK 1:47 sǝ ɓabumam kǝ pak banɓoarnado atàcau mala Ɓakuli Mǝ'amsǝam,
LUK 1:48 acemǝnana yì ka, ɗenyina nǝ mim, guro male kat andǝ amani ama ǝn pa a kun kǝgìr raka! Twal ado aban o a dǝmba ka, aɓwana arǝ anza kat à nǝ̀ tunǝam ama mǝ'kúm tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 1:49 Acemǝnana Ɓakuli mana Karban kat ka, pàngŋǝ́nàm agir mǝgulke. Lùllǝì ka nda Ɓwa Mǝfele.
LUK 1:50 Kǝ lǝmdǝ mǝsǝswatǝr male aban aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ ɓanggi wi ka, twal a do'nza aban ká ɓè.
LUK 1:51 Pangŋǝna atúró mǝgulke nǝ murbui, sǝ mesǝkina amǝ gusǝlǝ-múrû andǝ aɗenyicau malea kat.
LUK 1:52 Yi sulǝna amurǝma amur abuno-murǝm malea, sǝ loasǝna amǝ nyesǝmúrû.
LUK 1:53 Amǝ'nzala ka ɗǝmsǝnia nǝ agir mǝɓoarne, sǝ amǝkume ka tasǝna takwaria ɓǝà o nǝ ɓabuia.
LUK 1:54 Bwalǝni guro male Isǝrayila kàm, aɓa ɗenyinǝ mǝsǝswatǝr male,
LUK 1:55 kǝla mǝnana pàcau aban aká sǝm, a Ibǝrayim andǝ amǝkè, málá male pà kàm ɗàng!>>
LUK 1:56 Maryamu do atà Alisabatu zongŋo tàrú, nda sǝ nyarǝna umna a là ka.
LUK 1:57 Lang pwari gbáshí muna mala Alisabatu kārǝ́na ka, yi ɓǝl muna-ɓwabura.
LUK 1:58 Aɓi amǝkunɓala, andǝ aɓǝla ok ama, Mǝtalabangŋo lǝmdǝni Alisabatu ɓwamuru mǝgule, ɓǝlna muna ka, à yì bwalì wi pàk banɓoarnado.
LUK 1:59 A tongno-nong-tàruià nongŋo ka, à yiu ace kasǝî muna ɓate. À earce ama à nǝ̀ tsǝki wi lullǝ tárrí Zakariya.
LUK 1:60 Sǝ nggè kasǝa ama, <<Awo, ɓǝà tunǝi ama, Yohana.>>
LUK 1:61 Sǝ à ne wi ama, <<Kǝɓwa pà kàm aɓalǝ aɓǝla ma'wun nǝ mǝna yì lullǝu ka ɗàng.>>
LUK 1:62 Pǝlǝa à ne tár muna cau nǝ bu, ɓǝ̀ na koya lullǝu na nǝ̀ tunǝna muna nǝi.
LUK 1:63 Sǝ zǝmba ama, ɓǝà yinǝi wi nǝ kpamgbang gilǝgir. Koyan ngga ndali, mǝnana gilǝ ama <<Lùllǝì nda Yohana>> ka.
LUK 1:64 Anggo ka, kara kún Zakariya mǝnna, lasǝi panzǝa, pǝlǝa tita nacau, kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli.
LUK 1:65 Amǝkunɓala kat ka múrià kàrria. Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana arǝ alá a bu-nzali múr ankono mala nzali Yahudi ka, à camarǝ naki cau mala amǝnia yì agir ka.
LUK 1:66 Ɓwa mǝnana kat ok ce ka, ndali sǝ ɗiban a ɗenyicau male ama, <<Mǝnia yì muna ka, nǝ̀ yia duk ya ulangni nani? Acemǝnana bu Ɓakuli na muri.>>
LUK 1:67 Zakariya, yì tár Yohana ka lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele. Pǝlǝa ɓangnǝa, bangcau mala Ɓakuli, ama:
LUK 1:68 Nokiban ngga dumǝna mala Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli mala amǝ Isǝrayila. Acemǝnana yina ace bwalì aɓwana male kàm, sǝ angŋǝna múrià, pusǝnia a gung.
LUK 1:69 Yi pa sǝm Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana ndanǝ rǝcandǝa ka, a tau-murǝm mala guro male Dauda.
LUK 1:70 Pè kǝla mǝnana bang a kún amǝ'ɓangnǝa male mǝfele ɓara-ɓara ka.
LUK 1:71 Pe anggo ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ amsǝ sǝm a bu aɓisǝm amǝbura, andǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à ɓinǝmǝsǝ sǝm ngga.
LUK 1:72 Pàk mǝnia ka ace lǝmdǝì atár sǝm mǝsǝswatǝr, sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɗenyinǝ kùrcau male mǝfele.
LUK 1:73 Nǝ mǝnia yì kùrcau ka, kánbi tár sǝm Ibǝrayim ama nǝ̀ amsǝ sǝm a bu aɓisǝm amǝbura, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm pak túró male nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa,
LUK 1:75 aɓa do mǝfele andǝ ɓealɓoarna a ɓadǝmbi a do yilǝmu ma'sǝm kat.
LUK 1:76 Sǝ we munem ngga, à nǝ̀ tunǝo ama mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mana Karban nǝ Gulo kat ka. Awu nǝ akì Mǝtalabangŋo dǝmba, ace gilǝki wi atanjar male,
LUK 1:77 ace pe aɓwana male súrǝ̀ amsǝban nǝ njar mala kum twalbanì mala acauɓikea malea.
LUK 1:78 Ace mǝsǝswatǝr andǝ ɓuɓɓuka mala Ɓakuli ma'sǝm ngga, nǝ̀ tsǝk kwaro mala ban ɓǝ̀ mǝnna amur sǝm nǝ kuli,
LUK 1:79 ace pà tǎlaban aban aɓwana mǝnana à do aɓa pǝndǝa andǝ yinggǝli lú ka, ace yál kusǝ sǝm aɓa ká tanjar mala dorǝpwala.
LUK 1:80 Muna, yì Yohana ka, camarǝ gulo sǝ dumnǝ rǝcandǝa aɓa bangŋo. Do male ka nda aɓa pǝɗanban a njenza, kya bwal a pwari pusǝrǝi aban amǝ Isǝrayila.
LUK 2:1 Aɓalǝ amǝno yì anonggio ka, Kaisar Agusta pa nzongcau ama, ɓǝa ɓal aɓwana mǝnana aɓa nzali Roma ka kat ɓǝa gilǝ lullǝia.
LUK 2:2 Mǝnia ka nda tita ɓalban arǝ abákú mǝnana Karniyus nda nggwamna mala bu-nzali Suriya ka.
LUK 2:3 Sǝ koyan ngga o a là male, ace mǝnana ɓǝà kya gilǝ lullǝì ka.
LUK 2:4 Yisǝfu ka, lo a Nazarat ɓè là a bu-nzali Galili, aban ká a bu-nzali Yahudi, a là mala Dauda mana à tunǝki ama Betalami ka, acemǝnana yì Yisǝfu ka muna lá na, a tàu mala Dauda.
LUK 2:5 O kano andǝ Maryamu mā-nsari male mǝnana gongŋǝna ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝà kya gilǝ lullǝia.
LUK 2:6 À nda kano più a Betalami ka, pwari gbáshí male yi kārǝa.
LUK 2:7 Pǝlǝa gbáshí muna dǝmba male, muna-ɓwabura. Mbúɓɓǝkì aɓa nggubyau sǝ nongsǝi aɓa kpamgbang-girlina mala agirkusǝu, acemǝnana à pànǝ ban nongŋo aɓa nda a ban-sulǝo ɗang.
LUK 2:8 Tù nǝ bania aɓa mǝnia yì bu-nzali ka, aɓea yalgir do a takuri aban yál agirkusǝu malea nǝ du.
LUK 2:9 Pǝlǝa ɓè mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo pusǝrǝi a bania, ɓoarɓwa mala Mǝtalabangŋo ta gumbǝlia. Ɓangciu bwalia kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 2:10 Mǝturonjar banggia wia ama, <<Ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakka wun ɗàng. Wu sǝni, ǝn ndya yina wun nǝ bǝsa Cau Mǝɓoarne mǝ'pwasǝ ɓabumì kǝ̀rkǝ́r mǝnana nda ace ɓwapǝndǝa kat ka.
LUK 2:11 Yalung aɓa nggea-là mala Dauda ka, à ɓǝlǝ́na wun Mǝ'amsǝban; yì nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝtalabangŋo.
LUK 2:12 Gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama mǝnia yì cau ka mǝsǝcau na ka ndya ka. Wun nǝ̀ nggá kum bangna-muna à mbuɓɓǝ́kini aɓa nggubyau sǝ à nongsǝi aɓa kpamgbang-girlina mala agirkusǝu.>>
