LUK 2:13 Anggo ka kara aɓea amǝturonjar pas sulǝ nǝ kuli a ban mǝturonjar mana yiu a dǝmbe ka. À kǝ ɓwangsǝ Ɓakuli à kǝ na ama:
LUK 2:14 <<Nokiban a ban Ɓakuli akanó a kùli, sǝ a ɓanza ka dorǝpwala a ban aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ pwasǝ ɓabumi ka!>>
LUK 2:15 Lang amǝturonjar nyingŋǝnia à nyarǝna à umna kùli ka, ayálgír mǝno nea rǝia ama, <<Wu fani sǝm nǝ̀ ká a Betalami, sǝm nǝ̀ nggá sǝn mǝnia yì gìr mana kumban, mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo na sǝm ce ka.>>
LUK 2:16 Pǝlǝa à lo a kaurǝa à kya kum Maryamu andǝ Yisǝfu sǝ bangna-muna aban nongŋo aɓa kpamgbang-girlina mala agirkusǝu.
LUK 2:17 Lang à sǝnǝni ka, pǝlǝa à mesǝ cau mǝnana mǝturonjar banggia wia amur mǝnia yì muna ka.
LUK 2:18 Aɓwana mǝnana kat à ok ka à ndali nǝ cau mǝnana ayálgír banggia wia ka.
LUK 2:19 Sǝ Maryamu ka bwal amǝnia yì acau, kǝ ɗenyi amúrià nǝ ɓabumi.
LUK 2:20 Ayalgir nyare à kǝ gusǝlǝ Ɓakuli, à kǝ ɓwangsǝki ace agir mǝnana kat à o sǝ à sǝni, kǝla mǝnana à banggia wia ka.
LUK 2:21 A tongno-nong-tàruià nongŋo, pwari mǝnana à nǝ̀ kasǝî wi ɓate ka, à tsǝki wi lullǝu ama Yesu, lullǝu mǝnana mǝturonjar pe wi sǝ yi kpa a bum ngge ka.
LUK 2:22 Lang apwari mala lak rǝia aɓa ɓoarnsari a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli yi lumsǝna, kǝla mǝnana Nggurcau mala Musa na ka, Yisǝfu andǝ Maryamu twal Yesu à um nǝi a Urǝshalima ace mǝnana ɓǝà kyan nǝi a ɓadǝm Mǝtalabangŋo ka.
LUK 2:23 Nggurcau mala Mǝtalabangŋo na ama, <<Koya muna-dǝmba mǝnana muna-ɓwabura na ka, à nǝ̀ ká nǝi ɓǝ̀ duk mala Mǝtalabangŋo.>>
LUK 2:24 À wari gbal ace pà gir'nkila kǝla mǝnana Nggurcau mala Mǝtalabangŋo bang ama ɓǝà pà ka: <<akutugangyi ɓari, ko amuna-kutumurǝm ɓari.>>
LUK 2:25 A bàkú mǝno ka ɓeɓwa ndakam nǝ do a Urǝshalima lùllǝì ama Shimiyon. Yì ka, mǝ ɓealɓoarna, mǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli na. Nda ban kundǝ amsǝban mala amǝ Isǝrayila, sǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele na amurí.
LUK 2:26 Bangŋo Mǝfele lǝmdǝni wi ama pà nǝ̀ wu ɗang, she ɓǝ̀ sǝnǝna Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo turi ka.
LUK 2:27 Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli loasǝi wari nǝi a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. Maryamu andǝ Yisǝfu yiu nǝ Yesu a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, ace mǝnana ɓǝa pakki wi gir mǝnana Nggurcau mala Musa kani ka.
LUK 2:28 Shimiyon yi ak muna a buì sǝ ɓwangsǝ Ɓakuli na ama:
LUK 2:29 <<A dyan ngga we Mǝtalabangŋo mǝnana a Karban kat ka, nying guro mò ɓǝ̀ o aɓa rǝpwala, kǝla mana a bang ngga.
LUK 2:30 Acemǝnana amǝsǝam sǝnǝna amsǝban mô,
LUK 2:31 mana a gilǝkice a ɓamǝsǝ aɓwana mala anzali kat ka.
LUK 2:32 Tǎlaban na ace mǝn mǝsǝ aɓwana mala acili anzali, sǝ aban aɓwana mô amǝ Isǝrayila ka gulo na.>>
LUK 2:33 Tár muna andǝ ngge ka à ndali nǝ cau mǝnana à bang amurí ka.
LUK 2:34 Pǝlǝa Shimiyon tsǝkia wia bu sǝ ne nggè Maryamu ama, <<Kwakikiro pepè: Mǝnia yì Muna ka Ɓakuli tsǝngŋǝni ama nǝ̀ duk tǝr kpa andǝ lo mala ɓwapǝndǝa pas a Isǝrayila. Yì ka, nǝ̀ duk gir'lǝmdǝa mǝnana pur nǝban Ɓakuli, mǝnana aɓwana pas nǝ̀ na mǝɓane amurí ka.
LUK 2:35 Nǝ̀ pusǝta ɗenyicau ɓabum mala aɓwana pas. Sǝ we ka, kpakpak mǝkwanbanì mǝnana aɓwana nǝ̀ pakki wi ka nǝ̀ soa ɓabumo kǝla soaban mala nggeabyau.>>
LUK 2:36 Ɓè ɓwagula mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli nakam gbal lùllǝì ama, Anna, muna mala Fanuwel, a tàu mala Asha. Anzǝm isǝban ngga, à do andǝ burí pǝlǝa tongno-nong-ɓari sǝ burí wu.
LUK 2:37 Anggo sǝ do mā-lú apǝlǝa lumi-tongno-nong-tàrú nǝ mǝsǝì ine. Gapiyi tārǝia andǝ Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ɗang, du andǝ pwari nda aban peri aban Ɓakuli nǝ gilmùr andǝ hiwi.
LUK 2:38 A kǝ bu-pwari mǝno Shimiyon nda ban nacau nǝ Yisǝfu andǝ Maryamu ka, yiu pǝlǝa kutia pakki Ɓakuli yàwá andǝ bangcau amur muna a ban aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kundǝ akmúrú mala Urǝshalima ka.
LUK 2:39 Lang Yisǝfu andǝ Maryamu malǝna gir mǝnana kat Nggurcau mala Mǝtalabangŋo kani ka, à nyare a nzali Galili, a la malea a Nazarat.
LUK 2:40 Muna gulo, kum rǝcandǝa, lùmsǝ nǝ sǝlǝe, ɗǝm ngga ɓwamuru mala Ɓakuli na amurí.
LUK 2:41 Koya pǝlǝa nani ka tár Yesu andǝ ngge kǝ̀ o a Urǝshalima ace Lamsan Yàlîmurû.
LUK 2:42 Lang Yesu lùmsǝ̀nà apǝlǝa lum-nong-ɓari ka à wari a Lamsan Yàlîmurû, kǝla mǝnana à pakkiyi ka.
LUK 2:43 Lang Lamsan Yàlîmurû malǝna sǝ tárrí andǝ ngge na aban nyare à nǝ̀ o a la ka, Muna yì Yesu ka akrǝi a Urǝshalima, sǝ yia ka à sǝlǝ ɗang.
LUK 2:44 À twali ama nda aɓalǝ acilia aɓwana mǝnana à twal gya andǝia ka, nda à gya aban o bà pwarikpǝra. Nǝ nzǝ́mò ka à tita alte a ban aɓǝla malea andǝ agyajam.
LUK 2:45 Lang à sǝni raka, à nyare a kusǝia aban ká Urǝshalima à nǝ̀ nggá sǝnbani.
LUK 2:46 Anzǝm nongŋo tàrú ka à kya kumi a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli aban do atà amǝkànìgìr, nda rǝ kwakikiri aban oea, sǝ kǝ ɗikia acau.
LUK 2:47 Ɓwa man kat oe ka, ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ sǝlǝgir male andǝ acau mǝnana kǝ nyesǝia wia aɓa pa eare ka.
LUK 2:48 Lang a tárrí andǝ ngge sǝni ka, à ndali. Sǝ nggè ɗì ama, <<Munem, palang sǝ a pakka sǝm ani? Mim sǝnǝ tárró sǝm came arǝ alto nǝ rǝɓǝla.>>
LUK 2:49 Yesu ɗia ama, <<Ace mana sǝ wu altam? Wu sǝlǝ mbak ama dumǝnam púp mǝ pa a ɓala mala Tárrám a kun túró male?>>
LUK 2:50 Sǝ yia ka à bwalta mǝnia yì cau nea wia ka ɗang.
LUK 2:51 Pǝlǝa lo ateà à nyare aban o a Nazarat. Kǝ okia wia. Sǝ nggè ka bwal amǝnia yì acau ka a ɓabumi.
LUK 2:52 Yesu gulo aɓa sǝlǝe andǝ nggunrǝu, nǝ earmúrú a ban Ɓakuli, andǝ aɓwana.
LUK 3:1 Nda aɓa lum-nong-tongnoia pǝlǝa mala do murǝm mala Kaisar Tiberiya, murǝm mǝgule mala amǝ Roma; Buntu Bilatus nda nggwamna mala bu-nzali Yahudi, Hirǝdus nda murǝm mala bu-nzali Galili, sǝ mǝ'eambi Filip nda murǝm mala abu-nzali Ituriya andǝ Tǝrakonitis; Lisaniyas nda murǝm mala bu-nzali Abilini,
LUK 3:2 sǝ Annas andǝ Kayafas ka à nda ka apǝris mǝgule. A bàkú mǝno ka cau mala Ɓakuli yiu a ban Yohana muna mala Zakariya aɓa pǝɗanban a njenza.
LUK 3:3 Yohana ka kutio arǝ alá mǝnana a kun Nggeasala Jodan ngga, kǝ hamnǝ cau ama, <<Wu pwanzali, wu ɗeki bu wun arǝ acauɓikea ma'wun, ɓǝà pakka wun batisǝma, ace mǝnana Ɓakuli ɓǝ̀ twala wun ban acauɓikea ma'wun ngga.>>
LUK 3:4 Kǝla mǝnana à gilǝì aɓa Malǝmce mala Ishaya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ɗiɗyal ama: <<Gì ɓeɓwa kǝ tunǝban aɓa pǝɗanban a njenza ama, <Wu gilǝki tanjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo; Wu tsǝk atanjar ɓǝà cam pǝrapǝra ace.
LUK 3:5 Koya ɓatūliban ngga à nǝ̀ lumsǝí, koya nkono andǝ muna nkono ka à nǝ̀ bǝbbǝriki. Atanjar mǝkarke ka à nǝ̀ sārǝia, aban mana gwangɗing- gwangɗing ngga à nǝ̀ gilǝkia ɓǝà nong pàling.
LUK 3:6 Sǝ ɓwapǝndǝa kat ka nǝ̀ sǝn amsǝban mala Ɓakuli!> >>
LUK 3:7 Yohana ne aɓwabundǝa mǝnana à kǝ yiu a baní ɓǝ̀ pakkia wia batisǝma ka ama, <<Wun amuna baffu, yan sangsǝ kir wun ama ɓǝ̀ wu ɓanggi nggea bumlulla mala Ɓakuli mǝnana kǝ yiu ka?
LUK 3:8 Wu pusǝ ɓealu mǝnana nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama wu pwanǝna'nzali, wu nyìngŋǝ̀nà acauɓikea ma'wun ngga. Wu kǝa twali ama do ma'wun kǝla amǝkau mala Ibǝrayim ngga nǝ̀ amsǝ wun ɗang. Ən nggǝ na wun ama aɓalǝ atali man ngga, Ɓakuli nǝ̀ gandǝ loasǝi Ibǝrayim amǝkau.
LUK 3:9 Ko ado ka kun bero na a tǝrta anggun. Koya nggun mǝnana pà nǝ̀ pusǝ ɓǝle mǝɓoarne raka à nǝ̀ kasǝi à nǝ̀ turi a bǝsa.>>
LUK 3:10 Ɓwabunda pǝlǝa ɗì Yohana ama, <<Sǝ mana ado sǝm nǝ̀ pa?>>
LUK 3:11 Yohana earia wia ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana kat ndanǝ adaura ɓari ka, ɓǝ̀ nyesǝ ɓe ɓǝ̀ pè ɓwa mǝnana pa nǝi raka. Ɓwa mǝnana nǝ girlina ka, ɓǝ̀ pè aɓwana mǝnana à pa nǝi raka.>>
LUK 3:12 Amǝ'ak boalo-cemi gbal ka à yiu ama ɓǝà pakkia wia batisǝma. Pǝlǝa à ɗì ama, <<Malǝm, mana sǝm nǝ̀ pa?>>
LUK 3:13 Yohana pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Wu kǝa ak gìr mǝnana kútì mana à kasǝa wun ngga ɗàng.>>
LUK 3:14 Aɓea soje ɗì ama, <<Sǝ sǝm ngga, mana sǝm nǝ̀ pa?>> Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Wu kǝa kùmsǝkun kǝɓwa ɗàng, wu kǝa ɓunbî kǝɓwa cau ɓà arǝì ɗàng. Wu do amur kǝ boalo zongŋo ma'wun.>>
LUK 3:15 Ɓwapǝndǝa kwaki kiria, nǝ tsǝkɓalǝu, à kǝ ndali nǝ ɓabumia ko Yohana nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban.
LUK 3:16 Pǝlǝa Yohana earia wia kat ama, <<Ən nggǝ pakka wun batisǝma nǝ mur. Sǝ ɓeɓwa ndakam kútiǎm nǝ gulo, nda nǝ̀ yiu ka. Anggur-nkura male ka, ǝn kārǝa mǝ nǝ panzǝia ɗang. Yì ka, nǝ̀ yia pakka wun batisǝma nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele andǝ bǝsa.
LUK 3:17 Kwar sarǝgir male nda buì. Nǝ̀ yia esǝki katǝra, nǝ̀ ram mǝsǝsa a bà male, sǝ kwá ka nǝ̀ pisǝì nǝ bǝsa mǝnana pà nǝ̀ limgi raka.>>
LUK 3:18 Anggo nǝ aɓea cau pas sǝ Yohana kwarkir ɓwapǝndǝa sǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban abania.
LUK 3:19 Sǝ lang Yohana gim murǝm Hirǝdus ace twal Hirǝdiya, mala mǝ'eambi, andǝ acilia ɓealɓikea mǝnana pakkia ka,
LUK 3:20 Hirǝdus tsǝa à bwal Yohana à oasǝi a ndàkurban. Mǝno ka ɓè cauɓikea na Hirǝdus pa amur amǝnana angŋa dǝmba pangŋǝnia ka.
LUK 3:21 Lang à ndarǝ pakki aɓwabundǝa kat batisǝma, sǝ Yesu gbal ka à pangŋǝni wi batisǝma, sǝ nda ban pak hiwi ka, kara kùli mǝnna,
LUK 3:22 Bangŋo Mǝfele sulǝ amurí nǝ nggunrǝu kǝla kutu. Gi Ɓakuli pur nǝ kùli na ama, <<A nda Munem mǝnana ǝn nggǝ earceo ka, ban kǝ ɓoaram a rǝo kǝ̀rkǝ́r.>>
LUK 3:23 Yesu ka ndanǝ pǝlǝa kǝla lumi-tàrú sǝ tita túró mala Ɓakuli. Aɓwana twali ama yì ka, nda muna mala Yisǝfu. Yisǝfu ka nda muna mala Heli,
LUK 3:24 Heli nda muna mala Matat, Matat nda muna mala Lawi, Lawi nda muna mala Melki, Melki nda muna mala Janayi, Janayi nda muna mala Yisǝfu.
LUK 3:25 Yisǝfu nda muna mala Matatiyas, Matatiyas nda muna mala Amos, Amos nda muna mala Nahum, Nahum nda muna mala Esǝli, Esǝli nda muna mala Naggai.
LUK 3:26 Naggai nda muna mala Ma'at, Ma'at nda muna mala Matatiyas, Matatiyas nda muna mala Semeyi, Semeyi nda muna mala Yosek, Yosek nda muna mala Yahuda.
LUK 3:27 Yahuda nda muna mala Yoanan, Yoanan nda muna mala Resa, Resa nda muna mala Jerubabel, Jerubabel nda muna mala Shaltiyel, Shaltiyel nda muna mala Neri.
LUK 3:28 Neri nda muna mala Melki, Melki nda muna mala Addi, Addi nda muna mala Kosam, Kosam nda muna mala Elmadam, Elmadam nda muna mala Er.
LUK 3:29 Er nda muna mala Jesǝwa. Jesǝwa nda muna mala Eliyeza. Eliyeza nda muna mala Jorim. Jorim nda muna mala Matat. Matat nda muna mala Lawi.
LUK 3:30 Lawi nda muna mala Shimiyon. Shimiyon nda muna mala Yahuda. Yahuda nda muna mala Yisǝfu. Yisǝfu nda muna mala Yonam. Yonam nda muna mala Iliyakim.
LUK 3:31 Eliyakim nda muna mala Meliya. Meliya nda muna mala Menna. Menna nda muna mala Matata. Matata nda muna mala Natan. Natan nda muna mala Dauda.
LUK 3:32 Dauda nda muna mala Jeshi. Jeshi nda muna mala Obet. Obet nda muna mala Boaza. Boaza nda muna mala Salmon. Salmon nda muna mala Nashon.
LUK 3:33 Nashon nda muna mala Aminadap. Aminadap nda muna mala Adǝmin. Adǝmin nda muna mala Arni. Arni nda muna mala Hezǝron. Hezǝron nda muna mala Parisa. Parisa nda muna mala Yahuda.
LUK 3:34 Yahuda nda muna mala Yakupu. Yakupu nda muna mala Ishaku. Ishaku nda muna mala Ibǝrayim. Ibǝrayim nda muna mala Tera. Tera nda muna mala Naho.
LUK 3:35 Naho nda muna mala Seru. Seru nda muna mala Reyu. Reyu nda muna mala Pele, Pele nda muna mala Eba. Eba nda muna mala Shela.
LUK 3:36 Shela nda muna mala Kenan. Kenan nda muna mala Arfakza. Arfakza nda muna mala Shem, Shem nda muna mala Nuhu. Nuhu nda muna mala Lamek.
LUK 3:37 Lamek nda muna mala Metusela. Metusela nda muna mala Inok. Inok nda muna mala Jared. Jared nda muna mala Mahalale. Mahalale nda muna mala Kenan.
LUK 3:38 Kenan nda muna mala Enosh. Enosh nda muna mala Set. Set nda muna mala Adamu, sǝ Adamu nda muna mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 4:1 Yesu lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele, nyàrî Nggeasala Jodan ngga, Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli um nǝi a pǝɗanban a njenza.
LUK 4:2 Akanó ka Shetan camarǝ karǝkì nongŋo lumi-ine. Aɓalǝ amǝno yì anonggio ka li kǝgìr ɗang. A masǝlǝata anongge ka nzala wali.
LUK 4:3 Shetan ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a nda Muna mala Ɓakuli ka, ne mǝnia yì tali ka ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝ nɗǝmo.>>
LUK 4:4 Yesu nyesǝi wi ama, <<À gilǝ a Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli ama, <Ɓwa pà nǝ̀ au nǝ girlina nǝmurǝì ɗang.>>>
LUK 4:5 Shetan loasǝi um nǝi a nggea ban mǝ'dāhre, sǝ lǝmdǝì wi anzali-murǝm mala ɓanza kat aɓa kuɓimǝsǝu.
LUK 4:6 Pǝlǝa Shetan ne wi ama, <<Mǝ nǝ po arǝcandǝa malea andǝ ɓoarɓwa malea kat, acemǝnana à panamia. Mǝ nǝ gandǝ pe koyan mǝnana ǝn earce pe wi ka.
LUK 4:7 Sǝ ɓǝa kū`ndǝó, a gusǝlǝam ngga, agir man nǝ̀ duk amo yia kat.>>
LUK 4:8 Yesu nyesǝi wi ama, <<À gilǝ a Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli ama, << <Peri aban Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli mo, sǝ wu kpate yì nǝmurǝì.>>>
LUK 4:9 Shetan nyare loasǝi um nǝi a Urǝshalima, kya tamsǝi a ɓong Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a nda Muna mala Ɓakuli ka, ta zurro a nzali.
LUK 4:10 Acemǝnana Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli bang ama, << <Ɓakuli nǝ̀ tsǝk amǝturonjar male aceo ɓǝa yalo caca; à nǝ̀ mbalǝkio a ɓabuia ace mǝnana wu kǝa tul kusǝo arǝ tali raka.> >>
LUK 4:12 Yesu nyesǝi wi ama, <<À gilǝ aɓa Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli ama, <Ce a kārǝki Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli mo ɗang.> >>
LUK 4:13 Lang Shetan malǝna kārǝki Yesu ka, pǝlǝa gǝshì banì zuku.
LUK 4:14 Yesu nyare a Galili aɓa rǝcandǝa mala Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli. Cau male akiban kat aɓa nzali mǝno.
LUK 4:15 Kànìgìr arǝ andakpapi malea, sǝ koyan ngga ɓwangsǝki.
LUK 4:16 Yesu kutio a Nazarat la mǝnana gul kam ngga. A pwari Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo mala amǝ Yahudi ka, Yesu kutio a ndakpapi kǝla mǝnana pakki ka. Lo came nǝ̀ ɓal cau aɓa Malǝmce.
LUK 4:17 Pǝlǝa à pe wi Malǝmce mala Ishaya Mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli. Lang mǝnni ka pǝlǝa kum ban mǝnana à gilǝa ama,
LUK 4:18 <<Bangŋo mala Mǝtalabangŋo nda a muram, acemǝnana tàrnám ɓǝ̀n hamnǝ Cau Mǝɓoarne a ban amǝ'tǝ̀r. Tasǝam ɓǝ̀n yi hamnǝ cau mala panzǝban a ban aɓwana mǝnana à kùria ka. Ɓǝà nyesǝi ante mǝsǝu sǝnban, sǝ ɓǝà pusǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda aɓata parban ngga a gung.
LUK 4:19 Ɓǝ̀n hama ama pwari mana Ɓakuli nǝ̀ amsǝ aɓwana male nǝi ka yina.>>
LUK 4:20 Pǝlǝa kar Malǝmce pè mǝ ɗenyi nǝia, ɓunte do. Mǝsǝ ɓwapǝndǝa mǝnana a ndakpapi ka kàr arǝì kat.
LUK 4:21 Pǝlǝa tita nea wia ama, <<Mǝnia yì cau ɓá Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli kir wun oè ka, lùmsǝ̀nà yalung.>>
LUK 4:22 Ko yan ngga bang cau mǝɓoarne amurí, sǝ à pak ndali arǝ sǝlǝ nacau male mǝɓuɓɓuki. Pǝlǝa à ɗiban ama, <<Nggearǝì ka, muna mala Yisǝfu nda man re?>>
LUK 4:23 Yesu nea wia ama: Ɓafo ka wun nǝ̀ nam mǝnia yì kun-nacau ka, ama, <<Mǝsonzǝo, sonzǝ ɓamuro!>> Ɗǝm ngga wun nǝ̀ nam ama, <<Agir mǝnana sǝm ok ama a pakkia a Kapanahum ngga, pea kani a là mo.>>
LUK 4:24 Ən nggǝ bangga wun mǝsǝcau, kǝ mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli pà kàm mǝnana à earnǝi a là male ka ɗàng.
LUK 4:25 Ən nggǝ na wun mǝsǝcau ama, amā-lú ndakam pas a nzali Isǝrayila a nza mala Iliya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli a bàkú mǝnana mbulo came pǝlǝa tàrú nǝ tsùrú, sǝ nggea nzal-gula kpa a nzali kat ka.
LUK 4:26 Kat anggo ka Ɓakuli tasǝ Iliya a ban kǝɓwa ateà ɗàng, she a ban ɓe mā-lú a Zarefat, a bu-nzali Sidon kano kuko.
LUK 4:27 Amǝdakali ndakam pas a nzali Isǝrayila a nza mala Elisha mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli, kat anggo ka Ɓakuli sonzǝ kǝɓwa ateà ɗàng, she kǝ Naaman, bǝri ɓwa Suriya.
LUK 4:28 Aɓwana mǝnana kat a ndakpapi ka bumia lúllô lang à ok amǝnia yì acau ka.
LUK 4:29 Pǝlǝa à lo à ramgi ta Yesu, à pusǝì anzǝm la, à um nǝi amur muna-nkono mǝnana la malea cam amurí ka, ama à nǝ̀ ramte ɓǝ̀ kpa.
LUK 4:30 Kara gya kutio a nre ɓwabundǝa, bwal njar male aban o.
LUK 4:31 Pǝlǝa Yesu sulǝo aban ká Kapanahum, ɓè la aɓa bu-nzali Galili. A pwari usǝlǝo ka tita kani aɓwana gìr.
LUK 4:32 À ndali nǝ kanigìr male acemǝnana cau male ka ndanǝ rǝcandǝa.
LUK 4:33 Aɓa ndakpapi ka, ɓeɓwa ndakam nǝ kukwar arǝì. Lo mak'zwalo bàng-bàng kǝ na ama,
LUK 4:34 <<Oi! Mana a alkite arǝ sǝm, we Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat. A yiu ace wal sǝm le? Ən súrǝ́nà rǝo, a nda Ɓwa Mǝfele mala Ɓakuli.>>
LUK 4:35 Yesu sà arǝì ama, <<Gìr kuno più! Purî rǝì!>> Pǝlǝa kukwar loasǝi me a nzali a ɓadǝm ɓwapǝndǝa kat, pǝlǝa purî rǝì, tsǝki wi penye ɗàng.
LUK 4:36 Ɓwapǝndǝa kat ndali, à kǝ nea rǝia ama, <<Ulang ya kanigir nda man? Nǝ nacau sà'arǝban andǝ rǝcandǝa mǝgule sǝ kǝ pusǝ akukwar!>>
LUK 4:37 Kara cau mala Yesu akiban kat a bu-nzali malea.
LUK 4:38 Yesu pǝlǝa purî ɓá Ndakpapi kutio a ɓala mala Shiman. Nkil Shiman ngga ɓauwa gandǝi nongsǝi. Pǝlǝa à zǝmbi Yesu ɓǝ̀ sonzǝi.
LUK 4:39 Yesu kū`ndǝó amurí sǝ gim ɓauwa, pǝlǝa ɓauwa sùlǝî rǝì. Kara long nǝ lo àkǝ̀ banì pea wia girlina.
LUK 4:40 Lang pwari nda rǝ kpa ka, ɓwapǝndǝa yiu nǝ amǝkwánó ɗàngɗáng, pǝlǝa tsǝk buì amur koyan aɓalǝia ka, twalia wia ban rǝkwana kat.
LUK 4:41 Ɗǝm ngga akukwar purî rǝ aɓwana pas, à kǝ loasǝ già ama, <<A nda Muna mala Ɓakuli.>> Yesu gimbia, eare ama ɓǝà na kǝ cau ɗàng, acemǝnana à sǝlǝna ama yì ka, nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban.
LUK 4:42 Nǝ tadǝmbari ka Yesu lo o a ban mǝnana kǝɓwa pà kàm raka. Ɓwapǝndǝa camarǝ alte. Lang à kumǝni ka, à ɓariki à nǝ̀ kàsǝ̀kúni acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ kǝa nyia ɗàng.
LUK 4:43 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Dumǝnam púp mǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban mala Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli arǝ aɓea lá gbal, acemǝnana àkǝ̀ ce sǝ à túrǎm.>>
LUK 4:44 Pǝlǝa kutio aban hamnǝ cau arǝ andakpapi, a nzali Yahudi.
LUK 5:1 Ɓè pwari mwashat Yesu naban came a kun Garang Jenasaret, ɓwapǝndǝa nggiki kàrì aɓalǝu aban ok cau mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 5:2 Mǝsǝì kpa arǝ awaru ɓari a kun mur. Amǝtalea kpashia, à ndaban lákkí andámbú malea.
LUK 5:3 Pǝlǝa Yesu eauwe aɓa waru man mwashat ka, mala Shiman. Ne wi ama ɓǝ̀ tasǝ ta waru a ɓá mùr bǝti nǝ kunmur. Pǝlǝa dum nǝ do a waru sǝ kǝ kani aɓwana gir.
LUK 5:4 Lang malǝna cau ka, pǝlǝa ne Shiman ama, <<Soa waru ɓǝ̀ kya ban mǝlime a mùr, sǝ wu túr ndámbú ace bwal nji.>>
LUK 5:5 Shiman eari wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, sǝm mal dù aban tanni, sǝ ko sǝm bwal kǝgìr ɗàng. Sǝ acemǝnana awu nǝ na ka, mǝ nǝ túr ndámbú.>>
LUK 5:6 Lang à túrna ndámbú ka, à bwal nji lùmsǝ ndámbú, gandǝa ndámbú tita sana.
LUK 5:7 Pǝlǝa à tunǝ aɓia mǝnana aɓa ɓe waru ka, ɓǝà yi bwalia wia. À yì lumsǝ amǝnia yì awaru ɓari ka nǝ nji, gandǝa awaru tita ko a mùr.
LUK 5:8 Lang Shiman Bitǝrus sǝn mǝnia yì gir ka, kpa a ɓadǝm Yesu sǝ na ama, <<Mǝ nda yan sǝ awu nǝ came abanam, Mǝtalabangŋo, mim ngga mǝ nda mǝ'cauɓikea.>>
LUK 5:9 Yì andǝ aɓi ka à ndali nǝ làkkì mala nji mǝnana à bwal ka.
LUK 5:10 Anggo gbal sǝ aɓi amǝtúró mala Shiman, yia Jemis andǝ Yohana, amuna mala Zabadi ndali. Yesu pǝlǝa ne Shiman ama, <<Ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakko ɗang, twal ado ka, aɓwana na a nǝ nggǝ bwalia ɓǝa yiu abanam ngga, anji na ɗang.>>
LUK 5:11 Pǝlǝa à yì kpashi awaru a nza, sǝ à nying koya gir ka, à o atà Yesu.
LUK 5:12 A ɓekǝ pwari ka Yesu nda a ɓè là. Ɓè ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝ kwánó dakali ka yiu a banì. Lang sǝn Yesu ka, kara yi ɓunno a ɓadǝmbi, sǝ zǝmbi wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, ɓǝ̀ a nǝ ear ka, a nǝ gandǝ twàlâm-ban dakali mǝnia a rǝàm ngga, ɓǝn ɓoarnsari.>>
LUK 5:13 Yesu lǝmdǝ buì je, ne wi ama, <<Ən earǝna, dakali mo ka à langŋǝ́nì, ɓǝ̀ rǝo malâ.>> Àkǝ̀ banì kara dakali malâ.
LUK 5:14 Yesu pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Kǝa ne kǝɓwa ce ɗàng, bwal njar kyane a ban pǝris ɓǝ̀ pelǝkio; sǝ wu pa ɓoro mǝnana Musa tsǝa ama ɓǝa pà ka, ace mǝnana koyan ngga ɓǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama rǝo sonzǝna.>>
LUK 5:15 Kat andǝ amani ka cau amur Yesu akiban, gandǝa ɓwabundǝa yiu ace ok cau male andǝ kum twalban akwánó mǝnana a rǝia ka.
LUK 5:16 Sǝ pak ka Yesu kǝ o arǝ ban mǝnana kǝɓwa pà kàm raka ace pak hiwi.
LUK 5:17 Ɓè pwari mwashat Yesu ka nda ban kanigir, amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa mǝnana à purkio arǝ amuna-là ɗàngɗáng aɓalǝ abu-nzali Galili andǝ Yahudi, andǝ Urǝshalima ka, à ndakam aban do. Sǝ Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli ka nda te ace sonzǝ amǝ rǝkwana.
LUK 5:18 Aɓea ɓwana yiu nǝ mǝkwánó rǝwuna, à twali a kala. À ɓariki à nǝ̀ kútí nǝi a ɓala, à nǝ̀ nggá nongsǝi a ɓadǝm Yesu.
LUK 5:19 Lang à kum njar mǝnana à nǝ̀ kútí nǝi raka, ace làkkì mala ɓwabundǝa ka, à pǝlǝa à eauwe amur kurǝm, à mǝn ban, sǝ à sùlǝì andǝ kala male a ɓadǝm Yesu aɓalǝ aɓwana.
LUK 5:20 Lang Yesu sǝn gūliarǝu malea ka, pǝlǝa ne mǝkwánó ama, <<Ɓiam, à twalǝno ban acauɓikea mo.>>
LUK 5:21 Amalǝm Nggurcau andǝ amǝ Farisi tita ndali nǝ ɓabumia ama, <<Yana mǝnia yì ɓwa kǝ ak bancame mala Ɓakuli ka! Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli nǝmurǝì raka, yana nǝ̀ twalban cauɓikea!>>
LUK 5:22 Yesu súrǝ̀ ɗenyicau malea pǝlǝa ɗia ma, <<Ace mana sǝ wu kǝ ɗikiban a ɓabum wun amur man yì cau ka?
LUK 5:23 Mǝ ye nda kwano kútì ɓì, ɓǝà na ama, <À twalǝno ban acauɓikea mò le> ko ɓǝà na ama, <Lo, wu gya?>
LUK 5:24 Sǝ ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ wu sǝlǝ ama Muna mala Ɓwa ka ndanǝ rǝcandǝa amur ɓanza nǝ̀ twalban cauɓikea ka, mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝa wun.>> Pǝlǝa ne mǝkwánó rǝwuna ama, <<Lo, twal kala mò o a ɓala!>>
LUK 5:25 Anggo ka kara lo cam nǝ came a ɓadǝmbia, twal kala mǝnana nongŋo amurí ka, o a ɓala, kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli.
LUK 5:26 Koyan ngga ndali, sǝ à kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli. Muria kàrria kǝ̀rkǝ́r, à na ama, <<Sǝm sǝnǝna agir gyamiban yalung.>>
LUK 5:27 Anzǝm man ngga Yesu puro pǝlǝa sǝn mǝ'ak boalo-cemi, lùllǝì ama Lawi, dumǝna aɓa mǝdanki cemi. Yesu ne wi ama, <<Lo, yiu atàm.>>
LUK 5:28 Lawi par buì lo, nying girbunda kat o atè.
LUK 5:29 Pǝlǝa Lawi tunǝ pakkiɗire mǝgule mala li girlina ace Yesu a ɓala male. Sǝ pas aɓalǝ aɓwabundǝa mǝnana aban li ateà ka amǝ'ak boalo-cemi na.
LUK 5:30 Sǝ aɓea amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau malea nggwani aban alaggana mala Yesu ama, <<Palang sǝ wu kǝ lili, wu kǝ nuki agir wunǝ amǝ'ak boalo-cemi andǝ amǝ'cauɓikea, aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kpata Nggurcau mala Musa raka.>>
LUK 5:31 Yesu earia wia ama, <<Aɓwana mǝnana rǝia bang ngga à alkiyita mǝsonzǝo ɗang, amǝ rǝkwana na à alkiyita mǝsonzǝo ka.
LUK 5:32 Ən yiu ace tunǝ amǝ'cauɓoarna ɗang, ǝn yiu ace amǝ'cauɓikea ɓǝa nyare aban Ɓakuli.>>
LUK 5:33 Aɓea ɓwana ne Yesu ama, <<Alaggana mala Yohana ka à kǝ gilmùr, sǝ à kǝ pak hiwi tùtù. Anggo gbal sǝ alaggana mala amǝ Farisi kǝ pa. Sǝ amo yì alaggana ka à came arǝ li sǝ à kǝ nu.>>
LUK 5:34 Yesu earia wia ama, <<Wu nǝ̀ tsǝk agyajam mala bura-māfela ɓǝa gilmùr yi mǝnana nda tea più ka le?
LUK 5:35 Pwari na kǝ yiu ka, mǝnana à nǝ̀ twal bura-māfela a rǝia ka. Amǝno yì pwari ka sǝ à nǝ̀ gilmùr.>>
LUK 5:36 Pǝlǝa nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka, ama: Kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ san kun nggubyau mǝbǝshe, sǝ nǝ̀ mbàkìnà mǝ'e nǝi ɗàng. Ɓǝ̀ pè anggo ka, sanǝna nggubyau mǝbǝshe, sǝ mbàkì mana sannì arǝ nggubyau mǝbǝshe ka pà nǝ̀ ak rǝarǝia andǝ mǝ'e ɗang.
LUK 5:37 Sǝ kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ so mur anap mǝbǝshe aɓa du mǝ'e nǝ̀ funyi kúni ɗang. Ɓǝ̀ pè anggo ka mùr-anap mǝbǝshe mǝno ka nǝ̀ ar du, nǝ̀ sukkio, sǝ du ka nǝ̀ ueɓà.
LUK 5:38 Mùr-anap mǝbǝshe ka aɓa du mǝbǝshe sǝ à nǝ̀ soé.
LUK 5:39 Sǝ kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ nu mur anap mǝ'e, sǝ nǝ̀ earce mǝbǝshe ɗang. Acemǝnana nǝ̀ na ama, <<Mǝ'e ɓoaro kútì mǝbǝshe.>>
LUK 6:1 A ɓe pwari Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo mala amǝ Yahudi, Yesu ar aɓalǝ aɓaban-mǝsa. Alaggana male kǝ harki kir mǝssa sǝ à kǝ bik a ɓabuia à kǝ she.
LUK 6:2 Aɓea amǝ Farisi bang ama, <<Palang sǝ wu kǝ pak gir mǝnana ɓoaro ɓǝa pe a pwari usǝlǝo raka?>>
LUK 6:3 Yesu earia wia ma, <<Wu malaká ɓal gir mǝnana murǝm Dauda pe, yi mǝnana yì andǝ aɓwana mana atè nzala walia ka re?
LUK 6:4 Mǝnana Dauda kutio a Nda mala Ɓakuli, twal bǝredi mǝfele, mǝnana nzongcau tsǝa ama kǝ apǝris na nǝmurǝia à nǝ̀ li ka, pǝlǝa li sǝ pe aɓwana mǝnana atè ka à li.>>
LUK 6:5 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama, <<Muna mala Ɓwa ka Mǝtalabangŋo na amur Pwari Sabbat.>>
LUK 6:6 A ɓe pwari Sabbat ɗǝm ngga Yesu kutio a Ndakpapi aban kanigir. Ɓè ɓwa nakam mǝnana buì mǝlì wu ka.
LUK 6:7 Amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa camarǝ alta cau mǝnana à nǝ̀ tsǝki Yesu arǝì ka. À tsǝki wi mǝsǝu à nǝ̀ sǝni ko nǝ̀ twalban rǝkwana a pwari Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo.
LUK 6:8 Sǝ Yesu ka súrǝ́nà rǝ ɗenyicau malea, pǝlǝa ne mǝbuwuna ama, <<Lo, yiu cam a ɓadǝm ɓwapǝndǝa kat.>> Nda lo came abanì.
LUK 6:9 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ma, <<Ən nggǝ ɗì wun, mǝ ye na Nggurcau mala Musa eara sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm pè a pwari Sabbat? Ɓǝà pak mǝɓoarne le ko ɓǝà pak mǝɓane, ɓǝà amsǝ yilǝmu le ko ɓǝà kiɗiki?>>
LUK 6:10 Pǝlǝa sǝnia kàrìban kat sǝ ne mǝbuwuna ama, <<Sárǝ́ buo.>> Pǝlǝa sárǝ́ buì, kara buì sonzǝ àkǝ̀ banì.
LUK 6:11 Sǝama amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa ka bumia lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r, à tita banggia rǝia gìr mǝnana à nǝ̀ pak nǝ Yesu ka.
LUK 6:12 Aɓalǝ anonggio mǝno ka, Yesu o a bum nkono nǝ̀ ká pàk hiwi. Bankwari aban hiwi a ban Ɓakuli.
LUK 6:13 Ban fana ka tunǝ alaggana male rambia pǝlǝa tàr lum-nong-ɓari mǝnana tunǝia ama amǝ'mishan ngga.
LUK 6:14 À nda ka Shiman (mǝnana tsǝki wi lullǝu ama Bitǝrus ka), andǝ Andǝru (mǝ'eam Bitǝrus), andǝ Jemis, andǝ Yohana, andǝ Filip, andǝ Batalomi,
LUK 6:15 andǝ Matiu, andǝ Toma, andǝ Jemis (muna mala Alfiyus), andǝ Shiman (mǝnana à tunǝki ama ɓwa mana earkiyi ace la male raka),
LUK 6:16 andǝ Yahuda (muna mala Jemis), sǝ Yahuda Iskariyoti (mǝnana yi kúrkúró nǝ Yesu ka).
LUK 6:17 Lang à sùlǝ́nì múr nkono ka, Yesu yi came a ɓe palban. Aɓea alaggana male ndakam pas aban rambǝa. Aɓwabundǝa pas mǝnana à purkio aɓa nzali Yahudi, andǝ Urǝshalima andǝa mǝnana a bu-nzali mala amǝ Taya andǝ Sidon mana a kun nggeamùr ka, à ndakam gbal.
LUK 6:18 À yiu ace ok cau male andǝ kum sonzǝban mala arǝkwana malea. Amǝnana gbal akukwar kǝ pea wia tanni ka, akukwar purî rǝia kat.
LUK 6:19 Aɓwana kat ɓariki ama à nǝ̀ je rǝì, acemǝnana rǝcandǝa kǝ puro arǝì kǝ sonzǝia kat.
LUK 6:20 Yesu loasǝ mǝsǝì sǝn amǝtè sǝ nea wia ama: Wu ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli wun amǝ'tǝ̀r, acemǝnana Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka ma'wun na.
LUK 6:21 Wu ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli, yì wun mǝnana wu kǝ ok nzala ado ka, acemǝnana à nǝ̀ ɗǝmsǝ wun. Wu ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli, wun man wu kǝ ɓua ado ka, acemǝnana wun nǝ̀ ngga oalo.
LUK 6:22 Wu ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli, wun mana ɓwapǝndǝa kǝ ɓinǝ mǝsǝ wun, à kǝ tar wun kǝla amǝɓane, à kǝ sanggi wun, à kǝ tunǝa wun ɓealɓikea, atàcau mem ngga!
LUK 6:23 Wu pak bumpwasǝa a mǝno yì pwari ka, wu yalke nǝ banɓoarnado, acemǝnana a kùli ka tangnakusǝ wun ngga mǝgule na. Anggo sǝ atárrià pakki amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 6:24 Sǝa ma caukwanban na nǝ wun, wun amǝkume, acemǝnana wu angŋa dǝmba wu kumǝna ma'wun yì girikiban!
LUK 6:25 Caukwanban na nǝ wun mǝnana wu ɗǝmna ado ka, acemǝnana nzala nǝ̀ wal wun. Caukwanban na nǝ wun mana wu kǝ oal ado ka, acemǝnana wu nǝ̀ keban, wu nǝ̀ ɓua.
LUK 6:26 Caukwanban na nǝ wun mǝnana koyan ngga kǝ ɓwangsǝ wun ngga, acemǝnana anggo sǝ akeâ a pwarian ɓwangsǝ amǝ'ɓangnǝa mǝ'nyir nì.
LUK 6:27 Sǝama ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, wun mǝnana wu kǝ oem ngga: Wu earce aɓiwun amǝbura, aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ ɓinǝmǝsǝ wun ngga, wu pakkia wia mǝɓoarne.
LUK 6:28 Aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ su wun ngga, wu tsǝkia wia bu. Aɓwana mǝnana ce wun kǝ shiria ka, wu pakkia wia hiwi.
LUK 6:29 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa kweo a takiro ka, pǝlǝi wi ɓe takiro gbal. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɓwa ak nggea daura mo a rǝo ka, ce a ginǝì wi ɓǝ̀ twal muna-daura mo ɗang.
LUK 6:30 Ɓwa mǝnana kat zǝmbǝo ka, pe wi. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ koyan twalgir mǝnana mona ka, kǝa na ama a nǝ é ɗang.
LUK 6:31 Pakki aɓwana gir mǝnana a kǝ earce ama ɓǝa pakko ka.
LUK 6:32 Sǝ ɓǝà aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ earce wun, à nda wu earki cea ka, ya tsǝkbu nda wun nǝ̀ kùmô aɓalǝi? Ko nggearǝ <<amǝ'cauɓikea>> ka à kǝ earce aɓwana mǝnana amǝ'earcea na ka.
LUK 6:33 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ kǝ aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ pakka wun pepè, à nda wun nǝ̀ pakkia wia mǝɓoarne ka, ya tsǝkbu nda wun nǝ̀ kùmô aɓalǝi? Ko nggearǝ <<amǝ'cauɓikea>> ka anggo sǝ à kǝ pa.
LUK 6:34 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ aɓwana mǝnana wu pākia wia tangna ka, à nda kǝ amǝnana wu kǝ tsǝkɓalǝ wun arǝia ama à nda à nǝ̀ gandǝ mbwe wun tangnê ka, ya tsǝkbu nda wun nǝ̀ kùmô aɓalǝi? Ko nggearǝ <<amǝ'cauɓikea>> ka à kǝ peâ <<amǝ'cauɓikea>> tangna acemǝnana ɓǝà yi mbwea kat gìr mǝnana à pa ka.
LUK 6:35 Wun ngga, wu earce aɓiwun amǝbura, wu pakkia wia mǝɓoarne. Wu pea wia tangna, sǝ wu kǝa tsǝkɓalǝu ama à nǝ̀ mbwe wun ɗàng. Sǝ tangnakusǝ wun nǝ̀ gulo, sǝ wun nǝ̀ duk amuna mala Tár wun Ɓakuli mǝnana Karban nǝ Gulo kat ka. Acemǝnana yì ka, kǝ lǝmdǝ ɓwamuru male, ko aban amǝtǝmbu andǝ amǝ'ɓealɓikea.
LUK 6:36 Wu duk amǝ sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr, kǝla mǝnana Tár wun ngga ndanǝ mǝsǝswatǝr ka.
LUK 6:37 Wu kǝa wu sǝn cauɓikea mala aɓwana ɗang, sǝ wun gbal ka à pà nǝ̀ sǝn cauɓikea ma'wun ɗàng. Wu kǝa ɓashi aɓwana ɗàng, sǝ à pà nǝ̀ ɓashia wun gbal ɗàng. Wu twalbani, sǝ à nǝ̀ twala wun banì.
LUK 6:38 Wu pǎ, sǝ à nǝ̀ pà wun gbal. Kārè mǝɓoarne mǝnana à pàrrí, sǝ à dǝkǝri kǝ sukki ka, nda à nǝ̀ solǝa wun ngga. Acemǝnana tasau mana wu kārǝia aɓwana nǝi ka, kǝ nda à nǝ̀ kārǝa wun nǝi ka.
LUK 6:39 Yesu nyare nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka: Nte nǝ̀ gandǝ bwalì nte gara le? Yia kǝm ngga à pà nǝ̀ kpa a tūli re?
LUK 6:40 Mǝ'eaulǝki gìr ka kútí malǝm male ɗàng. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana à kanǝnì wi gìr pepè ka, nǝ̀ pa kǝla malǝm male.
LUK 6:41 Palang sǝ mǝsǝo ueo arǝ kǝkar mǝnana a mǝsǝ ɓio ka, sǝ a tsǝkiro arǝ gbǝlang nggun mǝnana a mò yì mǝsǝu ka ɗàng?
LUK 6:42 Palang sǝ awu nǝ ne mǝ'eambo ama, <<Mǝ'eambǝam, came mǝ pyaupo kǝkar mǝnana a mǝsǝo ka,>> yi mǝnana a gandǝ sǝn gbǝlang nggun mana a mò yì mǝsǝu raka? We mǝ'swarki ɓamuru! Pusǝ gbǝlang nggun mǝnana a mǝsǝo ka peatu, sǝ a nǝ gandǝ sǝnban pepè mǝnana a nǝ pyau kǝkar mǝnana a mǝsǝ ɓio ka.
LUK 6:43 Nggun mǝɓoarne pà nǝ̀ pusǝ ɓǝle mǝɓane ɗàng. Sǝ nggun mǝɓane pà nǝ̀ pusǝ ɓǝle mǝɓoarne gbal ɗàng.
LUK 6:44 Koya nggun ngga à kǝ súrǝì arǝ ɓǝle. Aɓwana kǝ tūki ɓǝla-vwari arǝ nggun-zwe ɗang, ko ɓǝla-nɓau aɓalǝa ankwarki ɗàng.
LUK 6:45 Ɓwa mǝɓoarne ka, mǝɓoarne mǝnana lùmsǝ ɓabumi ka, nda kǝ puro a kúni ka. Sǝ ɓwa mǝɓane ka kǝ pusǝ mǝɓane mǝnana lùmsǝ ɓabumi ka. Gìr mǝnana lùmsǝ ɓabum ɓwa ka, nda kǝ pur a kúni ka.
LUK 6:46 Ace mana sǝ wu kǝ tunǝam ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, Mǝtalabangŋo,>> sǝ wu kǝ pak gìr mǝnana ǝn bangga wun ngga ɗàng?
LUK 6:47 Ɓwa mǝnana kǝ yiu abanam, kǝ kwakikiri arǝ cau mem, sǝ kǝ tsǝi aɓa túró ka, mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝa wun lang sǝ ɓwe pa.
LUK 6:48 Yì ka, nda kǝla ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ ɓak ɓala male ka, tǝm tūli mǝlime, sǝ kwakita kusǝɓǎ amur tali. Lang mùr longŋa yiu akiban ngga, mùrɓangŋa yi wal ɓǎ man, sǝ ko dǝurǝ ɗang, acemǝnana à kwákítè amur tali.
LUK 6:49 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana ok cau mem sǝ tsǝi aɓa túró raka, nda kǝla ɓwa mǝnana ɓak ɓala amur sala, ko tǝm kusǝì raka. Lang mùrɓangŋa yi wal mǝnia yì ɓala ka, kara ɓala kanggia kpa gbǝrǝrǝm.
LUK 7:1 Lang Yesu malǝna banggi aɓwana amǝnia yì acau ka, pǝlǝa kutio o a Kapanahum.
LUK 7:2 Aɓa mǝnia yì la ka guro mala ɓe ɓwamǝgule soje mala amǝ Roma, mǝnana earkiyi ace raka, nongkwánó yi bwal kun-lú.
LUK 7:3 Sǝ lang ɓwamǝgule soje man ok ce Yesu, túr aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi a baní, ɓǝà zǝmbi wi ɓǝ̀ yiu ɓǝ̀ yi twali guro male ban rǝkwana.
LUK 7:4 À yiu a ban Yesu à yì zǝmbi wi nǝ ɓabumia mwashat ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka ɓoaro wu bwalì wi kàm!
LUK 7:5 Yì ka, kǝ earce nzali ma'sǝm, ɗǝm ngga ɓakka sǝm Ndakpapi.>>
LUK 7:6 Yesu pǝlǝa bwal njargula aban ká andǝia. Gbàshìnà ban ɓala ka, ɓwamǝgule soje man túr agyajam male ɓǝà ne Yesu ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, kǝa pè ɓamuro tanni ɗang, acemǝnana ǝn kārǝa wu kutio a ɓala mem ɗàng.
LUK 7:7 Sǝ ǝn sǝni ka ǝn kārǝa mǝ nǝ ká a bano ɗàng. Bangcau àkǝ̀ ban mǝnana a ndakam ngga, sǝ guro mem nǝ̀ kum rǝcandǝa.
LUK 7:8 Acemǝnana mim nǝ ɓamúràm ngga, mǝ nda aɓata ɓwa, nǝ asoje a ɓatam. Ɓǝ̀ ǝn ne man ama, <O> ka, nǝ̀ ká, sǝ ɓǝ̀ ǝn ne ɓwa mǝno ama, <Yiu> ka, nǝ̀ yiu gbal. Ɓǝ̀ ǝn ne guro mem ama, <Pak mǝnia ka> nǝ̀ pè.>>
LUK 7:9 Lang Yesu ok man yì cau ka, ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r, pǝlǝ rǝì aban ɓwabundǝa mǝnana à kǝ yiu atè ka, nea wia ama, <<Ən nggǝ na wun, ǝn malaká kum gūliarǝu mǝgule ulang man aɓa nzali Isǝrayila ɗang!>>
LUK 7:10 Lang aɓwana mǝnana à túriá à nyarǝna a ɓala ka, à kya kum guro man, rǝì bǎng.
LUK 7:11 A nzǝmi bǝti ka, Yesu o a la mǝnana à tunǝki ama Nayi ka. Alaggana male andǝ aɓwabundǝa kǝ̀rkǝ́r o atè.
LUK 7:12 Lang gbàshìnà kun la ka, à je andǝ aɓea ɓwana mǝnana à twalǝna lú-mǝlagga à nǝ̀ nggǝ purni ka. Yì lú ka ndà kǝ̀ muna-ɓwabura mwashat a bu nggè. Sǝ nggè ka mā-lú na. Ɓwabunda pas mǝnana a le ka à puro atè.
LUK 7:13 Lang Mǝtalabangŋo sǝn ɓwama man ngga, mǝsǝswatǝr male bwali, pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Ce a ɓua ɗang!>>
LUK 7:14 Pǝlǝa kutio tsǝk buì arǝ kal-lú. Amǝ twal lú pǝlǝa à cam gǝs. Sǝ Yesu na ama, <<Lagga, ǝn nggǝ no ama wu lo!>>
LUK 7:15 Lú kara lo dum nǝ do, tita nacau, pǝlǝa Yesu nyesǝi pe nggè.
LUK 7:16 Ko yan ngga gir nî karmuri, pǝlǝa à ɓwangsǝ Ɓakuli, à kǝ na ama, <<Ɓè mǝɓangnǝa mǝgule pusǝna rǝì aban sǝm. Ɓakuli yina ace amsǝ aɓwana male!>>
LUK 7:17 Cau mala gir mǝnia Yesu pe ka, akiban aɓa nzali Yahudi andǝ acili alá mǝnana à kàrì banì ka.
LUK 7:18 Alaggana mala Yohana yi banggi wi agir mǝnana kat Yesu pea ka. Pǝlǝa Yohana tunǝ aɓwana ɓari ateà,
LUK 7:19 sǝ tasǝia aban Mǝtalabangŋo ɓǝa kya ɗì ama, <<A nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban, mǝnana sǝm nggǝ kundǝ ka le, ko ɓǝ̀ sǝm kundǝ ɓeɓwa ɗàng?>>
LUK 7:20 Lang aɓwana man yina aban Yesu ka, à yì na ama, <<Yohana Mǝbatisǝma túr sǝm a bano, ɓǝ̀ sǝm yì ɗio ama, <A nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana sǝm nggǝ kundǝ ka le, ko ɓǝ̀ sǝm kundǝ ɓeɓwa ɗàng?> >>
LUK 7:21 Àkǝ̀ banì Yesu twalia aɓwana pas ban akwánó andǝ arǝpangŋa malea, pusǝki akukwar arǝ aɓwana, sǝ mǝn mǝsǝ ante.
LUK 7:22 Pǝlǝa ne aɓwana mǝnana Yohana túriá ka ama, <<Wu nyare wu kya banggi Yohana agir mǝnana wu sǝn andǝ mǝnana wu ok ka. Ante kǝ sǝnban, aman à gbakǝri a kusǝia ka à lo à kǝ gya, amǝkwánó-dakali ka à kǝ twalia wia ban dakali malea, amǝkir'ara kǝ okban, à kǝ loasǝ alú, sǝ Cau Amsǝban ngga à kǝ hamnǝi a ban amǝ'tǝ̀r.
LUK 7:23 Ɓwa mǝnana makgìr cau mem raka ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli!>>
LUK 7:24 Anzǝm o mala aɓwana mǝnana Yohana túriá ka, Yesu tita nea ɓwapǝndǝa acau amur Yohana ama, <<Lang wu puro wu wari a ban Yohana aɓa pǝɗanban a njenza ka, mana gir nì nda wu waria sǝne? Ndǝrdangŋa mǝnana gung kǝ dǝurǝki ka nda le? Awo!
LUK 7:25 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ nda raka, mana wu waria sǝne? Ɓè ɓwa na mǝnana makki adaura mǝɓoarne arǝì ka le? Awo! Aɓwana mǝnana à makkiyi adaura mǝɓoarne sǝ à nda aɓa banɓoarna mala kume ka, à nda malea a palta.
LUK 7:26 Sǝ mana wu waria sǝne? Mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na le? E, ǝn nggǝ na wun, yì ka, kútì mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 7:27 Yohana nda ɓwa mǝnana Malǝmce bangcau amurí ama: << <Mǝ nǝ tasǝ mǝturonjar mem ɓǝ̀ ako dǝmba, mǝnana nǝ̀ gilǝkio njargula sǝ a nǝ yiu ka.>
LUK 7:28 Ən nggǝ na wun, aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à ɓǝlia a ɓanza man ngga, kǝɓwa pà kàm kútì Yohana nǝ gulo ɗang. Sǝama ɓwa mǝnana nda mǝkyauwe kat aɓata Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka ndanǝ gulo kútì.>>
LUK 7:29 Ɓwapǝndǝa kat, ko nggearǝ amǝ'ak boalo-cemi, lang à oangŋa cau mala Yesu ka, à ear kat ama, njargula mala Ɓakuli ka mǝɓoarne na, acemǝnana Yohana nǝ̀ pakkia wia batisǝma.
LUK 7:30 Sǝ amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm nggurcau ka à ginǝ kàné mala Ɓakuli mǝnana acea ka, acemǝnana à ɓinǝ ama ɓǝ̀ Yohana ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakkia wia batisǝma ɗàng.
LUK 7:31 Yesu lidǝmba nǝ cau ama: Arǝ man sǝ mǝ nǝ kànì aɓwana mǝnana a nza man ngga? À nda kǝla mana?
LUK 7:32 À nda kǝla amuna mǝnana à do a kun limo, à kǝ akia rǝia cau ama: <<Sǝm twangga wun ntetu, sǝ wu ta'nggwam ɗang; sǝm tuka wun nggyal ɓua-lú, sǝ wu ɓua ɗàng!>>
LUK 7:33 Yohana Mǝbatisǝma ka yiu kǝ li nɗǝmo ɗàng, kǝ nu mùr-anap ɗàng. Sǝ wu na ama, <<Ndanǝ kukwar atè.>>
LUK 7:34 Muna mala Ɓwa yiu kǝ li, kǝ nu, nyare wu na ama, <<Wu sǝn nggea mǝ'lǐgula, mǝ nukiagir, gyajam mala amǝ'ak boalo-cemi andǝ <amǝ'cauɓikea.> >>
LUK 7:35 Kat andǝ amani ka sǝlǝe mala Ɓakuli ka, yi lǝmdǝ rǝì mǝsǝcau na aɓalǝ atúró mala aɓwana mǝnana à é ka.
LUK 7:36 Ɓè ɓwa aɓalǝ amǝ Farisi tunǝ Yesu arǝ girlina pwarikpǝra. Pǝlǝa Yesu wari a ɓala mala ɓwa Farisi man kya do aban li.
LUK 7:37 A là mǝno ka ɓè ɓwama nda kam mǝnana à súrǝì nǝ do aɓa cauɓikea, mā-gyatarǝu na ka. Lang ok ama Yesu nda ban li a ɓala mala ɓwa Farisi ka, yiu nǝ muna-dù mǝ'ɓoarjamnì mana à lumsǝì nǝ mùrú mǝ'rǝmɓoarne, mana kúrè candǝ ka.
LUK 7:38 Yiu yi kūndǝ nǝ ban akusǝ Yesu a nzǝmi, sǝ kǝ ɓua; liu anzǝm kusǝ Yesu nǝ mǝrǝm, esǝkia nǝ nyang múrí, sǝ kùria arǝì nǝ abui; camarǝ jeki akusǝ Yesu tùtù nǝ mburkuni, sǝ kǝ hasǝia nǝ mùrú mǝ'rǝmɓoarne.
LUK 7:39 Ɓwa Farisi mǝnana tunǝ Yesu arǝ girlina ka sǝn mǝnia ka. Pǝlǝa na nǝ ɓabumi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa man ngga mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na ka, ɓǝ́ súrǝ́nà rǝ ɓwa mǝnana jekiyi rǝì, sǝ koya ulang ɓwama nda man ngga, acemǝnana mǝ'cauɓikea na.>>
LUK 7:40 Yesu eari wi ama, <<Shiman, mǝ ndanǝ cau mǝnana mǝ nǝ no ka.>> Pǝlǝa pe eare ama, <<Nam ce, Malǝm.>>
LUK 7:41 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ɓè ɓwa kǝ kpata aɓwana ɓari tangna. Ɓwa mwashat ka ak mǝsǝboalo gbǝman-tongno, sǝ ɓeɓwa ka lumi-tongno nda ak ka.
LUK 7:42 Yia kǝm ngga à gandǝ mbwe ka tangna man ɗang. Mǝpa-tangna pǝlǝa twalia wia ban mǝno yì atangna ka. Sǝ ado ka yana aɓalǝia nǝ̀ earce nǝ̀ kutibanì?>>
LUK 7:43 Shiman eari wi ama, <<A sǝne mem ngga ɓwa mǝnana tangna male kpǝm sǝ à twali wi banì ka.>> Yesu ne wi ama, <<Yàwá! A nani pepè.>>
LUK 7:44 Pǝlǝa pǝlǝ rǝì a ban ɓwama man, sǝ ne Shiman ama, <<A sǝn mǝnia yì ɓwama ka? Ən kutio a ɓala mo, a pam mur lákkí akusǝu ɗang. Sǝ ɓwama man ngga liupam akusǝam nǝ mǝrǝm male. Sǝ kǝ esǝkia nǝ nyang muri.
LUK 7:45 A gingsǝam nǝ nu kunam ɗàng, sǝ mǝnia yì ɓwama ka, kutio mem mǝni ɗār ka, ko aulǝa tù kúni arǝ nu ka kusǝam ɗàng.
LUK 7:46 A hasǝam mùrú a ɓamuram ɗàng, sǝ yì ka, hasǝam mùrú mǝ'rǝmɓoarne arǝ akusǝam.
LUK 7:47 Ace mani ka, ǝn nggǝ banggo, earcearǝu male mana gul kpǝm ngga, lǝmdǝ ama, acauɓikea mǝgule male ka à twalǝni wi bania kat. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana à twali wi banì bǝti ka, earcearǝu male gbal ka nda bǝti.>>
LUK 7:48 Yesu pǝlǝa ne ɓwama mǝno ka ama, <<À twalǝno ban acauɓikea mo.>>
LUK 7:49 Acili aɓwana mǝnana a ban li ka, a tita nea rǝia ama, <<Man yì ɓwa ka nda yana, mǝnana kǝ gandǝ twalban cauɓikea ka?>>
LUK 7:50 Pǝlǝa Yesu ne ɓwama mǝno ama, <<Paɓamuru mô amsǝno; o atà dorǝpwala mô.>>
LUK 8:1 Tù anzǝm man ngga Yesu gya arǝ alá mǝgulke andǝ amuna-là ɗàngɗáng aban hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban mala Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli. Alaggana male man lum-nong-ɓari ka, à nda atè.
LUK 8:2 Aɓea mamǝna mǝnana à pusǝ akukwar arǝia sǝ à twalia wia ban arǝkwana ka, à nda gbal atè. Amǝnia yì amamǝna ka à nda ka Maryamu (mǝnana à tunǝki ama Ɓwa Magdala), mana à pusǝ akukwar tongno-nong-ɓari arǝì ka,
LUK 8:3 andǝ Joana mālá Kuza, mǝnana kǝ ɗenyi nǝ ɓala mala Murǝm Hirǝdus ka, sǝ Suzana andǝ acilia pas. À kǝ pakki Yesu andǝ alaggana male gbasha nǝ agirkuma malea.
LUK 8:4 Lang ɓwabundǝa na arǝ ramba sǝ aɓwana na rǝ purkio arǝ alá ɗàngɗáng aban yiu aban Yesu ka, Yesu pǝlǝa nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka:
LUK 8:5 Ɓè mǝ'rya wari a ɓeale. Nda ban kok mǝsǝɓeale ka, aɓea sukkio amur njargula. Aɓwana parkia a ɓakusǝia sǝ amuna-nyal mana a kùli ka à yì tarkia.
LUK 8:6 Aɓea sukkio amur tali, lang à purna ka kara à ime, acemǝnana à kum banpwala ɗang.
LUK 8:7 Aman sukkio aɓalǝ azwe, sǝ à gulo andǝia ka, kara zwe sorǝkia.
LUK 8:8 Sǝ aman ngga à sukkio amur nzali mǝɓoarne. À puro, à gulo, à kya ɓǝla, komǝyenani ka pusǝ ɓǝle kútì mǝnana à ɓeali ka kusǝ gbǝman. Yesu bangŋǝna mǝnia yì cau ka, pǝlǝa loasǝ gi na ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝ kir okban ngga ɓǝ̀ ǒ.>>
LUK 8:9 Alaggana mala Yesu ɗì ama, mana nda ɓá mǝnia yì kanicau ka.
LUK 8:10 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama: Wun ngga à pana wun súrǝ̀ gir ɓá sǝmbǝrǝa mala Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli. Sǝ mala acili aɓwana ka, ǝn nggǝ nea wia nǝ kanicau ace mǝnana ɓǝà lùmsǝ cau ɓá Malǝmce mǝnana ama: <<À nǝ̀ soa mǝsǝia, sǝ à pà nǝ̀ sǝn kǝgìr ɗàng; À nǝ̀ kwaki kiria aban okban, sǝ ce pà nǝ̀ kpakia wia ɗàng.>>
LUK 8:11 Mǝnia ka ndà ɓá man yì kanicau: Mǝsǝɓeale ka nda cau mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 8:12 Amǝsǝɓeale mǝnana à kpa mur njargula ka, à nda ka aɓwana mǝnana à ǒ, sǝ Shetan yiu yi pwan cau mǝnana a ɓabumia ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝà kǝa pà ɓamuria ɓǝà kum àwá ka ɗàng.
LUK 8:13 Amǝnana à kpa amur tali ka, à nda ka aɓwana mǝnana à ok cau ka, à é nǝ bumpwasǝa, sǝ cau kum kutio a ɓabumia ɗàng. Paɓamuru malea ka banì sau ɗang, pwari kārǝkiban yiu ka kara à kpa.
LUK 8:14 Amǝsǝɓeale mǝnana à kpa aɓalǝ azwe ka, à nda ka aɓwana mǝnana à ak cau mala Ɓakuli, sǝ nǝnzǝ́mò ka aɗenyicau mala doɓanza andǝ alta kume, sǝ bumpina arǝ kum banɓoarnado mala gìr ɓanza, yi tsǝia ko à ɓǝl ɗàng.
LUK 8:15 Sǝ amǝsǝɓeale mǝnana a nzali mǝɓoarne ka, à nda ka aɓwana mǝnana à ok cau sǝ à bwali nǝ ɓabum mǝɓoarne mǝɓafoe ka. À lidǝmba aɓa gandǝrǝu, sǝ cau pusǝ ɓealu mǝɓoarne aɓalǝia.
LUK 8:16 Ɓwa pà nǝ̀ tsǝk bǝsa a pitǝla sǝ nǝ̀ kùmsǝi wi nkenye amurí, ko nǝ̀ oasǝi a tǝta gado ɗàng. Nǝ̀ gyari a kùli ace aɓwana mǝnana à nǝ̀ kútí ka ɓǝà sǝn tǎlaban.
LUK 8:17 Kǝgìr pà kàm a sǝmbǝrǝa mǝnana à pà nǝ̀ pusǝ ce raka, sǝ kǝgìr pà kàm mǝnana à nǝ̀ gir ce, mǝnana à pà nǝ̀ súrǝì ko tè pà nǝ̀ pur raka.
LUK 8:18 Wu tsǝkiru arǝ gir mǝnana wu kǝ ok ka. Ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝi ka, à nǝ̀ tsǝki wi ɓe amurí. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana pànǝi raka, ko mǝnana kǝ sǝni kǝla ndanǝi ka, à nǝ̀ é arǝì.
LUK 8:19 Pǝlǝa nggea Yesu andǝ amǝ'eambi yiu a baní, sǝ ace làkkì mala aɓwana ka à bwal bani ɗàng.
LUK 8:20 Pǝlǝa ɓeɓwa ne Yesu ama, <<Nggo andǝ amǝ'eambo ka, à nda ban came a nza, à kǝ earce sǝno.>>
LUK 8:21 Yesu nea wia ama, <<Nggem andǝ amǝ'eambam ngga, à nda ka ɓwana mǝnana à kǝ ok cau mala Ɓakuli sǝ à kǝ tsǝi aɓa túró ka.>>
LUK 8:22 A ɓè pwari mwashat Yesu ne alaggana male ama, <<Wu fani sǝm nǝ̀ eauwe a ɓè nkaring nggeamùr.>> Pǝlǝa à eauwe a waru aban ká.
LUK 8:23 À nda rǝ o ka, Yesu koa ntulo. Kara nggea gung mǝcandǝe longŋǝna ɓua a nggeamùr, ɓǝ́ kongsǝna waru. Yia ka à nda aɓa nggea tanni mǝgule.
LUK 8:24 Alaggana wario à kya loasǝkì a ntulo ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, Ɓwamǝgule, sǝm ndo sǝm nǝ̀ ko!>> Yesu lo pǝlǝa sà arǝ gung andǝ mur mǝnana gung kǝ loasǝki ka. Kara gung kur kǝkǝs, ban nyare pwal ɗǝong.
LUK 8:25 Yesu pǝlǝa ɗì alaggana male ama, <<Gūliarǝui ma'wun nda ke?>> Ɓangciu pakkia wia, à ndali pǝlǝa à ɗì rǝarǝia ama, <<Ya ɓwa nda man, mǝnana sa arǝ gung andǝ mur, pǝlǝa à oki wi ka!>>
LUK 8:26 Yesu andǝ alaggana male samsǝa à yàllî nggeamùr Galili à kya kpasha a bu-nzali mala amǝ Gerasin.
LUK 8:27 Lang Yesu nǝ̀ eauwe a nza ka, kara ɓè ɓwabura ndya, mǝnana ndanǝ akukwar arǝì ka. Ɓwabure pur amǝno yì la ka. Ɓwabure ka banì sauwuna oasǝ agir-nggūrǝu arǝì ɗàng, sǝ dukiyi a ɓala ɗàng, akiyi rǝì aɓalǝ aɓembe.
LUK 8:28 Lang nǝ̀ sǝn Yesu ka, kara mak'zwalo bàng-bàng, yi kpa a ɓadǝmbi, loasǝ gi kǝ̀rkǝ́r ama, <<Mana ǝn pakko, Yesu, Muna mala Ɓakuli mana Karban kat ka? Ən nggǝ zǝmbo, kǝa pam tanni ɗàng!>>
LUK 8:29 Ne anggo acemǝnana Yesu angŋǝna dǝmba sàrǝ̀nà amǝnia yì akukwar ka ɓǝà purî rǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka. Kusǝ pas ka abangŋo mǝɓane man kǝ lo arǝì. Sǝ kat andǝ amani ama aɓwana nǝ̀ taka akusǝi andǝ abui nǝ anko andǝ ansolo, sǝ à nǝ̀ tamsǝ aɓwana ɓǝà yállí ka, nǝ̀ kasǝki ansolo, nǝ̀ ɓungia anko. Pǝlǝa akukwar nǝ̀ um nǝi a ɓabondo.
LUK 8:30 Yesu ɗì ama, <<Lùllǝò a mana?>> Pǝlǝa eare ama, <<Lullǝam nda Pas.>> Bang anggo acemǝnana akukwar pas sǝ à kùtí a rǝì.
LUK 8:31 Akukwar nì camarǝ zǝmbi Yesu ama ɓǝ̀ kǝa tasǝia aɓa tūli-tàtǝkǝtè, yì tūli-bǝsa ɗàng.
LUK 8:32 A girǝi bania anggo ka, nggea domwan mala atǝmbǝrǝm-ɓala ndakam, aban likiali a bum-nkono. Akukwar nì zǝmbi Yesu ama ɓǝ̀ earia wia ɓǝà kya kutio arǝ atǝmbǝrǝm-ɓala mǝno, pǝlǝa earia wia ɓǝà kyane.
LUK 8:33 Lang akukwar purî rǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, à kya kutio arǝ atǝmbǝrǝm-ɓala. Kara domwan man kat giɓi nǝ mire a pal nkono à kya ɓunno a kun gwanyi mǝ'dāhre, à sukkio aɓa anggeamùr, à ko kat à wu mbǝtǝp.
LUK 8:34 Lang amǝ'yál atǝmbǝrǝm-ɓala sǝn gìr mǝnana kumban ngga, à sarǝa mire aban o, à kya bangce a la andǝ acilia ban aɓa bu-nzali mǝno.
LUK 8:35 Ɓwabunda puro aban ká sǝn gìr mǝnana kumban ngga. Lang à yina a ban Yesu ka, à yì kum mǝnia yì ɓwa mǝnana akukwar purî rǝì ka, aban do a ɓadǝm Yesu nǝ agir-nggūrǝu arǝì, ɗenyicau male nyarǝna arǝì, sǝ ɓangciu pakkia wia.
LUK 8:36 Aɓwana mǝno à sǝn gir nî nǝ mǝsǝia ka, à kanî aɓwana ce pusǝo mǝnana à pusǝ akukwar arǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka.
LUK 8:37 Ɓwabunda mǝnana kat a bu-nzali mǝno mala amǝ Gerasin ngga, à zǝmbi Yesu ama ɓǝ̀ upi nzali malea, acemǝnana ɓangciu pakkia wia kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Lang Yesu eauwe a waru, nǝ̀ nyare nǝ̀ o ka,
LUK 8:38 ɓwa mǝnana akukwar purî rǝì ka zǝmbi wi ama, nǝ̀ o atè. Sǝ Yesu ɓinǝe, ne wi ama,
LUK 8:39 <<Nyare a la ma'wun kya na ce nggea gìr mǝgule mǝnana Ɓakuli pakko wi ka.>> Pǝlǝa mǝnia yì ɓwa ka nyare o a la malea, camarǝ bang ce gìr mǝnana Yesu pakki wi ka.
LUK 8:40 Lang Yesu nyarǝna ka, ɓwabundǝa gingsǝi, acemǝnana à nda ban kundǝe.
LUK 8:41 Pǝlǝa ɓeɓwa, lùllǝì ama Jarus, ɓwamǝgule mala Ndakpapi, yiu yi kpa a ɓadǝm Yesu, kǝ ɓuakia rǝì ama ɓǝ̀ yiu atè a ɓala male,
LUK 8:42 acemǝnana kǝ mǝɓoarnsarile mwashat ɓǝ̀rɓǝ̀r, mǝnana ndanǝ apǝlǝa lum-nong-ɓari ka, kúni malanǝ̀ kùmsǝó. Yesu bwalǝna njargula aban ká, ɓwabundǝa mǝnana lo atè ka nggiki kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 8:43 Ɓè ɓwama nda aɓalǝia, mǝnana pak apǝlǝa lum-nong-ɓari nkila na aban sukkio arǝì. Mal girkuma male a ban amǝ'sonzǝo, sǝ kǝɓwa gandǝ sonzǝe ɗàng.
LUK 8:44 Ɓwama man kar nǝ nzǝm Yesu, je kun daura male, anggo ka kara sukkio mala nkila male came.
LUK 8:45 Yesu ɗiban ama, <<Yana ɓwe jem?>> Koyan ngga na ama ndà ɗang. Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus na ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, ɓwabundǝa kārǝio aɓalǝu, sǝ à kǝ ramgio, sǝ a kǝ ɗiban ama, <Yana ɓwe jem?> >>
LUK 8:46 Sǝ Yesu ka bang ama, <<Ɓè ɓwa jenam, ǝn sǝlǝa, acemǝnana ǝn ok rǝcandǝa puro arǝàm.>>
LUK 8:47 Lang ɓwama man sǝnǝni te ndo nǝ̀ pur ka, puro rǝì kǝ ɓǝla, yi kpa a ɓadǝm Yesu. A ɓamǝsǝ ɓwabundǝa kat, bang tǝr gir mana tsǝi sǝ je Yesu, andǝ kúmó mǝnana kum rǝpwala àkǝ̀ banì ka.
LUK 8:48 Sǝ Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ɓoarnsarilem, gūliarǝu mô arǝàm twalǝno ban rǝkwana mò, o aɓa rǝpwala.>>
LUK 8:49 Yesu na arǝ nacau più ka, ɓeɓwa pur nǝ ɓala mala Jarus, yì ɓwamǝgule mala Ndakpapi. Yi ne Jarus ama, <<Ɓoarnsarileo pangŋǝna lú. Kǝa pe Malǝm tanni ɓà ɗàng.>>
LUK 8:50 Lang Yesu ok ce ka, ne Jarus ama, <<Ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakko ɗàng, we ka tamsǝ ɓabumo, rǝ munio nǝ̀ malâ.>>
LUK 8:51 Lang à yì bwalǝna ɓala mala Jarus ka, Yesu eari kǝɓwa kutio atè ɗàng, she kǝ Bitǝrus, sǝ Yohana andǝ Jemis, sǝ tár muna andǝ ngge.
LUK 8:52 Anggo ka ɓwapǝndǝa kat à nda rǝ ɓua sǝ à kǝ keban ace. Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wu kǝa ɓua ɗàng, muna ka wu ɗàng, nda a ntulo!>>
LUK 8:53 Kara à oali oalo kyauwikiban, acemǝnana à sǝlǝna ama muna ka wuna.
LUK 8:54 Pǝlǝa Yesu bwal muna a garabui, sǝ na ama, <<Munem, lo!>>
LUK 8:55 Yilǝmi muna kara nyare, sǝ par buì lo cam nǝ came. Yesu pǝlǝa nea wia ama, ɓǝà pe wi girlina ɓǝ̀ li.
LUK 8:56 Atár muna andǝ ngge ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Pǝlǝa Yesu nunkiria, ama ɓǝà kǝa ne kǝɓwa ce gìr mǝnana kumban ngga ɗàng.
LUK 9:1 Yesu tunǝ amǝ'mishan male mǝnana lum-nong-ɓari ka, sǝ pea wia rǝcandǝa andǝ gara amur akukwar kat sǝ ɓǝa twalban rǝkwana.
LUK 9:2 Pǝlǝa tasǝia ɓǝa kya hamnǝ ce Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli, sǝ ɓǝa twali aɓwana ban rǝkwana.
LUK 9:3 Nea wia ama, <<Wu kǝa twal kǝgìr a bu wun ace gya ma'wun ɗàng. Wu kǝa twal gara-gya, ko luru, ko girlina, ko boalo, ko aɓea agir-nggūrǝu ɗang.
LUK 9:4 Koya ɓala wu sulǝ kam ngga, wu kǝa ɗeki ɓalae ɗàng, she ɓǝ̀ wu nyìngŋǝ̀nà le ka.
LUK 9:5 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ aɓwana ak wun raka, ɓǝ̀ wun nǝ̀ nying le ka wu kǝtǝri tú mǝnana a kusǝ wun ngga, acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ nakún wun amúrià.>>
LUK 9:6 Pǝlǝa à lo à ara arǝ amuna-là aban hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban andǝ twali aɓwana ban rǝkwana a koya ban.
LUK 9:7 Hirǝdus, murǝm Galili ok ce agir mǝnana à kǝ pak kat ka, muri zurǝì, acemǝnana aɓea aɓwana kǝ̀ na ama, Yohana nda à loasǝi a ɓembe ka.
LUK 9:8 Aɓea ɓwana ka à kǝ na ama Iliya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli nda yi pusǝrǝi ka, nyare aɓea ka ama, ɓekǝ mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mǝnana a pwarian ngga nda long nǝ yilǝmu ka.
LUK 9:9 Hirǝdus ka bang ama, <<Yohana ka ǝn tsǝa à kasǝ meali, sǝ yana ɓwe nda mǝnia ɗǝm ǝn nggǝ oki amǝnia yia acau amurí ka?>> Pǝlǝa alta sǝn Yesu.
LUK 9:10 Lang amǝ'mishan nyarǝna ka, à yì banggi Yesu agir mǝnana kat à pak ka. Pǝlǝa umia, yia nǝmurǝia, a ɓè la mǝnana à kǝ tunǝi ama Beseda ka.
LUK 9:11 Ɓwabunda ok ce, kara à pwan rǝia à o atè. Yesu gingsǝia, sǝ nea wia cau amur Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli, sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à yiu sǝ à nda aɓa rǝkwana ka, twalia wia ban arǝkwana malea.
LUK 9:12 Lang pwari mala nǝ̀ kpa ka, alaggana mala Yesu man lum-nong-ɓari ka, à sungŋo a baní à yì ne wi ama, <<Ɗeki ɓwabundǝa ɓǝa o arǝ amuna-là, ɓǝa kya alta girlina andǝ ban nongŋo, acemǝnana ban mǝnia sǝm ndakam ngga ɓabondo na.>>
LUK 9:13 Sǝ Yesu ka nea wia ama, <<Wu pea wia girlina ɓǝa li.>> Pǝlǝa à ne Yesu ama, <<Kǝgìr mǝnana sǝm ndanǝi ka, kǝ bǝredi tongno nda andǝ amǝnji ɓari. She ɓǝ̀ do ama ɓǝ̀ sǝm kya kur girlina ace ɓwabundǝa man kat ka.>>
LUK 9:14 Aburana mǝnana a banì ka à bwal á-tongno. Pǝlǝa Yesu ne alaggana male ama, <<Wu tsǝia ɓǝa do mbop-mbop lumi-tongno-tongno.>>
LUK 9:15 Anggo sǝ alaggana tsǝia, koyana le ka dum nǝ do.
LUK 9:16 Yesu twal abǝredi mǝnia tongno andǝ anji ɓari ka, pǝlǝa loasǝ múrí a kùli pak yàwá, sǝ ɓwanggia, pè alaggana male ɓǝà gaki ɓwabundǝa.
LUK 9:17 Yia kat à li à ɗǝmngya. Alaggana pwan cili aɓwangine mǝnana à ueo ka arǝ azace lum-nong-ɓari.
LUK 9:18 Ɓè pwari ndakam Yesu ka nda ban pak hiwi nǝmurǝì, sǝ alaggana male yiu atè, pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Ɓwabunda kǝ na ama, Mǝ nda yana?>>
LUK 9:19 À eari wi ama, <<Aɓea ɓwana ama a nda Yohana Mǝbatisǝma, aɓea ka ama a nda Iliya, mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli, sǝ aɓea ka ama a nda ɓè mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli atà mǝnana a pwarian ngga, mǝnana nyare yiu nǝ yilǝmu ka.>>
LUK 9:20 Yesu nyare ɗia ama, <<Sǝ wun, a bangŋe ma'wun ngga, mǝ nda yana?>> Bitǝrus eare ama, <<A nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana Ɓakuli turi ka.>>
LUK 9:21 Yesu nunkiria nǝ rǝcandǝa ama, ɓǝa kǝa ne kǝɓwa ɗàng.
LUK 9:22 Pǝlǝa na ama, <<Dumǝna púp Muna mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ kum tanni arǝ agir pas, sǝ akapana, andǝ agbani pǝris, andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau ka à nǝ̀ ɓinǝi. À nǝ̀ wal-luí, sǝ aɓa tàruià nongŋo ka nǝ̀ lo nǝ yilǝmu.>>
LUK 9:23 Pǝlǝa nea aɓwana kat ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana kat kǝ earce yiu atàm ngga, nǝ̀ ɓinǝ ɓamúrì,nǝ̀ twal nggun-gangndǝi male ko aya pwari ka nǝ̀ kpatam.
LUK 9:24 Ɓwa mǝnana kǝ earce amsǝ yilǝmi ka, nǝ̀ ɗwanyibanì, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana turta yilǝmi acem ngga, nǝ̀ amsǝi.
LUK 9:25 Mana gir nì nǝ̀ purî ɓwa yi mǝnana ɓǝ̀ kum ɓanza kat, sǝ ɗwanyi yilǝmi ko yilǝmi kiɗiki ka?
LUK 9:26 Ɓǝ̀ kǝsǝkya kǝ pakki ɓwa arǝàm sǝ arǝ cau mem ngga, kǝsǝkya nǝ̀ pakki Muna mala Ɓwa arǝì, a pwari mǝnana nǝ̀ yiu nǝi, aɓa ɓoarɓwa male andǝ ɓoarɓwa mala Tárrí andǝ mala amǝturonjar mǝfele ka.
LUK 9:27 Ən nggǝ bangga wun mǝsǝcau, aɓea ɓwana mǝnana à nda ban came kani ka, à pà nǝ̀ wu ɗàng, she ɓǝà sǝnǝna Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka.>>
LUK 9:28 Kǝla anzǝm nongŋo tongno-nong-tàrú, mǝnana Yesu nakiyi acau man ngga, tunǝ Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana andǝ Jemis, pǝlǝa à eauwe amur ɓe nkono ace pak hiwi.
LUK 9:29 Lang nda rǝ pak hiwi ka, ɓamǝsǝi twalo nggaɗi, sǝ agir-nggūrǝu male ka à pwasǝ tyal-tyal, kǝla linzama mala tǎlaban.
LUK 9:30 Kara aɓwana ɓari, Musa andǝ Iliya yiu, à kǝ nacau nǝi.
LUK 9:31 À pusǝ rǝia aɓa ɓoarɓwa mala kùli, aban nacau andǝ Yesu. À bang cau amur lú male, mǝnana nǝ̀ yia lùmsǝo a Urǝshalima ka.
LUK 9:32 Sǝ Bitǝrus andǝ aɓi ka à kongŋa malea a nggea ntulo. Lang mǝsǝia nǝ̀ sa ka, à sǝn ɓoarɓwa mala Yesu andǝ aɓwana mǝnia ɓari aban came andǝi ka.
LUK 9:33 Lang amǝnia yì aɓwana nda ban nying Yesu à nǝ̀ o ka, Bitǝrus pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, ndanǝ ɓoaro mǝnana sǝm nda kani ka. Sǝm nǝ̀ gilǝ agumli tàrú, mwashat ka nda aceo, mwashat ace Musa, sǝ mǝnia mwashat ka nda ace Iliya.>> Sǝ yì ka, súrǝ̀ cau mǝnana nakiyi ka ɗàng.
LUK 9:34 Nda aban nacau più ka, pǝrɓang sulǝo gìr múrià, pǝlǝa ɓangciu pakkia wia mǝnana pǝrɓang yi gìr múrià ka.
LUK 9:35 Gì Ɓakuli pur nǝ ɓá pǝrɓang na ama, <<Mǝnia ka Munem na, nda mǝnana ǝn tarrì ka, wu kwaki kir wun arǝì.>>
LUK 9:36 Lang giu nanacau ka, kara à sǝn Yesu nǝmurǝì. Alaggana man bwal ce arǝarǝia, à ne kǝɓwa ce gir mǝnana à sǝn aɓalǝ anongge ka ɗàng.
LUK 9:37 Ban fana ka, lang Yesu andǝ alaggana mǝnia tàrú sùlǝ́nì múr nkono ka, ɓwabundǝa yiu rambǝa a ban Yesu.
LUK 9:38 Ɓè ɓwa aɓa ɓwabundǝa loasǝ gì ama, <<Malǝm! Ən nggǝ zǝmbo, ɓwamur munem, nda kǝ̀ munem mwashat!
LUK 9:39 Ɓè bangŋo mǝɓane kǝ lo à rǝì, sǝ kǝ tsǝì kǝ yasǝlǝban nǝ mak'zwalo bàng-bàng. Kǝ turi aɓa dǝurǝki rǝì wak gandǝa ntāra nǝ̀ gupi a kúni. Kani lo arǝì anggo, pà nǝ̀ eare nǝ̀ nyi ɗàng she ɓǝ̀ sokkina te pà nî tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka.
LUK 9:40 Ən zǝmbi alaggana mô ɓǝà pusǝì, sǝ à gandǝi ɗàng.>>
LUK 9:41 Sǝ Yesu pǝlǝia wia ama, <<Wun a nza man ngga wu nda wu pak murcandǝa sǝ wu ɗwanyi paɓamuru a ban Ɓakuli ka! Banem nǝ̀ sau lang aban do sǝnǝa wun sǝ wun nǝ̀ kànì pak ɓè kǝgìr? Nǝ̀ ngga ká a ya pwari sǝ mǝ nǝ nggǝ twal gandǝrǝu nǝ wun?>> Pǝlǝa ne ɓwabure ama, <<Yinǝ munio kani.>>
LUK 9:42 Lang muna longŋǝna aban yiu ka, kara kukwar loasǝi gwarrì a nzali, turi aɓa mǝɓulɓul mǝ'kǝ̀rkǝ́r nì. Pǝlǝa Yesu pyau kukwar, kukwar purî rǝ muna, sǝ Yesu nyesǝì pè tárrí.
LUK 9:43 Yia kat ka à ndali nǝ gulo mala rǝcandǝa mala Ɓakuli. Lang ɓwabundǝa kat nda rǝ ndali nǝ agir mǝnana Yesu pè ka, ne alaggana male ama,
LUK 9:44 <<Wu kwaki kir wun arǝ cau mǝnana mǝ nǝ bangga wun ado ka: Muna mala Ɓwa ka à ndo à nǝ̀ me a ɓabù aɓwana amǝɓinǝ mǝsǝì.>>
LUK 9:45 Sǝ alaggana ka à súrǝ̀ ɓá mǝnia yì cau ka ɗàng. Ceì sǝmbǝrǝia wia à gandǝ bwalte ɗàng, sǝ ɓangciu pakkia wia ɓǝa ɗì amurí.
LUK 9:46 Makgìr lo aɓalǝ alaggana mala Yesu amur koyana aɓalǝia nda ɓwamǝgule kat.
LUK 9:47 Yesu súrǝ́nà ɗenyicau malea, pǝlǝa loasǝ ɓè muna tamsǝi a nkanggari,
LUK 9:48 sǝ nea wia ama, <<Koyana sǝ ɓǝ̀ ak muna kǝla mǝnia ace lullǝam ngga, angŋǝnam, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana em ngga, angŋǝna Tárrám mǝnana tasǝam ngga. Ɓwa mǝnana kutibanì kat a nongsǝmúrû aɓalǝ wun ngga, nda ɓwamǝgule ma'wun kat.>>
LUK 9:49 Pǝlǝa Yohana ne wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, sǝm sǝn ɓeɓwa aban pusǝ akukwar nǝ lùllǝò sǝ sǝm ne wi ɓǝ̀ came, ɓǝ̀ kǝa pè ɗàng, acemǝnana pà aɓalǝ sǝm ɗàng.>>
LUK 9:50 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Wu kǝa tamsǝi ɗàng, ɓwa mǝnana pà a nggaro nǝ wun raka, ma'wun na.>>
LUK 9:51 Lang pwari mǝnana Yesu nǝ̀ nyarni aban o a kùli gbashìnà ka, Yesu tsǝk muri aban ká a Urǝshalima.
LUK 9:52 Pǝlǝa tasǝ amǝ'na-túrbân à aki dǝmba aban ká a ɓè muna-là mala amǝ Samariya ɓǝà kya gilǝki ban-sulǝo.
LUK 9:53 Sǝ aɓwana mala mǝno yì muna-là ka à gingsǝi ɗàng, acemǝnana yì ka, tsǝk muri aban ká nǝ Urǝshalima.
LUK 9:54 Alaggana male, Jemis andǝ Yohana, à sǝni anggo ka pǝlǝa à ɗiban ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, ɓǝ̀ sǝm tunǝ bǝsa a kùli ɓǝ̀ yi pisǝ aɓwana mǝnia ka le?>>
LUK 9:55 Yesu pǝlǝ rǝì sà arǝ Jemis andǝ Yohana.
LUK 9:56 Pǝlǝa à kutio à o a ɓè muna-là.
LUK 9:57 À nda ban ká a njargula ka, ɓeɓwa ne Yesu ama, <<Mǝ nǝ kpato ko ayaban a nǝ ká kàm ngga.>>
LUK 9:58 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Amǝ'nzǝgban ngga à ndanǝ atūli malea, sǝ amuna-nyal mǝnana a kùli ka à ndanǝ anda, sǝ Muna mala Ɓwa ka pànǝ ban mǝnana nǝ̀ usǝlǝ kam ngga ɗàng.>>
LUK 9:59 Pǝlǝa ne ɓeɓwa ama, <<Yiu atàm.>> Sǝ ɓwe ne wi ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, cam peatu, mǝ kya tsǝkban tárrám.>>
LUK 9:60 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ɗeki alú ɓǝa tsǝk alú malea, sǝ we ka kyane kya hamnǝ Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli.>>
LUK 9:61 Nyare ɓeɓwa bang ama, <<Mǝ nǝ kpato, Mǝtalabangŋo, sǝama cam peatu mǝ nyare mǝ kya tsǝk amǝɓala mem a ndà.>>
LUK 9:62 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana nda ban rya nǝ andá, sǝ kǝ kar mǝsǝi a nzǝmi ka, kārǝa nǝ̀ kum Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ɗang.>>
LUK 10:1 Anzǝm mǝnia ka, Mǝtalabangŋo twal aɓea ɓwana lumi-tongno-nong-ɓari nǝ mǝsǝì ɓari atà amǝkpate, sǝ tasǝia ɓari-ɓari ɓǝa aki dǝmba o arǝ alá andǝ aban mǝnana yì ka, nǝ̀ ká kam ngga.
LUK 10:2 Nea wia ama: Túró pwan gir ɓaban ngga ndakam kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ amǝtúró ka à làkkì ɗàng. Ace mani ka, wu zǝmbi Mǝtala ɓaban ɓǝ̀ tasǝ amǝtúró a ɓaban.
LUK 10:3 Wu kyane! Ən nggǝ tasǝ wun kǝla amuna-nzur aɓalǝ anvwa-bondo.
LUK 10:4 Wu kǝa twal boalo, ko luru gya, ko ankura, a bu wun ɗàng, sǝ wu kǝa makki kǝɓwa kún a njargula ɗang.
LUK 10:5 Ko ya ɓala na wu kútí kam ngga, wu tite nǝ na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ dorǝpwala sulǝo a ɓala man.>>
LUK 10:6 Ɓǝ̀ mǝ'earce dorǝpwala na a ɓalae ka, makkun ma'wun ɓǝ̀ do amurí. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ pà kàm raka, makkun ma'wun ɓǝ̀ nyare atà wun.
LUK 10:7 Wu do a ɓalae, wu li, wu nu koya gir à pà wun kam ngga, acemǝnana mǝtúró ka ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ kum tangnakusǝi. Wu kǝa wu turkio arǝ aɓala ɗang.
LUK 10:8 Ɓǝ̀ ya là wu kútí kam, sǝ à ak wun ngga, wu li komana à pà wun ngga.
LUK 10:9 Wu twalia wia ban arǝkwana mǝnana abanì ka, sǝ wu nea wia ama, <<Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli yina aban wun tù.>>
LUK 10:10 La mǝnana wu kútí kam, sǝ à ak wun raka, wu puro arǝ akula malea wu na ama,
LUK 10:11 <<Ko nggearǝ tú la ma'wun mǝnana a kusǝ sǝm ngga, sǝm nggǝ kǝtǝrikia wuni. Sǝ wu sǝlǝ ama: Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka yina aban wun tù!>>
LUK 10:12 Ən nggǝ na wun, a pwari ɓashi ka, ɓashi mala Ɓakuli amur mǝno yì la ka nǝ̀ candǝe nǝ̀ kútì mala amǝ Sodom.
LUK 10:13 Caukwanban nǝ we, Korazin! Caukwanban ne we gbal Beseda! Ɓǝa agir-ndǝlǝki mǝnana à pakkia aɓalǝ wun, à pangŋǝnia a Taya andǝ Sidon ngga, ɓǝ à pwanǝna nzali ɗiɗyal, à makkina anggubyau keban a rǝia, nǝ tāpì aɓa tú.
LUK 10:14 Gìr'kwanrǝu mana nǝ̀ yiu amur wun a pwari ɓashi ka, nǝ̀ ɓike nǝ̀ kútì mǝnana nǝ̀ yiu amur amǝ Taya andǝ amǝ Sidon ngga.
LUK 10:15 Sǝ we Kapanahum ngga! A kǝ́ sǝni kǝla à nǝ̀ loasǝo aban ká kùli le? Awo! À nǝ̀ túrǒ a nzali àkǝ̀ ɓá tūli-lú!
LUK 10:16 Wun amǝ kpatam, ɓwa mǝnana kwakikiri arǝ wun ngga, nda ban kwakikiri a rǝam, ɓwa mǝnana ginǝ wun ngga, ginǝnam, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana ginǝam ngga, ginǝna Tárrám mǝnana tasǝam ngga.
LUK 10:17 Amǝkpata Yesu mǝnana lumi-tongno-nong-ɓari mǝsǝì ɓari ka à nyar nǝ bumpwasǝa à yiu à yì na ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, nggearǝ akukwar ka à kǝ oka sǝm aɓa lùllǝò!>>
LUK 10:18 Pǝlǝa Yesu pea wia eare ama, <<Ən sǝn Shetan pur a kùli aban kpa kǝla li'nzama mala mbulo.
LUK 10:19 Ən pana wun rǝcandǝa wu parki an'yau andǝ agenye sǝ wu limurǝm amur bangŋo mala ɓi'wun mǝbura, kǝgìr pà nǝ̀ kum wun ɗang.
LUK 10:20 Sǝ ban ɓǝ̀ kǝa ɓoara wun ama akukwar kǝ oka wun ɗang, wu pak bumpwasǝa ama alullǝ wun ngga à gilǝnia a kùli.>>
LUK 10:21 Amǝno yì pwari ka, Yesu lùmsǝ nǝ bumpwasǝa aɓa Bangŋo Mǝfele sǝ bang ama, <<Ən ɓwangsǝkio we Dâ, Mǝtala kùli andǝ nzali, acemǝnana a sǝmbǝrǝ amǝnia yì agir ka arǝ amǝ'sǝlǝe andǝ amǝ'súrǝ̀e, sǝ a lǝmdǝia aban amuna mǝkèke. E, Dâ, mǝnia ka nda gir mǝnana pwasǝ bumo ka.>>
LUK 10:22 <<Girbunda kat ka Tárrám nyìngŋǝ́nàm mia a buam. Kǝɓwa súrǝ̀ koyan nda Muna ɗang, she kǝ Ɓakuli Tárrú nǝmurǝì, sǝ kǝɓwa pà kàm súrǝ̀ koyan nda Tárrú ɗang, she kǝ Muni, andǝ aɓwana mǝnana Muni tarkia ama nǝ̀ lǝmdǝí abania ɓǝa súrǝì ka.>>
LUK 10:23 Pǝlǝa pǝlǝ rǝì a ban alaggana male, nea wia zàng ama, <<Amǝsǝu mǝnana à kǝ sǝn gìr mǝnana wu kǝ sǝni ka, à ndanǝ earmúrú a ban Ɓakuli!
LUK 10:24 Ən nggǝ na wun ama, amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli andǝ amurǝma ka, à kǝ earce ama à nǝ̀ sǝn gìr mǝnana wu kǝ sǝni ka, sǝ à kùmô à sǝni ɗàng. À kǝ̀ earce ok cau mǝnana wu kǝ oe ka, sǝ à kùmô à oè ɗàng!>>
LUK 10:25 A ɓekǝ pwari ka, ɓè mǝ'sǝlǝ Nggurcau mala Musa lo nǝ̀ kārǝki Yesu. Pǝlǝa ɗì ama, <<Malǝm, mana mǝ nǝ pa sǝ mǝ nǝ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka?>>
LUK 10:26 Yesu eari wi ama, <<Mana ɗe à gilǝa aɓa Nggurcau? Lang sǝ a kǝ ɓalli?>>
LUK 10:27 Ɓwe eare ama, << <Earce Ɓakuli mô nǝ ɓabumo kat, nǝ yilǝmo kat, nǝ rǝcandǝa mô kat, nǝ ɗenyicau mò kat>; sǝ wu <earce ɓio mǝkunɓala kǝla mǝnana a earce ɓamúrò ka.> >>
LUK 10:28 Yesu eari wi ama, <<A bangŋǝna mǝsǝcau. We ka, pàk anggo, awu nǝ auwa.>>
LUK 10:29 Sǝ yì ka, earce nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama ɓwarki raka, pǝlǝa ɗì Yesu ama, <<Yana nda ɓiam?>>
LUK 10:30 Yesu ne wi ama: Ɓè ɓwa lo a Urǝshalima aban ká Jeriko, kara amǝ'ɓǝmbǝriban kasǝ a kúni. À swárkì wi agir-nggūrǝì, à walki ue bǝti ɓǝ́ wuna, sǝ à o à ɗeki.
LUK 10:31 Anggo ka ɓè Pǝris twalǝna kǝ njargule aban ká. Mǝsǝì nǝ̀ yia kpa arǝì ka, kara kyanggi wi o a o male.
LUK 10:32 Sǝ anggo gbal ka ɓeɓwa Lawitwal kǝ njarnì, lang yiu yi bik banì ka mǝsǝì kpa arǝì, kara twal ɓè njar ɗàng.
LUK 10:33 Ɓè ɓwa-kúnɗàngna, ɓwa Samariya kar àkǝ̀ njargule, nǝ̀ yia sǝn ɓwa man ngga, mǝsǝswatǝr bwali.
LUK 10:34 Pǝlǝa kyang a baní, soapi wi mùrú andǝ mùr-anap amur anpenye, sǝ marǝki wi anpenye nǝ bugir. Twali tsǝì anzǝm dambǝritso male. Wari nǝi a ban-sulǝo kya ɗenyinǝi.
LUK 10:35 Ban fana ka pusǝ boalo, dinariɓari pè mǝɗenyi nǝ ban-sulǝo, ne wi ama, <<Ɗenyi nǝ mǝnia yì mǝkwánó ka. Gìr mǝnana kat a kasǝi amurí kútì mǝnia ka mǝ nǝ yia mbweo ɓǝ̀n nyarna ka.>>
LUK 10:36 A masǝlǝate ka Yesu ɗì ama, <<Ata aɓwana mǝnia tàrú ka, yana a ɗenyicau mò, nda lǝmdǝ dokunɓala arǝ ɓwa mǝnana kpa a bu amǝ'ɓǝmbǝriban ngga?>>
LUK 10:37 Mǝ'sǝlǝ Nggurcau eare ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana lǝmdǝì wi ɓwamuru ka.>> Yesu ne wi ama, <<Kyane kya pa anggo.>>
LUK 10:38 Lang Yesu andǝ alaggana male bwalna njar ka, à yì bik ɓè muna-là a ban mǝnana ɓè ɓwama, lùllǝì ama Marta, gingsǝia, ea a ɓala male ka.
LUK 10:39 Marta ka ndanǝ mǝ'eambi muna-ɓwama lùllǝì ama Maryamu, yi do a ɓadǝm Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu aban ok kànìgìr male.
LUK 10:40 Sǝ Marta ka nyesǝ ɗenyicau male arǝ atúró mǝnana ɓoaro ɓǝà pea ka. Pǝlǝa yiu a ban Yesu yi ɗì ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, kǝgìr oasǝo arǝ atúró mǝnana mǝ'eambam nyinggam a kikilam ngga re? Ne wi ɓǝ̀ bwalàm.>>
LUK 10:41 Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu ne wi ama, <<Marta, Marta, ɓabumo pi sǝ a kǝ pe rǝo tanni arǝ agir pas.
LUK 10:42 Sǝ kǝgìr mwashat nda à earkiyi ce ka, ndà kǝ mǝɓoarne mǝnia Maryamu twali ka, sǝ kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ é arǝì ɗàng.>>
LUK 11:1 Ɓè pwari mwashat Yesu na ban pak hiwi a ɓe ban. Lang malǝna ka, ɓeɓwa atà alaggana male ne wi ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, kania sǝm pak hiwi, kǝla mǝnana Yohana kani alaggana male ka.>>
LUK 11:2 Yesu nea wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ wu nǝ̀ pak hiwi ka, wu na ama: << <We Tár sǝm mǝnana a kùli ka, lùllǝò ka ɓǝà gusǝlǝi, Domurǝm mò ɓǝ̀ yiu.
LUK 11:3 Pà sǝm girlina mala yalung andǝ mala koya pwari ka.
LUK 11:4 Twala sǝm ban acauɓikea ma'sǝm, kǝla mana sǝm gbal ka sǝm nggǝ twali aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ pakka sǝm cauɓikea, banì ka. Kǝa ká nǝ sǝm aɓa kārǝkiban ɗang.> >>
LUK 11:5 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama: Ɓǝà bang ama ɓeɓwa atà wun ngga ndanǝ gyajam, sǝ wari a baní nǝ ɓadu kya ne wi ama, <<Ɓeam, pam tangna bǝredi tàrú.
LUK 11:6 Ɓè gyajam mem twal bǝri yiu abanam, sǝ ǝn panǝ kǝgìr mǝ nǝ pe wi ɗang.>>
LUK 11:7 Sǝ gyajam male eari wi nǝ ɓakurǝm ama, <<Kǝa tāki kiram ɗang! Kunkurǝm ngga à gìrnì, sǝ mim sǝnǝ amunem ngga, sǝm nongŋa nǝ nongŋo, pà mǝ nǝ gandǝ lo mǝ nǝ po kǝgìr ɗàng.>>
LUK 11:8 Ən nggǝ na wun ama, ko ɓǝ̀ pà nǝ̀ gandǝ lo nǝ̀ pe wi bǝredi, acemǝnana yì ka, gyajam male na ka, raka, sǝ ace pitau mala ɓwa mǝno ka, nǝ̀ lo nǝ̀ pe wi gir mǝnana kat pàktǝle ka.
LUK 11:9 Ace mani ka ǝn nggǝ na wun ama: Wu zǝmba, à nǝ̀ pa wun. Wu alte, wu nǝ̀ kùmô. Wu wal kunkurǝm, à nǝ̀ mǝnba wuni.
LUK 11:10 Acemǝnana ɓwa mana kat zǝm ngga, à nǝ̀ pe wi, ɓwa mana alte ka, nǝ̀ kùmô. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana gbal kat wal kunkurǝm ngga, à nǝ̀ mǝnbi wi.
LUK 11:11 Wun aɓwana mǝnana wu nda ka tárrú ka, yana aɓalǝ wun mǝnana ɓǝ̀ muni zǝmbi wi nji, nǝ̀ pe wi n'yau ka?
LUK 11:12 Ko ana raka, ɓǝ̀ zǝmbi wi nki-nggu ka, kara nǝ̀ pe wi genye?
LUK 11:13 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ wun, amǝ'ɓealɓikea, wu sǝlǝ pe amuna ma'wun aɓoro mǝɓoarne ka, sǝ koshi Tár wun mana a kùli ka! Yì ka, aɓa njar mǝnana wori mǝno ka nǝ̀ pea aɓwana mǝnana à zǝmbi wi ka, Bangŋo Mǝfele!
LUK 11:14 A ɓekǝ pwari ka, Yesu na rǝ pusǝ kukwar arǝ ɓeɓwa mǝnana kǝ gandǝ nacau raka. Lang kukwar nì purna ka, ɓwa mǝnana kǝ nacau raka, kara nacau, ɓwabundǝa ndali.
LUK 11:15 Sǝ aɓea aɓwana aɓalǝia na ama, <<Kwei, yi mǝnana gbal nǝ Be'elzebul, murǝm mala akukwar sǝ kǝ pusǝ akukwar ka.>>
LUK 11:16 Aɓea ɓwana kǝ earce tambi Yesu gbǝ́lî, pǝlǝa à ne wi ama ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝia wia gir'ndali mǝnana nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama yì ka, pur nǝ ban Ɓakuli ka.
LUK 11:17 Sǝ Yesu sǝlǝna rǝ ɗenyicau malea, pǝlǝa nea wia ama: Nzali murǝm mǝnana kat gaki ka, pà nǝ̀ cam ɗang, sǝ ɓala mǝnana gaki ka, pà nǝ̀ cam ɗang.
LUK 11:18 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ Shetan gau rǝì ka, palang sǝ domurǝm male nǝ̀ came? Ən bang anggo, acemǝnana wu na ama nǝ Be'elzebul sǝ ǝn nggǝ pusǝ akukwar.
LUK 11:19 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ ǝn nggǝ pusǝ akukwar nǝ Be'elzebul ka, amǝkpata wun ngga, nǝ mana sǝ à kǝ pusǝia? Ɓǝ̀ nda ana ka, à dumǝna wun amǝ'ɓashi nǝ ɓamuria.
LUK 11:20 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ nǝ rǝcandǝa mala Ɓakuli sǝ ǝn nggǝ pusǝ akukwar ka, Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli yina aban wun.
LUK 11:21 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwabura-ɓwa mǝnana kùrna rǝì nǝ girbura sǝ nda kǝ yál ɓala male ka, ɓala male nǝ̀ duk ɗwal, kǝgìr pà nǝ̀ je ɗàng.
LUK 11:22 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɓeɓwa mǝnana kútì nǝ rǝcandǝa yiu arǝì, yi gandǝi ka, nǝ̀ ak agirbura mǝnana gulikiyi a rǝia ka, sǝ nǝ̀ pwan girkuma arǝì.
LUK 11:23 Ɓwa mǝnana pà atàm raka, ɓiam-mǝbura na, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana bwalàm ramge raka, nda aban mesǝki.
LUK 11:24 Ɓǝ̀ kukwar purî rǝ ɓwa ka, kǝ gāli arǝ aban-ima, ace alta ban usǝlǝo. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ kum raka, nǝ̀ ne ɓamúrì ama, <<Mǝ nǝ nyare a ɓala mǝnana ǝn ɗeki ka.>>
LUK 11:25 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ yi kumi à esǝkini, ɓoarnansari gǝraɗau ka,
LUK 11:26 pǝlǝa nǝ̀ nyare nǝ̀ nggá yiu nǝ aɓea kukwar tongno-nong-ɓari mǝnana à kútì nǝ ɓealɓikea ka, à nǝ̀ yia kutio à nǝ̀ dukam. Do mala ɓwe adyan ngga nǝ̀ ɓiki kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ̀ kútì mǝdǝmbe.
LUK 11:27 Yesu na rǝ naki amǝnia yì acau ka, kara ɓe ɓwama aɓa ɓwabundǝa loasǝ gi ama, <<Tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli na amur nggeau mǝnana ɓǝ̀lo sǝ a nu kiure ka!>>
LUK 11:28 Yesu pa eare ama, <<E, ɓafo, sǝama, tsǝkbu pwala mala Ɓakuli ka nda amur aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ ok cau male, sǝ à kǝ kpate ka!>>
LUK 11:29 Lang ɓwabundǝa nǝ̀ nggǝ làkkì ka, Yesu na ama: Nza mǝnia ka mǝɓealɓike na, kǝ earce sǝn gir'ndali. Sǝ kǝ gir'lǝmdǝa mǝpandali pà kàm à nǝ̀ pe wi ɗang she kǝ gir'lǝmdǝa mala Yunana.
LUK 11:30 Kǝla mǝnana Yunana duk gir'lǝmdǝa aban amǝ Nineva ka, anggo sǝ Muna mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ do aban mǝnia yì nza ka.
LUK 11:31 A pwari ɓashi ka, mā-murǝm mala amǝ Sheba nǝ̀ came andǝ aɓwana mǝnana a nza man ngga, sǝ nǝ̀ yinǝ kasǝ-ɓashi amúrià, acemǝnana yì ka, lo a masǝlǝata nzali ɓanza kuko sǝ yiu ace ok sǝlǝe mala Solomon. Sǝ ado ka Ɓwa mǝnana kútì Solomon ngga ndya ka.
LUK 11:32 A pwari ɓashi mala Ɓakuli ka amǝ Nineva nǝ̀ came andǝ aɓwana mǝnana a nza man ngga, sǝ à nǝ̀ yinǝ kasǝ-ɓashi amúrià. Acemǝnana yia amǝ Nineva ka à pwanzali à ɗeki buia arǝ acauɓikea malea, nǝ hama mala Yunana, sǝ ado ka Ɓwa mǝnana kútì Yunana ka ndya ka!
LUK 11:33 Ɓwa pà nǝ̀ tsǝk bǝsa a pitǝla sǝ nǝ̀ sǝmbǝrǝi, ko nǝ̀ kùmsǝî wi nkenye ɗàng. She nǝ̀ gyari a kùli, ace mǝnana aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kutio a ɓala ka ɓǝà sǝn tǎlaban.
LUK 11:34 Mǝsǝo nda pitǝla mala rǝò. Ɓǝ̀ mǝsǝo nda bǎng ngga, rǝò kat ka nǝ̀ lùmsǝ nǝ tǎlaban. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ amǝsǝo ɓoar raka, rǝò kat ka lùmsǝ̀nà nǝ pǝndǝa.
LUK 11:35 Sǝ we ka, tsǝkiro, ɓǝ̀ tǎlaban mô ɓǝ̀ kǝa duk pǝndǝa ɗang.
LUK 11:36 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ rǝò kat ka lùmsǝ nǝ tǎlaban, kǝ pǝndǝa pa kàm ko bǝti raka, nǝ̀ ta kat kǝla mǝnana pitǝla kǝ po tǎlaban ngga.
LUK 11:37 Anzǝm mǝnana Yesu malǝna naki acau ka, ɓeɓwa Farisi tunǝi arǝ girlina. Pǝlǝa Yesu wario kya do nǝ̀ li girlina.
LUK 11:38 Lang ɓwa Farisi sǝn Yesu tita li girlina sǝ lak buì kǝla mǝnana nggurcau malea bang raka, kara ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ mani.
LUK 11:39 Pǝlǝa Mǝtalabangŋo ne wi ama: Wun amǝ Farisi ka wu kǝ lak nzǝm kwar andǝ nzǝm tasau, sǝ ɓabum wun ngga lùmsǝ nǝ mɓali andǝ ɓealɓikea.
LUK 11:40 Wun amǝ ɗwanyi sǝlǝe! Nggearǝ Ɓakuli mǝnana pak ɓālǝi ka nǝ̀ pak nzǝmi mbo?
LUK 11:41 Wu pè amǝ'tǝ̀r agir mǝnana wu ndanǝia ka nǝ ɓabum wun mwashat, sǝ ko mana ma'wun kat ka nǝ̀ dupa wun nǝ ɓoarnsari.
LUK 11:42 Caukwanban nǝ wun, amǝ Farisi! Acemǝnana wu kǝ pa mwashat aɓa lum mala ambuzang andǝ ambulara andǝ acilia agirpwala, sǝ wu būrǝce kpata gìr aɓa mǝsǝcau andǝ earce Ɓakuli. Amǝnia ka à nda ka agir mǝnana wu nǝ̀ pa rǝcandǝa a rǝia ka, sǝ acili agir mǝno ka wu nǝ̀ pea gbal.
LUK 11:43 Caukwanban nǝ wun, amǝ Farisi! Acemǝnana wu kǝ earce aban-do mǝɓoarne aɓalǝ andakpapi andǝ makkun aɓalǝ alimo.
LUK 11:44 Caukwanban nǝ wun! Acemǝnana wu nda kǝla aɓembe mǝnana à ɓǝà raka, gandǝa aɓwana kǝ gya amúrià, à kǝ pǝndǝkea, aɓa ɗwanyi sǝlǝe.
LUK 11:45 Ɓè ɓwa aɓalǝ amǝ'sǝlǝgir Nggurcau mala Musa eari wi ama, <<Malǝm, ɓǝ̀ a bang ana ka, a sangŋa sǝm gbal!>>
LUK 11:46 Yesu pa eare ama: Wun amǝsúrǝ̀ Nggurcau mala Musa, caukwanban nǝ wun! Acemǝnana wu kǝ parì aɓwana twalo mǝnana à pà nǝ̀ gandǝ twale raka, sǝ wun nǝ ɓamurǝ wun ngga, ko munabu wun mwashat ka wu pà nǝ̀ loasǝi ama wu nǝ̀ tsǝkia wia ɗang.
LUK 11:47 Caukwanban nǝ wun! Acemǝnana wu gilǝki ce aɓembe mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli, sǝ aká wun na à wal-luia.
LUK 11:48 Anggo ka wu earǝna nǝ gir mǝnana aká wun pè ka. Yia na à wal-lú amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ka, sǝ wu nda wu gilǝki ɓak aɓembe malea ka.
LUK 11:49 Mǝnia ka nda cau mǝnana Ɓakuli bang amur wun ngga, <<Mǝ nǝ tura wun ban nǝ amǝ'ɓangnǝa andǝ amǝ'mishan, aɓea ka wun nǝ̀ wal-luia sǝ acilia ka wun nǝ̀ pea wia tanni.>>
LUK 11:50 Ace mani ka, nkila mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mǝnana à sukki ɗiɗyal, twal a tita ɓanza ka, à nǝ̀ ɗice a bu aɓwana mǝnana a nza man ngga.
LUK 11:51 Tite nǝ nkila mala Habila yi bwal ban nkila mala Zakariya, mǝnana à wal-lui a nre gyangŋan andǝ Ban Mǝfele ka. Ɓafo ǝn nggǝ bangga wun, à nǝ̀ ɓashia aɓwana mǝnana a nza man ngga acea kat!
LUK 11:52 Caukwanban nǝ wun, wun amalǝm Nggurcau! Wu ak kunɓala mala sǝlǝgir. Wun nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun ngga wu kútí ɗang, sǝ wu kasǝkun aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ earce kutio ka!
LUK 11:53 Lang Yesu nyìngŋǝ̀nà banì ka, amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa tita ɓinǝ mǝsǝì kǝ̀rkǝ́r, à cam arǝì nǝ ɗike amur acau pas.
LUK 11:54 À kǝ̀ alta bwale aɓa cau mǝnana nǝ̀ pur a kúni ka.
LUK 12:1 Anggo ka, lang ɓwabundǝa mǝnana làkkì malea nda á-pas à yì ramǝna a ban Yesu, gandǝa à kǝ parki rǝarǝia ka, Yesu tita nacau peatu nǝ alaggana male ama: Wu parkir wun arǝ yismala amǝ Farisi. Mǝ nda ban nacau amur kúnɓárína malea.
LUK 12:2 Kǝ gìr pà kàm mǝnana gire sǝ à pà nǝ̀ ndǝli raka, sǝ koya gir'sǝmbǝrǝa ka à nǝ̀ pusǝ ce.
LUK 12:3 Ace mani ka, cau mǝnana wu ne a pǝndǝa ka, à nǝ̀ ok ce bwāng, sǝ mǝnana wu sheri aɓa kiru aɓa ndà-nongŋo ka, à nǝ̀ hamnǝ ce amur akurǝm.
LUK 12:4 Ən nggǝ na wun, wun agyajam mem, wu kǝa ɓanggi aɓwana mǝnana à nǝ̀ wal-lú ɓwa, sǝ anzǝmi ka à pànǝ kǝgìr mǝnana à nǝ̀ pàk ka ɗàng.
LUK 12:5 Mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝa wun rǝ ɓwa mǝnana wun nǝ̀ ɓanggi wi ka. Wu ɓanggi Ɓakuli, mǝnana ɓǝ̀ walna ɓwa ka, ndanǝ rǝcandǝa mǝnana nǝ̀ ramta ɓwa a lú-bǝsa ka. Ɓafo, ǝn nggǝ na wun, wu ɓanggi wi!
LUK 12:6 Nggearǝì ka amǝpuɗeng tongno mbo sǝ à kǝ kúria kwapo ɓari? Kat andǝ amani ka kǝ ɓè pà kàm mǝnana Ɓakuli lorǝi ka ɗàng.
LUK 12:7 Wu sǝni! Ko nggearǝ anyang ɓamuru wun ngga à ɓalnia kat. Ace mani ka, ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakka wun ɗàng, wu kútí amǝpuɗeng kat nǝ ɓoarɓwa.
LUK 12:8 Ən nggǝ bangga wun, ɓwa mǝnana kat bang paɓamuru male arǝàm a ɓadǝmbǝ aɓwana ka, mim Muna mala Ɓwa ka mǝ nǝ bangce gbal ama yì ka, mem na a ɓadǝmbǝ amǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 12:9 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat makgìr súrǝàm a ɓadǝm ɓwapǝndǝa ka, mǝ nǝ makgìr súrǝè gbal a ɓadǝm amǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 12:10 Ɓwa mǝnana kat bangcau mǝɓane amur Muna mala Ɓwa ka, à nǝ̀ twali wi banì, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana na caukyauwikiban amur Bangŋo Mǝfele ka, à pà nǝ̀ twalbani ɗàng.
LUK 12:11 Ɓǝà wari nǝ wun aɓalǝ andakpapi, a ɓadǝmbǝ amǝ'ɓashi andǝ amurǝma ka, ɓǝ̀ ɓalǝ wun ɓǝ̀ kǝa kasǝkia arǝ pǝlǝcau, ko mana wun nǝ̀ na ka ɗàng.
LUK 12:12 Acemǝnana àkǝ̀ banì, Bangŋo Mǝfele nǝ̀ kania wun cau mǝnana wun nǝ̀ na ka.
LUK 12:13 Ɓè ɓwa aɓa ɓwabundǝa ne Yesu ama, <<Malǝm, ne mǝ'eambam ɓǝ̀ sǝm gau gǝna mǝnana tár sǝm nyingga sǝm ngga.>>
LUK 12:14 Yesu pǝlǝi wi ama, <<Ɓwabura, yana ciem mǝ'ɓashi ko mǝgaugir anre wun?>>
LUK 12:15 Pǝlǝa ne ɓwabundǝa ama, <<Wu parkir wun, wu yál rǝ wun arǝ koya ulang kikil ka, acemǝnana làkkì mala agirkuma mala ɓwa ka, nda yilǝmi ɗàng.>>
LUK 12:16 Pǝlǝa nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka ama: Ɓaban mala ɓè mǝkume pusǝ girlina kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 12:17 Pǝlǝa ne ɓamúrì ama, <<Mana ado mǝ nǝ pa? Ən panǝ ban mǝnana mǝ nǝ ram girlina mem kàm ngga ɗàng.
LUK 12:18 <<Mǝnia ka nda gìr mǝnana mǝ nǝ pàk ka, mǝ nǝ arki abá mem sǝ mǝ nǝ ɓakki amǝgulke, mǝ nǝ so girlina andǝ acili agirkuma mem kàm.
LUK 12:19 Sǝ mǝ nǝ ne yilǝmem ama, <A ndanǝ gǝna kǝ̀rkǝ́r aban ramba mǝnana nǝ̀ twalki apǝlǝa pas ka, panzǝ rǝò, lìli, nu, sǝ wu pak banɓoarnado.> >>
LUK 12:20 Sǝ Ɓakuli ne wi ama, <<We gǝm ɓwa! Àkǝ̀ bu du mǝnia ka, à nǝ̀ twal yilǝmio a rǝò. Sǝ agirbunda mǝnia a rambi ɓamuro ka, à nǝ̀ duk mala yana?>>
LUK 12:21 A masǝlǝate ka Yesu bang ama, <<Anggo sǝ nǝ̀ kum ɓwa mǝnana rambi ɓamúrì gǝna, sǝ yì ka, mǝ'tǝ̀r na aban Ɓakuli ka.>>
LUK 12:22 Yesu pǝlǝa ne alaggana male ama: Ən nggǝ na wun ama ɓabum wun ɓǝ̀ kǝa pi ace gìr mǝnana wun nǝ̀ li ace do nǝ yilǝmu, andǝ mǝnana wun nǝ̀ oasǝo arǝ wun ngga ɗàng.
LUK 12:23 Acemǝnana yilǝmu ka kútì girlina, sǝ nggūrǝu gbal ka kútì agir-nggūrǝu.
LUK 12:24 Wu sǝna arǝ agang'lang pé! À kǝ̀ ɓealɓeale ɗang, à kǝ ram girɓaban ɗang, ko nggearǝ ban tsǝk girlina ko bà ka à pànǝi ɗàng. Kat andǝ amani ka Ɓakuli kǝ linǝia. Sǝ ɓoarɓwa ma'wun aban Ɓakuli ka kútì mala amuna-nyal!
LUK 12:25 Sǝ yana aɓalǝ wun ɗe mǝnana ɗenyicau mala ɗwanyi nǝ̀ tsǝk yilǝmi nǝ̀ sauwa a ɓanza nǝ bu-pwari mwashat ka? Kǝɓwa pà kàm ɗàng.
LUK 12:26 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ pà wu nǝ̀ gandǝ pak gìr mǝkyauwe kǝla mǝnia raka, palang sǝ wu kǝ pisǝ ɓalǝ wun arǝ acilia?
LUK 12:27 Wu sǝni, lang sǝ apwasǝo-bondo kǝ gulo! À kǝ̀ pak túró ko à kǝ pyau nkonggúr ɗàng. Sǝ ǝn nggǝ na wun ama, nggearǝ Murǝm Solomon aɓa kume andǝ gulo male kat ka oasǝ agir-nggūrǝu kǝla malea ɗàng.
LUK 12:28 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ anggo sǝ Ɓakuli kǝ ɗenyi nǝ abondo mǝnana à ndya à kǝ sǝnia yalung, sǝ li ka à turnia a bǝsa ka, sǝ nǝ wun? Pà nǝ̀ pakka wun mǝnana kútì malea ka re? Gūliarǝu ma'wun kyau fat!
LUK 12:29 Ɓǝ̀ ɓabum wun ɓǝ̀ kǝa pi ace agir mǝnana wun nǝ̀ li, ko wun nǝ̀ nu ka ɗàng, wu kǝa pak ɗenyicau amurí ɗàng.
LUK 12:30 Amǝɓanza ka à kǝ ɓangŋa atà amǝnia yì agir kat ka. Sǝ Tár wun sǝlǝna ama wu kǝ pak-tǝla amǝnia yì agir ka.
LUK 12:31 Wu alta Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli a dǝmba nǝ ko man ngga, sǝ amǝnia yì agir ka à nǝ̀ pà wunia gbal.
LUK 12:32 Domwan mǝkyauwe, ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakka wun ɗàng, acemǝnana Tár wun ngga ban kǝ ɓoari wi ɓǝ̀ pà wun agir mǝɓoarne mala Domurǝm male.
LUK 12:33 Wu makki agirkuma ma'wun, wu pè amǝ'tǝ̀r boale. Wu kumbi ɓamur rǝ wun andaboalo mǝnana à kǝ sangi raka, sǝ wu tsǝk kume ma'wun a kùli aban mǝnana pà nǝ̀ amsǝa, sǝ amǝn'í pa nǝ̀ gbashì, ko tatǝmdi nǝ̀ kiɗiki raka.
LUK 12:34 Acemǝnana ban mana kume mò ndakam ngga, akàm sǝ ɓabumo nǝ̀ pa.
LUK 12:35 Wu kur rǝwun ace túró, apitǝla ma'wun ɓǝà kǝ ta.
LUK 12:36 Kǝla aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kundǝmur mǝtala-ɓala malea ɓǝ̀ nyàrî ban pakkiɗire isǝban ngga. Acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ nyarǝna sǝ yi walkina kunɓala ka, à nǝ̀ lo a kaurǝa, à nǝ̀ mǝnbi wi.
LUK 12:37 Ban nǝ̀ ɓoari amǝno yia amuna-ɓala ka, yì mǝnana ɓǝ̀ mǝtala-ɓala yiu yi kumia andǝ amǝsǝia ka. Ən nggǝ na wun ɓafo, nǝ̀ kur rǝì, nǝ̀ nea wia ɓǝà do, sǝ nǝ̀ pea wia girlina.
LUK 12:38 Ban nǝ̀ ɓoari amǝno yì amuna-ɓala ka, yì mana mǝtala-ɓala malea yi kumia aɓa gilǝrǝu ka, ko ɓǝ̀ yiu nǝ ɓadu, ko ɓǝ̀ nggu mala nǝ̀ ɓua ka.
LUK 12:39 Wu sǝlǝ ama, ɓǝ̀ mǝtala-ɓala sǝlǝna rǝ bu-pwari mǝnana mǝn'í nǝ̀ yiu nǝi ka, pà nǝ̀ eare mǝn'í nǝ̀ kutio a ɓala male ɗàng.
LUK 12:40 Sǝ wun gbal ka, wu do nǝ kur-rǝu, acemǝnana Muna mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ yiu a bu-pwari mǝnana wu tsǝk ɓalǝu ama nǝ̀ yiu nǝi raka.
LUK 12:41 Bitǝrus ɗiban ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, sǝm nda a nakiya sǝm mǝnia yì kanicau ka le ko a ndaban ne aɓwana kat?>>
LUK 12:42 Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu eare ama: Yana nda muna-ɓala mǝnana mǝsǝle na, à nǝ̀ earnǝi ka? Yì ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana mǝtala-ɓala male nyinggi wi ɓala a buì, ɓǝ̀ pè acilia amuna-ɓala girlina ɓǝ̀ pwari malea pangŋǝna ka.
LUK 12:43 Mǝno yì muna-ɓala ka ndanǝ banɓoarnado yi mǝnana ɓǝ̀ mǝtala-ɓala male nyare yi kumi ndaban pak túró mǝnana à pe wi ka.
LUK 12:44 Ən nggǝ na wun ɓafo, mǝtala-ɓala male nǝ̀ yia tsǝì amur girkuma male kat.
LUK 12:45 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ muna-ɓala ne ɓamúrì ama, <<Mǝtala-ɓala mem ngga pà nǝ̀ nyar tù ɗàng.>> Sǝ ɓǝ̀ kùtí a wal amuna-ɓala, aburana andǝ amamǝna, kǝ li, kǝ nu, sǝ kǝ wal-wale ka,
LUK 12:46 mǝtala-ɓala mala mǝno yì muna-ɓala ka, nǝ̀ nyare a bu-pwari mǝnana muna-ɓalae tsǝkbum raka, a pwari mǝnana pànǝ sǝlǝe raka. Nǝ̀ yia koè, nǝ̀ kasǝki wi anpenye, sǝ nǝ̀ nyesǝi aɓalǝ amǝ'ɗwanyi kpata mǝsǝcau.
LUK 12:47 Muna-ɓala mǝnana súrǝ̀ kani mala mǝtala-ɓala male, sǝ kur rǝi ace, ko pak kǝgìr ace raka, à nǝ̀ koè kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 12:48 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana sǝlǝ ɗang sǝ pak gìr mǝnana ɓoaro ɓǝà koè ace ka, à nǝ̀ koè bǝti. Ɓwa mǝnana à pè wi kpǝm ngga, à nǝ̀ alte a buì kpǝm. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana à pè wi kàm kpǝm ngga, à nǝ̀ ɗice a buì gbal kàm kpǝm.
LUK 12:49 Ən yiu ace soa bǝsa a ɓanza. Eare mem ngga ɓǝ́ bǝshe ka ndaban earke!
LUK 12:50 Mǝ ndanǝ batisǝma mala tanni mǝnana à nǝ̀ pakkam ngga, ado ka ndaban pisǝam a ɓalǝam, she ɓǝà pàngŋǝ̀nì ka.
LUK 12:51 Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla ǝn yiu ace yinǝ dorǝpwala a ɓanza le? Awo! Ən nggǝ na wun, gakkya na ǝn yiu nǝi ka.
LUK 12:52 A dǝmba ka, àkǝ ɓala mǝ'mwashati mǝnana aɓwana kàm tongno ka, à nǝ̀ gakki rǝia. Aman tàrú ka à nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ aman ɓari ka, amǝnana ɓari ka à nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ amǝnana tàrú ka.
LUK 12:53 Tárrú nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ muna-ɓwabura male, sǝ muna-ɓwabura gbal ka nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ tárrí. Nggeau nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ muna-ɓwama male, sǝ muna-ɓwama gbal ka nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ ngge. Nggeau nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ mālá muni, sǝ ɓwama nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ nggea burí.
LUK 12:54 Yesu ne ɓwabundǝa ama: Ɓǝ̀ wu sǝn pǝrɓang aban eauwe, nǝ njar-nzali ka, wu kǝ na ama, <<Mbulo ndo nǝ̀ nya,>> sǝ nǝ̀ nya gbal.
LUK 12:55 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ gung njar-kunmur ɓua ka, wu na ama <<Ban ndo nǝ̀ pi yalung,>> sǝ ban nǝ̀ pi gbal.
LUK 12:56 Wun amǝ'kúnɓárína! Wu súrǝ̀ kusǝpa mala agir mǝnana a nzali andǝ bumkuli ka, sǝ palang sǝ wu gandǝ súrǝ̀ kusǝpa mala agir-lǝmdǝa mala nza ma'sǝm man ɗang?
LUK 12:57 Palang sǝ wu gandǝ gakkita mǝɓoarne andǝ mǝɓane ɗàng?
LUK 12:58 Ɓǝ̀ a ndaban o a ndaɓashi wunǝ ɓwa mǝnana wulio ka, ɓariki wu gilǝki cau wunǝi amur njargula, ɓǝ̀ ana raka nǝ̀ nungio aban ká a ban mǝ'ɓashi, sǝ mǝ'ɓashi nǝ̀ tasǝ takwaro a ban amǝ'munagara, sǝ yià ka à nǝ̀ ramto a ndàkurban.
LUK 12:59 Ən nggǝ na wun, a pà wu nǝ purî ban mǝno ka ɗàng, she ɓǝà kpǝrina tà lǝpan mò ka.
LUK 13:1 A pwari mǝno ka, aɓea ɓwana nakam àkǝ̀ banì, à ne Yesu cau mala amǝ Galili mǝnana à ndarǝ pa gir'nkila aban Ɓakuli sǝ Bilatus tsǝa à wal-luia ka.
LUK 13:2 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama: Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla amǝnia yì amǝ Galili à walia ka à nda ka amǝnana à kútí acili amǝ Galili nǝ cauɓikea ka le?
LUK 13:3 Awo! Ən nggǝ na wun, ɓǝ̀ wu nying pakki acauɓikea, wu nyare aban Ɓakuli raka, wu nǝ̀ wú kat gbal.
LUK 13:4 Ko aɓwana mǝnana lum-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-tàrú mǝnana ndà-kulí mǝ'dāhre kpa a múrià à wú a Silowam ngga, wu kǝ sǝni kǝla à kútìban nǝ cauɓikea a Urǝshalima kat le?
LUK 13:5 Awo! Ən nggǝ na wun, ɓǝ̀ wu nying pakki acauɓikea wu nyare aban Ɓakuli raka, wu nǝ̀ wú kat gbal.
LUK 13:6 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka ama: Ɓè ɓwa ndanǝ nggun vwari a ɓaban male. Waria alta ɓǝle sǝ ko kya kum ɗang.
LUK 13:7 Sǝ ne ɓwa mǝnana kǝ yál ɓaban ngga ama, <<Pǝlǝa tàrú yalung mǝ ndarǝ nyarki kani ace alta ɓǝla vwari mǝnia ka, sǝ ko ǝn kum ɗang. Kasǝi turi! Ace mana sǝ nǝ̀ nggǝ kiɗiki nzali ɓà?>>
LUK 13:8 Sǝ mǝ'yál ɓaban ne wi ama, <<Mǝtala-ɓala, ɗeki ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝa mǝnia ka ɓǝ̀ malâ, mǝ nǝ kwarki nzali mǝnana a tǝte ka, sǝ mǝ nǝ soapi wi ciunda.
LUK 13:9 Ɓǝ̀ pusǝ ɓǝle aɓa pǝlǝa mǝnana kǝ yiu ka, yàwá! Ɓǝ̀ ɓǝl ɗǝm raka, sǝ wu kasǝi.>>
LUK 13:10 A pwari usǝlǝo mala amǝ Yahudi ka, Yesu na aban kani aɓwana gir aɓa ɓe ndakpapi.
LUK 13:11 Ɓè ɓwama nakam kukwar gbakǝri pǝlǝa lum-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-tàrú. Kàrrì kàngkàng, gandǝ sárǝ́ rǝì ɗang ko bǝti.
LUK 13:12 Lang Yesu nǝ̀ sǝni ka, pǝlǝa tunǝi ama ɓǝ̀ yiu a dǝmba, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Ɓwama, à panzǝno a bu mǝnia yì kwánó mo ka.>>
LUK 13:13 Pǝlǝa tsǝk abui arǝì, anggo ka, kara sárǝ́ pǝrapǝra, kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli.
LUK 13:14 Sǝ ɓwamǝgule ndakpapi ka bumi lúllô, acemǝnana Yesu twalban rǝkwana a pwari usǝlǝo ka. Ne aɓwana mana à ram ngga ama, <<Anongŋo ndakam tongno-nong-mwashat ace túró. Wu yiu ɓǝà twala wun ban arǝkwana ma'wun aɓalǝ amǝno yì apwari ka, wu kǝa yiu a pwari usǝlǝo ɗàng.>>
LUK 13:15 Mǝtalabangŋo pǝlǝi wi ama, <<Wun amǝ'kúnɓárína! Ko yan aɓalǝ wun ngga kǝ panzǝ jamnda ko dambǝritso male a domwan kǝ um nǝi a pe wi mùr a pwari usǝlǝo re?
LUK 13:16 Sǝ ado ka, mǝnia yì ɓwama, Mǝkà Ibǝrayim, mǝnana Shetan kùrrì pǝlǝa lum-bwamdǝ-tongno-nong-tàrú ka, à pà nǝ̀ panzǝi a pwari usǝlǝo re?>>
LUK 13:17 Lang bangŋǝna anggo ka, kara kǝsǝkya pakki aɓi-mǝbura. Sǝ aɓwana ka banɓoaria wia nǝ agir-ndǝlǝki mǝnana pea ka.
LUK 13:18 Pǝlǝa Yesu ɗiban ama, <<Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka nda kǝla mana? Mǝ nǝ kànì arǝ mana?
LUK 13:19 Nda kǝla mǝsǝ musta mǝnana ndya mǝní bǝti, mǝnana ɓeɓwa twali kya ɓeali a ɓaban male ka. Gulo kya pǝlǝa nggun sǝ amuna-nyal mana a kùli ka à yì bwal ndà arǝ abuí.>>
LUK 13:20 Nyare ɗiban ama, <<Arǝ mana sǝ mǝ nǝ kani Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli?
LUK 13:21 Nda kǝla yis mǝnana ɓè ɓwama twal bǝti, sùrǝì andǝ muku mǝsǝbondo alkama tasau tàrú, pǝlǝa loakio aki ɓālǝi kat ka.>>
LUK 13:22 Yesu kutio arǝ alá andǝ amuna-là aban kani aɓwana gìr, dǝshi muri aban ká Urǝshalima.
LUK 13:23 Pǝlǝa ɓeɓwa ɗì ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, aɓwana bǝti na à nǝ̀ amsǝia ka le?>> Yesu nea wia ama:
LUK 13:24 Wu ɓariki wu kutio a kunkurǝm mǝnana ɓwear ka, ǝn nggǝ na wun, acemǝnana aɓwana pas à nǝ̀ ɓariki ama à nǝ̀ kutio, sǝ à pà nǝ̀ gandǝi ɗang.
LUK 13:25 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝtala-ɓala longŋǝna sǝ girǝna kunɓala ka, wun nǝ̀ cam nǝ nza sǝ wun nǝ̀ nggǝ walki kunɓala aban zǝmba ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, mǝnba sǝm kunɓala!>> Sǝ yì ka, nǝ̀ eare ama, <<Ən súrǝ̀ wun ɗang, sǝ ǝn súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana wu pur kam ngga ɗang!>>
LUK 13:26 Sǝ wun nǝ̀ na ama, <<Sǝm li, sǝ sǝm nu, sǝnǝa wun, sǝ a kanì aɓwana gir arǝ anreɓala ma'sǝm.>>
LUK 13:27 Sǝ nǝ̀ eara wun ama, <<Ən súrǝ̀ wun ɗang, sǝ ǝn súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana wu pur kam ngga ɗang. Wu upi banam, wun amǝ'ɓealɓikea!>>
LUK 13:28 Akàm wun nǝ̀ nggǝ ɓua nǝ nǝmnggi munabu wun, ɓǝ̀ wu sǝna Ibǝrayim, andǝ Ishaku andǝ Yakupu andǝ amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli kat aɓa Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli, sǝ wun ngga à ɗekina wun nǝ nza ka.
LUK 13:29 Ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ pur nǝ njar-takuli, nǝ njar-nzali, nǝ njar-nza andǝ njar-kunmur, à nǝ̀ yia do aban lìli banɓoarnado a Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 13:30 A pwari mǝno ka, aɓea aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ gusǝlǝ cea ado ka à nǝ̀ kyauwikia, sǝ aɓea aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kyauwikia ado ka à nǝ̀ gusǝlia.
LUK 13:31 Anggo ka aɓea amǝ Farisi yiu aban Yesu à yì ne wi ama, <<Nying ban mǝnia ka, o a ɓe ban ɗàng. Hirǝdus kǝ earce wal-luio.>>
LUK 13:32 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama: Wu kyane wu kya ne mǝno yì mǝ'nyamshaminu ka ama, <<Mǝ nǝ pusǝ akukwar, mǝ nǝ twali aɓwana ban rǝkwana yalung andǝ li, sǝ a tàruià nongŋo ka, mǝ nǝ masǝlǝta túró mem.
