LUK 13:33 Kat andǝ amani ka, mǝ nda amur gya yalung andǝ li sǝ liawo. Mǝsǝcau ka à nǝ̀ wal-lú kǝ mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli sǝ pà aɓa Urǝshalima ɗang re!>>
LUK 13:34 Wun amǝ Urǝshalima! Wun amǝ Urǝshalima! Wun mǝnana wu kǝ wal-lú amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ka. Aɓwana mǝnana à túriá aban wun ngga wu kǝ ɓukkia nǝ atali, ɓǝa wú. Kusǝ shen Mǝ nda ban earce ram wun aban mǝ'mwashati, kǝla mǝnana nggu kǝ ramgi amuni aɓata ankpamtari ka, sǝ wu ear ɗang.
LUK 13:35 Wu sǝni, Ndàmǝgule ma'wun ngga, Ɓakuli ginǝkina wuni, nongŋǝna atàrǝì. Ən nggǝ na wun, pà wu nǝ̀ nyare wun nǝ̀ sǝnam ɗǝm ɗàng. She pwari mǝnana wun nǝ̀ bang ama, <<Ɓwangsǝban mala Ɓakuli na amur ɓwa mǝnana kǝ yiu aɓa lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo ka!>>
LUK 14:1 A ɓè Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo mala amǝ Yahudi ka, Yesu kutio aban lili a ɓala mala ɓè ɓwamǝgule Farisi. Kara aɓwana tsǝki wi mǝsǝu.
LUK 14:2 Àkǝ̀ ɓadǝmbi ka ɓeɓwa ndakam, nǝ kwánó tú.
LUK 14:3 Yesu ɗì amǝ Farisi andǝ amǝ súrǝ̀ Nggurcau ama, <<Nggurcau mala Musa eare ama ɓǝà twalban rǝkwana a pwari Sabbat le, ko ɓǝà kǝa twal ɗàng?>>
LUK 14:4 Ban pwalo ateà ɗǝong. Pǝlǝa Yesu tsǝk buì arǝ ɓwabure, twali wi ban rǝkwana, sǝ tasǝi ɓǝ̀ o.
LUK 14:5 Pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Yan aɓalǝ wun mǝnana ɓǝ̀ muni ko jamnda male kpa a tūli a pwari Sabbat ka, pà nǝ̀ pusǝì a kaurǝa raka?>>
LUK 14:6 Sǝ yia ka ko à kum cau na amur mǝnia ka ɗàng.
LUK 14:7 Lang Yesu sǝn aɓea abǝri mǝnana à tunǝia a ban li girlina à nǝ̀ nggǝ alta ban-do mǝɓoarne ka, pǝlǝa nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka. Bangŋa ama:
LUK 14:8 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa tunǝo a lìli isǝban ngga, kǝa alta buno mǝɓoarne ɗàng, acemǝnana yakǝla à tunǝna ɓeɓwa mǝnana kutio nǝ ɓoarɓwa ka.
LUK 14:9 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ nda anggo ka, ɓwa mǝnana tunǝ wun kǝm ngga nǝ̀ yia nô ama, <<Lo, nyinggi mǝnia yì ɓwa ka ban.>> Nǝ kǝsǝkya sǝ awu nǝ nyare aban yiu a ban-do mǝnana a nzǝ́mò ka.
LUK 14:10 Ɓǝà tunǝo a lìli mǝgule ka, kya do a buno mǝnana a nzǝ́mò ka. Ɓwa mǝnana tunǝo ka ɓǝ̀ yiu sǝ ɓǝ̀ yi nô ama, <<Gyajam, lo kya dǝmba.>> Anggo ka a nǝ kum gulo a ban aɓeo abǝri mǝnana à tunǝ wun wunǝia ka.
LUK 14:11 Mǝnia nda acemǝnana koya ɓwa na mana twal ɓamur rǝì ka, à nǝ̀ nyesǝi ɓà, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana nongsǝ ɓamur rǝì ka, à nǝ̀ gusǝlǝi.
LUK 14:12 Yesu pǝlǝa ne ɓwa mǝnana tunǝban ngga ama: Ɓǝ̀ a tunǝban ace ligirlina banɓoarnado ko pakkiɗire ka, ce a tunǝ agyajam mô, ko amǝ'eambo, ko aɓǝla mô, ko aɓeo amǝ murkala amǝ kume ɗàng. Ɓǝ̀ a pa anggo ka, yia ka à nǝ̀ tunǝo gbal a malea, sǝ anggo ka lǝmdǝna ama à mbweno a kunì.
LUK 14:13 Ɓǝ̀ a nǝ tunǝban ace ligirlina banɓoarnado ka, tunǝ amǝ'tǝ̀r, amǝkusǝu-wuna, agbakǝre, andǝ ante.
LUK 14:14 Anggo sǝ a nǝ kum tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli. Acemǝnana à pà nǝ̀ gandǝ mbweo raka, a nǝ nggá kum mbweban mô a pwari mǝnana amǝ'ɓealɓoarna nǝ̀ loapi ɓembe nǝi ka.
LUK 14:15 Lang ɓeɓwa mǝnana atà Yesu aban lili nǝ̀ ok ana ka, ne Yesu ama, <<Ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ ligirlina lǐ mǝgule a Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka, ndanǝ tsǝkbu!>>
LUK 14:16 Yesu eari wi ama: Ɓè ɓwa ndakam pak girlina banɓoarnado mǝgule. Turkiban arǝ aɓwana pas.
LUK 14:17 Lang pwari ligirlina kārǝ́na ka, tasǝ guro male ɓǝ̀ kya ne aɓwana mana à tunǝia lǐ ka ama, ɓǝa yiu, ko mana le ka à malǝna pe.
LUK 14:18 Sǝ yia kat ka à alkita anjar puro. Mǝdǝmba na ama, <<Ən nggǝ loa kur ɓaban, mǝ nǝ ká sǝne. Pà mǝ nǝ bwal ɗang, pakkam munyi.>>
LUK 14:19 Ɓè ɓwa ka na ama, <<Ən kúr anda-rya lum, ǝn nggǝ um nǝ o a mwamia, pà mǝ nǝ bwal ɗang, ida pàkkam munyi.>>
LUK 14:20 Ɓè ɓwa na ɗǝm ama, <<Ən loa isǝ ɓwama, pà mǝ nǝ gandǝ ká ɗang.>>
LUK 14:21 Guro nyare yi ne mǝtala-ɓala male acau mǝno kat. Mǝtala-ɓala ka bumi lúllô, pǝlǝa banggi guro male ama, <<Nyare o amur anjargula andǝ anreɓala, kyane kya tunǝki amǝ'tǝ̀r, amǝ kusǝ-wuna, ante andǝ agbakǝre.>>
LUK 14:22 Pǝlǝa guro nyare yi ne wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, gir mǝnana a na ce ka à pangŋǝni, sǝ cili ban ndakam.>>
LUK 14:23 Pǝlǝa mǝtala-ɓala ne guro ama, <<Puro o amur anjargula mǝgulke andǝ amǝkèke, kya ɓuaki arǝ aɓwana ɓǝa yiu, ace mǝnana ɓala mem ɓǝ̀ yi lùmsǝ ka.
LUK 14:24 Ən nggǝ na wun, aɓwana mǝnana à túrià ban ngga, kǝɓwa pà kàm ateà nǝ̀ ok girlina mem a kúni ɗàng!>>
LUK 14:25 Aɓwabundǝa pas nda ban ká andǝa Yesu, sǝ pǝlǝ rǝì nea wia ama:
LUK 14:26 Ɓwa mǝnana kat kǝ earce kpatam, sǝ ginǝ tárrí andǝ ngge, andǝ māmí, andǝ amuni, andǝ amǝ'eambi aburana andǝ amamǝna raka, pà nǝ̀ gandǝ duk mǝkpatam ɗàng. E, ɓwa pà nǝ̀ duk mǝkpatam ɗàng ɓǝ̀ ɓwe ginǝ ce nggearǝ yilǝmi acem raka.
LUK 14:27 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɓwa twal nggun-gangndǝi male yiu atàm raka, pà nǝ̀ gandǝ duk mǝkpatam ɗang.
LUK 14:28 Yana atà wun mǝnana earce nǝ̀ ɓak ndà-kulí mǝ'dāhre, sǝ pà nǝ̀ do peatu nǝ̀ ɓalbumi nǝ̀ sǝni ko ndanǝ boalo mǝnana nǝ̀ malǝna mǝno yì túró nǝi ka ɗàng?
LUK 14:29 Ɓǝ̀ pa anggo raka sǝ kwakina tà kusǝɓǎ, sǝ gandǝ masǝlǝe raka, ko yana sǝ sǝni ka, nǝ̀ oali.
LUK 14:30 À nǝ̀ nggǝ bang ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka tita ɓǎ sǝ gandǝ male ɗàng.>>
LUK 14:31 Ya murǝm nani nǝ asoje á-lum, nǝ̀ ká lwa arǝ ɓe murǝm mǝnana nǝ asoje á-lumi-ɓari ka, sǝ pà nǝ̀ do peatu nǝ̀ ɓalbumi nǝ̀ sǝni ko nǝ̀ gandǝ came a kún ɓi, mǝnana nǝ asoje á-lumi-ɓari ka ɗàng?
LUK 14:32 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ pà nǝ̀ gandǝi raka, ɓǝ̀ ɓì nda kuko ka, nǝ̀ gbara nǝ̀ turban ɓǝà zǝmba ace gilǝki cau.
LUK 14:33 Anggo gbal ɓǝ̀ koyan aɓalǝ wun sǝ nying girbunda male kat raka, pà nǝ̀ gandǝ duk mǝkpatam ɗàng.
LUK 14:34 Tuɓamur ka gìr mǝɓoarne na, sǝ ɓǝ̀ cyauwe male purrínì rǝì ka, mana nǝ̀ tsǝì sǝ nǝ̀ cyàu ɗǝm?
LUK 14:35 Pà nǝ ɓoaro ko a ɓaban ko a gìgí ɗang; ueo sukkio mǝnana à nǝ̀ sukki ka. Ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝ kir okban ngga, ɓǝ̀ o!
LUK 15:1 Aɓe fara ka amǝcemi andǝ amǝ'cauɓikea na aban rambǝa kat à nǝ̀ kwaki kiria arǝ Yesu.
LUK 15:2 Sǝ amǝ Farisi andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa ka à kǝ nggwani ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka kǝ do atà amǝ'cauɓikea, kǝ lili andǝia.>>
LUK 15:3 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka:
LUK 15:4 Ɓǝa twali ama ɓe kǝɓwa aɓalǝ wun ndanǝ anzur gbǝman. Ɓǝ̀ mwashat ateà ɓwàr ka, ɓwe pà nǝ̀ ɗeki amǝnia lumi-tongno-nong-ine nǝ mǝsǝi tongno-nong-ine ka aban likiali nǝ̀ ká alta mǝno mwashat ɓwàr ka, she ɓǝ̀ kumǝni ka re?
LUK 15:5 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ kumǝni ka, nǝ banɓoarnado sǝ nǝ̀ twali a kwari,
LUK 15:6 aban o a la. Nǝ̀ tunǝ agyajam male andǝ amǝkunɓala, sǝ nǝ̀ nea wia ama, <<Wu bwalàm pak banɓoarnado, ǝn kumǝna nzur mem mǝnana ɓwàr ka!>>
LUK 15:7 Ən nggǝ na wun ama, anggo gbal a kùli ka bumpwasǝa nda kam kǝ̀rkǝ́r ace mǝ'cauɓikea mwashat mǝnana nying acauɓikea male nyare aban Ɓakuli ka. Mǝno yì bumpwasǝa ka kútì mana ndakam amur amǝ'cauɓoarna mǝnana lumi-tongno-nong-ine nǝ mǝsǝi tongno-nong-ine mana à ɓwarki tanjar raka.
LUK 15:8 Ko ɓǝa twali ama ɓe ɓwama na nǝ amǝsǝ-boalo lum, sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝnia mwashat ɓwar arǝì ka, pà nǝ̀ tsǝk bǝsa a pitǝla nǝ̀ esǝki ɓala, sǝ nǝ̀ alban pepe she ɓǝ̀ kumǝni ka re?
LUK 15:9 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ kumǝni ka, nǝ̀ tunǝ agyansari male andǝ amǝkunɓala nǝ̀ nea wia ama, <<Wu bwalàm pak banɓoarnado! Ən kumǝna boalo mem mǝnana ɓwàr ka.>>
LUK 15:10 Ən nggǝ na wun ama anggo gbal, bumpwasǝa nakam aban amǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli ace mǝ'cauɓikea mwashat mǝnana ginǝki acauɓikea male, nyare aban Ɓakuli ka.
LUK 15:11 Pǝlǝa Yesu lidǝmba aban na ama: Ɓè ɓwabura nakam nǝ amuna-burana ɓari.
LUK 15:12 Mǝkyauwe mala ɓi ne tárrí ama, <<Dâ, pam kāmbe mem mala kume mo.>> Pǝlǝa tárrí gapia wia kume male aɓalǝu.
LUK 15:13 Anzǝm anonggio shen ngga, ɓwa mǝkyauwe kùr twalo male kat, kara twal bǝri o a ɓe la a bansauwa. Akanó ka kya kasǝ kume male aɓa do mǝɓane.
LUK 15:14 Anzǝm mǝnana kiɗikina kume male kat ka, nggea nzala yi kpa a mǝno yì nzali ka, kara kutio aɓa tǝ̀r mǝcandǝe.
LUK 15:15 Pǝlǝa o kya alta túró aban ɓeɓwa a la mǝno ka. Sǝ ɓwa mǝno ka tasǝi a domwan mala agirkusǝu male ɓǝ̀ kǝ pea atǝmbǝrǝm-ɓala girlina.
LUK 15:16 Rǝi ɓǝl pǝrpǝr arǝ nggunì girlina mǝnana atǝmbǝrǝm-ɓala kǝ li ka ama nǝ̀ li, sǝ kǝɓwa pe wi ɗang.
LUK 15:17 Yi nyare a ɗenyicau male ka na ama, <<Amǝtúró mǝnana à kǝ li a ɓabù tárrám ka girlina gandǝia ɓà, sǝ mǝ ndya nzala kǝ wal-luem ngga!
LUK 15:18 Mǝ nǝ nyare, mǝ nǝ o aban tárrám, mǝ nǝ ne wi ama, <Dâ, ǝn pangŋǝni Ɓakuli cauɓikea sǝ ǝn pangŋǝno cauɓikea.
LUK 15:19 Ən kārǝa ɓǝa tunǝam ama mǝ nda munio ɗǝm ɗang, nyesǝam kǝla ɓe mǝtúró-ɓala mo.> >>
LUK 15:20 Pǝlǝa lo nyare aban o aban tárrí. Nda kuko malaká bik ban tárrí ɗang, mǝsǝ tárrí kpa arǝì, kara mǝsǝswatǝr male bwali. Lo nǝ mire aban ká aban muni, kya kurrì zǝp.
LUK 15:21 Muni ne wi ama, <<Dâ, ǝn pangŋǝni Ɓakuli cauɓikea, sǝ ǝn pangŋǝno. Ən kārǝa ɓǝà tunǝam ama munio ɗǝm ɗàng.>>
LUK 15:22 Sǝ tárrí ka ne amǝ'túró-ɓala male ama, <<Wu yinǝi wi nǝ daura mǝ'ɓoarjamnì mǝnana kútì a ɓi ka, wu turi wi arǝì. Wu oasǝi wi girmunabu, wu oasǝi wi ankura a kusǝì.
LUK 15:23 Wu bwal lo-jamnda mǝ'nyane, wu wali. Sǝm nǝ̀ lìli, sǝm nǝ̀ pangŋǝni banɓoarnado.
LUK 15:24 Acemǝnana mǝnia yì muna-ɓwabura mem ngga wú, sǝ lo; ɓwaro, sǝ à kumi.>> Pǝlǝa à tita pakkiɗire.
LUK 15:25 Anggo ka, muni mǝgule na a ɓabondo. Nyarna nǝ̀ yia gbashi rǝ ɓala ka, ok walki anggwam andǝ nggyal andǝ tāki'anggwam.
LUK 15:26 Pǝlǝa tunǝ ɓe mǝtúró-ɓala ɗì, mana à pakkiyia.
LUK 15:27 Mǝtúró-ɓala eari wi ama, <<Mǝ'kyauweo na yiu ka, nda tárró wal jamnda mǝ'nyane, acemǝnana nyarǝna yina bǎng, yi kumǝni.>>
LUK 15:28 Sǝ muna mǝgule ka bumi lúllô, ginǝ kutia ɓala. Tárrí puro yi kumi, camarǝ ɓuakia rǝì.
LUK 15:29 Sǝ ne tárrí ama, <<Sǝn apǝlǝa mǝnia pas mǝ nda ban pakko túró kǝla guro, ko ǝn mgbikio kiru arǝ cau mo àkǝ̀ pwari ɗang. Kat andǝ amani anggo ka, ko kǝ muna-mbul mǝnana a nǝ pam ama ɓǝ̀ ǝn twani ɓǝ̀ sǝm pakkiɗire sǝnǝ agyajam mem ngga, pà kàm ɗang!
LUK 15:30 Lang munio mǝnia nyarǝna, a nzǝm mana kiɗikina gǝna mo arǝ amā-gyatarǝu ka, a yi wali wi muna jamnda mǝ'nyane!>>
LUK 15:31 Pǝlǝa tárrí ne wi ama, <<Munem, sǝm nda a tarǝ sǝm sǝnǝ we, sǝ gìr mǝnana kat mem na ka, mo na.
LUK 15:32 Ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ sǝm pak banɓoarnado andǝ bumpwasǝa, acemǝnana mǝnia yì mǝ'kyauweo ka wú, sǝ adyan ngga longŋǝna nǝ amǝsǝì; ɓwaro, sǝ à kumǝni.>>
LUK 16:1 Yesu ne alaggana male ɓe kanicau ɗǝm ama: <<Ɓè mǝkume ndanǝ ɓwa mǝnana kǝ ɗenyi nǝ agirkuma male ka. À kya oasǝki muri ama mǝnia yì ɓwa ka kǝ kiɗiki kume male.
LUK 16:2 Pǝlǝa tunǝi ɗì ama, <Ya cau nda man ǝn nggǝ o a muro ka? Bǝlam ɓá túró mo, acemǝnana a pà nǝ duk mǝɗenyi nǝ agirkuma mem ɗǝm ɗàng.>
LUK 16:3 <<Mǝɗenyi nǝ agirkuma pak ɗenyicau ama, <Mana ado mǝ nǝ pa? Mǝtala-ɓala mem ndo nǝ̀ pǝram arǝ túró. Ən panǝ rǝcandǝa mǝ nǝ rikrya ɗang, sǝ kǝsǝkya kǝ pakkam arǝ zǝmgi agir.
LUK 16:4 Ado ka, ǝn súrǝ́nà rǝ gir mǝnana mǝ nǝ pak ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝa pǝrnam arǝ túró ka, aɓwana nǝ̀ em arǝ aɓala malea ka.>
LUK 16:5 <<Pǝlǝa tunǝ amǝtangna mala mǝtala-ɓala male mwashat-mwashat. Ɗi mǝdǝmba ama, <Shen nda mǝtala-ɓala mem kǝ kpato?>
LUK 16:6 <<Pǝlǝa eari wi ama, <Du mùrú gbǝman tongno-nong-tàrú na.> <<Mǝɗenyi nǝ agirkuma ne wi ama, <Twal malǝmce tangnê, do a kaurǝa gilǝ gbǝman ine.>
LUK 16:7 <<Pǝlǝa ɗì ɓaria ama, <Shen sǝ à kǝ kpato?> <<Yì ka, eare ama, <Mǝssa tasau á-mwashat.> <<Oaso ne wi ama, <Twal malǝmce tangnê, nyesǝi gilǝ gbǝman-tongno-nong-tàrú.>
LUK 16:8 <<Mǝtala-ɓala ɓwangsǝ mǝɗenyi nǝ agirkuma mǝ'ɗwanyi mǝsǝcau nì mǝno ace kutan male. Acemǝnana aɓwana amǝkpata ɓanza mǝnia ka à ndanǝ kutan aɓa do malea arǝarǝia à kútì aɓwana mǝnana amǝkpata Ɓakuli na ka.>>
LUK 16:9 Yesu lidǝmba nǝ cau ama: <<Ən nggǝ bangga wun, wu pak túró nǝ gǝna mala ɓanza, wu bwal agyajam nǝi, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ gǝne umna ka, Ɓakuli nǝ̀ ak wun gbal arǝ aɓala mǝnana à pà nǝ̀ kiɗiki raka.
LUK 16:10 <<Ɓwa mǝnana à gandǝ earnǝi arǝ gir mǝkyauwe ka à nǝ̀ earnǝi arǝ mǝgule gbal. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana pànǝ mǝsǝcau arǝ mǝkyauwe raka, pà nǝ̀ dum nǝ mǝsǝcau arǝ mǝgule gbal ɗàng.
LUK 16:11 Sǝ ɓǝà pà nǝ̀ earnǝ wun nǝ bwal gǝna ɓanza raka, yana nǝ̀ earnǝ wun arǝ gǝna mǝɓafoe?
LUK 16:12 Sǝ ɓǝà earnǝ wun nǝ kume mala ɓeɓwa raka, yana nǝ̀ pà wun kume mǝnana ma'wun na ka?
LUK 16:13 <<Kǝ muna-ɓala pà nǝ̀ pakki amǝtala-ɓala ɓari turoɓala ɗàng. Ko nǝ̀ ginǝmǝsǝ man mwashat ka sǝ nǝ̀ earce ɓe, ko ana raka, nǝ̀ pa ɓamúrì aɓata ɓwa man mwashat ka, sǝ nǝ̀ būrǝce ɓe. Pa wu nǝ̀ pa ɓamur wun aban Ɓakuli andǝ boalo yia kǝm ɗàng.>>
LUK 16:14 Sǝ yia amǝ Farisi mǝnana amǝ earce boalo na ka, à nǝ̀ ok mǝnia yì acau ka, à sonzǝkì Yesu nggê.
LUK 16:15 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama: <<Wu nda ka aɓwana mǝnana wu kǝ lǝmdǝì acili aɓwana ama wu nda ka amǝɓoarne, sǝ Ɓakuli ka súrǝ́nà ɓabum wun. Gìr mǝnana ɓwapǝndǝa gusǝlǝi kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka mǝɓeami na a ban Ɓakuli.
LUK 16:16 <<Kaniama Yohana Mǝbatisǝma nǝ̀ tita hama ka, anggurcau mala Musa andǝ acau ɓá malǝmce mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli nda à kǝ lǝmdǝa wun njar ka. Sǝ adyan ngga Bǝsa Cau Mǝɓoarne mala Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ndya à kǝ hamnǝi ka, sǝ koyan ngga kǝ ɓariki kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ kutio kam.
LUK 16:17 Sǝ mǝnia ka lǝmdǝ ama Nggurcau mala Musa ɗwanyini rǝcandǝa male ɗàng, ko aɓa ɓè kǝcau ndok. Ndǝrmya mala kùli andǝ nzali ka, nda halku amur mǝnana ɓè kǝcau ndok ɓǝ̀ ndǝrmi aɓa Nggurcau mala Musa ka.
LUK 16:18 <<Ɓwa mǝnana pǝr māmí sǝ al ɓè ka nda rǝ pak cauɓikea nongnǝban a nza nǝ doɓala, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana al ɓwama mana à pǝri ka nda rǝ pak cauɓikea nongnǝban a nza nǝ doɓala.
LUK 16:19 <<Ɓè mǝkume ndakam mǝnana agir-nggūrǝu male ka boalea candǝ kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ koya pwari ka kǝ do aɓa rǝpwala.
LUK 16:20 À kǝ̀ nongsǝ ɓe mǝ'tǝ̀r a kunɓala male, lùllǝì ama Liazaro, mǝnana npenye aki rǝì kat ka.
LUK 16:21 Rǝi kǝ ɓǝla arǝ li gìr mǝnana ɓwano kpa a ɓadǝm mǝkume ka. Nggearǝ anvwa ɗǝm à yiu à kǝ lenzǝki anpenye male.
LUK 16:22 <<A masǝlǝate ka mǝ'tǝ̀r man yi wú, amǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli yi twali à um nǝi a ban Ibǝrayim. Mǝkume gbal ka wú pǝlǝa à tsǝkbani.
LUK 16:23 Yilǝmi o a ɓanza mala alú, a ban mana kya kutio aɓa kwanban mala tanni mǝ'kǝ̀rkǝ́r nì ka, loasǝ mǝsǝì sǝn Ibǝrayim kuko andǝ Liazaro a nkanggari.
LUK 16:24 Pǝlǝa tunǝ Ibǝrayim ama, <Dâ Ibǝrayim, sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr mem sǝ wu tasǝ Liazaro ɓǝ̀ oasǝ munabuì a mùr ɓǝ̀ lipam ta'mealam nǝi, acemǝnana mǝ nda aɓa tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r aɓa bǝsa mǝnia!>
LUK 16:25 <<Sǝ Ibǝrayim eari wi ama, <Munem, ɗenyi ama do mo a ɓanza ka a kum agir mo amǝɓoarne, sǝ Liazaro ka kum agir mǝɓane, sǝ ado ka ndya kum banɓoarnado kani ka, sǝ we ka a nda aɓa tanni mǝkwanbanì kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 16:26 Ko ɓǝ̀ cè mǝnia nda raka, nre sǝm sǝnǝa wun ngga nggea tūli ndakam, acemǝnana aɓwana mana à earce lo kani à nǝ̀ ká a ban wun ngga, ɓǝa kǝa gandǝi ɗàng. Sǝ aɓwana mana gbal à nǝ̀ lo kano aban yiu a ban sǝm ngga ɓǝa kǝa gandǝi ɗàng.>
LUK 16:27 <<Mǝkume na ama, <Sǝ ɓǝ̀ nda na ka ǝn nggǝ zǝmbǝo, Dâ, túr Liazaro a ɓala mala tárrám,
LUK 16:28 akanó ka mǝ ndanǝ amǝ'eambu tongno. Ɓǝ̀ kya nunkiria, ace mǝnana yia gbal ka ɓǝà kǝa yiu a mǝnia yì ban tanni nggea mǝɓike ka ɗàng.>
LUK 16:29 <<Ibǝrayim eari wi ama, <A Musa andǝ amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli nda kano a bania, ɓǝa kwaki kiria a rǝia.>
LUK 16:30 <<Mǝkume ne wi ama, <Awo, Dâ Ibǝrayim, ɓǝ̀ ɓwa lo a ɓembe sǝ wari a bania ka, à nǝ̀ pwanzali, à nǝ̀ ɗeki buia arǝ acauɓikea malea.>
LUK 16:31 <<Pǝlǝa Ibǝrayim ne wi ama, <Ɓǝà ok à Musa andǝ amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli raka, ko ɓǝ̀ ɓwa lo a ɓembe ka à pà nǝ̀ oè ɗàng!> >>
LUK 17:1 Yesu ne alaggana male ama: Agir mǝnana à nǝ̀ tsǝk aɓwana à nǝ̀ kpa aɓa cauɓikea ka dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ yiu. Sǝa ma caukwanban nǝ́ ɓwa mǝnana amǝnia yì agir à pur nǝ bani ka.
LUK 17:2 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa nǝ̀ tsǝk mwashat atà amǝnia yì amuna ɓǝ̀ pak cauɓikea ka, kǝpǝna ɓǝa ɗurri ɓwe taligo a meali sǝ ɓǝa ramte aɓa nggeamùr.
LUK 17:3 Ace mani ka wu tsǝkir wun. Ɓǝ̀ mǝ'eambo pakko cauɓikea ka, gimbi, sǝ ɓǝ̀ vwaki buì arǝ cauɓikea male pwanzali ka, twali wi banì.
LUK 17:4 Ko ɓǝ̀ pakko cauɓikea kusǝ tongno-nong-ɓari aɓa pwari mǝ'mwashati, sǝ nyar kusǝ tongno-nong-ɓari a bano yi pwanmbo nzali ka, twali wi banì.
LUK 17:5 Pǝlǝa Amǝ'mishan ne Mǝtalabangŋo ama, <<Tsǝk paɓamuru ma'sǝm ɓǝ̀ gulo.>>
LUK 17:6 Mǝtalabangŋo pea wia eare ama: Ko ɓǝ̀ gūliarǝu ma'wun kyauwe kǝla mǝsǝ musta ka, wun nǝ̀ gandǝ banggi nggea nggun mǝnia ka ama, <<U, kya kpa aɓa nggeamùr!>> Sǝ yì ka, nǝ̀ kpata cau ma'wun.
LUK 17:7 Ɓǝà twali ama ɓeɓwa nda kam aɓalǝ wun mana ndanǝ muna-ɓala mǝnana wari a rya a ɓaban ko a yál anzur ka. Ɓǝ̀ mǝnia yì muna-ɓala ka ndo kǝ nyàrî ɓabondo nǝ nyare ka, mǝtala-ɓala male nǝ̀ ne wi ama, <<Farǝo, yiu do lìli le?>>
LUK 17:8 Pa nǝ̀ ne wi ama, <<Pakkam girlina peatu, wu yi tsǝkami a ɓadǝmbam, ɓǝ̀ ǝn linali sǝ ǝn nunà mùr ka, sǝ awu nǝ lìli, awu nǝ nu mùr re?>>
LUK 17:9 Nǝ̀ pàkkî muna-ɓala man yàwá, acemǝnana kpata cau mana ne wi ɓǝ̀ pè ka le?
LUK 17:10 Anggo gbal sǝ nǝ̀ pang nǝ wun: ɓǝ̀ wu pangŋǝna agir mǝnana kat à bangga wun ama ɓǝ̀ wu pea ka, wun nǝ̀ na ama, <<Sǝm nda ka mǝtúró-ɓala mǝnana sǝm pà a kun kǝgìr raka. Kǝ túró ma'sǝm nda sǝm pak ka.>>
LUK 17:11 Yesu nǝ̀ o a Urǝshalima ka, kar nǝ nzong-nzali mala amǝ Samariya andǝ amǝ Galili.
LUK 17:12 Nda ban kutio aɓa ɓè muna-là ka, aɓea burana lum amǝdakali na, à yì kasǝ a kúni. À cam zak,
LUK 17:13 sǝ à loasǝ già à tunǝban ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule! Yesu! Sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr ma'sǝm!>>
LUK 17:14 Yesu pǝlǝ mǝsǝì sǝnia sǝ nea wia ama, <<Wu kyane, wu kya lǝmdǝ rǝ wun aban apǝris.>> À nda ban o ka, kara dakali mali rǝia.
LUK 17:15 Lang ɓwa mwashat aɓalǝia sǝni rǝì malǝna ka, kara soaɓunu nyare aban yiu, loasǝ gi, kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli.
LUK 17:16 Yi kpa a ɓadǝm Yesu aban pakki wi yàwá. Sǝ yì ka, ɓwa Samariya na.
LUK 17:17 Yesu ɗiban ama, <<Aɓwana lum mbo sǝ à twalia wia ban dakali? Aman tongno-nong-ine ka à nda malea ake?
LUK 17:18 Kǝ ɓwa pà kàm ateà nǝ̀ nyare nǝ̀ ɓwangsǝ Ɓakuli ka ɗang, she kǝ ɓwa-kúnɗàngna mǝnia ka?>>
LUK 17:19 Pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Lo o, gūliarǝu mo a rǝam amsǝno.>>
LUK 17:20 Amǝ Farisi ɗì Yesu ama, <<A ya pwari sǝ Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli nǝ̀ yiu?>> Yesu earia wia ama, <<Yiu mala Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka gìr na mǝnana à nǝ̀ sǝni nǝ mǝsǝu ka ɗàng.
LUK 17:21 Kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ na ama, <Ndya ka, wu sǝni!> Ko ana raka, <Ndako ka> ɗàng. Acemǝnana Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka nda àkǝ̀ ɓalǝ wun.>>
LUK 17:22 Pǝlǝa ne alaggana male ama: Pwari na kǝ yiu ka yi mǝnana rǝ wun nǝ̀ ɓǝla arǝ sǝn pwari mwashat aɓalǝ apwari mala Muna Mala Ɓwa ka, sǝ pà wun nǝ̀ sǝni ɗàng.
LUK 17:23 Ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ na wun ama, <<Ndako ka!>> Ko ana raka, <<Ndya ka!>> Wu kǝa ɓangŋa ateà ɗang.
LUK 17:24 Kǝla mǝnana ɓǝ̀ mbulo li'nzama pǝlilip ka, nǝ̀ tá amur ɓanza a buì man nǝ̀ nggá bwal ɓe buì ka, anggo sǝ Muna Mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ pa a pwari nyare male.
LUK 17:25 Sǝa ma peatu ka, Muna mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ nu tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r arǝ agir pas, sǝ aɓwana mǝnana a nza man ngga à nǝ̀ ɓinǝ mǝsǝì.
LUK 17:26 Kǝla mǝnana kumban a nza mala Nuhu ka, anggo sǝ nǝ̀ pa aɓalǝ anonggio mǝnana Muna Mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ nyare nǝ̀ yiu nǝi ka.
LUK 17:27 Ɓwapǝndǝa kǝ lìli, kǝ nu, à kǝ al rǝarǝia, à kǝ isǝ amunia bà pwari mǝnana Nuhu kútí nǝi a nggea-waru ka. Pǝlǝa mùr-gùla yiu yi twaltea kat.
LUK 17:28 Kǝ nda anggo a nza mala Lotu. Ɓwapǝndǝa kǝ li, à kǝ nu, à kǝ kúrkúró, à kǝ makkiagir, à kǝ rikrya, à kǝ ɓakki aɓah.
LUK 17:29 A pwari mǝnana Lotu purî ɓá Sodom ngga, bǝsa andǝ amǝsǝtali bǝsa nya nǝ kuli amur amǝ Sodom twaltea kat.
LUK 17:30 Anggo sǝ nǝ̀ kumban a pwari mǝnana Muna Mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ yia pusǝna rǝì nǝi ka.
LUK 17:31 A mǝno yì pwari ka, ɓwa mǝnana nda amur kurǝm male sǝ agirkuma male ka à nda aɓa kurǝm ngga, ɓǝ̀ kǝa na ama nǝ̀ sulǝ púp nǝ̀ nggá pwania ɗang. Anggo sǝ ɓwa mǝnana nda a ɓabondo ka, ɓǝ̀ kǝa nyare a ɓala ace twal kǝgìr ɗang.
LUK 17:32 Wu ɗenyi nǝ mālá Lotu!
LUK 17:33 Ɓwa mǝnana kǝ earce nǝ̀ amsǝ yilǝmi ka nǝ̀ turte. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kǝ turta yilǝmi ka nǝ̀ tsǝkcè.
LUK 17:34 Ən nggǝ na wun, a mǝno yì du ka, aɓwana ɓari nǝ̀ pa aban nongŋo a kala mǝ'mwashati, à nǝ̀ twal man mwashat ka, à nǝ̀ nying ɓe.
LUK 17:35 À nǝ̀ kum amamǝna ɓari aban go aban mǝ'mwashati, à nǝ̀ twal mwashat à nǝ̀ nying man mwashat ka.
LUK 17:36 [À nǝ̀ kum aburana ɓari a ɓaban, à nǝ̀ twal man mwashat ka, à nǝ̀ nying ɓe.]
LUK 17:37 Pǝlǝa alaggana male ɗì ama, <<Aya ban le, Mǝtalabangŋo?>> Yesu earia wia ama, <<Ban mǝnana lugir pak kam ngga, abanì sǝ adǝkǝlaki nǝ̀ rambǝa.>>
LUK 18:1 Yesu ne alaggana male ɓekǝ kanicau mǝnana nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama yia ka ɓǝa kǝ pak hiwi cala rǝia wuki ɗang.
LUK 18:2 Na ama: A ɓekǝ là, ɓè murǝm-ɓashi nakam mǝnana kǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli ɗang, sǝ kǝgìr oasǝi arǝ kǝɓwa raka.
LUK 18:3 Sǝ ɓè mā-lú nakam àkǝ̀ lě, mǝnana camarǝ nyarke aban mǝ'ɓashi man nǝ ɓua ama, <<Kutio anre sǝm sǝnǝ mǝɓinǝ muram.>>
LUK 18:4 Ata dǝmbe ka ginǝe. Nǝ nzǝ́mò ka ne ɓamúrì ama, <<Ko kat andǝ amani ama ǝn nggǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli ɗang, sǝ kǝgìr oasǝkiam arǝ kǝɓwa raka,
LUK 18:5 mǝ nǝ pak ɓashi mǝ'mǝsǝcau nì ace mǝnia yì mā-lú mǝnana kùrram mwacang ngga. Acemǝnana ɓǝn pak raka, nǝ̀ yauwam nǝ nyarke male tùtù abanam!>>
LUK 18:6 Pǝlǝa Yesu Mǝtalabangŋo na ama: Wu ok cau mǝnana murǝm-ɓashi mǝ'ɗwanyi mǝsǝcau man na ka!
LUK 18:7 Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla Ɓakuli ka pà nǝ̀ pak ɓashi mǝ'mǝsǝcau nì ace aɓwana male mǝnana tària, mǝnana à kǝ ɓua a ɓadǝmbi, dù andǝ pwari ka re? Nǝ̀ dǝndi arǝ bwalia wia kam le?
LUK 18:8 Ən nggǝ na wun ama, nǝ̀ pea wia gìr mǝnana malea na ka a kaurǝa. Sǝa ma ɓǝ̀ Muna Mala Ɓwa yiu ka, nǝ̀ yia kum paɓamuru a ɓanza le?
LUK 18:9 Yesu na mǝnia yì kanicau ka arǝ aɓwana mǝnana à twalî ɓamuria ama yia ka à nda ka amǝ'cauɓoarna, sǝ à ɓǝsǝki acili aɓwana à nyesǝia amǝ'cauɓikea na ka, ama:
LUK 18:10 Aɓwana ɓari à wari a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ace pak hiwi. Mwashat ka ɓwa Farisi na, sǝ ɓè ka mǝcemi na.
LUK 18:11 Pǝlǝa ɓwa Farisi lo came pak hiwi amur ɓamúrì. Na ama, <<Ɓakuli, ǝn pakko yàwá, acemǝnana mǝ nda mǝ'cauɓikea kǝla acili aɓwana ɗàng. Ən pa kǝla amǝ'ɓǝmbǝriban, amǝ ɗwanyi do amur mǝsǝcau, amǝ'nongginǝban a nza nǝ doɓala, ko kǝla mǝnia yì mǝcemi ka ɗàng.
LUK 18:12 Ən nggǝ gilmùr kusǝ ɓari a nre-limo mwashat, sǝ ǝn nggǝ pe Ɓakuli kāmbe mwashat aɓa lum mala koya girkuma mem.>>
LUK 18:13 Sǝ mala mǝcemi ka cam kuko. Eare ama nǝ̀ loasǝ múrí a kùli ɗang, wal kikili na ama, <<Ɓakuli, sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr mem, mim ngga mǝ nda mǝ'cauɓikea!>>
LUK 18:14 Ən nggǝ na wun ama, mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, nyare aban o ɓala male ka, mǝ'cauɓoarna na a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli, pa kǝla mala ɓwa Farisi ɗàng. Koyana kat sǝ kǝ twalɓamuri ka, à nǝ̀ kyauwiki, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kǝ nongsǝ ɓamúrì ka, à nǝ̀ gusǝlǝi.
LUK 18:15 Ɓè fara ka aɓea ɓwana yiu nǝ amuna aban Yesu ama ɓǝ̀ yi tsǝkia wia bu. Alaggana male sǝni anggo ka, à lo à sà a rǝia.
LUK 18:16 Sǝ Yesu ka tunǝ amuna a baní oaso na ama, <<Wu ɗeki amuna ɓǝa yiu abanam, wu kǝa pǝrkia ɗang, acemǝnana Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka nda ace a ulang amǝnia ka.
LUK 18:17 Ən nggǝ na wun mǝsǝcau ama koyana sǝ pà nǝ̀ ak Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli kǝla muna mǝkyauwe raka, pà nǝ̀ gandǝ kútí kam ɗàng.>>
LUK 18:18 Ɓè ɓwamǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi mǝkume ɗì Yesu ama, <<Malǝm mǝɓoarne, mana gir ni na mǝ nǝ pa sǝ mǝ nǝ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka?>>
LUK 18:19 Yesu eari wi ama, <<A bang ama mǝ nda ɓwa mǝɓoarne? Kǝ ɓwapǝndǝa pa kàm mǝɓoarne na ɗang, she Ɓakuli nǝmurǝì.
LUK 18:20 We ka, à súrǝ́nà rǝ anzongcau mala Ɓakuli mǝnana ama: <Kǝa kútí aɓa cauɓikea mala nongnǝ ɓwa mǝnana wu al rǝ wun wunǝi raka, kǝa wal-lú ɗàng, kǝa iun'í ɗang, kǝa ɓun-nyir amur ɓwa ɗàng, pe tárró andǝ nggo gulo.> >>
LUK 18:21 Pǝlǝa ɓwe na ama, <<Amǝnia ka, yàle mǝ nda muntulo sǝ ǝn bwalia.>>
LUK 18:22 Lang Yesu ok mǝnia ka, ne wi ama, <<Ɓè gìr mwashat na a ɗwanyi ka. Makki agir mǝnana kat a ndanǝia ka, gaki amǝ'tǝ̀r, awu nǝ kum gǝna a kùli, sǝ wu yiu, wu yi kpatam.>>
LUK 18:23 Lang nǝ̀ o ana ka bumi kiɗiki, acemǝnana yì ka, mǝkume na kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 18:24 Yesu sǝni kyap-kyap, sǝ na ama, <<Nǝ̀ kwano sǝ mǝgǝna nǝ̀ kutio a Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli!
LUK 18:25 Ɓafo ka, kutio mala mǝgǝna a Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka kwano kútì kutio mala kalakadambi a tǝta nlerǝman.>>
LUK 18:26 Aɓwana mǝnana à ok mǝnia ka à ɗiban ama, <<Sǝ yana ado nǝ̀ àwá?>>
LUK 18:27 Yesu eare ama, <<Gìr mǝnana pà nǝ̀ gandǝ pa aban ɓwapǝndǝa raka, nǝ̀ gandǝ pa aban Ɓakuli.>>
LUK 18:28 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus ne wi ama, <<Sǝni, sǝm nyìngŋǝ̀nà agirkuma ma'sǝm kat sǝm yiu a kpato!>>
LUK 18:29 Yesu nea wia ama, <<Ən nggǝ na wun mǝsǝcau, kǝɓwa pà kàm mǝnana ɗeki ɓala, ko ɓwama, ko amǝ'eambu, ko tárrû andǝ nggeau, ko amuna ace Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli,
LUK 18:30 sǝ nǝ̀ ɗwanyi kum agir kǝ̀rkǝ́r a nza mǝnia ka. Sǝ ɗǝm ngga a nza mǝno kǝ yiu ka, nǝ̀ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka.>>
LUK 18:31 Yesu tunǝ alaggana male, aman lum-nong-ɓari ka a giriban, sǝ nea wia ama: Wu sǝni sǝm ndo sǝm nǝ̀ ká a Urǝshalima, sǝ agir mǝnana kat amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli gilǝì amur Muna Mala Ɓwa ka à nǝ̀ lùmsǝo.
LUK 18:32 À nǝ̀ nyesǝi à nǝ̀ pea aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka, à nǝ̀ oali, oalban zalǝkiban, à nǝ̀ sanggì, à nǝ̀ tappi wi ntāra, à nǝ̀ koè, sǝ à nǝ̀ wali nǝ̀ wu,
LUK 18:33 sǝ a tàruià nongŋo ka, nǝ̀ loapi ɓembe.
LUK 18:34 Sǝ ko alaggana male bwalta kǝgìr aɓa mǝnia yì acau ka ɗàng. À sǝmbǝrǝia wia ɓālǝi, ko à súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana kǝ nacau amurí ka ɗàng.
LUK 18:35 Yesu gbàshìna Jeriko ka, ɓe nte nakam aban do a girǝi njargula aban zǝmgi agir.
LUK 18:36 Lang nǝ̀ ok gǝshi ɓwabundǝa mǝnana kǝ kútí ka, ɗiban ama, mana kumban le?
LUK 18:37 À pǝlǝa à ne wi ama, <<Yesu ɓwa Nazarat nda kǝ kútí ka.>>
LUK 18:38 Pǝlǝa tunǝban bàng-bàng ama, <<Yesu! Muna mala Dauda! Sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr mem!>>
LUK 18:39 Aɓwana mǝnana à ak dǝmba ka à sà arǝì ɓwam, ama ɓǝ̀ duk kúni ɗǝong. Sǝ yì ka, kara loasǝ gi kpǝm ama, <<Muna Mala Dauda, sǝn mǝsǝswatǝr mem!>>
LUK 18:40 Yesu go kusǝì came, sǝ na ama, ɓǝa yinǝi a baní. Lang yina a baní tù ka, Yesu ɗì ama,
LUK 18:41 <<Mana a earce mǝ pakko?>> Pǝlǝa nte man eare ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, ǝn nggǝ earce sǝnban.>>
LUK 18:42 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Kum sǝnban! Paɓamuru mo amsǝno.>>
LUK 18:43 Àkǝ̀ banì gbal kara kum sǝnban, sǝ kpa atà Yesu aban o, kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli. Lang ɓwapǝndǝa mǝnana kat sǝni ka, yia gbal ka à ɓwangsǝ Ɓakuli.
LUK 19:1 Yesu ara aɓa nggea-là Jeriko, ndaban kútí aɓalǝi.
LUK 19:2 Ɓè ɓwa ndakam lùllǝì ama Zaka, ɓwamǝgule mala amǝcemi na sǝ yì ka, mǝkume na.
LUK 19:3 Yì ka, ɓariki nǝ̀ sǝni ko yana nda Yesu. Ɓwabunda nda kam pas mǝnana yia gbal ka à kǝ̀ earce sǝn Yesu ka. Sǝ yi Zaka, acemǝnana nkpandal na ka, gandǝ sǝnban aɓa ɓwabundǝa ɗang.
LUK 19:4 Pǝlǝa ɓangŋa, ak dǝmba, kya eauwe a nggun vwari nǝ̀ sǝni, acemǝnana àkǝ̀ banì sǝ Yesu nǝ̀ pǝlǝa.
LUK 19:5 Lang Yesu yi bwalǝna banì ka, loasǝ mǝsǝì a kùli sǝ ne wi ama, <<Zaka, fa rǝo sùlǝî nggun! Yalung ngga, she mǝ nǝ sulǝ a ɓala mo.>>
LUK 19:6 Pǝlǝa sulǝo a kaurǝa gingsǝ Yesu nǝ bumpwasǝa.
LUK 19:7 Ɓwapǝndǝa mǝnana kat sǝn mǝnia ka, tita nggwani ama, <<Ɓwabura man ngga kya sulǝna a ɓala mala mǝ'cauɓikea!>>
LUK 19:8 Zaka pǝlǝa lo sǝ ne Mǝtalabangŋo ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, sǝni, mǝ nǝ gau girkuma mem aɓalǝu, mǝ nǝ pè amǝ'tǝ̀r kāmbe mwashat, sǝ ɓǝ̀ ǝn mbǝrina kǝɓwa ka, mǝ nǝ nyesǝi ɓwe gìr nî kusǝ ine.>>
LUK 19:9 Pǝlǝa Yesu ne wi ama, <<Yalung ngga amsǝban yina a ɓala mǝnia ka, acemǝnana mǝnia yì ɓwa gbal ka mǝ'kà Ibǝrayim na.
LUK 19:10 Muna mala Ɓwa ka, yiu àkǝ̀ ce alta gir mǝnana ɓwàr ka, nǝ̀ amsǝi.>>
LUK 19:11 Lang à nǝ̀ nggǝ kwaki kiria arǝ mǝnia yì acau ka, Yesu lidǝmba nǝ nea wia ɓe kanicau, acemǝnana anggo ka à gbàshìnà ban Urǝshalima, sǝ à kǝ sǝni kǝla Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka ndo nǝ̀ yiu àkǝ̀ dyadyan mǝno ka.
LUK 19:12 Pǝlǝa na ama: Ɓè mǝtaumurǝm wari a ɓe nzali mǝsauwe nǝ̀ nggá ak gara-murǝm, sǝ nǝ̀ nyare.
LUK 19:13 Kaniama nǝ̀ o ka tunǝ atà amǝtúró male lum, gakkia wia mǝsǝboalo zǝnariya luru lum sǝ nea wia ama, <<Boalo mǝnia ka wu kǝ nggāliki nǝi, she ɓǝn nyarǝna ka.>>
LUK 19:14 Sǝ aɓwana male ka à ɓinǝi, pǝlǝa à tasǝ aɓea aɓwana atè ɓǝà kya na ama, <<Sǝm earce mǝnia yì ɓwa ka ɓǝ̀ duk murǝm ma'sǝm ɗàng.>>
LUK 19:15 Kat andǝ amani ka, mǝnia yì ɓwa ka à kya pe wi gara-murǝm, sǝ nyare a kusǝì yiu. Pǝlǝa turban atà amǝ'túró-ɓala mǝnana pākia wia boalo ka, acemǝnana nǝ̀ súrǝ̀ gir mana à kum aɓa nggāliki ka.
LUK 19:16 Mǝdǝmba yiu yi na ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, luru mǝsǝboalo mô ka, ǝn kumǝna luru lum amurí.>>
LUK 19:17 Pǝlǝa mǝtala-ɓala male ne wi ama, <<Yàwá, mǝtúró mem mǝɓoarne! Acemǝnana a lǝmdǝ mǝsǝcau amur mǝnia bǝti ka, a nǝ duk mǝlà amur anggea-là lum.>>
LUK 19:18 Ɓaria ɓwa yiu yi na ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, luru mǝsǝboalo mo ka, ǝn kumǝna luru tongno amurí.>>
LUK 19:19 Mǝtala-ɓala male ne wi ama, <<We ka, a nǝ bwal anggea-là tongno.>>
LUK 19:20 Pǝlǝa ɓe guro yiu yi na ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, luru mǝsǝboalo mo nia ka, ǝn karrì aɓa bugir ǝn sǝmbǝrǝi pepe.
LUK 19:21 Ɓangciu pakkam a rǝo, acemǝnana we ka cau mò kwano na ɗang. A kǝ twal gìr mǝnana awu nǝ̀ tsǝk raka, sǝ a kǝ pwan gìr ɓaban mǝnana awu nǝ̀ ɓeal raka.>>
LUK 19:22 Mǝtala-ɓala male eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nǝ kùrro nǝ acau mǝnana à pur a kuno ka, we mǝtúró-ɓala mǝɓealɓike! A sǝlǝna she ama cau mem kwano na ɗang, ǝn nggǝ twal gìr mǝnana mǝ nǝ̀ tsǝk raka, sǝ ǝn nggǝ pwan gìr ɓaban mǝnana mǝ nǝ̀ ɓeal raka?
LUK 19:23 Sǝ palang sǝ a ɓinǝ ká tsǝkam boalo mem a banki, ace mǝnana ɓǝn nyare yiu ka, mǝ nǝ yia é nǝ mur amurí?>>
LUK 19:24 Pǝlǝa nea aɓwana mana à came abanì ka ama, <<Wu ak luru mǝsǝboalo mǝnana a buì ka, wu pè ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝ luru lum ngga.>>
LUK 19:25 Sǝ à ne wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, yì ka, ndanǝ male yì luru lum mala mǝsǝboalo zǝnariya!>>
LUK 19:26 Pǝlǝa eare ama, <<Ən nggǝ na wun ama, ɓwa mǝnana ndanǝi ka, à nǝ̀ tsǝki ɓi amurí, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana pà nǝi raka, nggearǝ mǝno bǝti a buì ka à nǝ̀ é arǝì.
LUK 19:27 Sǝ amǝno yì amǝɓinǝ muram mǝnana à ear ama mǝ duk murǝm amúrià raka, wu yinǝia kani, wu yi wal-luia a ɓadǝmbam!>>
LUK 19:28 Anzǝm mana Yesu bangŋǝna mǝnia yì acau ka, pǝlǝa dupia wia a dǝmba aban ká a Urǝshalima.
LUK 19:29 Lang gbàshìnà Betafaji andǝ Betani aban nkono Olif ka, pǝlǝa tasǝ aɓea alaggana male ɓari.
LUK 19:30 Nea wia ama, <<Wu kya a muna-là mǝnana a dǝm wun ngga. Kutio ma'wun ngga wun nǝ̀ kum mǝdambǝriso à kùrni, mǝnana kǝɓwa malaká eauwe a nzǝmi raka. Wu panzǝi, wu yinǝi.
LUK 19:31 Ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa ɗì wun ama ace mana sǝ wu kǝ panzǝi le ka, wun nǝ̀ ne wi ama Ɓwamǝgule ma'sǝmkǝ earce.>>
LUK 19:32 Yia mǝnana à túriá ka à wario à kya kumi kǝla mǝnana Yesu nea wia ka.
LUK 19:33 À ndarǝ panzǝ mǝdambǝriso ka, amǝtale ɗia ama, <<Ace mana sǝ wu kǝ panzǝ mǝdambǝriso?>>
LUK 19:34 À eare ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo kǝ earce.>>
LUK 19:35 À yiu nǝ mǝdambǝriso aban Yesu. À makki agir-koarǝu malea a nzǝmi, pǝlǝa à eamsǝ Yesu amurí.
LUK 19:36 Nda ban o ka, ɓwapǝndǝa sárǝ́ki agir-koarǝu malea amur njargula.
LUK 19:37 Lang yi bwalǝna ban mǝnana njargula dili kam aban ká Nkono Olif ka, bundǝo mala amǝkpate mǝnia ka, à tita loasǝ già nǝ bumpwasǝa aban ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli, ace agir-ndǝlǝki mǝnana à sǝn ngga.
LUK 19:38 À kǝ bang ama, <<Ɓwangsǝban ɓǝ pa aban Murǝm mǝnana kǝ yiu aɓa lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo ka!>> <<Dorǝpwala nda kam a kùli sǝ gulo ka aban Ɓakuli!>>
LUK 19:39 Aɓea amǝ Farisi mǝnana aɓa ɓwabundǝa ka à ne Yesu ama, <<Malǝm, sà arǝ alaggana mo ɓǝa pwalo!>>
LUK 19:40 Yesu nea wia ama, <<Ən nggǝ bangga wun, ɓǝà duk ɗǝong ngga, atali nǝ akia wia ɓwangsǝkiban.>>
LUK 19:41 Lang Yesu yi gbashìnà Urǝshalima mǝsǝì nǝ̀ kpa arǝì ka, kara túr kúni a ɓua ace,
LUK 19:42 na ama, <<Eare mem ngga, we Urǝshalima, yalung ngga a súrǝ́nà rǝ gir mǝnana nǝ̀ yipò nǝ dorǝpwala ka. Sǝ ado ka à sǝmbǝrǝni, mǝsǝo pà nǝ̀ gandǝ sǝne ɗàng.
LUK 19:43 Aɓea pwari nda à kǝ yiu, mǝnana aɓio amǝbura nǝ̀ yia ɓak nggea zǝ̀kì mǝcandǝe, à nǝ̀ gumbǝlio aɓalǝu, sǝ à nǝ̀ gìr amuro a koya buì ka.
LUK 19:44 À nǝ̀ yia arkio, à nǝ̀ sukkio a nzali, we wunǝ aɓwana mǝnana a ɓālǝo ka. À pà nǝ̀ ɗeki kǝ tali aban came amur ɓè ɗàng, acemǝnana we ka a súrǝ̀ pwari mǝnana Ɓakuli yiu nǝi ace amsǝo ka ɗàng.>>
LUK 19:45 Pǝlǝa Yesu kutio, pǝr amǝ'kúrkúró a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 19:46 Nea wia ama, <<À gilǝni ama, <Ɓala mem ngga nǝ̀ duk ɓala hiwi>; <sǝ wun ngga wu nyesǝi duk npu mala amǝ'ɓǝmbǝriban!> >>
LUK 19:47 Ko aya pwari ka Yesu na aban kanigir aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. Agbani Pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa sǝ akapana mǝnana aɓa ɓwapǝndǝa ka, à kǝ alte à nǝ̀ wal-luí.
LUK 19:48 Sǝ à kumbi ban ɗang, acemǝnana acau male pwan ɗenyicau mala ɓwapǝndǝa kat.
LUK 20:1 A ɓekǝ pwari Yesu ndaban kani aɓwana gìr a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, sǝ kǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban, agbani pǝris, andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, andǝ akapana yia kat à yiu a baní.
LUK 20:2 À yì ne wi ama, <<Bangga sǝm, nǝ ya rǝcandǝa sǝ a kǝ pakki amǝnia yì agir, sǝ yana po mǝnia yì gara mala pea ka?>>
LUK 20:3 Yesu pǝlǝia wia ama, <<Mǝ nǝ ɗì wun gbal. Wu banggàm,
LUK 20:4 batisǝma mala Yohana ka, pur nǝ kuli le, ko pur nǝ ban ɓwapǝndǝa?>>
LUK 20:5 Pǝlǝa à pǝlǝki ce arǝarǝia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm bang ama <Pur nǝ kuli ka,> nǝ̀ ɗì sǝm ama, <Sǝ palang sǝ wu pa ɓamur wun arǝì ɗàng?>
LUK 20:6 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ sǝm na ama, <Pur nǝ ban ɓwapǝndǝa ka, aɓwana mǝnia kat ka à nǝ̀ ɓukki sǝm, acemǝnana yia ka à eàrnà ama Yohana ka mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na.> >>
LUK 20:7 Pǝlǝa à eare ama, <<Sǝm súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana pur kam ngga ɗàng.>>
LUK 20:8 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama, <<Mim gbal ka pa mǝ nǝ bangga wun nǝ koya rǝcandǝa sǝ ǝn nggǝ pakki amǝnia yì agir ka ɗàng.>>
LUK 20:9 Yesu lidǝmba aban ne aɓwana mǝnia yì kanicau ka ama: Ɓè ɓwa tsǝk ɓaban nggun anap, sǝ nyesǝi pè aɓea amǝtúró rya, sǝ kutio o a bǝri banì kya sau kam.
LUK 20:10 Kún pwan ɓǝlanggun anap karǝna adyan ngga, pǝlǝa túr ɓè mǝtúró-ɓala male a ban amǝtúró ɓǝà kya aki wi ɓǝlanggun. Kara amǝtúró yi walki mǝtúró-ɓala man, sǝ à pǝrì um nǝ ɓabui.
LUK 20:11 Nyare túr ɓè mǝtúró-ɓala; yì gbal ka à walki à lǝmdǝì wi gìr kǝsǝkya sǝ à pǝri um nǝ ɓabui.
LUK 20:12 Nyar ɗǝm túr tàruià; à yì tsǝki wi anpenye à ramte à túri nǝ nza.
LUK 20:13 Pǝlǝa mǝtala ɓaban na ama, <<Mana ado mǝ nǝ pa? Mǝ nǝ tasǝ munem mǝnana ǝn earkiyi ace raka, yakǝla à nǝ̀ pe wi gulo!>>
LUK 20:14 Lang amǝtúró nǝ̀ yia sǝni ka, à kur kunarǝia amurí ama, <<Yauwa! Mǝnia ka nda mǝliɓala. Sǝm nǝ̀ wal-luí, sǝ ɓaban ngga nǝ̀ duk ma'sǝm!>>
LUK 20:15 Pǝlǝa à yasǝlǝi à túri nǝ nzǝm nkāndan, sǝ à kar atè à kya wali wu. Pǝlǝa Yesu ɗiban ama, <<Mana ado wu kǝ sǝni mǝnia yì mǝtala ɓaban ngga nǝ̀ yia pakkia wia?
LUK 20:16 Nǝ̀ yiu nǝ̀ yia wal-lú amǝtúró mǝnia sǝ nǝ̀ nyesǝ ɓaban nǝ̀ pe aɓea aɓwana!>> Lang ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ ok mǝnia ka à na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli twalban mani!>>
LUK 20:17 Pǝlǝa Yesu sǝnia kyap-kyap sǝ na ama, <<Sǝ mana ɗe nda tǝrcau mǝnana malǝmce bangŋi ama: << <Tali mǝnana amǝɓa ɓinǝi ka, nda à nyesǝi yi bwal ɓǎ kàngkàng ngga.>
LUK 20:18 Ɓwa mǝnana kat sǝ kpa amur mǝno yì tali ka nǝ̀ arkya nǝ̀ mesǝke mwashat-mwashat, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana tali man kpa amurí ka, nǝ̀ betǝki.>>
LUK 20:19 Amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa andǝ agbani Pǝris alta njargula mǝnana à nǝ̀ bwali nǝi tsuk-tsuk ka, acemǝnana à sǝlǝna ama mǝnia yì kanicau ka nda a rǝia. Sǝa ma ɓangciu kǝ pakkia wia arǝ aɓwana.
LUK 20:20 Aɓi-mǝbura tsǝki wi mǝsǝu, pǝlǝa à tasǝ amǝ'iucau, mǝnana à lǝmdǝa kǝla amǝ'mǝsǝcau na ka. A ɗenyicau malea ka à nǝ̀ bwal Yesu aɓa cau mǝnana pur a kúni ka, sǝ à nǝ̀ ká nǝi a ɓabù mǝtala-nzali, yì nggwamna mala amǝ Roma.
LUK 20:21 Pǝlǝa amǝ'iucau ɗì Yesu ama, <<Malǝm, sǝm sǝlǝ ama cau mo andǝ kanigir mo ka mǝsǝcau na kat. Aɓwana kat a bano ka amǝ'mwashati na. A kǝ kani njargula mala Ɓakuli nǝ mǝsǝcau.
LUK 20:22 Nggearǝì ka ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ sǝm mbwe Kaisar, murǝm mǝgule mala amǝ nzali Roma boalo-cemi le, ko ɓǝ̀ sǝm ká pe wi ɗang?>>
LUK 20:23 Yì ka, súrǝ́nà ɓá kutan malea pǝlǝa nea wia ama,
LUK 20:24 <<Wu lǝmdǝam mǝsǝboalo dinari. Ɓamǝsǝ ɓwa andǝ gir mǝnana à gilǝa rǝì ka mala yana?>> À eari wi ama, <<Mala Kaisar na.>>
LUK 20:25 Pǝlǝa nea wia ma, <<Wu pè Kaisar gìr mǝnana mala Kaisar na ka, sǝ Ɓakuli ka wu pè wi gìr mǝnana male na ka.>>
LUK 20:26 À gandǝ kume nǝ ɓwarkio aɓa cau male a ɓadǝm ɓwapǝndǝa ɗang. À ndali nǝ cau male, kara à do kunia ɗǝong.
LUK 20:27 Sǝ aɓea amǝ Saduki, mǝnana à na ama aɓwana pà nǝ̀ lo anzǝm lú raka, à yiu a ban Yesu nǝ ɗiban.
LUK 20:28 À na ama: Malǝm, Musa gilǝa sǝm ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ mǝ'eam ɓwa wú sǝ ɗeki māmí amuna pà kàm raka, ɓwe ka nǝ̀ al mā-lú ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ɓǝli mǝ'eambi amuna.>>
LUK 20:29 Sǝ a pwarian ngga aɓea aɓwana ndakam yia tongno-nong-ɓari à nda amǝ'eambu. Mǝdǝmba al ɓwama yi wu à pànǝ muna ɗang.
LUK 20:30 Sǝ ɓaria ka anggo gbal, al ɓwame sǝ yi wu pànǝ muna ɗang.
LUK 20:31 Tàruia gbal ka yi twal ɓwame, anggo sǝ yia mǝnia tongno-nong-ɓari ka à yì wúkio à ɗeki ɓwama, ko kǝ muna pa kàm ɗàng.
LUK 20:32 A masǝlǝate ka, ɓwama gbal ka yi wu.
LUK 20:33 Sǝ ado ka, a pwari loapi ɓembe ka nǝ̀ duk mālá yana ateà le, acemǝnana yia mǝnia tongno-nong-ɓari ka à dumǝna nǝi?
LUK 20:34 Yesu earia wia ama: Aɓwana mǝnana a ɓanza man ngga à kǝ al rǝia sǝ à kǝ isǝ amunia.
LUK 20:35 Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à sǝnia à kārǝ́na à nǝ̀ lo a ɓembe sǝ à nǝ̀ kum kutio a ɓanza mǝno kǝ yiu ka, à pà nǝ̀ al rǝia ko à nǝ̀ isǝ amunia ɗàng.
LUK 20:36 Sǝ à pà nǝ̀ wu ɗǝm ɗàng, acemǝnana à nda kǝla amǝturonjar. Amuna mala Ɓakuli na. Yia ka à nda ka ɓwana mǝnana à loapi ɓembe ka.
LUK 20:37 Sǝ amur cau mala loapi ɓembe ka, nggearǝ Musa ka lǝmdǝ ama alú nǝ̀ loapi ɓembe. Aɓa cau mǝnana à gilǝe amur mǝ'nkwarki mǝnana kǝ earki bǝsa ka, bang ama Mǝtalabangŋo ka nda, <<Ɓakuli mala Ibǝrayim, Ɓakuli mala Ishaku, sǝ Ɓakuli mala Yakupu.>>
LUK 20:38 Yì ka, Ɓakuli mala alú na ɗang, nda Ɓakuli mala aɓwana mǝnana nǝ yilǝmu ka, acemǝnana sǝlǝna ama yia kat ka à ndanǝ yilǝmu.
LUK 20:39 Aɓea amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa pǝlǝi wi ama, <<Malǝm, cau mo ka mǝsǝcau na!>>
LUK 20:40 Anggo ka kǝɓwa nyare loasǝ kúni ama nǝ̀ ɗì ɓekǝ cau ɗǝm ɗàng.
LUK 20:41 Yesu pǝlǝa turia wia ɓè ɗiban ama, <<Mana tsǝa sǝ à kǝ na ama Kǝrǝstika Muna mala Daudana?
LUK 20:42 Dauda nǝ nggearǝì ka bang aɓa malǝmce mala Anggyal ama, << <Ɓakuli Mǝtalabangŋo, ne Mǝtalem ama, Do a buam mǝlì
LUK 20:43 she ɓǝn nyesǝna aɓio-mǝbura à pǝlǝna muna-buno tsǝk kusǝu a ɓakusǝo ka.>
LUK 20:44 Dauda ka tunǝ Kǝrǝsti ama <Mǝtalem.> Sǝ palang ado sǝ Kǝrǝsti duk muni ɗǝm?>>
LUK 20:45 Lang aɓwana kat nda arǝ kwaki kiria à nǝ̀ nggǝ oè ka, Yesu pǝlǝa ne alaggana male ama,
LUK 20:46 <<Wu tsǝkir wun arǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa. À earce gya nǝ anggea-daura, sǝ à earce ɓǝà kǝ makkia wia kun aɓalǝ alimo, à earce aban-do mǝɓoarne arǝ andakpapi andǝ abuno mala aɓwana-mǝgule arǝ aban pakkiɗire lìli.
LUK 20:47 À kǝ ɓǝmbǝri amā-lú arǝ agirkuma malea, sǝ à kǝ ɓosǝki aɓwana nǝ pakki ahiwi mǝ'sake. A ulang yia ka à nǝ̀ pakkia wia ɓashi mǝcandǝe.>>
LUK 21:1 Lang Yesu loasǝ mǝsǝì ka, sǝn amǝ kume à nda rǝ turki aɓoro malea aɓa akwati boalo mǝnana aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka.
LUK 21:2 Ɗǝm ngga mǝsǝì kpa arǝ ɓe mā-lú, mǝ'tǝ̀r, aban túr amǝsǝ-boalo mǝkèke ɓari.
LUK 21:3 Pǝlǝa Yesu na ama, <<Mǝsǝcau, ǝn nggǝ bangga wun ama mǝnia yì mā-lú mǝtapwasǝa ka, nda túr gìr mǝnana kútì malea ka kat.
LUK 21:4 Acemǝnana aɓwana mǝnia kat ka à tù aɓa kume malea mǝnana kpǝm ngga, sǝ yì ka, aɓa tǝ̀r male sǝ pa gìr mǝnana kat ndanǝi ace do male ka.>>
LUK 21:5 Aɓea alaggana male na aban naki acau amur ɓoarjam mala Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli mǝnana à gilǝki nǝ atali mǝɓoarkijami, andǝ aɓoro mǝnana à tària ace pe Ɓakuli ka. Pǝlǝa Yesu na ama,
LUK 21:6 <<Ɓǝ̀ mala agir mǝnana wu kǝ sǝnia à nda ka, ɓè pwari nǝ̀ yiu mǝnana kǝ ɓè tali pa kàm à nǝ̀ ɗeki aban came amur ɓè ka ɗàng. Komǝyenani ka à nǝ̀ rambi à nǝ̀ turi a nzali.>>
LUK 21:7 Pǝlǝa à ɗì Yesu ama, <<Malǝm, amǝnia yì agir ka a ya pwari sǝ à nǝ̀ kumban? Ɗǝm ngga mana girnì na nǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama à mala à nǝ̀ kumban?>>
LUK 21:8 Sǝ Yesu pǝlǝia wia ama: Wu parkir wun ɓǝà kǝa swárki wun ɗàng. Acemǝnana aɓwana pas à nǝ̀ yiu aɓa lullǝam, à nǝ̀ nggǝ bang ama, yia ka à nda ka Kǝrǝsti, ɗǝm ngga à nǝ̀ na ama, <<Pwari gbàshìnà!>> Wu kǝa kpata cau malea ɗàng.
LUK 21:9 Ɓǝ̀ wu ok cau mala a'lwa andǝ amunǝo ka, cala ɓangciu pakka wun ɗàng. Amǝnia yì agir ka dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ ak dǝmba kumban, sǝ masǝlǝata ɓanza malaká yiu peatu ɗàng.
LUK 21:10 Pǝlǝa lidǝmba aban nea wia ama: Nzali nǝ̀ lo nǝ lwa arǝ ɓe nzali, sǝ domurǝm nǝ̀ lo arǝ ɓe domurǝm.
LUK 21:11 Agǝggǝli mǝcandǝe mala nzali nǝ̀ kumban, nzala nǝ̀ kpa, akwánó ɓanza ɗàngɗáng nǝ̀ puro arǝ aban pas. Agir kàrmúrû andǝ agir-lǝmdǝa mǝgulke à nǝ̀ pur nǝ kuli.
LUK 21:12 Sǝ kaniama amǝnia yì agir nǝ̀ kumban ngga, à nǝ̀ bwalki wun, à nǝ̀ pà wun tanni. À nǝ̀ ká nǝ wun a ɓashi arǝ andakpapi, à nǝ̀ kùr wun arǝ andakùrban, à nǝ̀ kánǝ wun aban amurǝma andǝ anggwamna, acemǝnana wu nda ka amǝ kpatam ngga.
LUK 21:13 Mǝnia ka nǝ̀ pa wun dǝmbu hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban mem.
LUK 21:14 Wu twali a ɓabum wun ama, pa wu nǝ̀ do nǝ ɓalǝkasǝkya arǝ cau mǝnana wun nǝ̀ na aban ɓashi ka ɗàng.
LUK 21:15 Acemǝnana mǝ nǝ pà wun acau andǝ sǝlǝe mǝnana kǝɓwa pà kàm atà amǝ ɓinǝmúr wun mǝnana nǝ̀ gandǝ cam a kún wun, ko nǝ̀ makgìr cau ma'wun ngga ɗàng.
LUK 21:16 Nggearǝ aɓwana mǝnana à ɓǝl wun, andǝ amǝ'eam wun, aɓǝla andǝ agyajam ma'wun ngga, à nǝ̀ pà wun nzǝmia, à nǝ̀ wal-lú ka aɓea ɓwana aɓalǝ wun.
LUK 21:17 Aɓwana kat nǝ̀ ɓinǝmǝsǝ wun acemǝnana wu nda ka amǝkpatam ngga.
LUK 21:18 Sǝ ko nyang múr wun mwashat ka pà nǝ̀ kpa a nzali ɗang.
LUK 21:19 Mǝsǝkang-kangŋa ma'wun na nǝ̀ amsǝ wun, nǝ̀ pa wun yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka.
LUK 21:20 Ɓǝ̀ wu sǝnǝna asoje à yì karina Urǝshalima ka, wu sǝlǝ ama kpa male gbàshìnà.
LUK 21:21 Sǝ anggo ka aɓwana mǝnana a nzali Yahudi ka, ɓǝà ɓangŋa ɓǝà eauwe amur ankono, aɓwana mǝnana aɓa là ka ɓǝà puro, sǝ aɓwana mǝnana a bondo ka ɓǝà kǝa kutio aɓa là ɗàng.
LUK 21:22 Acemǝnana mǝnia yì pwari ka mala mbweban nutanni na, ace lùmsǝ agir mǝnana kat à gilǝì aɓa Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli ka.
LUK 21:23 Aɓalǝ apwari mǝno ka, gìr mǝsǝswatǝr na nǝ amamǝna mǝnana nǝ amuna a bumia, andǝa mǝnana à kǝ pea amuna kiura ka! Nggea tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ̀ yiu amur mǝnia yì nzali, sǝ bumlulla mala Ɓakuli nǝ̀ sulǝo amur amǝnia yì aɓwana ka.
LUK 21:24 À nǝ̀ wal-lú aɓea ɓwana ateà nǝ nggeabyau, sǝ aɓea ɓwana ka à nǝ̀ bwalia guro à nǝ̀ umnǝia arǝ anzali kat mala ɓanza. Aɓwana mana amǝ Isǝrayila na raka, à nǝ̀ parki Urǝshalima aɓata rǝcandǝa malea, à nǝ̀ pàkce acau male ɓà, bà lùmsǝo mala apwari mana Ɓakuli kasǝa acea, yia aɓwana mana amǝ Isǝrayila na raka.
LUK 21:25 Agir-lǝmdǝa nǝ̀ purkio aɓa pwari, andǝ zongŋo andǝ anlero. A ɓanza ka, ɓwapǝndǝa kat nǝ̀ do nǝ ɓalǝkasǝkya andǝ gakkya mala ɗenyicau, à nǝ̀ pǝlǝ nǝ ɓalǝia ɓà nǝ ɓangciu arǝ songnǝo mala nggeamùr andǝ eaki-nkono male.
LUK 21:26 Ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ wukiaban ace ɓangciu, ɓalǝia nǝ̀ kasǝkya arǝ gir mǝnana nǝ̀ sulǝo amur ɓanza ka, acemǝnana à nǝ̀ dǝurǝki anggea gìr mǝgulke mǝnana a kùli ka.
LUK 21:27 Anggo ka à nǝ̀ sǝn Muna Mala Ɓwa aban yiu aɓa pǝrɓang nǝ rǝcandǝa andǝ ɓoarɓwa mǝgule.
LUK 21:28 Ɓǝ̀ amǝnia yì agir tinata kumban ngga, wu lo, wu loasǝ múr wun a kùli, acemǝnana pwari akmúr wun gbàshìnà.
LUK 21:29 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia mǝnia yì kanicau ka: Wu sǝn nggun vwari andǝ acili anggun kat.
LUK 21:30 Ɓǝà tinata to mbuia ka, wun nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun ngga, wun nǝ̀ sǝni sǝ wun nǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama mbulo gbashìnà.
LUK 21:31 Anggo gbal, ɓǝ̀ wu sǝnǝna amǝnia yì agir à ndaban pakki ka, wu sǝlǝ ama Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka gbàshìnà.
LUK 21:32 Ən nggǝ na wun mǝsǝcau ama, tà mǝnia yì nza ka pà nǝ̀ mal ɗang she ɓǝ̀ amǝnia yì agir kat ka à kumǝnaban ngga.
LUK 21:33 Kùli andǝ nzali ka tea nǝ̀ malâ, sǝ Cau mem ngga tè pà nǝ̀ mal ɗang ko bǝti.
LUK 21:34 Wu parkir wun wu kǝa eare ɓǝ̀ ɗenyicau ma'wun lùmsǝ nǝ likiagir, wal-wale andǝ pisǝɓalǝu arǝ alta agir ɓanza, gandǝa mǝno yì pwari ka nǝ̀ yia yasǝlǝ wun ngga ɗàng.
LUK 21:35 Kǝla gbǝ́lî, nǝ̀ yiu amur aɓwana mǝnana a ɓanza kat ka.
LUK 21:36 Wu dum nǝ mǝsǝ wun ko aya pwari, nǝ́ pak hiwi ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ wu apî amǝnia yì agir mana à mala à nǝ̀ kumban, sǝ ɗǝm ngga ɓǝ̀ wu kum kusǝu came a ɓadǝm Muna mala Ɓwa ka.
LUK 21:37 Ko aya pwari ka Yesu nda aban kanigir aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, sǝ nǝ pwarikpana ka nǝ̀ o a múr mǝ'nkono mǝnana à tunǝki ama Nkono Olif ka nǝ̀ nggá nong kam.
LUK 21:38 Sǝ nǝ bu dǝmbari ka aɓwana kat kǝ yiua ok kanigir male a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 22:1 Ado ka, pwari Ɗire mala Bǝredi mana kǝ lo raka, mǝnana à tunǝki ama <<Ɗire Yàlîmurû>> ka gbàshìnà.
LUK 22:2 Agbani pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa came arǝ alta njargula mǝnana à nǝ̀ wal Yesu nǝi aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa ka, acemǝnana ɓangciu kǝ pakkia wia arǝ aɓwana malea.
LUK 22:3 Pǝlǝa Shetan kutio arǝ Yahuda mǝnana à tunǝki ama Iskariyoti ka. Yì ka, nda aɓalǝ alaggana mala Yesu mana lum-nong-ɓari ka.
LUK 22:4 Yahuda wari aban agbani pǝris andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ yál Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, à nacau andǝia, amur njar mǝnana nǝ̀ pa Yesu nǝi a buia ka.
LUK 22:5 Banɓoaria wia, kara à eare ama à nǝ̀ pe wi boalo.
LUK 22:6 Yì ka, eare, pǝlǝa kútí a alta njar mǝnana nǝ̀ kùmô sǝ nǝ̀ pea wia Yesu nǝi a pwari mǝnana ɓwabundǝa pà kàm raka.
LUK 22:7 Lang Lamsan mala Bǝredi mana kǝ lo raka tinate, a pwari walki anzur mala Ɗire Yàlîmurû ka,
LUK 22:8 Yesu tasǝ Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana, nea wia ama, <<Wu kyane wu kya gilǝkia sǝm girlina mala Ɗire Yàlîmurû mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ li ka.>>
LUK 22:9 À ɗì ama, <<A ya ban sǝ ɓǝ̀ sǝm kya pak túró girline?>>
LUK 22:10 Nea wia ama, <<Kutio ma'wun a nggea-là ani ka, wun nǝ̀ je wunǝ ɓe ɓwabura nǝ bàng-mùr amurí. Wu kya atè a ɓala mǝnana nǝ̀ kútí kam ngga.
LUK 22:11 Wu ne mǝtala-ɓalae ama, <Malǝm nǝ̀ túr sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɗio ama: Bansulǝo mǝnana nǝ̀ li girlina Ɗire Yàlîmurû kam andǝ alaggana male ka, nda a ya ban?>
LUK 22:12 Nǝ̀ lǝmdǝa wun rǝ ɓe ndà-kulí mǝgule, à gilǝkina ɓālǝi. A kam sǝ wun nǝ̀ pak túró girlina.>>
LUK 22:13 Pǝlǝa à wario à kya kum girbunda kǝla mǝnana Yesu nea wia ka. Pǝlǝa à pak túró girlina Ɗire Yàlîmurû.
LUK 22:14 Lang pwari kārǝ́na ka, Yesu andǝ amǝ'mishan male do aban li girlina.
LUK 22:15 Pǝlǝa nea amǝ'mishan male ama, <<Ən earǝna ce li girlina Ɗire Yàlîmurû mǝnia ka kǝ̀rkǝ́r sǝnǝa wun, sǝ ɓǝ̀n kutio a tanni!
LUK 22:16 Sǝ ǝn nggǝ na wun, pa mǝ nǝ li ɗǝm ɗàng, she pwari mana ɓǝ̀ kya lumsǝna a Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka.>>
LUK 22:17 Pǝlǝa Yesu twal kwap mala mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap, sǝ pakki Ɓakuli yàwá, sǝ na ama, <<Wu ak mǝnia ka, wu gakkia rǝ wun.
LUK 22:18 Ən nggǝ na wun ama, twal ado ka pà mǝ nǝ nu mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap ɗǝm ɗàng, she ɓǝ̀ Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli yina ka.>>
LUK 22:19 Pǝlǝa twal bǝredi, pakki Ɓakuli yàwá, ɓwani, sǝ pea wia, nea wia ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda nggūrǝam, mǝnana ǝn pa ace wun ngga, wu kǝ pak mǝnia ka, ace ɗenyi nǝ mim.>>
LUK 22:20 Anzǝm girlina ka, twal ɓè kwap mala mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap a buì, sǝ na ama, <<Kwap mǝnia ka, nda bǝsa kùrcau a nre Ɓakuli andǝ aɓwana male, mǝnana à kurrì nǝ nkílèm mana à sukki ace wun ngga.
LUK 22:21 Sǝ wu sǝni! Ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ kúrkúró nǝ mim ngga nda aɓalǝ sǝm aban li kani atàm!
LUK 22:22 Lú mala Muna mala Ɓwa ka nǝ̀ pa kǝla mǝnana Ɓakuli kani ka, sǝ caukwanban na nǝ ɓwa mǝnana me ka!>>
LUK 22:23 Alaggana tita ɗiki rǝarǝia ko yana ɓwe na aɓalǝia mǝnana nǝ̀ pak mǝnia yì gir ka.
LUK 22:24 Makgir pǝlǝa lo a nrea amur ko yana aɓalǝia nda ɓwamǝgule malea kat.
LUK 22:25 Yesu nea wia ama: Amurǝma mala amǝɓanza ka à kǝ lǝmdǝ rǝcandǝa amur aɓwana, sǝ amǝ'lǝmdǝ gulo amur aɓwana ka à kǝ tunǝ ɓamuria ama, <<agyajam mala ɓwapǝndǝa.>>
LUK 22:26 Sǝ wun ngga, anggo sǝ wun nǝ̀ pak ɗàng. Ma'wun ngga, ɓwa mǝnana gula wun kat ka nda nǝ̀ dupa wun kǝla muna kat ka, gbani gbal ka nda rítǎu.
LUK 22:27 Yana nda ɓwamǝgule, ɓwa mǝnana do a ban-li ka le, ko ɓwa mǝnana kǝ gaki girlina ka? Nda ɓwa mǝnana do a ban-li ka re? Sǝ mim ngga ǝn do aɓalǝ wun kǝla mǝ gau girlina.
LUK 22:28 Wu nda ka aɓwana mǝnana wu came a nzǝmam aɓa kārǝkiban mǝnana kumam ngga.
LUK 22:29 Ace mani ka, ǝn pana wun gara-murǝm, kǝla mǝnana Tárrám pam ngga.
LUK 22:30 Wun nǝ̀ li, sǝ wun nǝ̀ nu atàm a Domurǝm mem, sǝ wun nǝ̀ do amur abuno-murǝm aban ɓashia atau mala Amǝ Isǝrayila mǝnia lum-nong-ɓari ka.
LUK 22:31 Yesu banggi Bitǝrus ama, <<Shiman, Shiman! Kwaki kiro! Shetan kǝ alte ama nǝ̀ sárǝ́ki wun kǝla sárǝ́ mǝsǝsa.
LUK 22:32 Sǝ mim ngga ǝn pangŋa hiwi aceo we Shiman, ace mǝnana paɓamuru mo ɓǝ̀ kǝa kpa ɗang. Sǝ ɓǝ̀a longŋa ka, ɓak ɓabum amǝ'eambo.>>
LUK 22:33 Bitǝrus eari wi ama, <<Mǝtalem, ǝn shamna bumam mǝ nǝ o atò a ndàkurban, sǝ mǝ nǝ wu atò!>>
LUK 22:34 Yesu pǝlǝi wi ama, <<Ən nggǝ no we Bitǝrus, yalung mǝnia ka kaniama nggu nǝ̀ ɓua ka, a nǝ tǝmcem kusǝ tàrú ama a súrǝàm ɗang!>>
LUK 22:35 Yesu pǝlǝa ɗì alaggana male ama, <<A pwari mǝno ǝn túr wun wu kya hamnǝ cau mem, sǝ wu pànǝ ndaboalo, ko luru-gya, ko ankura raka, wu ɗwanyi kǝgìr le?>> À eare ama <<Awo!>>
LUK 22:36 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Sǝ ado ka, koyana sǝ ndanǝ ndaboalo ko luru ka, ɓǝ̀ twali. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana pànǝ nggeabyau raka, ɓǝ̀ mak daura-múrɓì male ɓǝ̀ kúrô.
LUK 22:37 Mǝ ndaban bangga wun ama cau mǝnana à gilǝì aɓa Malǝmce ama, <À oasǝi atà amǝ'cauɓikea>ka, nǝ̀ lùmsǝo a muram pup. E, gìr mǝnana à gilǝì a muram ngga nda kǝ yiu a lùmsǝo ka.>>
LUK 22:38 Pǝlǝa alaggana male ne wi ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo! Sǝni! Anggea-byau ndya ɓari ka.>> Pǝlǝa Yesu banggia wia ama, <<Kārǝ́na ana!>>
LUK 22:39 Yesu lo o amur Nkono Olif kǝla mǝnana pakkiyi pwari-pwari ka. Pǝlǝa alaggana male o atè.
LUK 22:40 À kya bwalǝna banì ka, Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wu pak hiwi, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ wu kǝa kpa aɓa kārǝkiban raka.>>
LUK 22:41 Pǝlǝa upia wia zak, kya kū`ndǝó pak hiwi,
LUK 22:42 ama, <<Dâ, ɓǝ̀ awu nǝ ear ka, twàlâm mǝnia yì kwap mala tanni ka: sǝ mǝnia ka nê mem ma ɗang, ɓǝ̀ do ama nê mò na.>>
LUK 22:43 Kara mǝturonjar sulǝo a baní, ɓak ɓabumi.
LUK 22:44 Sǝ acemǝnana nda aɓa bumkiɗikea mǝgule ka, kutio arǝ hiwi nǝ rǝcandǝa. Piban mǝnana pur arǝì ka kǝ surkio a nzali kǝla nkila.
LUK 22:45 Lang Yesu loapi ban hiwi ka, nyare a ban alaggana male kya kumia a ntulo, acemǝnana à nda aɓa bumkiɗikea, mǝnana ɓungi rǝia ka.
LUK 22:46 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Mana tsǝa sǝ wu kùtí a nong'ntullo? Wu lo, wu pak hiwi, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ wu kǝa kpa aɓa kārǝkiban ɗang.>>
LUK 22:47 Kúni malaká pwal arǝ cau ɗang, kara ɓwabundǝa yi tusǝna. Yahuda, mwashat aɓalǝ alaggana Lum-nong-ɓari ka, nǝ̀ yinǝia. Pǝlǝa sung a ban Yesu, mǝn abui kùrrì arǝì.
LUK 22:48 Yesu pǝlǝa ɗì ama, <<Yahuda, a ndarǝ kúrkúró nǝ Muna Mala Ɓwa nǝ nuban a nkiu?>>
LUK 22:49 Lang alaggana mala Yesu mǝnana atè sǝn gìr mǝno nǝ̀ kumban ngga, pǝlǝa à ɗì ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm paktúró nǝ anggea-byau ma'sǝm le, Mǝtalabangŋo?>>
LUK 22:50 Kara mwashat aɓalǝ alaggana mala Yesu kwetǝ nggeabyau male, kwar guro mala Pǝris Mǝgule, kasǝ kiri mǝlì kpat.
LUK 22:51 Pǝlǝa Yesu na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ go anggo!>> Pǝlǝa je kir ɓwabure, sonzǝì.
LUK 22:52 Yesu pǝlǝa ne agbani pǝris andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ'yál Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, mǝnana à yiu arǝì ka ama, <<Wu yiu a rǝam nǝ anggea-byau andǝ agara-kwalta kǝla mǝ nda ɓwamǝgule mala amǝ'soakitau?
LUK 22:53 Ko aya pwari ka mǝ nda atà wun aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, sǝ wu loasǝ kun wun a rǝàm ɗàng. Sǝ bu-pwari man she ka ma'wun na, andǝ mala rǝcandǝa mala pǝndǝa.>>
LUK 22:54 À bwal Yesu, sǝ à dǝshina ɓala mala Pǝris Mǝgule nǝi. Sǝ Bitǝrus ka, tārǝtè kǝ o ateà.
LUK 22:55 Amǝ'yál palta ka à bwalǝna bǝsa a cengge à dumǝna a kúni. Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus yi do ateà.
LUK 22:56 Ɓè muna-ɓwama, mǝtúró-ɓala sǝni aban do a kun bǝsa. Sǝni kyap-kyap sǝ na ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, nda atè.>>
LUK 22:57 Bitǝrus pǝlǝa tǝmce ama, <<Ɓwama, ǝn súrǝ̀ ɓwe ɗàng!>>
LUK 22:58 Zuku ka, ɓeɓwa sǝn Bitǝrus sǝ na ama, <<We ka, a nda tea!>> Bitǝrus eare ama, <<Ɓwabura! Mǝ nda ɗang!>>
LUK 22:59 Anzǝm kǝla bu-pwari mwashat ka, ɓeɓwa cam kingging ama, <<Ɓafo, mǝnia yì ɓwa ka nda atè, acemǝnana yì gbal ka ɓwa Galili na.>>
LUK 22:60 Bitǝrus ama, <<Ɓwabura! Ən súrǝ̀ cau mǝnana a banggiyi ka ɗàng!>> Kúni malaká pwal ɗàng, kara nggu ɓua.
LUK 22:61 Mǝtalabangŋo pǝlǝ mǝsǝì sǝn Bitǝrus. Ɓalǝ Bitǝrus kasǝa arǝ cau mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo ne wi ama: <<Kaniama nggu nǝ̀ ɓua a bu du man yalung ngga, a nǝ tǝmce súrǝàm kusǝ tàrú.>>
LUK 22:62 Pǝlǝa puro a nza kya ɓua kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 22:63 Aɓwana mǝnana à cia ɓǝa yál Yesu ka, à oali, oalban kyauwikiban sǝ à walki.
LUK 22:64 À kùr amǝsǝì; pǝlǝa à koè a takiri sǝ à ɗì ama, <<Na sǝm, yana ɓwe na walo ka, we mǝɓangnǝa?>>
LUK 22:65 À naki wi acau mǝkwanrui sǝ à kǝ sanggì.
LUK 22:66 Lang ban fana ka, aɓwana-mǝgule, amǝkùrcau mala amǝ Yahudi, agbani pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, yi ramba, pǝlǝa à yinǝ Yesu a ɓadǝmbia.
LUK 22:67 À ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana Ɓakuli turi ka, na sǝm.>> Yesu earia wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ǝn bangga wun ngga, pà wun nǝ̀ earnǝ mim ɗang.
LUK 22:68 Sǝ ɓǝ̀n ɗì wun ngga, pà wu nǝ̀ pam eare ɗang.
LUK 22:69 Twal ado aban ká ka, Muna Mala Ɓwa nǝ̀ do a bù-mǝlì mala Ɓakuli mǝnana Karmur gulo kat ka.>>
LUK 22:70 Pǝlǝa yia kat ka à sà'arǝì ama, <<A ndarǝ bang ama a nda Muna mala Ɓakuli le?>> Pǝlǝa pea wia eare ama, <<Kǝ ndo wu na ka, Mǝ nda.>>
LUK 22:71 Pǝlǝa à na ama, <<Ya cau ɗǝm sǝm alta oe? Sǝm ongŋǝni àkǝ̀ mburkuni!>>
LUK 23:1 Yia kat ka à lo à warinǝ Yesu a ɓadǝm Bilatus.
LUK 23:2 Pǝlǝa à tita tsǝki wi acau arǝì ama, <<Sǝm kum mǝnia yì ɓwa ka aban soakita aɓwana, ama ɓǝà kǝa pè Kaisar, murǝm mǝgule mala amǝ Roma, boalo-cemi ɗàng. Ɗǝm ngga kǝ na ama, yì ka, nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana Ɓakuli túrí ka, sǝ kǝ ne rǝì ama murǝm na.>>
LUK 23:3 Pǝlǝa Bilatus ɗì Yesu ama, <<A nda murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi le?>> Yesu eare ama, <<Nda kǝla mǝnana à na ka.>>
LUK 23:4 Pǝlǝa Bilatus ne agbani pǝris andǝ aɓwana ama, <<Ən kum kǝgìr mǝɓane arǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka ɗàng.>>
LUK 23:5 Pǝlǝa à ginǝ kpékpé ama, <<Kànìgìr male aɓa nzali Yahudi kǝ tsǝk aɓwana ɓǝà loasǝ munǝo arǝ amǝ'talanzali Roma. Tita mǝnia yì gir ka a Galili, ndya yi bwalǝna ban man kat.>>
LUK 23:6 Lang Bilatus nǝ̀ ok anggo ka, pǝlǝa ɗiban ama, <<Ɓwe ka ɓwa Galili na le?>>
LUK 23:7 Lang sǝlǝna ama Yesu ka puro a nzali mǝnana aɓata yálban mala murǝm Hirǝdus ka, pǝlǝa tasǝi a ban Hirǝdus, mǝnana yì gbal ka nda a Urǝshalima àkǝ̀ ɓalǝ anongge mǝno ka.
LUK 23:8 Lang Hirǝdus sǝn Yesu ka, banɓoari wi kǝ̀rkǝ́r, acemǝnana banì sauwuna nda ban alta sǝn Yesu. Aɓa cau mǝnana ok amurí ka, tsǝkbumi ama nǝ̀ sǝn Yesu aban pak gir'ndali.
LUK 23:9 Pǝlǝa ɗiki nǝ aɗiban pas, sǝ kǝ do mala Yesu kúni più.
LUK 23:10 Agbani pǝris andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa mǝnana abanì ka, à lo nǝ rǝcandǝa aban tsǝki Yesu acau arǝì ɗàngɗáng.
LUK 23:11 Hirǝdus andǝ asoje male pak ceì ɓà, à nyesǝi gìr oalo na. À makki wi adaura murǝm arǝì pǝlǝa à nyesǝi a ban Bilatus.
LUK 23:12 Àkǝ̀ bu-pwari mǝno ka Hirǝdus andǝ Bilatus ka à duk agyajam, acemǝnana ɗiɗyal ka à earkiyi mǝsǝarǝia ɗàng.
LUK 23:13 Bilatus tunǝ agbani pǝris, andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule, andǝ acilia aɓwana.
LUK 23:14 Nea wia ama, <<Wu yiu nǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka a banam, wu na ama kǝ soakita aɓwana ɓǝà lo munǝo. Ən ɗiki akani amǝsǝ wun, sǝ aɓalǝ acau mǝnana wu bang amurí ka, ǝn kum ko kǝcau mwashat mǝnana mǝsǝcau na ka ɗàng.
LUK 23:15 Hirǝdus gbal ka kumi nǝ kǝ cauɓikea ɗang, ndya nyesǝi a ban sǝm ngga. Kǝla mǝnana ado wu kǝ sǝni ka, kǝ ɓè gìr pà kàm pè mǝnana ɓoro ɓǝà wal-luí ace ka ɗàng.
LUK 23:16 Ace mani ka mǝ nǝ koè sǝ mǝ nǝ ɗeki ɓǝ̀ o.>>
LUK 23:17 [A koya Pwari Lamsan Yàlîmurû ka, dumǝna púp Bilatus nǝ̀ panzǝia wia ɓwa mwashat atà aɓwana mǝnana à kùrria ka.]
LUK 23:18 Ɓwabunda kat loasǝ già ama, <<Wal-lú mǝnia yì ɓwa ka! Panzǝa sǝm Barabbas!>>
LUK 23:19 (Barabbas ka ɓeɓwa na à oasǝi a ndàkurban ace loasǝ munǝo mǝnana kumban aɓa Urǝshalima, sǝ ace wal-lú ɗǝm.)
LUK 23:20 Bilatus ka kǝ earce ama nǝ̀ nying Yesu ɓǝ̀ o, nda sǝ nyare zǝmbia wia.
LUK 23:21 Kara à came arǝ loasǝ già ama, <<Ɓǝà gballì a nggun! Ɓǝà gballì a nggun!>>
LUK 23:22 Bilatus nyar tàruià ka nea wia ama, <<Ace mana le? Ya cauɓikea nda mǝnia yì ɓwa ka pa? Ən kum kǝ mǝɓane mǝnana ɓǝà wal-luí ace ka ɗàng. Ace mani ka mǝ nǝ koè sǝ mǝ nǝ nyi ɓǝ̀ o.>>
LUK 23:23 Kara à loasǝ già kǝ̀rkǝ́r ama she ɓǝà gbàllì Yesu a nggun, gandǝa cau malea kya parban.
LUK 23:24 Bilatus gandǝa eare ama ɓǝà pakkia wia gìr mǝnana bumia kànì ka.
LUK 23:25 Panzǝia wia ɓwa mǝnana à earce ka ɓǝ̀ o, yì ɓwa mana à túrí a ndàkurban ace loasǝ munǝo andǝ wal-lú ka. Sǝ twal Yesu pea wia ɓǝà pakki wi gìr mǝnana bumia kànì ka.
LUK 23:26 Lang à nungina Yesu aban o ka, à kya kum Shiman ɓwa Sayirin, pur nǝ ɓabondo nǝ̀ ká aɓa nggea-là. À bwali à parri wi nggun-gangndǝi amurí, sǝ à tsǝì ɓǝ̀ twali, ɓǝ̀ kpa nǝi atà Yesu.
LUK 23:27 Ɓwabunda kǝ̀rkǝ́r kpate aban o andǝ amamǝna mǝnana à kǝ ɓua, à kǝ keban ace ka.
LUK 23:28 Yesu pǝlǝ rǝì nea wia ama: Wun amamǝna mala amǝ Urǝshalima, wu kǝa ɓua acem ɗàng, wu ɓua ace ɓamur rǝ wun andǝ amuna ma'wun.
LUK 23:29 Acemǝnana aɓea apwari nǝ̀ nggá yiu mǝnana wun nǝ̀ na ama, <<Tsǝkbu nda amur amamǝna mǝnana à nkombi na, mǝnana à ɓǝl àkǝ muna raka, andǝ akiura mǝnana kǝ muna nuia àkǝ̀ pwari raka!>>
LUK 23:30 A pwari mǝno ka, <<Aɓwana nǝ̀ ne ankono mǝdārike cau ama, <Wu kpa amur sǝm!> Sǝ à nǝ̀ ne amuna-nkono ama, <Wu kùmsǝó amur sǝm!> >>
LUK 23:31 Ɓǝ̀ ɓwapǝndǝa kǝ pak amǝnia yì agir, mǝnana nggun nda andǝa pwale ka, lang sǝ nǝ̀ pa, yì mǝnana ɓǝ̀ imǝna ka?
LUK 23:32 Aɓea aɓwana ɓari, yia kǝm ngga amǝ'ɓealɓikea na, à warinǝia à nǝ̀ nggá wal-luia andǝ Yesu.
LUK 23:33 Lang à yì bwalǝna ban mǝnana à tunǝki ama, Nkpoula Ɓamuru ka, pǝlǝa à gbàllì Yesu kàm amur nggun-gangndǝi, atārǝia andǝ amǝ'ɓealɓikea mǝnia ɓari ka, mwashat atà buì mǝlì, sǝ man mwashat ka, atà buì mǝ'nggare.
LUK 23:34 Pǝlǝa Yesu na ama, <<Dâ, twalia wia banì, acemǝnana à súrǝ̀ gir mana à pakkiyi ka ɗàng.>> Pǝlǝa asoje kocàca amur agir-nggūrǝu male, à gakkia rǝia.
LUK 23:35 Ɓwapǝndǝa came aban sǝnban, sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule oali, ama, <<Kǝ amsǝ aɓea aɓwana, ɓǝ̀ amsǝ ɓamur rǝì, ɓǝ̀ yì ka, nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana Ɓakuli tarrì ka!>>
LUK 23:36 Nggearǝ asoje gbal ka, à oali, sǝ à lo à yì pe wi mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap mǝhangŋe.
LUK 23:37 Sǝ à na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a nda murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi ka, amsǝ ɓamur rǝò.>>
LUK 23:38 A múrí a kùli arǝ kpamgbang ngga, à gilǝ amǝnia yì acau ka:
LUK 23:39 Mwashat atà amǝ'ɓealɓikea mǝnana à gbàllia akanó ka, ne Yesu cau kyauwikiban gbal ama, <<A nda Kǝrǝsti mbak? Amsǝ ɓamur rǝò sǝ wu amsǝ sǝm!>>
LUK 23:40 Ɓì mǝɓealɓikea gimbi ne wi ama, <<We ka, a ɓanggi Ɓakuli re, yi mǝnana kǝ ɓashi mǝ'mwashati mala lú nda à kàsǝô ka?
LUK 23:41 Ma'sǝm ngga à kasǝa sǝm ɓashi amur mǝsǝcau gìr mǝnana sǝm pè ka. Sǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka pàk kǝ mǝɓane ɗàng.>>
LUK 23:42 Pǝlǝa na ama, <<Yesu, ɗenyi nǝ mim ɓǝà kutina a Domurǝm mò ka.>>
LUK 23:43 Yesu earî wi ama, <<Ɓafo na ǝn nggǝ nô ka, yalung ngga a nda atàm a là do banɓoarna mala Ɓakuli.>>
LUK 23:44 Lang pwari bwalǝna ɓong múrú ka, pǝndǝa yi gir ban, bà bu-pwari tàrú mala pwarikpǝra.
LUK 23:45 Lagir mǝnana à kasǝna Ban Mǝfele nǝi a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, kara zanzǝa a ɓalǝu.
LUK 23:46 Pǝlǝa Yesu loasǝ gì bàng-bàng ama, <<Dâ! A ɓabuo sǝ ǝn nggǝ pa bangŋo mem!>> Lang bangŋǝna anggo ka, kara yilǝmi pùró.
LUK 23:47 Ɓwamǝgule soje sǝn gìr mǝnana kumban ngga, ɓwangsǝ Ɓakuli, na ama, <<Ɓafo na, mǝnia yì Ɓwa ka Mǝɓealɓoarna na.>>
LUK 23:48 Lang ɓwabundǝa mǝnana ramba ace sǝn gbàllì Yesu, sǝn gìr mǝnana kumban ngga, à wal kikilia, à pǝlǝ nzǝmia à o nǝ bumkiɗikea.
LUK 23:49 Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana à súrǝ̀ Yesu, andǝ amamǝna mǝnana à pur andǝi a Galili ka, à cam zak, sǝ à kǝ sǝn amǝnia yì agir ka.
LUK 23:50 Ɓè ɓwa nakam lùllǝì ama, Yisǝfu, ɓwa Arimatiya mala nzali Yahudi. Yì ka, nda aɓalǝ amǝ kùrcau mala amǝ Yahudi, mǝ'ɓealɓoarne na. Yì ka, gìr mǝnana aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi pàk ka, earnǝ kǝ ɓè ateà ɗàng. Yì ka, ndarǝ kundǝ yiu mala Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 23:52 Yì nda mana wari a ban Bilatus kya zǝm lú Yesu ka.
LUK 23:53 Pǝlǝa kya sulǝ lú, marǝki aɓa nggurbyau pwasǝa, sǝ tsǝì a ɓembe mǝnana à tǝmi aɓa tali, yì mǝnana à malaká tsǝk kǝɓwa kàm raka.
LUK 23:54 Pwari mǝno ka nda pwari gilǝrǝu ace Sabbat, mǝnana malanǝ̀ tite ka.
LUK 23:55 Amamǝna mana à yiu andǝ Yesu nǝ Galili ka à o atà Yisǝfu, à kya sǝn ɓembe andǝ nongsǝo mǝnana à nongsǝ luí a ɓembe ka.
LUK 23:56 Pǝlǝa à nyare à o a là, à kya alta amùrú andǝ amuku agir mǝ'rǝmɓoarne. Sǝ à usǝlǝo a Pwari Sabbat, acemǝnana ɓǝà kpata Nzongcau ka.
LUK 24:1 A pwari Ladi, pwari mǝdǝmbe anzǝm pwari Sabbat nǝ budǝmbari ɗiɗyal, amamǝna twal muku agir mǝ'rǝmɓoarne mǝnana à gilǝkicea ka, sǝ à o a ɓembe.
LUK 24:2 À kya kum tali ka à gǝshini a kun ɓembe.
LUK 24:3 Sǝ lang à kútí ka, à kum lú Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu ɗàng.
LUK 24:4 À ndaban ndali nǝ mǝnia yì gìr ka, kara aɓwana ɓari nǝ agir-nggūrǝu mǝnana à kǝ tà'nzama pǝlilip ka, à came a bania.
LUK 24:5 Nǝ ɓangciu a rǝia amamǝna man ti múrià a nzali. Sǝ aɓwana mǝno nea wia ama, <<Ace mana sǝ wu kǝ alta ɓwa mǝnana nǝ yilǝmu ka aɓalǝ alú?
LUK 24:6 Pa kani ɗang, longŋǝna! Wu ɗenyi nǝ cau mǝnana bangga wun yì mana nda a Galili ka
LUK 24:7 ama, <À nǝ̀ pà Muna mala Ɓwa a bu amǝ'cauɓikea, à nǝ̀ gbàllì a nggun, sǝ a tàruià nongŋo ka nǝ̀ lo nǝ yilǝmu.> >>
LUK 24:8 Pǝlǝa ɓalǝ amamǝna man kasǝa arǝ acau male.
LUK 24:9 Lang à nyàrǝ́nì ɓembe ɓa-tali ka, à kya ne alaggana mana lum-nong-mwashat ka andǝ acili amǝkpate kat.
LUK 24:10 A Maryamu Ɓwa Magdala, andǝ Joana, andǝ Maryamu nggea Jemis, andǝ aɓea amamǝna, à nda à yì banggi amǝ'mishan male cê ka.
LUK 24:11 Sǝ yia ka à earnǝ cau mala amamǝne ɗàng, a bania ka cau mǝɓane na à banggi ka.
LUK 24:12 Sǝ Bitǝrus ka lo ɓangŋa aban ká ɓembe; kya kū`ndǝó sǝ kǝ anggurbyau múr lú nda sǝn aban nongŋo ka. Pǝlǝa nyare aban o kǝ ndali nǝ gir mǝnana kumban ngga.
LUK 24:13 Àkǝ̀ pwari mǝno ka aɓwana ɓari atà amǝkpata Yesu puro aban ká a muna-là mǝnana à tunǝki ama Imawus, mana nre andǝ Urǝshalima ka mel tongno nong-ɓari na ka.
LUK 24:14 À ndarǝ naki acau amur gir mǝnana kumban ngga.
LUK 24:15 Lang à nda aɓa naki acau andǝ ɗiki rǝarǝia amur amǝnia yì agir ka, Yesu nǝ nggearǝì ka yiu bwal teà sǝ kǝ gya andǝia aban ká.
LUK 24:16 À sǝni, sǝ ko à gandǝ súrǝè ɗàng.
LUK 24:17 Pǝlǝa Yesu ɗia ama, <<Mana gir nì nda wu nakiyia, nǝ pǝlǝki ce arǝ wun aban ká ɗe?>> À go kusǝia à cam più, ɓamǝsǝia kìɗìkì.
LUK 24:18 Ɓwa mwashat aɓalǝia, lùllǝì ama Kǝliyopas, ɗì ama, <<A nda kǝ bǝri nǝmurǝo a Urǝshalima mǝnana a sǝlǝce agir mǝnana à kumban aɓalǝ anonggio mǝnia ka ɗang?>>
LUK 24:19 Pǝlǝa ɗia ma, <<A ya gìr nani?>> À eari wi ama, <<Agir mǝnana à kum Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat. Yì ka, mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na, sǝ ndanǝ rǝcandǝa aɓa cau andǝ túró a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli andǝ ɓwapǝndǝa kat.
LUK 24:20 Agbani pǝris andǝ amurǝma ma'sǝm ramte ama ɓǝà kya kasǝi wi ɓashi lú, pǝlǝa à gbàllì a nggun.
LUK 24:21 Sǝm ndanǝ tsǝkɓalǝu ama nda ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ yia amsǝ amǝ Isǝrayila ka! Ɗǝm ngga tàruià nongŋo ndya yalung mǝnana mǝnia yì agir kumban ngga.
LUK 24:22 Nyar ɗǝm ngga, aɓea amamǝna aɓalǝ sǝm yi na sǝm cau ndali. Yalung nǝ dǝmbari ka à wari a ɓembe,
LUK 24:23 sǝ à kya kum luí ɗàng. À nyare à yì na sǝm ama à sǝn causǝna mala amǝturonjar, mǝnana à bang ama ndanǝ yilǝmu ka.
LUK 24:24 Sǝ aɓea aɓwana aɓalǝ sǝm wari a ɓembe à kya kum gìr nî anggo kǝla mǝnana amamǝna na ka, sǝ yì ka, à sǝni ɗàng.>>
LUK 24:25 Pǝlǝa Yesu nea wia ama, <<Wu gǝmi fat, sǝ ɓamur wun dǝmbǝri arǝ bwalta acau mǝnana kat amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na ka!
LUK 24:26 Wu sǝlǝ mbo ama dumǝna púp Kǝrǝsti ka nǝ̀ nu tanni nǝ̀ amǝnia yì agir ka, sǝ nǝ̀ kutio aɓa gulo male?>>
LUK 24:27 Pǝlǝa tite nǝ Nggurcau mala Musa andǝ Kànìgìr mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli kat, bǝlkia wia ɓalǝ acau mǝnana à gilǝia aɓalǝ Amalǝmce amurí ka.
LUK 24:28 Lang à gbàshìnà ban muna-là mǝnana à kǝ ká kàm ngga, Yesu pa kǝla nǝ̀ kutio a dǝmba,
LUK 24:29 sǝ à ne wi ama, <<Nongŋo a ban sǝm, pwari kpana, sǝ dù malanǝ̀ pǝndǝa.>> Pǝlǝa o ateà.
LUK 24:30 À yì dumǝna amur girlina ka, yi twal bǝredi, pàkkî Ɓakuli yàwá, sǝ ɓwani pea wia.
LUK 24:31 Anggo ka, kara mǝsǝia mǝnna sǝ à sǝlǝ ama yì na, kara ndǝrmi a rǝia.
LUK 24:32 Sǝ à ɗì rǝarǝia ama, <<Ashe pa ɓà sǝ ɓabum sǝm kǝ pi mǝnana nda ban na sǝm acau a tanjargula, sǝ kǝ bǝlkia sǝm ɓalǝ Amalǝmce mala Ɓakuli ka ɗàng.>>
LUK 24:33 Pǝlǝa à lo à nyare a kusǝia aban ká Urǝshalima. À kya kum alaggana male mana lum nong-mwashat ka andǝ acilia à dapina a banɓwáná,
LUK 24:34 aban na ama, <<Mǝsǝcau na! Mǝtalabangŋo longŋǝni ɓembe nǝ yilǝmu, yi pusǝrǝi a ban Shiman Bitǝrus!>>
LUK 24:35 Amǝnia ɓari ka à na ce gìr mǝnana kumia a njargula Imawus ka, andǝ súrǝó mǝnana à yì súrǝ̀ Yesu anzǝm mana ɓwanǝna bǝredi ka.
LUK 24:36 Kúnià malaká pwal arǝ acau mǝnana à nakiyi ka ɗàng, kara Yesu pusǝrǝi aɓalǝia, sǝ nea wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝ wun pwalo!>>
LUK 24:37 À ndali, ɓangciu pakkia wia, à twali kǝla lú na à sǝn ngga.
LUK 24:38 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Palang sǝ ɓangciu bwal wun anggo, sǝ wu do nǝ tuti a ɗenyicau ma'wun?
LUK 24:39 Wu sǝn abuam andǝ akusǝam, mǝ nda nǝ ɓamúràm! Wu jem, sǝ wu sǝni, acemǝnana lú pànǝ́ nyama andǝ amú kǝla mǝnana wu sǝni mǝ ndanǝia ka ɗàng.>>
LUK 24:40 Lang nania wia anggo ka, pǝlǝa lǝmdǝia wia abui andǝ akusǝi.
LUK 24:41 Sǝ à nda più aɓa ɗwanyi earnǝ cau a ɓabumia, atàcau mala bumpwasǝa andǝ ndali ka, Yesu pǝlǝa ɗia ama, <<Wu ndanǝ kǝ girlina kani le?>>
LUK 24:42 À twal nji mǝtwane à pe wi.
LUK 24:43 Pǝlǝa é sǝ she, àkǝ̀ mǝsǝia.
LUK 24:44 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda cau mǝnana ǝn bangga wun, mana sǝm nda a tarǝ sǝm ngga. Koya gìr mǝnana à gilǝì a muram aɓa Nggurcau mala Musa andǝ amalǝmce mala Amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli andǝ Anggyal ka, dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ lùmsǝo.>>
LUK 24:45 Pǝlǝa mǝn ɗenyicau malea ace mǝnana ɓǝà súrǝ̀ Amalǝmce mala Ɓakuli.
LUK 24:46 Nyare nea wia ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda gìr mǝnana à gilǝ ka: Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban, nǝ̀ nu tanni, nǝ̀ wu, sǝ nǝ̀ loapi ɓembe nǝ yilǝmu, a tàruià pwari.
LUK 24:47 Sǝ cau mala pwanzali a mala vwaki bu arǝ cauɓikea, andǝ twalban cauɓikea ka, à nǝ̀ hamnǝi aɓa lùllǝì, arǝ anzali kat, à nǝ̀ tite a Urǝshalima.
LUK 24:48 Wun nda ka amǝ'nakún mala mǝnia yì agir ka a ban aɓwana.
LUK 24:49 Ado ka, mǝ nǝ tasǝa wun Bangŋo Mǝfele mǝnana Tárrám bang ama nǝ̀ pà wun ngga. Sǝama wun nǝ̀ kúndǝô a Urǝshalima, she ɓǝ̀ rǝcandǝa mǝnana pur nǝ kuli sulǝna amur wun ngga.>>
LUK 24:50 Pǝlǝa puro andǝia à kya bwal Betani. Loasǝ buì a kùli sǝ tsǝkia wia bù.
LUK 24:51 Nda rǝ tsǝkia wia bù ka, kara nyia, pǝlǝa à twali aban ká a kùli.
LUK 24:52 À peri a baní, sǝ à nyare aban ká a Urǝshalima nǝ bumpwasǝa kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
LUK 24:53 Koya pwari ka à kǝ wari aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, à kǝ mal pwari malea kàm aban ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli.
JOH 1:1 Kaniama Ɓakuli nǝ̀ pusǝ ɓanza ka, Cau ni nda kam, sǝ mǝno yì Cau ka à nda tàrǝia andǝ Ɓakuli; sǝ yì, yì Cau ka Ɓakuli na.
JOH 1:2 A tite ka à nda andǝ Ɓakuli.
JOH 1:3 Nǝ yi sǝ Ɓakuli pusǝ agir kat. Kǝgìr pà kàm mwashat mana à pusǝì mǝnana nǝ yi sǝ à pusǝì raka.
JOH 1:4 Yì nda tǝr yilǝmu, sǝ mǝnia yì yilǝmu ka yiu nǝ tǎlaban aban ɓwapǝndǝa.
JOH 1:5 Sǝ yì tǎlaban ngga kǝ ta aɓa pǝndǝa sǝ pǝndǝa ka gandǝ bwalte ɗàng!
JOH 1:6 Ɓè ɓwa yiu, mǝ'njar mǝnana Ɓakuli túrí ka, lùllǝì ama Yohana.
JOH 1:7 Yiu yi ne ɓwapǝndǝa cau amur mǝnia yì tǎlaban ngga, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ɓwapǝndǝa kat ok mǝnia yì cau ka, ɓǝ̀ é.
JOH 1:8 Yohana nǝ ɓamúrì ka nda tǎlabanì ɗang; yì ka, yiu ace nacau amur tǎlabanì.
JOH 1:9 Tǎlaban mǝ'mǝsǝcau nì, mǝnana kǝ ta aban ɓwapǝndǝa kat ka, ndo kǝ yiu a ɓanza ka.
JOH 1:10 Yì Cau ka nda a ɓanza, sǝ kat andǝ amani ama nǝ yi sǝ à pusǝ ɓanza ka, ɓanza súrǝì ɗàng.
JOH 1:11 Yiu aban aɓwana mǝnana amale na ka, sǝ amale é ɗàng.
JOH 1:12 Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à é, à pa ɓamuria a baní ka, pània wia rǝcandǝa ɓǝà duk amuna mala Ɓakuli.
JOH 1:13 Ɓǝlban malea ka, mala nkila na andǝ nggūrǝu ɗang. Pa aɓa kpapi mala ɓwama andǝ ɓwabura ɗang. Mǝnia ka pe mala Ɓakuli na.
JOH 1:14 Mǝnia yì Cau ka yi duk ɓwamǝpǝndǝe, sǝ yi duk zuku aɓalǝ sǝm. Sǝm sǝna gulo male, gulo mala kǝ̀ Muna mwashat ɓǝ̀rɓǝ̀r, mana pur nǝban Tárrí Ɓakuli ka, lùmsǝo nǝ ɓwamuru andǝ mǝsǝcau.
JOH 1:15 Yohana ne aɓwana cau amurí nǝ giu mǝcandǝe ama, <<Mǝnia ka nda ɓwa mǝnana ǝn na wun cau amurí nǝma nda ban yiu a nzǝmam ngga, sǝ yì ka, kútiǎm nǝ gulo, acemǝnana yì ka, ndakam ɗiɗyal sǝ à yì ɓǝ̀lám.>>
JOH 1:16 Aɓa ɓwamuru andǝ mǝnbu male sǝ tsǝka sǝm bu kat, kǝ pa sǝm agir mǝɓoarne a nzǝmarǝia.
JOH 1:17 Ɓakuli pa sǝm Nggurcau nǝ bu Musa, sǝ nǝ bu Yesu Kǝrǝsti sǝ pa sǝm ɓwamuru andǝ mǝsǝcau.
JOH 1:18 Kǝ ɓwa sǝn ma Ɓakuli àkǝ̀ pwari ɗàng, she kǝ Muni mǝnana à nda mwashat andǝ yi, sǝ nda a nkanggari ka. Yì nda tsǝa sǝ sǝm súrǝ̀ Tárrí ka.
JOH 1:19 Aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi mǝnana a Urǝshalima ka à túr apǝris andǝ Amǝ'Lawi ɓǝà kya ɗì Yohana ama, yì ka, nda yana le?
JOH 1:20 Yohana sǝmbǝrǝia wia kǝgìr ɗàng, banggia wia mǝsǝcau ama, <<Mǝ nda Kǝrǝsti ɗàng.>>
JOH 1:21 À ɗì ama, <<Sǝ we ka a nda yana? A nda Iliya le?>> Yohana earia wia ama, <<Awo, mǝ nda yì ɗàng.>> Sǝ à ɗì ama, <<A nda mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mǝnana sǝm nggǝ kundǝmuri ka le?>> Earia wia ama, <<Awo.>>
JOH 1:22 A masǝlǝate ka à ɗì ama, <<Na sǝm cau mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝm nyesǝi aɓwana mǝnana à túr sǝm ngga. A kǝ twali ɓamuro ama a nda yana?>>
JOH 1:23 Yohana earia wia nǝ cau mala Ishaya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ama, <<Mǝ nda gìu mǝnana kǝ hama a ɓabondo ka, ama, <Wu tsǝk njargula ɓǝ cam kporong ace Mǝtalabangŋo.> >>
JOH 1:24 Aɓea amǝ Farisi mǝnana à túriá ka,
JOH 1:25 à ɗì Yohana ama, <<Sǝ ɓǝ̀ a nda Kǝrǝsti, ko Iliya, ko mǝno yì mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli raka, palang sǝ a kǝ pakki aɓwana batisǝma?>>
JOH 1:26 Yohana earia wia ama, <<Ən nggǝ pakki aɓwana batisǝma nǝ mùr, sǝ ɓeɓwa nda came aɓalǝ wun mǝnana wu súrǝì raka,
JOH 1:27 yì ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana kǝ yiu a tam tù ka, ǝn kārǝa mǝ nǝ panzǝ anggur-nkura male ka ɗàng.>>
JOH 1:28 Mǝnia yì gir ka à pè a Betani, a nkaring Nggeasala Jodan, àkǝ̀ ban mǝnana Yohana pakkiyi batisǝma kam ngga.
JOH 1:29 Ɓè ban fana ka, Yohana sǝn Yesu aban yiu nǝ bani, sǝ pǝlǝa na ama, <<Wu sǝn Mǝgam mala Ɓakuli, mǝnana twalkiyi cauɓikea mala ɓanza ka!
JOH 1:30 Mǝnia ka nda ɓwa mǝnana ǝn na ce ama, <Ɓè ɓwa nda kǝ yiu atàm ngga. Yì ka, kútiǎm nǝ gulo, acemǝnana yì ka, ndakam ɗiɗyal sǝ à yì ɓǝlam.>
JOH 1:31 Nggearǝ mim ngga ǝn súrǝì ɗiɗyal ɗang, sǝ tǝr yiu mem mǝnana ǝn nggǝ pakki aɓwana batisǝma nǝ mùr ka nda ace mǝnana ɓǝà lǝmdǝì amǝ Isǝrayila rǝì ka.>>
JOH 1:32 Pǝlǝa Yohana bang gìr mǝnana súrǝì amurí ka ani: <<Ən sǝn Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli kǝla kutu, sulǝ nǝ kuli yi do amurí.
JOH 1:33 Ɓǝ́ pà mǝ nǝ súrǝì ɗàng, ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli mǝnana tasǝam ama ɓǝ̀n yi pakki aɓwana batisǝma nǝ múr ka nda nam raka. Nam ama, <Ɓwa mǝnana a sǝni Bangŋo mem sulǝo yi do amurí ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ pakki aɓwana batisǝma nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele ka.>
JOH 1:34 Ən sǝnǝni sǝ ǝn nggǝ bangcau amurí ama, yì ka, nda Muna mala Ɓakuli.>>
JOH 1:35 Ɓè ban fana ka, Yohana nda kano ɗǝm andǝ aɓea alaggana male ɓari.
JOH 1:36 Lang nǝ̀ sǝn Yesu aban kutio ka, na ama, <<Wu sǝn Mǝgam mala Ɓakuli!>>
JOH 1:37 Lang alaggana mǝnia ɓari à ongŋǝni náná anggo ka, kara à o atà Yesu.
JOH 1:38 Yesu nǝ̀ pǝlǝ rǝì ka, kara sǝnia aban yiu atè, sǝ ɗia ama, <<Mana wu earki ce?>> À eare ama, <<Rabbi a ya ban sǝ a pa?>> (Rabbi ka ɓālǝi nda Malǝm.)
JOH 1:39 Yesu earia wia ama, <<Wu yiu wu yi sǝni.>> À pǝlǝa à wario à kya sǝn ban-do male. Sǝ à kya do atè bà du. Anggo ka bu-pwari ine nǝ pwarikpǝra na.
JOH 1:40 Ɓè ɓwa mwashat atà mǝnia yì aɓwana ɓari mǝnana à ok cau mǝnana Yohana na ka nda Andǝru, mǝ'eam Shiman Bitǝrus.
JOH 1:41 Andǝru pǝlǝa kum mǝ'eambi Shiman, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Sǝm kumǝna Mezaya (Tǝr Mezaya nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana Ɓakuli bang ama nǝ̀ tasǝi ka.)>>
JOH 1:42 Sǝ yiu nǝ Shiman aban Yesu. Yesu sǝni kyap-kyap, sǝ na ama, <<A nda Shiman muna mala Yohana. À nǝ̀ tunǝo ama, Kefas.>> (Tǝr Kefas nda Bitǝrus, ɓālǝi ama, Tali.)
JOH 1:43 Ɓè ban fana ka, Yesu twali a ɓabumi ama nǝ̀ o a Galili. Yi kum Filip sǝ ne wi ama, <<Yiu atàm.>>
JOH 1:44 Filip ka ɓwa Beseda na, la mala Andǝru andǝ Bitǝrus.
JOH 1:45 Filip alta Nataniyel yi kumi sǝ ne wi ama, <<Sǝm kumǝna ɓwa mǝnana Musa gilǝgir amurí aɓa malǝmce Nggurcau mala Musa, andǝ mǝnana à gilǝa aɓa malǝmce mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ka, yì Yesu ɓwa Nazarat, muna mala Yisǝfu.>>
JOH 1:46 Nataniyel na ama, <<A Nazarat! Kǝ gir mǝɓoarne nǝ̀ pur a Nazarat gbal?>> Filip ne wi ama, <<Yiu sǝni.>>
JOH 1:47 Lang Yesu sǝn Nataniyel aban yiu ka, nacau amurí ama, <<Mǝnia ka ɓwa Isǝrayila mǝɓafoe na, mǝnana pànǝ nyir arǝì raka.>>
JOH 1:48 Nataniyel ɗì Yesu ama, <<A pak lang sǝ a súrǝàm?>> Yesu eari wi ama, <<Mǝnana a nda a tǝta nggun vwari ka, ǝn angŋa dǝmba ǝn sǝnǝ no, sǝ Filip tunǝo.>>
JOH 1:49 Pǝlǝa Nataniyel ne Yesu ama, <<Rabbi, a nda Muna mala Ɓakuli! A nda Murǝm mala amǝ Isǝrayila!>>
JOH 1:50 Yesu ne Nataniyel ama, <<A earnǝ mim acemǝnana ǝn banggo nǝma, ǝn sǝno a tǝta nggun vwari ka le? A nǝ sǝn agir mǝgulke mǝnana à kútì man ngga.>>
JOH 1:51 Yesu nyare nea wia ama, <<Ən nggǝ na wun mǝsǝcau, wun nǝ̀ sǝn kùli nǝ mǝnna, andǝ amǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli aban eauwe andǝ sulǝo amur Muna mala Ɓwa.>>
JOH 2:1 A tàruià nongŋo ka, à ndanǝ isǝban a Kana a nzali Galili, sǝ nggea Yesu ndakam abanì.
JOH 2:2 À tunǝ Yesu andǝ alaggana male aban isǝbanì.
JOH 2:3 À nda ɓá pakkiɗire ka, mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap málá a rǝia. Nggea Yesu yi ne wi ama, <<Mùr ɓǝlanggun anap malea malǝna.>>
JOH 2:4 Pǝlǝa Yesu eari wi ama, <<Nnâ, palang sǝ a oasǝam aɓa ce? Bu-pwari mala lǝmdǝrǝu mem malaká karǝ peatu ɗàng.>>
JOH 2:5 Nggea Yesu ne amǝ gau girlina ama, <<Wu pàk gìr mǝnana kat bangga wun ngga.>>
JOH 2:6 Àkǝ̀ banì ka, aganggǝlang mǝnana à kwária aɓa tali ka à ndakam, yia tongno-nong-mwashat; amǝnana amǝ Yahudi kǝ soak mùr aɓalǝia à kǝ lákkína rǝia nǝi andǝ agir ace peri a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli ka. Ko mǝ ye ka kǝ twal amunabang-mùr lumi-ɓari ko lumi-tàrú.
JOH 2:7 Yesu ne amǝ gau girlina ama, <<Wu to mùr wu lumsǝki aganggǝlang.>> Sǝ à lumsǝkia kat nǝ mur.
JOH 2:8 Sǝ nea wia ama, <<Adyan ngga wu ɗàrǝa wu kya pe ɓwamǝgule mala pakkiɗire isǝban.>> Pǝlǝa à ɗàrǝa à wari wi nǝi.
JOH 2:9 Sǝ ɓwamǝgule mala pakkiɗire isǝban ok mùr mǝnana à nyesǝi pǝlǝna mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap ka. Sǝ yì ka, súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana à pusǝ mǝnia yì mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap kàm ngga ɗàng (sǝ amǝ gau girlina mǝnana à ɗàrǝ́ mùr nì ka à sǝlǝna). Sǝ pǝlǝa tunǝ bura-māfela a giriban.
JOH 2:10 Sǝ na ama, <<Aɓwana pak ka à kǝ yinǝ mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap mǝɓoarne a dǝmba, ɓǝ̀ abǝri nùna karǝnia ka, sǝ à kǝ yiu nǝ mǝnana twal tè ka; sǝ mò ka a tsǝk mǝɓoarne a nzǝ́mò!>>
JOH 2:11 Gir'ndǝliki mǝnia Yesu pè a Kana, a nzali Galili ka, nda mǝdǝmbe mala agir-ndali male mǝnana lǝmdǝ gulo male ka. Sǝ alaggana male sǝni à pa ɓamuria a baní.
JOH 2:12 Anzǝm man ngga, Yesu andǝ ngge andǝ amǝ'eambi andǝ alaggana male o a Kapanahum sǝ à kya nonggi kam zuku.
JOH 2:13 Lang pwari Lamsan Yàlîmurû mala amǝ Yahudi gbashìnà ka, Yesu o a Urǝshalima.
JOH 2:14 Kya kum amǝ makki andá, andǝ anzur andǝ akutu, andǝ aɓwana mǝnana à dumǝna nǝ do aban nggaɗi boalo ka, aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli.
JOH 2:15 Pǝlǝa Yesu peau nkamso nǝ nggúr sǝ pǝria kat, andǝ anzur, andǝ andá, ɓǝà purî ɓá Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. Sǝ ndǝlǝkí agir, mesǝki amǝsǝ-boalo mala amǝ nggaɗi boalo.
JOH 2:16 Sǝ ne amǝ makki akutu ama, <<Wu pusǝ agir mǝnia ka aban man! Wu kǝa nyesǝ Ɓala mala Tárrám ɓǝ̀ duk limo ɗang!>>
JOH 2:17 Sǝ ɓalǝ alaggana male kasǝa arǝ cau mǝnana Malǝmce na ama, <<Rǝɓǝla mem arǝ Ɓala mo we Ɓakuli ka, nǝ̀ earke a ɓalǝam kǝla bǝsa.>>
JOH 2:18 Aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi ɗì Yesu ama, <<Ya gir'ndǝlǝki na ado awu nǝ pa, mǝnana nǝ̀ lǝmdǝa sǝm ama, Ɓakuli pano rǝcandǝa mala pak mǝnia yì gir ka?>>
JOH 2:19 Yesu earia wia ama, <<Wu arki man yì Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, sǝ aɓa nongŋo tàrú ka mǝ nǝ loasǝi ɗǝm.>>
JOH 2:20 Pǝlǝa amǝ Yahudi ne wi ama, <<Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli mǝnana twal amǝɓa pǝlǝa lumi-ine bwamdǝ tongno-nong-mwashat sǝ à ɓè ka, a na ama awu nǝ ɓè aɓa nongŋo tàrú?>>
JOH 2:21 Sǝ Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli mǝnana Yesu nakiyi ce ka, nda nggūrǝì.
JOH 2:22 Anzǝm mǝnana Yesu longŋǝni ɓembe ka, sǝ ɓalǝ alaggana male kasǝa ama, Yesu nania wia. Pǝlǝa à earnǝ Malǝmce andǝ acau mǝnana Yesu nea wia ka.
JOH 2:23 Mǝnana Yesu nda a Urǝshalima a pwari Lamsan Yàlîmurû ka, aɓwana pas à sǝn agir-ndǝlǝki mǝnana pea ka, pǝlǝa à pà ɓamuria a baní.
JOH 2:24 Sǝ Yesu ka earnǝia ɗàng, acemǝnana súrǝ́nà rǝ ɓwapǝndǝa kat.
JOH 2:25 Yesu pà aban alte ɓǝ̀ kǝɓwa ɓǝ̀ ne wi cau amur ɓwapǝndǝa ɗàng, acemǝnana yì nǝ ɓamúrì ka súrǝ́nà rǝ ɓabum ɓwapǝndǝa.
JOH 3:1 Ɓè ɓwa ndakam atà aɓwana-mǝgule, amǝ kùrcau mala amǝ Yahudi, mǝnana lùllǝì ama Nikodimus ka. Nda aɓalǝ amǝ Farisi.
JOH 3:2 Ɓwabura man yiu aban Yesu nǝ dú, sǝ yi ne wi ama, <<Malǝm, sǝm sǝlǝna ama a nda mǝkànìgìr mǝnana Ɓakuli túrí ka. Kǝ ɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ gandǝ pakki agir-ndǝlǝki mǝnana a pakkiyi ka ɗàng, yi mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli pa atè raka.>>
JOH 3:3 Yesu eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda ban nô mǝsǝcau, ɓǝà ɓǝsǝlǝ ɓǝl ɓwa raka, pà nǝ̀ kutio aɓa domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ɗang.>>
JOH 3:4 Nikodimus ɗiban ama, <<Lang sǝ à nǝ̀ ɓǝsǝlǝ ɓǝl ɓwa mǝnana gulna ka? Nǝ̀ kútí a bum ngge ɗǝm sǝ à nǝ̀ ɓǝsǝlǝ ɓǝle lè?>>
JOH 3:5 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Mǝ nda ban nô mǝsǝcau, kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ kutio aɓa domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ɗang, she ɓǝà ɓǝlǝni nǝ mùr andǝ Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli ka.
JOH 3:6 Tárrú andǝ nggeau à nda à ɓǝlkiyi ɓwapǝndǝa ka, sǝ ɓǝlban ɓá Bangŋo ka, túró mala Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli na.
JOH 3:7 Kǝa ndali nǝ cau mǝnana ǝn banggo nǝma, <Dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ basǝ ɓǝl wun ngga> ɗàng.
JOH 3:8 Gung kǝ ɓua kǝ o aban mǝnana earce nǝ̀ ká kàm ngga. Wu kǝ ok gǝshi, sǝ wu súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana purkiyi kam andǝ ban mǝnana kákiyi kam ngga ɗàng. Anggo sǝ ɓwa mǝnana à basǝ ɓǝle aɓa Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli ka pa.>>
JOH 3:9 Nikodimus ɗì ama, <<Lang sǝ mǝnia yì ɓǝlban ngga nǝ̀ gandǝ pa?>>
JOH 3:10 Yesu pǝlǝa eari wi ama, <<Nggearǝ we ka a nda ɓwamǝgule aɓa kànìgìr a nzali Isǝrayila, sǝ a súrǝ̀ mǝnia yì gìr ka ɗàng?
JOH 3:11 Mǝ nda ban nô mǝsǝcau, gìr mǝnana sǝm súrǝì, andǝ mǝnana sǝm sǝn ngga, nda sǝm nakiyia wun ce ka. Kat andǝ amani ka wu ɓinǝ ak cau mǝnana sǝm nggǝ na wun ngga.
JOH 3:12 Ən na wun cau mala agir mǝnana a ɓanza man ngga, sǝ wu earnǝ mim ɗang, lang sǝ wun nǝ̀ earnǝ mim yì mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ǝn na wun cau mala agir mǝnana a kùli ka?
JOH 3:13 Kǝ ɓwa malaká eau a kùli ɗang, she kǝ yì mǝnana sulǝ nǝ kuli ka, yì Muna mala Ɓwa, mǝnana nda a kùli ka.
JOH 3:14 <<Kǝla mǝnana Musa loasǝ n'yau amur gara a ɓabondo ka, anggo sǝ dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ loasǝ Muna mala Ɓwa a kùli,
JOH 3:15 acemǝnana koya ɓwa mǝnana kat pa ɓamúrì a baní ka ɓǝ̀ kǝa kìɗìkì ɗàng, yì ka ɓǝ̀ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka.
JOH 3:16 <<Ɓakuli ka earce ɓanza kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ yi pâ kǝ̀ Muna male mwashat ace mǝnana ɓwa mana kat pà ɓamúrì a baní ka ɓǝ̀ kǝa kìɗìkì ɓǝ̀ ueɓà ɗàng, ɓǝ̀ kum yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka.
JOH 3:17 Ɓakuli tasǝ Muni ɓǝ̀ yì ɓashì ɓanza ɗàng, tasǝì ɓǝ̀ yì amsǝ ɓanza.
JOH 3:18 <<Ɓwa mǝnana kat pà ɓamúrì aban Muna mala Ɓakuli ka, pà aɓata ɓashi ɗàng. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat ɓinǝ pà ɓamúrì ka, à angŋa dǝmba à kasǝna ɓashi ɓǝ̀ sulǝo amurí, acemǝnana ɓinǝ pà ɓamúrì aban Muna mwashat ɓǝ̀rɓǝ̀r mala Ɓakuli ka.
JOH 3:19 Tǝ́r ɓashi mala Ɓakuli ka nda mǝnana ama, tǎlaban yiu a ɓanza, sǝ ɓwapǝndǝa earce pǝndǝa kútì tǎlaban, acemǝnana atúró malea ka amǝɓealɓike na.
JOH 3:20 Ɓwa mǝnana kat kǝ pak gìr mǝɓike ka, kǝ ginǝ tǎlaban, sǝ pà nǝ̀ yiu aban tǎlaban ɗang, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ tǎlaban ɓǝ̀ kǝa lǝmdǝ atúró ɓealɓikea male ɗàng.
JOH 3:21 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kǝ pak gìr aɓa mǝsǝcau ka, kǝ yiu aban tǎlaban, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ tǎlaban lǝmdǝ atúró male, mǝnana pea nǝ́ ɓanggi Ɓakuli ka.>>
JOH 3:22 Anzǝm man ngga, Yesu andǝ alaggana male nying Urǝshalima sǝ à o arǝ aɓea muna-là aɓa bu-nzali Yahudi. À kya pakkia anonggio kam, aban pakki aɓwana batisǝma.
JOH 3:23 Yohana gbal ka nda aban pak batisǝma a Ainon mǝnana a ban Salim ngga, acemǝnana mùr nda abanì kpǝm. Ɓwapǝndǝa camarǝ yiu a baní, sǝ kǝ pakkia wia batisǝma.
JOH 3:24 (Anggo ka à malaká oasǝ Yohana a ndàkurban peatu ɗàng.)
JOH 3:25 Aɓea alaggana mala Yohana andǝ ɓeɓwa Yahudi, à lo makgìr amur kúncau mala lákkí rǝu andǝ lákkí agir ace peri aban Ɓakuli.
JOH 3:26 Sǝ alaggana mala Yohana yiu a baní à yì ne wi ama, <<Rabbi, ɓālǝo kasǝa arǝ ɓwa mǝnana wu nda wunǝi a nkaring Nggeasala Jodan, yì mǝnana a bangga sǝm cau amurí ka? Sǝni, nda kǝ̀ pàkkî aɓwana batisǝma ka, sǝ aɓwana pwanǝna rǝia kat aban ká a baní.>>
JOH 3:27 Pǝlǝa Yohana na ama: Ɓakuli ka nda kǝ pe ɓwa túró mǝnana nǝ̀ pak ka.
JOH 3:28 Wun, nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun ngga, wun nǝ̀ nakunam mǝnana ǝn bang nǝma, <<Mǝ nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban ɗang. À túrǎm nǝ túrô ɓǝ̀n aki wi dǝmba yiu.>>
JOH 3:29 Māfela ka mālá bura-māfela na; sǝ murǝm gyajam mala bura-māfela mǝnana cam aban kundǝe kǝ kwakikiri arǝì ka, ban kǝ ɓoari wi arǝ ok gì bura-māfela. Mim gbal ka, ban kǝ ɓoaram arǝ cau mǝno wu banggàm ngga.
JOH 3:30 Dumǝna púp ama, nǝ̀ nggǝ lidǝmba nǝ gulo, sǝ mim ngga mǝ nǝ nggǝ amsǝa.
JOH 3:31 Ɓwa mǝnana pur nǝ kuli ka, nda mǝnana ndanǝ gulo kútì acili aɓwana kat ka. Ɓwa mǝnana ndakani a ɓanza ka, mala ɓanza na, sǝ acau male ka a mala ɓanza na. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana sulǝ nǝ kuli ka, ndanǝ gulo kútì aɓwana kat.
JOH 3:32 Yì ka, yiu, yi bǝlkuni amur gir mǝnana sǝna sǝ ok ka, sǝ kǝɓwa ak cau male ɗàng.
JOH 3:33 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat ak cau male ka earǝna ama cau mala Ɓakuli ka mǝsǝcau na.
JOH 3:34 Ɓwa mǝnana Ɓakuli túrí ka, kǝ na gì Ɓakuli, acemǝnana Ɓakuli soapi wi Bangŋo male puppup.
JOH 3:35 Ɓakuli earce Muni sǝ nyinggi wi girbunda kat a buì.
JOH 3:36 Koya ɓwa na sǝ pà ɓamúrì aban Muna mala Ɓakuli ka, ndanǝ yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka. Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat ɓinǝ Muna mala Ɓakuli ka pà nǝ̀ kum yilǝmu ɗang, bumlulla mala Ɓakuli ka nǝ̀ ueo amurí.
JOH 4:1 Yesu sǝlǝ ama amǝ Farisi ongŋǝna ce ama yì ka, nda arǝ kum amǝkpate pas sǝ nda arǝ pakkia wia batisǝma kútì mala Yohana.
JOH 4:2 (Aɓa mǝsǝcau ka, Yesu nǝ ɓamúrì ka pakki kǝɓwa batisǝma ɗàng, alaggana male na à pakkiyi ka.)
JOH 4:3 Lang Yesu yi sǝlǝ ama amǝ Farisi ongŋǝna ama amǝkpate nǝ̀ nggǝ̀ làkkì ka, nying bu-nzali Yahudi, nyare o ɗǝm a bu-nzali Galili.
JOH 4:4 O male ka dumǝni wi púp nǝ̀ ara aɓa nzali Samariya.
JOH 4:5 Lang yina a nzali Samariya ka, pǝlǝa yiu a ɓe la mǝnana à tunǝki ama Saika ka; banì sapi nzali mǝnana Yakupu pe muni Yisǝfu a pwarian ngga ɗang.
JOH 4:6 Tūli-mùr mala Yakupu ka, nda abanì. Yesu aulǝna nǝ gya nǝ pwari zǝkya ka, yi do a kun tūli-mùrî nǝ̀ usǝlǝo.
JOH 4:7 Ɓè ɓwama Samariya yiu a to mùr, sǝ Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ɗàrǝâm mùr mǝ nu.>>
JOH 4:8 (Anggo ka alaggana male warina a kúr girlina aɓa là.)
JOH 4:9 Sǝ ɓwame pǝlǝa ne Yesu ama, <<A nda ɓwa Yahudi, sǝ mǝ nda ɓwa Samariya. Lang sǝ a nǝ zǝm mùr-nùná a buam yi mǝnana kǝgìr kǝ kpapi amǝ Yahudi andǝ amǝ Samariya raka?>>
