JOH 16:24 Yàle ado ka wu malaká zǝm kǝgìr aɓa lullǝam ɗàng: wu zǝmba sǝ à nǝ̀ pà wun, sǝ bumpwasǝa ma'wun nǝ̀ lùmsǝo.
JOH 16:25 Ən na wun amǝnia yì acau ka nǝ cauɓaɓi, sǝ pwari na kǝ yiu ka mǝnana pà mǝ nǝ na wun cau ɗǝm nǝ cauɓaɓi raka. Mǝ nǝ pusǝa wun cau a banfana amur Tárrám.
JOH 16:26 Sǝ wun nǝ̀ zǝmba aɓa lullǝam. Ən pa aban na nǝma mǝ nǝ zǝmbi Tárrám amur wun ɗang.
JOH 16:27 Tárrám nǝ ɓamúrì ka kǝ earce wun kǝ̀rkǝ́r, acemǝnana wu kǝ earcem, sǝ acemǝnana wu earnǝ mim ama ǝn pur nǝ bani ka.
JOH 16:28 Ən pur a ban Tárrám sǝ ǝn yiu a ɓanza, sǝ ado ka, mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ nying ɓanza mǝ nǝ nyare a ban Tárrám.
JOH 16:29 Pǝlǝa alaggana male banggi wi ama, <<Ado wuni sǝ a kǝ pusǝa sǝm cau a banfana. Cauɓaɓe na a banggiyi ɗǝm ngga ɗàng.
JOH 16:30 Adyan ngga sǝm sǝlǝna ama we ka a súrǝ̀ agir kat, ɓwa pà nǝ̀ na ama nǝ̀ ɗio kǝ cau ɗàng. Ace mǝno ka sǝm earǝna ama we ka a pur nǝban Ɓakuli.>>
JOH 16:31 Yesu pǝlǝa eare ama: Ado ka, wu earǝna nǝ mim le?
JOH 16:32 Wu sǝni, pwari na kǝ yiu ka, yàle nggearǝ pwari nì yina, yì mǝnana wun kat ka, wun nǝ̀ mesǝke, koyan ngga nǝ̀ bwal njar male, wun nǝ̀ ɗekiam nǝmurǝam. Sǝ ǝn pa gbal nǝmurǝam ɗàng, acemǝnana Tárrám nda atàm.
JOH 16:33 Ən bangga wun amǝnia yì acau ka, acemǝnana a ɓalǝam ngga wun nǝ̀ kum dorǝpwala. Aɓa mǝnia yì ɓanza ka, wun nǝ̀ kum patanni, sǝama ɓabum wun ɓǝ̀ kǝa ɓungi ɗang! Ən linamurǝm amur ɓanza!
JOH 17:1 Anzǝm mǝnana Yesu malǝna naki acau mǝnia ka, pǝlǝa loasǝ mǝsǝì a kùli, sǝ pàk hiwi ama: Dâ, adyan ngga bu-pwarî yina. Gusǝlǝ Munio ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Munio pò gulo mô ka.
JOH 17:2 A panì wi rǝcandǝa amur ɓanza kat, ɓǝ̀ pea aɓwana mǝnana a yinǝia a baní ɓǝà duk amǝkpate ka, yilǝmu mǝnana málá male pà kàm raka.
JOH 17:3 Sǝ mǝnia ka nda njar kum yilǝmu mǝnana pà nǝ̀ mal raka, ɓǝà súrǝ̀o, kǝ we Ɓakuli Mǝ'mǝsǝcau nì, andǝ Munio Yesu Kǝrǝsti mǝnana a túrí aɓa ɓanza ka.
JOH 17:4 Ən yinǝno nǝ́ gulo a ɓanza man, acemǝnana ǝn malǝna túró mô mana a pam ama ɓǝ̀n pê ka.
JOH 17:5 Sǝ ado ka, Dâ, nyesǝâm gulo a ɓadǝmbo, gulo mǝnana mǝ ndanǝi sǝnǝ we ɗiɗyal sǝ a yi pusǝ ɓanza ka.
JOH 17:6 Ən lǝmdǝni aɓwana mǝnana a pam mia a ɓanza ka rǝò. Yia ka amô na. A nǝ̀ pam mia, sǝ à kpanatà cau mò.
JOH 17:7 Yia adyan ngga à sǝlǝna ama koya gìr mǝ ndanǝi ka kǝ pur nǝ bano.
JOH 17:8 Ən pania wia cau mǝnana a pam ngga, sǝ yia gbal ka à angŋǝni; à sǝlǝna ama mǝsǝcau na ǝn pur a bano, sǝ à earǝna ama a nǝ̀ túrǎm.
JOH 17:9 Hiwi mem ngga, pà ace ɓanza ɗàng, nda kǝ cea, aɓwana mǝnana a pam ngga, acemǝnana yia ka amô na.
JOH 17:10 Aɓwana mǝnana kat mǝ ndanǝia ka amô na, sǝ a nda a pamia ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝà lǝmdǝ gulo mem aɓalǝia ka.
JOH 17:11 Ado ka mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ nying ɓanza, mǝ nǝ nyare a bano, sǝ yia ka à ndakani a ɓanza più. Dâ Ɓakuli Mǝfele! Yália, nǝ rǝcandǝa mala lùllǝò mǝnana a pam ngga, acemǝnana yia ka ɓǝà duk mwashat kǝla mǝnana sǝm nda mwashat sǝnǝ we ka.
JOH 17:12 A do mem sǝnǝia ka, ǝn yália, sǝ ǝn bwalia nǝ rǝcandǝa mala lùllǝò mǝnana a pam ngga. Kǝ ɓè ɓwàr ateà ɗàng, she kǝ yì ɓwa mǝnana dupî ká kìɗìkì ka, acemǝnana cau mò mana à gilǝì aɓa Malǝmce ka, ɓǝ̀ lùmsǝo.
JOH 17:13 Adyan ngga mǝ ndya ǝn nggǝ ká a bano ka. Ən nggǝ banggia wia amǝnia yia cau mǝnana mǝ ndakani più amǝnia yì ɓanza ka, acemǝnana ɓǝà lùmsǝ nǝ bumpwasǝa mem.
JOH 17:14 Ən pania wia cau mò, sǝ ɓanza kǝ ɓinǝ mǝsǝia, acemǝnana yia ka à nda ka mala ɓanza ɗàng, kǝla mǝnana mim ngga mǝ nda mala ɓanza raka.
JOH 17:15 Ən pa aban zǝmba nǝma wu pusǝia, ɓǝà nying ɓanza ɗàng. Mǝ nda aban zǝmba ama, wu bwalia, ɓǝà kǝa kútí a ɓabù Shetan, mǝɓealɓikea ɗang.
JOH 17:16 Yia ka à mala ɓanza mǝnia na ɗang kǝla mǝnana mim ngga mǝ nda mala ɓanza raka.
JOH 17:17 Tària ɓǝà duk amô nǝ mǝsǝcau mò; cau mò ka nda kǝ mǝsǝcau.
JOH 17:18 Kǝla mǝnana a túrǎm aɓa ɓanza ka, anggo gbal sǝ ǝn nggǝ túriá aɓa ɓanza.
JOH 17:19 Sǝ àkǝ̀ cea sǝ ǝn tàr ɓamúràm ɓǝ̀n duk mô, acemǝnana yia gbal ka, ɓǝà tàr ɓamuria aceo ɓǝà duk amô aɓa mǝsǝcau.
JOH 17:20 Hiwi mem ngga pà ace alaggana mem mǝnia nǝmurǝia ɗàng, nda gbal ace aɓwana mǝnana à nǝ̀ yia ak Cau Amsǝban mǝnana amǝkpatam nǝ̀ hamnǝi a banià ka.
JOH 17:21 Ən nggǝ pak hiwi nǝma yia kat ka ɓǝà duk mwashat, kǝla mǝnana mim sǝnǝ we, sǝm nda mwashat ka. Dâ, kǝla mǝnana a nda a ɓalǝam, sǝ mǝ nda a ɓālǝo ka, yia gbal ka ɓǝà do aɓalǝ sǝm, ace mǝnana ɓanza ɓǝ̀ eare ama a nǝ̀ túrǎm ngga.
JOH 17:22 Ən pania wia gulo mǝnana a pam ngga, acemǝnana ɓǝà duk mwashat, kǝla mǝnana mim sǝnǝ we sǝm nda mwashat ka.
JOH 17:23 Mim sǝnǝia ka sǝm nda mwashat, sǝ mim sǝnǝ we ka sǝm nda mwashat. Cia, ɓǝà kum ulang mǝnia yì dotarǝu mǝɓoarne ka aɓalǝia, ace mǝnana amǝɓanza ɓǝà sǝlǝ ama a nǝ̀ túrǎm, sǝ ɓǝà sǝlǝ gbal ama a kǝ earcea kǝla mǝnana a kǝ earcem ngga.
JOH 17:24 Dâ! Ən nggǝ earce nǝma aɓwana mǝnana a pamia ka, ɓǝà do atàm a ban mǝnana mǝ nda kam ngga; sǝ ɓǝà sǝn gulo mem mǝnana a pam, acemǝnana a kǝ earcem sǝ a yi pusǝ ɓanza ka.
JOH 17:25 We Dâ Mǝ'cauɓoarna! Ɓanza súrǝ̀o ɗàng, sǝ mim ngga ǝn súrǝ̀o, sǝ amǝnia yì alaggana mem ngga, à sǝlǝna ama a nǝ̀ túrǎm.
JOH 17:26 Ən lǝmdǝnia wia rǝò, sǝ mǝ nǝ lidǝmba nǝ lǝmdǝia wia rǝò ɗǝm, ace mǝnana earcearǝu mana a ndanǝi arǝàm ngga ɓǝ̀ do aɓalǝia, sǝ mim ngga mǝ nǝ duk gbal aɓalǝia.
JOH 18:1 Anzǝm mǝnana Yesu malǝna hiwi ka, pǝlǝa lo andǝ alaggana male à eauwe a nkaring mala ɓangŋaban Kidǝron. À kya kutio a ɓè ɓaban mala anggun olif.
JOH 18:2 Yahuda, mǝnana mak Yesu ka, súrǝ́nà rǝ banì, acemǝnana kusǝ pas Yesu kǝ dapi kam andǝ alaggana male.
JOH 18:3 Agbani Pǝris andǝ amǝ Farisi tasǝ amǝ'yál Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli andǝ aɓea soje mala amǝ Roma, ɓǝa kyane atà Yahuda aban mǝnana Yesu nakam ngga. À kur rǝia nǝ agirbura, sǝ à bwal bǝsa arǝ aɓukan, andǝ apitǝla, pǝlǝa à puro à yì tusǝo a ɓabanì.
JOH 18:4 Sǝ Yesu ka angŋa dǝmba sǝlǝna gir mǝnana nǝ̀ kumi ka, pǝlǝa puro cam a ɓadǝmbia, sǝ ɗia ama, <<Yana ɓwe na wu alkite?>>
JOH 18:5 À eare ama, <<Yesu ɓwa Nazarat.>> Banggia wia ama, <<Mǝ Nda.>> Yahuda, yì ɓwa mǝnana mak Yesu ka, nda aban came ateà.
JOH 18:6 Lang Yesu banggia wia ama, <<Mǝ Nda>> ka, kara à nyar nǝ nzǝmia à sukki a nzali.
JOH 18:7 Pǝlǝa Yesu nyare ɗia ama, <<Yana ɓwe na wu alkiyite le?>> À eare ama, <<Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat.>>
JOH 18:8 Yesu eare ama, <<Ən nanà wun nǝma Mǝ Nda. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝ nda wu alkiyitam ngga, wu ɗeki alaggana mem mǝnia ka ɓǝa o.>>
JOH 18:9 Mǝnia ka pa anggo ace mǝnana cau mana pur a kúni ka ɓǝ̀ lùmsǝo, mǝnana ama, <<Dâ, aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnana a pam ngga, ǝn turta kǝɓwa mwashat ɗang.>>
JOH 18:10 Shiman Bitǝrus kwetǝ nggeabyau, kwarǝna guro mala Pǝris Mǝgule nǝi, kasǝ kiri mǝlì kpat. (Lullǝ mǝno yì guro nda Malchus.)
JOH 18:11 Yesu banggi Bitǝrus ama, <<Nyesǝ nggeabyau mo oasǝi a ndè! A kǝ sǝni kǝla pa mǝ nǝ nu kwap mala tanni mǝnana Tárrám pam ama ɓǝn nu ka re?>>
JOH 18:12 Pǝlǝa asoje andǝ mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban malea, andǝ amǝ munagara mala amǝ Yahudi, bwal Yesu, sǝ à taka abui.
JOH 18:13 A tadǝmbe ka à umnǝ Yesu a ɓadǝm Annas, nkil Kayafas, yì Pǝris Mǝgule a mǝno yì pǝlǝa ka.
JOH 18:14 Kǝ Kayafas mǝno nda kwarkir aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi ama ndanǝ ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ ɓwa mwashat wú a kún aɓwana mala amǝ Yahudi ka.
JOH 18:15 Shiman Bitǝrus andǝ ɓe lagga mala Yesu wari a ban mǝnana à kútí nǝ Yesu kàm ngga. Mǝnia yì lagga ka Pǝris Mǝgule súrǝì pepè, nda sǝ à eari wi kutio aɓa ɓala mala Pǝris Mǝgule ka.
JOH 18:16 Bitǝrus ka ueo aban came a kunɓala nǝ nza. Sǝ mǝnia yì lagga mana pǝris mǝgule súrǝì ka, nyare yiu yi nacau nǝ muna-ɓwama mǝnana à tamsǝi ace yál kunɓala ka, pǝlǝa earî Bitǝrus ɓǝ̀ kutio.
JOH 18:17 Muna-ɓwame ɗì Bitǝrus ama, <<A nda gbal aɓalǝ amǝkpata ɓwa mǝno à bwali ka le?>> Bitǝrus eari wi ama, <<Awo, ǝn pa aɓalǝia ɗàng.>>
JOH 18:18 Ɗwal nda kam kǝ̀rkǝ́r, pǝlǝa amǝtúró palta andǝ amǝ munagara bwal bǝsa, à kǝ dandǝ rǝia. Sǝ Bitǝrus yiu, yi cam a bania a kun bǝsa.
JOH 18:19 Pǝlǝa Pǝris Mǝgule tita ɗiki Yesu amur alaggana male andǝ kanigir male.
JOH 18:20 Yesu banggi wi ama, <<Acau mem ngga ǝn nea bwāng a ɓadǝm ɓwapǝndǝa kat. Sǝ ko aya pwari ka mǝ ndaban kanigir arǝ ndakpapi andǝ Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, ban ramba mala amǝ Yahudi. Ən na kǝ cau aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa ɗang.
JOH 18:21 Sǝ ace man sǝ à kǝ ɗìkiam? Ɗì ka aɓwana mǝnana à ok cau mana ǝn na ka. Yia ka à súrǝ́nà rǝ cau mǝnana ǝn na ka.>>
JOH 18:22 Lang Yesu bangŋǝna anggo ka, ɓeɓwa aɓalǝ amǝ yál Ndàmǝgule, mǝnana came a banì, kwak Yesu a takiri, sǝ bang ama, <<Anggo sǝ a nǝ pǝlǝì Pǝris Mǝgule cau?>>
JOH 18:23 Pǝlǝa Yesu ear ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ǝn nacau mǝnana mǝɓane na ka, banggàm ɓá ɓwarke, sǝ ɓǝ̀ mǝsǝcau na ǝn na ka, mana nda tǝr koem a takiram?>>
JOH 18:24 Anggo, andǝa kǝ tà bu mǝnana à tàkà abu Yesu ka, sǝ Annas tasǝte a ban Kayafas, yì Pǝris Mǝgule.
JOH 18:25 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka, Shiman Bitǝrus nda àkǝ̀ bancame a kun bǝsa, aban dandǝ rǝì. Sǝ aɓwana a banì ɗì ama, <<We ka, a pa aɓalǝ alaggana mala ɓwa mǝno re?>> Pǝlǝa yì ka, tǝmce, na ama, <<Awo, ǝn pa aɓalǝia ɗàng.>>
JOH 18:26 Sǝ ɓeɓwa mwashat aɓalǝ aguro mala Pǝris Mǝgule, ɓǝla mala ɓwa mǝnana Bitǝrus kasǝ kiri ka, nacau ama, <<Ən sǝno mǝni atà Yesu akanó a ɓaban re?>>
JOH 18:27 Bitǝrus nyare tǝmce, ama, <<Awo mǝ nda ɗang.>> Anggo ka, kara nggu ɓua.
JOH 18:28 Nǝ dǝmbari ɗiɗyal ka à pusǝ Yesu a ɓala mala Kayafas, à um nǝi a banmǝgule mala Nggwamna, ɓwa Roma. Sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi, mǝnana à tsǝki Yesu cau atè ka, à ɓinǝ kutio aɓa palta mala Nggwamna, acemǝnana ɓǝà kútí ka, à nǝ̀ pǝndǝki ɓamuria, mǝnana nǝ̀ tsǝa à pà nǝ̀ kùmô à nǝ̀ li girlina Lamsan Yàlîmurû raka.
JOH 18:29 Ace mǝno ka, Bilatus pur a bania, sǝ ɗia ama, <<Ya cau na wu yiu nǝi amur mǝnia yì ɓwa ka le?>>
JOH 18:30 Pǝlǝa à eare ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓwa mǝnia ka, mǝ'ɓealɓikea na raka, ɓǝ́ pa sǝm nǝ̀ yiu nǝi a bano ɗàng.>>
JOH 18:31 Bilatus pǝlǝa banggia wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ nda anggo ka, wu um nǝi, wu kya ɓashi wi nǝ nggurcau ma'wun la.>> Pǝlǝa amǝ Yahudi eare ama, <<Sǝm pà nǝ́ rǝcandǝa mala kasǝ ɓashi-lú amur kǝɓwa ɗàng.>>
JOH 18:32 Mǝnia ka lùmsǝ cau mǝnana Yesu bang amur ulang lú mǝnana nǝ̀ wu ka.
JOH 18:33 Pǝlǝa Bilatus nyare aɓa palta male sǝ túrban ɓǝà kútí nǝ Yesu a baní. Ɗì Yesu ama, <<A nda murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi le?>>
JOH 18:34 Yesu eari wi ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɗiban ngga, a twali a mala ɓamuro le ko aɓea ɓwana na à no cau a muram ngga?>>
JOH 18:35 Bilatus ne wi ama, <<Mim ngga mǝ nda ɓwa Yahudi le? Aɓwana mô andǝ agbani pǝris ma'wun na à yiu nǝ we a ɓashi a banam ngga. Mana ɗe a pa?>>
JOH 18:36 Yesu eare ama, <<Domurǝm mem ngga mala ɓanza mǝnia na ɗang. Ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝ ama mala ɓanza man na ka, ɓǝ́ amǝkpatam nǝ̀ munǝo acem, à pà nǝ̀ eari aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi ɓǝà bwalam ɗang. Awo, domurǝm mem ngga mala ɓanza man na ɗang.>>
JOH 18:37 Bilatus pǝlǝa ne Yesu ama, <<Ashe a nda murǝm!>> Yesu eari wi ama, <<A bang ama mǝ nda murǝm. Ace kǝ mani sǝ à ɓǝ̀lám, sǝ yiu mem a ɓanza ka nda ace na mǝsǝcau, sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat kǝ camata mǝsǝcau ka, kǝ kwakikiri kǝ ok giem.>>
JOH 18:38 Pǝlǝa Bilatus ɗì ama, <<Mana nda mǝsǝcau?>> Bilatus nyare puro a ban amǝ Yahudi sǝ banggia wia ama, <<Mim ngga ǝn kumi nǝ ɓekǝ cauɓikea ɗang!
JOH 18:39 Sǝ wun amǝ Yahudi ka, ko aya pǝlǝa sǝ ɓǝ̀ yi karǝ nǝ Lamsan Yàlîmurû ka, pàk ka wu kǝ earce ama ɓǝn panzǝa wun ɓwa mwashat atà aɓwana mǝnana à kùria a ndàkurban ngga. Ado ka, wu earce ɓǝn panzǝa wun mǝnia yì <Murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi> ka le?>>
JOH 18:40 Sǝ à nyesǝi wi nǝ loasǝban ama, <<Awo, ɓwa mǝnia na à nǝ̀ panzǝa sǝmi ka ɗàng! Panzǝa sǝm Barabbas!>> (Barabbas ka à bwali acemǝnana yì ka, mǝ'mgbicau na.)
JOH 19:1 Bilatus pǝlǝa tsǝa à kwak Yesu nǝ kamso.
JOH 19:2 Asoje marǝki zwe kǝla mbulan-murǝm sǝ à oasǝì Yesu a ɓamúrí. À túrì wi daura ulang mala amurǝma arǝì,
JOH 19:3 sǝ à kǝ nyarke a ɓadǝmbi, à kǝ ne wi cau ɓanginǝban ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝo pwalo, we murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi!>> Sǝ à kǝ koe a ɓamǝsǝi nǝ ɓabuia.
JOH 19:4 Bilatus pǝlǝa pur ɗǝm a ban aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi sǝ nea wia ama, <<Wu kwaki kir wun! Mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ pusǝì, mǝ nǝ yinǝi a ban wun, sǝama wu sǝlǝ ama mim ngga ǝn kumi nǝ ɓekǝ cauɓikea ɗang.>>
JOH 19:5 Pǝlǝa Yesu pur a bania a nza, nǝ mbulan zwe a múrí andǝ daura mala amurǝma arǝì. Sǝ Bilatus nea wia ama, <<Ɓwe ndya ka!>>
JOH 19:6 Lang agbani pǝris andǝ amǝ'yál Ndàmǝgule nǝ̀ sǝni ka, à loasǝ già a kùli à na ama, <<Gbàllì a nggun-gangndǝi! Gbàllì a nggun-gangndǝi!>> Bilatus na ama, <<Wu twali la, wu kya gbàllì a nggun-gangndǝi nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun! Acemǝnana mim ngga ǝn kumi nǝ ɓekǝ cauɓikea ɗang.>>
JOH 19:7 Pǝlǝa aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi eari wi ama, <<Aɓa nggurcau ma'sǝm ngga, ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ wú, acemǝnana twal ɓamúrì ama yì ka, Muna mala Ɓakuli na!>>
JOH 19:8 Lang Bilatus nǝ̀ ok man yì cau ka, gir nî pe wi ɓangciu kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
JOH 19:9 Pǝlǝa nyesǝ Yesu wari nǝi aɓa palta ɗǝm sǝ ɗì ama, <<We ka, a pur a ya ban?>> Sǝ Yesu ka duk kúni più, pǝlǝi wi kǝ cau ɗàng.
JOH 19:10 Bilatus banggi wi ama, <<A pà nǝ nam cau ɗang? A sǝlǝ mbak ama mǝ ndanǝ rǝcandǝa mǝ nǝ panzǝo, ko mǝ nǝ tsǝa ɓǝà gbàllio a nggun-gangndǝi?>>
JOH 19:11 Yesu eari wi ama, <<A pà nǝ kum rǝcandǝa a muram ɗàng, yi mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli pamo raka. Ace mǝno ka, ɓwa mǝnana tasǝam aɓa buo ka, cauɓikea male gulo kútì mò.>>
JOH 19:12 Lang Bilatus ok mǝnia yì cau ka, pǝlǝa ɓariki nǝ̀ alta njargula mǝnana nǝ̀ pusǝna Yesu nǝi ka. Sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi ka, à loasǝ già bàng-bàng ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a panzǝ ɓwa mǝnia sǝ au ka, lǝmdǝ ama a nda gyajam mala Kaisar, Mǝtala nzali ɗang! Acemǝnana ɓwa mana kat twal ɓamúrì ama yì ka, murǝm na ka, ɓwe ka mǝ'mgbicau na arǝ Mǝtala nzali!>>
JOH 19:13 Lang Bilatus nǝ̀ ok cau mǝno ka, pǝlǝa pusǝ Yesu a banfana sǝ eauwe do amur buno ɓashi mǝnana à kǝ tunǝi ama, <<Ban múr tali>> ka. (Nǝ kun Ibǝru ka à kǝ tunǝi ama, <<Gabbata.>>)
JOH 19:14 Anggo ka pwarizǝkya gbàshìnà a pwari gilǝrǝu ace Lamsan Yàlîmurû. Pǝlǝa Bilatus banggi amǝ Yahudi ama, <<Wu sǝni, murǝm ma'wun ndya ka!>>
JOH 19:15 Kara yia kat à lo arǝì gǝu ama, <<Wali ɓǝ̀ wu! Wali ɓǝ̀ wu! Gbàllì a nggun-gangndǝi!>> Bilatus ɗia ama, <<Mana! Wu earce ɓǝ̀n gballì murǝm ma'wun a nggun le?>> Pǝlǝa agbani pǝris malea ear ama, <<Kǝ murǝm pa a bu sǝm ɗàng, she kǝ Kaisar, Mǝtala nzali mala amǝ Roma!>>
JOH 19:16 Gandǝa Bilatus pea wia Yesu, ɓǝà kya gbàllì amur nggun-gangndǝi ka. Sǝ à bwal Yesu à um nǝi.
JOH 19:17 À tsǝki wi nggun-gangndǝi mǝnana à nǝ̀ ká gbàllì amurí ka, a meali, sǝ pur aban ká a ban mǝnana à kǝ tunǝi ama <<Ban kpouloɓamuru>> ka. Nǝ kun Ibǝru ka, à tunǝ banì ama, <<Golgota.>>
JOH 19:18 Àkǝ̀ banì sǝ à gbàllì Yesu amur nggun-gangndǝi. À gbàllì aɓea aɓwana ɓari gbal andǝ Yesu, mwashat atà buì mǝlì sǝ ɓè ka atà buì mǝ'nggare, sǝ Yesu ka nda aɓa ɓalǝu.
JOH 19:19 Bilatus gilǝgir arǝ gbǝlang kpamgbang sǝ tsǝa à gbàllì arǝ nggun-gangndǝi amur Yesu. Cau mǝnana gilǝ ka nda, <<Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat, Murǝm Mala Amǝ Yahudi.>>
JOH 19:20 Ban mǝnana à gbàllì Yesu kàm ngga, sau nǝ là ɗàng, aɓwana pas ɓal mǝnia yì gìr à gilǝì ka, acemǝnana à gilǝì nǝ kún mala amǝ Ibǝru, andǝ kún mala amǝ Latin, andǝ kún mala amǝ Gǝrik.
JOH 19:21 Sǝ agbani pǝris wari a ban Bilatus à kya banggi wi ama, <<Kǝa gilǝ ama, <Yì ka, nda Murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi> ɗàng. Ɓoaro male ka à nǝ̀ gilǝ ama, <Ɓwa mǝnia ka bang ama, yì nda Murǝm mala amǝ Yahudi.> >>
JOH 19:22 Bilatus nyesǝia wia ama, <<Awo! Gìr mǝnana ǝn gilǝna ka dumǝna anggo.>>
JOH 19:23 Anzǝm mǝnana asoje gbàllìnà Yesu amur nggun-gangndǝi ka, à pwan agir-nggūrǝì à gauwia banì ine, sǝ koya soje ka twal banì mwashat. Sǝ nggea-daura male mǝnana à tè nǝ nggubyau mwashat, kunkpakǝri pa arǝì raka, à twali gbal.
JOH 19:24 Pǝlǝa à nea rǝia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ sǝm ngga na ama sǝm nǝ̀ sàngi daura man ɗang, a kun mani ka, ɓǝ̀ sǝm kocàca amurí, ɓwa mǝnana lì ka ɓǝ̀ twali.>> Mǝnia yì gìr ka yi pa anggo ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ lùmsǝ cau mala Ɓakuli mǝnana bang ama, <<À gakkia rǝia adaura mem sǝ à kocàca ace nggea-daura mem.>> Mǝnia ka nda gìr mǝnana asoje pê ka.
JOH 19:25 Nggea Yesu, andǝ mǝ'eam ngge mǝɓwame, andǝ Maryamu mālá Kilobas, andǝ Maryamu Ɓwa Magdala ka, à ndaban came tù a ban nggun-gangndǝi mǝnana à gbàllì Yesu amurí ka.
JOH 19:26 Yesu sǝn nggè andǝ ɓe lagga male mǝnana earkiyi ace raka aban came a banì; pǝlǝa banggi nggè ama, <<Nnâ, munio ndya ka.>>
JOH 19:27 Sǝ ne mǝnia yì lagga male ka ama, <<We ka, nggo ndya ka.>> Twal a pwari mǝno ka, mǝnia yì lagga mala Yesu ka, um nǝ nggea Yesu a ɓala male.
JOH 19:28 Yesu sǝlǝna ama ado ka agir mǝnana kat Ɓakuli túrí ɓǝ̀ yi pea ka, malǝna pea, sǝ ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ cau mala Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli ɓǝ̀ lùmsǝ ka, bang ama, <<Ən nggǝ ok mǝsamur.>>
JOH 19:29 Kwar ndakam a banì, mǝnana lùmsǝ nǝ mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap mǝhangŋe ka, pǝlǝa asoje par soso aɓalǝi, sǝ à loasǝi a kun gara, à tsǝki wi a kúni ɓǝ̀ nu.
JOH 19:30 Lang Yesu sonzǝ mur anap nì ka, na ama, <<Malǝna!>> Pǝlǝa dili múrí sǝ pa yilǝmi.
JOH 19:31 Pwari mǝno ka pwari gilǝrǝu na, acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ ban fana ka, pwari Sabbat na. Sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi ka, à pà nǝ̀ earce ɓǝ̀ alú ueo akanó aban gyare amur anggun-gangndi, ɓǝà bwal ɓè pwari mǝno kǝ yiu ka ɗàng. Ace mani ka à banggi Bilatus ama, ɓǝ̀ earia wia ɓǝà ɓungi akusǝ aɓwana mǝnana à gbàllia amur anggun-gangndi ka. À earce pe anggo ace mǝnana ɓǝà wu tù à nǝ̀ sulǝ aluia a nzali. À zǝmba anggo acemǝnana mǝnia yì pwari Sabbat ka, pwari mǝfele na a ban amǝ Yahudi, sǝ ɗǝm ngga pwari mǝgule na, acemǝnana yi karǝ nǝ Pwari Lamsan ngga.
JOH 19:32 Asoje pǝlǝa à wario à kya ɓungi akusǝ aɓwana mǝnana à gbàllia a bu mǝlì andǝ bu mǝ'nggare mala Yesu ka.
JOH 19:33 Lang à yiu a ban Yesu ka, à sǝni ka Yesu angŋa dǝmba wuna, sǝ à ɗeki, à ɓungi akusǝi ɗàng.
JOH 19:34 Sǝa ma, mwashat aɓalǝ amǝnia yì asoje ka, zuɓi Yesu a nkanggari nǝ kaɗa, kara nkila andǝ mùr puro aban sukkio.
JOH 19:35 Ɓwa mǝnana sǝn mǝnia yì gìr ka, nda bang ce ka, sǝ cau mǝnana na ka mǝsǝcau na, ace mǝnana wun gbal ka ɓǝ̀ wu ak cê, sǝ ɓǝ̀ wu pa ɓamur wun.
JOH 19:36 Mǝnia yì gìr ka pa anggo ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ lùmsǝ cau mala Ɓakuli mǝnana à gilǝì aɓa Malǝmce ama, <<À pà nǝ̀ ɓun mu kǝ bare ɗàng.>>
JOH 19:37 Sǝ ɓè ban ɗǝm aɓa Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli bang ama, <<Aɓwana nǝ̀ sǝn ɓwa mǝnana à zuɓi nǝ kaɗa ka.>>
JOH 19:38 Nǝ nzǝ́mò ka, Yisǝfu, ɓwa Arimatiya zǝmbi Bilatus ama, nǝ̀ twal lú Yesu. (Yì Yisǝfu ka mǝkpata Yesu na aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa, acemǝnana kǝ ɓanggi aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi.) Bilatus pǝlǝa earî wi ɓǝ̀ twali. Nda sǝ Yisǝfu wario kya twal lú Yesu um nǝi ka.
JOH 19:39 Nikodimus, ɓwabura mǝnana ɗiɗyal yiu a ban Yesu nǝ du ka, wari atà Yisǝfu. Yinǝ mùrú mǝ'rǝmɓoarne, a buì, ace hasǝi lú. Mùruî ka à pè nǝ myang nggun mǝr mana à zurǝì andǝ muku nggun-alus ka. Dǝmbǝrya male na tyang lumi-tàrú.
JOH 19:40 Aburana mǝnia yia kǝm ngga à twal lú Yesu sǝ à marǝki aɓa nggurbyau pwasǝa andǝ mùrú mǝ'rǝmɓoarne, kǝla mǝnana amǝ Yahudi kǝ pang nǝ lú sǝ à nǝ̀ tsǝì ka.
JOH 19:41 A ban mǝnana à gbàllì Yesu kàm ngga, ɓe ɓaban nda kam nǝ ɓembe aɓalǝi, mǝnana à kwarí aɓa sorotali ka, bǝshe na, à malaká tsǝk kǝɓwa kàm ɗàng.
JOH 19:42 Sǝ acemǝnana pwari mǝno ka pwari gilǝrǝu na ace Sabbat andǝ Lamsan Yàlîmurû mala amǝ Yahudi ka, sǝ acemǝnana gbal mǝno yì ɓembe ka nda a bania tù ka, à tsǝk lú Yesu aɓalǝi.
JOH 20:1 Anzǝm pwari Sabbat nǝ tadǝmbari ɗiɗyal, ban na mbul-mbul più, Maryamu Ɓwama Magdala wari a ɓembe, sǝ kya sǝni ka tali mǝnana à girna kun ɓembe nǝi ka, à gǝshini.
JOH 20:2 Pǝlǝa nyar nǝ mire aban ká aban Shiman Bitǝrus andǝ ɓe lagga, mǝnana Yesu kǝ earce kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka, sǝ banggia wia ama, <<À pusǝna Mǝtala sǝm Yesu a ɓembe, sǝ sǝm súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana à wari nǝi kam ngga ɗang!>>
JOH 20:3 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus andǝ mǝno yì ɓe lagga ka, à puro à dǝshi ɓembe.
JOH 20:4 Yia kǝm ngga à nda aban ká nǝ mire, sǝ mǝno yì ɓe lagga ka ɓangŋa aki Bitǝrus dǝmba yi bik ban ɓembe.
JOH 20:5 Pǝlǝa dili muri a kun ɓembe, sǝn anggubyau-múr lú aɓa ɓembe sǝ kútí ɗang.
JOH 20:6 Lang Shiman Bitǝrus yiu nǝnzǝ́mò ka, kara kútí nǝ kútiô aɓa ɓembe. Yì gbal ka kǝ anggubyau-múr lú nda sǝn ngga,
JOH 20:7 sǝ nggurbyau mǝnana à marǝkina ɓamur Yesu nǝi ka, pà aban acili anggurbyau mǝnana à tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nàban Yesu nǝia ka ɗàng; male ka à kàrrì à nongsǝi ɗàng.
JOH 20:8 Sǝ lagga mǝnana akdǝmba ɓangŋa yiu a kún ɓembe ka, kútí gbal aɓa ɓembe; sǝn agir nì kat, sǝ ear ama mǝsǝcau na, Yesu longŋǝni ɓembe.
JOH 20:9 Kaniama gìr mǝnia ka nǝ̀ yia kumban ngga, yìa ka, à bwalta cau mala Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli mǝnana bang ama, Yesu nǝ̀ loapi ɓembe nǝ yilǝmu ka ɗàng.
JOH 20:10 Pǝlǝa alaggana mǝno nyare à o a la.
JOH 20:11 Sǝ Maryamu ka came a nza a kún ɓembe aban ɓuá. Nǝ́ ɓuá a kúni, sǝ dìlì múrí nǝ̀ sǝn ɓá ɓembe.
JOH 20:12 Kara sǝn amǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli ɓari nǝ agir-pwasǝa arǝia, aban do, aban mǝnana à nongsǝ lú Yesu kàm ɗiɗyal ka. Mwashat ka do nǝ ban ɓamúrí, sǝ ɓè mǝnia mwashat ka nda a bu ban akusǝi.
JOH 20:13 Sǝ à ɗì Maryamu ama, <<Ɓwama, mana pur arǝò sǝ a kǝ ɓua le?>> Pǝlǝa Maryamu earia wia ama, <<Aɓwana twalna Mǝtalem à umna nǝi, sǝ ǝn súrǝ̀ ban mǝnana à tsǝì kàm ngga ɗàng!>>
JOH 20:14 Sǝ pǝlǝ rǝì, nǝ̀ u ka, kara sǝn Yesu aban came a baní, sǝ sǝlǝ ama Yesu na ɗang.
JOH 20:15 Pǝlǝa Yesu ɗì ama, <<Ɓwama, mana pur arǝò sǝ a kǝ ɓua? Yana ɗe a alkite?>> Maryamu kǝ sǝni kǝla yì ka, mǝtala ɓaban na, pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule, ɓǝ̀ a nda a twali ka, banggàm ban mǝnana a tsǝì kàm ngga, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀n kyane ɓǝ̀n kya twali ka.>>
JOH 20:16 Pǝlǝa Yesu tunǝi nǝ lùllǝì ama, <<Maryamu!>> Pǝlǝa pǝlǝ rǝì a baní sǝ na ama, <<Rabbonai!>> (Mǝnia nǝ kun Ibǝru ka nda <<Malǝm.>>)
JOH 20:17 Yesu ne wi ama, <<Ce a kúr a rǝàm ɗàng, acemǝnana ǝn malaká nyare aban Tárrám a kùli peatu ɗàng. Ado ka, kyane aban amǝ'eambǝam, alaggana mem, kya banggia wia ama, Mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ nyare aban Tárrám, mǝnana nda Tárrià ka, aban Ɓakuli mem, mǝnana nda Ɓakuli malea ka.>>
JOH 20:18 Anggo sǝ Maryamu Ɓwama Magdala wario kya kum alaggana mala Yesu sǝ banggia wia ama, <<Ən sǝnǝna Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu!>> Pǝlǝa banggia wia cau mǝnana Yesu banggi wi ka.
JOH 20:19 Nǝ pwarikpǝra a mǝno yì pwari a nzǝm pwari Sabbat ka, alaggana mala Yesu nda atārǝia aɓa kurǝm. À girki akunkurǝm acemǝnana à kǝ ɓanggi aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi. Ɓalǝia ama nǝ̀ kasǝ ka, kara à sǝn Yesu purna, camǝna aɓalǝia, sǝ nea wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝ wun pwalo.>>
JOH 20:20 Lang bangŋǝna anggo ka, pǝlǝa lǝmdǝia wia anpenye mǝnana arǝ abui andǝ nkanggari ka. Alaggane lùmsǝ nǝ banɓoarnado acemǝnana à sǝnǝna Mǝtalabangŋo ka.
JOH 20:21 Yesu banggia wia ɗǝm ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝ wun pwalo. Kǝla mǝnana Tárrám túrǎm ngga, anggo gbal sǝ ǝn nggǝ túr wun.>>
JOH 20:22 Pǝlǝa pyaupia wia lin'ueo amúrià sǝ na ama, <<Wu ak Bangŋo Mǝfele.
JOH 20:23 Ɓǝ̀ wu twali aɓwana ban acauɓikea malea ka, à twalǝnia wia banì. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ wu twalia wia banì raka, yia ka à twalia wia banì gbal ɗàng.>>
JOH 20:24 Toma, mwashat aɓalǝ alaggana lum-nong-ɓari, mǝnana à kǝ tunǝi ama Pasa ka, pa aɓalǝia, a pwari mǝno Yesu yiu abania ka ɗang.
JOH 20:25 Pǝlǝa aɓi alaggana banggi wi ama, <<Sǝm sǝnǝna Mǝtalabangŋo!>> Sǝ Toma banggia wia ama, <<Mim ngga pà mǝ nǝ earnǝ mǝno ka ɗàng, she ɓǝn sǝnǝna akun anpenye mala akūsà mǝnana arǝ abui, sǝ ǝn jena kun anpenye nǝ munabuam, sǝ ǝn tsǝ́ngŋǝ̀nà buam arǝ penye mǝnana a nkanggari ka.>>
JOH 20:26 Anzǝm nongŋo tongno-nong-tàrú ka, alaggana nda ɗǝm atārǝia a ɓala andǝ Toma, sǝ akunakurǝm ngga à girkinia kat; kara Yesu yi cam ɗǝm aɓalǝia sǝ bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ rǝ wun pwalo.>>
JOH 20:27 Pǝlǝa lǝmdǝì Toma abui sǝ ne wi ama, <<Sǝn abuam; sǝ wu tsǝk muna-buo kani; sárǝ́ buo tsǝì arǝ penye mana a mǝsǝ nkanggariam ngga. Ɗeki ɓabum tuti mo, earnǝ cau!>>
JOH 20:28 Toma pǝlǝa eari Yesu ama, <<Mǝtalem andǝ Ɓakuli mem!>>
JOH 20:29 Yesu pǝlǝa ne wi ama, <<Nda acemǝnana a sǝnǝnam ngga, sǝ a nǝ earnǝ mim le? Aɓwana mǝnana à sǝnam raka, sǝ à ak cau mem nǝ ɓabumia kat ka, à ndanǝ tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli!>>
JOH 20:30 Yesu pakki aɓea agir-ndǝlǝki pas a mǝsǝ alaggana male, mǝnana à gilǝia aɓa malǝmce mǝnia raka.
JOH 20:31 Sǝ amǝnia à gilǝia ka, nda ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ wu earnǝi ama Yesu nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban, Muna mala Ɓakuli; sǝ aɓa paɓamuru ma'wun a baní ka, wu nǝ̀ kum yilǝmu aɓa rǝcandǝa mala lùllǝì.
JOH 21:1 Nǝ nzǝ́mò ka, Yesu nyar ɗǝm pusǝrǝi a ban alaggana male a kun Garang Tiberiya. Ani sǝ gir nî pa.
JOH 21:2 Shiman Bitǝrus, sǝ Toma mǝnana à tunǝki ama Pasa ka, andǝ Nataniyel ɓwa Kana mala Galili, andǝ amuna-burana mala Zabadi, andǝ aɓea alaggana mala Yesu ɓari, à nda atārǝia kat.
JOH 21:3 Pǝlǝa Shiman Bitǝrus banggi aɓi ama, <<Mim ngga mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ o a taula.>> Sǝ aɓi banggi wi gbal ama, <<Sǝm nǝ̀ ká atò.>> Pǝlǝa yia kat à eauwe a waru malea aban ká taula. Sǝ a bu du mǝno ka à bwal kǝgìr ɗang.
JOH 21:4 Ban kwarǝna, pwari nǝ̀ nggǝ eau ka, Yesu yiu yi came a kun mur sǝ yia alaggana ka à sǝlǝ ama Yesu na ɗang.
JOH 21:5 Pǝlǝa tunǝban ɗia ama, <<Wun alaggana, wu bwal kǝ nji le?>> À ear ama, <<Awo!>>
JOH 21:6 Pǝlǝa Yesu banggia wia ama, <<Wu túr ndámbú ma'wun atà bu mǝlì mala waru, wu nǝ̀ bwal nji!>> Pǝlǝa à túr ndámbú a mùr sǝ à bwal nji kǝ̀rkǝ́r, yàle à gandǝ nun ndámbú, à eamsǝi aɓa waru ɗang, acemǝnana anji làkkì pas aɓa ndámbú.
JOH 21:7 Sǝ lagga mǝnana Yesu earkiyi ace raka ne Bitǝrus ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo na!>> Lang Shiman Bitǝrus oè ama Mǝtalabangŋo na ka, kara twal daura male mǝnana swárí sǝ kútí a túró ka, oasǝi arǝì, tǎ zurro a mùr sǝ oakio aban ká a kún mùr.
JOH 21:8 Acili alaggana ueo aɓa waru aban nungi ndámbú mǝnana lùmsǝ nǝ nji ka, aban ká a nza. Ban mǝnana waru nda kam aɓa mùr ka sau nǝ nza ɗàng; sauwa male nda kǝla kusǝu gbǝman-tàrú.
JOH 21:9 Lang à nǝ̀ yia eau a nza ka, à sǝn nkalang bǝsa aban earke nǝ anji-twana amurí andǝ bǝredi a banì.
JOH 21:10 Yesu banggia wia ama, <<Wu yiu nǝ aɓea anji aɓalǝ amǝnana wu bwal adyan ngga.>>
JOH 21:11 Pǝlǝa Shiman Bitǝrus eauwe aɓa waru sǝ kya nun ndámbú eamsǝi a kún nza. Ndámbú lùmsǝ nǝ anji mǝgulke gbǝman-nǝ-lumi-tongno nǝ mǝsǝì tàrú (153), sǝ kat andǝ làkkì mala anji mǝno ka, ko bǝti ndámbú san ɗàng.
JOH 21:12 Yesu pǝlǝa tunǝia ama, <<Wu yiu wu lìli!>> Sǝ kǝɓwa pà kàm atà alaggana male, mǝnana gandǝ ɗî ama, a nda yana le ka ɗàng, acemǝnana yia kat ka, à sǝlǝna ama Mǝtalabangŋo na.
JOH 21:13 Pǝlǝa Yesu twal bǝredi pea wia, anggo gbal sǝ pang nǝ anji.
JOH 21:14 Mǝnia ka nda tàruià pusǝrǝu mala Yesu a ban alaggana male anzǝm loapi ɓembe male.
JOH 21:15 Anzǝm mǝnana à lina girlina ka, Yesu pǝlǝa ɗì Shiman Bitǝrus ama, <<Shiman muna mala Yohana, a earcem kútì amǝnia ka le?>> Bitǝrus eare ama, <<E, Mǝtalabangŋo, a sǝlǝna ama ǝn nggǝ earceo.>> Yesu banggi wi ama, <<Ɗenyi nǝ amuna-nzur mem.>>
JOH 21:16 Yesu ɗì ɗǝm ama, <<Shiman muna mala Yohana, a earcem le?>> Shiman ama, <<E, Mǝtalabangŋo, a sǝlǝna ama ǝn nggǝ earceo.>> Yesu ne wi ama, <<Tsǝkir anzur mem.>>
JOH 21:17 Yesu nyare ɗì Shiman Bitǝrus tàruià ɗiban ɗǝm ama, <<Shiman muna mala Yohana, a kǝ earcem le?>> Bum Bitǝrus kìɗìkì nǝ mǝnia yì tàruià ɗiban ngga. Nda sǝ ne Yesu ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, a súrǝ̀ agir kat. A sǝlǝna ama mim ngga ǝn nggǝ earceo!>> Pǝlǝa Yesu banggi wi ama, <<Tsǝkir anzur mem.
JOH 21:18 Mǝ nda ban banggo mǝsǝcau: mǝnana a kǝ long-nǝ-lo ka, a kǝ gandǝ oasǝ agir a rǝo sǝ a kǝ wari a ban mǝnana kat a earce a nǝ ká kàm ngga. Sǝ ɓǝ̀ a enà ka, a nǝ sárǝ́ abuo, sǝ aɓea ɓwana ɗàng nda à nǝ̀ oasǝo agir a rǝò, sǝ à nǝ̀ ká nǝ we, a ban mǝnana a earce ká kàm raka.>>
JOH 21:19 Yesu na anggo ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ulang njar mǝnana Bitǝrus nǝ̀ wù nǝi ka, mǝnana nǝ̀ gusǝlǝ lullǝ Ɓakuli ka. Pǝlǝa Yesu ne wi ama, <<Yiu atàm.>>
JOH 21:20 Bitǝrus pǝlǝ rǝì sǝ sǝn lagga mǝnana Yesu earkiyi ace raka a nzǝmia, aban yiu ateà. Yì nda kǝ lagga mǝnana eangnǝ arǝ Yesu a masǝlǝata ligirlina malea, sǝ ɗìkiyi Yesu ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, yana ɓwe na nǝ̀ meo ka?>>
JOH 21:21 Lang Bitǝrus nǝ̀ sǝni ka, pǝlǝa ɗì Yesu ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, sǝ lagga man ngga, mana nǝ̀ kumi?>>
JOH 21:22 Yesu eari wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ǝn eare nǝma yì ka, ɓǝ̀ do nǝ yilǝmu bà nyare mem ngga, mana oasǝo aɓalǝi? We ka, kpatam!>>
JOH 21:23 Kara cau akban aɓalǝ acili amǝkpata Yesu ama mǝnia yì lagga ka, pà nǝ̀ wu ɗàng. Sǝ anggo sǝ Yesu na ɗang. Yesu ka bang nǝ bang ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ ǝn eare nǝma yì ka, ɓǝ̀ do nǝ yilǝmu bà nyare mem ngga, mana oasǝo?>>
JOH 21:24 Mǝnia yì lagga ka nda mǝnana bang cau amur agir mǝnia, sǝ gilǝia aɓa Malǝmce ka. Sǝ sǝm sǝlǝna ama cau mǝnana na ka, mǝsǝcau na.
JOH 21:25 Aɓea agir ndakam pas mǝnana Yesu pea ka, yàle ɓǝà na ama, à nǝ̀ kpatea mwashat-mwashat à nǝ̀ gilǝia kat ka, ǝn nggǝ sǝni nǝma ɓanza kat ka, pà nǝ̀ gandǝ bwal amalǝmce mǝnana à nǝ̀ gilǝia ka ɗàng.
ACT 1:1 We Tiyofulus, aɓa Malǝmce mem mǝdǝmbe ka, ǝn angŋa dǝmba ǝn gilǝno agir mǝnana kat Yesu tita pea andǝ kane,
ACT 1:2 bà pwari mǝnana à twali nǝi aban ká kùli ka. Sǝ kaniama nǝ̀ o a kùli ka, kwarkir amǝ'mishan male mǝnana tàrkia ka, nǝ rǝcandǝa mala Bangŋo Mǝfele.
ACT 1:3 Anzǝm tanni andǝ lú mala Yesu ka, yi long nǝ yilǝmu ɗǝm. Aɓalǝ anongŋo lumi-ine, pusǝrǝi kusǝ pas aban alaggana male, arǝ anjar ɗàngɗáng mǝnana lǝmdǝia wia ama kàngkàng longŋǝna ndanǝ yilǝmu ka. À sǝni nǝ mǝsǝia sǝ bangcau nǝia amur Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 1:4 Sǝ nda peatu abania ka, banggia wia ama: Wu kǝa nying Urǝshalima ɗang. Wu kúndǝô, she ɓǝ̀ Tárrám pana wun Bangŋo Mǝfele mǝnana wu oem ǝn na nǝma, bang ama nǝ̀ pa wun ngga.
ACT 1:5 Yohana ka pakki aɓwana batisǝma nǝ múr, sǝ banì pà nǝ̀ sau ɗang aɓalǝ anonggio bǝti ka, à nǝ̀ pakka wun batisǝma nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele.
ACT 1:6 Lang amǝ'mishan yi dapina aban Yesu ka, pǝlǝa à ɗì ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, ado sǝ a nǝ nyesǝ domurǝm aban amǝ Isǝrayila le?>>
ACT 1:7 Pǝlǝa Yesu banggia wia ama, <<Kǝ Tárrám nda nǝmurǝì mǝnana ndanǝ rǝcandǝa mala tsǝk amǝno yì apwari andǝ abákú ka, sǝ à pa ace wun ɓǝ̀ wu súrǝ̀ia ka ɗàng.
ACT 1:8 Sǝa ma, wun ngga, wun nǝ̀ kum rǝcandǝa, yi mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Bangŋo Mǝfele sulǝna amur wun ngga. Wun nǝ̀ duk amǝ nacau mem a Urǝshalima, andǝ ɓá nzali Yahudi, andǝ nzali Samariya, andǝ ɓanza kat.>>
ACT 1:9 Anzǝm mǝnana Yesu naná cau anggo ka, àkǝ̀ mǝsǝia à nda rǝ sǝne, kara à twali aban ká o a kùli. Kya ko aɓa pǝrɓang, à gandǝ sǝne ɗǝm ɗang.
ACT 1:10 Lang à nda rǝ tsǝk mǝsǝia più a kùli aban sǝn o male ka, kara aɓwana ɓari nǝ agirkùró mǝpwasǝe, à pusǝ rǝia aban came abania.
ACT 1:11 Sǝ à bang ama, <<Wun amǝ Galili, palang sǝ wu cam kani aban sǝnban a kùli? Mǝnia yì Yesu à twali arǝ wun aban ká kùli ka, nǝ̀ nggá nyare kǝla mǝno wu sǝni aban o a kùli ka.>>
ACT 1:12 Pǝlǝa amǝ'mishan mǝnia nyàrî Nkono Olif, mǝnana sauwa mala nrei andǝ Urǝshalima ka, nda kǝla mêl mwashat.
ACT 1:13 Lang à bwalǝna ɓala ka, pǝlǝa à kutio a kurǝm kùli, ban mǝnana à duki kam ngga. Aɓwana mǝnana à nda abanì ka, à nda ka Bitǝrus, andǝ Yohana, andǝ Jemis, andǝ Andǝru, andǝ Filip, andǝ Toma, andǝ Batalomi, andǝ Matiu, andǝ Jemis muna mala Alfiyus. À nda atārǝia andǝ Shiman mǝnana earkiyi ace là male raka, andǝ Yahuda muna mala Jemis.
ACT 1:14 Yia a ɓinado malea ka, à uekiyì dapi nǝ ɓabumia mwashat atārǝia a ban pak hiwi ɗàng, andǝ amamǝna, andǝ Maryamu nggea Yesu, andǝ amǝ'eam Yesu.
ACT 1:15 Aɓalǝ anongŋo mǝno ka, amǝkpata Yesu yiu à yì rambǝa a banɓwáná, làkkì malea kat ka nda gbǝman nǝ lumi-ɓari. Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus lo came nacau ama:
ACT 1:16 Wun amǝ'eambǝam, dumǝna púp ama à nǝ̀ lùmsǝ cau Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli mǝnana Bangŋo Mǝfele bangŋi ɗiɗyal nǝ kun Murǝm Dauda amur Yahuda ka. Yahuda ka nda ɓwa mǝnana lǝmdǝ njar aban ká nǝ́ aɓwana mǝnana à bwal Yesu ka.
ACT 1:17 Ɗiɗyal ka nda aɓalǝ sǝm, sǝ ndanǝ kāmbe male gbal mǝnana à pe wi aɓa túró mishan ngga.
ACT 1:18 (Nǝ boalo mala túró mǝɓane, sǝ Yahuda kúr nzali, pǝlǝa aɓalǝi sǝ kpa, sok murí wǔ, bumi ara, alungŋe sukkio a nza.
ACT 1:19 Aɓwana mǝnana à do a Urǝshalima kat ka, à ok ce, nda tsǝa sǝ à tunǝ banì nǝ kun malea ama, Akeldama ka, ɓālǝi nda <<Nzali Nkila.>>)
ACT 1:20 Acemǝnana à gilǝa aɓa Malǝmce mala Anggyal ama, <<Ɓala male ka ɓǝ̀ do nǝ ɓālǝi atarǝì, kǝɓwa pà nǝ̀ duk kam ɗang.>> Ɗǝm ngga à gilǝa ama: <<Ɓǝ̀ ɓeɓwa ɗàng ɓǝ̀ ak bantúró male.>>
ACT 1:21 Ado ka dumǝna púp ama sǝm nǝ̀ twal ɓeɓwa ɓǝ̀ ak bancame mala Yahuda. Sǝm nǝ̀ twal aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnana à nda atà sǝm aɓalǝ apǝlǝa mǝnana kat sǝm nda a tarǝ sǝm sǝnǝa Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu ka.
ACT 1:22 Ɓǝ̀ tite a pwari mǝnana Yohana pakki Yesu batisǝma nǝi, yi bwal a pwari mǝnana à twali nǝi arǝ sǝm aban o a kùli ka. Ɓǝ̀ yana sǝ à twali ka, nǝ̀ duk mwashat atà sǝm aban hamnǝ cau mala loapi ɓembe mala Yesu.
ACT 1:23 Pǝlǝa à pa lullǝ aɓwana ɓari: Yisǝfu, mǝnana à kǝ tunǝi ama Barsabas (Sǝ à súrǝì gbal nǝ Yustus ka) andǝ Matǝyes.
ACT 1:24 Pǝlǝa à pak hiwi ama, <<We Mǝtalabangŋo, mǝnana súrǝ̀ ɓabum koyan kat ka, lǝmdǝa sǝm yana a twalo aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnia ɓari ka,
ACT 1:25 ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ twal bantúró mishan a kúnì Yahuda, mǝnana nying sǝm o a ban mǝnana dupi wi ka.>>
ACT 1:26 Pǝlǝa à túr mǝsǝboalo a kùli, à nǝ̀ sǝn ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ li ka, sǝ yi kpa, lǝmdǝ ama Matǝyes na li ka; nda à twal Matǝyes yi lumsǝ kun làkkì mala amǝ'mishan mala Yesu mǝnana à ueo lum-nong-mwashat ka.
ACT 2:1 A pwari mala Lamsan mala Pentikos ka, amǝkpata Yesu nda atārǝia a ban mǝ'mwashati.
ACT 2:2 Zuku ka, kara à ok gǝshi gìr pur a kùli kǝla gǝshi gung-mbulo mǝcandǝe aban ɓua. Yi lumsǝ ɓala mǝnana à ndakam aban do ka.
ACT 2:3 Pǝlǝa à sǝn gìr mǝnana nda kǝla alasǝ bǝsa, yi sulǝ amur koyan ateà ka kat.
ACT 2:4 Aɓwana mǝnana kat abanì ka, à lumsǝia nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele, sǝ à tita nacau nǝ aɓea kún ɗàngɗáng, mǝnana Bangŋo Mǝfele pea wia rǝcandǝa mala ne ka.
ACT 2:5 A bàkú mǝno ka, amǝ Yahudi mǝnana amǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli na, mǝnana à purkio arǝ anzali mala ɓanza kat sǝ à yiu ka, à ndakam nǝ do aɓa Urǝshalima.
ACT 2:6 Lang à ok mǝnia yì loàsǝ̀ban ngga, ɓwabundǝa ɓangŋa yiu yi rambǝa. À ndali acemǝnana koyan ateà ok amǝkpata Yesu aban nacau nǝ akún malea.
ACT 2:7 Gìr nî pea wia ndali, sǝ dupia wia gìr-gyambǝliban kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ à kǝ na ama: Amǝnia yì aɓwana kat ka, amǝ Galili na re?
ACT 2:8 Sǝ lang sǝ sǝm oea aban nacau nǝ akún la sǝm?
ACT 2:9 Sǝm ngga, sǝm purki arǝ anzali Pataya, andǝ Medes, andǝ Elam, andǝ Mesopotamiya, andǝ Yahudi, andǝ Kapadosiya. Sǝ aɓea ɓwana atà sǝm ngga à purki arǝ anzali Pwantus andǝ Asiya,
ACT 2:10 andǝ Firigiya, andǝ Pamfiliya, andǝ Masar, andǝ abuban mala amǝ Libiya mǝnana tù nǝ Sayirin ngga, andǝ anzali Roma,
ACT 2:11 andǝ Kǝreti, andǝ Arabiya. Aɓea aɓwana atà sǝm ngga amǝ Yahudi na, sǝ acili sǝm ngga aɓwana na mǝnana à pǝlǝ amǝkpata peri mala amǝ Yahudi ka. Sǝm kat ka, sǝm ok aɓwana man aban nacau nǝ akún la sǝm amur agir-ndǝlǝki mǝnana Ɓakuli pea ka!
ACT 2:12 Yia kat, à cam a banì aban ndalǝki, múrià zuriki, à kǝ ɗiki rǝia ama, <<Mana nda ɓá mǝnia yì gìr ka?>>
ACT 2:13 Sǝ aɓea ɓwana aɓalǝ aɓwabundǝa ka à nyesǝ ce nî gìr oalban na, à kǝ na ama, <<Mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap nda à nu sǝ kǝ walia ka!>>
ACT 2:14 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus lo cam nǝ came andǝ acilia amǝ'mishan mala Yesu lum-nong-mwashat gbal atè, loasǝ gi a kùli bangcau nǝ ɓwabundǝa ama: Wun aɓwana ma'sǝm, amǝ Yahudi andǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à ndanǝ do akani aɓa Urǝshalima ka! Wu kwaki kir wun pale wu o, wun kat, ɓǝ̀ ǝn bǝla wun ɓá mǝnia yì gìr ka.
ACT 2:15 Aɓalǝ wun ngga, aɓea aɓwana nda ban bang ama, aɓwana mǝnia ka mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap nda à nu, kǝ walia ka. Ən nggǝ bangga wun, anggo sǝ pak ɗàng. Wu sǝlǝ ama, ado ka dǝmbari na. Mùr-ɓǝlanggun anap pà nǝ̀ wal aɓwana a bu-pwari tongno-nong-ine mala dǝmbari ɗàng.
ACT 2:16 Awo, gìr mǝnana ado wu sǝni ka, à angŋa dǝmba à naná ce, a pwarian, a kún mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli kǝla Joyel, ama:
ACT 2:17 <<Ɓakuli bang ama, a masǝlǝata apwari ka, Mǝ nǝ sulǝ Bangŋo mem amur ɓwapǝndǝa kat. Amuna-burana andǝ amuna- mamǝna ma'wun, à nǝ̀ na gì Ɓakuli. Alaggana ma'wun nǝ̀ sǝn sǝna aɓa bangŋo, sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule nǝ̀ lòrǝ̀ alorǝo.
ACT 2:18 Arǝ apwari mǝno ka, mǝ nǝ sulǝ Bangŋo mem amur aguro mem, aburana andǝ amamǝna, sǝ à nǝ̀ na gì Ɓakuli.
ACT 2:19 Mǝ nǝ pakki agir- gyambǝliban a kùli andǝ agir-ndali a nzali. À nǝ̀ sǝn nkila, andǝ bǝsa, andǝ apǝrɓang-yelebǝsa.
ACT 2:20 Pwari nǝ̀ pǝlǝ pǝndǝa, sǝ zongŋo nǝ̀ pǝlǝ mǝbangŋe kǝla nkila, anzǝm mǝno sǝ Pwari Mǝgule andǝ Mǝɓoarɓwe mala Mǝtalabangŋo nǝ̀ yia tusǝo.
ACT 2:21 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat ɓua a ban Mǝtalabangŋo ka, nǝ̀ kum àwá.>>
ACT 2:22 Wun amǝ Isǝrayila, wu kwakikir wun, wu ok acau man. Yesu ɓwa Nazarat ka, ɓwa na mǝnana Ɓakuli earnǝi, sǝ lǝmdǝ ama yì nǝ̀ túrí, sǝ pe wi rǝcandǝa mala pakki agir-ndǝlǝki andǝ agir-gyambǝliban, andǝ agir-lǝmdǝa amǝgulke ka. Wun nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun ngga, wu sǝlǝna, acemǝnana akani aɓalǝ wun, àkǝ̀ mǝsǝ wun sǝ pea.
ACT 2:23 Ɓakuli súrǝ́nà rǝ gir mǝnana nǝ̀ kumban ngga, sǝ nǝ kani male, sǝ wu mak Yesu aban aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka, amǝ ɗwanyi kpata Nggurcau, mǝnana à yì gballì amur nggun-gangndǝi, à wal-luí ka.
ACT 2:24 Sǝama Ɓakuli panzǝi a ɓabu rǝcandǝa mala lú, pǝlǝa loasǝi a ɓembe, acemǝnana lú kārǝa nǝ̀ bwali a ɓembe ɗang.
ACT 2:25 Dauda bangcau amurí ama: <<Ən nggǝ sǝn Mǝtalabangŋo a koya pwari ka a banam; ɓangciu pà nǝ̀ pakkam ɗàng, acemǝnana nda a girem.
ACT 2:26 Acemani ka, ɓabumam nǝ̀ pakkiɗire, sǝ lasǝam ngga lùmsǝ nǝ bumpwasǝa; sǝ amur mǝno ka, nggūrǝam nǝ̀ usǝlǝo aɓa tsǝkɓalǝu.
ACT 2:27 We ka, a pà wunǝ nying yilǝmem ɓǝ̀ ueo aɓalǝ alú ɗàng, sǝ a pà wu nǝ nying guro mò Mǝfele ɓǝ̀ rǝmbǝo a ɓembe ɗang.
ACT 2:28 A lǝ́mdǝ́nàm anjar mala yilǝmu, sǝ do mô a banam ngga ndá nǝ̀ lùmsǝam nǝ banɓoarnado ka.>>
ACT 2:29 Wun amǝ'eambǝam, mǝ nǝ gandǝ na wun nǝ rǝcandǝa ama, kà-sǝm Dauda ka wú, sǝ à tsǝì a ɓembe, sǝ bà yalung, ɓembe male ndya a ban sǝm ngga.
ACT 2:30 Sǝ acemǝnana yì ka, mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na ka, súrǝ́nà rǝ cau mǝnana Ɓakuli banggi wi nǝ kángìr ama, nǝ̀ tsǝk mwashat atà amǝkè ɓǝ̀ do a buno-murǝm male ka.
ACT 2:31 Dauda ka sǝnǝna gìr mǝnana Ɓakuli nǝ̀ nggá pa a dǝmba ka, nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ nacau amur loapi ɓembe mala Kǝrǝsti ka, ama, <<Ɓakuli nyi a ɓembe ɗang, sǝ nggūrǝì gbal ka rǝm ɗang.>>
ACT 2:32 Ɓakuli loasǝ Yesu a ɓembe, sǝm kat ka, sǝm sǝni nǝ mǝsǝ sǝm anzǝm lo male.
ACT 2:33 Ado ka à loasǝni, à tsǝngŋǝni a buno-gulo a bù-mǝlì mala Ɓakuli Tárrí. Sǝ Ɓakuli pani wi Bangŋo Mǝfele, kǝla mǝnana bang ama nǝ̀ pà ka. Gìr mǝnana ado wu sǝna sǝ wu ok ka, nda ɓoro male mǝnana yi soapa sǝm amur sǝm ngga.
ACT 2:34 Dauda ka eauwe wari a kùli ɗang, ace mani ka pà aban nacau amur ɓamúrì ɗàng mǝnana yi na ama: <<Mǝtalabangŋo banggi Mǝtalem ama: <Do akani a buam mǝlì,
ACT 2:35 she ɓǝn tsǝ́ngŋǝ̀nà aɓio amǝbura à pǝlǝna abuno tsǝk kusǝu a ɓakusǝo ka.> >>
ACT 2:36 Ace mani ka, aɓwana mala amǝ Isǝrayila kat, ɓǝà sǝlǝa nǝ mǝsǝcau ama, Yesu mǝnana wu gbàllì amur nggun-gangndǝi ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana Ɓakuli tsǝì ɓǝ̀ do nda Mǝtalabangŋo, sǝ nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban ngga!
ACT 2:37 Lang amǝnia yì aɓwana ok anggo ka, cau tǝmia a ɓabumia kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ à ne Bitǝrus andǝ acilia amǝ'mishan ama, <<Amǝ'eam sǝm, mana ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ sǝm pa?>>
ACT 2:38 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus earia wia ama, <<Koyan aɓalǝ wun ngga, ɓǝ̀ pwanzali ɓǝ̀ vwakibuì arǝ cauɓikea. Ɓǝà pakki wi batisǝma aɓa lullǝ Yesu Kǝrǝsti, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli twala wun ban acauɓikea ma'wun, sǝ wun nǝ̀ kum ɓoro mala Bangŋo Mǝfele.
ACT 2:39 Mǝnia yì ɓwamuru Ɓakuli bangce ka, nda ace wun andǝ amuna ma'wun, andǝ aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka, andǝa mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli ma'sǝm nǝ̀ nggá tunǝia ka.>>
ACT 2:40 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus banggia wia aɓea acau pas sǝ nunkiria ama, <<Wu amsǝ ɓamur rǝ wun aɓa nza mǝɓike mǝnia ka!>>
ACT 2:41 Aɓwana mǝnana à akcau mala Ɓakuli ka, à pakkia wia batisǝma. Lakki mala mǝnia yì aɓwana, à tsǝa amur làkkì mala amǝkpata Yesu a pwari mǝno ka à nda á-tàrú.
ACT 2:42 Pǝlǝa yia ka à paɓamuria aban ak kanigìr a ban amǝ'mishan, andǝ do atārǝia, andǝ li girlina atārǝia, andǝ pakki ahiwi.
ACT 2:43 Ɓwapǝndǝa kat ka do nǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli, acemǝnana Ɓakuli kǝ pakki agir-ndǝlǝki, andǝ agir-gyambǝliban nǝ abu amǝ'mishan.
ACT 2:44 Sǝ amǝkpata Yesu kat ka, à dapi ɓamuria, a do atārǝia, à kǝ gau agirbunda malea atārǝia.
ACT 2:45 À makki agirkuma andǝ agǝna malea, sǝ à pè koya ɓwa nani ka gìr mǝnana karǝ arǝ tǝle male ka.
ACT 2:46 Koya pwari ka, à kǝ yiu a dapi atārǝia, aban peri aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. À kǝ kpapiki arǝ aɓala malea aban li girlina. À kǝ li girlina atārǝia nǝ banɓoarnado, nǝ ɓabumia mwashat.
ACT 2:47 À camarǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli, sǝ aɓwana kat ka banɓoaria wia a rǝia. Sǝ koya pwari ka, Ɓakuli kǝ tsǝa amur làkkì malea nǝ aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kum amsǝban ngga.
ACT 3:1 A ɓè pwari mwashat, Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana ka à ndaban eauwe aban ká a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, a bu-pwari tàrú mala pwari, ace pak hiwi.
ACT 3:2 Ɓè ɓwa nakam, mǝnana à ɓǝ̀lì ka gbakǝre na. Koya pwari ka à kǝ twali à kǝ tsǝì a giriban, a kun Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, mǝnana à tunǝki ama, Kunɓala Mǝɓoarjami, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ kǝ zǝmgi agir a bu aɓwana mana à kǝ kútí aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka.
ACT 3:3 Lang nǝ̀ sǝn Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana aban kutio aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, zǝmbia wia boalo.
ACT 3:4 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana soaki wi mǝsǝu, sǝ Bitǝrus banggi wi ama, <<Sǝn sǝm!>>
ACT 3:5 Pǝlǝa gbakǝre-ɓwa tsǝk mǝsǝì arǝia, kǝ sǝni ama à nǝ̀ pe wi ɓoro.
ACT 3:6 Sǝ Bitǝrus banggi wi ama, <<Ən panǝ boalo mǝ nǝ po ɗàng. Sǝama gìr mǝnana mǝ ndanǝi ka nda ǝn nggǝ po ka. Aɓa lullǝ Yesu Kǝrǝsti ɓwa Nazarat, lo sǝ wu gya!>>
ACT 3:7 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus bwal buì mǝlì, loasǝi tamsǝì. Nǝ̀ pa anggo ka, kara akusǝ ɓwabura man andǝ ankpalkusǝi kum rǝcandǝa,
ACT 3:8 sǝ yàl a kùli came amur akusǝi, sǝ tita gya! Kǝ gya, kǝ yàl a kùli, aban ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli. Pǝlǝa kutio ateà a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 3:9 Aɓwana kat sǝni aban gya, sǝ kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli.
ACT 3:10 Lang à yì súrǝì ama, nda kǝ gbakǝre, mǝ'zǝmnggiagir mǝnana dukiyi a kunɓala Mǝɓoarjami mala Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, à pak ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ gir mǝnana à pakki wi ka!
ACT 3:11 Lang mǝnia yì ɓwa na ban kur arǝ Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana aban mǝnana à tunǝki ama, Tara mala Solomon ngga, aɓwana kat mana aban nì ka, à ɓangŋa à yiu à yì came abania aban pak ndalǝki nǝ mǝnia yì gìr ka.
ACT 3:12 Lang Bitǝrus sǝn ɓwabundǝa yi ram ka pǝlǝa banggia wia ama: Wun amǝ Isǝrayila, palang sǝ wu kǝ pak ndali, sǝ palang sǝ wu kǝ soa mǝsǝ wun arǝ sǝm? Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla nǝ rǝcandǝa ma'sǝm andǝ cauɓoarna ma'sǝm sǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka kǝ gya ado le?
ACT 3:13 Ɓakuli mala Ibǝrayim, andǝ Ishaku andǝ Yakupu, Ɓakuli mala aká sǝm, nda pè guro male yì Yesu gulo nǝ mǝnia yì gìr ka. Sǝ wun ngga wun nǝ̀ twali sǝ wu pea aɓwana ɓǝà walì. Wu ɓinǝkì a ɓadǝm Bilatus, anzǝm mǝnana yì Bilatus ka, earǝna ama nǝ̀ panzǝi ɓǝ̀ o ka.
ACT 3:14 Wu ginǝki Ɓwa Mǝɓoarne, Guro Mǝfele mala Ɓakuli, sǝ wu banggi Bilatus ama, ɓǝ̀ panzǝa wun mǝ'walki-alú.
ACT 3:15 Wu wal-lú ɓwa mǝnana nda pākiyi yilǝmu ka, sǝama Ɓakuli loasǝi a ɓembe. Sǝ sǝm ngga sǝm sǝnǝni nǝ mǝsǝ sǝm, nda sǝm nggǝ nacau male ka.
ACT 3:16 Nǝ́ gūlì arǝ lullǝ Yesu, sǝ mǝnia yì gbakǝre ka kum rǝcandǝa. Sǝ wun ngga, wu sǝlǝna rǝ ulang gbakǝri male ɗiɗyal. Sǝ paɓamuru aban Yesu nǝ̀ yinǝi wi nǝ rǝcandǝa mala nggūrǝì, kǝla mǝno ado wun kat wu sǝnì ka.
ACT 3:17 Ado ka, wun amǝ'eamrǝarǝu, ǝn sǝlǝna ama gìr mǝnana wun, wunǝa aɓwana-mǝgule ma'wun pakki Yesu ka, wu pè aɓa ɗwanyi sǝlǝe.
ACT 3:18 Sǝ Ɓakuli ka, nda ban lùmsǝ agir mǝnana bangce nǝ kun amǝ'ɓangnǝa male ama, Kǝrǝsti nǝ̀ nu tanni ka.
ACT 3:19 Wu pwanzali ado, wu pǝlǝ nzǝm wun arǝ acauɓikea ma'wun. Wu nyare aban Ɓakuli, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ twala wun ban acauɓikea ma'wun.
ACT 3:20 Sǝ Mǝtalabangŋo ka nǝ̀ pà wun apwari mala kum bǝsa rǝcandǝa, sǝ nǝ̀ tasǝa wun Kǝrǝsti Yesu, mǝnana twali tsǝì ɓǝ̀ duk Mǝ'amsǝban ace wun ngga.
ACT 3:21 Dumǝna púp ama Yesu ka nǝ̀ ueo kano a kùli, bà pwari mǝnana Ɓakuli nǝ̀ nyesǝ agir kat ɓǝà pǝlǝ bǝshe, kǝla mǝnana bangce nǝ kun amǝ'ɓangnǝa male amǝfele a pwarian ngga.
ACT 3:22 Musa bang ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli ma'wun, nǝ̀ loasǝ ɓe mǝɓangnǝa, kǝla mim aɓalǝ aɓwana ma'wun. Wu tsǝkir wun arǝ agir mǝnana kat nǝ̀ bangga wun ngga.
ACT 3:23 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kat pà nǝ̀ okî mǝnia yì mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli raka, à nǝ̀ pusǝì aɓalǝ aɓwana mala Ɓakuli ɓǝ̀ kiɗiki.>>
ACT 3:24 Tite aban Samuyila, amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli kat, amǝnana Ɓakuli bang cau nǝia ka, à bang cau amur agir mǝnana à kǝ kumban yalung ngga.
ACT 3:25 Wu nda ka amuna mala amǝno yia amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ka, sǝ wu nda aɓa kùrcau mala Ɓakuli mǝnana pakki aká wun ngga. Acemǝnana Ɓakuli banggi Ibǝrayim ama, <<Nǝ́ bú mǝ'keò sǝ mǝ nǝ tsǝki aɓwana a ɓanza kat buam.>>
ACT 3:26 Lang Ɓakuli loasǝna guro male Yesu ka, tasǝi a ban wun, wun amǝ Isǝrayila peatu, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ tsǝka wun bu, a njar mala pǝlǝ koyan atà wun ngga, ɓǝ̀ nying ɓealɓikea male.
ACT 4:1 Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana ka, à ndaban nea aɓwana cau più, sǝ apǝris andǝ ɓwamǝgule mala amǝ'yál Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli andǝ amǝ Saduki pǝlǝa à yì tusǝo.
ACT 4:2 Yia ka bumia lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r, acemǝnana Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana na ban kani aɓwana gìr sǝ à kǝ hamnǝi ama, nǝ ban Yesu ka aɓwana nǝ̀ kum lo a ɓembe, kǝla mǝnana Yesu loapi ɓembe ka.
ACT 4:3 Pǝlǝa à bwal Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana à oasǝia a ndàkurban, ɓǝa nongŋo she ɓǝ̀ ban fana ka, acemǝnana pwari kpana.
ACT 4:4 Kat andǝ amani ka, aɓwana pas mǝnana à ok cau mala Ɓakuli ka à paɓamuria, sǝ mǝnia ka yi tsǝk làkkì mala aburana mǝnana à paɓamuria ka, yi bwal á-tongno (5,000).
ACT 4:5 Ban fana ka, amǝtala la, andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi, andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, à yì dapi a Urǝshalima.
ACT 4:6 Annas Pǝris Mǝgule ka ndakam, andǝ Kayafas, andǝ Yohana, andǝ Alizanda, andǝ aɓea aɓwana amǝtau mala Pǝris Mǝgule.
ACT 4:7 Pǝlǝa à yiu nǝ alaggana mala Yesu mǝnia yia ɓari ka, à came a ɓadǝmbia, sǝ à ɗia ama, <<Nǝ ya rǝcandǝa, sǝ aɓa lullǝ yana sǝ wu pak mǝnia yì gìr ka?>>
ACT 4:8 Sǝ Bitǝrus ka, lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele, pǝlǝa nea wia ama: Wun amǝtala là andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule ma'sǝm!
ACT 4:9 Ado ka, wu ndaban ɗì sǝm ace túró mǝɓoarne mǝnana à pakki gbakǝre man ngga le? Wu kǝ earce wun nǝ̀ súrǝ̀ lang sǝ yi kum rǝcandǝa ka le?
ACT 4:10 Came ɓǝ̀ ǝn bangga wun bwāng, wun, wunǝa amǝ Isǝrayila kat ama, nda aɓa lullǝ Yesu Kǝrǝsti ɓwa Nazarat, yì ɓwa mǝnana wu gballì amur nggun-gangndǝi, sǝ Ɓakuli loasǝi a ɓembe ka, sǝ mǝnia yì ɓwa ka kum rǝcandǝa.
ACT 4:11 Yesu ka nda ɓwa mǝnana Malǝmce nacau amurí, ama, <<Tali mǝnana wun amǝɓa wu nyesǝi ɓà ka, nda yi duk kǝ tali mǝnana kútì aɓea kat nǝ ɓoaro ka.>>
ACT 4:12 Amsǝban ngga à kǝ kumi aban Yesu nǝmurǝì, Ɓakuli pa ma ɓekǝ lullǝu aɓa ɓanza, mǝnana nǝ yì sǝ aɓwana nǝ̀ kum amsǝban ngga ɗàng.
ACT 4:13 Sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule man kat ka, à pak ndalǝki nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa mala Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana, acemǝnana à sǝnia ka aɓwana na anggo, à kum ɓekǝ kanigir aɓa Malǝmce ɗàng. Pǝlǝa gìr nî yi kpākia wia ama Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana ka à do a tārǝia andǝ Yesu.
ACT 4:14 Sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule man ngga à pànǝ cau mǝnana ɗǝm à nǝ̀ na ka ɗang, acemǝnana à sǝn ɓwa mǝnana à twali wi ban rǝkwana ka, aban came aban Bitǝrus, andǝ Yohana aban nì.
ACT 4:15 Pǝlǝa à nea wia ama, ɓǝa nying nda-kpapi ɓǝa pur a nza, sǝ yia ka à lidǝmba nǝ nacau arǝarǝia.
ACT 4:16 Sǝ à ɗì rǝarǝia ama, <<Lang sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ pang nǝ aman yia aɓwana ka? Acemǝnana koyan a Urǝshalima ka sǝlǝna ama à nda à pak mǝnia yì gir'ndǝlǝki ka, sǝ pà sǝm nǝ̀ tǝmce ɗang.
ACT 4:17 Sǝ ace mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ tamsǝ mǝnia yì cau ɓǝ̀ kǝa lidǝmba nǝ mesǝe aɓalǝ aɓwana ɗǝm raka, ɓǝ̀ sǝm nunkiria, ɓǝa kǝa na ama à nǝ̀ nyare à nǝ̀ ne kǝɓwa cau ɗǝm aɓa lullǝ Yesu ɗang.>>
ACT 4:18 Pǝlǝa à tunǝia, sǝ à nea wia ama, ɓǝa kǝa na ama à nǝ̀ nyare à nǝ̀ nacau, ko à nǝ̀ kanigìr nǝ lullǝ Yesu ɗǝm ɗang.
ACT 4:19 Sǝ Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana nea wia ama, <<Nggearǝ wun nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun ngga, wu gau mǝnia yì ɓashi ka a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli, amur mana ɓoaro ɓǝà pa; ɓǝà oka wun le, ko ɓǝà okî Ɓakuli?
ACT 4:20 Acemǝnana pà sǝm nǝ̀ tamsǝ nacau amur gir mǝnana sǝm sǝni, sǝ sǝm ok ka ɗàng.>>
ACT 4:21 Pǝlǝa aɓwana-mǝgule nyare nunkiria nǝ rǝcandǝa, sǝ à nyia à o. Acemǝnana à sǝni ka, nǝ̀ kwano sǝ à nǝ̀ pea wia tanni, acemǝnana ɓwapǝndǝa na rǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli, nǝ gir'ndali mǝnana à pe ka.
ACT 4:22 Mǝnia yì ɓwa mǝnana à pakki wi gir'ndǝlǝki mala twalban rǝkwana ka, apǝlǝa male a ɓanza kútì lumi-ine.
ACT 4:23 Lang à nyingŋǝnia ka, Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana nyar aban aɓea amǝkpata Yesu, sǝ à yì banggia wia cau mǝnana agbani pǝris andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi na ka.
ACT 4:24 Lang amǝkpata Yesu o anggo ka, kara à loasǝ già atārǝia a ban Ɓakuli aban pak hiwi ama: We Mǝtalabangŋo mǝnana Karban kat ka, a nda ɓwa mǝnana a pusǝ kuli, andǝ nzali, andǝ nggeamùr, andǝ agir mǝnana aɓalǝia kat ka!
ACT 4:25 A bang cau nǝ Bangŋo mò, nǝ kún kà-sǝm Dauda, yì guro mò, ama: <<Palang sǝ bum aɓwana mala anzali ɓanza kǝ lúllô, palang sǝ aɓwapǝndǝa kǝ kùr kunarǝia ɓà?
ACT 4:26 Amurǝma ɓanza kùr rǝia, sǝ amǝ'talanzali ramba, arǝ Mǝtalabangŋo Ɓakuli, andǝ Kǝrǝsti male.>>
ACT 4:27 Acemǝnana anggo sǝ Hirǝdus andǝ Buntu Bilatus kpapi kunarǝia aɓa mǝnia yì là ka. À kpapi kunarǝia andǝ aɓwana mǝnana à súrǝ̀ Ɓakuli raka, andǝ amǝ Isǝrayila kat, nǝ ɓibura arǝ Yesu, yì guro mò Mǝfele, yì ɓwa mana a tsǝì nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban ngga.
ACT 4:28 Sǝ gìr mǝnana yia à pak kat ka, nda gìr mǝnana we, aɓa rǝcandǝa andǝ kàne mò ka, a tsǝa ama anggo sǝ nǝ̀ yia pa.
ACT 4:29 Sǝ adyan ngga, Mǝtalabangŋo, ok cau ɓungi ɓabum malea, sǝ wu pa sǝm, sǝm aguro mo, rǝcandǝa mala bang cau mò nǝ ɓabumcandǝa.
ACT 4:30 Lǝmdǝ buo nǝ rǝcandǝa mala twalban rǝkwana, pakki agir-ndǝlǝki andǝ agir-gyambǝliban nǝ lullǝ guro mò Mǝfele yì Yesu.
ACT 4:31 Lang à nǝ̀ mal pak hiwi ani ka, kara ban mǝnana à ram kam ngga dǝurǝkio. Sǝ yia kat ka, à lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele, sǝ à hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli nǝ ɓabumcandǝa.
ACT 4:32 Amǝkpata Yesu kat ka à dum nǝ ɓabumia andǝ ɗenyicau malea mwashat. Acemǝnana kǝɓwa ɓalǝia twal girkuma male ka, male na nǝmurǝì raka, à gaki agir kat arǝarǝia.
ACT 4:33 Amǝ'mishan lidǝmba aɓa rǝcandǝa nǝ banggi aɓwana cau mala loapi ɓembe mala Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu, sǝ ɓwamuru mala Ɓakuli sulǝo amúrià kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 4:34 Kǝ ɓwa pà kàm aɓalǝia mǝnana ɗwanyi kǝgìr ka ɗàng, acemǝnana aɓwana mana à ndanǝ agirkuma kǝla anzali ko aɓala ka, à mea,
ACT 4:35 sǝ à yiu nǝ boale a ban amǝ'mishan, acemǝnana ɓǝà pè koyan ngga gìr mǝnana pàk tǝle ka.
ACT 4:36 Sǝm nǝ̀ gandǝ sǝni arǝ Yisǝfu, mǝnana amǝ'mishan pè wi ɓè lullǝu ama Barnabas ka (ɓá lullǝuî nda, Ɓwa mǝnana kǝ ɓakɓabum aɓwana ka). Yì ka, ɓwa tàu mala Lawi na, mǝnana pur a Luran mana à tunǝki ama Sayipǝrus ka.
ACT 4:37 Yì Barnabas ka, yiu yi mak nzali male, pǝlǝa yinǝ boale kat a ban amǝ'mishan.
ACT 5:1 Sǝ ɓeɓwa nakam lùllǝì ama Hananiya. Yì andǝ māmí Safira ka à mak nzali malea.
ACT 5:2 Sǝ nǝ eare mala māmí, sǝ san boalo mǝnana à mangŋa nzali nǝi ka, sǝ warinǝ cili aban amǝ'mishan, kya pea wia.
ACT 5:3 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus banggi wi ama, <<Hananiya, palang sǝ a eare Shetan lùmsǝ ɓabumo, gandǝa a ne Bangŋo Mǝfele nyir, sǝ a tsǝk cili boalo mǝnana a kúmô aɓa mak nzali ka a pángŋǝ̀nà mò nǝi?>>
ACT 5:4 Nzali nî ka, mona sǝ a me re? Sǝ anzǝm mǝnana a mangŋǝ́nì ka, boale kat ka mona a nǝ pàngŋǝ̀nà gìr mana kat a earkiyice ka nǝi. Palang sǝ a pak ɗenyicau mala pak mǝnia yì gìr ka? Sǝ sǝm nda mǝnana a bangga sǝm nyir ka ɗàng. Ɓakuli na mǝnana a ne wi nyir ka.
ACT 5:5 Lang Hananiya nǝ̀ ok cau mǝno ka, kara kpa a nzali, wu. Sǝ aɓwana mana kat à ok cau mǝnia ka, gìr nî pea wia ɓangciu kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 5:6 Pǝlǝa alaggana marǝki luí, à kya tsǝì a tūli.
ACT 5:7 A nzǝmi kǝla abúpwari tàrú ka, māmí yiu, pànǝ sǝlǝe mala gìr mǝnana kum burí ka ɗang.
ACT 5:8 Bitǝrus pǝlǝa ɗì ama, <<Banggam, mǝnia ka nda kǝ boalo mǝnana kat à pa wun ace nzali mǝnana wu me ka le?>> Pǝlǝa pa eare ama, <<E, anggo sǝ sǝm me.>>
ACT 5:9 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus banggi wi ama, <<Palang sǝ wun kǝm wu eare, wu pak ɗenyicau mala kārǝki Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli? Sǝni, kusǝ alaggana mǝnana à tsǝk burio a tūli ka, à nda à cam a kunɓala ka, à nǝ̀ yia twalo gbal!>>
ACT 5:10 Àkǝ̀ banì, kpa a ɓadǝm Bitǝrus wu. Pǝlǝa alaggana man kutio, sǝ lang à yì kumi wuna ka, à twali à kya tsǝì abanarǝia andǝ burí.
ACT 5:11 Pǝlǝa ɓangciu mǝgule sulǝ amur ikǝlisiya kat, andǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à ok ce mǝnia yì gìr ka.
ACT 5:12 Amǝ'mishan pakki agir-ndali andǝ agir-gyambǝliban pas aɓalǝ aɓwana. Sǝ amǝkpata Yesu kat pak ka à kǝ dapi a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli a buban mǝnana à kǝ tunǝi ama Tara mala Solomon ngga.
ACT 5:13 Acili aɓwana ka, ɓangciu pakkia wia, à gandǝ kutio aɓalǝ amǝkpata Yesu ɗang, sǝ aɓwana kat ka à twal amǝkpata Yesu nǝ gulo kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 5:14 Kat andǝ mǝno ka, aburana andǝ amamǝna pas camarǝ paɓamuria aban Mǝtalabangŋo. Mǝnia ka tsǝa amur làkkì malea.
ACT 5:15 Nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa, sǝ aɓwana pusǝ amǝkwánó à nongsǝia a girǝi anjar aɓalǝ aleso andǝ akala, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Bitǝrus nǝ̀ yia kútí ka, ɓǝ̀ yilǝmi ɓǝ̀ sulǝ amur aɓea aɓwana ateà.
ACT 5:16 Aɓwabundǝa purki arǝ amuna-là pas mala Urǝshalima, à yiu nǝ amǝkwánó andǝ aɓwana mǝnana akukwar nda a rǝia ka. Sǝ yia kat ka à kum twalban mala akwánó malea.
ACT 5:17 Pǝlǝa Pǝris mǝgule andǝ aɓwana mǝnana atè, mǝnana à nda buì mala amǝ Saduki ka, à lo nǝ mɓali kǝ̀rkǝ́r arǝ amǝ'mishan.
ACT 5:18 Pǝlǝa à bwal amǝ'mishan, à oasǝia a ndàkurban.
ACT 5:19 Sǝ nǝ dú mǝno ka, mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo mǝn akún ndàkurban, pusǝ amǝ'mishan a nza, sǝ banggia wia ama,
ACT 5:20 <<Wu kyane, wu kya came a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, wu banggi aɓwana kat cau mala mǝnia yì bǝsa yilǝmu ka.>>
ACT 5:21 Pǝlǝa amǝ'mishan ongŋǝna anggo ka, à kutia Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli nǝ budǝmbari, sǝ à tita kanigir. Lang Pǝris Mǝgule andǝ aɓwana atè yina ka, à tunǝ amǝkùrcau mala amǝ Yahudi a banɓwáná, sǝ à tasǝban a Ndàkurban ace mǝnana ɓǝà kya yiu nǝ amǝ'mishan a ɓadǝmbia ka.
ACT 5:22 Lang aɓwana mǝnana à túriá, à yiu a ndàkurban ngga, à yì kum amǝ'mishan a ndàkurban ɗang. Pǝlǝa à nyare a ban dapi a kya bangce, ama,
ACT 5:23 <<Lang sǝm warina a ndàkurban ngga, sǝm nggea kum akún ndàkurban ngga à kumlǝnia, sǝ à ɓun kǝ ɓè ateà ɗàng. Sǝ amǝ'yál ndàkurban gbal ka, à nda aban came malea, sǝ lang sǝm loasǝ kunakurǝm ngga, sǝm kum kǝɓwa aɓalǝi ɗàng!>>
ACT 5:24 Lang agbani pǝris andǝ ɓwamǝgule mala amǝ'yál Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ok anggo ka, gìr nî pea wia ndali, nǝ gir mana kum amǝ'mishan ngga, andǝ gir mana nǝ̀ kpate ka.
ACT 5:25 Pǝlǝa ɓeɓwa yiu a bania sǝ yi banggia wia ama, <<Wu kwaki kir wun! Aɓwana mǝnana wu oasǝia a ndàkurban ngga, à nda a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli aban kani aɓwana gìr!>>
ACT 5:26 Pǝlǝa ɓwamǝgule mala amǝ'yál Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli puro wari andǝ amǝtè, à kya yinǝ amǝ'mishan. À pakkia wia ɓè kǝgìr nǝ rǝcandǝa ɗang, acemǝnana ɓangciu kǝ pakkia wia ama, aɓwana nǝ̀ ɓukkia nǝ atali.
ACT 5:27 Pǝlǝa à kútí nǝ amǝ'mishan à yì tamsǝia a ɓadǝm amǝkùrcau, sǝ Pǝris Mǝgule pakkia wia ɗiban,
ACT 5:28 ama, <<Sǝm nunkir wun nǝ rǝcandǝa ama, wu kǝa na ama, wun nǝ̀ kanigir nǝ lullǝ ɓwa man ɗǝm ɗàng. Ado ka wu tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà kanigir ma'wun akina ban kat aɓa Urǝshalima, nyar ɗǝm ngga, wu kǝ earce tsǝa ɓǝà na ama, sǝm nda sǝm wal Yesu ka!>>
ACT 5:29 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus andǝ aɓea amǝ'mishan eare ama: Sǝm ngga, sǝm nǝ̀ okî Ɓakuli, amur mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ okî ɓwapǝndǝa ka.
ACT 5:30 Ɓakuli mala aká sǝm nda loasǝ Yesu a ɓembe, anzǝm mǝnana wu gbàllì amur nggun-gangndǝi, wu wal-luí ka.
ACT 5:31 Nda Ɓakuli loasǝi, dumsǝi a buno mala gulo, a buì mǝlì, nda sǝ duk Ɓwamǝgule andǝ Mǝ'amsǝban ngga. Ɓakuli pak mǝnia yì gìr ka ace pè amǝ Isǝrayila dǝmbu mala pwanzali ɓǝà pǝlǝ nzǝmia arǝ acauɓikea malea, sǝ nǝ̀ twalia wia banì.
ACT 5:32 Sǝm nda ka aɓwana mǝnana sǝm sǝni nǝ mǝsǝ sǝm, nda sǝm nggǝ nakún amǝnia yì agir ka, sǝ anggo gbal sǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele, mǝnana Ɓakuli pani aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ kpata cau male ka.
ACT 5:33 Lang amǝkùrcau kat ongŋǝna mǝno yì cau ka, bumia lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ à lo ama, à nǝ̀ wal-luia.
ACT 5:34 Pǝlǝa ɓeɓwa nakam aɓalǝia, ɓwa Farisi, mǝnana à tunǝki ama Gamaliyel, malǝm Nggurcau mala Musa, mǝnana ɓwapǝndǝa kat kǝ pe wi gulo ka. Lo came aɓalǝia, sǝ tsǝa ɓǝ̀ amǝ'mishan puro a nza bǝti.
ACT 5:35 Pǝlǝa banggi dapi ama: Wun amǝ'eambam, amǝ Isǝrayila, wu ɓal ɓabum wun nǝ gir mǝnana wu kǝ earce pakkî aɓwana man ngga.
ACT 5:36 Wun nǝ̀ gandǝ ɗenyi ama, ɓwa kǝla Tiudas, pur a pwarian kǝ na ama, yì ka, ɓwamǝgule na, yi mǝnana aɓwana gbǝman-ine pǝlǝ amǝkpate ka. Sǝ à yì wali wǔ, amǝ kpate gbal ka à mesǝke, sǝ cau male yi wú anggo.
ACT 5:37 A nzǝmi ka, Yahuda, ɓwa Galili yi lo gbal, a bàkú mala ɓalban. Yi nun aɓwana pas atè, yì gbal ka à yì wali wǔ, sǝ amǝtè mesǝki kat.
ACT 5:38 Ace mani ka, mǝ ndaban bangga wun, wu kǝa na ama, wun nǝ̀ pakkî aɓwana man ɓè kǝgìr ɗàng. Wu nyia anggo! Acemǝnana gìr mana yia ka à ne, sǝ à pè ka, ɓǝ̀ pě mala ɓwapǝndǝa na ka, nǝ̀ kútí anggo,
ACT 5:39 sǝ ɓǝ̀ pě mala Ɓakuli na yinǝ gir man ngga, wun pà nǝ̀ gandǝia ɗàng, ɓǝ̀ ana raka, wun nǝ̀ nggá kum ɓamur rǝ wun aban munǝo arǝ Ɓakuli! Pǝlǝa dapi kat kpata kwarkiru mala Gamaliyel,
ACT 5:40 sǝ à tunǝ amǝ'mishan ɓǝà kutio a bania, sǝ à nunkiria, à koea. Pǝlǝa à nea wia ama, ɓǝà kǝa na ama à nǝ̀ ɓǝsǝlǝ nacau nǝ lullǝ Yesu ɗǝm ɗàng. Pǝlǝa à nyia ɓǝà o anggo.
ACT 5:41 Lang amǝ'mishan nying bania ka, à pak banɓoarnado, acemǝnana Ɓakuli sǝnǝnia ama à kārǝ́na nutanni ace lullǝ Yesu.
ACT 5:42 Nda do ama ko aya pwari ka, ko a Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, ko arǝ aɓala, amǝ'mishan ngga, à lidǝmba nǝ kanigir andǝ hama nǝ Cau Amsǝban ama, Yesu nda Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban.
ACT 6:1 Aɓalǝ amǝno yì anonggio, lang làkkì mala amǝkpata Yesu nǝ̀ nggǝ lidǝmba ka, nggwani kutio a nre ka amǝ Yahudi mǝnana à kǝ na kún Gǝrik, andǝ amana à kǝ na kún Ibǝru ka. Amǝnana à kǝ na kún Gǝrik ka, à na ama à kǝ tsǝkir amā-lú malea aban gau girlina mala koya pwari ka ɗàng.
ACT 6:2 Pǝlǝa amǝ'mishan mana lum-nong-ɓari ka, à tunǝ amǝ kpata Yesu kat aban dapi, à na ama, <<Pa nǝ̀ ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ sǝm bwaki bu sǝm arǝ túró hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli, ɓǝ̀ sǝm nyare a gaki girlina ɗang.
ACT 6:3 Ace mani ka, wun amǝ'eamrǝarǝu, wu tàrki aɓwana tongno-nong-ɓari aɓalǝ wun, amǝnana à kǝ ɓwangsǝia, ɗǝm ngga à lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli, andǝ sǝlǝe, mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ pea wia mǝnia yì túró ka.
ACT 6:4 Sǝ sǝm ngga, sǝm nǝ̀ pa rǝcandǝa ma'sǝm arǝ pakki Ɓakuli túró nǝ hiwi andǝ hamnǝ cau.>>
ACT 6:5 Mǝnia yì cau à bang ngga, banɓoari koyan ngga arǝì. Pǝlǝa à twal Itǝfanu, ɓwa mǝnana lùmsǝ nǝ paɓamuru aban Ɓakuli andǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele ka, andǝ Filip, andǝ Pǝrokorus, andǝ Nikano, andǝ Timon, andǝ Pamena, andǝ Nikolas. Nikolas ka ɓwa nggea-là Antiyok na, mǝnana kútí a kpata peri mala amǝ Yahudi ka.
ACT 6:6 Amǝnia yia aɓwana ka, nda à yì tamsǝia a ɓadǝmbǝ amǝ'mishan, à pakkia wia hiwi, sǝ à tsǝkia wia bu ka.
ACT 6:7 Anggo sǝ cau mala Ɓakuli lidǝmba kǝ akiban. Amǝkwaɗi mǝnana a Urǝshalima ka, à lidǝmba nǝ làkkì. Sǝ apǝris pas paɓamuria aban kpata Yesu.
ACT 6:8 Itǝfanu ka, lùmsǝ nǝ ɓwamuru andǝ rǝcandǝa mala Ɓakuli, kǝ pakki agir-gyambǝliban andǝ agir-ndali mǝgulke aɓalǝ aɓwana.
ACT 6:9 Sǝ aɓea amǝ Yahudi mǝnana à pur nǝ anggea-là Sayirin andǝ Alizandǝriya, mǝnana à nda ɓalǝ amǝ ndakpapi mǝnana à tunǝki ama Ndakpapi mala aɓwana mǝnana à panzǝia ka, à mgbicau a rǝi. Yia andǝ aɓea mǝnana à pur arǝ abu-nzali mala amǝ Sǝlisiya andǝ Asiya ka, à lo nǝ makgìr a rǝi.
ACT 6:10 Sǝ Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli pe Itǝfanu sǝlǝe mǝnana ɓǝ̀ nacau ka, kǝɓwa ateà gandǝ makgirì ɗang.
ACT 6:11 Pǝlǝa à soakita aɓea aɓwana aɓa sǝmbǝrǝa ama ɓǝà na ama, <<Sǝm oè aban kyauwiki Musa, sǝ kǝ nacau mǝɓane amur Ɓakuli.>>
ACT 6:12 Anggo sǝ à soa bum amǝ Yahudi andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule andǝ amalǝm Nggurcau mala Musa. À lo à bwal Itǝfanu à um nǝi aban amǝ'ɓashi.
ACT 6:13 Pǝlǝa à loasǝ aɓea aɓwana ɓǝà na nyir amurí ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, koya pwari ka nda mur na mǝɓane amur Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli andǝ Nggurcau mala Musa.
ACT 6:14 Sǝm oè bang ama, mǝnia yì Yesu, Ɓwa Nazarat ka, nǝ̀ arki Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, sǝ nǝ̀ nggaɗi akúncau mǝnana Musa nyingga sǝm mia ka!>>
ACT 6:15 Mǝsǝ ɓwapǝndǝa mǝnana kat a ndaɓashi ka, ueo arǝ Itǝfanu aban sǝne kyap-kyap. Sǝ à sǝn ɓamǝsǝi ka, nda kǝla mala mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 7:1 Pǝlǝa Pǝris Mǝgule ɗì Itǝfanu ama, <<Acau mǝnia à nea a muro ka, ɓafo na le?>>
ACT 7:2 Itǝfanu eare ama: Wun amǝ'eambǝam andǝ atarram, wu kwakikir wun a rǝàm! Ɓakuli mǝɓoarɓwe pusǝrǝi aban ká sǝm Ibǝrayim a nzali Mesopotamiya peatu, kaniama ɓǝ̀ o a dola a Haran.
ACT 7:3 Sǝ ne wi ama, <<Ɗeki aɓwana mô andǝ nzali ma'wun, o a nzali mǝnana mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝo wi ka.>>
ACT 7:4 Anggo sǝ Ibǝrayim ɗeki Chaldi, nzali malea, kutio o kya do a Haran. Anzǝm lú mala tárrí ka, Ɓakuli loasǝi aban yiu a nzali mǝnia wu nda kam ado ka.
ACT 7:5 Sǝ Ɓakuli ka, pe Ibǝrayim kǝ ban aɓa nzali nì ama liɓala na ace ka ɗàng, ko mǝɓakusǝu mwashat. Sǝa ma yi pàcau ama nǝnzǝ́mò ka, nǝ̀ pe wi nzali nì ɓǝ̀ duk male andǝ amǝkè atè, kat andǝa mani ama anggo ka Ibǝrayim malaká kum muna ɗang peatu.
ACT 7:6 Mǝnia ka nda cau mana Ɓakuli ne wi ka: <<Amǝkeo nǝ̀ nggá do kǝla abǝri a ɓè nzali mǝnana malea na raka. Amǝ nzali mǝno nǝ̀ cia à nǝ̀ duk aguro, à nǝ̀ pea wia tanni arǝ apǝlǝa gbǝman-ine.>>
ACT 7:7 Sǝa ma Ɓakuli bang ama, <<Mǝ nǝ ɓashia aɓwana mala nzali mǝno mǝnana à nǝ̀ cia a guro ka. A nzǝmi ka, à nǝ̀ purî ɓá mǝno yì nzali ka, à nǝ̀ yia peri abanam àkǝ̀ ban mǝnia ka.>>
ACT 7:8 Pǝlǝa Ɓakuli pe Ibǝrayim kùrcau mala kasǝ ɓatau. Anggo, lang Ibǝrayim ɓǝlna Ishaku ka, kasǝî wi ɓate a tongno-nong-tàruià nongŋo. Ishaku ɓǝl Yakupu, sǝ Yakupu yì ɓǝl aká sǝm mǝnana lum-nong-ɓari ka.
ACT 7:9 Aká sǝm ngga à mwar arǝ mǝ'eambia yì Yisǝfu, sǝ à me, ɓǝ̀ kya duk guro a Masar. Sǝ Ɓakuli na atè,
ACT 7:10 amsǝi aɓalǝ atanni male. Pe wi múrɓoarna andǝ sǝlǝe a ɓadǝm Firona, Murǝm Masar, pǝlǝa murǝm Masar tsǝk Yisǝfu ɓǝ̀ duk nggwamna mala nzali Masar, sǝ amur ɓala male kat yì Murǝm.
ACT 7:11 Sǝ nzala yi kpa aɓa nzali Masar andǝ nzali Kan'ana kat, mǝnana yiu nǝ tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka. Aká sǝm gandǝ kum girlina ɗang.
ACT 7:12 Sǝ lang Yakupu yi ok ama mǝsǝsa nda a nzali Masar ka, pǝlǝa túr amuni, yia aká sǝm. Mǝnia ka nda tita ká malea a Masar.
ACT 7:13 Ɓaria ká malea ka, Yisǝfu lǝmdǝ ɓamúrì aban amǝ'eambi, pǝlǝa Firona yi súrǝ̀ amǝɓala mala Yisǝfu.
ACT 7:14 Anzǝm mǝno ka, Yisǝfu pǝlǝa tasǝban a ban tárrí Yakupu ɓǝà ne wi ama, kǝ earce yì andǝ amǝɓala male mǝnana ɓwamǝpǝndǝe lumi tongno-nong-ɓari bwamdǝ-tongno ka, yia kat ɓǝà yiu a Masar.
ACT 7:15 Pǝlǝa Yakupu o a Masar, akàm sǝ yì andǝ amuni, yia aká sǝm, à kya wukio.
ACT 7:16 À pwan aluia à um nǝia a Shekem, akanó sǝ à kya cia a ɓembe mǝnana Ibǝrayim kúr a bu amuna mala Hamo nǝ boalo ka.
ACT 7:17 Lang pwari mǝnana Ɓakuli nǝ̀ lùmsǝ gir mǝnana pàcau ace a ban Ibǝrayim yi gbashìnà ka, aɓwana ma'sǝm yi lakkìna a Masar kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 7:18 Pǝlǝa ɓè Murǝm mǝnana súrǝ̀ kǝgìr amur Yisǝfu raka, yi eau a buno-murǝm a Masar.
ACT 7:19 Mǝnia yì murǝm ngga tǝpǝri aká sǝm, pea wia tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r mǝnana kwanrǝia ka. Kǝ tsǝa ama ɓǝà nying abangna-muna malea a nza ace mǝnana ɓǝà kǝa au raka.
ACT 7:20 Àkǝ ɓá bákú mǝno ka, nda à ɓǝlna Musa nǝi ka; muna na nǝ ɓoarɓwa kǝ̀rkǝ́r a mǝsǝ Ɓakuli. À iulǝi zongŋo tàrú a ɓala mala tárrí.
ACT 7:21 Lang à kya nyingŋǝni a nza ka, ɓoarnsari mala Firona twali, yi lǝsǝi kǝla muni.
ACT 7:22 À kanî Musa sǝlǝe mala amǝ Masar kat, pǝlǝa dum nǝ rǝcandǝa aɓa nacau andǝ túró.
ACT 7:23 Lang apǝlǝa mala Musa lumsǝna lumi-ine ka, ɗenyicau yipì wi a ɓabumi ama ɓǝ̀ kyane, ɓǝ̀ kya sǝn aɓwana male, yia amǝ Isǝrayila.
ACT 7:24 Kya sǝn ɓè ɓwa-Masar aban pakkì ɓe ɓwa-Isǝrayila gìr mǝnana ɓoar raka, ɓà. Nda sǝ lo kya cama ta ɓwa-Isǝrayila, ak munǝo, pǝlǝa wal-lú ɓwa-Masar.
ACT 7:25 Musa twali ama aɓwana male, yì amǝ Isǝrayila, à nǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama Ɓakuli nda aban paktúró nǝi ɓǝ̀ amsǝia, sǝ ko à súrǝ̀ mani ɗàng.
ACT 7:26 Ban fana ka yi kumǝna amǝ Isǝrayila ɓari aban munǝo, pǝlǝa kutia gakkia. Nea wia ama, <<Wu nda ka amǝ'eamrǝarǝu amǝ Isǝrayila wun kǝm, sǝ palang sǝ wu kǝ munǝo a rǝarǝ wun?>>
ACT 7:27 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana kǝ pè ɓì tanni ka, jambǝrǝ Musa, ne wi ama, <<Yana cio ɓwamǝgule andǝ mǝ'ɓashi amur sǝm?
ACT 7:28 A kǝ earce wal-luem kǝla mǝnana a wal-lú ɓe ɓwa-Masar yilung ngga le?>>
ACT 7:29 Lang Musa nǝ̀ ok ana ka, kara ɓangŋa o a nzali Midiyan, kya duk bǝri-ɓwa kàm. A banì sǝ kya ɓǝl amuna-burana ɓari.
ACT 7:30 Anzǝm apǝlǝa lumi-ine ka, mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli pusǝrǝi a ban Musa aɓa lasǝbǝsa mǝnana kǝ earke aɓa nkwarki ka, a njenza a ban Nkono Saina.
ACT 7:31 Lang Musa nǝ̀ sǝn mǝnia yì gìr ka, ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ gir mǝnana sǝn ngga. Twal kusǝì aban ká, nǝ̀ nggá pelǝki pepè, kara ok gi Mǝtalabangŋo ama:
ACT 7:32 <<Mǝ nda Ɓakuli mala akeô, Ɓakuli mala Ibǝrayim, andǝ Ishaku, sǝ Yakupu.>> Rǝ Musa twal ɓǝla nǝ ɓangciu, gandǝ loasǝ mǝsǝì nǝ̀ sǝnban ɗang.
ACT 7:33 Pǝlǝa Mǝtalabangŋo ne wi ama, <<Swár ankura mǝnana a kusǝo ka, acemǝnana ban mana a cam kam ngga, nzali mǝfele na.
ACT 7:34 Ɓafo na, ǝn sǝnǝna tanni mala aɓwana mem a Masar. Ən ongŋǝna ɓua malea, sǝ ǝn sulǝo mǝ nǝ yia panzǝia. Ado ka, Mǝ nǝ túrǒ, nyare, kya Masar.>>
ACT 7:35 Mǝnia ka nda kǝ Musa mǝnana à ɓinǝki, à ne wi ama, <<Yana cio ɓwamǝgule andǝ mǝ'ɓashi amur sǝm?>> Nda kǝ ɓwe mǝnana Ɓakuli tasǝi, ɓǝ̀ duk ɓwamǝgule amúrià andǝ mǝ'amsǝia, nǝ bu mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli mǝnana pusǝrǝi a baní aɓa lasǝbǝsa mǝnana kǝ earke aɓa nkwarki ka.
ACT 7:36 Yi amsǝia à purî ɓá nzali Masar nǝ pakki agir-gyambǝliban andǝ agir-ndǝlǝki aɓa nzali Masar, andǝ Nggeamùr Nzuno, sǝ aɓalǝ apǝlǝa lumi-ine a njenza.
ACT 7:37 Mǝnia ka nda kǝ Musa mǝnana nea amǝ Isǝrayila ama, <<Ɓakuli nǝ̀ loasǝ ɓe mǝɓangnǝa male kǝla mim àkǝ̀ ɓalǝ aɓwana ma'wun.>>
ACT 7:38 Yì Musa ka, nda atà amǝ Isǝrayila a ban ramba a njenza; ndakam akanó atà aká sǝm atārǝia andǝ mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli mǝnana nacau nǝi a Nkono Saina, sǝ ak acau mǝpà yilǝmuì, ace yinǝia aban sǝm.
ACT 7:39 Sǝ aká sǝm ngga, à ɓinǝ okî Musa; à ginǝkì, sǝ aɓa ɗenyicau malea ka, à earce ama à nǝ̀ nyare a Masar.
ACT 7:40 À ne Haruna ama, <<Pakka sǝm ankúl mǝnana à nǝ̀ dupa sǝm kǝla aɓakuli, ɓǝà akà sǝm dǝmba aban gya. Acemǝnana mǝnia yì Musa pusǝ sǝm a nzali Masar ka, sǝm súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana kumi ka ɗàng.>>
ACT 7:41 A bàkú mǝno ka à ɓak ɓǝ̀nzál kǝla muna jamnda. À yinǝ agirkusǝu, à ɗārǝ́ nkilia a baní, sǝ à pak banɓoarnado nǝ mǝnia yì gìr à pè nǝ buia ka.
ACT 7:42 Sǝ Ɓakuli ka pǝlǝia wia nzǝmi, nyia ɓǝà kutia peri a ban anlero mǝnana a kùli ka, kǝla mǝnana à gilǝì aɓa Malǝmce mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ama: <<Wun amǝ Isǝrayila! Mǝ nda wu yinǝàm nǝ agir'nkila andǝ apagir aɓalǝ apǝlǝa lumi-ine a njenza ka ɗàng.
ACT 7:43 Ndàkalú mala ɓǝ̀nzál Molek, andǝ nlero mala ɓǝ̀nzál ma'wun yì Rifan, à nda wu twalo wu kǝ gingnǝia atà wun ngga. Amǝnia ka à nda ka ankúl mǝnana wu pàkkî ɓamur rǝ wun ace peri a bania ka. Ace mani ka, mǝ nǝ tsǝa à nǝ̀ pwan wun, à nǝ̀ umnǝ wun arǝ anzali kuko, a dǝmba nǝ Babila.>>
ACT 7:44 Aɓa gya mala aká sǝm a njenza ka, à ndanǝ Taragula mala Ɓakuli mǝnana lǝmdǝ do male ateà ka. Mǝnia yì Taragula ka à pè kǝla mǝnana Ɓakuli kani Musa ama ɓǝ̀ pè ka.
ACT 7:45 Nǝ nzǝ́mò ka, aká sǝm yì ak mǝnia yì Taragula ka a bu atárrià. À yinǝi a buia a nza mǝnana Jesǝwa yiu nǝia a ban mǝnia ka. À ak nzali mǝnia ka a bu aɓea akún mǝnana à ndakam ɗiɗyal sǝ Ɓakuli pǝria, aban ká munǝo mala aká sǝm a rǝia ka. Taragula ka ueo kano a bania bà nza mala murǝm Dauda.
ACT 7:46 Dauda ka kum earmúrú mala Ɓakuli, pǝlǝa zǝmbi Ɓakuli ama, nǝ̀ ɓakki wi ɓala aɓalǝ aɓwana male amǝ Isǝrayila.
ACT 7:47 Sǝa ma Solomon nda yi ɓakkì Ɓakuli ɓalae ka.
ACT 7:48 Kat andǝ amani ka, Ɓakuli mana Gulo Karban kat ka, kǝ do a ɓala mǝnana ɓwapǝndǝa nǝ̀ ɓak ka ɗàng. Kǝla mǝnana mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli bang ama,
ACT 7:49 <<Mǝtalabangŋo na ama, <Kuli ka nda buno-murǝm mem, sǝ ɓanza ka ban tsǝk akusǝam na. Sǝ ya ulang ɓala na ɗǝm wun nǝ̀ ɓakkam? Ko ana raka, aya ban nani sǝ wun nǝ̀ ɓakkam ɓala mǝnana nǝ̀ kārǝam ngga?
ACT 7:50 Nǝ buam sǝ ǝn pak kùli andǝ nzali re?> >>
ACT 7:51 Wun amǝ murcandǝa, andǝ amǝ ɗwanyi súrǝ̀ Ɓakuli aɓa ɗenyicau ma'wun! Kir wun dǝmbǝri aban ok cau mala Ɓakuli fat! Wu nda kǝla aká wun gbal, wu camarǝ mgbiki Bangŋo Mǝfele kiru!
ACT 7:52 Kǝ ɓè mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli nakam mǝnana aká wun pè wi tanni raka le? Amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mana a pwarian à bangce yiu mala Mǝɓealɓoarna ka, aká wun wal-luia. Sǝ ado ka wu kúrkúró nǝi, nyare wu wali wú,
ACT 7:53 yì wun mǝnana wu ak Nggurcau mala Ɓakuli mǝnana à pa wun nǝ́ bu amǝturonjar, sǝ wu kpate raka.
ACT 7:54 Lang amǝkùrcau nǝ̀ ok ana ka, kara ce nì lul bumia kǝ̀rkǝ́r, à nǝm munabuia arǝì nǝ bumlulla.
ACT 7:55 Sǝ Itǝfanu ka, lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele, pǝlǝa loasǝ mǝsǝì a kùli, sǝn tǎlaban mala ɓoarɓwa mala Ɓakuli, sǝ sǝn Yesu aban came a bu mǝlì mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 7:56 Pǝlǝa na ama, <<Wu sǝni! Ndo ǝn sǝn kùli à mǝnni, sǝ Muna mala Ɓwa ndo cam nǝ came a bu mǝlì mala Ɓakuli ka!>>
ACT 7:57 À nǝ̀ ok ana ka, kara à girki akiria nǝ abuia, sǝ nǝ zwalo a kunia bàng-bàng, à ndashi aban ká arǝì.
ACT 7:58 À bwali à nungi, à pusǝì anzǝm nggea-là, sǝ à tita ɓukki nǝ atali. Anggo ka, aɓwana mǝnana à tsǝki wi cau arǝì ka, à nongsǝ anggea-daura malea a ban ɓe mǝlagga lùllǝì ama Sawul.
ACT 7:59 Lang à ndarǝ ɓukki ka, Itǝfanu loasǝ gi pak hiwi ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu, ak yilǝmem!>>
ACT 7:60 Pǝlǝa ɓun amur ankūnǝi loasǝ gi nǝ rǝcandǝa ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, kǝa bwalia nǝ mǝnia yì cauɓikea ka amúrià ɗàng.>> Lang bangŋǝna anggo ka, kara kúni kùmsǝó.
ACT 8:1 Sawul ka ban ɓoari wi arǝ wal-lú Itǝfanu. Àkǝ̀ pwari mǝno ka pàtanni lo arǝ ikǝlisiya mana a Urǝshalima ka. Amǝkwaɗi kat à mesǝki arǝ aban ɗàngɗáng aɓa nzali Yahudi andǝ Samariya, kǝ amǝ'mishan na nǝmurǝia à ueo aɓa Urǝshalima ka.
ACT 8:2 Aɓea amǝ'ɓanggi Ɓakuli na à yì tsǝkban Itǝfanu ka. À ɓua ace kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 8:3 Pǝlǝa Sawul lo wuni adyan aban pe ikǝlisiya tanni ace mǝnana nǝ̀ kiɗiki ka. Kǝ kutikio arǝ aɓala, kǝ bwalki aburana andǝ amamǝna, kǝ um nǝia a ndàkurban.
ACT 8:4 Amǝkwaɗi mǝnana à mesǝki ka, à camarǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban a koya ban mǝnana à wari kam ngga.
ACT 8:5 Filip ka wari a ɓe nggea-là aɓa nzali Samariya, kya camarǝ hamnǝ cau mala Kǝrǝsti, Mǝ'amsǝban aban aɓwana.
ACT 8:6 Ɓwabunda kwaki kiria aban ok cau mǝnana Filip kǝ na ka nǝ ɓabumia kat, lang à sǝn agir-ndǝlǝki mǝnana kǝ pea ka.
ACT 8:7 Abangŋo mǝɓane kǝ purkì rǝ aɓwana pas, nǝ zwalo bàng-bàng. Sǝ aɓwana mǝnana ɓè barea wú, andǝ agbakǝre ka, à twalia wia ban akwánó malea.
ACT 8:8 Ace mani ka, banɓoarnado sulǝ kǝ̀rkǝ́r a mǝno yì nggea-là ka.
ACT 8:9 A mǝno yì nggea-là ka, ɓeɓwa nda kam lùllǝì ama Shiman, yì ka, mǝɗikalú na. Kǝ pe aɓwana mǝnana a Samariya ka ndali. Kǝ twali ɓamúrì ama yì ka, nggea ɓwa mǝcandǝe na.
ACT 8:10 Ɓwapǝndǝa kat, muna andǝ ɓwamǝgule kǝ kwakikiru arǝì. À kǝ bang ama, <<Yì ka, ndanǝ rǝcandǝa mala Ɓakuli mǝnana à tunǝki ama <Rǝcandǝa Mǝgule> ka.>>
ACT 8:11 Yia ka à nyesǝ ɗenyicau malea a baní acemǝnana banì sauwuna, nda aban pea wia ndali nǝ kutan male.
ACT 8:12 Sǝ lang aɓwana yi ak cau amsǝban mǝnana Filip kǝ hamnǝi amur Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli andǝ lullǝ Yesu Kǝrǝsti ka, à kya pakkia wia batisǝma, aburana andǝ amamǝna.
ACT 8:13 Sǝ Shiman nǝ nggearǝì gbal ka, paɓamuri, pǝlǝa à pakki wi batisǝma. Pǝlǝa yì ka, akrǝi atà Filip, à kǝ gya andǝi a koya ban mǝnana wari kam ngga. Kǝ ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r lang sǝn agir-ndǝlǝki andǝ agir-gyambǝliban mǝgulke mǝnana Filip kǝ pea ka.
ACT 8:14 Lang amǝ'mishan mǝnana a Urǝshalima, ongŋǝna ama amǝ Samariya angŋǝna cau mala Ɓakuli ka, à tasǝ Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana abania.
ACT 8:15 À yì bwalna ka, pǝlǝa à pakkia aɓwana mǝnia mǝnana à loa ak cau mala Ɓakuli ka hiwi, ace mǝnana ɓǝa kum Bangŋo Mǝfele ka.
ACT 8:16 Sǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele ka, malaká sulǝo amur kǝɓwa ateà ɗàng peatu; kǝ batisǝma nda nǝmurǝì à pakkia wia aɓa lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu ka.
ACT 8:17 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana tsǝk buia amúrià, sǝ à kum Bangŋo Mǝfele.
ACT 8:18 Lang Shiman sǝnǝna amǝ'mishan à tsǝk buia amur aɓwana sǝ à kum Bangŋo Mǝfele ka, pǝlǝa yinǝia wia nǝ boalo,
ACT 8:19 sǝ na ama, <<Wu pam mǝnia yì rǝcandǝa gbal, ace mǝnana koyana ǝn tsǝk buam amurí ka, ɓǝ̀ kum Bangŋo Mǝfele.>>
ACT 8:20 Sǝ Bitǝrus banggi wi ama, <<We wunǝ boalo mo ka, wu kya bǝsa, acemǝnana a kǝ sǝni kǝla ɓoro mala Ɓakuli ka, à nǝ̀ kúrí nǝ boalo!
ACT 8:21 Kǝ gìr oasǝo aɓa mǝnia yì túró ka ɗang, acemǝnana ɓabumo pa pepe a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli ɗang.
ACT 8:22 Ado ka, pwanzali, pǝlǝ nzǝ́mó arǝ mǝnia yì ɓealɓikea ka, sǝ wu pak hiwi aban Mǝtalabangŋo. Ear ka yì ka, nǝ̀ twalo ban mǝnia yì ɗenyicau mala bumo ka.
ACT 8:23 Acemǝnana ǝn sǝni ka a lumsǝ nǝ mwararǝu mǝɓike kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ cauɓikea marǝkino.>>
ACT 8:24 Pǝlǝa Shiman ear ama, <<Ida, zǝmbi Mǝtalabangŋo acem, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ɓe kǝgìr mwashat aɓalǝ acau mǝnana a na ka, ɓǝ̀ kǝa kumam ɗang!>>
ACT 8:25 Anzǝm mana Bitǝrus andǝ Yohana bangŋǝna cau mǝnana à súrǝì amur Yesu, sǝ à hamǝna nǝ cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo ka, à nyare a Urǝshalima. Amur njar aban o ka, à camarǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban arǝ amuna-là mala amǝ Samariya pas.
ACT 8:26 Ɓè mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo ne Filip ama, <<Lo, tsǝk muro nǝ njar-kunmur, kyane a njargula mǝnana sulǝ a Urǝshalima aban ká Gaza ka.>> (Mǝnia yì njargula ka kàr nǝ ɓá pǝɗanban a njenza.)
ACT 8:27 Nda Filip lo, bwal njargula aban ká. Kya je andǝ ɓeɓwa Itiyopiya, bedǝran na. Yì ka, nggea ɓwamǝgule na, mǝnana bwalkiyi ban tsǝk boalo mala Kandis, mā-murǝm mala amǝ Itiyopiya ka. Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, wari a peri aban Ɓakuli a Urǝshalima.
ACT 8:28 Sǝ nda rǝ nyare aban o a là ka, do aɓa waru-pǝr male, sǝ kǝ ɓalgìr aɓa malǝmce mala Ishaya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 8:29 Pǝlǝa Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli ne Filip ama, <<Kyane, bwalta mǝno yì waru ka.>>
ACT 8:30 Filip pǝlǝa ɓangŋa wario, kya ok mǝno yì ɓwa ka nda aban ɓalgìr aɓa malǝmce mala Ishaya mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli. Sǝ Filip ɗì ama, <<A bwalta gìr mǝnana a ɓalkiyi ka le?>>
ACT 8:31 Pǝlǝa eari Filip ama, <<Lang sǝ mǝ nǝ bwalte, yì mǝnana kǝɓwa bǝlam ɓālǝi raka?>> Pǝlǝa tunǝ Filip ne wi ama ɓǝ̀ eauwe ɓǝ̀ do atè a waru.
ACT 8:32 Ban mǝnana Bedǝran ɓalkiyi aɓa Malǝmce ka ndya ka: <<À nunni kǝla nzur aban ká pwan meali. Kǝla muna-nzur a bu amǝ'mwa nyang nzur, loasǝ kúni ɗang.
ACT 8:33 À nyesǝ ce ɓà, à gìrì nǝ mǝsǝcau. Yana nǝ̀ gandǝ bang cau amur amǝkè? Acemǝnana yilǝmi a ɓanza ka, à kasǝi mgbeatuk.>>
ACT 8:34 Pǝlǝa bedǝran man ɗì Filip ama, <<Banggam, yana ɓwe mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli nakiyi cau amurí, ɓamur rǝì na le, ko ɓeɓwa ɗàng?>>
ACT 8:35 Filip tite nǝ́ kǝ mǝnia yì ban aɓa Malǝmce ka, pǝlǝa banggi wi Cau Amsǝban mala Yesu.
ACT 8:36 À nda ban ká a njargula ka, à yì bwal ɓè ban mǝnana nǝ mur ka. Pǝlǝa bedǝran na ama, <<Sǝni! Mur nia ka! Mana nǝ̀ tsǝa sǝ à pà nǝ̀ pakkam batisǝma ɗang?>>
ACT 8:37 [Filip ne wi ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ a paɓamuro nǝ ɓabumo mwashat ka, à nǝ̀ gandǝ pakko.>> Pǝlǝa bedǝran eari wi ama, <<Ən earna nǝma Yesu Kǝrǝsti ka Muna mala Ɓakuli na.>>]
ACT 8:38 Pǝlǝa bedǝran ne mǝkwak waru ama ɓǝ̀ tamsǝ waru. Filip andǝ bedǝran sulǝo à kutio a mùr, sǝ Filip pakki wi batisǝma.
ACT 8:39 Lang à eapini mùr ka, kara Bangŋo mala Mǝtalabangŋo twal Filip um nǝi. Bedǝran nyare sǝni ɗǝm ɗang. Sǝa ma bwal njargula male aban o nǝ bumpwasǝa.
ACT 8:40 Sǝ Filip, nǝnzǝ́mò ka, kya kum ɓamúrì a ɓè la mana à tunǝki ama Azotus ka. Hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban kam, pǝlǝa gya arǝ alá kat mala ban mǝno ka aban hamnǝ ce, yi pur a Kaisariya.
ACT 9:1 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka, Sawul nda arǝ lidǝmba nǝ nabura arǝ amǝkpata Mǝtalabangŋo, kǝ earce ama nǝ̀ wal-luia. Wario a ban Pǝris Mǝgule,
ACT 9:2 kya zǝmbi wi ɓǝ̀ pè wi acauterǝa aban ká a ban aɓwana-mǝgule mala andakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi, mana a nggea-là Damaska ka. Pa anggo ace mǝnana ɓǝà eari wi, ɓǝ̀ wario sǝ kum koya ɓwa, mǝnana kǝ kwaɗi Njar mala Mǝtalabangŋo, ko aburana ko amamǝna nda ka, nǝ̀ bwalkia, nǝ̀ tākia abuia nǝ̀ um nǝia a Urǝshalima.
ACT 9:3 Lang Sawul malanǝ̀ bwal Damaska ka, kara nggea tǎlaban pur nǝ kuli yi ta, kàrì aɓalǝu.
ACT 9:4 Sawul puro kpa a nzali, pǝlǝa ok giu ne wi ama, <<Sawul, Sawul, ace mana sǝ a kǝ pam tanni?>>
ACT 9:5 Sǝ Sawul ɗiban ama, <<A nda yana le, ɓwamǝgule?>> Giu eari wi ama, <<Mǝ nda Yesu mǝnana a pākiyi wi tanni ka.
ACT 9:6 Sǝ ado ka lo, kutio a nggea-là, à nǝ̀ nggá banggo gìr mǝnana awu nǝ pak ka.>>
ACT 9:7 Aɓi amǝgya mala Sawul ka, à go gǝs, nacau pà kàm ɗàng. À ok gi ɓwa nacau, sǝ à sǝn kǝɓwa ɗàng.
ACT 9:8 Sawul loapi nzali, lang mǝn mǝsǝì ka, ko kǝ sǝn ban ɗang. Pǝlǝa à bwalì wi gara à kútí nǝi a Damaska.
ACT 9:9 Nongŋo tàrú sǝnban ɗang, lìli ɗang, sǝ nu kǝgìr gbal ɗàng.
ACT 9:10 Ɓè mǝkwaɗi ndakam a Damaska lùllǝì ama Hananiya. Mǝtalabangŋo tunǝi a lòrǝo ama, <<Hananiya!>> Pǝlǝa eare ama, <<Mǝ ndya ka, Mǝtalabangŋo.>>
ACT 9:11 Pǝlǝa Mǝtalabangŋo ne wi ama, <<Kyane a nreɓala mǝnana à tunǝki ama Pǝrapǝra ka, ɗice ɓe ɓwa Tarsus ndakam a ɓala mala Yahuda, lùllǝì ama Sawul. Ndaban pak hiwi.
ACT 9:12 Ən lǝmdǝni wi, aɓa sǝnsǝna ɓeɓwa lùllǝì ama Hananiya yiu, yi tsǝk abui amurí ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ sǝnban ɗǝm ngga.>>
ACT 9:13 Sǝ Hananiya eare ama, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, ǝn ongŋǝna cau mala mǝnia yì ɓwa ka a kún aɓwana pas, andǝ gìr'mur'mwana mǝnana lǝmdǝia aɓwana mô mana a Urǝshalima ka.
ACT 9:14 Sǝni ado, yiu male mana akani ka, agbani pǝris nǝ pè wi rǝcandǝa ɓǝ̀ yi bwalki aɓwana kat mana à kǝ̀ peri a bano ka.>>
ACT 9:15 Mǝtalabangŋo ne Hananiya ama, <<Kyane, mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, ǝn tarrì girtúró mem na, ɓǝ̀ kyan nǝ lullǝam a ban aɓwana arǝ anzali, andǝ amurǝma, sǝ ban amǝ Isǝrayila.
ACT 9:16 Mǝ nǝ lǝmdǝì wi agir mǝnana nǝ̀ tanni a rǝia kat ace lullǝam ngga.>>
ACT 9:17 Pǝlǝa Hananiya lo kya kutio a ɓala mǝnana Sawul ndakam ngga. Tsǝk buì amur Sawul, sǝ na ama, <<Mǝ'eamrǝarǝu Sawul, Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu mana pusǝrǝi a bano amur njargula mǝnana a yiu nǝi ka, túrǎm ace mǝnana wu kum sǝnban ɗǝm, sǝ wu lumsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele.>>
ACT 9:18 Kara anggo ka, ɓè kǝgìr kǝla anggwato nji puro aɓalǝ amǝsǝ Sawul à kpa, kara kǝ sǝnban ɗǝm. Pǝlǝa lo, à pakki wi batisǝma.
ACT 9:19 Anzǝm man ngga, ak girlina li, nda sǝ kumǝna rǝcandǝa ka. Sawul pakki anonggio bǝti atà amǝkwaɗi a Damaska.
ACT 9:20 Anggo kara tita hamnǝ cau amur Yesu arǝ andakpapi ama, <<Ɓafo, Yesu ka muna mala Ɓakuli na!>>
ACT 9:21 Aɓwana mǝnana kat à kwaki kiria arǝì ka à ndali, gandǝa à ɗiban ama, <<Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka, nda mana mbak kǝ lǝmdǝì amǝkpata Yesu gìr'mur'mwana a Urǝshalima ka? Sǝ nggearǝ yiu male akani ka, pà ace mǝnana nǝ̀ yia bwalkia nǝ̀ um nǝia a ban agbani pǝris a Urǝshalima ka re?>>
ACT 9:22 Hama mala Sawul ka dum nǝ rǝcandǝa, yàle amǝ Yahudi mǝnana a Damaska ka, à gandǝ makgìr mǝsǝcau mǝnana lǝmdǝia wia ama Yesu ka nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban ngga ɗang.
ACT 9:23 Anzǝm anonggio pas ka, amǝ Yahudi kùrkún a rǝia ama à nǝ̀ wal-lú Sawul.
ACT 9:24 À camarǝ yál kún nggea-là dù andǝ pwari, ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ wal-luí ka. Pǝlǝa cê kpa a kir Sawul.
ACT 9:25 Nǝ du, alaggana male twali aɓa ndakade, à sùlǝì nǝ nza, a fongǝran arǝ sheran mana kàrì nggea-là ka.
ACT 9:26 Lang Sawul yina a Urǝshalima ka, ɓariki ama nǝ̀ kutio aɓalǝ amǝkwaɗi. Sǝ yia ka à ɓanggi wi, acemǝnana à ear ama yì ka, mǝkwaɗi mǝ'mǝsǝcau nì na ɗang.
ACT 9:27 Pǝlǝa Barnabas wari nǝi a ban amǝ'mishan, kya bǝlia wia sǝna mǝnana Sawul sǝn Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu amur njargula, andǝ cau mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo banggi Sawul ka. Ɗǝm ngga banggia wia ce hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban mǝnana Sawul hamnǝi a Damaska nǝ rǝcandǝa aɓa lullǝ Yesu ka.
ACT 9:28 Sawul adyan ngga do atà amǝ'mishan, makrǝi aɓalǝia a Urǝshalima, kǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa aɓa lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 9:29 Sǝ ɗǝm ngga kǝ nacau nǝ amǝ Yahudi mǝnana à kǝ na kun Gǝrik ka, à camarǝ makgìr andǝia kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Sǝa ma à kutia alte ama à nǝ̀ wal-luí.
ACT 9:30 Lang ce nǝ̀ kpa kir amǝ'eamrǝarǝu ka, kara à ɓang nǝ Sawul à um nǝi a Kaisariya, à kya tasǝ te aban ká Tarsus, a la malea.
ACT 9:31 Anggo sǝ ikǝlisiya aɓa nzali Yahudi kat, andǝ Galili andǝ Samariya ka, dum nǝ rǝpwala. Nǝ́ pǎ gbasha mala Bangŋo Mǝfele, amǝkwaɗi kum rǝcandǝa, sǝ à kǝ làkkì, à do nǝ ɓanggi Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 9:32 Aɓa gya mala Bitǝrus arǝ alá ɗàngɗáng aban sǝn ta amǝkwaɗi ka, wari a ban aɓwana mala Ɓakuli mǝnana nǝ do a Lida ka.
ACT 9:33 Akanó ka kya kum ɓeɓwa lùllǝì ama Eniyas, gbakǝre na kǝ dǝurǝ rǝì ɗàng. Twalna apǝlǝa tongno-nong-tàrú nda aban nongŋo a kala.
ACT 9:34 Bitǝrus ne wi ama, <<Eniyas, Yesu Kǝrǝsti twalǝno ban kwánó mò. Lo, kàr kál-nongŋo mô.>> Anggo kara Eniyas lo.
ACT 9:35 Aɓwana mǝnana kat a Lida andǝa mǝnana a Sharon ngga, à sǝn Eniyas pǝlǝa à paɓamuria a ban Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu.
ACT 9:36 Aɓa nggea-là Jopa ka, ɓè ɓwama ndakam, mǝkwaɗi na, lùllǝì ama Tabita. (Lùllǝì nǝ kun Gǝrik ka nda Dokas, ɓālǝi nda: mbamba). Yì ka, aulǝ nǝ pakki aɓwana gìr mǝɓoarne ɗàng, kǝ bwalì amǝ'tǝ̀r kàm.
ACT 9:37 Aɓalǝ amǝno yì anonggio ka, rǝì pakki wi pak lú. Lang à sussǝna lú ka, pǝlǝa à nongsǝi aɓa ndà-kulí.
ACT 9:38 Lida ka nda a ban Jopa tù. Lang amǝkwaɗi ok ama Bitǝrus yiu, nda a Lida ka, pǝlǝa à tasǝ aɓwana ɓari, ɓǝà kya zǝmbi wi ama ɓǝ̀ ɓangŋa a bania a kaurǝa.
ACT 9:39 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus lo o ateà. À yiu à yì bwalǝna ka, à kútí nǝi aɓa ndà-kulí. Amā-lú kat à kàrì aɓalǝu à kǝ ɓua, sǝ à kǝ lǝmdǝki wi adaura andǝ acili agir-nggūrǝu mǝnana Dokas pākia wia mana malaká wu raka.
ACT 9:40 Bitǝrus pusǝia a nza kat, pǝlǝa kū`ndǝó amur ankūnǝi sǝ pak hiwi. Pǝlǝa pǝlǝ rǝì a ban lú, sǝ bang ama, <<Tabita, lo!>> Sǝ Tabita mǝn amǝsǝì, sǝ lang sǝn Bitǝrus ka, par buì lo dum nǝ do.
ACT 9:41 Bitǝrus bwali a garabui, loasǝi tamsǝi amur akusǝi. Pǝlǝa tunǝ amǝkwaɗi andǝ amā-lú, sǝ pea wia Tabita nǝ yilǝmu.
ACT 9:42 Mǝnia yì gìr ka ceì aki ɓá Jopa kat, sǝ ɓwapǝndǝa pas pa ɓamuria a ban Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 9:43 Bitǝrus pakki anonggio a Jopa pas, a ɓala mala ɓè mǝtúró bangsǝki anggû mana à kǝ tunǝi ama Shiman ngga.
ACT 10:1 A Kaisariya ka ɓeɓwa ndakam lùllǝì ama Karnilus. Yì ka, ɓwamǝgule soje na, amur asoje mala amǝ Roma mana à tunǝkia ama, <<Asoje Italiya>> a ɓinalea ka.
ACT 10:2 Yì andǝ ɓala male kat à kǝ peri a ban Ɓakuli, à kǝ gusǝlǝi, sǝ mǝ'ɓanggi Ɓakuli na. Kǝ pe amǝ'tǝ̀r ɓoro kǝ̀rkǝ́r, sǝ usǝlǝkiyi pak hiwi ɗàng.
ACT 10:3 Ɓè kǝ pwari nakam, a bu-pwari tàrú mana pwari pǝlǝna ka, sǝni kǝla lòrǝo, sǝ lòrǝo na ɗang. Sǝn mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli aban yiu a baní, yi ne wi ama, <<Karnilus!>>
ACT 10:4 Yì ka, pǝlǝ mǝsǝì a ban mǝturonjar nǝ rǝɓǝla, sǝ ɗiban ama, <<Mana gir ni na, Ɓwamǝgule?>> Mǝturonjar ne wi ama, <<Ahiwi mò andǝ aɓoro mô mǝnana a kǝ pê amǝ'tǝ̀r ka, Ɓakuli angŋǝnia.
