ACT 10:5 Ado ka, túr aɓwana a Jopa, ɓǝà kya tunǝo ɓeɓwa ndakam lùllǝì ama Shiman, mǝnana à tunǝki ama Bitǝrus ka.
ACT 10:6 Yì ka, sulǝo a ɓala mala Shiman mǝbangsǝ-nggu, ɓala male nda a kún nggeamùr.>>
ACT 10:7 Lang mǝturonjar mǝnana ne Karnilus cau umna ka, Karnilus tunǝ atà amǝtúró ɓala male ɓari, sǝ ɓè soje mwashat mǝgusǝlǝ Ɓakuli, aɓalǝ amǝgya atè.
ACT 10:8 Anzǝm mana bǝlǝnia wia ɓacau mǝnana kat mǝturonjar banggi wi ka, sǝ tasǝia a Jopa.
ACT 10:9 Ban fana ka, aɓwana mana Karnilus tasǝia ka, à nda njar aban ká. À gbàshìnà ban lě ka, pwari malanǝ̀ yiu a ɓong múrú. Bitǝrus gbal ka eauna a kurǝm murɓe nǝ̀ pak hiwi.
ACT 10:10 Nzala yi wali, kǝ earce nǝ̀ li girlina, sǝ lang à nda arǝ pak girlina ka, kara Ɓakuli mǝn mǝsǝì.
ACT 10:11 Sǝn kùli mǝn bwāng, sǝ sǝn ɓè kǝgìr kǝla nggea lagir mǝtangŋe à sùlǝ̀nì aban yiu a nzali nǝ anggúr arǝ akuni ine.
ACT 10:12 Aɓa mǝnia yì nggea lagir ka, koya mbalang girkusǝu ka, ndakam; amana à kǝ gya amur kusǝia ine ka, andǝ amana à kǝ nun bumia a nzali ka, andǝ anyal mana a bumkuli ka.
ACT 10:13 Pǝlǝa ok giu aban ne wi ama, <<Bitǝrus, lo, walo, sǝ wu she!>>
ACT 10:14 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus bang ama, <<Awo, Mǝtalabangŋo! Ən malaká li kǝgìr mǝnana Nggurcau nyesǝi mǝpǝndǝke na ko gìr'ɓeami na ka ɗàng.>>
ACT 10:15 Giu nyar ɓaria ama, <<Gìr mǝnana Ɓakuli gilǝkini ɓoarnansari ka, ce a tunǝi ama gìr'ɓeami ɗàng.>>
ACT 10:16 Mǝnia yì gìr ka pa anggo kusǝ tàrú, kara à nyesǝ nggea lagir mǝno a kùli.
ACT 10:17 Lang Bitǝrus nda aban ndali amur mana nda ɓá mǝnia yì gìr mǝnana Ɓakuli mǝn mǝsǝì sǝni ka, aɓwana mana Karnilus tasǝia ka, à yina à ɗina ce ɓala mala Shiman, à yì camǝna a kunɓala.
ACT 10:18 À pak kou, sǝ à ɗiban ko Shiman mǝnana à tunǝki ama Bitǝrus ka, a ɓalae sǝ sulǝo.
ACT 10:19 Sǝ lang Bitǝrus nda più aban pak ɗenyicau amur mǝnia yì gìr Ɓakuli mǝn mǝsǝì sǝni ka, Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli ne wi ama, <<Shiman, aɓwana tàrú à nda kǝ sǝn banio ka.
ACT 10:20 Lo, sulǝo, wu kyan wunǝia, ce a ɓukibumo ɗàng, acemǝnana mǝ́ nǝ̀ tasǝia.>>
ACT 10:21 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus sulǝo kya kumia, sǝ nea wia ama, <<Mǝ nda ɓwa mǝnana wu sǝngiyi banì ka. Mana yiu nǝ wun ɗe?>>
ACT 10:22 À eare ama, <<Ɓwamǝgule soje, yì Karnilus nǝ̀ túr sǝm. Ɓwa mǝɓafoe na, kǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli. Aɓwana aɓa nzali mala amǝ Yahudi kat kǝ na mǝɓoarne amurí. Mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli ne wi ama ɓǝ̀ no wu yiu a ɓala male, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ kya ok cau mǝnana a nǝ bang ngga.>>
ACT 10:23 Bitǝrus pǝlǝa warinǝia a ɓala, à pak abǝri male. Ban fana ka, lo andǝia. Aɓea mǝkwaɗi mana a Jopa ka, à lo ateà.
ACT 10:24 Ɓè ban fana ka, à kya bwal Kaisariya. Karnilus ka nda aban kullimuria, angŋǝna dǝmba tunǝna aɓǝla andǝ agyajam-ndà male, à yina à yì rǝmǝna.
ACT 10:25 Lang Bitǝrus nǝ̀ kutio a ɓala ani ka, Karnilus kara lo kya kpa kū`ndǝó a ɓadǝmbi, aban pe wi gulo.
ACT 10:26 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus loasǝi, ne wi ama, <<Lo, mim gbal ka mǝ nda ɓwamǝpǝndǝe.>>
ACT 10:27 Bitǝrus nda amur ne wi cau, sǝ kutio a ɓala kum ɓwapǝndǝa ramna kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 10:28 Pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Wun ngga wu sǝlǝna ama, nggurcau ma'sǝm eare ama ɓwa Yahudi ɓǝ̀ kutio a ɓala mala aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, ko ɓǝ̀ kǝgìr dapia ɗàng. Sǝ Ɓakuli ka lǝmdǝàm ama, mǝ ngga tunǝ kǝɓwa ama ɓwa mǝɓane ko mǝɓeami ka ɗàng.
ACT 10:29 Nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa, sǝ lang à túrban atàm ngga, ǝn yiu, ǝn ɓinǝ ɗang. Ado ka wu banggàm, mana nda ɓá túrban atàm?>>
ACT 10:30 Karnilus eare ama: Nongŋo tàrú mǝno kútí ka, pwari nda anggo kǝla mǝnia ka, a bu-pwari tàrú mala pwarikpǝra, mǝ nda ban pak hiwi a ɓala mem, kara ɓeɓwa mana oasǝ agir-nggūrǝu mǝlinzame ka, puro yi came a ɓadǝmbam.
ACT 10:31 Na ama, <<Karnilus, Ɓakuli ongŋǝna hiwi mo sǝ sǝnǝna aɓoro mǝnana a kǝ pe amǝ'tǝ̀r ka.
ACT 10:32 Túrban a Jopa atà Shiman mana à tunǝki ama Bitǝrus ka. Nda a ɓala mala Shiman mǝbangsǝ-nggu, a kún nggeamùr.>>
ACT 10:33 Nda sǝ ǝn gbara ǝn túrban a to ka, sǝ ndya gbal a pê pepè a yiu ka. Ado ka sǝm ndya kat sǝm nggǝ kúndǝô a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli, sǝm nǝ̀ ak cau mana Mǝtalabangŋo no ama wu na sǝm ngga.
ACT 10:34 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus tita nacau ama: Ado ka ǝn sǝlǝna ama ɓafo na Ɓakuli ka earce kǝɓwa kútì ɓè ɗàng.
ACT 10:35 A koya kun ngga, kǝ ak aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ peri a bani, sǝ à kǝ pak gìr mana kǝ pwasǝ bumi ka.
ACT 10:36 Wu sùrǝ́nà cau mǝnana Ɓakuli tasǝnaban nǝi aban amǝ Isǝrayila, kǝ nea wia Bǝsa Cau Amsǝban andǝ dorǝpwala nǝban Yesu Kǝrǝsti, yi mǝnana nda Mǝtalabangŋo amur agirbunda kat ka.
ACT 10:37 Wu sǝlǝna ce gìr mana kumban a nzali Yahudi, tite a nzali Galili a nzǝm mana Yohana tinata hamnǝ cau male mala batisǝma ka.
ACT 10:38 Wu sǝlǝna ɗǝm ama Ɓakuli tsǝk buì amur Yesu Ɓwa Nazarat nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele, andǝ rǝcandǝa. Kǝ gya aban pakki agir mǝɓoarne, sǝ kǝ twalban rǝkwana mala aɓwana mǝnana à nda aɓata rǝcandǝa mala Shetan ngga, acemǝnana Ɓakuli nda atè.
ACT 10:39 Sǝ sǝm, amǝ'mishan ngga, sǝm nda ka amǝ'nakún mala agir mana sǝm sǝn Yesu pea kat a nzali mala amǝ Yahudi andǝ ɓá Urǝshalima ka. À wal-luí nǝ gbaliban amur nggun-gangndǝi.
ACT 10:40 Sǝ Ɓakuli loasǝi a tàruià nongŋo, sǝ nyinggi dǝmbu ɓǝ̀ pusǝrǝi ɓǝà sǝni.
ACT 10:41 Pusǝrǝi aban ɓwapǝndǝa kat ɗàng, kǝ sǝm mana Ɓakuli ak dǝmba tàrki sǝm ama ɓǝ̀ sǝm duk amǝ'nakún male, yì sǝm mana a nzǝm loapi ɓembe male, sǝm lìli sǝnǝia, sǝm nu sǝnǝia ka, sǝm nda.
ACT 10:42 Pǝlǝa tsǝk sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban aban aɓwana sǝ ɓǝ̀ sǝm lǝmdǝia wia ama yì ka, nda ɓwa mǝnana Ɓakuli twali ɓǝ̀ do mǝ'ɓashi mala aɓwana mana nǝ yilǝmu andǝ amana à wuna ka.
ACT 10:43 Yì nda mana amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli kat ka, à nakún ace ama, koyana kat sǝ paɓamuri a baní ka, nǝ̀ kum twalban cauɓikea aɓa lùllǝì.
ACT 10:44 Kún Bitǝrus malaká pwal ɗàng, kara Bangŋo Mǝfele sulǝo amur aɓwana mǝnana kat à kǝ ok cau mana nakiyi ka.
ACT 10:45 Amǝ Yahudi mǝnana amǝkwaɗi na, mana à yiu andǝ Bitǝrus nǝ Jopa ka, à ndali nǝ sulǝo mala Bangŋo Mǝfele amur aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka.
ACT 10:46 Sǝ à oea aban naki acau nǝ aɓia kún sǝ à kǝ ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli. Bitǝrus pǝlǝa na ama,
ACT 10:47 <<Aɓwana mǝnia ka à kumǝna Bangŋo Mǝfele kǝla mana sǝm kum ngga, kǝɓwa ndakam nǝ̀ ginǝe ama ɓǝà kǝa pakkia wia batisǝma aɓa lullǝ Yesu raka le?>>
ACT 10:48 Pǝlǝa tsǝa ama ɓǝà pakkia wia batisǝma aɓa lullǝ Yesu Kǝrǝsti. Sǝ Karnilus zǝmbi wi ama ɓǝ̀ pakki aɓea anongŋo a bania.
ACT 11:1 Amǝ'mishan andǝ aɓea amǝkwaɗi mana a nzali Yahudi ka à ok ama aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka à angŋǝna cau mala Ɓakuli gbal.
ACT 11:2 Lang Bitǝrus wari a Urǝshalima ka, amǝ Yahudi mana a paɓamuria a ban Yesu ka à loarǝi nǝ cau ama,
ACT 11:3 <<Palang sǝ a wari a ɓala mala aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka, nyare a li girlina wunǝia!>>
ACT 11:4 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus bǝlia wia ɓá gìr mǝnana kat pak ka, twal a tite, ama:
ACT 11:5 Mǝ nda aɓa nggea-là Jopa, lang mǝ nda ban hiwi ka, kara Ɓakuli mǝn mǝsǝam, ǝn sǝn sǝna. Ən sǝn ɓè kǝgìr aban sulǝo a nzali kǝla nggubyau mǝgule mana à mǝnni, à kǝ sulǝi nǝ kuli nǝ abui mana ine ka, pǝlǝa yiu yi came a banam.
ACT 11:6 Ən sǝn ɓālǝi pepè, kara ǝn sǝn ambalang agirkusǝu-ɓala, andǝ anyam ɓabondo, agir-nzali, andǝ anyal ɓabondo.
ACT 11:7 Pǝlǝa ǝn ok giu banggàm ama, <<Bitǝrus lo, walo she!>>
ACT 11:8 Sǝ ǝn na nǝma, <<Pà nǝ̀ pa anggo ɗàng, Mǝtalabangŋo! Acemǝnana kǝ girlina mǝɓeami ko mana Nggurcau nyesǝi mǝpǝndǝke na ka malaká kutia kunam ɗàng.>>
ACT 11:9 Pǝlǝa giu nî nyare nacau ɗǝm nǝ kuli ama, <<Kǝa nyesǝ gir mǝnana Ɓakuli langŋǝ́nì ɓoarnansari ka ama mǝpǝndǝke na ɗang.>>
ACT 11:10 Mǝnia pa anggo kusǝ tàrú, sǝ a masǝlǝate ka à yì nyesǝ gir nì a kùli.
ACT 11:11 Aɓa mǝno anggo ka, aɓwana tàrú mǝnana à pur a Kaisariya, à túriá a banam ngga, à yì tusǝna a ɓala mana mǝ nda kam nǝ do ka.
ACT 11:12 Pǝlǝa Bangŋo banggàm ama mǝ ngga ɓukkibumam ɗàng, ɓǝ̀ sǝm o sǝnǝia. Pǝlǝa amǝkwaɗi mǝnia tongno-nong-mwashat a Jopa ka à lo atàm aban ká Kaisariya, sǝm kat sǝm wari a ɓala mala Karnilus.
ACT 11:13 Pǝlǝa banggà sǝm cau mala mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli mǝnana sǝni aban came a ɓala male, sǝ banggi wi ama, <<Tasǝ ɓwa a Jopa a ban ɓwa mana lùllǝì ama Shiman Bitǝrus ka.
ACT 11:14 Yì nda ɓwa mǝnana nǝ̀ banggo cau mana nǝ̀ amsǝo wunǝ amǝɓala mò kat ka.>>
ACT 11:15 Lang ǝn tinata nacau ka, kara Bangŋo Mǝfele sulǝo amúrià, kǝla mǝnana sulǝo amur sǝm a dǝmbe ka.
ACT 11:16 Pǝlǝa ɓalǝam kasǝ arǝ cau mana Mǝtalabangŋo bang ama, <<Yohana pàk batisǝma nǝ mur, sǝ ma'wun ngga à nǝ̀ pàkka wun batisǝma nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele.>>
ACT 11:17 Sǝ acemǝnana Ɓakuli pea aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, ɓoro mǝ'mwashati andǝ mana pà sǝm, sǝm mǝnana sǝm pànà ɓamur rǝ sǝm aban Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu Kǝrǝsti ka, mǝ nda yana sǝ mǝ nǝ ginǝ pě mala Ɓakuli!
ACT 11:18 Lang à nǝ̀ o ana ka, à pànǝ kún nacau ɗǝm ɗàng, kara à tita ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli. À na ama, <<Sǝm sǝnǝni ado, Ɓakuli panì aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka gbal njargula mala pwanzali a mala pǝlǝ nzǝmia arǝ acauɓikea malea, ɓǝà kum yilǝmu!>>
ACT 11:19 Aɓea amǝkwaɗi mǝnana pàtanni mesǝkia a nzǝm lú mala Itǝfanu ka, à gāli à kya bwal bareban Fonishiya, andǝ Luran Sayipǝrus, andǝ nggea-là Antiyok aɓa bu-nzali Suriya. À kǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban, sǝ kǝ amǝ Yahudi nda nǝmurǝia à hambia wia ka.
ACT 11:20 Sǝa ma aɓea amǝkwaɗi mana à pur nǝ luran Sayipǝrus andǝ nggea-là Sayirin ka, à kutio à wari a Antiyok, à kya tita hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban mala Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu a ban aɓwana mala aɓea anzali.
ACT 11:21 Rǝcandǝa mala Mǝtalabangŋo ka nda teà, sǝ aɓwana mala aɓea anzali pas à earnǝ Cau Amsǝban à paɓamuria a ban Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 11:22 Cau mala mǝnia yì gìr ka yi bwal ban amǝkwaɗi a Urǝshalima, pǝlǝa à tasǝ Barnabas a Antiyok.
ACT 11:23 Lang yiu yi bwalǝna Antiyok sǝ sǝnǝna tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli amur aɓwana ka, bumi pwasǝo, camarǝ kwarkiria ɓǝà cam kàngkàng aɓa paɓamuru malea sǝ ɓǝà do nǝ mǝsǝcau a ban Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 11:24 Barnabas ka ɓwa mǝɓoarne na, lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele andǝ paɓamuru. Aɓwana pas à ak Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 11:25 Pǝlǝa Barnabas wari a Tarsus a sǝnban Sawul.
ACT 11:26 Lang kumǝni ka, twali wari nǝi a Antiyok. Yia kǝm à pak pǝlǝa mwashat a ban amǝkwaɗi aban kani aɓwana pas cau mala Ɓakuli. Àkǝ̀ Antiyok sǝ à tita tunǝ amǝkwaɗi ama a Kǝrǝsta.
ACT 11:27 Àkǝ̀ ɓalǝ anongge mǝno ka aɓea amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli pur a Urǝshalima sǝ à wari a Antiyok.
ACT 11:28 Mwashat aɓalǝia, à tunǝki ama Agabus, lo came aɓa rǝcandǝa mala Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli bang ama, nzala mǝgule nda nǝ̀ yia kpa a bu ɓanza mǝno ka kat. (Anggo sǝ gìr nî yi lumsǝo, nzala kpa a bàkú mana Kǝlaudiyus nda murǝm mǝgule ka).
ACT 11:29 Pǝlǝa amǝkwaɗi nea rǝia ama, koyan aɓalǝia ka ɓǝ̀ pà ɓoro mana nǝ̀ gandǝi ka, ɓǝà tasǝi ace pà gbasha a ban amǝ'eamrǝarǝu mana a nzali Yahudi ka.
ACT 11:30 Anggo sǝ à pa, à tasǝ boale a ban aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝkwaɗi nǝ bu Barnabas andǝ Sawul.
ACT 12:1 A bàkú mǝno ka Murǝm Hirǝdus mǝnana à tunǝki ama Agǝripa ka tita pè aɓea amǝkwaɗi aɓa ikǝlisiya tanni.
ACT 12:2 Bwal Jemis, mǝ'eam Yohana, kasǝ meali nǝ nggeabyau.
ACT 12:3 Lang sǝn mǝnia yì gìr pè ka pwasǝ bum aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi ka, nyartu bwal Bitǝrus gbal. (Mǝnia ka pè a pwari Lamsan mala Bǝredi mǝnana yis pa'arǝi raka.)
ACT 12:4 Lang bwalǝna Bitǝrus ka pǝlǝa tsǝa à kya oasǝi a ndàkurban. Tamsǝ asoje arǝ abanì ine ɓǝà yállí, sǝ koya banì ka ndanǝ asoje ine. Kànì mala Hirǝdus ka nda mǝnana ama nǝ̀ pakki Bitǝrus ɓashi lú a ɓamǝsǝ ɓwapǝndǝa a nzǝm Lamsan Yàlîmurû.
ACT 12:5 Anggo ka, Bitǝrus nda a ndàkurban, sǝ amǝkwaɗi ka à camarǝ pak hiwi nǝ ɓabumia kat aban Ɓakuli aceì.
ACT 12:6 Àkǝ̀ bu du mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ban fana ka Hirǝdus nǝ̀ pakki Bitǝrus ɓashi ka, Bitǝrus nda ntulo, abuí andǝ akusǝi ka à tākia nǝ ansolo, sǝ nda a nre ka asoje ɓari. Aɓea asoje came à kǝ yál kun ndàkurban.
ACT 12:7 Ɓalǝu ama nǝ̀ kasǝ ka, nggea tǎlaban karara yi angŋǝna ɓá ndàkurban, sǝ mǝturonjar mala Mǝtalabangŋo puro yi came a ɓadǝm Bitǝrus. Pǝlǝa dǝurǝki Bitǝrus a nkpamtari, loasǝi a ntulo, sǝ ne wi ama, <<Lo a kaurǝa!>> Kara ansolo purrì bu Bitǝrus à sukkio a nzali.
ACT 12:8 Pǝlǝa mǝturonjar ne wi ama, <<Oasǝ agir arǝò, sǝ wu oasǝ ankura.>> Bitǝrus pakki anggo kat. Mǝturonjar ne wi ama, <<Ado ka, mak nggea-daura murɓe mò sǝ yiu atàm.>>
ACT 12:9 Bitǝrus lo purî ɓá ndàkurban aban ká atà mǝturonjar. Aɓa mǝno anggo kat ka, kǝ twali kǝla lòrǝo na, ko pànǝ sǝlǝe ama mǝsǝcau na ɗang.
ACT 12:10 À kya kútì ban amǝ'yál kún nda mǝdǝmbe, à kya kútì ɓarià. À nǝ̀ nggá bwal nggea kunɓala-bolo mǝnana soa nggea-là ka, kara kunɓala-bolo man mǝnbia wia nǝ ɓamúrì. Pǝlǝa à puro aban o amur njarmǝgule, ɓālǝi ama nǝ̀ kasǝ ka, mǝturonjar ndǝrmina.
ACT 12:11 Anzǝm man ngga Bitǝrus nyare aɓa sǝlǝe male, sǝ na ama, <<She ado sǝ kǝ kpakàm ama mǝsǝcau na! Mǝtalabangŋo tasǝ mǝturonjar male ɓǝ̀ amsǝam a bu Hirǝdus sǝ aɓalǝ agir mǝnana kat aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi kùr amuram ngga!>>
ACT 12:12 Lang mǝnia ka kpani wi ka, kara soa ɓala mala Maryamu, nggea Yohana Markus. Akàm sǝ amǝkwaɗi pas ramba aban pak hiwi.
ACT 12:13 Pǝlǝa Bitǝrus wal kunɓala, sǝ muna-ɓala mǝnana à tunǝki ama Roda ka, yiu a ban loasǝi wi kun ɓala.
ACT 12:14 Lang ongŋǝna gi Bitǝrus na ka, kara nying mǝn kunɓala, nyar nǝ mire, nǝ banɓoarnado, kya ne koya ɓwa ka ama Bitǝrus nda aban came a nza a kunɓala.
ACT 12:15 À banggi wi ama, <<Ɓamuro pǝlǝ nǝ pǝlǝa!>> Sǝ lang muna ɓinǝe, cam kingging ama Bitǝrus na ka, nda à na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ nda na ka, mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli mǝnana yálkiyi ka nda.>>
ACT 12:16 Sǝ Bitǝrus camarǝ walki kunɓala. Lang à yì mǝnǝni wi kunɓala sǝ à sǝni ka, à pak ndali.
ACT 12:17 Bitǝrus pǝlǝa nea wia nǝ bui ama ɓǝà duk kunia più, pǝlǝa bǝlia wia ɓālǝi lang sǝ Mǝtalabangŋo pusǝì, pur nǝi a ndàkurban ngga. Nea wia ama, ɓǝà banggi Jemis andǝ amǝ'eamrǝarǝu amǝnia yì agir ka, pǝlǝa nyia kutio o a ɓè ban.
ACT 12:18 Nǝ dǝmbari ka, asoje amǝ yálban ngga ban twalo zurǝì a rǝia, à pǝlǝ ɓalǝia ɓà amur mana kumban sǝ Bitǝrus ka à sǝni raka.
ACT 12:19 Hirǝdus tsǝa ɓǝà alte, sǝ à kumi ɗàng. Pità asoje amǝ'yálban nǝ ɗikiban, pǝlǝa tsǝa ama ɓǝà wal-luia. Anzǝm man ngga, Hirǝdus nying nzali Yahudi kutio o kya do a Kaisariya zuku.
ACT 12:20 Hirǝdus ka bumi lúllô arǝ amǝ Taya andǝ amǝ Sidon, nda sǝ à wari atārǝia a baní à nǝ̀ nggá gilǝki cau, acemǝnana kǝ girlina mana a nzali mala Hirǝdus ka nda à akiyi kam ngga. Lang à kumǝna gbasha a ban Bǝlastus, muna-ɓala mǝnana murǝm earnǝi ka, pǝlǝa à zǝm cau mala dotarǝu aɓa dorǝpwala.
ACT 12:21 A pwari mǝnana Hirǝdus kasǝi à nǝ̀ dum nǝi ka, oasǝ adaura murǝm-ɓwa male, pǝlǝa eauwe do a buno-murǝm sǝ nacau nǝ aɓwana mǝnana à ram ngga.
ACT 12:22 Aɓwana loasǝ già à kǝ noki ama, <<Man ngga gì ɓekǝ ɓakuli na, gì ɓwapǝndǝa na ɗang!>>
ACT 12:23 Àkǝ̀ banì, mǝturonjar mala Ɓakuli kwak Hirǝdus túrí a nzali, acemǝnana twal gulo Ɓakuli ka. Anggwaso lì, kara wǔ.
ACT 12:24 Sǝ cau mala Ɓakuli ka camarǝ lidǝmba, ɓwapǝndǝa pas pǝlǝ amǝkwaɗi.
ACT 12:25 Lang Barnabas andǝ Sawul malǝna túró mishan malea a Urǝshalima ka, pǝlǝa à nyare atārǝia andǝ Yohana, mana ɓè lùllǝì ama Markus ka.
ACT 13:1 Aɓa Ikǝlisiya mǝnana a Antiyok mala bu-nzali Suriya ka amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ndakam, andǝ amǝ kanigir. À nda ka Barnabas, andǝ Shimiyon (mǝnana à tunǝki ama Mǝpǝndǝe ka), andǝ Lukiyus (ɓwa Sayirin), andǝ Maneyan (mǝnana lo atārǝia andǝ murǝm Hirǝdus ka), sǝ Sawul.
ACT 13:2 A ɓe pwari lang à nǝ̀ nggǝ peri aban Mǝtalabangŋo andǝ gilmùr ka, Bangŋo Mǝfele na ama, <<Wu tàrâm Barnabas andǝ Sawul wu cia ɗàng ace túró mǝnana ǝn tunǝia à nǝ̀ pakkam ngga.>>
ACT 13:3 Anzǝm gilmùr andǝ hiwi ka, pǝlǝa à tsǝk abu amúrià sǝ à tasǝia aban o a túró mishan.
ACT 13:4 Yia kǝm mana Bangŋo Mǝfele túriá ka, à pur a Antiyok sǝ à wari a Selusiya, la a kun múr. Abanì ka à kutia waru aban ká a nggea-là Salamis aɓa luran Sayipǝrus.
ACT 13:5 Lang à kya bwalǝna Salamis ka, à hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli arǝ andakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi. Yohana Markus wari ateà ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ bwalia wia túró mishan ngga.
ACT 13:6 À gya arǝ aban pas aɓa luran, à yì bwal la mana à tunǝki ama Pafos ka. Abanì sǝ à kum ɓeɓwa Yahudi mǝmonzǝe, à tunǝki ama Ba-Yesu, mǝnana twal ɓamúrì aɓa nyir ama yì ka, mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na.
ACT 13:7 Yì ka, mǝtamurǝm mala nggwamna, Sajiyos Polus na. Sǝ nggwamna ka, ɓwa na ndanǝ sǝlǝe, pǝlǝa túrban arǝ Barnabas andǝ Sawul acemǝnana kǝ earce ok cau mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 13:8 Sǝ mǝɓangnǝa mǝ nyirì mǝno, mana gbal à tunǝki ama Elimas ka, camarǝ zurǝì kusǝcau, kǝ ɓariki nǝ̀ tsǝk nggwamna ɓǝ̀ kǝa súrǝ̀ mǝsǝcau ɓǝ̀ paɓamuri ɗang.
ACT 13:9 Sǝ Sawul, mana à tunǝki ama Bulǝs ka, lùmsǝ nǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele. Soa mǝsǝi sǝn Elimas kyap-kyap, sǝ banggi wi ama,
ACT 13:10 <<We muna mala Shetan! A nda ɓimǝbura mala gìr mana kat mǝɓoarne na ka! We ka, a lumsǝ nǝ aɓealɓikea ɗàngɗáng mala swarkiban andǝ ɓosǝkia aɓwana. A pà nǝ nying buo arǝ pūrǝki mǝsǝcau mala Mǝtalabangŋo ama ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝ nyir ɗang?
ACT 13:11 Ado ka, ǝn nggǝ banggo, bu Mǝtalabangŋo nǝ̀ sulǝo a muro. We ka, a nǝ duk nte, a nǝ pakki anonggio pas a pà nǝ sǝn tǎlaban mala pwari ɗàng.>> Àkǝ̀ banì kara amǝsǝ Elimas twal mbǝrǝm-mbǝrǝm, pǝndǝa sulǝo amurí, came arǝ harǝkiban aban alta ɓwa mana nǝ̀ bwalì wi gara ka.
ACT 13:12 Lang nggwamna nǝ̀ sǝn man yì gìr kumban ngga, kara paɓamuri aban Mǝtalabangŋo. Yì ka, ndali kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ mǝnia yì kanigir amur Mǝtalabangŋo ka.
ACT 13:13 Bulǝs andǝ aɓwana mana andǝ yì ka, à nying Pafos, à kutio a waru à samsǝa aban ká Parga a bu-nzali Pamfiliya. Yohana Markus ɗekia kano nyare o a Urǝshalima.
ACT 13:14 À purî Parga, à eauwe a nza aban ká a Antiyok mala bu-nzali Pisidiya. A pwari Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo mala amǝ Yahudi ka à kutio aban peri a ndakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi, à kya do.
ACT 13:15 Anzǝm ɓalgìr aɓa Nggurcau mala Musa andǝ malǝmce mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli ka, aɓwana-mǝgule mala ndakpapi tasǝ cau abania ama, <<Wun amǝ'eamrǝarǝu, ɓǝ̀ wu ndanǝ kǝcau kwarkiru ace aɓwana ka, wu yiu, wu yi ne.>>
ACT 13:16 Bulǝs pǝlǝa lo came, loasǝ buì ama ban ɓǝ̀ pwalo, sǝ na ama: Wun amǝ Isǝrayila andǝ aɓwana mala aɓea anzali, mana wu kǝ peri aban Ɓakuli ka, wu kwaki kir wun wu oem!
ACT 13:17 Ɓakuli mala amǝ Isǝrayila tàrki aká sǝm, sǝ cia à làkkì sǝ à gul nǝ rǝcandǝa a nzali Masar. Nǝ rǝcandǝa male mǝgule sǝ yi pusǝia aɓa do guro mǝnana a mǝno yì nzali ka.
ACT 13:18 Twal gandǝrǝu nǝ aɓealu malea aɓalǝ apǝlǝa lumi-ine mala gya malea a pǝɗanban a njenza.
ACT 13:19 Lang à bwal nzali Kan'ana ka, twalta aɓea kun tongno-nong-ɓari, pǝlǝa ak anzali malea pea amǝ Isǝrayila ɓǝ̀ pǝlǝ girkuma malea.
ACT 13:20 Amǝnia yì agir ka à twal apǝlǝa gbǝman-ine nǝ lumi-tongno (450). Anzǝm man ngga, Ɓakuli pea wia amúrû amúrià bà bàkú mala Samuyila mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 13:21 Pǝlǝa yia aɓwana nǝ ɓamuria ka, à zǝmba ama ɓǝà pea wia murǝm. Pǝlǝa Ɓakuli pea wia Sawul muna mala Kishi, a tàu mala Benjami, mana duk murǝm amúrià pǝlǝa lumi-ine ka.
ACT 13:22 Anzǝm mana Ɓakuli sulǝna Sawul ka, pǝlǝa twal Dauda ɓǝ̀ dupia wia murǝm. Sǝ bang amur Dauda ama, <<Ən kum muna mala Jeshi yì Dauda ka, ɓwa na mǝnana kǝ pwasǝ ɓabumam ngga. Kǝ kpata gìr mǝnana ǝn earce nǝma ɓǝ̀ pak ka.>>
ACT 13:23 Nǝban tàu mala Dauda sǝ Ɓakuli yi pea amǝ Isǝrayila Mǝ'amsǝban, yì Yesu, kǝla mana bang ama nǝ̀ pak ka.
ACT 13:24 Kaniama Yesu ɓǝ̀ yiu ka, Yohana Mǝbatisǝma hamǝna ama amǝ Isǝrayila kat ɓǝà pǝlǝ nzǝmia arǝ acauɓikea, ɓǝà pwanzali, sǝ ɓǝà pakkia wia batisǝma.
ACT 13:25 Lang Yohana nda rǝ mal túró mana Ɓakuli pe wi ɓǝ̀ pak ka, bang ama, <<Wu kǝ sǝni kǝla mǝ nda Kǝrǝsti, yì ɓwa mǝnana Ɓakuli tarrì ka le? Mim ngga mǝ nda yì ɗàng. Yì ka, nda kǝ yiu atàm tù ka, sǝ anggúr ankura male ka ǝn kārǝa mǝ nǝ panzǝia ɗàng.>>
ACT 13:26 Ado ka wun amǝ'eambǝam amǝ Isǝrayila, amǝ'kau mala Ibǝrayim, andǝ aɓwana mala acili anzali mǝnana à kǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli ka, aban sǝm sǝ à túrban nǝ mǝnia yì cau amsǝban ngga!
ACT 13:27 Aɓwana, mana nǝ́ do a Urǝshalima andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule amǝ'yálban malea ka, à súrǝ̀ Yesu ama yì nda Mǝ'amsǝban mǝnana amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli gilǝ cau amurí ka ɗàng. A kun mani ka, à kasǝi wi ɓashi wal-luí, sǝ aɓa pě anggo ka à lùmsǝ̀nà acau mala amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mana à kǝ ɓalli a koya pwari Sabbat, sǝ à bwalte raka.
ACT 13:28 Kat andǝ amani ama à kumi nǝ cauɓikea mana à nǝ̀ wali nǝi raka, à ginǝe, à ne Bilatus ama ɓǝà wal-luí.
ACT 13:29 Lang à lùmsǝ̀nà gìr mana kat à gilǝ amurí ama à nǝ̀ pakki wi ka, pǝlǝa à sùlǝì amur nggun-gangndǝi, à kya tsǝì a ɓembe.
ACT 13:30 Sǝ Ɓakuli ka loasǝi nǝ yilǝmu!
ACT 13:31 Aɓalǝ anongŋo pas kǝ pusǝrǝi aban aɓwana mǝnana à kǝ gya andǝia ɗiɗyal, a Galili aban ká Urǝshalima ka. Yia a dyan ngga, à nda ka amǝ nakuni aban amǝ Isǝrayila.
ACT 13:32 Sǝ ado ka, sǝm ndya sǝm yina wun nǝ mǝnia yì Cau Amsǝban ngga. Mǝnia ka nda gìr mana Ɓakuli bang ama nǝ̀ pakki aká sǝm ngga.
ACT 13:33 Sǝ Ɓakuli lumsǝna sǝmi, sǝm mǝnana sǝm nda ka amǝkea ka, yi mana loasǝ Yesu a ɓembe ka. Mǝnia ka nda cau mana à bang amur Yesu aɓa ɓaria kùré mala Anggyal ama: <<We ka, a nda Munem; yalung ngga ǝn dumǝna Tárró.>>
ACT 13:34 Ɓakuli ka bangŋǝna ama nǝ̀ loasǝi, pà nǝ̀ ɗeki ɓǝ̀ rǝmba a tūli ɗang. Mǝnia ka bangŋi aɓa Malǝmce ama: <<Mǝ nǝ po atsǝkbu mǝfele, amǝ'mǝsǝcau nì mǝnana ǝn pacau acea aban Dauda ka.>>
ACT 13:35 Anggo sǝ Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli bang ɗǝm a ɓè ban ama: <<A pa nǝ eare a nǝ nying Ɓwa mo Mǝfele ɓǝ̀ rǝmba a tūli ɗang.>>
ACT 13:36 Mǝnia ka Dauda na à nakiyi cau amurí ka ɗàng, acemǝnana anzǝm mana Dauda pàngŋǝ̀nà gìr mana kànì mala Ɓakuli na, a nza male ka, pǝlǝa wu, à tsǝì a ɓembe atà akê, nggūrǝì ka rǝmbo.
ACT 13:37 Sǝama Ɓwa mǝnana Ɓakuli loasǝi a ɓembe ka, nggūrǝì rǝm ɗang.
ACT 13:38 Ace mani ka, wun amǝ'eambǝam, wu kwakikir wun! Wu sǝlǝ ama nǝ bu Yesu sǝ wu nǝ̀ kum twalban cauɓikea ma'wun.
ACT 13:39 Ɓwa mǝnana paɓamuri a baní ka, à pusǝni aɓata kùrban mala cauɓikea, mǝnana Nggurcau mala Musa pa nǝ̀ gandǝ pe raka.
ACT 13:40 Wu tsǝkir wun, ace mǝnana cau mana amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na ka, ɓǝ̀ kǝa lùmsǝ amur wun ɗàng, mǝnana ama:
ACT 13:41 <<Wu sǝni, wun amǝ ɓangginǝ cau mala Ɓakuli! Wu ndali, wu kya lú, wu ueɓà! Acemǝnana gìr mana ado ǝn nggǝ pe yalung ngga, gìr na mǝnana pà wu nǝ̀ earnǝi raka, ko ɓǝà bang ama ɓeɓwa bangga wun ce ka.>>
ACT 13:42 Lang Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas à nda ban nying ndakpapi ka, ɓwapǝndǝa zǝmbia wia ama ɓǝà nyare a pwari Sabbat mana kǝ yiu ka, ɓǝà nea wia cau ɗǝm amur amǝnia yì agir ka.
ACT 13:43 Anzǝm mana ɓwapǝndǝa mesǝna ka, amǝ Yahudi pas andǝ aɓwana mana à paɓamuru aɓata kwaɗi mala amǝ Yahudi ka, à akrǝia atà Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas. Sǝ Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas ka, à kwarkiria ama ɓǝà lidǝmba nǝ gūlì arǝ ɓwamuru mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 13:44 Pwari Sabbat yi karna ka, là pur kat à yì ramba aban okcau mala Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 13:45 Lang aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi nǝ̀ sǝn aɓwabundǝa ka, kara mɓali pakkia wia, à kǝ makgìr nǝ cau mǝnana kat Bulǝs bang ngga, à kǝ sanggì.
ACT 13:46 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas nea wia nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa ama: Wun amǝ Yahudi, wun nda mǝnana ɓoaro sǝm nǝ̀ bangga wun cau mala Ɓakuli peatu ka. Sǝ acemǝnana wu ɓinǝkini, sǝ wu lǝmdǝna ama wu gattini kum yilǝmu mana málá male pà kàm raka, adyan ngga sǝm ɗekina wun, sǝm nǝ̀ o aban aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka.
ACT 13:47 Acemǝnana mǝnia ka nda nzongcau mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo tsǝka sǝm ama: <<Ən tsǝ́ngŋǝ̀nà wun, wu nda ka tǎlaban aban aɓwana a ɓanza, acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ ɓanza kat kum amsǝban.>>
ACT 13:48 Lang aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka nǝ̀ ok a na ka, kara banɓoaria wia, à kǝ ɓwangsǝki Mǝtalabangŋo ace cau male. Sǝ aɓwana mana kat Ɓakuli tària ace yilǝmu mana pà nǝ̀ mal raka, à paɓamuria, à duk amǝkwaɗi.
ACT 13:49 Cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo mǝsǝe akiban a nzali mǝno.
ACT 13:50 Pǝlǝa aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi soakita aɓwana-mǝgule mala nggea-là, andǝ aɓea amamǝna amǝgulo mala aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka, mana à kǝ peri aban Ɓakuli ka. A tita pe Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas tanni, pǝlǝa à pǝria à purî ɓá nzali malea.
ACT 13:51 Sǝ yia amǝ'mishan ngga à kǝtǝri tú kusǝia, ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝia wia ama à pusǝkina abuia, ɓǝ̀ mana kumia le ka nda amúrià, pǝlǝa à kutio aban ká a Ikoniya.
ACT 13:52 Amǝkpata Yesu mana a Antiyok ka, à lùmsǝ nǝ banɓoarnado andǝ Bangŋo Mǝfele.
ACT 14:1 A nggea-là Ikoniya a bu-nzali Likoniya ka Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas kutio aɓa ndakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi, kǝla mana à pakkiyi ka. À bang cau mala Ɓakuli kam nǝ rǝcandǝa, sǝ mǝnia ka tsǝa amǝ Yahudi andǝ aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka pas, à paɓamuria, à pǝlǝ amǝkwaɗi.
ACT 14:2 Sǝ amǝ Yahudi mana à paɓamuria raka, à soakita aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, ɓǝa pǝlǝ arǝ amǝkwaɗi, ɓǝa ɓinǝ mǝsǝia.
ACT 14:3 Sǝ Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas ka à akrǝia abanì, a sau kam, aban hamnǝ cau ɓwamuru mala Mǝtalabangŋo nǝ rǝcandǝa. Ɓakuli lùmsǝ cau malea, nǝ pea wia rǝcandǝa mala pakkia agir-ndǝlǝki andǝ agir-gyambǝliban, lǝmdǝia aɓwana ama, cau male mana à banggia wia ka, mǝsǝcau na.
ACT 14:4 Sǝ aɓwana mana a mǝnia yì nggea-là ka, à gau banì ɓari: aɓea ɓwana ka à nda ta amǝ Yahudi, sǝ acilia ka à nda ta amǝ'mishan.
ACT 14:5 Pǝlǝa aɓea aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, andǝ aɓea amǝ Yahudi, nǝ pu'nzǝm mala aɓwana-mǝgule mala nggea-là ka, à kurkunia amur amǝ'mishan, à nǝ̀ pakkia wia mǝɓane, à nǝ̀ ɓukkia nǝ atali.
ACT 14:6 Lang ce nǝ̀ yia kpa a kir amǝ'mishan ngga, kara à ɓangŋa à o arǝ anggea-là Listǝra andǝ Dabe mala amǝ Likoniya, andǝ cili bum-ban mana kàrì ban mǝno ka.
ACT 14:7 Akanó ka, à lidǝmba nǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban.
ACT 14:8 A Listǝra ka, ɓeɓwa nakam gbakǝri arǝ akusǝi, anggo sǝ à ɓǝli, mwam gya àkǝ̀ pwari ɗang.
ACT 14:9 Yì ka, do kǝ kwakikiri arǝ cau mana Bulǝs kǝ na ka. Bulǝs sǝni kyap-kyap, kara sǝlǝ ama ɓwabure ka, ndanǝ paɓamuru mana kārǝ́na ɓǝa twaliban rǝkwana ka,
ACT 14:10 pǝlǝa Bulǝs loasǝ gi kpǝm, ne wi ama, <<Lo cam amur akusǝo!>> Anggo, sǝ ɓwa man lo yàl a kùli, pǝlǝa tita gya.
ACT 14:11 Lang ɓwabundǝa sǝnǝna gìr mana Bulǝs pe ka, kara à tita mak'zwalo nǝ kun Likoniya malea ama, <<Aɓakuli pǝlǝna aɓwapǝndǝa, ndya à sulǝo aban sǝm ngga!>>
ACT 14:12 Pǝlǝa à eare ama Barnabas ka nda mǝɓakuli mala amǝ Gǝrik mana à tunǝki ama Zǝyos ka. Sǝ Bulǝs ka à pe wi lullǝu ama Hamis, acemǝnana yì nda murǝm nacau ka.
ACT 14:13 Sǝ pǝris mala Zǝyos, mana ndà-peri male nda tù a nzǝm la ka, yiu nǝ ajamnda andǝ anlang pwasǝobondo a kun njar kutio aɓa nggea-là. Yinǝia ace mǝnana yì andǝ ɓwabundǝa ka, à kǝ earce ama à nǝ̀ pwan-myal ajamnda mǝno ka, à nǝ̀ ɗārǝ́na amǝ'mishan nǝia.
ACT 14:14 Lang ɓá ce yi kpa akir amǝ'mishan, yì Barnabas andǝ Bulǝs ka, kara à sàngi agir-nggūrǝu malea, à kutia mire aɓalǝ aɓwabundǝa, nǝ zwalo a kunia ama:
ACT 14:15 Wun aɓwana, palang sǝ wu kǝ pak mǝnia yì gìr ka? Sǝm gbal ka sǝm nda ka ɓwapǝndǝa kǝla wun. Sǝm yina wun nǝ Bǝsa Cau Amsǝban mala Ɓakuli. Cau mǝnana ama ɓǝ̀ wu nying kpata amǝnia yì agir mǝɓane mǝnana à panǝ yilǝmu raka. Wu nyare aban Ɓakuli mana nǝ yilǝmu, yì ɓwa mǝnana pusǝ kuli, andǝ nzali, andǝ nggeamùr andǝ agir mǝnana aɓalǝia kat ka.
ACT 14:16 A pwarian ngga, ɗeki aɓwana a ɓanza ɓǝà pak gìr mana bumia kania wia ka,
ACT 14:17 sǝ kat andǝ amǝno ka, nying ɓamúrì aɓa ɗwanyi gìr mana nǝ̀ nakuni a ban aɓwana ama yì ka, ndakam, andǝ lǝmdǝ pě mǝɓoarne male a bania ka ɗàng. Kǝ̀ pa wun mbulo andǝ agir-soro mǝɓoarne, ɓǝ̀ kunì karna ka. Sǝ kǝ pa wun girlina andǝ ɓabum banɓoarnado.
ACT 14:18 Sǝ kat andǝ amǝno yì acau a Barnabas andǝ Bulǝs banggia wia ka, kwanbi ɓwabundǝa sǝ à nying ɗārǝia.
ACT 14:19 Aɓea amǝ Yahudi pur nǝ Antiyok (a bu-nzali Pisidiya) andǝ Ikoniya, à yì nun ɓwabundǝa a buì malea. Pǝlǝa à ɓukki Bulǝs nǝ atali, à nungi, à pusǝì, à kya túrí anzǝm nggea-là, à kǝ sǝni kǝla wuna.
ACT 14:20 Lang amǝkwaɗi yi kārì aɓalǝu ka, kara par buì lo nyare kutio aɓa nggea-là. Ɓè banfana ka, yì andǝ Barnabas, à lo, à kutio a Dabe.
ACT 14:21 Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban a Dabe. À kum aɓwana kam pas mana à pǝlǝ amǝkpata Yesu ka. Pǝlǝa à nyare a Listǝra, andǝ Ikoniya, à kya kutio a Antiyok mana aɓa bu-nzali Pisidiya ka.
ACT 14:22 À camarǝ pe amǝkwaɗi rǝcandǝa, à kǝ kwarkiria ama, ɓǝà lidǝmba nǝ paɓamuru malea. À kǝ kasǝ ɓalǝia nǝ mǝnia yì cau ka ama, <<Dumǝna púp sǝm nǝ̀ nu tanni ɗàngɗáng, sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ kutio a Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli.>>
ACT 14:23 Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas twal aɓwana-mǝgule mǝnana à cia amur amǝkwaɗi a koya ikǝlisiya ka. Nǝ hiwi andǝ gilmùr, à tsǝk aɓwana-mǝgule mǝnia aɓata yálban mala Mǝtalabangŋo mana à gūlì a rǝi ka.
ACT 14:24 Pǝlǝa a Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas nyar nǝ nzǝmia nǝ ɓá bu-nzali Pisidiya, à yì purrì wi à kutio a bu-nzali Pamfiliya.
ACT 14:25 À yì hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban a Parga, pǝlǝa à sulǝo aban ká Ataliya.
ACT 14:26 À nying Ataliya ka, à kutia waru sǝ à samsǝa aban ká a Antiyok mala bu-nzali Suriya, aban mǝnana à tita gya malea kam ngga, àkǝ̀ ban mǝnana à cia aɓata ɓwamuru mala Mǝtalabangŋo, ɓǝa kya túró mǝno ado à kǝ nyàrî pe ka.
ACT 14:27 Lang à bingŋǝna ka, pǝlǝa à rambǝa amǝkwaɗi a banɓwáná, sǝ à banggia wia agir mǝnana kat Ɓakuli pe nǝ ta buia, andǝ njar mala paɓamuru mǝnana Ɓakuli mǝnbi aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka gbal.
ACT 14:28 Pǝlǝa à do, bania sau kano atārǝia andǝ amǝkwaɗi.
ACT 15:1 Aɓea amǝkwaɗi pur a nzali Yahudi à yiu a Antiyok, a bu-nzali Suriya. À tita kani amǝkwaɗi ama, <<Ɓǝà kasǝa wun ɓata wun, kǝla mana Nggurcau mala Musa kànì raka, pa wu nǝ̀ kum amsǝban ɗang.>>
ACT 15:2 Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas ka à earnǝ mǝnia yì kànìgìr ka ɗàng, à makgìr kǝ̀rkǝ́r andǝ amǝno yì amǝ Yahudi ka. A masǝlǝate ka, à yì eare ama ɓǝà tasǝ Bulǝs, sǝ Barnabas, andǝ aɓea amǝkwaɗi ɓǝa kya Urǝshalima ɓǝà kya kum amǝ'mishan andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule amur ikǝlisiya, ɓǝà ok kunia amur mǝnia yì cau ka.
ACT 15:3 Pǝlǝa ikǝlisiya, yì amǝkwaɗi tasǝia aban ká. À ara aɓalǝ abarìban Fonishiya andǝ Samariya à kǝ nea amǝkwaɗi cau mala pǝlǝa mala aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka a ban Ɓakuli. Bum amǝkwaɗi pwasǝo nǝ ok mǝnia yì cau ka.
ACT 15:4 Lang à yina a Urǝshalima ka, amǝkwaɗi andǝ amǝ'mishan andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule amur amǝkwaɗi gingsǝia. Pǝlǝa yia ka à twal gìr mǝnana kat Ɓakuli pak nǝia aɓa gya malea ka, à banggia wia.
ACT 15:5 Sǝ aɓea amǝkwaɗi amǝ Yahudi mana à nda buì mala amǝ Farisi ka, à lo à came, à na ama, <<Aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, mǝnana à pǝlǝ amǝkwaɗi ka, dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ kasǝia ɓatea, sǝ à nǝ̀ kpata Nggurcau mala Musa.>>
ACT 15:6 Pǝlǝa amǝ'mishan andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule amur amǝkwaɗi yi do ace sǝngi ɓá mǝnia yì cau ka.
ACT 15:7 Anzǝm naki acau pas ka, Bitǝrus lo came, sǝ nea wia ama: Wun amǝ'eamrǝarǝu, wu sǝlǝna ama aɓea apwari mǝno à kútí ka, Ɓakuli twalam aɓalǝ wun mǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban aban aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka. Ɓakuli tasǝam ace mǝnana yia gbal ka, ɓǝà ǒ, ɓǝà paɓamuria aban Yesu.
ACT 15:8 Ɓakuli mana súrǝ̀ ɓabum koyan ngga, yi lǝmdǝna ama, yì ka, angŋǝnia, acemǝnana pea wia Bangŋo Mǝfele kǝla mana pà sǝm ngga.
ACT 15:9 Ɓakuli lǝmdǝa sǝm earmúrú sǝ ɓinǝmǝsǝia ɗàng, twalia wia ban acauɓikea malea, lak ɓabumia, acemǝnana à paɓamuria a baní ka.
ACT 15:10 Sǝ palang ado, sǝ wu kǝ earce ama wun nǝ̀ kārǝki Ɓakuli, nǝ tsǝki aɓwana mǝnia amǝ Yahudi na raka sǝ à pǝlǝ amǝkwaɗi ka, twalo mǝdǝmbǝre mana nggearǝ aká sǝm, ko sǝm nǝ ɓamurǝ sǝm ngga, sǝm gandǝ twale raka?
ACT 15:11 Mǝnia ka pà nǝ̀ pa anggo ɗàng! Sǝm pa ɓamur sǝm sǝ Ɓakuli amsǝ sǝm nǝ ɓwamuru mala Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu, kǝla mana yia gbal ka à paɓamuria ka.
ACT 15:12 Koyana ka duk ɗǝong, lang Barnabas andǝ Bulǝs kutia nacau mala agir-ndǝlǝki andǝ agir-gyambǝliban mana Ɓakuli pea nǝ buia aɓalǝ aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka.
ACT 15:13 Lang à malǝna nacau ka, Jemis pǝlǝ cau ama: Wu kwaki kir wun a banam, wun amǝ'eamrǝarǝu!
ACT 15:14 Shiman Bitǝrus ndo bǝl ɓá lang sǝ Ɓakuli ɗenyi nǝ aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka ka, mana lǝmdǝia wia ɓwamuru, twal aɓwana aɓalǝia ɓǝà duk amale ka.
ACT 15:15 Mǝnia yì paɓamuru mala aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, nda kǝ ɓangnǝa mǝnana amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli bangŋǝni ka. Kǝla mana à gilǝì aɓa Malǝmce ama:
ACT 15:16 <<Anzǝm man ngga mǝ nǝ nyare sǝ mǝ nǝ yia ɓak ɓala mala Dauda mana kpa ka. Kat andǝa mani ama arki ka, mǝ nǝ ɓè ɗǝm, mǝ nǝ nyesǝi a kusǝì kǝla mana ɗiɗyal ka,
ACT 15:17 ace mǝnana aɓwana arǝ acilia nzali ka, ɓǝà alta Mǝtalabangŋo, yia aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, mǝnana ǝn tunǝia ɓǝà duk amem ngga.
ACT 15:18 Mǝnia ka Mǝtalabangŋo nǝ̀ bangŋa, yì ɓwa mana pusǝ amǝnia yì agir a banfana ɗiɗyal ka.>>
ACT 15:19 Jemis lidǝmba nǝ cau, na ama: A sǝne mem ngga, ɓǝ̀ sǝm ngga pea aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, mana à kǝ pǝlǝ a ban Ɓakuli ka, tanni ɗàng.
ACT 15:20 Gìr mana kutibanì ka, sǝm nǝ̀ gilǝ cauterǝa, sǝm nǝ̀ banggia wia ama ɓǝà kǝa li girlina mana à pea alú atà ankúl ka ɗàng. Ɓǝà purî ɓá kìɗìkì mala nongginǝban. Ɓǝà kǝa li nyam girkusǝu mana à pūrǝ meali nǝ pūrǝo ka ɗàng, sǝ ɓǝà kǝa li nkila ɗàng.
ACT 15:21 Ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɗenyi ama twal arǝ anza mana a pwarian ngga, Nggurcau mala Musa ka, à hamǝna nǝi arǝ andakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi a koya nggea-là ka, a koya Pwari Sabbat.
ACT 15:22 Pǝlǝa amǝ'mishan, andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule amur amǝkwaɗi, andǝ cili ikǝlisiya mana a Urǝshalima ka, sǝni ka ɓoaro ɓǝà twal aɓwana aɓalǝia ɓǝà tasǝia à Antiyok, atārǝia andǝ a Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas. À twal aɓwana ɓari atà aɓwana-mǝgule amur amǝkwaɗi mana amǝkwaɗi kǝ pea wia gulo ka; ɓwa kǝla Yahuda mana à tunǝki ama Barsabas ka, sǝ Silas.
ACT 15:23 À tasǝia nǝ mǝnia yì cauterǝa ka: Cau mǝnia ka puro a ban sǝm, amǝ'mishan andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule amur amǝkwaɗi, amǝ'eam wun. Sǝm nggǝ tasǝ makkun a ban amǝ'eamrǝarǝu kat, mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, mana à ndanǝ do a Antiyok, andǝ acilia aban aɓalǝ abu-nzali Suriya, andǝ Sǝlisiya ka.
ACT 15:24 Sǝm ok ama aɓea aɓwana mana sǝm nǝ̀ túriá raka, à pur aɓalǝ sǝm à yiu a ban wun à yì zurǝi múr wun, à zunggǝli ɓabum wun nǝ acau mana à bang ngga.
ACT 15:25 Ace mani ka sǝm yì dapi, sǝ nǝ́ eare ma'sǝm kat sǝ sǝm twal aɓwana sǝm túriá a ban wun, atārǝia andǝa Barnabas andǝ Bulǝs, yia mana sǝm earkiyi acea raka.
ACT 15:26 Yia ka aɓwana na mǝnana à pa yilǝmia a cau mala túró mala Mǝtala sǝm Yesu Kǝrǝsti ka.
ACT 15:27 Sǝm ndya sǝm nggǝ tasǝa wun Yahuda andǝ Silas, mana à nǝ̀ bangga wun nǝ kunia yì cau mala agir mǝnana kat sǝm cia aɓa gilǝe ka.
ACT 15:28 Nǝ́ eare mala Bangŋo Mǝfele ka sǝm sǝni ka ndanǝ ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ sǝm ngga tsǝka wun twalo amur wun nǝ anzongcau pas mala amǝ Yahudi ama ɓǝ̀ wu kpatea ka ɗang. Kǝ amǝnia na wu nǝ̀ ɗenyi nǝia ka:
ACT 15:29 Wu kǝa li girlina mǝnana à ɗārǝia alú ka ɗang; wu kǝa li nkila ɗang; wu kǝa li nyam girkusǝu mana à pūrǝ myali nǝ puro ka ɗang; wu kǝa kutia pàkkiagir kìɗìkì mala nonggi nǝ rǝarǝu ɗang. Ɓǝ̀ wu yál ɓamur rǝ wun arǝ amǝnia ka, wu pangŋa mǝɓoarne. Ɓǝ̀ rǝ wun pwalo.
ACT 15:30 Aɓwana mana à tasǝia ka, à wari a Antiyok, à kya rambǝa amǝkwaɗi mana abanì ka kat, sǝ à pea wia cauterǝa mana à túriá nǝi ka.
ACT 15:31 Lang à ɓalni ka, amǝkwaɗi lùmsǝ nǝ banɓoarnado, nǝ cau ɓak ɓabum mana a túriá wia ban nǝi ka.
ACT 15:32 Pǝlǝa Yahuda andǝ Silas, yia mǝnana nǝ ɓamuria ka amǝ'ɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli na ka, à sau kam aban kwarkir amǝkwaɗi, à kǝ ɓak ɓabumia nǝ acau pas.
ACT 15:33 Anzǝm mana à pakkina anonggio zuku abania ka, amǝkwaɗi tsǝktea aban nyare a Urǝshalima, aban aɓwana mana à tasǝia ka, nǝ rǝpwala.
ACT 15:34 Sǝ Bulǝs andǝ Barnabas ka à akrǝia a Antiyok, yia andǝ aɓea aɓwana pas à kania aɓwana gìr sǝ à hamnǝ cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 15:36 Nǝ nzǝ́mò ka, Bulǝs ne Barnabas ama, <<Fa sǝm nǝ̀ nyare arǝ alá mǝnana sǝm hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban mala Mǝtalabangŋo kam ngga, sǝm ngga sǝn lidǝmba mala amǝkwaɗi mana à kǝ loa paɓamuria adyan tù ka.>>
ACT 15:37 Barnabas ka earnǝ ce, sǝ earce ama à nǝ̀ o andǝa Yohana Markus.
ACT 15:38 Sǝ Bulǝs ka, ɓinǝ ce kpékpé, ama ɓǝ̀ kǝa ká ateà ɗang, acemǝnana Yohana Markus ka ɗekia, nyare a Pamfiliya, lidǝmba nǝ túró ateà ɗang.
ACT 15:39 Kunia ɓua amur mǝnia yì cau kǝ̀rkǝ́r, gandǝa à gau njar, à ginggia rǝia ɗàngɗáng. Barnabas twal Yohana Markus, a kutio a waru à o a luran Sayipǝrus.
ACT 15:40 Sǝ Bulǝs twal Silas à o andǝi. Amǝkwaɗi cia aɓata ɓwamuru mala Mǝtalabangŋo nǝ hiwi.
ACT 15:41 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs lidǝmba nǝ gya atārǝia andǝ Silas aɓalǝ abu-nzali Suriya andǝ Sǝlisiya, kǝ kwarkir amǝkwaɗi aban pea wia rǝcandǝa.
ACT 16:1 Bulǝs andǝ Silas wari a nggea-là Dabe, sǝ à kya kutio à o a nggea-là Listǝra. Abanì ka ɓe mǝkwaɗi nda kam lùllǝì ama Timoti. Ngge yì Timoti gbal ka mǝkwaɗi na, ɓwa Yahudi, sǝ tárrí ka ɓwa Gǝrik na.
ACT 16:2 Amǝkwaɗi mana a Listǝra andǝ Ikoniya ka, à kǝ ɓwangsǝi yì Timoti.
ACT 16:3 Bulǝs earce nǝ̀ o atārǝia andǝ Timoti a ban túró, pǝlǝa kasǝi wi ɓatè. Pè anggo ace mǝnana amǝ Yahudi mana à ndanǝ do arǝ abanì ka, à sǝlǝna ama tár Timoti ka ɓwa Gǝrik na.
ACT 16:4 Aɓa gya malea arǝ alá ka, à kǝ banggia amǝkwaɗi anzongcau mǝnana amǝ'mishan andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mana a Urǝshalima earǝna amúrià ace aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka ɓǝà kǝ kpatea ka.
ACT 16:5 Anggo sǝ amǝkwaɗi kum rǝcandǝa aɓa paɓamuru malea, sǝ à kǝ làkkì koya pwari ka.
ACT 16:6 Bulǝs andǝ aɓi amǝgya à o arǝ abu-nzali Firigiya andǝ Galati, acemǝnana Bangŋo Mǝfele earia wia ama ɓǝà hamnǝ cau a bu-nzali Asiya ɗàng.
ACT 16:7 Lang à yina a nzong-nzali mala amǝ Misiya ka, à ɓariki ama à nǝ̀ kutio a bu-nzali Bitiniya, nyare Bangŋo mala Yesu ɓinǝia wia,
ACT 16:8 pǝlǝa à ara aɓa bu-nzali Misiya, à dili aban ká a Tǝros.
ACT 16:9 A bu mǝno yì dù ka, Bulǝs kum sǝnǝ aɓa Bangŋo; sǝn ɓeɓwa mala bu-nzali Masǝdoniya aban came, aban zǝmbi wi ama, <<Yiu a Masǝdoniya, yiu bwala sǝm!>>
ACT 16:10 Pǝlǝa sǝm lo aban ká a Masǝdoniya, acemǝnana sǝm sǝlǝna ama Ɓakuli na aban tunǝ sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban aban aɓwana mana a bu-nzali Masǝdoniya ka.
ACT 16:11 Sǝm nying Tǝros a waru-mur aban ká a luran Samotǝres. Lang ban fana ka, sǝm yì bwal Niyapolis, là a kun nggeamùr.
ACT 16:12 Akanó ka sǝm eauwe a nza aban ká a Filipi, ɓè nggea-là mǝgule mala bu-nzali Masǝdoniya aɓa nzali domurǝm mala amǝ Roma. Sǝm pakki aɓea anonggio akanó.
ACT 16:13 A pwari Sabbat ka sǝm purî ɓá nggea-là, sǝm wari a kun nggeasala, aban mana sǝm nggǝ sǝni kǝla akàm sǝ amǝ Yahudi kǝ dapi ace pak hiwi ka. Abanì sǝ sǝm do, sǝm nacau nǝ amamǝna mǝnana sǝm kumia aban ramba abanì ka.
ACT 16:14 Ɓè ɓwama mwashat aɓalǝ amamǝna mǝnana ok sǝm ngga, lùllǝì ama Lidiya, ɓwa nggea-là Tiyatǝra, mǝ makki anggubyau mǝɓoarne mana kúrià pà bǝti raka. Yì ka, ɓwama na mana kǝ peri aban Ɓakuli pepè ka. Lang kwakikiri aban ok sǝm ngga, Mǝtalabangŋo mǝn ɓabumi ɓǝ̀ ak cau mana Bulǝs kǝ na ka.
ACT 16:15 Anzǝm mana à pàngŋǝ́nì wi batisǝma andǝ amǝ'ɓala male ka, pǝlǝa tunǝ sǝm ɓǝ̀ sǝm yiu a ɓala male; na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ wu earnǝ mim ama mǝ nda mǝkwaɗi mǝɓafoe aban Mǝtalabangŋo ka, wu yiu, wu sulǝo a ɓala mem.>> Camarǝ ɓuaki arǝ sǝm gandǝa sǝm eare.
ACT 16:16 A ɓè pwari, sǝm nda rǝ o aban pak hiwi ka, sǝm je sǝnǝ ɓe nsari, guro na. Ndanǝ kukwar arǝì mǝnana kǝ pe wi sǝne, nǝ̀ gandǝ na gìr mǝnana nǝ̀ kumban a dǝmba ka. Yì ka, kǝ kumbi amǝtale gǝna kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ ɓangnǝ-ɓangnǝa.
ACT 16:17 Nsari man kǝ gya atà sǝm sǝnǝa Bulǝs, kǝ loasǝban, kǝ na ama, <<Aɓwana mǝnia ka, à nda ka ɓwana mala Ɓakuli mana Karban kat ka! À nda aban hamba wun njar mana wu nǝ̀ kum àwá nǝi ka!>>
ACT 16:18 Twal anonggio pas camarǝ nacau mǝ'mwashati; gandǝa bum Bulǝs lúllô sǝ pǝlǝa arǝ banggi kukwar mǝnana arǝ nsari ka ama, <<Aɓa lullǝ Yesu Kǝrǝsti sǝ ǝn banggo, purî rǝ nsari man!>> Kara kukwar purrì rǝ nsarì àkǝ̀ banì.
ACT 16:19 Lang amǝtala guro-nsari man sǝlǝna ama tà kume malea kasǝna ka, kara à bwal Bulǝs andǝ Silas, à nungia aɓalǝ aɓwana aban ká a ban amǝ'talanzali a ban-kpapí mala nggea-là.
ACT 16:20 Lang à yina nǝia a ɓadǝmbǝ amǝ'ɓashi ka, à kya na ama, <<Aɓwana man ngga amǝ Yahudi na, sǝ à nda à kǝ yiu nǝ loàsǝ̀ban aɓa là mǝgule ma'sǝm ngga!
ACT 16:21 À kǝ kania aɓwana agir mǝnana à nda ɗàng andǝ anzongcau ma'sǝm, sǝm mana sǝm nda ka amǝ Roma ka.>>
ACT 16:22 Ɓwabunda yi ramǝna a rǝia amur Bulǝs andǝ Silas aban walkia. Pǝlǝa amǝ'ɓashi tsǝa à sàngi agir-nggūrǝu mǝnana arǝ Bulǝs andǝ Silas ka, sǝ à koea nǝ nkamso.
ACT 16:23 Anzǝm mana à kwangnia kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka, à kya túriá aɓa ndàkurban, sǝ à tsǝk mǝ'yál ndàkurban ɓǝ̀ tsǝkiri arǝia pepè.
ACT 16:24 Mǝyal ndàkurban pa kǝla mǝnana à banggi wi ka, ramtea a tǝrtà ndàkurban, pǝlǝa taka akusǝia arǝ agbǝla-nggun amǝdǝmbǝre.
ACT 16:25 Nǝ ɓadu ka Bulǝs andǝ Silas camarǝ pak hiwi, sǝ à kǝ tukia anggyal aban Ɓakuli, sǝ acili aɓwana mana à gìria andǝia ka, à kwakikiria à kǝ oea.
ACT 16:26 Anggo ka kara, nzali gǝggǝliki, tsǝk kusǝ ndàkurban dǝkǝri kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Akunakurǝm mǝngi kat, sǝ ansolo mana arǝ akusǝ andǝ abu koyan kat a ndàkurban ngga, à ɓungio à sukki kat.
ACT 16:27 Mǝyal ndàkurban lo ndǝring, lang nǝ̀ sǝnban ngga, akunakurǝm kat ka, à mǝngina. Aɓa ɗenyicau male ka twali ama, aɓwana mana à gìria a ndà ka, à ɓangŋǝna à mesǝkina. Nda kwetǝ nggeabyau nǝ̀ wal ɓamúrì.
ACT 16:28 Sǝ Bulǝs sà a rǝi ɓwam ama, <<Came, kǝa wal ɓamuro ɗàng! Sǝm ndakani kat!>>
ACT 16:29 Mǝyal ndàkurban tunǝban ɓǝà yinǝi wi nǝ bǝsa. Pǝlǝa ɓangŋa kutio aɓa ndàkurban, kya kpa a ɓadǝm Bulǝs andǝ Silas, rǝì kǝ ɓǝla.
ACT 16:30 Pǝlǝa pusǝia à puro anza, sǝ ɗia ama, <<Aɓwana-mǝgule, mana gir nì na mǝ nǝ pa sǝ mǝ nǝ kum amsǝban?>>
ACT 16:31 À eari wi ama, <<Paɓamuro aban Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu, sǝ awu nǝ kum amsǝban, we wunǝ aɓwana mana aɓala mò ka.>>
ACT 16:32 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs andǝ Silas ne wi Cau Amsǝban mala Mǝtalabangŋo, yì andǝ aɓwana mana aɓa ɓala male ka.
ACT 16:33 Àkǝ̀ mǝno yì bù dù ka, mǝ'yál ndàkurban ɗenyi nǝia, lákkià wia anpenye malea; sǝ yì andǝ koyana aɓa ɓala male ka, à pakkia wia batisǝma.
ACT 16:34 Pǝlǝa wari nǝ Bulǝs andǝ Silas a ɓala male, sǝ yi pea wia girlina. Yì andǝ amǝ'ɓala male kat ka à lùmsǝ nǝ bumpwasǝa, acemǝnana yia kat ka à angŋǝna Ɓakuli.
ACT 16:35 Ban fana ka, aɓwana-mǝgule mala là túr amǝ'munagara ɓǝà kya banggi mǝ'yál ndàkurban ama, <<Ɓǝà nying amǝno yì aɓwana ka ɓǝà o.>>
ACT 16:36 Pǝlǝa mǝ'yál ndàkurban ne Bulǝs ama, <<Aɓwana-mǝgule mala là túrban, ama ɓǝà na wun ama, wu o. Ace mani ka wu kyan caca!>>
ACT 16:37 Sǝ Bulǝs pǝlǝa nea amǝ'munagara ama, <<À kwak sǝm a mǝsǝ ɓwapǝndǝa bwāng, sǝ à pakka sǝm kǝ ɓashi ɗàng, sǝ à nyare à oasǝ sǝm a ndàkurban, sǝm mǝnana sǝm nda ka amǝ Roma ka! Sǝ ado ka, à kǝ earce ama à nǝ̀ nying sǝm a sǝmbǝrǝa? Mǝnia ka pà nǝ̀ pàk ɗàng! Ɓǝà yiu nǝ nggearǝia, ɓǝà yi panzǝ sǝm!>>
ACT 16:38 Lang amǝ'munagara kya banggia aɓwana-mǝgule mala là mǝnia yì cau, sǝ à yì sǝlǝ ama Bulǝs andǝ Silas ka, amǝ Roma na ka, ɓangciu bwalia.
ACT 16:39 Pǝlǝa aɓwana-mǝgule mala là lo à yiu a ndàkurban nǝ nggearǝia, à yiu a pwanbi Bulǝs andǝ Silas nzali. Pǝlǝa à pusǝia, sǝ à zǝmbia wia ama ɓǝà o, ɓǝà nying nggea-là.
ACT 16:40 Lang Bulǝs andǝ Silas nyìngŋǝ̀nà ndàkurban ngga, à nyare a ɓala mala Lidiya. A kàm ngga, à kya kum amǝkwaɗi, sǝ à ɓak ɓabumia. Anzǝm man ngga, sǝ à nying lě.
ACT 17:1 Bulǝs andǝ Silas yi gya arǝ alá Amfipolis andǝ Apoloniya, à yì bwal Tasalonika, ban mǝnana ɓe ndakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi nakam ngga.
ACT 17:2 Kǝla mana pakkiyi ka, Bulǝs pǝlǝa kutio a ndakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi. Abanì ka, twal apwari Sabbat tàrú, à camarǝ sǝngi acau aɓa Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli andǝ aɓwana,
ACT 17:3 kǝ mǝngi ɓalǝ acau, kǝ lǝmdǝia wia ama, Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban ngga dumǝna púp nǝ̀ nu tanni sǝ nǝ̀ loapi ɓembe nǝ yilǝmu. Ɓǝsǝlǝi banggia wia ama, <<Yì Yesu mana ǝn nggǝ hamnǝ ce ka, nda kǝ Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban.>>
ACT 17:4 Aɓea amǝ Yahudi kum jeban mala Ɓakuli a ɓabumia pǝlǝa à kpapi múrià andǝa Bulǝs andǝ Silas. Anggo gbal sǝ aɓwana-mǝgule amamǝna andǝ aɓwana pas amǝ Gǝrik, mana à kǝ peri aban Ɓakuli ka, à pu atà Bulǝs andǝ Silas.
ACT 17:5 Sǝa ma, aɓea amǝ Yahudi ka mɓali pakkia wia, pǝlǝa à kum aɓwana amǝɓane aɓa limo, à rambǝia, sǝ à kutia zunggǝliban aɓa nggea-là. À wari nǝ munǝo a ɓala mala Jasǝn, acemǝnana à nǝ̀ bwal Bulǝs andǝ Silas à nǝ̀ yinǝia a nza aban ɓwabundǝa ka.
ACT 17:6 Sǝ lang à kum Bulǝs andǝ Silas raka, à nungi Jasǝn andǝ aɓea amǝkpata Yesu, à yiu nǝia aban amǝkùrcau mala la. À camarǝ loasǝban nǝ già a kùli ama, <<Aɓwana mǝnia ka, à nda à kǝ yinǝ zunggǝli a bum ɓanza kat ka! À ndya ɗǝm à yiua zurǝi nggea-là ma'sǝm ngga,
ACT 17:7 sǝ Jasǝn angŋǝnia a ɓala male. Aɓwana mǝnia kat ka à nyesǝ anzongcau mala Kaisar, yì murǝm mǝgule mala amǝ Roma ɓà, à kǝ na ama ɓekǝ murǝm nakam, lùllǝì ama Yesu.>>
ACT 17:8 Lang amǝtala nggea-là andǝ aɓwabundǝa nǝ̀ ok anggo ka, kara bumia lúllô à lo aban loasǝban.
ACT 17:9 Amǝtala nggea-là tsǝk Jasǝn andǝ acili amǝkwaɗi à mbwe boalo mana à kasǝ ace panzǝia ka, nda sǝ à nyingŋǝnia ɓǝa o ka.
ACT 17:10 Lang du pǝndǝna ka, amǝkpata Yesu tasǝ ta Bulǝs andǝ Silas a Biriya. À yì bwalǝna ka, à kutio a ndakpapi mala amǝ Yahudi.
ACT 17:11 Amǝ Biriya ka ɓealǝia ɓoaro kútì mala amǝ Tasalonika, acemǝnana à akcau nǝ rǝɓǝla. À kǝ̀ bǝlki ɓá Malǝmce a koya pwari ka, ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ sǝni ko cau mana Bulǝs bang ngga, nda kǝ mǝsǝcau.
ACT 17:12 Aɓwana pas aɓalǝ amǝ Yahudi akcau mala Ɓakuli; sǝ pas atà aɓwana-mǝgule, amamǝna andǝ aburana mala amǝ Gǝrik gbal ka, à paɓamuria à pǝlǝ amǝkwaɗi.
ACT 17:13 Lang amǝ Yahudi mana a Tasalonika ongŋǝna ama a Bulǝs na ban hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli a Biriya ka, à yiu abanì à yì soakita aɓwana kam pas, à lo loàsǝ̀ban.
ACT 17:14 Amǝkpata Yesu lo tù, à tasǝ ta Bulǝs a kun nggeamùr, sǝ Silas andǝ Timoti ka à ueo a Biriya.
ACT 17:15 Aɓwana mana à waria tsǝkta Bulǝs ka, à wari nǝi a la mana à tunǝki ama Atina ka, sǝ à nyare à yiu a Biriya. Bulǝs banggia wia ɓǝa ne Silas andǝ Timoti ama, ɓǝa lo tù, ɓǝa kya kumi a Atina.
ACT 17:16 Lang Bulǝs na ban kundǝ Silas andǝ Timoti a Atina ka, bumi kiɗiki kǝ̀rkǝ́r arǝ sǝn mǝnia yì nggea-là ka, lùmsǝ nǝ ankúl.
ACT 17:17 Pǝlǝa kútí arǝ andakpapi aban bangcau nǝ amǝ Yahudi andǝ amǝ Gǝrik mana amǝ ɓanggi Ɓakuli na ka. Sǝ koya pwari gbal ka, kǝ bangcau a ban-kpapí mala nggea-là, nǝ aɓwana mǝnana kat à kǝ yiu abanì ka.
ACT 17:18 Aɓea amǝ sǝlǝe mala amǝ Epikiuriya andǝ amǝ Stoyik kutia makgìr arǝ Bulǝs, acemǝnana Bulǝs nea wia Cau Amsǝban amur Yesu andǝ loapi ɓembe ka. Aɓea aɓwana aɓalǝia à ɗiban ama, <<Mana gir nì na mǝ'loàsǝ̀ban mǝnia kǝ earce ama nǝ̀ na le?>> Sǝ aɓea aɓwana ateà na ama, <<Yì ka, sǝm nggǝ sǝni kǝla nda aban hamnǝ cau amur ankúl mala aɓea nzali.>>
ACT 17:19 Pǝlǝa à twal Bulǝs, à yiu nǝi a ɓadǝmbǝ aɓwana-mǝgule, amǝkùrcau mala lě, a ban mana à tunǝki ama, Ariyopagus ka, sǝ à ne wi ama, <<Sǝm nggǝ earce ama sǝm nǝ̀ súrǝ̀ cau mala bǝsa kanigir mana a nakiyi cau amurí ka.
ACT 17:20 Aɓea agir mǝnana sǝm oeo a nacau amúrià ka, sǝm súrǝ̀ia ɗang. Aceì dupa sǝm abǝshe a kir sǝm, sǝ sǝm nggǝ earce ama sǝm nǝ̀ súrǝ̀ ɓalǝia.>>
ACT 17:21 À bang anggo acemǝnana amǝ Atina kat andǝ abǝri mana à nda aɓa mǝnia yì la ka, à kǝ mal pwari malea amur naki acau andǝ oki abǝsa acau.
ACT 17:22 Bulǝs pǝlǝa lo came a ɓadǝmbǝ aɓwana-mǝgule, amǝkùrcau mala là, a Ariyopagus, sǝ bang ama: Ən sǝni ama, wun, amǝ Atina ka, wu nda ka amǝ peri kǝ̀rkǝ́r aɓalǝ agir kat.
ACT 17:23 Lang mǝ ndaban gya aɓa là ma'wun ngga, ǝn sǝn aban-peri ma'wun pas. Ən sǝn ɓè gyangŋan mana à gilǝ cau kam arǝì ama, <<Mǝnia ka Nda Ace Pagulo Aban Ɓakuli Mana Sǝm Súrǝì Raka.>> Ado ka, mǝno yì Ɓakuli wu kpakiyi atè sǝ wu súrǝì raka, nda mǝnana mǝ nǝ na wun cau amurí ka.
ACT 17:24 Ɓakuli mǝnana pusǝ ɓanza andǝ agir mana aɓalǝi kat ka, nda Mǝtala kùli andǝ nzali, sǝ yì ka, dukiyi a ndà-peri mana à ɓè nǝ bu ɓwapǝndǝa ka ɗàng.
ACT 17:25 Sǝ yì ka, alkiyita kǝgìr a bu ɓwapǝndǝa mǝnana à nǝ̀ pe wi aɓa pakki wi túró ka ɗàng, acemǝnana kǝ yì nda ɓwa mǝnana pākiyi yilǝmu, andǝ lin'ueo, andǝ agirbunda kat aban aɓwana ka.
ACT 17:26 Aɓa ɓwa mwashat sǝ pusǝ aɓwapǝndǝa ɗàngɗáng, amana à lùmsǝ ɓanza kat ka. Kǝ yì na ɓara-ɓara kasǝ tite andǝ masǝlǝata anza malea, andǝ abu-ɓanza mana à nǝ̀ do kam ngga.
ACT 17:27 Ɓakuli pa anggo, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ ɓwapǝndǝa alte, nǝ tsǝkɓalǝu ama aɓa harǝkiban aban alte ka à nǝ̀ kumi. Kat andǝ amani ka, Ɓakuli ka nda tù aban koyan atà sǝm ngga.
ACT 17:28 Acemǝnana <<A ɓālǝi sǝ sǝm do nǝ yilǝmu, sǝm nggǝ gya, sǝ sǝm pa.>> Kǝla mana aɓea amǝ'nggyal ma'wun bang ngga ama, <<Sǝm gbal ka, sǝm nda ka muna male>> ka.
ACT 17:29 Sǝ acemǝnana sǝm nda ka muna mala Ɓakuli ka, ɓǝ̀ sǝm ngga sǝni ama Ɓakuli ka nda kǝla ɓǝ̀nzál mana à ɓeì nǝ bolo-njengǝlan ko azǝrfa, ko tali, aɓa nggaman nyoulǝ gir ko sǝlǝpe mala ɓwapǝndǝa ka ɗàng.
ACT 17:30 Adó ɗwanyi súrǝ̀ Ɓakuli mana aɓwana pa aɓalǝia ɗiɗyal ka, Ɓakuli tsǝkir acê ɗàng, sǝ a dyan ngga, kǝ bang ama tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà nzongcau, ɓǝà ɓwana kat a koya ban, ɓǝà nying acauɓikea malea, ɓǝà pwanzali a baní.
ACT 17:31 Acemǝnana yì ka, tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà pwari mana nǝ̀ ɓashì ɓanza nǝi aɓa mǝsǝcau, nǝ bu ɓwa mǝnana tsǝì ka. Lǝmdǝna mǝnia yì ɓwa ka aban aɓwana kat, nǝ loasǝo mana loasǝi a ɓembe nǝ yilǝmu ka.
ACT 17:32 Lang à ok Bulǝs nacau mala loapi ɓembe nǝ yilǝmu ka, aɓea aɓwana aɓalǝia nyesǝ cau mǝnana Bulǝs bang ngga cau oalban na. Acilia ka à na ama, <<Sǝm nggǝ earce ama she a ɓekǝ pwari sǝ wu yi bangga sǝm cau ɗǝm amur mǝnia yì gìr ka.>>
ACT 17:33 Anggo sǝ Bulǝs nying ɓalǝia, bwal njar nǝ̀ o,
ACT 17:34 sǝ aɓea aɓwana ka, à o atà Bulǝs, à paɓamuria aban Mǝtalabangŋo. Aɓalǝ amǝnia yì aɓwana à paɓamuria ka, mwashat ka nda aɓalǝ amǝkùrcau, à kǝ tunǝi ama, Diyonisiyos. Ɓè ɓwama nda kam gbal aɓalǝia, lùllǝì ama, Damaris, andǝ aɓea aɓwana.
ACT 18:1 Anzǝm mǝno ka, Bulǝs nying Atina pǝlǝa wari a Korinti.
ACT 18:2 Abanì sǝ kya kum ɓeɓwa Yahudi à kǝ tunǝi ama Akila, mǝnana à ɓǝli a bu-nzali Pwantus ka. Yì andǝ māmí Pǝrisǝla ka, à pur a nggea-là Roma, a nzali Italiya sǝ à yiu a dyan tù, acemǝnana Kǝlaudiyus, yì murǝm mǝgule mala amǝ Roma, pǝr amǝ Yahudi kat ɓǝa nying Roma. Bulǝs wari a sǝn a Akila andǝ Pǝrisǝla.
ACT 18:3 Sǝ acemǝnana túróbù malea mala pakkia gumli na mwashat ka, Bulǝs do andǝia, à kutia pakki atúró atārǝia.
ACT 18:4 A koya pwari Sabbat, pwari usǝlǝo mala amǝ Yahudi ka, Bulǝs kǝ wari a ndakpapi kǝ nacau nǝ amǝ Yahudi andǝ amǝ Gǝrik ace mǝnana nǝ̀ kùmô nǝ̀ nunnia ɓǝà sǝlǝ ama Yesu ka, nda Mǝ'amsǝban.
ACT 18:5 Lang Silas andǝ Timoti nyìngŋǝ̀nà bu-nzali Masǝdoniya, à yì bwalǝna ka, Bulǝs kara pa ɓamúrì kat ace hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli. Camarǝ banggi amǝ Yahudi ama, Yesu nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban.
ACT 18:6 Amǝ Yahudi ka à ɓinǝna à pà nǝ̀ ak cau mala Bulǝs ɗàng. À camarǝ banggi wi acau mǝɓane. Bulǝs pǝlǝa kǝtǝri tú mana arǝ agir-nggūrǝu male ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝia wia ama yì ka, pusǝkina abui. Sǝ banggia wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ nkila ma'wun, ueo amur wun. Ɓǝ̀ wu kutio a lú-bǝsa ka, wun nǝ̀ ɓua nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun! Mim ngga ǝn pusǝkina abuam. Twal ado aban ká a dǝmba ka, mǝ nǝ o a hamnǝ cau aban aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka.>>
ACT 18:7 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs nying ɓá ndakpapi, sǝ o kya do a ɓala mala ɓè mǝkpata Ɓakuli, à tunǝki ama Titiyus Yustus. Ɓala male ka sau nǝ ndakpapi ɗàng.
ACT 18:8 Kǝrispus, ɓwamǝgule ndakpapi ka, paɓamuri aban Mǝtalabangŋo, yì andǝ amǝɓala male kat. Sǝ aɓwana pas a Korinti, mǝnana à ok cau mala Bulǝs ka, à paɓamuria aban Mǝtalabangŋo, pǝlǝa à pakkia wia batisǝma.
ACT 18:9 A ɓè fara nǝ du ka, Mǝtalabangŋo nacau nǝ Bulǝs aɓa sǝnǝ aɓa Bangŋo ama, <<Ɓangciu ɓǝ̀ kǝa pakko ɗàng, sǝ kǝa na ama a nǝ nying hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli ɗang,
ACT 18:10 acemǝnana mǝ nda tò. Kǝ ɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ pakko kǝgìr ɗàng. Aɓa nggea-là mǝnia ka, mǝ ndanǝ aɓwana kàm pas mǝnana à nǝ̀ paɓamuria abanam ngga.>>
ACT 18:11 Nda Bulǝs lidǝmba nǝ do a Korinti pǝlǝa mwashat nǝ tsùrú, aban kania wia cau mala Ɓakuli ka.
ACT 18:12 Lang à tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà Galiyo, ɓwa Roma a Nggwamna mala bu-nzali Akaya ka, aɓea amǝ Yahudi mana à ndanǝ do a banì ka, à kùr kunarǝia à bwal Bulǝs, à wari nǝi a ɓadǝm Nggwamna ace ɓashi.
ACT 18:13 A na ama, <<Ɓwabura man ngga ndaban ɓariki nǝ̀ pwan bum aɓwana ɓǝà kpata Ɓakuli a njar mana nda ɗàng andǝ gir mǝnana nggurcau ma'sǝm na ka!>>
ACT 18:14 Bulǝs nǝ̀ mǝn kúni nǝ̀ nacau ka, kara Galiyo pǝlǝa arǝ amǝ Yahudi mana à warinǝ cau ka. Nea wia ama, <<Wun amǝ Yahudi, ɓǝà pǝlǝ ama wu yiu nǝ ɓwa mǝnia ka ace ɓekǝ cau mala gìr mǝɓane mǝnana pa, ko nzongcau nda ɓùn ngga, ɓǝ́ ɓoaro mǝ nǝ pak munyi, mǝ nǝ kwaki kiram arǝ wun.
ACT 18:15 Sǝ acemǝnana ce ka nda amur aɗikiaban amur acau, andǝ alullǝu, andǝ anggurcau ma'wun ngga, wu mal nǝ ace nǝ ɓamur rǝ wun. Pa mǝ nǝ do mǝ'ɓashi amur ulang agir kǝla amǝnia ka ɗàng!>>
ACT 18:16 Pǝlǝa tsǝa à pusǝia aɓa ndaɓashi.
ACT 18:17 Sǝ yia kat ka à pǝlǝ amur Sosǝtins, mǝ'yál mur ndakpapi, à bwali, à walki àkǝ̀ kun ndaɓashi. Sǝ ko kǝgìr dǝurǝ Galiyo ɗàng, ko bǝti.
ACT 18:18 Bulǝs do andǝ amǝkpata Yesu mana aɓa Korinti ka arǝ anonggio pas. Pǝlǝa nyia, nǝ̀ o a bu-nzali Suriya. À kpapi gya atārǝia andǝa Pǝrisǝla andǝ Akila. Lang à yì bingŋǝna Sǝnkǝriya, la a kun nggeamùr ka, Bulǝs mwa muri ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ lǝmdǝ ama yì ka, lùmsǝ̀nà nzongcau mala amǝ Yahudi mǝnana twalo a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli nǝ̀ pè ka. Pǝlǝa à kutio a waru-mur aban ká.
ACT 18:19 Lang à yì bwal nggea-là Afisu ka, Bulǝs nying a Pǝrisǝla andǝ Akila aɓa waru. Sǝ kutio wari a ndakpapi aban naki acau andǝ amǝ Yahudi.
ACT 18:20 Aɓea aɓwana aɓalǝia à zǝmbi Bulǝs, ɓǝ̀ pàk anonggio pas, sǝ ɓinǝe.
ACT 18:21 Ndo nǝ̀ o ka, pǝlǝa nea wia ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli earǝna ka, mǝ nǝ nyare mǝ nǝ yiu aban wun.>> Anggo sǝ kutio a waru nying Afisu, aban o.
ACT 18:22 Lang waru yi kpashina a kún mur a Kaisariya ka, Bulǝs sulǝo nǝ̀ kar a Urǝshalima aban makki amǝkwaɗi kûn. Pǝlǝa bwal njar nyare o a Antiyok aɓa bu-nzali Suriya.
ACT 18:23 Anzǝm anonggio bǝti a Antiyok ka, Bulǝs bwal njar, o arǝ aban aɓalǝ abu-nzali mala amǝ Galati andǝ amǝ Firigiya, kǝ ɓak ɓabum amǝkwaɗi kat mana arǝ abanì ka.
ACT 18:24 A bàkú mǝno ka, ɓeɓwa Yahudi mana à tunǝki ama Apolo, mǝnana pur nǝ nggea-là Alizandǝriya ka, yiu a Afisu. Yì ka, ɓwa na ndanǝ sǝlǝ nacau, sǝ súrǝ̀ Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 18:25 Acemǝnana yì ka, kum kanigir kǝ̀rkǝ́r aɓa Njar mala Mǝtalabangŋo ka, nǝ ɓabum pina mǝgule sǝ kǝ hama andǝ kani aɓwana mǝsǝrǝ mǝsǝcau amur Yesu. Sǝ kat andǝ a mani ka, kǝ cau mala pa batisǝma mala Yohana nda súrǝ̀ ce ka.
ACT 18:26 Pǝlǝa Apolo tita nacau nǝ rǝcandǝa a ndakpapi. Lang Pǝrisǝla andǝ Akila ok cau mana kǝ na ka, à tunǝi à o andǝi a ɓala malea, à kya mǝngi wi ɓá njar mala Ɓakuli pepe.
ACT 18:27 Lang Apolo bangŋǝna ama nǝ̀ o a Akaya ka, amǝkpata Ɓakuli ɓak ɓabumi ɓǝ̀ kyane. Pǝlǝa à gilǝ cauterǝa aban ká aban amǝkwaɗi mǝnana a Akaya ka, ace mǝnana ɓǝà ak Apolo pepè ka. Lang bwalǝna Akaya ka, kya duk nggea gbasha mǝgule a banì, mǝnana aɓwana kum ɓwamuru mala Ɓakuli, à pǝlǝ amǝkpate ka.
ACT 18:28 Yì ka, gandǝ amǝ Yahudi mǝnana à lo makgìr nǝi ka nǝ cau, aɓalǝ aɓwana mana à ram kat ka. Kǝ lǝmdǝia wia aɓa Malǝmce mala Ɓakuli ama, Yesu nda Kǝrǝsti Mǝ'amsǝban.
ACT 19:1 Mǝnana Apolo na aɓa Korinti ka, Bulǝs twal bǝri gya arǝ abuban, kya puro a Afisu. Abanì sǝ kum aɓea amǝkpata Yesu,
ACT 19:2 sǝ ɗia ama, <<Mǝnana wu pǝlǝ amǝ kpata Yesu ka, wu angŋǝna Bangŋo Mǝfele le?>> À pe wi eare ama, <<Awo, yàle sǝm malaká ok ama Bangŋo Mǝfele ndakam ɗàng.>>
ACT 19:3 Bulǝs ɗia ama, <<Sǝ ya ulang batisǝma nani à pakka wun?>> À pe wi eare ama, <<Batisǝma mala Yohana.>>
ACT 19:4 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs banggia wia ama, <<Batisǝma mǝnana Yohana pak ka nda ace aɓwana mana à pwanzali, à nying acauɓikea malea ka. Sǝ ne amǝ Isǝrayila ama ɓǝà paɓamuria aban ɓwa mǝnana kǝ yiu a nzǝmi ka, mǝnana à tunǝki ama, Yesu ka.>>
ACT 19:5 Lang à ongŋǝna anggo ka, pǝlǝa à pakkia wia batisǝma aɓa lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu.
ACT 19:6 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs tsǝk buì amúrià, kara Bangŋo Mǝfele sulǝo amúrià, à nacau nǝ akún-takuli, sǝ à hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 19:7 Làkkì mala amǝnia yì aɓwana ka nda lum-nong-ɓari.
ACT 19:8 Anzǝm mǝno ka, Bulǝs twal zongŋo tàrú kǝ wari aɓa ndakpapi, camarǝ ne aɓwana cau nǝ mǝsǝkang-kangŋa. Aɓa nakia cau andǝ aɓwana ka, kǝ ɓariki nǝ̀ nyesǝ ɓabumia arǝ do murǝm mala Ɓakuli amur aɓwana.
ACT 19:9 Sǝ aɓea aɓwana ka à candǝkicau à ɓinǝ paɓamuria, à kǝ naki acau mǝɓane amur Njar kpata Mǝtalabangŋo, a ɓadǝmbǝ aɓwana. Pǝlǝa Bulǝs ɗekia, pwan amǝkpata Yesu à o andǝia, sǝ a koya pwari ka kǝ sǝngi ɓalǝ acau andǝia aɓa ndà-kanigir mala Tiranus.
ACT 19:10 Bulǝs lidǝmba nǝ kanigir a mǝno yì ndà-kanigir ka, kya bwal pǝlǝa ɓari, sǝ ace mǝno ka aɓwana kat mana nǝ do a bu-nzali mala Asiya ka, amǝ Yahudi andǝ amǝ Gǝrik, à ok cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 19:11 Ɓakuli pak agir-ndǝlǝki mǝgule kǝ̀rkǝ́r nǝ bu Bulǝs.
ACT 19:12 Ko nggearǝ ahankici andǝ agir-nggūrǝu mǝnana à je nggūrǝ Bulǝs ka, à twalia à wari nǝia aban amǝ rǝkwana, sǝ akwánó malea kara à mala, sǝ akukwar purrì rǝia.
ACT 19:13 Aɓea amǝ Yahudi nda kam mǝnana à kǝ gya arǝ aban, aban pusǝkia kukwar arǝ aɓwana ka. À ɓariki gbal ama à nǝ̀ pak túró nǝ lullǝ Yesu à nǝ̀ pusǝ akukwar pale, nǝ nea wia cau ama, <<Ən nggǝ sa arǝ wun aɓa lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu mǝnana Bulǝs kǝ hamnǝi ka, wu puro.>>
ACT 19:14 Amuna-burana tongno-nong-ɓari mala Sǝkeva, Pǝris Mǝgule mala amǝ Yahudi, à nda à pakki mǝnia yì gìr ka.
ACT 19:15 Sǝ a ɓe fara à nda aban pa anggo, pǝlǝa kukwar nea wia ama, <<Ən súrǝ̀ Yesu, sǝ ǝn sǝlǝna ce Bulǝs; sǝ wun ngga, wu nda ka yana?>>
ACT 19:16 Sǝ ɓwa mǝnana nǝ kukwar arǝì ka, yàlle kpa kwària, walkia nǝ walo ana, nǝ rǝcandǝa mana kútì malea ka. Kara à túr kusǝia a mire à nying ɓala male, nǝ anpenye a rǝia, nǝ ɓārǝia.
ACT 19:17 Aɓwana mǝnana kat à ndanǝ do a Afisu ka, amǝ Yahudi andǝ amǝ Gǝrik, à ok ce mǝnia yì gìr ka, kara ɓangciu bwalia kat, sǝ lullǝ Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu kum gulo kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 19:18 Pas aɓalǝ aɓwana mana à paɓamuria, à pǝlǝ amǝkpata Yesu ka, à yiu à yì bang ce pakkia gir ɓealɓikea malea kwas.
ACT 19:19 Aɓwana pas mǝnana ɗiɗyal ka à kǝ pakki agir swarkiban nǝ aɓuri ka, à yiu nǝ amalǝmce mala agir monzǝo malea, à yì pisǝia a bǝsa a ɓadǝmbǝ aɓwana kat. Lang aɓwana yi kpapiki aboalo agir mǝno à pisǝia kat ka, boale karǝa arǝ mǝsǝ bolo-azǝrfa á-lumi-tongno.
ACT 19:20 Anggo nǝ rǝcandǝa sǝ cau mala Mǝtalabangŋo gulo, akiban kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 19:21 Anzǝm amǝno yì agir ka, Bulǝs kum ɗenyicau a ɓabumi ama ɓǝ̀ kar aɓalǝ abu-nzali Masǝdoniya andǝ Akaya sǝ ɓǝ̀ kutio ɓǝ̀ kyane a Urǝshalima. Na ama, <<Anzǝm mana ɓǝ̀ ǝn warina a Urǝshalima ka, dumǝnam púp mǝ nǝ kutio, mǝ ká gbal a Roma.>>
ACT 19:22 Nda gìr mana tsǝa sǝ tasǝ Timoti andǝ Arasǝtus a Masǝdoniya, yia ɓari aɓalǝ aɓwana mana à kǝ bwalì wi túró ka. Sǝ yì ka, do a bu-nzali Asiya banì ɓinǝe sau zuku.
ACT 19:23 Àkǝ̀ ɓalǝ anonggio mǝno ka, nggea loàsǝ̀ban lo kǝ̀rkǝ́r aɓa Afisu amur cau mala kpata Njar mala Mǝtalabangŋo.
ACT 19:24 Mǝnia yì loàsǝ̀ban ngga tite nǝ ɓe mǝ'ntùl mana lùllǝì ama Demitǝrǝyus, mǝ tulki amuna kurǝm mana à nda kǝla ndà-peri mala mā-ɓǝ̀nzál Atimis, nǝ bolo-ntùl azǝrfa ka. Mǝnia yì nggali ka kǝ yinǝia amǝturoe boalo kǝ̀rkǝ́r.
ACT 19:25 Pǝlǝa Demitǝrǝyus tunǝ dapi mala aɓwana mǝnana kat à nda aɓa ulang mǝno yì túróbù malea ka, sǝ nea wia ama: Wun aburana, wu sǝlǝ ama kume ma'sǝm ngga àkǝ̀ ban mǝnia yì túró sǝ sǝm nggǝ kumi.
ACT 19:26 A dyan ngga, wu nda wu kǝ sǝni sǝ wu kǝ oe nǝ akir wun, gìr mǝnana mǝnia yì ɓwa à tunǝki ama Bulǝs kǝ pè ka. Nda ban na ama agir mǝnana aɓwapǝndǝa pê nǝ buia sǝ à kǝ peri abania ka, agir na à nǝ̀ peri abania ɗàng ko bǝti, sǝ nda kǝ̀ pwan ɓabum ɓwapǝndǝa ka. Tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nia à ɓwarkini tanjar akani aɓa Afisu andǝ bu-nzali Asiya kat.
ACT 19:27 Ɓangciu ma'sǝm ngga nda mǝnana ama, limo ma'sǝm ndo nǝ̀ kum lullǝu mǝɓane. Sǝ nggearǝ mǝno na nǝmurǝì ɗàng, ndà-peri mala mā-ɓǝ̀nzál mǝgulo mǝnana à kǝ peri a baní, yì Atimis gbal ka, nǝ̀ duk gir mǝɓane; sǝ Atimis, yì mā-ɓǝ̀nzál mǝnana koyan a Asiya andǝ ɓanza kat kǝ peri a baní ka, gulo male nǝ̀ kpa!
ACT 19:28 Lang à ongŋǝna cau man ngga, kara bumia lul kǝ̀rkǝ́r, à loasǝ già a kùli à kǝ na ama, <<Atimis mala amǝ Afisu ka, mǝgulo na!>>
ACT 19:29 Zuku ka, loàsǝ̀ban mǝno akinaban, ɓá nggea-là kat lo cam nǝ kusǝì. Ɓwabunda nyāri, à pur nǝ mire aban ká a ban-kpapí mala nggea-là. À bwal aburana ɓari, Gayus andǝ Aristakus, aɓi amǝ gya mala Bulǝs, mǝnana à pur a Masǝdoniya sǝ à yiu ka. À nungia à um nǝia a ban-kpapí.
ACT 19:30 Bulǝs nǝ ɓamúrì ka earce ama nǝ̀ ká a ɓadǝmbǝ aɓwabundǝa aban dapi nǝ̀ bangcau nǝia, sǝ amǝkpata Ɓakuli pǝrki.
ACT 19:31 Nggearǝ aɓwana-mǝgule mala là, mana à gyajam mala Bulǝs na ka, à teri wi cau ama, ɓǝ̀ kǝa na ama nǝ̀ kutio aɓa ban-kpapí ɗàng.
ACT 19:32 Ɓwabunda mana ram ngga, à twalo à zurǝki nǝ loàsǝ̀ban: aɓea aɓwana ka à kǝ nacau bàng-bàng amur ɓe gìr, sǝ aɓea aɓwana gbal ka à kǝ na malea ɗàng. Yàle bangulea ka à súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana tsǝa sǝ à yiu à yì ram ngga ɗàng.
ACT 19:33 Aɓea amǝ Yahudi ramta Alizanda a dǝmba a ɓadǝm ɓwabundǝa ɓǝ̀ bǝlia wia ɓá ceì. Pǝlǝa Alizanda lǝmdǝì ɓwabundǝa bu ɓǝà duk kunia più, sǝ ɓariki nǝ̀ na kúni, amur tǝr gir mana kumban ngga.
ACT 19:34 Lang amǝ Gǝrik mǝnana aɓa ɓwabundǝa yi sǝlǝ ama yì ka, ɓwa Yahudi na ka, kara à loasǝ già kpǝm kunia mwashat aban nacau mǝ'mwashati ama: <<Atimis mala amǝ Afisu ka, mǝgulo na!>> Twalia bu-pwari ɓari à ndarǝ na mǝnia yì cau ka.
ACT 19:35 A masǝlǝate ka, mǝgilǝgir mala nggea-là ɓariki tsǝk ɓwabundǝa à do kunia più. Pǝlǝa na ama: Wun amǝ'la-sǝm amǝ Afisu, ɓanza kat ka sǝlǝ mbak ama nggea-là mǝgule Afisu ka nda mǝ'yál ndà-peri mala Atimis mǝgule andǝ tali rǝì mǝnana pur nǝ kuli sǝ yi kpa a nzali ka re?
ACT 19:36 Kǝɓwa pà kàm nǝ̀ tǝmce amǝnia yì agir ka ɗàng. Ace mani ka, wu nyesǝ ɓabum wun, wu kǝa pak kǝgìr amur mire ɗàng.
ACT 19:37 Wu yina nǝ amǝnia yì aburana ɓari ka akani, kat andǝ amani ama, à ɓun kun ndà-peri ma'sǝm, à iu kǝgìr kàm ɗàng, ko à na mǝɓane amur mā-ɓǝ̀nzál ma'sǝm raka.
ACT 19:38 Ɓǝ̀ Demitǝrǝyus andǝ amǝtúró male ndanǝ cau mana à nǝ̀ na amur kǝɓwa ka, sǝm ndanǝ amǝ'ɓashi andǝ apwari do ɓashi; ɓǝà ndanǝ ɓe kǝgìr mana kwania arǝ kǝɓwa ka, à nǝ̀ gandǝ yinǝ cê.
ACT 19:39 Sǝ ɓǝ̀ ɓè kǝgìr nda kam ɗàng mǝnana wu earce wun nǝ̀ yinǝi ka, dumǝna púp à nǝ̀ na cê a ban amǝ ɓashi, a ban-kpapi mala amúrû kat.
ACT 19:40 Kǝla mǝnana nda kam ado ka, mǝnia yì gìr mǝnana kumban yalung ngga, tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà sǝm aɓa ɓangciu ama, amǝtala nzali nǝ̀ gandǝ tsǝka sǝm cau mala loasǝ munǝo mala ɓwabundǝa. Acemǝnana sǝm pànǝ kún nacau sǝm nǝ̀ na tǝr gìr mana yinǝ mǝnia yì came mala là andǝ zurǝki ka ɗàng.
ACT 19:41 Lang mǝgilǝgir mala nggea-là malǝna nacau man ngga, pǝlǝa mesǝ aɓwana mana à ram ngga à o.
ACT 20:1 Anzǝm mana loasǝkiaban malǝna ka, Bulǝs tunǝ amǝkwaɗi à yì rambǝa abanarǝia, pǝlǝa ɓak ɓabumia nǝ cau mala Ɓakuli, pea wia rǝcandǝa sǝ cia a ndà. Pǝlǝa nying banì kutio o a bu-nzali Masǝdoniya.
ACT 20:2 Lang gingna arǝ abumban aɓa mǝno yì bu-nzali aban ɓak ɓabum amǝkwaɗi nǝ cau mala Ɓakuli ka, pǝlǝa kutio wari a Gǝris mǝnana gbal à tunǝki ama bu-nzali Akaya ka.
ACT 20:3 Abanì sǝ kya do pak azongŋo tàrú. Lang Bulǝs mala nǝ̀ twal gya a waru nǝ̀ o a Suriya ka, yi ok ama aɓea amǝ Yahudi kùrna kunia amurí à nǝ̀ wal-luí a njar. Nda gìr mǝnana tsǝa sǝ nyar a kusǝì twal nza, pǝlǝ nǝ njar ɓá bu-nzali Masǝdoniya ka.
ACT 20:4 Aɓea burana mǝnana à pur gya atè ka à nda ka Sopata, muna mala Pirus ɓwa Biriya, andǝ Aristakus andǝ Sekundus amǝnana à pur nǝ nggea-là Tasalonika ka; sǝ Gayus ɓwa Dabe, andǝ Tikikus andǝ Tǝrofimus, amana à pur a bu-nzali mala Asiya ka, andǝ Timoti.
ACT 20:5 Yia mǝnia tongno-nong-ɓari ka, à akà sǝm dǝmba, mim Luka sǝnǝ Bulǝs, à o a waru-mur à kya kundǝ sǝm a Tǝros.
ACT 20:6 Sǝ sǝm twal gya nǝ kwar-nza sǝm o a nggea-là Filipi. Akanó anzǝm Lamsan mala Bǝredi mana Yist pa arǝì raka, sǝm nggea kutio a waru-mur aban o a nggea-là Tǝros. Anzǝm anongŋo tongno ka sǝm nggea kumia a Tǝros. Abanì sǝ sǝm pak limo mwashat.
ACT 20:7 Nǝ pwari kpǝra a pwari Ladi ka, sǝm yì rambǝa a tarǝ sǝm aban li girlina. Bulǝs tita hàmî aɓwana cau, sǝ acemǝnana ɓǝ̀ ban kwarǝna ka nǝ̀ bwal njar nǝ̀ o ka, camarǝ nacau kya bwal ɓadu.
ACT 20:8 Apitǝla ndakam pas à kǝ pa tǎlaban a ban mǝnana sǝm kpapiyi kam a ndà-kulí ka.
ACT 20:9 Mǝ lagga mǝnana lùllǝì ama Yutikus ka, nda ban do a fongǝran mala ndà-kulí. Sǝ lang Bulǝs camarǝ nacau bà ka, Yutikus ka ntulo kǝ aiki, yi kongŋǝna a ntulo kǝ̀rkǝ́r, nda kara pur kano a fongǝran, a bu tàruià ndà-kulí mǝno ɓong-ɓong, yi kpa a nzali. À nǝ̀ yiu à nǝ̀ yia twali ka, lú na.
ACT 20:10 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs sulǝ a nzali, kya kū`ndǝó amur mǝ lagga, sǝ kùrrì arǝì nǝ abui, na ama, <<Ce ɓalǝ wun zuriki ɗàng, ndanǝ yilǝmu!>>
ACT 20:11 Pǝlǝa Bulǝs andǝ acili aɓwana nyare à o a ndà-kulí ɗǝm. Anzǝm mǝnana à lina girlina atārǝia ka, Bulǝs lidǝmba nǝ nea wia cau bà kwaro mala ban. Pǝlǝa bwal njar kutio o.
ACT 20:12 Sǝ à twal mǝ lagga à um nǝi a ɓala nǝ banɓoarnado kǝ̀rkǝ́r, acemǝnana yilǝmi nyarǝna arǝì ka.
ACT 20:13 Pǝlǝa sǝm o amúrià sǝm kya eauwe a waru sǝm samsǝa aban ká a Asos, aban mǝnana sǝm nggea twal Bulǝs a waru kam ngga. Yì Bulǝs ka eau atà sǝm a waru a Tǝros ɗàng acemǝnana earce nǝ̀ kàr nǝ nza aban ká Asos.
ACT 20:14 Lang yiu yi kum sǝm a Asos ka, sǝm twali a waru sǝm kutio aban o a Mitǝlin.
ACT 20:15 Sǝm nying ban mǝno sǝm samsǝa aban o. Ba ɓe ban fana ka, sǝm yì bwal ban luran Kiyos. Ɓè ban fana ɗǝm ngga, sǝm samsǝa sǝm yì pur a luran Samos. Sǝm nying Samos ka, twal sǝm pwari mwashat sǝ sǝm yì bik là Miletus.
ACT 20:16 Amur njar aban ká Miletus ka, waru samsǝa yi kútí nǝ ban nggea-là Afisu. Bulǝs ka angŋǝna dǝmba twalǝna a ɓabumi ama pà nǝ̀ came a Afisu ɗang, ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ kǝa kiɗiki pwari kǝ̀rkǝ́r aɓa bu-nzali Asiya raka. Yì ka, nda mur larri nǝ̀ nggá bwal Urǝshalima, ɓǝ̀ nǝ̀ gandǝ pa ka ɓǝ̀ yi kum pwari Pakkiɗire Pentikos.
ACT 20:17 A Miletus sǝ Bulǝs túrban atà aɓwana-mǝgule mala ikǝlisiya mana a Afisu ɓǝa yiu ɓǝa yi kumi a Miletus.
ACT 20:18 Lang à yina ka, pǝlǝa nea wi ama: Wun ngga wu sùrǝ́nà ulang do mem andǝ túró mǝnana ǝn pa aɓalǝ apwari mǝno kat mǝ nda aban wun ngga, tite àkǝ̀ pwari mǝnana ǝn yiu nǝi a bu-nzali Asiya ka.
ACT 20:19 Nǝ nyesǝɓamuru andǝ mǝrǝm a mǝsǝam sǝ ǝn pakki Mǝtalabangŋo túró, acemǝnana mǝ nda mǝguro male. Ən do nǝ gandǝrǝu aɓa nutanni mala agir mǝnana à yipàm nǝ kurkunarǝu mala amǝ Yahudi mǝnana amǝkwaɗi na raka.
ACT 20:20 Wun ngga wu sǝlǝna ama aɓa hamnǝ cau mala Ɓakuli bwāng, mǝnana ǝn pe aɓalǝ aɓwana, andǝ kanigir arǝ aɓala ma'wun ngga, ǝn nying kǝgìr mǝnana ɓoaro ɓǝ̀ ǝn bangga wun, mǝnana nǝ̀ bwala wun kàm ngga ɗàng.
ACT 20:21 Ən banggi amǝ Yahudi andǝ aɓwana mana amǝ Yahudi na raka, nǝ nunkiru nǝma, dumǝna púp ɓǝà nyare aban Ɓakuli. Ɓǝà pǝlǝ nzǝmia arǝ acauɓikea malea, ɓǝà pwanzali, sǝ ɓǝà paɓamuria aban Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu.
ACT 20:22 Sǝ ado ka, mǝ ndo mǝ nǝ ká a Urǝshalima acemǝnana Bangŋo Mǝfele lǝ́mdǝ́nàm a banfana ama dumǝna púp ɓǝ̀n kyane. Ən súrǝ̀ gir mǝnana nǝ̀ nggá kumam akanó ka ɗàng.
ACT 20:23 Kǝ gìr mǝnana ǝn sǝlǝ ka nda mǝnana ama, a koya nggea-là ǝn kútí kam ngga, Bangŋo Mǝfele kǝ nunkiram ama oasǝban a ndàkurban andǝ tanni nda à kǝ kundǝam ngga.
ACT 20:24 Sǝ kǝgìr pà kàm atà agir mǝnia ka ɗǝurǝam ɗàng, yàle ǝn twal yilǝmem a kun ɓe kǝgìr ɗàng. Mim ngga, gìr mǝnana ǝn tsǝk muram arǝì ka nda mǝnana ama ɓǝ̀ ǝn mal túró mǝnana Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu pam ɓǝ̀ ǝn pe ka, yì túró hamnǝ Bǝsa Cau Amsǝban mala ɓwamuru mala Ɓakuli.
ACT 20:25 Ən sǝlǝna ama wun mǝnana ǝn camarǝ gya aɓalǝ wun, aban hamnǝ cau mala Domurǝm mala Ɓakuli ka, kǝɓwa pà kàm aɓalǝ wun nǝ sǝnam ɗǝm ɗàng.
ACT 20:26 Ace mani ka, mǝ nda ban na wun yalung ama, kǝ nkila mala kǝɓwa aɓalǝ wun pa a muram ɗàng.
ACT 20:27 Acemǝnana kane mǝnana kat Ɓakuli ndanǝi a ɓabumi, sǝ kǝ earce ama ɓǝ̀ wu súrǝì ka, ǝn nyar nǝ tam arǝ hamnǝ ce aban wun ɗàng.
ACT 20:28 Wu yál ɓamur rǝ wun andǝ aɓwana mala Ɓakuli mǝnana Bangŋo Mǝfele pa wun a bu wun ɓǝ̀ wu ɗenyi nǝia ka. Wu do kǝla ayálgír amur domwan mala Ɓakuli, yì ikǝlisiya male, amǝkpate mǝnana kúria nǝ nkila mala Muni, mǝnana sukki amur nggun-gangndǝi ace amsǝia ka.
ACT 20:29 Ən sǝlǝna ama anzǝm mǝnana ǝn nyìngŋǝ̀nà ban wun ngga, amǝkànìgìr nyir, kǝla anvwa bondo mǝɓealɓike, à nǝ̀ yiu aɓalǝ wun, ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ kiɗiki domwan mala Ɓakuli, amǝkwaɗi ka.
ACT 20:30 Sǝ a nggearǝ ɓalǝ wun ngga, aɓea aɓwana nǝ̀ lo à nǝ̀ ɓosǝki kusǝ mǝsǝcau. À nǝ̀ kutia kanigir-nyir ace mǝnana à nǝ̀ kum aɓea aɓwana mǝnana à nǝ̀ swárkia ɓǝà pǝlǝ amǝkpata teà ka.
ACT 20:31 Ace mani ka, wu tsǝkir wun pepè! Wu ɗenyi ama, nǝ amǝrǝm a mǝsǝam, du andǝ pwari, mǝ nda aban kani koyan atà wun ngga cau mala Ɓakuli kat bà apǝlǝa tàrú.
ACT 20:32 Ado ka, ǝn nggǝ nying wun a ɓabù Ɓakuli ɓǝ̀ bwal wun sǝ ɓǝ̀ tamsǝ wun aɓa paɓamuru arǝ cau mala ɓwamuru male, mǝnana nǝ̀ gandǝ ɓak wun, nǝ̀ pa wun atsǝkbu mǝnana Ɓakuli ndanǝi ace aɓwana mana twalnia à dumǝna amale na ka.
ACT 20:33 Ən sham ma kǝ boalo mala ɓwa ko agir-nggūrǝu male ɗàng.
ACT 20:34 Sǝ wun, nǝ́ ɓamur rǝ wun ngga, wu sǝlǝna ama, nǝ́ abuam mǝnia ka, sǝ ǝn nggǝ kum girlina mǝnana mǝ nǝ li sǝnǝ aɓwana mana sǝm nda sǝnǝia ka.
ACT 20:35 Aɓa koya gìr ǝn nggǝ pak ka, mǝ nda ban lǝmdǝa wun ama, aɓa pak túró mǝnana nkundǝr pa arǝì raka sǝ sǝm nǝ̀ bwalì aɓwana mana à pànǝi raka. Ɓǝ̀ sǝm ɗenyi nǝ acau mala Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu, mǝnana na nǝ ɓamúrì ama, <<Tsǝkbu mala Ɓakuli mana amur amǝ pa ɓoro ka nda kpǝm kútì do kúndǝô ɓǝà po.>>
ACT 20:36 Lang Bulǝs malǝna nacau ka, pǝlǝa kū`ndǝó amur ankūnǝi andǝia kat, sǝ à pak hiwi.
ACT 20:37 Yia kat à kutia ɓua nǝ mǝrǝm, à mǝn abuia à kǝ kùrki Bulǝs a rǝia, sǝ à kǝ jeki nki nǝ kunia aban tsǝe a ndà.
ACT 20:38 Gìr mǝnana pea wia ɓabumkiɗikea kǝ̀rkǝ́r ka nda cau mǝnana Bulǝs banggia wia ama, à pà nǝ̀ sǝni ɗǝm raka. Anggo sǝ à kya tsǝkte a kun-waru mur.
ACT 21:1 Anzǝm mana sǝm tsǝ̀ngŋǝ̀nà aɓwana-mǝgule mala amǝ Afisu à ndà ka, sǝm twal waru sǝm sarǝa aban ká a luran Kos. Ban fana ka, sǝm lo kano sǝm yì bwal luran Rodis, pǝlǝa sǝm yì kutio, sǝm wari a ɓe la a tunǝi ama Patara.
ACT 21:2 Abanì sǝ sǝm yì kum ɓè waru, mǝnana nǝ̀ ká a bareban Fonishiya, nda sǝm eau kam aban o ka.
ACT 21:3 Sǝm nda aban samsǝa aɓa nggeamùr aban o ka, mǝsǝ sǝm yi kpa arǝ luran mala Sayipǝrus kuko, sǝm yi túrí nǝ bu sǝm mǝ'nggare, sǝm lidǝmba aban o. Sǝm yì kpashi a kúnmur mala nggea-là Taya, aɓa bu-nzali Suriya. Abanì sǝ amǝtúró ɓa-waru sulǝ twalo.
ACT 21:4 Sǝm kya alta amǝkwaɗi mǝnana abanì ka sǝm do ateà limo mwashat. Bangŋo mala Ɓakuli lǝmdǝì amǝkwaɗi mǝno ka ama ɓǝa ne Bulǝs ɓǝ̀ kǝa na ama nǝ̀ ká Urǝshalima ɗang.
ACT 21:5 Sǝama lang pwari o ma'sǝm yi kārǝ́na ka, sǝm lo sǝm bwal njar aban o. Amǝkwaɗi mǝno kat, aburana andǝ amamǝna andǝ amuna malea, à puro à tsǝkta sǝm a kunmur. Akanó sǝ sǝm kat, sǝm kū`ndǝó sǝm pak hiwi.
ACT 21:6 Pǝlǝa sǝm tsǝk rǝ sǝm à ndà. Bulǝs andǝ aɓi sǝm amǝgya ka, sǝm kutio a waru; sǝ yia ka à nyare a là.
ACT 21:7 Sǝm loapi Taya ka, sǝm yì came a nggea-là Tolemayas. Sǝm makki amǝ'eamrǝarǝu kun, sǝ sǝm nong-mwashat abanì.
ACT 21:8 Ban fana ka, sǝm lidǝmba aban o a nggea-là Kaisariya. Akanó ka, sǝm yì sulǝo a ɓala mala Filip mǝ hamnǝ Cau Amsǝban. Yì ka, nda mwashat aɓalǝ aburana tongno-nong-ɓari, mǝnana amǝkwaɗi twalia a Urǝshalima ace bwal ban túró gau girlina ka.
ACT 21:9 Yì ka, ndanǝ ansarina ine mǝnana ko yana ateà ka ndanǝ ɓoro mala ɓangnǝa; à kǝ bang cau mala Ɓakuli mǝnana Bangŋo Mǝfele lǝmdǝia wia ka.
ACT 21:10 Anzǝm mǝnana sǝm pakkina anonggio pas akanó a ɓala mala Filip ka, ɓè mǝɓangnǝa mala Ɓakuli mǝnana à tunǝki ama Agabus ka, puro a bu-nzali Yahudi yi kum sǝm.
ACT 21:11 Yiu sǝ yi twal nggur-ɓunu mala Bulǝs, pǝlǝa kùr akusǝ ɓamúrì andǝ abui nǝi. Pǝlǝa bang ama, <<Bangŋo Mǝfele nda aban na ama, <Anggo sǝ amǝ Yahudi nǝ̀ nggá kùr mǝtala nggur-ɓunu mǝnia ka a Urǝshalima, sǝ à nǝ̀ twali à nǝ̀ pea aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi nda raka.> >>
ACT 21:12 Lang sǝm ok mǝnia yì cau anggo ka, sǝm mǝnana kat a banì ka, sǝm zǝmbi Bulǝs ama ɓǝ̀ kǝa na ama nǝ̀ ká a Urǝshalima ɗàng.
ACT 21:13 Sǝ yì ka, bang ama, <<Mana wu pakkiyi anggo, wu tsǝk mǝrǝm a mǝsǝ wun, wun nǝ̀ ɓungi ɓabumam? Yàle kùrban nda ǝn nakiyi ce ka ɗàng, ko nggearǝ lú ka ǝn earǝna mǝ nǝ nggá wu, acau mala Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu.>>
ACT 21:14 Lang sǝm yì sǝnǝni ama pa sǝm nǝ̀ gandǝ tamsǝe raka, nda sǝm ɗeki, sǝm na ama, <<Ɓǝ̀ kànì mala Mǝtalabangŋo ɓǝ̀ lùmsǝo.>>
ACT 21:15 Anzǝm aɓea anonggio ka, sǝm pwan atwalo ma'sǝm aban o a Urǝshalima.
ACT 21:16 Aɓea amǝkwaɗi mǝnana à pur a Kaisariya ka, à o atà sǝm gbal. À yì tsǝkta sǝm a ban mǝnana sǝm nǝ̀ duk kam ngga, a ɓala mala Manason, ɓwa Sayipǝrus. Yì ka, mwashat na aɓalǝ amǝkwaɗi amǝdǝmbe.
ACT 21:17 Lang sǝm yì bwalǝna Urǝshalima ka, amǝ'eamrǝarǝu ak sǝm nǝ bumpwasǝa.
ACT 21:18 Ban fana ka, sǝm sǝnǝa Bulǝs sǝm wari a ban Jemis, ace nacau nǝi. Aɓwana-mǝgule mala ikǝlisiya kat ka, à nda a banì.
ACT 21:19 Anzǝm makkun ngga, Bulǝs bǝl ɓalǝ agir mwashat-mwashat, mǝnana Ɓakuli pea nǝ bu túró mishan male aɓalǝ aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi nda raka.
ACT 21:20 À nǝ̀ ok mǝnia yì cau ka, à ɓwangsǝki Ɓakuli. Pǝlǝa à ne Bulǝs ama: Mǝ'eam sǝm Bulǝs, a sǝlǝna ama amǝ Yahudi mǝnana à pànà ɓamuria à angŋǝna Yesu ka, làkkì malea nda á-pas. Sǝ aɓa làkkì malea mǝno kat ka, à ndanǝ bumpina arǝ kpata Nggurcau mala Musa.
ACT 21:21 Aɓea ɓwana yiu à yì banggi amǝ Yahudi amǝkwaɗi mǝnana akani a Urǝshalima ka cau amuro. À bang ama, we ka a kǝ kania amǝ Yahudi mǝnana kat a do a nzali mala aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka, ɓǝa ɗeki kpata Nggurcau mala Musa. À na ama, weama ɓǝà kǝa kasǝ ɓata amunia ɗàng, sǝ ɓǝà kǝa kpata kúncau mala amǝ Yahudi ɗàng.
ACT 21:22 Mǝnana ado à nǝ̀ yia ok ama a yina ka, mana sǝm nǝ̀ pa?
ACT 21:23 Gìr mǝnana ado sǝm nggǝ earce ama wu pak ka, ndya ani ka. Sǝm ndanǝ aɓwana ine kani mǝnana à panacau a ɓadǝm Ɓakuli ka.
ACT 21:24 O ateà aɓa Ndàmǝgule, wu kpapi wunǝia aban pakki agir mala lak rǝǔ, agir mǝnana à kána à nǝ̀ pea ace mǝnana ɓǝ̀ Ɓakuli ea ka. Ɓǝ̀ pwari ɗārǝâ mǝnana à nǝ̀ pe ace swárià wia murià yina ka, mbwekia wia boalo agir ɗārǝâ mǝnana à nǝ̀ kasǝa a banì ka. Anggo sǝ koyan ngga nǝ̀ sǝlǝ ama cau mǝnana yia à ok a muro ka, nyir na. À nǝ̀ sǝlǝa ama nggearǝ we ka a kǝ kpata Nggurcau mala Musa.
ACT 21:25 Ma mala aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka, sǝ à pǝlǝa amǝkpata Yesu ka, sǝm tasǝnia wia cauterǝa aban banggia wia gìr mǝnana sǝm eare amurí ka. Sǝm bangŋǝna ama ɓǝà kǝa li girlina mǝnana à ɗārǝ́na alú nǝi ka ɗàng, ɓǝà kǝa li nkila ɗàng. Ɓǝà kǝa li nyam girkusǝu mǝnana à wali nǝ pūrǝki meali ka ɗàng. Ɗǝm ngga ɓǝ̀ ɓwa ɓǝ̀ kǝa nong nǝ ɓwa mǝnana à malaká al rǝia andǝi raka ɗàng.
ACT 21:26 Anggo sǝ Bulǝs, ban fana ka, twal aburana mǝno ine ka atè, sǝ yia atārǝia à lak rǝia. Anzǝm mǝno ka, Bulǝs kutio aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli sǝ banggi apǝris mala ɓá Nda anonggio shen mǝnana nǝ̀ twalia a cau mala gilǝki rǝia ka. Banggia wia pwari mana gbal à nǝ̀ yia pa ɓoro mala agirkusǝu mǝnana apǝris nǝ̀ ɗārǝ́na Ɓakuli nǝia, ace koya ɓwa nani ateà ka.
ACT 21:27 Anonggeo tongno nong-ɓari mala mǝno yì gilǝki rǝia ka à malanǝ̀ malâ, sǝ aɓea amǝ Yahudi mǝnana à pur a bu-nzali Asiya ka, à sǝn Bulǝs aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli. Pǝlǝa à swarkita ɓwabundǝa kat, kara à bwal Bulǝs.
ACT 21:28 À mak gāwàn bàng-bàng aban na ama, <<Wun amǝ Isǝrayila! Wu bwala sǝm! Mǝnia yì ɓwa ka nda mǝnana kǝ kania aɓwana arǝ aban kat ɓǝà ɓǝsǝki amǝ Isǝrayila ka. Kǝ kania wia ɓǝà kǝa kpata Nggurcau mala Musa ɗǝm ɗàng, sǝ ɓǝà kǝa pa gulo arǝ Ndàmǝgule mǝnia ka ɗǝm ɗàng. Ndya yina nǝ aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, yi pǝndǝkina ce ban mǝfele mǝnia ka!>>
ACT 21:29 (Yia ka à bang anggo, acemǝnana à sǝn Tǝrofimus ɓwa Afisu atārǝia andǝ Bulǝs aɓa nggea-là, nda sǝ à twali ama Bulǝs warina nǝi aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka.)
ACT 21:30 Ban zunggǝli aɓa nggea-là kat, sǝ ɓwapǝndǝa purkio nǝ mire, à yì ramba. À yì gbami Bulǝs, à nungi à pusǝì a nza nǝ Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli, pǝlǝa à girki akun-nda a kaurǝa.
ACT 21:31 Amǝnia yì aɓwana ka, à nda ban ɓariki à nǝ̀ wal-lú Bulǝs, sǝama cau yi bwal ban mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje mala amǝ Roma. À banggi wi ama, Urǝshalima kat ka gǝggǝlina.
ACT 21:32 Kara mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje lo tù, pwan asoje andǝ aɓea aɓwana-mǝgule malea, à ɓangŋa à yiu aban ɓwabundǝa. Lang aɓwana mǝnia sǝn mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje andǝ asoje mǝnana atè ka, kara à came, à nying buia arǝ walki Bulǝs.
ACT 21:33 Mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje yi bwal Bulǝs, bang ama ɓǝà ta abui nǝ ansolo ɓari. Pǝlǝa ɗiban ama, <<Yana nda man, sǝ mana ɗe pa?>>
ACT 21:34 Aɓea ɓwana aɓalǝ aɓwabundǝa loasǝ già aban na man, sǝ aɓea aɓwana kǝ na malea gbal ɗàng. Sǝ acemǝnana mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje bwalta kǝgìr mwashat mǝnana Bulǝs pak raka, pǝlǝa na ama ɓǝà um nǝ Bulǝs a ban-mǝcandǝe mala asoje.
ACT 21:35 À yì bwalǝna ban-eauwe mǝnana à nǝ̀ eau nǝi aban ká aɓa ban-mǝcandǝe ka, ɓwabundǝa twalo zunggǝli kǝ̀rkǝ́r. À san rǝia aban ká arǝ Bulǝs à nǝ̀ wali, gandǝa asoje imsǝi a kwàrú ace amsǝe a bù ɓwabundǝa mana nyāri arǝì ama à nǝ̀ wal-luí ka.
ACT 21:36 Ɓwabunda mǝno kpatea nǝ zwalo, à kǝ na ama, <<Ɓǝà wali ɓǝ̀ wu!>>
ACT 21:37 Lang asoje malanǝ̀ kútí nǝ Bulǝs aɓa ndà a ban-mǝcandǝe malea ka, pǝlǝa ne mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje ama, <<Mǝ nǝ gandǝ kum njar mǝ nacau nǝ we le?>> Sǝ mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje ɗì, nǝ ndali ama, <<A kǝ ok kún Gǝrik le?
ACT 21:38 A nda ɓwa Masar mǝnana mbo lo aɓalǝ apwari mǝno nǝ mgbicau arǝ nggwamnati, pwan amǝ walki-alú á-ine atè nǝ agirbura, um nǝia a njenza ka re?>>
ACT 21:39 Bulǝs na ama, <<Awo, Mim ngga mǝ nda ɓwa Yahudi, à ɓǝ̀lám a Tarsus, nggea-là aɓa bu-nzali Sǝlisiya. Mǝ nda muna nggea-là mǝɓoarne. Ən nggǝ zǝmbo nyinggam njar mǝ nea aɓwana mǝnia ka cau.>>
ACT 21:40 Mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje pǝlǝa nyinggi wi njar ɓǝ̀ nacau. Bulǝs pǝlǝa came amur ban-eauwe, sǝ loasǝì aɓwabundǝa buì ama ɓǝà pwalo. Lang ban pwalǝna ateà più ka, Bulǝs pǝlǝa nea wia cau nǝ kun Ibǝru.
ACT 22:1 Bulǝs na ama, <<Wun amǝ'eambǝam amǝ Yahudi andǝ aɓwana-mǝgule ma'sǝm, wu kwakikir wun wu ok cau mem!>>
ACT 22:2 Lang à oe aban nacau nǝ kun malea, kun Ibǝru ka, kara ban nyare pwal ateà piu-piu. Sǝ Bulǝs lidǝmba nǝ nacau ama:
ACT 22:3 Mim ngga mǝ nda ɓwa Yahudi. À ɓǝ̀lám a nggea-là Tarsus aɓa bu-nzali Sǝlisiya, sǝama ǝn gulo, sǝ à kaniam gìr akani a Urǝshalima aɓata Gamaliyel. À kaniam Nggurcau mala aká sǝm nǝ kwarkiru pepè, ɓǝn kpata anzongcau kat komǝye na ka. Ən pa ɓamúràm gbal nǝ rǝɓǝla mǝgule ace pè Ɓakuli gulo aɓa ko mana ǝn pak ka, kǝla mǝnana wu pa, wun mǝnana ado kat akani ka.
ACT 22:4 Ən pea amǝ kpata Njar mala Mǝtalabangŋo tanni kǝ̀rkǝ́r. Aɓea ateà ka ǝn walia à wu tam-tam. Sǝ aɓea, aburana andǝ amamǝna ka, ǝn bwalkia ǝn túriá aɓa ndàkurban.
ACT 22:5 Nggearǝ Pǝris mǝgule andǝ aɓwana male ka à nǝ̀ earnǝ mim ama mǝ ndaban na mǝsǝcau. Acemǝnana a buia sǝ ǝn nggǝ ak acauterǝa aban ká aban aɓwana-mǝgule amǝ là-sǝm amǝ Yahudi mǝnana a Damaska ka. Tǝr wario mem ngga nda mǝnana ama, ɓǝn bwalki amǝ kpata Yesu, ɓǝn kùrkia nǝ ansolo, ɓǝn yinǝia a Urǝshalima ace mǝnana ɓǝà yi pea wia tanni ka.
ACT 22:6 A ɓè fara mǝ nda mur njar aban ká, ǝn gbashìnà nggea-là Damaska, nǝ pwari zǝkya. Kaniama ɓalǝam nǝ̀ kasǝ ka, kara nggea tǎlaban karara, pur nǝ kuli yi tá gumbǝlǝem.
ACT 22:7 Ən kasǝa ǝn kpa a nzali, sǝ ǝn ok giu aban nam ama, <<Sawul, Sawul! Ace mana sǝ a kǝ pam tanni?>>
ACT 22:8 Sǝ ǝn ɗiban nǝma, <<A nda yana le, ɓwamǝgule?>> Pǝlǝa nam ama, <<Mǝ nda Yesu ɓwa Nazarat, mǝnana a kǝ pe wi tanni ka.>>
ACT 22:9 Aɓwana mǝnana atàm ngga, à sǝn tǎlaban sǝ ɓangciu pàkkia wia, sǝama à bwalta ɓá gìr mǝnana giu nakiyiam ngga ɗàng.
ACT 22:10 Sǝ ǝn ɗî ama, <<Mana mǝ nǝ pak le Mǝtalabangŋo?>> Pǝlǝa Mǝtalabangŋo nam ama, <<Lo, o aɓa Damaska, akàm sǝ à nǝ̀ nggá banggo gìr mǝnana kat awu nǝ pàk ka.>>
ACT 22:11 Mǝno yì tǎlaban ngga kara ciem amǝsǝam duk nte. Aɓwana mǝnana sǝm nda sǝnǝia ka, à bwalam a buam à warinǝ mim aɓa nggea-là Damaska.
ACT 22:12 Aɓa mǝno yì lamǝgule ka, ɓekǝ ɓwabura nda a banì à tunǝki ama, Hananiya; mǝ'ɓanggi Ɓakuli na, bwal nggurcau mala amǝ Yahudi nǝ paɓamuru tam-tam. Amǝ Yahudi mǝnana a Damaska kat ka, à kǝ pe wi gulo.
ACT 22:13 Yiu yi came a nkanggariam sǝ nam ama, <<Mǝ'eambam Sawul, ak sǝnban mô!>> Anggo àkǝ̀ banì amǝsǝam mǝnna, kara ǝn sǝni.
ACT 22:14 Pǝlǝa na ama, <<Ɓakuli mala aká sǝm tàrró ace mǝnana wu súrǝ̀ kànì male. Tàrno wu sǝn Ɓwa male Mǝɓealɓoarna, yì Mǝ'amsǝban, sǝ wu ok gi aban nacau.
ACT 22:15 Kǝ earce ama we ka, awu nǝ duk mǝ'nakuni. Awu nǝ ne koya ɓwa ka gìr mǝnana a sǝni sǝ a ok ka.
ACT 22:16 Sǝ adyan ngga, mana ɗǝm a kundǝkiyia? Lo, ɓǝà pakko batisǝma, pwanzali a ban Mǝtalabangŋo ɓǝ̀ twalo ban acauɓikea mô.>>
ACT 22:17 Anzǝm man ngga ǝn nyare a Urǝshalima, sǝ mǝ nda ban pak hiwi aɓa Ndàmǝgule mala Ɓakuli ka, kara ǝn sǝn sǝna aɓa bangŋo.
ACT 22:18 Ən sǝn Mǝtalabangŋo Yesu nda rǝ banggàm ama, <<Lo, farǝo nying Urǝshalima, acemǝnana aɓwana man kani ka à pà nǝ̀ ak cau mǝnana awu nǝ na a muram ngga ɗàng.>>
ACT 22:19 Pǝlǝa ǝn ne wi nǝma, <<Mǝtalabangŋo, kǝla yia ka à sǝlǝna ama, a koya ndakpapi ka ǝn wario ǝn nggǝ bwalki amǝ kpato, ǝn nggǝ pea wia tanni.
ACT 22:20 Sǝ a pwari mǝnana à wal-lú mǝ'nakuno yì Itǝfanu ka, ǝn ear nǝ mǝno yì wal-lú ka pepè. Mǝ nda kam aban came ǝn nggǝ tsǝkir anggea-daura mala aɓwana mǝnana à ɓukki à wali wu ka.>>
ACT 22:21 Pǝlǝa Mǝtalabangŋo nam ama, <<Kyane, acemǝnana mǝ nǝ túrǒ kuko aban aɓwana mǝnana amǝ Yahudi na raka.>>
ACT 22:22 Ɓwapǝndǝa kwakikiri, yi bwal ban mǝnana Bulǝs na mǝnia yì cau ka, pǝlǝa à lo loàsǝ̀ban nǝ giu kpǝm aban na ama, <<Wu wali ɓǝ̀ wu! Yì ka, kārǝa ɓǝ̀ dum nǝ yilǝmu ɗang!>>
ACT 22:23 Lang à ndaban makki'zwalo kǝ̀rkǝ́r, à kǝ yasǝlǝki anggea-daura malea a kùli, à kǝ loasǝ tú a gung ka,
ACT 22:24 mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje tsǝa à kútí nǝ Bulǝs aɓa ban-mǝcandǝe malea. Pǝlǝa bang ama ɓǝà koè ace mǝnana ɓǝà súrǝ̀ tǝr gir mǝnana tsǝa sǝ amǝ Yahudi lo nǝ zwalo arǝì anggo ka.
ACT 22:25 À kùrkina Bulǝs nǝ nggúr ama à nǝ̀ koè. Pǝlǝa ɗì soje mǝgulo mǝnana came a banì ka ama, <<Nggearǝì ka, nggurcau mala nzali eara wun ama ɓǝ̀ wu kok ɓwa nzali Roma mǝnana à malaká ɓashi wi, à kumi nǝ ɓekǝ cauɓikea raka le?>>
ACT 22:26 Lang soje mǝgulo man ok man yì cau ka, kara o a ban mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje, kya ɗì ama, <<Mana a kǝ earce ama awu nǝ pa? Ɓwa mǝno ka, ɓwa nzali Roma na!>>
ACT 22:27 Pǝlǝa mǝ'sàrǝ̀ban mala asoje wari a ban Bulǝs kya ɗì ama, <<Nam, we ka, a nda ɓwa nzali Roma le?>> Bulǝs eari wi ama, <<E, mǝ nda ɓwa Roma.>>
